wyzw preh bywm hhwa at hngSym bem wat STryw lamr and pharaoh-big-house direct the same day the taskmasters of the with-mum-people, and their officers, saying, vayzav par‘oh bayom hahu, hanogesim ba‘am ve’et shoterav lemor.
la taspwn ltt tbn lem llbn hlbnym ktmwl SlSm hm ylkw wqSSw lhm tbn ye no more give the with-mum-people straw-t-between to make brick-l-between, as heretofore: let them go and gather straw-t-between for themselves. lo tosifun latet teben la‘am lilbon halebenim kitmol shilshom, hem yelekhu veqosheshu lahem teben.
wat mtknt hlbnym aSr hm eSym tmwl SlSm tSymw elyhm la tgrew mmnw ky nrpym hm el kn hm zeqym lamr nlkh ncbxh lalhynw and the tale of the brick-l-betweens, which they did make heretofore, ye lay upon them; ye not diminish ought thereof: for they be idle; therefore they cry, saying, let us go and butcher to our to-no-these. ve’et matkonet halebenim ’asher hem ‘osim temol shilshom tasimu ‘alehem lo tigre‘u mimenu, ki nirpim hem ‘al ken hem zo‘aqim lemor nelekhah nizbekhah lelohenu.
tkbd hebdh el hanSym wyeSw bh wal ySew bdbry Sqr let there more work be laid upon the men, that they may labor therein; and let them not regard vain bee-words. tikhbad ha‘abodah ‘al ha’anashim veya‘asu bah, ve’al yish‘u bedibre shaqer.
wyzaw ngSy hem wSTryw wyamrw al hem lamr kh amr preh aynny ntn lkm tbn and the taskmasters of the with-mum-people went out, and their officers, and they spake to the with-mum-people, saying, thus saith pharaoh-big-house, i will not give you straw-t-between. vayeze’u nogesei ha‘am veshoterav vayomeru ’el ha‘am lemor, koh ’amar par‘oh ’eneni noten lakhem teben.
atm lkw qxw lkm tbn maSr tmzaw ky ayn ngre mebdtkm dbr go ye, get you straw-t-between where ye can find it: yet not ought of your work be diminished. ’atem lekhu qekhu lakhem teben me’asher timza’u, ki ’en nigra‘ me‘abodatkhem.
wypz hem bkl arz mzrym lqSS qS ltbn so the with-mum-people were scattered abroad throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows to gather stubble instead of straw-t-between. vayafez ha‘am bekhal ’erez mizrayim, leqoshesh qash lateben.
whngSym azym lamr klw meSykm dbr ywm bywmw kaSr bhywt htbn and the taskmasters hasted them, saying, fulfil your works, your daily tasks, as when there was straw-t-between. vehanogesim ’azim lemor, kalu ma‘asekhem debar yom beyomo ka’asher bihyot hateben.
wykw STry bny ySral aSr Smw elhm ngSy preh lamr mdwe la klytm xqkm llbn ktmwl SlSm gm tmwl gm hywm and the officers of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which pharaoh-big-house's taskmasters had set over them, were beaten, and demanded, wherefore have ye not fulfilled your task in making brick-l-between both yesterday and to day, as heretofore? vayuku shoterei benei yisra’el ’asher samu ‘alehem nogesei far‘oh lemor, madua‘ lo khilitem khaqekhem lilbon kitmol shilshom gam temol gam hayom.
wybaw STry bny ySral wyzeqw al preh lamr lmh teSh kh lebdyk then the officers of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards came and cried unto pharaoh-big-house, saying, wherefore dealest thou thus with thy workers? vayabo’u shoterei benei yisra’el vayiz‘aqu ’el par‘oh lemor, lamah ta‘aseh khoh la‘abadekha.
tbn ayn ntn lebdyk wlbnym amrym lnw eSw whnh ebdyk mkym wxTat emk there is no straw-t-between given unto thy workers, and they say to us, make brick-l-between: and, behold, thy workers are beaten; and the fault is in thine own with-mum-people. teben ’en nitan la‘abadekha ulebenim ’omerim lanu ‘asu, vehineh ‘abadekha mukim vekhatat ‘amekha.
wyamr nrpym atm nrpym el kn atm amrym nlkh ncbxh lyhwh and he said, ye are idle, ye are idle: therefore ye say, let us go and do butcher to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayomer nirpim ’atem nirpim, ‘al ken ’atem ’omerim nelekhah nizbekhah yhvh.
weth lkw ebdw wtbn la yntn lkm wtkn lbnym ttnw go therefore now, and work; for there no straw-t-between be given you, yet ye deliver the tale of brick-l-betweens. ve‘atah lekhu ‘ibdu veteben lo yinaten lakhem, vetokhen lebenim titenu.
wyraw STry bny ySral atm bre lamr la tgrew mlbnykm dbr ywm bywmw and the officers of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did see that they were in bad case, after it was said, ye not minish ought from your brick-l-betweens of your daily task. vayir’u shoterei bene yisra’el ’otam bera‘ lemor, lo tigre‘u milibnekhem debar yom beyomo.
wypgew at mSh wat ahrn nzbym lqratm bzatm mat preh and they met mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, who stood in the way, as they came forth from pharaoh-big-house: vayifge‘u mosheh ve’et ’aharon nizabim liqratam, bezetam me’et par‘oh.
wyamrw alhm yra yhwh elykm wySpT aSr hbaStm at ryxnw beyny preh wbeyny ebdyw ltt xrb bydm lhrgnw and they said unto them, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah look upon you, and decide; because ye have made our savor to be crave-abhorred in the eyes of pharaoh-big-house, and in the eyes of his workers, to put a sword in their hand to slay us. vayomeru ’alehem yere yhvh ‘alekhem veyishpot, ’asher hib’ashtem rekhenu be‘enei far‘oh ube‘enei ‘abadav latet khereb beyadam leharegenu.
wySb mSh al yhwh wyamr adny lmh hreth lem hch lmh ch Slxtny and mose-extracted returned unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and said, my base-lord, wherefore hast thou so bad entreated this with-mum-people? why is it that thou hast sent me? vayashab mosheh ’el yhvh vayomar, ’adonay lamah hare‘otah la‘am hazeh lamah zeh shelakhtani.
wmac baty al preh ldbr bSmk hre lem hch whzl la hzlt at emk for since i came to pharaoh-big-house to speak in thy name, he hath done bad to this with-mum-people; neither hast thou delivered thy with-mum-people at all. ume’az bati ’el par‘oh ledaber bishmekha hera‘ la‘am hazeh, vehazel lo hizalta ‘amekha.
wyamr yhwh al mSh eth trah aSr aeSh lpreh ky byd xcqh ySlxm wbyd xcqh ygrSm marzw then yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, now thou see what i will do to pharaoh-big-house: for with a strong hand he let them go, and with a strong hand he drive them out of his land. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘atah tir’eh ’asher ’e‘eseh lefar‘oh, ki beyad khazaqah yeshalekhem ubeyad khazaqah yegareshem me’arzo.
wydbr alhym al mSh wyamr alyw any yhwh and to-no-these spake unto mose-extracted, and said unto him, i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: vaydaber ’elohim ’el mosheh, vayomer ’elav ’ani yhvh.
wara al abrhm al yzxq wal yeqb bal Sdy wSmy yhwh la nwdety lhm and i appeared unto abraham-their-dick, unto isaac-laughter, and unto jacob-backstreet, by the name of to-no-these almighty, and by my name yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was i not hand-known to them. va’era ’el ’abraham ’el yizkhaq ve’el ya‘aqob be’el shaday, ushemi yhvh lo noda‘ti lahem.
wgm hqmty at bryty atm ltt lhm at arz knen at arz mgryhm aSr grw bh and i have also established my covenant with them, to give them the land of canaan-mobile-trade, the land of their pilgrimage, wherein they were strangers. vegam haqimoti beriti ’itam latet lahem ’erez kena‘an, ’erez megurehem ’asher garu bah.
wgm any Smety at naqt bny ySral aSr mzrym mebdym atm wackr at bryty and i have also heard the groaning of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, whom the mizraim-narrowsians keep in bondage; and i have remembered my covenant. vegam ’ani shama‘ti na’aqat benei yisra’el ’asher mizrayim ma‘abidim va’ezkor beriti.
lkn amr lbny ySral any yhwh whwzaty atkm mtxt sblt mzrym whzlty atkm mebdtm wgalty atkm bcrwe nTwyh wbSpTym gdlym wherefore say unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and i will bring you out from under the burdens of the mizraim-narrowsians, and i will rid you out of their bondage, and i will redeem you with a stretched out arm, and with great decision-grammars: lakhen ’emor libne yisra’el ’ani yhvh vehozeti ’etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim vehizalti ’etkhem me‘abodatam, vega’alti ’etkhem bizroa‘ netuyah ubishfatim gedolim.
wlqxty atkm ly lem whyyty lkm lalhym wydetm ky any yhwh alhykm hmwzya atkm mtxt sblwt mzrym and i will take you to me for a with-mum-people, and i will be to you a to-no-these: and ye hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, which bringeth you out from under the burdens of the mizraim-narrowsians. velaqakhti ’etkhem li le‘am vehayiti lakhem lelohim, vida‘tem ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem hamozi ’etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim.
whbaty atkm al harz aSr nSaty at ydy ltt ath labrhm lyzxq wlyeqb wntty ath lkm mwrSh any yhwh and i will bring you in unto the land, concerning the which i did swear to give it to abraham-their-dick, to isaac-laughter, and to jacob-backstreet; and i will give it you for an heritage: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehebeti ’etkhem ’el ha’arez ’asher nasati latet le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob, venatati ’otah lakhem morashah ’ani yhvh.
wydbr mSh kn al bny ySral wla Smew al mSh mqzr rwx wmebdh qSh and mose-extracted spake so unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and they hearkened not unto mose-extracted for anguish of breath-spirit, and for cruel bondage. vaydaber mosheh ken ’el benei yisra’el, velo shame‘u ’el mosheh miqozer ruakh ume‘abodah qashah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
ba dbr al preh mlk mzrym wySlx at bny ySral marzw go in, speak unto pharaoh-big-house king-moloch of mizraim-narrows, that he let children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards go out of his land. bo daber ’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim, vishalakh bene yisra’el me’arzo.
wydbr mSh lpny yhwh lamr hn bny ySral la Smew aly wayk ySmeny preh wany erl Sptym and mose-extracted spake before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, saying, behold, children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards have not hearkened unto me; how then pharaoh-big-house hear me, who am of foreskinned lips? vaydaber mosheh lifnei yhvh lemor, hen bene yisra’el lo shame‘u ’elay ve’ekh yishma‘eni far‘oh va’ani ‘aral sefatayim.
wydbr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn wyzwm al bny ySral wal preh mlk mzrym lhwzya at bny ySral marz mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and unto aaron-cabinet, and gave them a charge unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and unto pharaoh-big-house king-moloch of mizraim-narrows, to bring children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards out of the land of mizraim-narrows. vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon vayzavem ’el benei yisra’el ve’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim, lehozi bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim.
alh raSy byt abtm bny rawbn bkr ySral xnwk wplwa xzrwn wkrmy alh mSpxt rawbn these be the heads of their fathers' daughter-houses: children-betweens of reuben-see-child the firstborn of israel-juicy-towards; hanoch-educated, and pallu-wonder, hezron-courtyard, and carmi-my-wine-inherityard: these be the families of reuben-see-child. ’eleh rashei bet ’abotam, benei re’uben bekhor yisra’el khanokh ufalu khezron vekharmi ’eleh mishpekhot re’uben.
wbny Smewn ymwal wymyn wahd wykyn wzxr wSawl bn hknenyt alh mSpxt Smewn and children-betweens of simeon-hear-home; towards-his-sea, and jamin-righthand, and ohad-one, and jachin-prepare, and zohar-bleach, and shaul-lent child-between of a canaan-mobile-tradeitish woman: these are the families of simeon-hear-home. ubenei shim‘on yemu’el veyamin ve’ohad veyakhin vezokhar vesha’ul ben hakena‘anit, ’eleh mishpekhot shim‘on.
walh Smwt bny lwy ltldtm grSwn wqht wmrry wSny xyy lwy Sbe wSlSym wmat Snh and these are the names of children-betweens of levi-join according to their generations; gershon-drive-out, and kohath-obedient-hope, and merari-bitter: and the years of the life of levi-join were an hundred thirty and seven years. ve’eleh shemot bene levi letoledotam gereshon uqehat umerari, ushenei khayei levi sheba‘ usheloshim ume’at shanah.
bny grSwn lbny wSmey lmSpxtm children-betweens of gershon-drive-out; libni-to-build-my-white, and shimi-my-hearing, according to their families. benei gereshon libni veshim‘i lemishpekhotam.
wbny qht emrm wyzhr wxbrwn wecyal wSny xyy qht SlS wSlSym wmat Snh and children-betweens of kohath-obedient-hope; amram-people-high, and izhar-aperture, and hebron-friend-joy, and uz-gooseziel: and the years of the life of kohath-obedient-hope were an hundred thirty and three years. ubenei qehat ‘amram veyizhar vekhebron ve‘uzi’el, ushenei khayei qehat shalosh usheloshim ume’at shanah.
wbny mrry mxly wmwSy alh mSpxt hlwy ltldtm and children-betweens of merari-bitter; makhali-my-pardon and mushi-my-draw: these are the families of levi-join according to their generations. ubenei merari makhli umushi, ’eleh mishpekhot halevi letoledotam.
wyqx emrm at ywkbd ddtw lw laSh wtld lw at ahrn wat mSh wSny xyy emrm Sbe wSlSym wmat Snh and amram-people-high took him jochebed-made-heavy his father's sister to woman; and she conceived-of him aaron-cabinet and mose-extracted: and the years of the life of amram-people-high were an hundred and thirty and seven years. vayiqakh ‘amram yokhebed dodato lo le’ishah vateled lo ’aharon ve’et mosheh, ushenei khayei ‘amram sheba‘ usheloshim ume’at shanah.
wbny yzhr qrx wnpg wckry and children-betweens of izhar-aperture; korah-bald-ice, and nepheg-expired, and zichri-my-rememberer. ubenei yizhar, qorakh vanefeg vezikhri.
wbny ecyal mySal walzpn wstry and children-betweens of uz-gooseziel; mishael-towards-poll, and elzaphan-towards-cipher, and zithri-my-secret. ubenei ‘uzi’el, misha’el ve’elzafan vesitri.
wyqx ahrn at alySbe bt emyndb axwt nxSwn lw laSh wtld lw at ndb wat abyhwa at alecr wat aytmr and aaron-cabinet took him elisheba-my-towards-seven, daughter-hoof-bat-child of aminadab-my-people-contribute, sister of naashon-guess-snake, to woman; and she conceived-of him nadab-volunteer, and abihu-he-my-pa, eleazar-towards-stop, and itamar-with-palm. vayiqakh ’aharon ’elisheba‘ bat ‘aminadab ’akhot nakhshon lo le’ishah, vateled lo nadab ve’et ’abihu ’el‘azar ve’et ’itamar.
wbny qrx asyr walqnh wabyasp alh mSpxt hqrxy and children-betweens of korah-bald-ice; assir-prisoner, and elkanah-towards-buy, and abiasaph-my-father-collects: these are the families of the korhites-bald-ice. ubenei qorakh ’asir ve’elqanah va’abi’asaf, ’eleh mishpekhot haqarekhi.
walecr bn ahrn lqx lw mbnwt pwTyal lw laSh wtld lw at pynxs alh raSy abwt hlwym lmSpxtm and eleazar-towards-stop aaron-cabinet's child-between took him one of children-betweenesss of putiel-my-open-towards to woman; and she conceived-of him pinehas-mouth-attempt: these are the heads of the fathers of the levi-jointes according to their families. ve’el‘azar ben ’aharon laqakh lo mibenot puti’el lo le’ishah vateled lo pinekhas, ’eleh rashei ’abot halviyim lemishpekhotam.
hwa ahrn wmSh aSr amr yhwh lhm hwzyaw at bny ySral marz mzrym el zbatm these are that aaron-cabinet and mose-extracted, to whom yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said, bring out children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards from the land of mizraim-narrows according to their troop-clusters. hu ’aharon umosheh, ’asher ’amar yhvh lahem hozi’u benei yisra’el me’erez mizrayim ‘al zib’otam.
hm hmdbrym al preh mlk mzrym lhwzya at bny ySral mmzrym hwa mSh wahrn these are they which spake to pharaoh-big-house king-moloch of mizraim-narrows, to bring out children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards from mizraim-narrows: these are that mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet. hem hamdaberim ’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim lehozi bene yisra’el mimizrayim, hu mosheh ve’aharon.
wyhy bywm dbr yhwh al mSh barz mzrym and it came to pass on the day when yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted in the land of mizraim-narrows, vayhi beyom diber yhvh ’el mosheh be’erez mizrayim.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr any yhwh dbr al preh mlk mzrym at kl aSr any dbr alyk that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: speak thou unto pharaoh-big-house king-moloch of mizraim-narrows all that i say unto thee. vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor ’ani yhvh, daber ’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim kal ’asher ’ani dober ’elekha.
wyamr mSh lpny yhwh hn any erl Sptym wayk ySme aly preh and mose-extracted said before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, behold, i am of foreskinned lips, and how pharaoh-big-house hearken unto me? vayomer mosheh lifnei yhvh, hen ’ani ‘aral sefatayim ve’ekh yishma‘ ’elay par‘oh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh rah nttyk alhym lpreh wahrn axyk yhyh nbyak and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, see, i have made thee a to-no-these to pharaoh-big-house: and aaron-cabinet thy brother be thy bringer. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh re’eh netatikha ’elohim lefar‘oh, ve’aharon ’akhikha yihyeh nebi’ekha.
ath tdbr at kl aSr azwk wahrn axyk ydbr al preh wSlx at bny ySral marzw thou speak all that i direct thee: and aaron-cabinet thy brother speak unto pharaoh-big-house, that he send children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards out of his land. ’atah tedaber kal ’asher ’azaveka, ve’aharon ’akhikha yedaber ’el par‘oh veshilakh bene yisra’el me’arzo.
wany aqSh at lb preh whrbyty at atty wat mwpty barz mzrym and i will harden pharaoh-big-house's heart, and multiply my signs and my wonders in the land of mizraim-narrows. va’ani ’aqsheh leb par‘oh, vehirbeti ’ototay ve’et moftay be’erez mizrayim.
wla ySme alkm preh wntty at ydy bmzrym whwzaty at zbaty at emy bny ySral marz mzrym bSpTym gdlym and pharaoh-big-house not hearken unto you, that i may lay my hand upon mizraim-narrows, and bring forth mine troop-clusters, and my with-mum-people children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, out of the land of mizraim-narrows by great decision-grammars. velo yishma‘ ’alekhem par‘oh venatati yadi bemizrayim, vehozeti zib’otay ‘ami bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim bishfatim gedolim.
wydew mzrym ky any yhwh bnTty at ydy el mzrym whwzaty at bny ySral mtwkm and the mizraim-narrowsians hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, when i stretch forth mine hand upon mizraim-narrows, and bring out children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards from inward them. veyade‘u mizrayim ki ’ani yhvh bintoti ’et yadi ‘al mizrayim, vehozeti bene yisra’el mitokham.
wyeS mSh wahrn kaSr zwh yhwh atm kn eSw and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct them, so did they. vaya‘as mosheh ve’aharon, ka’asher zivah yhvh ’otam ken ‘asu.
wmSh bn Smnym Snh wahrn bn SlS wSmnym Snh bdbrm al preh and mose-extracted was fourscore years old, and aaron-cabinet fourscore and three years old, when they spake unto pharaoh-big-house. umosheh ben shemonim shanah ve’aharon ben shalosh ushemonim shanah, bedaberam ’el par‘oh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and unto aaron-cabinet, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
ky ydbr alkm preh lamr tnw lkm mwpt wamrt al ahrn qx at mTk whSlk lpny preh yhy ltnyn when pharaoh-big-house speak unto you, saying, show a miracle for you: then thou say unto aaron-cabinet, take thy pen, and cast it before-turns pharaoh-big-house, and it become a serpent. ki yedaber ’alekhem par‘oh lemor tenu lakhem mofet, ve’amarta ’el ’aharon qakh matekha vehashlekh lifne far‘oh yehi letanin.
wyba mSh wahrn al preh wyeSw kn kaSr zwh yhwh wySlk ahrn at mThw lpny preh wlpny ebdyw wyhy ltnyn and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet went in unto pharaoh-big-house, and they did so as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had direct: and aaron-cabinet cast down his pen before-turns pharaoh-big-house, and before-turns his workers, and it became a serpent. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el par‘oh vaya‘asu khen ka’asher zivah yhvh, vayashlekh ’aharon matehu lifnei far‘oh velifnei ‘abadav vayhi letanin.
wyqra gm preh lxkmym wlmkSpym wyeSw gm hm xrTmy mzrym blhTyhm kn then pharaoh-big-house also called the wise men and the sorcerers: now the magicians of mizraim-narrows, they also did in like manner with their enchantments. vayiqra gam par‘oh lakhakhamim velamkhashefim, vaya‘asu gam hem khartumei mizrayim belahatehem ken.
wySlykw ayS mThw wyhyw ltnynm wyble mTh ahrn at mTtm for they cast down every man his pen, and they became serpents: and aaron-cabinet's pen swallowed up their pens. vayashlikhu ’ish matehu vayihyu letaninim, vayibla‘ mateh ’aharon matotam.
wyxcq lb preh wla Sme alhm kaSr dbr yhwh and he hardened pharaoh-big-house's heart, that he hearkened not unto them; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had said. vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem, ka’asher diber yhvh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh kbd lb preh man lSlx hem and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, pharaoh-big-house's heart is hardened, he refuseth to let the with-mum-people go. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh kabed leb par‘oh, me’en leshalakh ha‘am.
lk al preh bbqr hnh yza hmymh wnzbt lqratw el Spt hyar whmTh aSr nhpk lnxS tqx bydk get thee unto pharaoh-big-house in the morning; lo, he goeth out unto the from-waters; and thou stand by the river's brink against he come; and the pen which was turned to a serpent thou take in thine hand. lekh ’el par‘oh baboqer hineh yozei hamaymah venizabta liqrato ‘al sefat hay’or, vehamateh ’asher nehpakh lenakhash tiqakh beyadekha.
wamrt alyw yhwh alhy hebrym Slxny alyk lamr Slx at emy wyebdny bmdbr whnh la Smet ed kh and thou say unto him, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of the hebrew-cross-overs hath sent me unto thee, saying, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me in the place-of-word-desert: and, behold, hitherto thou wouldest not hear. ve’amarta ’elav yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim shelakhani ’elekha lemor shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni bamidbar, vehineh lo shama‘ta ‘ad koh.
kh amr yhwh bcat tde ky any yhwh hnh anky mkh bmTh aSr bydy el hmym aSr byar wnhpkw ldm thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, in this thou hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: behold, i will hit with the pen that is in mine hand upon the from-waters which are in the river, and they be turned to blood. koh ’amar yhvh bezot teda‘ ki ’ani yhvh, hineh ’anokhi makeh bamateh ’asher beyadi hamayim ’asher bay’or venehefkhu ledam.
whdgh aSr byar tmwt wbaS hyar wnlaw mzrym lStwt mym mn hyar and the fish that is in the river die, and the river stink; and the mizraim-narrowsians loathe to drink of the from-waters of the river. vehadagah ’asher bay’or tamut uba’ash hay’or, venil’u mizrayim lishtot mayim min hay’or.
wyamr yhwh al mSh amr al ahrn qx mTk wnTh ydk el mymy mzrym el nhrtm el yaryhm wel agmyhm wel kl mqwh mymyhm wyhyw dm whyh dm bkl arz mzrym wbezym wbabnym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, say unto aaron-cabinet, take thy pen, and stretch out thine hand upon the from-waters of mizraim-narrows, upon their streams, upon their rivers, and upon their ponds, and upon all their pools of from-waters, that they may become blood; and that there may be blood throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows, both in tools of wood, and in tools of father-child-stone. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el ’aharon qakh matekha uneteh yadekha ‘al memei mizrayim ‘al naharotam ‘al ye’orehem ve‘al ’agmehem ve‘al kal miqveh memehem veyihyu dam, vehayah dam bekhal ’erez mizrayim uba‘ezim uba’abanim.
wyeSw kn mSh wahrn kaSr zwh yhwh wyrm bmTh wyk at hmym aSr byar leyny preh wleyny ebdyw wyhpkw kl hmym aSr byar ldm and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet did so, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct; and he lifted up the pen, and smote the from-waters that were in the river, in the sight of pharaoh-big-house, and in the sight of his workers; and all the from-waters that were in the river were turned to blood. vaya‘asu khen mosheh ve’aharon ka’asher zivah yhvh vayarem bamateh vayakh hamayim ’asher bay’or le‘enei far‘oh ule‘enei ‘abadav, vayehafekhu kal hamayim ’asher bay’or ledam.
whdgh aSr byar mth wybaS hyar wla yklw mzrym lStwt mym mn hyar wyhy hdm bkl arz mzrym and the fish that was in the river died; and the river stank, and the mizraim-narrowsians could not drink of the from-waters of the river; and there was blood throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows. vehadagah ’asher bay’or metah vayib’ash hay’or velo yakhelu mizrayim lishtot mayim min hay’or, vayhi hadam bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wyeSw kn xrTmy mzrym blTyhm wyxcq lb preh wla Sme alhm kaSr dbr yhwh and the magicians of mizraim-narrows did so with their enchantments: and pharaoh-big-house's heart was hardened, neither did he hearken unto them; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had said. vaya‘asu khen khartumei mizrayim belatehem, vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem ka’asher diber yhvh.
wypn preh wyba al bytw wla St lbw gm lcat and pharaoh-big-house turned and went into his daughter-house, neither did he set his heart to this also. vayifen par‘oh vayabo ’el beto, velo shat libo gam lazot.
wyxprw kl mzrym sbybt hyar mym lStwt ky la yklw lStt mmymy hyar and all the mizraim-narrowsians digged round about the river for from-waters to drink; for they could not drink of the from-waters of the river. vayakhperu khal mizrayim sebibot hay’or mayim lishtot, ki lo yakhelu lishtot mimemei hay’or.
wymla Sbet ymym axry hkwt yhwh at hyar and seven days were fulfilled, after that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had smitten the river. vayimalei shib‘at yamim, ’akharei hakot yhvh hay’or.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ba al preh wamrt alyw kh amr yhwh Slx at emy wyebdny and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, go unto pharaoh-big-house, and say unto him, thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh bo ’el par‘oh, ve’amarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
wam man ath lSlx hnh anky ngp at kl gbwlk bzprdeym and if thou refuse to let them go, behold, i will hit all thy borders with frogs: ve’im ma’en ’atah leshaleakh, hineh ’anokhi nogef kal gebulekha bazfarde‘im.
wSrz hyar zprdeym welw wbaw bbytk wbxdr mSkbk wel mTtk wbbyt ebdyk wbemk wbtnwryk wbmSarwtyk and the river bring forth frogs abundantly, which go up and come into thine daughter-house, and into thy bedchamber, and upon thy bed, and into the daughter-house of thy workers, and upon thy with-mum-people, and into thine ovens, and into thy kneadingtroughs: vesharaz hay’or zefarde‘im ve‘alu uba’u bebetekha ubakhadar mishkabekha ve‘al mitatekha, ubebet ‘abadekha ube‘amekha ubetanurekha ubemish’arotekha.
wbkh wbemk wbkl ebdyk yelw hzprdeym and the frogs come up both on thee, and upon thy with-mum-people, and upon all thy workers. ubekhah ube‘amekha ubekhal ‘abadekha, ya‘alu hazfarde‘im.
wyamr yhwh al mSh amr al ahrn nTh at ydk bmTk el hnhrt el hyarym wel hagmym whel at hzprdeym el arz mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, say unto aaron-cabinet, stretch forth thine hand with thy pen over the streams, over the rivers, and over the ponds, and cause frogs to come up upon the land of mizraim-narrows. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el ’aharon neteh yadekha bematekha ‘al haneharot ‘al hay’orim ve‘al ha’agamim, veha‘al hazfarde‘im ‘al ’erez mizrayim.
wyT ahrn at ydw el mymy mzrym wtel hzprde wtks at arz mzrym and aaron-cabinet stretched out his hand over the from-waters of mizraim-narrows; and the frogs came up, and covered the land of mizraim-narrows. vayet ’aharon yado ‘al memei mizrayim, vata‘al hazefardea‘ vatekhas ’erez mizrayim.
wyeSw kn hxrTmym blTyhm wyelw at hzprdeym el arz mzrym and the magicians did so with their enchantments, and brought up frogs upon the land of mizraim-narrows. vaya‘asu khen hakhartumim belatehem, vaya‘alu hazfarde‘im ‘al ’erez mizrayim.
wyqra preh lmSh wlahrn wyamr hetyrw al yhwh wysr hzprdeym mmny wmemy waSlxh at hem wycbxw lyhwh then pharaoh-big-house called for mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, and said, entreat yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, that he may take away the frogs from me, and from my with-mum-people; and i will let the with-mum-people go, that they may do butcher unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayiqra far‘oh lemosheh ule’aharon vayomer ha‘tiru yhvh veyaser hazfarde‘im mimeni ume‘ami, va’ashalekhah ha‘am veyizbekhu yhvh.
wyamr mSh lpreh htpar ely lmty aetyr lk wlebdyk wlemk lhkryt hzprdeym mmk wmbtyk rq byar tSarnh and mose-extracted said unto pharaoh-big-house, heaviness over me: when i entreat for thee, and for thy workers, and for thy with-mum-people, to destroy the frogs from thee and thy daughter-houses, that they may remain in the river only? vayomer mosheh lefar‘oh hitpa’er ‘alay lematay ’a‘tir lekha vela‘abadekha ule‘amekha lehakhrit hazafarde‘im mimekha umibatekha, raq bay’or tisha’arnah.
wyamr lmxr wyamr kdbrk lmen tde ky ayn kyhwh alhynw and he said, to morrow. and he said, be it according to thy bee-word: that thou mayest hand-know that there is none like unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these. vayomer lemakhar, vayomer kidbarekha lema‘an teda‘ ki ’en yhvh ’elohenu.
wsrw hzprdeym mmk wmbtyk wmebdyk wmemk rq byar tSarnh and the frogs depart from thee, and from thy daughter-houses, and from thy workers, and from thy with-mum-people; they remain in the river only. vesaru hazfarde‘im mimekha umibatekha ume‘abadekha ume‘amekha, raq bay’or tisha’arnah.
wyza mSh wahrn mem preh wyzeq mSh al yhwh el dbr hzprdeym aSr Sm lpreh and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet went out from pharaoh-big-house: and mose-extracted cried unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah because of the frogs which he had brought against pharaoh-big-house. vayezei mosheh ve’aharon me‘im par‘oh, vayiz‘aq mosheh ’el yhvh debar hazfarde‘im ’asher sam lefar‘oh.
wyeS yhwh kdbr mSh wymtw hzprdeym mn hbtym mn hxzrt wmn hSdt and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did according to the bee-word of mose-extracted; and the frogs died out of the daughter-houses, out of the villages, and out of the fields. vaya‘as yhvh kidbar mosheh, vayamutu hazfarde‘im min habatim min hakhazerot umin hasadot.
wyzbrw atm xmrm xmrm wtbaS harz and they added them together upon heaps: and the land stank. vayizberu ’otam khomarim khomarim, vatib’ash ha’arez.
wyra preh ky hyth hrwxh whkbd at lbw wla Sme alhm kaSr dbr yhwh and when pharaoh-big-house saw that there was respite, he hardened his heart, and hearkened not unto them; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had said. vayar par‘oh ki hayetah harevakhah vehakhbed libo velo shama‘ ’alehem, ka’asher diber yhvh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh amr al ahrn nTh at mTk whk at epr harz whyh lknm bkl arz mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, say unto aaron-cabinet, stretch out thy pen, and hit the dust of the land, that it may become lice throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el ’aharon neteh matekha vehakh ‘afar ha’arez, vehayah lekhinim bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wyeSw kn wyT ahrn at ydw bmThw wyk at epr harz wthy hknm badm wbbhmh kl epr harz hyh knym bkl arz mzrym and they did so; for aaron-cabinet stretched out his hand with his pen, and smote the dust of the earth, and it became lice in man, and in beast; all the dust of the land became lice throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows. vaya‘asu khen vayet ’aharon yado bematehu vayakh ‘afar ha’arez vatehi hakinam ba’adam ubabehemah, kal ‘afar ha’arez hayah khinim bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wyeSw kn hxrTmym blTyhm lhwzya at hknym wla yklw wthy hknm badm wbbhmh and the magicians did so with their enchantments to bring forth lice, and they could not: so there were lice upon man, and upon beast. vaya‘asu khen hakhartumim belatehem lehozi hakinim velo yakholu, vatehi hakinam ba’adam ubabehemah.
wyamrw hxrTmym al preh azbe alhym hwa wyxcq lb preh wla Sme alhm kaSr dbr yhwh then the magicians said unto pharaoh-big-house, this is the finger of to-no-these: and pharaoh-big-house's heart was hardened, and he hearkened not unto them; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had said. vayomeru hakhartumim ’el par‘oh ’ezba‘ ’elohim hi vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem ka’asher diber yhvh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hSkm bbqr whtyzb lpny preh hnh ywza hmymh wamrt alyw kh amr yhwh Slx emy wyebdny and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, rise up early in the morning, and stand before-turns pharaoh-big-house; lo, he cometh forth to the from-waters; and say unto him, thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far‘oh hineh yozei hamayemah, ve’amarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky am aynk mSlx at emy hnny mSlyx bk wbebdyk wbemk wbbtyk at herb wmlaw bty mzrym at herb wgm hadmh aSr hm elyh else, if thou wilt not let my with-mum-people go, behold, i will send swarms of flies upon thee, and upon thy workers, and upon thy with-mum-people, and into thy daughter-houses: and the daughter-houses of the mizraim-narrowsians be full of swarms of flies, and also the ground whereon they are. ki ’im ’enekha meshaleakh ‘ami hini mashliakh bekha uba‘abadekha ube‘amekha ubebatekha he‘arob, umale’u batei mizrayim ’et he‘arob vegam ha’adamah ’asher hem.
whplyty bywm hhwa at arz gSn aSr emy emd elyh lblty hywt Sm erb lmen tde ky any yhwh bqrb harz and i will sever in that day the land of goshen-rain, in which my with-mum-people dwell, that no swarms of flies be there; to the end thou mayest hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in the midst of the earth. vehifleti bayom hahu ’erez goshen ’asher ‘ami ‘omed ‘aleha lebilti heyot sham ‘arob, lema‘an teda‘ ki ’ani yhvh beqereb ha’arez.
wSmty pdt byn emy wbyn emk lmxr yhyh hat hch and i will put a division between-bin my with-mum-people and thy with-mum-people: to morrow this sign be. vesamti fedut ben ‘ami uben ‘amekha, lemakhar yihyeh ha’ot hazeh.
wyeS yhwh kn wyba erb kbd byth preh wbyt ebdyw wbkl arz mzrym tSxt harz mpny herb and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did so; and there came a grievous swarm of flies into the daughter-house of pharaoh-big-house, and into his workers' daughter-houses, and into all the land of mizraim-narrows: the land was corrupted by reason of the swarm of flies. vaya‘as yhvh ken vayabo ‘arob kabed betah far‘oh ubet ‘abadav, ubekhal ’erez mizrayim tishakhet ha’arez mipenei he‘arob.
wyqra preh al mSh wlahrn wyamr lkw cbxw lalhykm barz and pharaoh-big-house called for mose-extracted and for aaron-cabinet, and said, go ye, butcher to your to-no-these in the land. vayiqra far‘oh ’el mosheh ule’aharon, vayomer lekhu zibkhu lelohekhem ba’arez.
wyamr mSh la nkwn leSwt kn ky twebt mzrym ncbx lyhwh alhynw hn ncbx at twebt mzrym leynyhm wla ysqlnw and mose-extracted said, it is not until-witness so to do; for we butcher the abomination of the mizraim-narrowsians to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these: lo, we butcher the abomination of the mizraim-narrowsians before-turns their eyes, and will they not father-child-stone us? vayomer mosheh lo nakhon la‘asot ken ki to‘abat mizrayim nizbakh yhvh ’elohenu, hen nizbakh to‘abat mizrayim le‘enehem velo yisqelunu.
drk SlSt ymym nlk bmdbr wcbxnw lyhwh alhynw kaSr yamr alynw we will go three days' journey into the place-of-word-desert, and butcher to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these, as he direct us. derekh sheloshet yamim nelekh bamidbar, vezabakhnu yhvh ’elohenu ka’asher yomar ’elenu.
wyamr preh anky aSlx atkm wcbxtm lyhwh alhykm bmdbr rq hrxq la trxyqw llkt hetyrw bedy and pharaoh-big-house said, i will let you go, that ye may butcher to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these in the place-of-word-desert; only ye not go very far away: entreat for me. vayomer par‘oh ’anokhi ’ashalakh ’etkhem uzebakhtem yhvh ’elohekhem bamidbar raq harkheq lo tarkhiqu lalekhet, ha‘tiru ba‘adi.
wyamr mSh hnh anky ywza memk whetrty al yhwh wsr herb mpreh mebdyw wmemw mxr rq al ysp preh htl lblty Slx at hem lcbx lyhwh and mose-extracted said, behold, i go out from thee, and i will entreat yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah that the swarms of flies may depart from pharaoh-big-house, from his workers, and from his with-mum-people, to morrow: and let not pharaoh-big-house deal deceitfully any more in not letting the with-mum-people go to butcher to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayomer mosheh hineh ’anokhi yozei me‘imakh veha‘tarti yhvh vesar he‘arob mipar‘oh me‘abadav ume‘amo makhar, raq ’al yosef par‘oh hatel lebilti shalakh ha‘am lizboakh yhvh.
wyza mSh mem preh wyetr al yhwh and mose-extracted went out from pharaoh-big-house, and entreated yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayezei mosheh me‘im par‘oh, vaye‘tar ’el yhvh.
wyeS yhwh kdbr mSh wysr herb mpreh mebdyw wmemw la nSar axd and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did according to the bee-word of mose-extracted; and he removed the swarms of flies from pharaoh-big-house, from his workers, and from his with-mum-people; there remained not one. vaya‘as yhvh kidbar mosheh vayasar he‘arob mipar‘oh me‘abadav ume‘amo, lo nish’ar ’ekhad.
wykbd preh at lbw gm bpem hcat wla Slx at hem and pharaoh-big-house hardened his heart at this time also, neither would he let the with-mum-people go. vayakhbed par‘oh libo gam bapa‘am hazot, velo shilakh ha‘am.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ba al preh wdbrt alyw kh amr yhwh alhy hebrym Slx at emy wyebdny then yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, go in unto pharaoh-big-house, and tell him, thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of the hebrew-cross-overs, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh bo ’el par‘oh, vedibarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky am man ath lSlx wewdk mxcyq bm for if thou refuse to let them go, and wilt hold them still, ki ’im ma’en ’atah leshaleakh, ve‘odkha makhaziq bam.
hnh yd yhwh hwyh bmqnk aSr bSdh bswsym bxmrym bgmlym bbqr wbzan dbr kbd mad behold, the hand of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is upon thy in-them-animal which is in the field, upon the horses, upon the asses, upon the ripen-camels, upon the wall-oxen, and upon the sheep: there be a very grievous murrain. hineh yad yhvh hoyah bemiqnekha basadeh basusim bakhamorim bagemalim babaqar ubazon, deber kabed me’od.
whplh yhwh byn mqnh ySral wbyn mqnh mzrym wla ymwt mkl lbny ySral dbr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sever between-bin the in-them-animal of israel-juicy-towards and the in-them-animal of mizraim-narrows: and there nothing die of all that is children-betweens's of israel-juicy-towards. vehiflah yhvh ben miqneh yisra’el uben miqneh mizrayim, velo yamut mikal libnei yisra’el.
wySm yhwh mwed lamr mxr yeSh yhwh hdbr hch barz and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appointed a set time, saying, to morrow yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah do this thing in the land. vayasem yhvh mo‘ed lemor, makhar ya‘aseh yhvh hadabar hazeh ba’arez.
wyeS yhwh at hdbr hch mmxrt wymt kl mqnh mzrym wmmqnh bny ySral la mt axd and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did that thing on the morrow, and all the in-them-animal of mizraim-narrows died: and of the in-them-animal of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards died not one. vaya‘as yhvh hadabar hazeh mimakhorat vayamat kol miqneh mizrayim, umimiqneh bene yisra’el lo met ’ekhad.
wySlx preh whnh la mt mmqnh ySral ed axd wykbd lb preh wla Slx at hem and pharaoh-big-house sent, and, behold, there was not one of the in-them-animal of the israel-juicy-towardsites dead. and the heart of pharaoh-big-house was hardened, and he did not let the with-mum-people go. vayishlakh par‘oh vehineh lo met mimiqneh yisra’el ’ekhad, vayikhbad leb par‘oh velo shilakh ha‘am.
wyamr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn qxw lkm mla xpnykm pyx kbSn wcrqw mSh hSmymh leyny preh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted and unto aaron-cabinet, take to you handfuls of ashes of the furnace, and let mose-extracted sprinkle it toward the namespaces in the sight of pharaoh-big-house. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon qekhu lakhem khafenekhem piakh kibshan, uzeraqo mosheh hashamaymah le‘enei far‘oh.
whyh labq el kl arz mzrym whyh el hadm wel hbhmh lSxyn prx abebet bkl arz mzrym and it become small dust in all the land of mizraim-narrows, and be a grace-boil breaking forth with blains upon man, and upon beast, throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows. vehayah le’abaq ‘al kal ’erez mizrayim, vehayah ‘al ha’adam ve‘al habehemah lishkhin poreakh ’aba‘bu‘ot bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wyqxw at pyx hkbSn wyemdw lpny preh wycrq atw mSh hSmymh wyhy Sxyn abebet prx badm wbbhmh and they took ashes of the furnace, and stood before-turns pharaoh-big-house; and mose-extracted sprinkled it up toward namespaces; and it became a grace-boil breaking forth with blains upon man, and upon beast. vayiqkhu piakh hakibshan vaya‘amdu lifnei far‘oh vayizroq ’oto mosheh hashamayemah, vayhi shekhin ’aba‘bu‘ot poreakh ba’adam ubabehemah.
wla yklw hxrTmym lemd lpny mSh mpny hSxyn ky hyh hSxyn bxrTmm wbkl mzrym and the magicians could not stand before-turns mose-extracted because of the grace-boils; for the grace-boil was upon the magicians, and upon all the mizraim-narrowsians. velo yakhelu hakhartumim la‘amod lifnei mosheh mipenei hashekhin, ki hayah hashekhin bakhartumim ubekhal mizrayim.
wyxcq yhwh at lb preh wla Sme alhm kaSr dbr yhwh al mSh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hardened the heart of pharaoh-big-house, and he hearkened not unto them; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had bee-spoken unto mose-extracted. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh velo shama‘ ’alehem, ka’asher diber yhvh ’el mosheh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hSkm bbqr whtyzb lpny preh wamrt alyw kh amr yhwh alhy hebrym Slx at emy wyebdny and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, rise up early in the morning, and stand before-turns pharaoh-big-house, and say unto him, thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of the hebrew-cross-overs, let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far‘oh, ve’amarta ’elav koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky bpem hcat any Slx at kl mgpty al lbk wbebdyk wbemk bebwr tde ky ayn kmny bkl harz for i will at this time send all my plagues upon thine heart, and upon thy workers, and upon thy with-mum-people; that thou mayest hand-know that there is none like me in all the earth. ki bapa‘am hazot ’ani sholeakh kal magefotay ’el libekha uba‘abadekha ube‘amekha, ba‘abur teda‘ ki ’en kamoni bekhal ha’arez.
ky eth Slxty at ydy wak awtk wat emk bdbr wtkxd mn harz for now i will stretch out my hand, that i may hit thee and thy with-mum-people with pestilence; and thou be cut off from the earth. ki ‘atah shalakhti yadi va’akh ’otkha ve’et ‘amekha badaber, vatikakhed min ha’arez.
wawlm bebwr cat hemdtyk bebwr hratk at kxy wlmen spr Smy bkl harz and in very deed for this cause have i raised thee up, for to show in thee my dynamic; and that my name may be declared throughout all the earth. ve’ulam ba‘abur zot he‘emadtikha ba‘abur har’otekha kokhi, ulema‘an saper shemi bekhal ha’arez.
ewdk mstwll bemy lblty Slxm as yet exaltest thou thyself against my with-mum-people, that thou wilt not let them go? ‘odkha mistolel be‘ami, lebilti shalekham.
hnny mmTyr ket mxr brd kbd mad aSr la hyh kmhw bmzrym lmn hywm hwsdh wed eth behold, to morrow about this time i will cause it to rain a very grievous hail, such as hath not been in mizraim-narrows since the foundation thereof even until now. hini mamtir ka‘et makhar barad kabed me’od, ’asher lo hayah bemizrayim lemin hivasedah ve‘ad ‘atah.
weth Slx hec at mqnk wat kl aSr lk bSdh kl hadm whbhmh aSr ymza bSdh wla yasp hbyth wyrd elhm hbrd wmtw send therefore now, and gather thy in-them-animal, and all that thou hast in the field; for upon every man and beast which be found in the field, and not be brought home, the hail come down upon them, and they die. ve‘atah shelakh ha‘ez miqnekha ve’et kal ’asher lekha basadeh, kal ha’adam vehabehemah ’asher yimazei basadeh velo ye’asef habaytah veyarad ‘alehem habarad vametu.
hyra at dbr yhwh mebdy preh hnys at ebdyw wat mqnhw al hbtym he that feared the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah among the workers of pharaoh-big-house made his workers and his in-them-animal flee into the daughter-houses: hayarei debar yhvh me‘abdei par‘oh, henis ‘abadav ve’et miqnehu ’el habatim.
waSr la Sm lbw al dbr yhwh wyecb at ebdyw wat mqnhw bSdh and he that regarded not the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah left his workers and his in-them-animal in the field. va’asher lo libo debar yhvh, vaya‘azob ‘abadav ve’et miqnehu basadeh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh nTh at ydk el hSmym wyhy brd bkl arz mzrym el hadm wel hbhmh wel kl eSb hSdh barz mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, stretch forth thine hand toward namespaces, that there may be hail in all the land of mizraim-narrows, upon man, and upon beast, and upon every herb of the field, throughout the land of mizraim-narrows. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al hashamayim vihi barad bekhal ’erez mizrayim, ‘al ha’adam ve‘al habehemah ve‘al kal ‘eseb hasadeh be’erez mizrayim.
wyT mSh at mThw el hSmym wyhwh ntn qlt wbrd wthlk aS arzh wymTr yhwh brd el arz mzrym and mose-extracted stretched forth his pen toward namespaces: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sent thunder and hail, and the fire ran along upon the ground; and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah rained hail upon the land of mizraim-narrows. vayet mosheh matehu ‘al hashamayim yhvh natan qolot ubarad vatihalakh ’esh ’arezah, vayamter yhvh barad ‘al ’erez mizrayim.
wyhy brd waS mtlqxt btwk hbrd kbd mad aSr la hyh kmhw bkl arz mzrym mac hyth lgwy so there was hail, and fire mingled with the hail, very grievous, such as there was none like it in all the land of mizraim-narrows since it became a nation. vayhi barad ve’esh mitlaqakhat betokh habarad, kabed me’od ’asher lo hayah khamohu bekhal ’erez mizrayim me’az hayetah lego.
wyk hbrd bkl arz mzrym at kl aSr bSdh madm wed bhmh wat kl eSb hSdh hkh hbrd wat kl ez hSdh Sbr and the hail smote throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows all that was in the field, both man and beast; and the hail smote every herb of the field, and brake every tree of the field. vayakh habarad bekhal ’erez mizrayim kal ’asher basadeh me’adam ve‘ad behemah, ve’et kal ‘eseb hasadeh hikah habarad ve’et kal ‘ez hasadeh shiber.
rq barz gSn aSr Sm bny ySral la hyh brd only in the land of goshen-rain, where children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards were, was there no hail. raq be’erez goshen ’asher sham benei yisra’el, lo hayah barad.
wySlx preh wyqra lmSh wlahrn wyamr alhm xTaty hpem yhwh hzdyq wany wemy hrSeym and pharaoh-big-house sent, and called for mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, and said unto them, i have missed this time: yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is just, and i and my with-mum-people are wicked. vayishlakh par‘oh vayiqra lemosheh ule’aharon vayomer ’alehem khatati hapa‘am, yhvh hazadiq va’ani ve‘ami haresha‘im.
hetyrw al yhwh wrb mhyt qlt alhym wbrd waSlxh atkm wla tspwn lemd entreat yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah (for it is enough) that there be no more mighty thunderings and hail; and i will let you go, and ye stay no longer. ha‘tiru yhvh verab mihyot qolot ’elohim ubarad, va’ashalekhah ’etkhem velo tosifun la‘amod.
wyamr alyw mSh kzaty at heyr aprS at kpy al yhwh hqlwt yxdlwn whbrd la yhyh ewd lmen tde ky lyhwh harz and mose-extracted said unto him, as soon as i am gone out of the light-city, i will spread abroad my hands unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and the thunder cease, neither there be any more hail; that thou mayest hand-know how that the earth is yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's. vayomer ’elav mosheh kezeti ’et ha‘ir ’efros kapay ’el yhvh, haqolot yekhdalun vehabarad lo yihyeh ‘od lema‘an teda‘ ki yhvh ha’arez.
wath webdyk ydety ky Trm tyrawn mpny yhwh alhym and as for thee and thy workers, i hand-know that ye will not yet fear yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these. ve’atah va‘abadekha, yada‘ti ki terem tire’un yhvh ’elohim.
whpSth whSerh nkth ky hSerh abyb whpSth gbel and the flax and the gates-barley was smitten: for the gates-barley was in the ear, and the flax was bolled. vehapishtah vehase‘orah nukatah, ki hase‘orah ’abib vehapishtah gib‘ol.
whxTh whksmt la nkw ky apylt hnh and the wheat and the rye were not smitten: for they were not grown up. vehakhitah vehakusemet lo nuku, ki ’afilot henah.
wyza mSh mem preh at heyr wyprS kpyw al yhwh wyxdlw hqlwt whbrd wmTr la ntk arzh and mose-extracted went out of the light-city from pharaoh-big-house, and spread abroad his hands unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and the thunders and hail ceased, and the rain was not poured upon the earth. vayezei mosheh me‘im par‘oh ’et ha‘ir vayifros kapav ’el yhvh, vayakhdelu haqolot vehabarad umatar lo nitakh ’arezah.
wyra preh ky xdl hmTr whbrd whqlt wysp lxTa wykbd lbw hwa webdyw and when pharaoh-big-house saw that the rain and the hail and the thunders were ceased, he missed yet more, and hardened his heart, he and his workers. vayar par‘oh ki khadal hamatar vehabarad vehaqolot vayosef lakhato, vayakhbed libo hu va‘abadav.
wyxcq lb preh wla Slx at bny ySral kaSr dbr yhwh byd mSh and the heart of pharaoh-big-house was hardened, neither would he let children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards go; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had bee-spoken by mose-extracted. vayekhezaq leb par‘oh velo shilakh benei yisra’el, ka’asher diber yhvh beyad mosheh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ba al preh ky any hkbdty at lbw wat lb ebdyw lmen Sty atty alh bqrbw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, go in unto pharaoh-big-house: for i have hardened his heart, and the heart of his workers, that i might show these my signs before-turns him: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh bo ’el par‘oh, ki ’ani hikhbadti libo ve’et leb ‘abadav lema‘an shiti ’ototay ’eleh beqirbo.
wlmen tspr bacny bnk wbn bnk at aSr htellty bmzrym wat atty aSr Smty bm wydetm ky any yhwh and that thou mayest tell in the ears of thy child-between, and of thy child-between's child-between, what things i have wrought in mizraim-narrows, and my signs which i have done among them; that ye may hand-know how that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ulema‘an tesaper be’azenei binkha uben binkha ’asher hit‘alalti bemizrayim ve’et ’ototay ’asher samti bam, vida‘tem ki ’ani yhvh.
wyba mSh wahrn al preh wyamrw alyw kh amr yhwh alhy hebrym ed mty mant lent mpny Slx emy wyebdny and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet came in unto pharaoh-big-house, and said unto him, thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of the hebrew-cross-overs, how long wilt thou refuse to humble thyself before-turns me? let my with-mum-people go, that they may work for me. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el par‘oh vayomeru ’elav koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei ha‘ibrim matay me’anta le‘anot mipanay, shalakh ‘ami veya‘abduni.
ky am man ath lSlx at emy hnny mbya mxr arbh bgblk else, if thou refuse to let my with-mum-people go, behold, to morrow will i bring the locusts into thy coast: ki ’im ma’en ’atah leshaleakh ‘ami, hini mebi makhar ’arbeh bigbulekha.
wksh at eyn harz wla ywkl lrat at harz wakl at ytr hplTh hnSart lkm mn hbrd wakl at kl hez hzmx lkm mn hSdh and they cover the face-turns of the earth, that one cannot be able to see the earth: and they eat the residue of that which is escaped, which remaineth unto you from the hail, and eat every tree which groweth for you out of the field: vekhisah ‘en ha’arez velo yukhal lir’ot ha’arez, ve’akhal yeter hapeletah hanish’eret lakhem min habarad ve’akhal kal ha‘ez hazomeakh lakhem min hasadeh.
wmlaw btyk wbty kl ebdyk wbty kl mzrym aSr la raw abtyk wabwt abtyk mywm hywtm el hadmh ed hywm hch wypn wyza mem preh and they fill thy daughter-houses, and the daughter-houses of all thy workers, and the daughter-houses of all the mizraim-narrowsians; which neither thy fathers, nor thy fathers' fathers have seen, since the day that they were upon the earth unto this day. and he turned himself, and went out from pharaoh-big-house. umale’u batekha ubatei khal ‘abadekha ubatei khal mizrayim ’asher lo ra’u ’abotekha va’abot ’abotekha miyom heyotam ‘al ha’adamah ‘ad hayom hazeh, vayifen vayezei me‘im par‘oh.
wyamrw ebdy preh alyw ed mty yhyh ch lnw lmwqS Slx at hanSym wyebdw at yhwh alhyhm hTrm tde ky abdh mzrym and pharaoh-big-house's workers said unto him, how long this man be a snare unto us? let the men go, that they may work for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah their to-no-these: knowest thou not yet that mizraim-narrows is destroyed? vayomeru ‘abdei far‘oh ’elav ‘ad matay yihyeh zeh lanu lemoqesh shalakh ha’anashim veya‘abdu yhvh ’elohehem, haterem teda‘ ki ’abedah mizrayim.
wywSb at mSh wat ahrn al preh wyamr alhm lkw ebdw at yhwh alhykm my wmy hhlkym and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet were brought again unto pharaoh-big-house: and he said unto them, go, work for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these: and who are they that go? vayushab mosheh ve’et ’aharon ’el par‘oh vayomer ’alehem lekhu ‘ibdu yhvh ’elohekhem, mi vami haholekhim.
wyamr mSh bnerynw wbcqnynw nlk bbnynw wbbnwtnw bzannw wbbqrnw nlk ky xg yhwh lnw and mose-extracted said, we will go with our young and with our old, with our children-betweens and with our children-betweenesss, with our flocks and with our visit-cattles will we go; for we must hold a until-conception unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayomer mosheh bin‘arenu ubizqenenu nelekh, bebanenu ubibnotenu bezonenu ubibqarenu nelekh ki khag yhvh lanu.
wyamr alhm yhy kn yhwh emkm kaSr aSlx atkm wat Tpkm raw ky reh ngd pnykm and he said unto them, let yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah be so with you, as i will let you go, and your little ones: look to it; for bad is before-turns you. vayomer ’alehem yehi yhvh ‘imakhem ka’asher ’ashalakh ’etkhem ve’et tapekhem, re’u ki ra‘ah neged penekhem.
la kn lkw na hgbrym webdw at yhwh ky ath atm mbqSym wygrS atm mat pny preh not so: go now ye that are men, and work for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; for that ye did desire. and they were driven out from pharaoh-big-house's presence. lo khen lekhu na hagebarim ve‘ibdu yhvh ki ’otah ’atem mebaqshim, vaygaresh ’otam me’et penei far‘oh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh nTh ydk el arz mzrym barbh wyel el arz mzrym wyakl at kl eSb harz at kl aSr hSayr hbrd and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, stretch out thine hand over the land of mizraim-narrows for the locusts, that they may come up upon the land of mizraim-narrows, and eat every herb of the land, even all that the hail hath left. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al ’erez mizrayim ba’arbeh veya‘al ‘al ’erez mizrayim, veyokhal kal ‘eseb ha’arez kal ’asher hish’ir habarad.
wyT mSh at mThw el arz mzrym wyhwh nhg rwx qdym barz kl hywm hhwa wkl hlylh hbqr hyh wrwx hqdym nSa at harbh and mose-extracted stretched forth his pen over the land of mizraim-narrows, and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought an east wind upon the land all that day, and all that night; and when it was morning, the east wind brought the locusts. vayet mosheh matehu ‘al ’erez mizrayim yhvh nihag ruakh qadim ba’arez kal hayom hahu vekhal halayelah, haboqer hayah veruakh haqadim nasa ha’arbeh.
wyel harbh el kl arz mzrym wynx bkl gbwl mzrym kbd mad lpnyw la hyh kn arbh kmhw waxryw la yhyh kn and the locust went up over all the land of mizraim-narrows, and rested in all the coasts of mizraim-narrows: very grievous were they; before-turns them there were no such locusts as they, neither after them be such. vaya‘al ha’arbeh ‘al kal ’erez mizrayim vayanakh bekhol gebul mizrayim, kabed me’od lefanav lo hayah khen ’arbeh kamohu ve’akharav lo yihyeh ken.
wyks at eyn kl harz wtxSk harz wyakl at kl eSb harz wat kl pry hez aSr hwtyr hbrd wla nwtr kl yrq bez wbeSb hSdh bkl arz mzrym for they covered the face-turns of the whole earth, so that the land was darkened; and they did eat every herb of the land, and all the fruit of the trees which the hail had left: and there remained not any green thing in the trees, or in the herbs of the field, through all the land of mizraim-narrows. vaykhas ‘en kal ha’arez vatekhshakh ha’arez vayokhal kal ‘eseb ha’arez ve’et kal peri ha‘ez ’asher hotir habarad, velo notar kal yereq ba‘ez ube‘eseb hasadeh bekhal ’erez mizrayim.
wymhr preh lqra lmSh wlahrn wyamr xTaty lyhwh alhykm wlkm then pharaoh-big-house called for mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet in haste; and he said, i have missed to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, and against you. vaymaher par‘oh liqro lemosheh ule’aharon, vayomer khatati yhvh ’elohekhem velakhem.
weth Sa na xTaty ak hpem whetyrw lyhwh alhykm wysr mely rq at hmwt hch now therefore forgive, i pray thee, my miss only this once, and entreat yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, that he may take away from me this death only. ve‘atah sa na khatati ’akh hapa‘am veha‘tiru yhvh ’elohekhem, veyaser me‘alay raq hamavet hazeh.
wyza mem preh wyetr al yhwh and he went out from pharaoh-big-house, and entreated yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayezei me‘im par‘oh, vaye‘tar ’el yhvh.
wyhpk yhwh rwx ym xcq mad wySa at harbh wytqehw ymh swp la nSar arbh axd bkl gbwl mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah turned a mighty strong sea-west wind, which took away the locusts, and cast them into the end sea; there remained not one locust in all the coasts of mizraim-narrows. vayahafokh yhvh ruakh yam khazaq me’od vayisa ha’arbeh vayitqa‘ehu yamah suf, lo nish’ar ’arbeh ’ekhad bekhol gebul mizrayim.
wyxcq yhwh at lb preh wla Slx at bny ySral and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hardened pharaoh-big-house's heart, so that he would not let children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards go. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh, velo shilakh benei yisra’el.
wyamr yhwh al mSh nTh ydk el hSmym wyhy xSk el arz mzrym wymS xSk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, stretch out thine hand toward namespaces, that there may be darkness over the land of mizraim-narrows, even darkness which may be felt. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al hashamayim vihi khoshekh ‘al ’erez mizrayim, veyamesh khoshekh.
wyT mSh at ydw el hSmym wyhy xSk aplh bkl arz mzrym SlSt ymym and mose-extracted stretched forth his hand toward namespaces; and there was a thick darkness in all the land of mizraim-narrows three days: vayet mosheh yado ‘al hashamayim, vayhi khoshekh ’afelah bekhal ’erez mizrayim sheloshet yamim.
la raw ayS at axyw wla qmw ayS mtxtyw SlSt ymym wlkl bny ySral hyh awr bmwSbtm they saw not one another, neither rose any from his place for three days: and all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards had light in their dwellings. lo ra’u ’ish ’akhiv velo qamu ’ish mitakhtav sheloshet yamim, ulekhal benei yisra’el hayah ’or bemoshebotam.
wyqra preh al mSh wyamr lkw ebdw at yhwh rq zankm wbqrkm yzg gm Tpkm ylk emkm and pharaoh-big-house called unto mose-extracted, and said, go ye, work for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; only let your flocks and your visit-cattles be stayed: let your little ones also go with you. vayiqra far‘oh ’el mosheh vayomer lekhu ‘ibdu yhvh raq zonekhem ubeqarkhem yuzag, gam tapekhem yelekh ‘imakhem.
wyamr mSh gm ath ttn bydnw cbxym welwt weSynw lyhwh alhynw and mose-extracted said, thou must give us also butchers and on-ups, that we may butcher unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these. vayomer mosheh gam ’atah titen beyadenu zebakhim ve‘olot, ve‘asinu yhvh ’elohenu.
wgm mqnnw ylk emnw la tSar prsh ky mmnw nqx lebd at yhwh alhynw wanxnw la nde mh nebd at yhwh ed banw Smh our in-them-animal also go with us; there not an part-hoof be left behind; for thereof must we take to work for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these; and we hand-know not with what we must work for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, until we come thither. vegam miqnenu yelekh ‘imanu lo tisha’er parsah ki mimenu niqakh la‘abod yhvh ’elohenu, va’anakhnu lo neda‘ mah na‘abod yhvh ‘ad bo’enu shamah.
wyxcq yhwh at lb preh wla abh lSlxm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hardened pharaoh-big-house's heart, and he would not let them go. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh, velo ’abah leshalekham.
wyamr lw preh lk mely hSmr lk al tsp rawt pny ky bywm ratk pny tmwt and pharaoh-big-house said unto him, get thee from me, take heed to thyself, see my face-turns no more; for in that day thou seest my face-turns thou die. vayomer lo far‘oh lekh me‘alay, hishamer lekha ’el tosef re’ot panay ki beyom re’otekha fanay tamut.
wyamr mSh kn dbrt la asp ewd rawt pnyk and mose-extracted said, thou hast bee-spoken well, i will see thy face-turns again no more. vayomer mosheh ken dibarta, lo ’osif ‘od re’ot panekha.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ewd nge axd abya el preh wel mzrym axry kn ySlx atkm mch kSlxw klh grS ygrS atkm mch and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, yet will i bring one plague more upon pharaoh-big-house, and upon mizraim-narrows; afterwards he will let you go hence: when he let you go, he surely thrust you out hence altogether. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘od nega‘ ’ekhad ’abi ‘al par‘oh ve‘al mizrayim khen yeshalakh ’etkhem mizeh, keshalekho kalah garesh yegaresh ’etkhem mizeh.
dbr na bacny hem wySalw ayS mat rehw waSh mat rewth kly ksp wkly chb speak now in the ears of the with-mum-people, and let every man borrow of his neighbor, and every woman of her neighbor, jewels of silver and jewels of gold. daber na be’azenei ha‘am, veyish’alu ’ish me’et re‘ehu ve’ishah me’et re‘utah kele khesef ukhelei zahab.
wytn yhwh at xn hem beyny mzrym gm hayS mSh gdwl mad barz mzrym beyny ebdy preh wbeyny hem and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah gave the with-mum-people favor in the sight of the mizraim-narrowsians. moreover the man mose-extracted was very great in the land of mizraim-narrows, in the sight of pharaoh-big-house's workers, and in the sight of the with-mum-people. vayiten yhvh khen ha‘am be‘enei mizrayim, gam ha’ish mosheh gadol me’od be’erez mizrayim be‘enei ‘abde far‘oh ube‘enei ha‘am.
wyamr mSh kh amr yhwh kxzt hlylh any ywza btwk mzrym and mose-extracted said, thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, about midnight will i go out into the midst of mizraim-narrows: vayomer mosheh koh ’amar yhvh, kakhazot halaylah ’ani yozei betokh mizrayim.
wmt kl bkwr barz mzrym mbkwr preh hySb el ksaw ed bkwr hSpxh aSr axr hrxym wkl bkwr bhmh and all the firstborn in the land of mizraim-narrows die, from the first born of pharaoh-big-house that sitteth upon his throne, even unto the firstborn of the mum-true-maid that is behind the mill; and all the firstborn of beasts. umet kal bekhor be’erez mizrayim mibekhor par‘oh hayosheb ‘al kis’o ‘ad bekhor hashifkhah ’asher ’akhar harekhayim, vekhol bekhor behemah.
whyth zeqh gdlh bkl arz mzrym aSr kmhw la nhyth wkmhw la tsp and there be a great cry throughout all the land of mizraim-narrows, such as there was none like it, nor be like it any more. vehayetah ze‘aqah gedolah bekhal ’erez mizrayim, ’asher kamohu lo nihyatah vekhamohu lo tosif.
wlkl bny ySral la yxrz klb lSnw lmayS wed bhmh lmen tdewn aSr yplh yhwh byn mzrym wbyn ySral and against any of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards not a dog move his tongue, against man or beast: that ye may hand-know how that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah doth put a difference between-bin the mizraim-narrowsians and israel-juicy-towards. ulekhol benei yisra’el lo yekheraz keleb leshono leme’ish ve‘ad behemah, lema‘an tede‘un ’asher yafleh yhvh ben mizrayim uben yisra’el.
wyrdw kl ebdyk alh aly whStxww ly lamr za ath wkl hem aSr brglyk waxry kn aza wyza mem preh bxry ap and all these thy workers come down unto me, and bow down themselves unto me, saying, get thee out, and all the with-mum-people that follow thee: and after that i will go out. and he went out from pharaoh-big-house in a great nose-anger. veyaredu khal ‘abadekha ’eleh ’elay vehishtakhavu li lemor zei ’atah vekhal ha‘am ’asher beraglekha ve’akhare khen ’eze, vayezei me‘im par‘oh bakhori ’af.
wyamr yhwh al mSh la ySme alykm preh lmen rbwt mwpty barz mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, pharaoh-big-house not hearken unto you; that my wonders may be multiplied in the land of mizraim-narrows. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lo yishma‘ ’alekhem par‘oh, lema‘an rebot moftay be’erez mizrayim.
wmSh wahrn eSw at kl hmptym halh lpny preh wyxcq yhwh at lb preh wla Slx at bny ySral marzw and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet did all these wonders before-turns pharaoh-big-house: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hardened pharaoh-big-house's heart, so that he would not let children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards go out of his land. umosheh ve’aharon ‘asu kal hamofetim ha’eleh lifnei far‘oh, vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh velo shilakh bene yisra’el me’arzo.
wyamr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn barz mzrym lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet in the land of mizraim-narrows saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon be’erez mizrayim lemor.
hxdS hch lkm raS xdSym raSwn hwa lkm lxdSy hSnh this month be unto you the head of months: it be the first month of the year to you. hakhodesh hazeh lakhem rosh khodashim, rishon hu lakhem lekhadeshei hashanah.
dbrw al kl edt ySral lamr beSr lxdS hch wyqxw lhm ayS Sh lbyt abt Sh lbyt speak ye unto all the until-witness of israel-juicy-towards, saying, in the tenth day of this month they take to them every man a lamb, according to the daughter-house of their fathers, a lamb for an daughter-house: daberu ’el kal ‘adat yisra’el lemor be‘asor lakhodesh hazeh, veyiqkhu lahem ’ish seh lebet ’abot seh labayit.
wam ymeT hbyt mhyt mSh wlqx hwa wSknw hqrb al bytw bmkst npSt ayS lpy aklw tksw el hSh and if the daughter-household be too little for the lamb, let him and his neighbor next unto his daughter-house take it according to the number of the beings; every man according to his eating make your count for the lamb. ve’im yim‘at habayit miseh velaqakh hu ushekheno haqarob ’el beto bemikhsat nefashot, ’ish lefi ’akhelo takhosu ‘al haseh.
Sh tmym ckr bn Snh yhyh lkm mn hkbSym wmn hecym tqxw your lamb be simple, a rememberer of the first year: ye take it out from the sheep, or from the intense-goats: seh tamim zakhar ben shanah yihyeh lakhem, min hakebasim umin ha‘izim tiqakhu.
whyh lkm lmSmrt ed arbeh eSr ywm lxdS hch wSxTw atw kl qhl edt ySral byn herbym and ye do it up until the fourteenth day of the same month: and the whole assembly of the until-witness of israel-juicy-towards kill it in the evening. vehayah lakhem lemishmeret ‘ad ’arba‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hazeh, veshakhatu ’oto kol qehal ‘adat yisra’el ben ha‘arbayim.
wlqxw mn hdm wntnw el Sty hmcwct wel hmSqwp el hbtym aSr yaklw atw bhm and they take of the blood, and strike it on the two side posts and on the upper opening post of the daughter-houses, wherein they eat it. velaqekhu min hadam venatenu ‘al shetei hamezuzot ve‘al hamashqof, ‘al habatim ’asher yokhelu ’oto bahem.
waklw at hbSr blylh hch zly aS wmzwt el mrrym yaklhw and they eat the flesh in that night, roast with fire, and lit-mazat; and with bitter herbs they eat it. ve’akhelu habasar balaylah hazeh, zeli ’esh umazot ‘al merorim yokheluhu.
al taklw mmnw na wbSl mbSl bmym ky am zly aS raSw el kreyw wel qrbw eat not of it raw, nor sodden at all with from-waters, and roast with fire; his head with his legs, and with the purtenance thereof. ’al tokhelu mimenu na ubashel mebushal bamayim, ’im zeli ’esh rosho ‘al kera‘av ve‘al qirbo.
wla twtyrw mmnw ed bqr whntr mmnw ed bqr baS tSrpw and ye let nothing of it remain until the morning; and that which remaineth of it until the morning ye burn with fire. velo totiru mimenu ‘ad boqer, vehanotar mimenu ‘ad boqer ba’esh tisrofu.
wkkh taklw atw mtnykm xgrym nelykm brglykm wmqlkm bydkm wakltm atw bxpcwn psx hwa lyhwh and thus ye eat it; with your loins girded, your shoes on your feet, and your staff in your hand; and ye eat it in haste: it is yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's passover. vekhakhah tokhelu ’oto matenekhem khagurim na‘alekhem beraglekhem umaqelkhem beyedkhem, va’akhaltem ’oto bekhipazon pesakh hu yhvh.
webrty barz mzrym blylh hch whkyty kl bkwr barz mzrym madm wed bhmh wbkl alhy mzrym aeSh SpTym any yhwh for i will pass through the land of mizraim-narrows this night, and will hit all the firstborn in the land of mizraim-narrows, both man and beast; and against all the to-no-these of mizraim-narrows i will execute decision-grammar: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ve‘abarti be’erez mizrayim balaylah hazeh vehiketi khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim me’adam ve‘ad behemah, ubekhal ’elohei mizrayim ’e‘eseh shefatim ’ani yhvh.
whyh hdm lkm lat el hbtym aSr atm Sm wrayty at hdm wpsxty elkm wla yhyh bkm ngp lmSxyt bhkty barz mzrym and the blood be to you for a token upon the daughter-houses where ye are: and when i see the blood, i will pass over you, and the plague not be upon you to destroy you, when i hit the land of mizraim-narrows. vehayah hadam lakhem le’ot ‘al habatim ’asher ’atem. vera’iti hadam ufasakhti ‘alekhem, velo yihyeh bakhem negef lemashkhit behakoti be’erez mizrayim.
whyh hywm hch lkm lckrwn wxgtm atw xg lyhwh ldrtykm xqt ewlm txghw and this day be unto you for a memorial; and ye do it a until-conception to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah throughout your generations; ye do it a until-conception by an ordinance for ever. vehayah hayom hazeh lakhem lezikaron vekhagotem ’oto khag yhvh, ledorotekhem khuqat ‘olam tekhaguhu.
Sbet ymym mzwt taklw ak bywm hraSwn tSbytw Sar mbtykm ky kl akl xmz wnkrth hnpS hhwa mySral mywm hraSn ed ywm hSbey seven days ye eat lit-mazat; even the first day ye put away leaven out of your daughter-houses: for whosoever eateth leaven from the first day until the seventh day, that being be cut off from israel-juicy-towards. shib‘at yamim mazot tokhelu ’akh bayom harishon tashbitu se’or mibatekhem, ki kal ’okhel khamez venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra’el miyom harishon ‘ad yom hashebi‘i.
wbywm hraSwn mqra qdS wbywm hSbyey mqra qdS yhyh lkm kl mlakh la yeSh bhm ak aSr yakl lkl npS hwa lbdw yeSh lkm and in the first day there be an dedicated-finished convocation, and in the seventh day there be an dedicated-finished convocation to you; no manner of work be done in them, save that which every man must eat, that only may be done of you. ubayom harishon miqra qodesh ubayom hashebi‘i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem, kal melakhah lo ye‘aseh bahem ’akh ’asher ye’akhel lekhal nefesh hu lebado ye‘aseh lakhem.
wSmrtm at hmzwt ky bezm hywm hch hwzaty at zbawtykm marz mzrym wSmrtm at hywm hch ldrtykm xqt ewlm and ye guard-observe the until-conception of lit-mazat; for in this selfsame day have i brought your troop-clusters out of the land of mizraim-narrows: therefore ye guard-observe this day in your generations by an ordinance for ever. ushemartem hamazot ki be‘ezem hayom hazeh hozeti zib’otekhem me’erez mizrayim, ushemartem hayom hazeh ledorotekhem khuqat ‘olam.
braSn barbeh eSr ywm lxdS berb taklw mzt ed ywm haxd weSrym lxdS berb in the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month at even, ye eat lit-mazat, until the one and twentieth day of the month at even. barishon be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh ba‘ereb tokhelu mazot, ‘ad yom ha’ekhad ve‘esrim lakhodesh ba‘areb.
Sbet ymym Sar la ymza bbtykm ky kl akl mxmzt wnkrth hnpS hhwa medt ySral bgr wbacrx harz seven days there be no leaven found in your daughter-houses: for whosoever eateth that which is leavened, even that being be cut off from the until-witness of israel-juicy-towards, whether he be a stranger, or born in the land. shib‘at yamim se’or lo yimazei bebatekhem, ki kal ’okhel makhmezet venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘adat yisra’el bager ube’ezrakh ha’arez.
kl mxmzt la taklw bkl mwSbtykm taklw mzwt ye eat nothing leavened; in all your habitations ye eat lit-mazat. kal makhmezet lo tokhelu, bekhol moshebotekhem tokhelu mazot.
wyqra mSh lkl cqny ySral wyamr alhm mSkw wqxw lkm zan lmSpxtykm wSxTw hpsx then mose-extracted called for all the elders of israel-juicy-towards, and said unto them, draw out and take you a lamb according to your families, and kill the passover. vayiqra mosheh lekhal ziqnei yisra’el vayomer ’alehem, mishkhu uqekhu lakhem zon lemishpekhotekhem veshakhatu hapasakh.
wlqxtm agdt acwb wTbltm bdm aSr bsp whgetm al hmSqwp wal Sty hmcwct mn hdm aSr bsp watm la tzaw ayS mptx bytw ed bqr and ye take a bunch of hyssop-discharging, and dip it in the blood that is in the basin, and strike the lintel and the two side posts with the blood that is in the basin; and none of you go out at the opening of his daughter-house until the morning. uleqakhtem ’agudat ’ezob utebaltem badam ’asher basaf vehiga‘tem ’el hamashqof ve’el shetei hamezuzot min hadam ’asher basaf, ve’atem lo teze’u mipetakh beto ‘ad boqer.
webr yhwh lngp at mzrym wrah at hdm el hmSqwp wel Sty hmcwct wpsx yhwh el hptx wla ytn hmSxyt lba al btykm lngp for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will pass through to hit the mizraim-narrowsians; and when he seeth the blood upon the lintel, and on the two side posts, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will pass over the opening, and will not suffer the destroyer to come in unto your daughter-houses to hit you. ve‘abar yhvh lingof mizrayim vera’ah hadam ‘al hamashqof ve‘al shetei hamezuzot, ufasakh yhvh ‘al hapetakh velo yiten hamashkhit labo ’el batekhem lingof.
wSmrtm at hdbr hch lxq lk wlbnyk ed ewlm and ye guard-observe this thing for an ordinance to thee and to thy children-betweens for ever. ushemartem hadabar hazeh, lekhaq lekha ulebanekha ‘ad ‘olam.
whyh ky tbaw al harz aSr ytn yhwh lkm kaSr dbr wSmrtm at hebdh hcat and it come to pass, when ye be come to the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will give you, according as he hath promised, that ye keep this work. vehayah ki tabo’u ’el ha’arez ’asher yiten yhvh lakhem ka’asher diber, ushemartem ha‘abodah hazot.
whyh ky yamrw alykm bnykm mh hebdh hcat lkm and it come to pass, when your children-betweens say unto you, what mean ye by this work? vehayah ki yomeru ’alekhem benekhem, mah ha‘abodah hazot lakhem.
wamrtm cbx psx hwa lyhwh aSr psx el bty bny ySral bmzrym bngpw at mzrym wat btynw hzyl wyqd hem wyStxww that ye say, it is the butcher of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's passover, who passed over the daughter-houses of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in mizraim-narrows, when he smote the mizraim-narrowsians, and delivered our daughter-houses. and the with-mum-people bowed the head and partook-shatakh. va’amartem zebakh pesakh hu yhvh ’asher pasakh ‘al batei bene yisra’el bemizrayim benagepo mizrayim ve’et batenu hizil, vayiqod ha‘am vayishtakhavu.
wylkw wyeSw bny ySral kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh wahrn kn eSw and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards went away, and did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had direct mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, so did they. vayelekhu vaya‘asu benei yisra’el, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ve’aharon ken ‘asu.
wyhy bxzy hlylh wyhwh hkh kl bkwr barz mzrym mbkr preh hySb el ksaw ed bkwr hSby aSr bbyt hbwr wkl bkwr bhmh and it came to pass, that at midnight yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah smote all the firstborn in the land of mizraim-narrows, from the firstborn of pharaoh-big-house that sat on his throne unto the firstborn of the captive that was in the dungeon; and all the firstborn of in-them-animal. vayhi bakhazi halaylah yhvh hikah khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim mibekhor par‘oh hayosheb ‘al kis’o ‘ad bekhor hashebi ’asher bebet habor, vekhol bekhor behemah.
wyqm preh lylh hwa wkl ebdyw wkl mzrym wthy zeqh gdlh bmzrym ky ayn byt aSr ayn Sm mt and pharaoh-big-house rose up in the night, he, and all his workers, and all the mizraim-narrowsians; and there was a great cry in mizraim-narrows; for there was not a daughter-house where there was not one dead. vayaqam par‘oh laylah hu vekhal ‘abadav vekhal mizrayim vatehi ze‘aqah gedolah bemizrayim, ki ’en bayit ’asher ’en met.
wyqra lmSh wlahrn lylh wyamr qwmw zaw mtwk emy gm atm gm bny ySral wlkw ebdw at yhwh kdbrkm and he called for mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet by night, and said, rise up, and get you forth from inward my with-mum-people, both ye and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; and go, work for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, as ye have said. vayiqra lemosheh ule’aharon laylah vayomer qumu ze’u mitokh ‘ami gam ’atem gam benei yisra’el, ulekhu ‘ibdu yhvh kedaberkhem.
gm zankm gm bqrkm qxw kaSr dbrtm wlkw wbrktm gm aty also take your flocks and your visit-cattles, as ye have said, and be gone; and knee-fluffy-bless me also. gam zonekhem gam beqarkhem qekhu ka’asher dibartem valekhu, uberakhtem gam ’oti.
wtxcq mzrym el hem lmhr lSlxm mn harz ky amrw klnw mtym and the mizraim-narrowsians were urgent upon the with-mum-people, that they might send them out of the land in haste; for they said, we be all dead men. vatekhezaq mizrayim ha‘am lemaher leshalekham min ha’arez, ki ’ameru kulanu metim.
wySa hem at bzqw Trm yxmz mSartm zrrt bSmltm el Skmm and the with-mum-people took their dough before-turns it was leavened, their kneadingtroughs being bound up in their clothes upon their shoulders. vayisa ha‘am bezeqo terem yekhmaz, mish’arotam zerurot besimlotam ‘al shikhmam.
wbny ySral eSw kdbr mSh wySalw mmzrym kly ksp wkly chb wSmlt and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did according to the bee-word of mose-extracted; and they borrowed of the mizraim-narrowsians jewels of silver, and jewels of gold, and raiment: ubene yisra’el ‘asu kidbar mosheh, vayish’alu mimizrayim kele khesef ukhelei zahab usemalot.
wyhwh ntn at xn hem beyny mzrym wySalwm wynzlw at mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah gave the with-mum-people favor in the sight of the mizraim-narrowsians, so that they lent unto them such things as they required. and they spoiled the mizraim-narrowsians. yhvh natan khen ha‘am be‘enei mizrayim vayash’ilum, vaynazelu mizrayim.
wysew bny ySral mremss skth kSS mawt alp rgly hgbrym lbd mTp and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards journeyed from ram-voicelessses-born-by-ra to succoth-booths, about six hundred thousand on foot that were men, beside children-betweens. vayis‘u bene yisra’el mera‘meses sukotah, keshesh me’ot ’elef ragli hagebarim lebad mitaf.
wgm erb rb elh atm wzan wbqr mqnh kbd mad and a mixed multitude went up also with them; and flocks, and visit-cattles, even very much in-them-animal. vegam ‘ereb rab ‘alah ’itam, vezon ubaqar miqneh kabed me’od.
wyapw at hbzq aSr hwzyaw mmzrym egt mzwt ky la xmz ky grSw mmzrym wla yklw lhtmhmh wgm zdh la eSw lhm and they baked unleavened cakes of the dough which they brought forth out of mizraim-narrows, for it was not leavened; because they were thrust out of mizraim-narrows, and could not tarry, neither had they prepared for themselves any victual. vayofu habazeq ’asher hozi’u mimizrayim ‘ugot mazot ki lo khamez, ki goreshu mimizrayim velo yakhelu lehitmahmeah vegam zedah lo ‘asu lahem.
wmwSb bny ySral aSr ySbw bmzrym SlSym Snh warbe mawt Snh now the sojourning of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, who dwelt in mizraim-narrows, was four hundred and thirty years. umoshab benei yisra’el ’asher yashebu bemizrayim, sheloshim shanah ve’arba‘ me’ot shanah.
wyhy mqz SlSym Snh warbe mawt Snh wyhy bezm hywm hch yzaw kl zbawt yhwh marz mzrym and it came to pass at the end of the four hundred and thirty years, even the selfsame day it came to pass, that all the troop-clusters of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah went out from the land of mizraim-narrows. vayhi miqez sheloshim shanah ve’arba‘ me’ot shanah, vayhi be‘ezem hayom hazeh yaze’u kal zib’ot yhvh me’erez mizrayim.
lyl Smrym hwa lyhwh lhwzyam marz mzrym hwa hlylh hch lyhwh Smrym lkl bny ySral ldrtm it is a night to be much guard-observed unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for bringing them out from the land of mizraim-narrows: this is that night of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to be guard-observed of all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in their generations. lel shimurim hu yhvh lehozi’am me’erez mizrayim, hu halaylah hazeh yhvh shimurim lekhal benei yisra’el ledorotam.
wyamr yhwh al mSh wahrn cat xqt hpsx kl bn nkr la yakl bw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, this is the ordinance of the passover: there no stranger eat thereof: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’aharon zot khuqat hapasakh, kal ben nekhar lo yokhal bo.
wkl ebd ayS mqnt ksp wmlth atw ac yakl bw and every man's worker that is bought for money, when thou hast scribe-circumcised him, then he eat thereof. vekhal ‘ebed ’ish miqnat kasef, umaltah ’oto ’az yokhal bo.
twSb wSkyr la yakl bw a foreigner and an hired worker not eat thereof. toshab vesakhir lo yokhal bo.
bbyt axd yakl la twzya mn hbyt mn hbSr xwzh wezm la tSbrw bw in one daughter-house it be eaten; no carry forth ought of the flesh abroad out of the daughter-house; neither ye break a bone thereof. bebayit ’ekhad ye’akhel lo tozi min habayit min habasar khuzah, ve‘ezem lo tishberu bo.
kl edt ySral yeSw atw all the until-witness of israel-juicy-towards do it. kal ‘adat yisra’el ya‘asu ’oto.
wky ygwr atk gr weSh psx lyhwh hmwl lw kl ckr wac yqrb leStw whyh kacrx harz wkl erl la yakl bw and when a stranger sojourn with thee, and will keep the passover to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, let all his rememberers be scribe-circumcised, and then let him come near and do it; and he be as one that is born in the land: for no foreskinned person eat thereof. vekhi yagur ’itekha ger ve‘asah fesakh yhvh himol lo khal zakhar ve’az yiqrab la‘asoto vehayah ke’ezrakh ha’arez, vekhal ‘arel lo yokhal bo.
twrh axt yhyh lacrx wlgr hgr btwkkm one teaching be to him that is homeborn, and unto the stranger that sojourneth among you. torah ’akhat yihyeh la’ezrakh, velager hagar betokhkhem.
wyeSw kl bny ySral kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh wat ahrn kn eSw thus did all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, so did they. vaya‘asu kal benei yisra’el, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ve’et ’aharon ken ‘asu.
