wyhy bezm hywm hch hwzya yhwh at bny ySral marz mzrym el zbatm and it came to pass the selfsame day, that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did bring children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards out of the land of mizraim-narrows by their troop-clusters. vayhi be‘ezem hayom hazeh, hozi yhvh benei yisra’el me’erez mizrayim ‘al zib’otam.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qdS ly kl bkwr pTr kl rxm bbny ySral badm wbbhmh ly hwa dedicate-finify unto me all the firstborn, whatsoever openeth the womb among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, both of man and of beast: it is mine. qadesh li khal bekhor peter kal rekhem bibnei yisra’el ba’adam ubabehemah, li hu.
wyamr mSh al hem ckwr at hywm hch aSr yzatm mmzrym mbyt ebdym ky bxcq yd hwzya yhwh atkm mch wla yakl xmz and mose-extracted said unto the with-mum-people, remember this day, in which ye came out from mizraim-narrows, out of the daughter-house of bondage; for by strength of hand yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought you out from this place: there no leaven be eaten. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am zakhor hayom hazeh ’asher yezatem mimizrayim mibet ‘abadim ki bekhozeq yad hozi yhvh ’etkhem mizeh, velo ye’akhel khamez.
hywm atm yzaym bxdS habyb this day came ye out in the month abib-spring. hayom ’atem yoze’im, bekhodesh ha’abib.
whyh ky ybyak yhwh al arz hkneny whxty whamry whxwy whybwsy aSr nSbe labtyk ltt lk arz cbt xlb wdbS webdt at hebdh hcat bxdS hch and it be when yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bring thee into the land of the canaan-mobile-tradeites, and the hittite-cuts-tusk, and the amorite-talkers, and the hivite-experiences, and the jebusite-tramplers, which he sware unto thy fathers to give thee, a land flowing with milk and honey, that thou work this work in this month. vehayah khi yebi’akha yhvh ’el ’erez hakena‘ani vehakhiti veha’emori vehakhivi vehaybusi ’asher nishba‘ la’abotekha latet lakh ’erez zabat khalab udebash, ve‘abadta ha‘abodah hazot bakhodesh hazeh.
Sbet ymym takl mzt wbywm hSbyey xg lyhwh seven days thou eat lit-mazat, and in the seventh day be a until-conception to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. shib‘at yamim tokhal mazot, ubayom hashebi‘i khag yhvh.
mzwt yakl at Sbet hymym wla yrah lk xmz wla yrah lk Sar bkl gblk lit-mazat be eaten seven days; and there no leaven be seen with thee, neither there be rests seen with thee in all thy quarters. mazot ye’akhel shib‘at hayamim, velo yera’eh lekha khamez velo yera’eh lekha se’or bekhal gebulekha.
whgdt lbnk bywm hhwa lamr bebwr ch eSh yhwh ly bzaty mmzrym and thou show thy child-between in that day, saying, this is done because of that which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did unto me when i came forth out of mizraim-narrows. vehigadta lebinkha bayom hahu lemor, ba‘abur zeh ‘asah yhvh li bezeti mimizrayim.
whyh lk lawt el ydk wlckrwn byn eynyk lmen thyh twrt yhwh bpyk ky byd xcqh hwzak yhwh mmzrym and it be for a sign unto thee upon thine hand, and for a memorial between-bin thine eyes, that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's teaching may be in thy mouth: for with a strong hand hath yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought thee out of mizraim-narrows. vehayah lekha le’ot ‘al yadekha ulezikaron ben ‘enekha lema‘an tihyeh torat yhvh befikha, ki beyad khazaqah hozi’akha yhvh mimizrayim.
wSmrt at hxqh hcat lmwedh mymym ymymh thou therefore keep this ordinance in his season from year to year. veshamarta hakhuqah hazot lemo‘adah, miyamim yamimah.
whyh ky ybak yhwh al arz hkneny kaSr nSbe lk wlabtyk wntnh lk and it be when yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bring thee into the land of the canaan-mobile-tradeites, as he sware unto thee and to thy fathers, and give it thee, vehayah ki yebi’akha yhvh ’el ’erez hakena‘ani ka’asher nishba‘ lekha vela’abotekha, unetanah lakh.
whebrt kl pTr rxm lyhwh wkl pTr Sgr bhmh aSr yhyh lk hckrym lyhwh that thou set apart unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah all that openeth the womb-matrix, and every firstling that cometh of a beast which thou hast; the rememberers be yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's. veha‘abarta khal peter rekhem yhvh, vekhal peter sheger behemah ’asher yihyeh lekha hazekharim yhvh.
wkl pTr xmr tpdh bSh wam la tpdh werptw wkl bkwr adm bbnyk tpdh and every firstling of an ass thou redeem with a lamb; and if thou wilt not redeem it, then thou break his neck: and all the firstborn of man among thy children-betweens thou redeem. vekhal peter khamor tifdeh beseh ve’im lo tifdeh va‘arafto, vekhol bekhor ’adam bebanekha tifdeh.
whyh ky ySalk bnk mxr lamr mh cat wamrt alyw bxcq yd hwzyanw yhwh mmzrym mbyt ebdym and it be when thy child-between asketh thee in time to come, saying, what is this? that thou say unto him, by strength of hand yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought us out from mizraim-narrows, from the daughter-house of bondage: vehayah ki yish’alekha binkha makhar lemor mah zot, ve’amarta ’elav bekhozeq yad hozi’anu yhvh mimizrayim mibet ‘abadim.
wyhy ky hqSh preh lSlxnw wyhrg yhwh kl bkwr barz mzrym mbkr adm wed bkwr bhmh el kn any cbx lyhwh kl pTr rxm hckrym wkl bkwr bny apdh and it came to pass, when pharaoh-big-house would hardly let us go, that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah slew all the firstborn in the land of mizraim-narrows, both the firstborn of man, and the firstborn of beast: therefore i butcher to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah all that openeth the womb-matrix, being rememberers; and all the firstborn of my children-betweens i redeem. vayhi ki hiqshah far‘oh leshalekhenu vayaharog yhvh kal bekhor be’erez mizrayim mibekhor ’adam ve‘ad bekhor behemah, ‘al ken ’ani zobeakh yhvh kal peter rekhem hazekharim vekhal bekhor banay ’efdeh.
whyh lawt el ydkh wlTwTpt byn eynyk ky bxcq yd hwzyanw yhwh mmzrym and it be for a token upon thine hand, and for frontlets between-bin thine eyes: for by strength of hand yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought us forth out of mizraim-narrows. vehayah le’ot ‘al yadekhah uletotafot ben ‘enekha, ki bekhozeq yad hozi’anu yhvh mimizrayim.
wyhy bSlx preh at hem wla nxm alhym drk arz plStym ky qrwb hwa ky amr alhym pn ynxm hem bratm mlxmh wSbw mzrymh and it came to pass, when pharaoh-big-house had sent the with-mum-people, that to-no-these led them not through the way of the land of the philistines-griever, although that was near; for to-no-these said, lest peradventure the with-mum-people repent when they see war, and they return to mizraim-narrows: vayhi beshalakh par‘oh ha‘am velo nakham ’elohim derekh ’erez pelishtim ki qarob hu, ki ’amar ’elohim pen yinakhem ha‘am bir’otam milkhamah veshabu mizrayemah.
wysb alhym at hem drk hmdbr ym swp wxmSym elw bny ySral marz mzrym and to-no-these led the with-mum-people about, through the way of the place-of-word-desert of the end sea: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards went up harnessed out of the land of mizraim-narrows. vayaseb ’elohim ha‘am derekh hamidbar yam suf, vakhamushim ‘alu bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim.
wyqx mSh at ezmwt ywsp emw ky hSbe hSbye at bny ySral lamr pqd ypqd alhym atkm whelytm at ezmty mch atkm and mose-extracted took the bones of joseph-add with him: for he had straitly sworn children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, to-no-these will surely visit you; and ye carry up my bones away hence with you. vayiqakh mosheh ‘azmot yosef ‘imo, ki hashbea‘ hishbia‘ benei yisra’el lemor paqod yifqod ’elohim ’etkhem veha‘alitem ‘azmotay mizeh ’itekhem.
wysew mskt wyxnw batm bqzh hmdbr and they took their journey from succoth-booths, and encamped in etam-you, in the edge of the place-of-word-desert. vayis‘u misukot, vayakhanu be’etam biqzeh hamidbar.
wyhwh hlk lpnyhm ywmm bemwd enn lnxtm hdrk wlylh bemwd aS lhayr lhm llkt ywmm wlylh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah went before-turns them by day in a page-column-erection of a cloud, to lead them the way; and by night in a page-column-erection of fire, to give them light; to go by day and night: yhvh holekh lifnehem yomam be‘amud ‘anan lankhotam haderekh velaylah be‘amud ’esh leha’ir lahem, lalekhet yomam valayelah.
la ymyS emwd henn ywmm wemwd haS lylh lpny hem he took not away the page-column-erection of the cloud by day, nor the page-column-erection of fire by night, from before-turns the with-mum-people. lo yamish ‘amud he‘anan yomam ve‘amud ha’esh layelah, lifnei ha‘am.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wySbw wyxnw lpny py hxyrt byn mgdl wbyn hym lpny bel zpn nkxw txnw el hym speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they turn and encamp before-turns pihahirot-mouth-of-the-choice, between-bin migdol-tower and the sea, over against baalzephon-owner-of-cipher: before-turns it ye encamp by the sea. daber ’el benei yisra’el veyashubu veyakhanu lifnei hakhirot ben migdol uben hayam, lifnei zefon nikhkho takhanu ‘al hayam.
wamr preh lbny ySral nbkym hm barz sgr elyhm hmdbr for pharaoh-big-house will say of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, they are entangled in the land, the place-of-word-desert hath shut them in. ve’amar par‘oh libnei yisra’el nebukhim hem ba’arez, sagar ‘alehem hamidbar.
wxcqty at lb preh wrdp axryhm wakbdh bpreh wbkl xylw wydew mzrym ky any yhwh wyeSw kn and i will harden pharaoh-big-house's heart, that he follow after them; and i will be honored upon pharaoh-big-house, and upon all his troop-cluster; that the mizraim-narrowsians may hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. and they did so. vekhizaqti leb par‘oh veradaf ’akharehem ve’ikabedah befar‘oh ubekhal khelo veyade‘u mizrayim ki ’ani yhvh, vaya‘asu khen.
wygd lmlk mzrym ky brx hem wyhpk lbb preh webdyw al hem wyamrw mh cat eSynw ky Slxnw at ySral mebdnw and it was told the king-moloch of mizraim-narrows that the with-mum-people fled: and the heart of pharaoh-big-house and of his workers was turned against the with-mum-people, and they said, why have we done this, that we have let israel-juicy-towards go from serving us? vayugad lemelekh mizrayim ki barakh ha‘am, vayehafekh lebab par‘oh va‘abadav ’el ha‘am vayomru mah zot ‘asinu ki shilakhnu yisra’el me‘abedenu.
wyasr at rkbw wat emw lqx emw and he made ready his chariot, and took his with-mum-people with him: vaye’sor rikhbo, ve’et ‘amo laqakh ‘imo.
wyqx SS mawt rkb bxwr wkl rkb mzrym wSlSm el klw and he took six hundred chosen chariots, and all the chariots of mizraim-narrows, and captains over every one of them. vayiqakh shesh me’ot rekheb bakhur vekhol rekheb mizrayim, veshalishim ‘al kulo.
wyxcq yhwh at lb preh mlk mzrym wyrdp axry bny ySral wbny ySral yzaym byd rmh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hardened the heart of pharaoh-big-house king-moloch of mizraim-narrows, and he pursued after children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards went out with an high hand. vaykhazeq yhvh leb par‘oh melekh mizrayim vayirdof ’akharei benei yisra’el, ubenei yisra’el yoze’im beyad ramah.
wyrdpw mzrym axryhm wySygw awtm xnym el hym kl sws rkb preh wprSyw wxylw el py hxyrt lpny bel zpn and the mizraim-narrowsians pursued after them, all the horses and chariots of pharaoh-big-house, and his horsemen, and his army, and overtook them encamping by the sea, beside pihahirot-mouth-of-the-choice, before-turns baalzephon-owner-of-cipher. vayirdefu mizrayim ’akharehem vayasigu ’otam khonim ‘al hayam kal sus rekheb par‘oh ufarashav vekhelo, ‘al hakhirot lifnei zefon.
wpreh hqryb wySaw bny ySral at eynyhm whnh mzrym nse axryhm wyyraw mad wyzeqw bny ySral al yhwh and when pharaoh-big-house drew nigh, children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards lifted up their eyes, and, behold, the mizraim-narrowsians marched after them; and they were sore afraid: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards cried out unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ufar‘oh hiqrib, vayis’u bene yisra’el ‘enehem vehineh mizrayim nosea‘ ’akharehem vayire’u me’od vayiz‘aqu bene yisra’el ’el yhvh.
wyamrw al mSh hmbly ayn qbrym bmzrym lqxtnw lmwt bmdbr mh cat eSyt lnw lhwzyanw mmzrym and they said unto mose-extracted, because there were no graves in mizraim-narrows, hast thou taken us away to die in the place-of-word-desert? wherefore hast thou dealt thus with us, to carry us forth out of mizraim-narrows? vayomeru ’el mosheh hamibeli ’en qebarim bemizrayim leqakhtanu lamut bamidbar, mah zot ‘asita lanu lehozi’anu mimizrayim.
hla ch hdbr aSr dbrnw alyk bmzrym lamr xdl mmnw wnebdh at mzrym ky Twb lnw ebd at mzrym mmtnw bmdbr is not this the bee-word that we did tell thee in mizraim-narrows, saying, let us alone, that we may work for the mizraim-narrowsians? for it had been better for us to work for the mizraim-narrowsians, than that we should die in the place-of-word-desert. halo zeh hadabar ’asher dibarnu ’elekha bemizrayim lemor khadal mimenu vena‘abdah mizrayim, ki tob lanu ‘abod mizrayim mimutenu bamidbar.
wyamr mSh al hem al tyraw htyzbw wraw at ySwet yhwh aSr yeSh lkm hywm ky aSr raytm at mzrym hywm la tsypw lratm ewd ed ewlm and mose-extracted said unto the with-mum-people, fear ye not, stand still, and see the saving of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which he will show to you to day: for the mizraim-narrowsians whom ye have seen to day, ye see them again no more for ever. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am ’al tira’u hityazbu ure’u yeshu‘at yhvh ’asher ya‘aseh lakhem hayom, ki ’asher re’item mizrayim hayom lo tosifu lir’otam ‘od ‘ad ‘olam.
yhwh ylxm lkm watm txrySwn yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah fight for you, and ye hold your peace. yhvh yilakhem lakhem, ve’atem takharishun.
wyamr yhwh al mSh mh tzeq aly dbr al bny ySral wysew and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, wherefore criest thou unto me? speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they go forward: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh mah tiz‘aq ’elay, daber ’el bene yisra’el veyisa‘u.
wath hrm at mTk wnTh at ydk el hym wbqehw wybaw bny ySral btwk hym bybSh and lift thou up thy pen, and stretch out thine hand over the sea, and divide it: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards go on dry ground through the midst of the sea. ve’atah harem matekha uneteh yadekha ‘al hayam ubeqa‘ehu, veyabo’u bene yisra’el betokh hayam bayabashah.
wany hnny mxcq at lb mzrym wybaw axryhm wakbdh bpreh wbkl xylw brkbw wbprSyw and i, behold, i will harden the hearts of the mizraim-narrowsians, and they follow them: and i will get heavy upon pharaoh-big-house, and upon all his troop-cluster, upon his chariots, and upon his horsemen. va’ani hini mekhazeq leb mizrayim veyabo’u ’akharehem, ve’ikabedah befar‘oh ubekhal khelo berikhbo ubefarashav.
wydew mzrym ky any yhwh bhkbdy bpreh brkbw wbprSyw and the mizraim-narrowsians hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, when i have gotten me honor upon pharaoh-big-house, upon his chariots, and upon his horsemen. veyade‘u mizrayim ki ’ani yhvh, behikabedi befar‘oh berikhbo ubefarashav.
wyse mlak halhym hhlk lpny mxnh ySral wylk maxryhm wyse emwd henn mpnyhm wyemd maxryhm and the angel-messanger of to-no-these, which went before-turns the camp of israel-juicy-towards, removed and went behind them; and the page-column-erection of the cloud went from before-turns their face-turns, and stood behind them: vayisa‘ mal’akh ha’elohim haholekh lifnei makhaneh yisra’el vayelekh me’akharehem, vayisa‘ ‘amud he‘anan mipenehem vaya‘amod me’akharehem.
wyba byn mxnh mzrym wbyn mxnh ySral wyhy henn whxSk wyar at hlylh wla qrb ch al ch kl hlylh and it came between-bin the camp of the mizraim-narrowsians and the camp of israel-juicy-towards; and it was a cloud and darkness to them, and it gave light by night to these: so that the one came not near the other all the night. vayabo ben makhaneh mizrayim uben makhaneh yisra’el vayhi he‘anan vehakhoshekh vaya’er halayelah, velo qarab zeh ’el zeh kal halayelah.
wyT mSh at ydw el hym wywlk yhwh at hym brwx qdym ech kl hlylh wySm at hym lxrbh wybqew hmym and mose-extracted stretched out his hand over the sea; and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah caused the sea to go back by a strong east wind all that night, and made the sea dry land, and the from-waters were divided. vayet mosheh yado ‘al hayam vayolekh yhvh hayam beruakh qadim ‘azah kal halaylah vayasem hayam lekharabah, vayibaqe‘u hamayim.
wybaw bny ySral btwk hym bybSh whmym lhm xmh mymynm wmSmalm and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards went into the midst of the sea upon the dry ground: and the from-waters were a wall unto them on their right hand, and on their left. vayabo’u bene yisra’el betokh hayam bayabashah, vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam.
wyrdpw mzrym wybaw axryhm kl sws preh rkbw wprSyw al twk hym and the mizraim-narrowsians pursued, and went in after them to the midst of the sea, even all pharaoh-big-house's horses, his chariots, and his horsemen. vayirdefu mizrayim vayabo’u ’akharehem kol sus par‘oh rikhbo ufarashav, ’el tokh hayam.
wyhy baSmrt hbqr wySqp yhwh al mxnh mzrym bemwd aS wenn wyhm at mxnh mzrym and it came to pass, that in the morning watch yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah looked unto the troop-cluster of the mizraim-narrowsians through the page-column-erection of fire and of the cloud, and troubled the troop-cluster of the mizraim-narrowsians, vayhi be’ashmoret haboqer vayashqef yhvh ’el makhaneh mizrayim be‘amud ’esh ve‘anan, vayaham makhaneh mizrayim.
wysr at apn mrkbtyw wynhghw bkbdt wyamr mzrym anwsh mpny ySral ky yhwh nlxm lhm bmzrym and took off their chariot wheels, that they drave them heavily: so that the mizraim-narrowsians said, let us flee from the face-turns of israel-juicy-towards; for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah fighteth for them against the mizraim-narrowsians. vayasar ’ofan markebotav vaynahagehu bikhbedut, vayomer mizrayim ’anusah mipenei yisra’el ki yhvh nilkham lahem bemizrayim
wyamr yhwh al mSh nTh at ydk el hym wySbw hmym el mzrym el rkbw wel prSyw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, stretch out thine hand over the sea, that the from-waters may come again upon the mizraim-narrowsians, upon their chariots, and upon their horsemen. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh neteh yadekha ‘al hayam, veyashubu hamayim ‘al mizrayim ‘al rikhbo ve‘al parashav.
wyT mSh at ydw el hym wySb hym lpnwt bqr laytnw wmzrym nsym lqratw wyner yhwh at mzrym btwk hym and mose-extracted stretched forth his hand over the sea, and the sea returned to his strength when the morning appeared; and the mizraim-narrowsians fled against it; and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah overthrew the mizraim-narrowsians in the midst of the sea. vayet mosheh yado ‘al hayam vayashab hayam lifnot boqer le’etano umizrayim nasim liqrato, vayna‘er yhvh mizrayim betokh hayam.
wySbw hmym wyksw at hrkb wat hprSym lkl xyl preh hbaym axryhm bym la nSar bhm ed axd and the from-waters returned, and covered the chariots, and the horsemen, and all the troop-cluster of pharaoh-big-house that came into the sea after them; there remained not so much as one of them. vayashubu hamayim vaykhasu harekheb ve’et haparashim lekhol khel par‘oh haba’im ’akharehem bayam, lo nish’ar bahem ‘ad ’ekhad.
wbny ySral hlkw bybSh btwk hym whmym lhm xmh mymynm wmSmalm and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards walked upon dry land in the midst of the sea; and the from-waters were a wall unto them on their right hand, and on their left. ubenei yisra’el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam, vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam
wywSe yhwh bywm hhwa at ySral myd mzrym wyra ySral at mzrym mt el Spt hym thus yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah saved israel-juicy-towards that day out of the hand of the mizraim-narrowsians; and israel-juicy-towards saw the mizraim-narrowsians dead upon the sea shore. vayosha‘ yhvh bayom hahu yisra’el miyad mizrayim, vayar yisra’el mizrayim met ‘al sefat hayam.
wyra ySral at hyd hgdlh aSr eSh yhwh bmzrym wyyraw hem at yhwh wyamynw byhwh wbmSh ebdw and israel-juicy-towards saw that great work which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did upon the mizraim-narrowsians: and the with-mum-people feared yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and was coached by yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and his worker mose-extracted. vayar yisra’el hayad hagedolah ’asher ‘asah yhvh bemizrayim vayire’u ha‘am yhvh, vaya’aminu yhvh ubemosheh ‘abdo.
ac ySyr mSh wbny ySral at hSyrh hcat lyhwh wyamrw lamr aSyrh lyhwh ky gah gah sws wrkbw rmh bym then sang mose-extracted and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards this song unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and spake, saying, i will sing unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, for he hath triumphed gloriously: the horse and his rider hath he thrown into the sea. ’az yashir mosheh ubenei yisra’el hashirah hazot yhvh vayomeru lemor, ’ashirah yhvh ki ga’oh ga’ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam.
ecy wcmrt yh wyhy ly lySweh ch aly wanwhw alhy aby warmmnhw yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is my strength and song, and he is become my saving: he is my to-no-these, and i will prepare him an habitation; my father's to-no-these, and i will exalt him. ‘azi vezimrat yah vayhi li lishu‘ah, zeh ’eli ve’anvehu ’elohei ’abi va’aromemenhu.
yhwh ayS mlxmh yhwh Smw yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is a man of war: yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is his name. yhvh ’ish milkhamah, yhvh shemo.
mrkbt preh wxylw yrh bym wmbxr SlSyw Tbew bym swp pharaoh-big-house's chariots and his troop-cluster hath he cast into the sea: his chosen captains also are drowned in the end sea. markebot par‘oh vekhelo yarah bayam, umibkhar shalishav tube‘u beyam suf.
thmt yksymw yrdw bmzwlt kmw abn the depths have covered them: they sank into the bottom as a father-child-stone. tehomot yekhasyumu, yaredu bimzolot kemo ’aben.
ymynk yhwh nadry bkx ymynk yhwh trez awyb thy right hand, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, is become glorious in dynamic: thy right hand, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, hath dashed in pieces the enemy. yeminekha yhvh ne’dari bakoakh, yeminekha yhvh tir‘az ’oyeb.
wbrb gawnk thrs qmyk tSlx xrnk yaklmw kqS and in the greatness of thine excellency thou hast overthrown them that rose up against thee: thou sentest forth thy wrath, which consumed them as stubble. uberob ge’onkha taharos qamekha, teshalakh kharonekha yokhelemo kaqash.
wbrwx apyk nermw mym nzbw kmw nd nclym qpaw thmt blb ym and with the blast of thy nostrils the from-waters were added together, the floods stood upright as an heap, and the depths were congealed in the heart of the sea. uberuakh ’apekha ne‘ermu mayim nizebu khemo ned nozelim, qafe’u tehomot beleb yam.
amr awyb ardp aSyg axlq Sll tmlamw npSy aryq xrby twrySmw ydy the enemy said, i will pursue, i will overtake, i will divide the spoil; my lust be satisfied upon them; i will draw my sword, my hand destroy them. ’amar ’oyeb ’erdof ’asig ’akhaleq shalal, timla’emo nafshi ’ariq kharbi torishemo yadi.
nSpt brwxk ksmw ym zllw kewprt bmym adyrym thou didst blow with thy wind, the sea covered them: they sank as lead in the mighty from-waters. nashafta berukhakha kisamo yam, zalalu ka‘oferet bemayim ’adirim.
my kmkh balm yhwh my kmkh nadr bqdS nwra thlt eSh pla who is like unto thee, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, among the to-no-these? who is like thee, glorious in dedication, fearful in praises, doing wonders? mi khamokhah ba’elim yhvh mi kamokhah ne’dar baqodesh, nora tehilot ‘oseh fele.
nTyt ymynk tblemw arz thou stretchedst out thy right hand, the earth swallowed them. natita yeminekha tibla‘emo ’arez.
nxyt bxsdk em cw galt nhlt beck al nwh qdSk thou in thy mercy hast led forth the with-mum-people which thou hast redeemed: thou hast guided them in thy strength unto thy dedicated-finished habitation. nakhita bekhasdekha ‘am zu ga’aleta, nehalta be‘azekha ’el neveh qadshekha
Smew emym yrgcwn xyl axc ySby plSt the with-mum-people hear, and be afraid: sorrow take hold on the inhabitants of pelashet-break-into-grief. shame‘u ‘amim yirgazun, khil ’akhaz yoshebei pelashet.
ac nbhlw alwpy adwm ayly mwab yaxcmw red nmgw kl ySby knen then the dukes of edom-man be amazed; the mighty men of moab-from-father, trembling take hold upon them; all the inhabitants of canaan-mobile-trade melt away. ’az nibhalu ’alufei ’edom ’elei mo’ab yokhazemo ra‘ad, namogu kol yoshebei khena‘an.
tpl elyhm aymth wpxd bgdl crwek ydmw kabn ed yebr emk yhwh ed yebr em cw qnyt fear and dread fall upon them; by the greatness of thine arm they be as still as a father-child-stone; till thy with-mum-people pass over, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, till the with-mum-people pass over, which thou hast purchased. tipol ‘alehem ’ematah vafakhad bigdol zero‘akha yidemu ka’aben, ‘ad ya‘abor ‘amekha yhvh ‘ad ya‘abor ‘am zu qanita.
tbamw wtTemw bhr nxltk mkwn lSbtk pelt yhwh mqdS adny kwnnw ydyk thou bring them in, and plant them in the mountain of thine inheritance, in the place, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which thou hast made for thee to dwell in, in the dedicated-finished, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which thy hands have established. tebi’emo vetita‘emo behar nakhalatekha makhon leshibtekha pa‘alta yhvh, miqedash ’adonay konu yadekha.
yhwh ymlk lelm wed yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah reign for ever and ever. yhvh yimlokh le‘olam va‘ed.
ky ba sws preh brkbw wbprSyw bym wySb yhwh elhm at my hym wbny ySral hlkw bybSh btwk hym for the horse of pharaoh-big-house went in with his chariots and with his horsemen into the sea, and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought again the from-waters of the sea upon them; and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards went on dry land in the midst of the sea. ki ba sus par‘oh berikhbo ubefarashav bayam vayasheb yhvh ‘alehem mei hayam, ubenei yisra’el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam.
wtqx mrym hnbyah axwt ahrn at htp bydh wtzan kl hnSym axryh btpym wbmxlt and miriam-rebel-bitter the bringeress, the sister of aaron-cabinet, took a timbrel in her hand; and all the women went out after her with timbrels and with dances. vatiqakh miryam hanebi’ah ’akhot ’aharon ’et hatof beyadah, vatezena khal hanashim ’akhareha betupim ubimkholot.
wten lhm mrym Syrw lyhwh ky gah gah sws wrkbw rmh bym and miriam-rebel-bitter answered them, sing ye to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, for he hath triumphed gloriously; the horse and his rider hath he thrown into the sea. vata‘an lahem miryam, shiru yhvh ki ga’oh ga’ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam.
wyse mSh at ySral mym swp wyzaw al mdbr Swr wylkw SlSt ymym bmdbr wla mzaw mym so mose-extracted brought israel-juicy-towards from the end sea, and they went out into the place-of-word-desert of shur-wall; and they went three days in the place-of-word-desert, and found no from-waters. vayasa‘ mosheh yisra’el miyam suf vayeze’u ’el midbar shur, vayelekhu sheloshet yamim bamidbar velo maze’u mayim.
wybaw mrth wla yklw lStt mym mmrh ky mrym hm el kn qra Smh mrh and when they came to maratah-bitter-mercy, they could not drink of the from-waters of marah-bitter, for they were bitter: therefore the name of it was called marah-bitter. vayabo’u maratah velo yakhelu lishtot mayim mimarah ki marim hem, ‘al ken qara shemah marah.
wylnw hem el mSh lamr mh nSth and the with-mum-people murmured against mose-extracted, saying, what we drink? vayilonu ha‘am ‘al mosheh lemor mah nishteh.
wyzeq al yhwh wywrhw yhwh ez wySlk al hmym wymtqw hmym Sm Sm lw xq wmSpT wSm nshw and he cried unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah showed him a tree, which when he had cast into the from-waters, the from-waters were made sweet: there he made for them a statute and an ordinance, and there he proved them, vayiz‘aq ’el yhvh vayorehu yhvh ‘ez vayashlekh ’el hamayim vayimtequ hamayim, sham sam lo khoq umishpat vesham nisahu.
wyamr am Smwe tSme lqwl yhwh alhyk whySr beynyw teSh whacnt lmzwtyw wSmrt kl xqyw kl hmxlh aSr Smty bmzrym la aSym elyk ky any yhwh rpak and said, if thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, and wilt do that which is right in his sight, and wilt give ear to his directives, and keep all his statutes, i will put none of these diseases upon thee, which i have brought upon the mizraim-narrowsians: for i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah that healeth thee. vayomer ’im shamoa‘ tishma‘ leqol yhvh ’elohekha vehayashar be‘enav ta‘aseh veha’azanta lemizvotav veshamarta kal khuqav, kal hamakhalah ’asher samti bemizrayim lo ’asim ‘alekha ki ’ani yhvh rofe’ekha.
wybaw aylmh wSm Stym eSrh eynt mym wSbeym tmrym wyxnw Sm el hmym and they came to elim-bind, where were twelve wells of from-waters, and threescore and ten palm trees: and they encamped there by the from-waters. vayabo’u ’elimah vesham shetem ‘esreh ‘enot mayim veshib‘im temarim, vayakhanu sham ‘al hamayim.
wysew maylm wybaw kl edt bny ySral al mdbr syn aSr byn aylm wbyn syny bxmSh eSr ywm lxdS hSny lzatm marz mzrym and they took their journey from elim-bind, and all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards came unto the place-of-word-desert of miss, which is between-bin elim-bind and )sinai-bush-(proto, on the fifteenth day of the second month after their departing out of the land of mizraim-narrows. vayis‘u me’elim vayabo’u kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ’el midbar sin ’asher ben ’elim uben sinay, bakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hasheni lezetam me’erez mizrayim.
wylynw wylwnw kl edt bny ySral el mSh wel ahrn bmdbr and the whole until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards murmured against mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet in the place-of-word-desert: vayilonu kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon bamidbar.
wyamrw alhm bny ySral my ytn mwtnw byd yhwh barz mzrym bSbtnw el syr hbSr baklnw lxm lSbe ky hwzatm atnw al hmdbr hch lhmyt at kl hqhl hch breb and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards said unto them, would to to-no-these we had died by the hand of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in the land of mizraim-narrows, when we sat by the flesh pots, and when we did eat bread to the full; for ye have brought us forth into this place-of-word-desert, to kill this whole assembly with hunger. vayomeru ’alehem benei yisra’el mi mutenu beyad yhvh be’erez mizrayim beshibtenu ‘al sir habasar be’akhelenu lekhem lasoba‘, ki hozetem ’otanu ’el hamidbar hazeh lehamit kal haqahal hazeh bara‘ab.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hnny mmTyr lkm lxm mn hSmym wyza hem wlqTw dbr ywm bywmw lmen ansnw hylk btwrty am la then said yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah unto mose-extracted, behold, i will rain bread from namespaces for you; and the with-mum-people go out and gather a certain rate every day, that i may prove them, whether they will walk in my teaching, or no. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hini mamtir lakhem lekhem min hashamayim, veyaza ha‘am velaqetu debar beyomo lema‘an ’anasenu hayelekh betorati ’im lo.
whyh bywm hSSy whkynw at aSr ybyaw whyh mSnh el aSr ylqTw ywm ywm and it come to pass, that on the sixth day they prepare that which they bring in; and it be twice as much as they gather daily. vehayah bayom hashishi vehekhinu ’asher yabi’u, vehayah mishneh ‘al ’asher yilqetu yom yom.
wyamr mSh wahrn al kl bny ySral erb wydetm ky yhwh hwzya atkm marz mzrym and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet said unto all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, at even, then ye hand-know that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath brought you out from the land of mizraim-narrows: vayomer mosheh ve’aharon ’el kal benei yisra’el, ‘ereb vida‘tem ki yhvh hozi ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim.
wbqr wraytm at kbwd yhwh bSmew at tlntykm el yhwh wnxnw mh ky tlwnw tlynw elynw and in the morning, then ye see the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; for that he heareth your murmurings to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and what are we, that ye murmur against us? uboqer ure’item kebod yhvh beshame‘o telunotekhem ‘al yhvh, venakhnu mah ki talinu ‘alenu.
wyamr mSh btt yhwh lkm berb bSr lakl wlxm bbqr lSbe bSme yhwh at tlntykm aSr atm mlynm elyw wnxnw mh la elynw tlntykm ky el yhwh and mose-extracted said, this be, when yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah give you in the evening flesh to eat, and in the morning bread to the full; for that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah heareth your murmurings which ye murmur against him: and what are we? your murmurings are not against us, and to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayomer mosheh betet yhvh lakhem ba‘ereb basar le’ekhol velekhem baboqer lisboa‘ bishmoa‘ yhvh telunotekhem ’asher ’atem malinim ‘alav, venakhnu mah lo ‘alenu telunotekhem ki ‘al yhvh.
wyamr mSh al ahrn amr al kl edt bny ySral qrbw lpny yhwh ky Sme at tlntykm and mose-extracted spake unto aaron-cabinet, say unto all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, come near before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: for he hath heard your murmurings. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon ’emor ’el kal ‘adat benei yisra’el qirbu lifnei yhvh, ki shama‘ telunotekhem.
wyhy kdbr ahrn al kl edt bny ySral wypnw al hmdbr whnh kbwd yhwh nrah benn and it came to pass, as aaron-cabinet spake unto the whole until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they looked toward the place-of-word-desert, and, behold, the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appeared in the cloud. vayhi kedaber ’aharon ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el vayifnu ’el hamidbar, vehineh kebod yhvh nir’ah be‘anan.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Smety at tlwnt bny ySral dbr alhm lamr byn herbym taklw bSr wbbqr tSbew lxm wydetm ky any yhwh alhykm i have heard the murmurings of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: speak unto them, saying, at even ye eat flesh, and in the morning ye be filled with bread; and ye hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. shama‘ti telunot benei yisra’el daber ’alehem lemor ben ha‘arbayim tokhelu basar ubaboqer tisbe‘u lakhem, vida‘tem ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wyhy berb wtel hSlw wtks at hmxnh wbbqr hyth Skbt hTl sbyb lmxnh and it came to pass, that at even the quails came up, and covered the camp: and in the morning the dew lay round about the troop-cluster. vayhi ba‘ereb vata‘al haselav vatekhas hamakhaneh, ubaboqer shikhbat hatal sabib lamakhaneh.
wtel Skbt hTl whnh el pny hmdbr dq mxsps dq kkpr el harz and when the dew that lay was gone up, behold, upon the face-turns of the place-of-word-desert there lay a small round thing, as small as the hoar frost on the ground. vata‘al shikhbat hatal, vehineh ‘al penei hamidbar daq mekhuspas daq kakefor ‘al ha’arez.
wyraw bny ySral wyamrw ayS al axyw mn hwa ky la ydew mh hwa wyamr mSh alhm hwa hlxm aSr ntn yhwh lkm laklh and when children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards saw it, they said one to another, it is manna-whats-that: for they wist not what it was. and mose-extracted said unto them, this is the bread which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath given you to eat. vayir’u bene yisra’el vayomeru ’ish ’el ’akhiv man hu ki lo yade‘u mah hu, vayomer mosheh ’alehem hu halekhem ’asher natan yhvh lakhem le’akhlah
ch hdbr aSr zwh yhwh lqTw mmnw ayS lpy aklw emr lglglt mspr npStykm ayS laSr bahlw tqxw this is the thing which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct, gather of it every man according to his eating, an omer-say for every man, according to the number of your rolling-heads; take ye every man for them which are in his tents. zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh liqtu mimenu ’ish lefi ’akhelo, ‘omer lagulgolet mispar nafshotekhem ’ish la’asher be’aholo tiqakhu.
wyeSw kn bny ySral wylqTw hmrbh whmmeyT and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did so, and added, some more, some less. vaya‘asu khen benei yisra’el, vayilqetu hamarbeh vehamam‘it.
wymdw bemr wla hedyp hmrbh whmmeyT la hxsyr ayS lpy aklw lqTw and when they did mete it with an omer-say, he that added much had nothing over, and he that added little had no lack; they added every man according to his eating. vayamodu ba‘omer velo he‘dif hamarbeh vehamam‘it lo hekhsir, ’ish lefi ’akhelo laqatu.
wyamr mSh alhm ayS al ywtr mmnw ed bqr and mose-extracted said, let no man leave of it till the morning. vayomer mosheh ’ish ’al yoter mimenu ‘ad boqer.
wla Smew al mSh wywtrw anSym mmnw ed bqr wyrm twleym wybaS wyqzp elhm mSh notwithstanding they hearkened not unto mose-extracted; and some of them left of it until the morning, and it bred worms, and stank: and mose-extracted was wroth with them. velo shame‘u ’el mosheh vayotiru ’anashim mimenu ‘ad boqer vayarum tola‘im vayib’ash, vayiqzof ‘alehem mosheh.
wylqTw atw bbqr bbqr ayS kpy aklw wxm hSmS wnms and they added it every morning, every man according to his eating: and when the sun waxed hot, it melted. vayilqetu ’oto baboqer baboqer ’ish kefi ’akhelo, vekham hashemesh venamas.
wyhy bywm hSSy lqTw lxm mSnh Sny hemr laxd wybaw kl nSyay hedh wygydw lmSh and it came to pass, that on the sixth day they added twice as much bread, two omer-says for one man: and all the rulers of the until-witness came and told mose-extracted. vayhi bayom hashishi laqetu lekhem mishneh shenei ha‘omer la’ekhad, vayabo’u kal nesi’ei ha‘edah vayagidu lemosheh.
wyamr alhm hwa aSr dbr yhwh Sbtwn Sbt qdS lyhwh mxr at aSr tapw apw wat aSr tbSlw bSlw wat kl hedp hnyxw lkm lmSmrt ed hbqr and he said unto them, this is that which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath said, to morrow is the rest of the dedicated-finished sabbath-seven unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: bake that which ye will bake to day, and seethe that ye will seethe; and that which remaineth over lay up for you to be kept until the morning. vayomer ’alehem hu ’asher diber yhvh shabaton shabat qodesh yhvh makhar,. ’asher tofu ’efu ve’et ’asher tebashelu bashelu ve’et kal ha‘odef hanikhu lakhem lemishmeret ‘ad haboqer.
wynyxw atw ed hbqr kaSr zwh mSh wla hbayS wrmh la hyth bw and they laid it up till the morning, as mose-extracted bade: and it did not stink, neither was there any worm therein. vayanikhu ’oto ‘ad haboqer ka’asher zivah mosheh, velo hib’ish verimah lo hayetah bo.
wyamr mSh aklhw hywm ky Sbt hywm lyhwh hywm la tmzahw bSdh and mose-extracted said, eat that to day; for to day is a sabbath-seven unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: to day ye not find it in the field. vayomer mosheh ’ikhluhu hayom ki shabat hayom yhvh, hayom lo timza’uhu basadeh.
SSt ymym tlqThw wbywm hSbyey Sbt la yhyh bw six days ye gather it; and on the seventh day, which is the sabbath-seven, in it there be none. sheshet yamim tilqetuhu, ubayom hashebi‘i shabat lo yihyeh bo.
wyhy bywm hSbyey yzaw mn hem llqT wla mzaw and it came to pass, that there went out some of the with-mum-people on the seventh day for to gather, and they found none. vayhi bayom hashebi‘i yaze’u min ha‘am lilqot, velo maza’u.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ed anh mantm lSmr mzwty wtwrty and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, how long refuse ye to keep my directives and my teachings? vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh, ‘ad ’anah me’antem lishmor mizvotay vetorotay.
raw ky yhwh ntn lkm hSbt el kn hwa ntn lkm bywm hSSy lxm ywmym Sbw ayS txtyw al yza ayS mmqmw bywm hSbyey see, for that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath given you the sabbath-seven, therefore he giveth you on the sixth day the bread of two days; abide ye every man in his place, let no man go out of his place on the seventh day. re’u ki yhvh natan lakhem hashabat ‘al ken hu noten lakhem bayom hashishi lekhem yomayim, shebu ’ish takhtav ’al yezei ’ish mimeqomo bayom hashebi‘i.
wySbtw hem bywm hSbey so the with-mum-people rested on the seventh day. vayishbetu ha‘am bayom hashebi‘i.
wyqraw byt ySral at Smw mn whwa kcre gd lbn wTemw kzpyxt bdbS and the daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards called the name thereof manna-whats-that: and it was like coriander seed, to-between-bin-between-build-white; and the taste of it was like wafers made with honey. vayiqre’u bet yisra’el ’et shemo man, vehu kezera‘ gad laban veta‘mo kezapikhit bidbash.
wyamr mSh ch hdbr aSr zwh yhwh mla hemr mmnw lmSmrt ldrtykm lmen yraw at hlxm aSr haklty atkm bmdbr bhwzyay atkm marz mzrym and mose-extracted said, this is the thing which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah directeth, fill an omer-say of it to be kept for your generations; that they may see the bread wherewith i have fed you in the place-of-word-desert, when i brought you forth from the land of mizraim-narrows. vayomer mosheh zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh melo ha‘omer mimenu lemishmeret ledorotekhem, lema‘an yir’u halekhem ’asher he’ekhalti ’etkhem bamidbar behozi’i ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim.
wyamr mSh al ahrn qx znznt axt wtn Smh mla hemr mn whnx atw lpny yhwh lmSmrt ldrtykm and mose-extracted said unto aaron-cabinet, take a pot, and put an omer-say full of manna-whats-that therein, and lay it up before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to be kept for your generations. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon qakh zinzenet ’akhat veten shamah melo ha‘omer man, vehanakh ’oto lifnei yhvh lemishmeret ledorotekhem.
kaSr zwh yhwh al mSh wynyxhw ahrn lpny hedt lmSmrt as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, so aaron-cabinet laid it up before-turns the until-witness, to be kept. ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, vayanikhehu ’aharon lifnei ha‘edut lemishmaret.
wbny ySral aklw at hmn arbeym Snh ed bam al arz nwSbt at hmn aklw ed bam al qzh arz knen and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did eat manna-whats-that forty years, until they came to a land inhabited; they did eat manna-whats-that, until they came unto the borders of the land of canaan-mobile-trade. ubenei yisra’el ’akhelu haman ’arba‘im shanah ‘ad bo’am ’el ’erez noshabet, haman ’akhelu ‘ad bo’am ’el qezeh ’erez kena‘an.
whemr eSryt hayph hwa now an omer-say is the tenth part of an ephah-tired. veha‘omer ‘asirit ha’efah hu.
wysew kl edt bny ySral mmdbr syn lmseyhm el py yhwh wyxnw brpydym wayn mym lStt hem and all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards journeyed from the place-of-word-desert of miss, after their journeys, according to the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and pitched in rephidim-upholstery: and there was no from-waters for the with-mum-people to drink. vayis‘u kal ‘adat bene yisra’el mimidbar sin lemas‘ehem ‘al pi yhvh, vayakhanu birfidim ve’en mayim lishtot ha‘am.
wyrb hem em mSh wyamrw tnw lnw mym wnSth wyamr lhm mSh mh trybwn emdy mh tnswn at yhwh wherefore the with-mum-people did chide with mose-extracted, and said, give us from-waters that we may drink. and mose-extracted said unto them, why chide ye with me? wherefore do ye tempt yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah? vayareb ha‘am ‘im mosheh vayomeru tenu lanu mayim venishteh, vayomer lahem mosheh mah teribun ‘imadi mah tenasun yhvh.
wyzma Sm hem lmym wyln hem el mSh wyamr lmh ch helytnw mmzrym lhmyt aty wat bny wat mqny bzma and the with-mum-people thirsted there for from-waters; and the with-mum-people murmured against mose-extracted, and said, wherefore is this that thou hast brought us up out of mizraim-narrows, to kill us and our children-betweens and our in-them-animal with thirst? vayizma sham ha‘am lamayim vayalen ha‘am ‘al mosheh, vayomer lamah zeh he‘elitanu mimizrayim lehamit ’oti ve’et banay ve’et miqnay bazama.
wyzeq mSh al yhwh lamr mh aeSh lem hch ewd meT wsqlny and mose-extracted cried unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, saying, what i do unto this with-mum-people? they be almost ready to father-child-stone me. vayiz‘aq mosheh ’el yhvh lemor mah ’e‘eseh la‘am hazeh, ‘od me‘at useqaluni.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ebr lpny hem wqx atk mcqny ySral wmTk aSr hkyt bw at hyar qx bydk whlkt and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, go on before-turns the with-mum-people, and take with thee of the elders of israel-juicy-towards; and thy pen, wherewith thou hit the river, take in thine hand, and go. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘abor lifnei ha‘am veqakh ’itekha miziqnei yisra’el, umatekha ’asher hikita bo hay’or qakh beyadekha vehalakheta.
hnny emd lpnyk Sm el hzwr bxrb whkyt bzwr wyzaw mmnw mym wSth hem wyeS kn mSh leyny cqny ySral behold, i will stand before-turns thee there upon the rock in horeb-sword; and thou hit the rock, and there come from-waters out of it, that the with-mum-people may drink. and mose-extracted did so in the sight of the elders of israel-juicy-towards. hini ‘omed lefanekha sham ‘al hazur bekhoreb vehikita bazur veyaze’u mimenu mayim veshatah ha‘am, vaya‘as ken mosheh le‘enei ziqnei yisra’el.
wyqra Sm hmqwm msh wmrybh el ryb bny ySral wel nstm at yhwh lamr hyS yhwh bqrbnw am ayn and he called the name of the place massa-loadh, and meribah-jam, because of the chiding of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and because they tempted yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, saying, is yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah among us, or not? vayiqra shem hamaqom masah umeribah, ‘al rib benei yisra’el ve‘al nasotam yhvh lemor hayesh yhvh beqirbenu ’im ’ayin.
wyba emlq wylxm em ySral brpydm then came amalek-labour-king-moloch, and fought with israel-juicy-towards in rephidim-upholstery. vayabo ‘amaleq, vayilakhem ‘im yisra’el birfidim.
wyamr mSh al yhwSe bxr lnw anSym wza hlxm bemlq mxr anky nzb el raS hgbeh wmTh halhym bydy and mose-extracted said unto joshua-jesus-save, choose us out men, and go out, fight with amalek-labour-king-moloch: to morrow i will stand on the top of the hill with the pen of to-no-these in mine hand. vayomer mosheh ’el yehoshua‘ bekhar lanu ’anashim vezei hilakhem ba‘amaleq, makhar ’anokhi nizab ‘al rosh hagib‘ah umateh ha’elohim beyadi.
wyeS yhwSe kaSr amr lw mSh lhlxm bemlq wmSh ahrn wxwr elw raS hgbeh so joshua-jesus-save did as mose-extracted had said to him, and fought with amalek-labour-king-moloch: and mose-extracted, aaron-cabinet, and hur-small-place-prince went up to the top of the hill. vaya‘as yehoshua‘ ka’asher ’amar lo mosheh lehilakhem ba‘amaleq, umosheh ’aharon vekhur ‘alu rosh hagib‘ah.
whyh kaSr yrym mSh ydw wgbr ySral wkaSr ynyx ydw wgbr emlq and it came to pass, when mose-extracted held up his hand, that israel-juicy-towards prevailed: and when he let down his hand, amalek-labour-king-moloch prevailed. vehayah ka’asher yarim mosheh yado vegabar yisra’el, vekha’asher yaniakh yado vegabar ‘amaleq.
wydy mSh kbdym wyqxw abn wySymw txtyw wySb elyh wahrn wxwr tmkw bydyw mch axd wmch axd wyhy ydyw amwnh ed ba hSmS and mose-extracted hands were heavy; and they took a father-child-stone, and put it under him, and he sat thereon; and aaron-cabinet and hur-small-place-prince stayed up his hands, the one on the one side, and the other on the other side; and his hands were steady until the going down of the sun. videi mosheh kebedim vayiqkhu ’eben vayasimu takhtav vayesheb ‘aleha, ve’aharon vekhur tamekhu beyadav mizeh ’ekhad umizeh ’ekhad vayhi yadav ’emunah ‘ad bo hashamesh.
wyxlS yhwSe at emlq wat emw lpy xrb and joshua-jesus-save discomfited amalek-labour-king-moloch and his with-mum-people with the edge of the sword. vayakhalosh yehoshua‘ ‘amaleq ve’et ‘amo lefi khareb.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ktb cat ckrwn bspr wSym bacny yhwSe ky mxh amxh at ckr emlq mtxt hSmym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, write this for a memorial in a book, and rehearse it in the ears of joshua-jesus-save: for i will utterly put out the remembrance of amalek-labour-king-moloch from under namespaces. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ketob zot zikaron basefer vesim be’azenei yehoshua‘, ki makhoh ’emkheh zekher ‘amaleq mitakhat hashamayim.
wybn mSh mcbx wyqra Smw yhwh nsy and mose-extracted between-built an butcher-kitchen, and called the name of it yhwh-aeiou-ohyeahnissi: vayiben mosheh mizbeakh, vayiqra shemo yhvh nisi.
wyamr ky yd el ks yh mlxmh lyhwh bemlq mdr dr for he said, because yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath sworn that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will have war with amalek-labour-king-moloch from generation to generation. vayomer ki kes yah milkhamah yhvh ba‘amaleq, midor dor.
wySme ytrw khn mdyn xtn mSh at kl aSr eSh alhym lmSh wlySral emw ky hwzya yhwh at ySral mmzrym when jethro-look, the dimmer-server of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching, mose-extracted' father in law, heard of all that to-no-these had done for mose-extracted, and for israel-juicy-towards his with-mum-people, and that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had brought israel-juicy-towards out of mizraim-narrows; vayishma‘ yitro khohen midyan khoten mosheh kal ’asher ‘asah ’elohim lemosheh uleyisra’el ‘amo, ki hozi yhvh yisra’el mimizrayim.
wyqx ytrw xtn mSh at zprh aSt mSh axr Slwxyh then jethro-look, mose-extracted' father in law, took zipor-birdah-bird, mose-extracted' woman, after he had sent her back, vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh ziporah ’eshet mosheh, ’akhar shilukheha.
wat Sny bnyh aSr Sm haxd grSm ky amr gr hyyty barz nkryh and her two children-betweens; of which the name of the one was gershom-stranger; for he said, i have been an alien in a strange land: ve’et shenei baneha, ’asher shem ha’ekhad gereshom ki ’amar ger hayiti be’erez nakheriyah.
wSm haxd alyecr ky alhy aby becry wyzlny mxrb preh and the name of the other was eliezer-my-towards-helps; for the to-no-these of my father, said he, was mine help, and delivered me from the sword of pharaoh-big-house: veshem ha’ekhad ’eli‘ezer, ki ’elohei ’abi be‘ezri vayazileni mekhereb par‘oh.
wyba ytrw xtn mSh wbnyw waStw al mSh al hmdbr aSr hwa xnh Sm hr halhym and jethro-look, mose-extracted' father in law, came with his children-betweens and his woman unto mose-extracted into the place-of-word-desert, where he encamped at the mount of to-no-these: vayabo yitro khoten mosheh ubanav ve’ishto ’el mosheh, ’el hamidbar ’asher hu khoneh har ha’elohim.
wyamr al mSh any xtnk ytrw ba alyk waStk wSny bnyh emh and he said unto mose-extracted, i thy father in law jethro-look am come unto thee, and thy woman, and her two children-betweens with her. vayomer ’el mosheh ’ani khotenkha yitro ba ’elekha, ve’ishtekha ushenei baneha ‘imah.
wyza mSh lqrat xtnw wyStxw wySq lw wySalw ayS lrehw lSlwm wybaw hahlh and mose-extracted went out to until-witness his father in law, and did obeisance, and kissed him; and they asked each other of their welfare; and they came into the tent. vayezei mosheh liqrat khoteno vayishtakhu vayishaq lo vayish’alu ’ish lere‘ehu leshalom, vayabo’u ha’ohelah.
wyspr mSh lxtnw at kl aSr eSh yhwh lpreh wlmzrym el awdt ySral at kl htlah aSr mzatm bdrk wyzlm yhwh and mose-extracted told his father in law all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had done unto pharaoh-big-house and to the mizraim-narrowsians for israel-juicy-towards's sake, and all the travail that had come upon them by the way, and how yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah delivered them. vaysaper mosheh lekhoteno kal ’asher ‘asah yhvh lefar‘oh ulemizrayim ‘al ’odot yisra’el, kal hatela’ah ’asher meza’atam baderekh vayazilem yhvh.
wyxd ytrw el kl hTwbh aSr eSh yhwh lySral aSr hzylw myd mzrym and jethro-look rejoiced for all the goodness which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had done to israel-juicy-towards, whom he had delivered out of the hand of the mizraim-narrowsians. vayikhad yitro ‘al kal hatobah ’asher ‘asah yhvh leyisra’el, ’asher hizilo miyad mizrayim.
wyamr ytrw brwk yhwh aSr hzyl atkm myd mzrym wmyd preh aSr hzyl at hem mtxt yd mzrym and jethro-look said, knee-fluffy-blessed be yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, who hath delivered you out of the hand of the mizraim-narrowsians, and out of the hand of pharaoh-big-house, who hath delivered the with-mum-people from under the hand of the mizraim-narrowsians. vayomer yitro barukh yhvh ’asher hizil ’etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad par‘oh, ’asher hizil ha‘am mitakhat yad mizrayim.
eth ydety ky gdwl yhwh mkl halhym ky bdbr aSr cdw elyhm now i hand-know that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is greater than all to-no-these: for in the thing wherein they dealt proudly he was above them. ‘atah yada‘ti ki gadol yhvh mikal ha’elohim, ki badabar ’asher zadu ‘alehem.
wyqx ytrw xtn mSh elh wcbxym lalhym wyba ahrn wkl cqny ySral lakl lxm em xtn mSh lpny halhym and jethro-look, mose-extracted' father in law, took a on-up and butchers for to-no-these: and aaron-cabinet came, and all the elders of israel-juicy-towards, to eat bread with mose-extracted' father in law before-turns to-no-these. vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh ‘olah uzebakhim lelohim, vayabo ’aharon vekhol ziqnei yisra’el le’ekhal lekhem ‘im khoten mosheh lifnei ha’elohim.
wyhy mmxrt wySb mSh lSpT at hem wyemd hem el mSh mn hbqr ed herb and it came to pass on the morrow, that mose-extracted sat to decide the with-mum-people: and the with-mum-people stood by mose-extracted from the morning unto the evening. vayhi mimakhorat vayesheb mosheh lishpot ha‘am, vaya‘amod ha‘am ‘al mosheh min haboqer ‘ad ha‘areb.
wyra xtn mSh at kl aSr hwa eSh lem wyamr mh hdbr hch aSr ath eSh lem mdwe ath ywSb lbdk wkl hem nzb elyk mn bqr ed erb and when mose-extracted' father in law saw all that he did to the with-mum-people, he said, what is this thing that thou doest to the with-mum-people? why sittest thou thyself alone, and all the with-mum-people stand by thee from morning unto even? vayar khoten mosheh kal ’asher hu ‘oseh la‘am, vayomer mah hadabar hazeh ’asher ’atah ‘oseh la‘am madua‘ ’atah yosheb lebadekha vekhal ha‘am nizab ‘alekha min boqer ‘ad ‘areb.
wyamr mSh lxtnw ky yba aly hem ldrS alhym and mose-extracted said unto his father in law, because the with-mum-people come unto me to inquire of to-no-these: vayomer mosheh lekhoteno, ki yabo ’elay ha‘am lidrosh ’elohim.
ky yhyh lhm dbr ba aly wSpTty byn ayS wbyn rehw whwdety at xqy halhym wat twrtyw when they have a matter, they come unto me; and i decide between-bin one and another, and i do make them hand-know the statutes of to-no-these, and his teachings. ki yihyeh lahem dabar ba ’elay veshafati ben ’ish uben re‘ehu, vehoda‘ti khuqei ha’elohim ve’et torotav.
wyamr xtn mSh alyw la Twb hdbr aSr ath eSh and mose-extracted' father in law said unto him, the thing that thou doest is not good. vayomer khoten mosheh ’elav, lo tob hadabar ’asher ’atah ‘oseh.
nbl tbl gm ath gm hem hch aSr emk ky kbd mmk hdbr la twkl eShw lbdk thou wilt surely wear away, both thou, and this with-mum-people that is with thee: for this thing is too heavy for thee; thou art not able to perform it thyself alone. nabol tibol gam ’atah gam ha‘am hazeh ’asher ‘imakh, ki khabed mimekha hadabar lo tukhal ‘asohu lebadekha.
eth Sme bqly ayezk wyhy alhym emk hyh ath lem mwl halhym whbat ath at hdbrym al halhym hearken now unto my voice, i will give thee counsel, and to-no-these be with thee: be thou for the with-mum-people to to-no-these-ward, that thou mayest bring the causes unto to-no-these: ‘atah shema‘ beqoli ’i‘azekha vihi ’elohim ‘imakh, heyeh ’atah la‘am mul ha’elohim vehebeta ’atah hadebarim ’el ha’elohim.
whchrth athm at hxqym wat htwrt whwdet lhm at hdrk ylkw bh wat hmeSh aSr yeSwn and thou teach them ordinances and teachings, and show them the way wherein they must walk, and the work that they must do. vehizhartah ’ethem hakhuqim ve’et hatorot, vehoda‘ta lahem haderekh yelekhu bah ve’et hama‘aseh ’asher ya‘asun.
wath txch mkl hem anSy xyl yray alhym anSy amt Snay bze wSmt elhm Sry alpym Sry mawt Sry xmSym wSry eSrt moreover thou provide out of all the with-mum-people able men, such as fear to-no-these, men of truth, hating covetousness; and place such over them, to be rulers of thousands, and rulers of hundreds, rulers of fifties, and rulers of tens: ve’atah tekhezeh mikal ha‘am ’anshe khayil yir’ei ’elohim ’anshei ’emet sone’ei baza‘, vesamta ‘alehem sarei ’alafim sarei me’ot sarei khamishim vesarei ‘asarot.
wSpTw at hem bkl et whyh kl hdbr hgdl ybyaw alyk wkl hdbr hqTn ySpTw hm whql melyk wnSaw atk and let them decide the with-mum-people at all seasons: and it be, that every great matter they bring unto thee, and every small matter they decide: so it be easier for thyself, and they bear the burden with thee. veshafetu ha‘am bekhal ‘et vehayah kal hadabar hagadol yabi’u ’elekha vekhal hadabar haqaton yishpetu hem, vehaqel me‘alekha venase’u ’itakh.
am at hdbr hch teSh wzwk alhym wyklt emd wgm kl hem hch el mqmw yba bSlwm if thou do this thing, and to-no-these direct thee so, then thou be able to endure, and all this with-mum-people also go to their place in peace. ’im hadabar hazeh ta‘aseh vezivekha ’elohim veyakhaleta ‘amod, vegam kal ha‘am hazeh ‘al meqomo yabo beshalom.
wySme mSh lqwl xtnw wyeS kl aSr amr so mose-extracted hearkened to the voice of his father in law, and did all that he had said. vayishma‘ mosheh leqol khoteno, vaya‘as kol ’asher ’amar.
wybxr mSh anSy xyl mkl ySral wytn atm raSym el hem Sry alpym Sry mawt Sry xmSym wSry eSrt and mose-extracted chose able men out of all israel-juicy-towards, and made them heads over the with-mum-people, rulers of thousands, rulers of hundreds, rulers of fifties, and rulers of tens. vayibkhar mosheh ’anshe khayil mikal yisra’el vayiten ’otam rashim ‘al ha‘am, sarei ’alafim sarei me’ot sarei khamishim vesarei ‘asarot.
wSpTw at hem bkl et at hdbr hqSh ybyawn al mSh wkl hdbr hqTn ySpwTw hm and they decided the with-mum-people at all seasons: the hard causes they brought unto mose-extracted, and every small matter they decided themselves. veshafetu ha‘am bekhal ‘et, hadabar haqasheh yebi’un ’el mosheh vekhal hadabar haqaton yishputu hem.
wySlx mSh at xtnw wylk lw al arzw and mose-extracted let his father in law depart; and he went his way into his own land. vayshalakh mosheh ’et khoteno, vayelekh lo ’el ’arzo.
bxdS hSlySy lzat bny ySral marz mzrym bywm hch baw mdbr syny in the third month, when children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards were gone forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows, the same day came they into the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto. bakhodesh hashelishi lezet bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim, bayom hazeh ba’u midbar sinay.
wysew mrpydym wybaw mdbr syny wyxnw bmdbr wyxn Sm ySral ngd hhr for they were departed from rephidim-upholstery, and were come to the place-of-word-desert of bush-missai, and had pitched in the place-of-word-desert; and there israel-juicy-towards camped before-turns the mount. vayis‘u merefidim vayabo’u midbar sinay vayakhanu bamidbar, vayikhan sham yisra’el neged hahar.
wmSh elh al halhym wyqra alyw yhwh mn hhr lamr kh tamr lbyt yeqb wtgyd lbny ySral and mose-extracted went up unto to-no-these, and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah called unto him out of the mountain, saying, thus thou say to the daughter-house of jacob-backstreet, and tell children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; umosheh ‘alah ’el ha’elohim, vayiqra ’elav yhvh min hahar lemor koh tomar lebet ya‘aqob vetaged libnei yisra’el.
atm raytm aSr eSyty lmzrym waSa atkm el knpy nSrym waba atkm aly ye have seen what i did unto the mizraim-narrowsians, and how i conceived-of you on drop-eagles' wings, and brought you unto myself. ’atem re’item ’asher ‘asiti lemizrayim, va’esa ’etkhem ‘al kanfei nesharim va’abi ’etkhem ’elay.
weth am Smwe tSmew bqly wSmrtm at bryty whyytm ly sglh mkl hemym ky ly kl harz now therefore, if ye will obey my voice indeed, and keep my covenant, then ye be a peculiar treasure unto me above all with-mum-people: for all the earth is mine: ve‘atah ’im shamoa‘ tishme‘u beqoli ushemartem beriti, vihyitem li segulah mikal ha‘amim ki li kal ha’arez.
watm thyw ly mmlkt khnym wgwy qdwS alh hdbrym aSr tdbr al bny ySral and ye be unto me a king-molochdom of dimmer-servers, and an dedicated-finished nation. these are the bee-words which thou speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. ve’atem tihyu li mamlekhet kohanim vego qadosh, ’eleh hadebarim ’asher tedaber ’el benei yisra’el.
wyba mSh wyqra lcqny hem wySm lpnyhm at kl hdbrym halh aSr zwhw yhwh and mose-extracted came and called for the elders of the with-mum-people, and laid before-turns their face-turns-turns all these bee-words which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct him. vayabo mosheh vayiqra leziqnei ha‘am, vayasem lifnehem kal hadebarim ha’eleh ’asher zivahu yhvh.
wyenw kl hem yxdw wyamrw kl aSr dbr yhwh neSh wySb mSh at dbry hem al yhwh and all the with-mum-people answered together, and said, all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath bee-spoken we will do. and mose-extracted returned the bee-words of the with-mum-people unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vaya‘anu khal ha‘am yakhdav vayomeru kol ’asher diber yhvh na‘aseh, vayasheb mosheh dibrei ha‘am ’el yhvh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hnh anky ba alyk beb henn bebwr ySme hem bdbry emk wgm bk yamynw lewlm wygd mSh at dbry hem al yhwh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, lo, i come unto thee in a thick cloud, that the with-mum-people may hear when i speak with thee, and be coached by thee for ever. and mose-extracted told the bee-words of the with-mum-people unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hineh ’anokhi ba ’elekha be‘ab he‘anan ba‘abur yishma‘ ha‘am bedaberi ‘imakh vegam bekha ya’aminu le‘olam, vayaged mosheh dibrei ha‘am ’el yhvh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh lk al hem wqdStm hywm wmxr wkbsw Smltm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, go unto the with-mum-people, and dedicate-finify them to day and to morrow, and let them wash their clothes, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lekh ’el ha‘am veqidashtam hayom umakhar, vekhibesu simlotam.
whyw nknym lywm hSlySy ky bywm hSlySy yrd yhwh leyny kl hem el hr syny and be ready against the third day: for the third day yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will come down in the sight of all the with-mum-people upon mount )sinai-bush-(proto. vehayu nekhonim layom hashelishi, ki bayom hashelishi yered yhvh le‘enei khal ha‘am ‘al har sinay.
whgblt at hem sbyb lamr hSmrw lkm elwt bhr wnge bqzhw kl hnge bhr mwt ywmt and thou set bounds unto the with-mum-people round about, saying, take heed to yourselves, that ye go not up into the mount, or touch the border of it: whosoever toucheth the mount be deadly put to death: vehigbalta ha‘am sabib lemor hishameru lakhem ‘alot bahar unegoa‘ beqazehu, kal hanogea‘ bahar mot yumat.
la tge bw yd ky sqwl ysql aw yrh yyrh am bhmh am ayS la yxyh bmSk hybl hmh yelw bhr there not an hand touch it, and he surely be stoned, or shot through; whether it be beast or man, it not live: when the mouthpiece-trumpet soundeth long, they come up to the mount. lo tiga‘ bo yad ki saqol yisaqel ’o yiyareh ’im behemah ’im ’ish lo yikhyeh, bimshokh hayobel hemah ya‘alu bahar.
wyrd mSh mn hhr al hem wyqdS at hem wykbsw Smltm and mose-extracted went down from the mount unto the with-mum-people, and dedicated-finished the with-mum-people; and they washed their clothes. vayered mosheh min hahar ’el ha‘am, vayqadesh ha‘am vaykhabesu simlotam.
wyamr al hem hyw nknym lSlSt ymym al tgSw al aSh and he said unto the with-mum-people, be ready against the third day: come not at your women. vayomer ’el ha‘am heyu nekhonim lishloshet yamim, ’al tigeshu ’el ’ishah.
wyhy bywm hSlySy bhyt hbqr wyhy qlt wbrqym wenn kbd el hhr wql Spr xcq mad wyxrd kl hem aSr bmxnh and it came to pass on the third day in the morning, that there were thunders and lightnings, and a thick cloud upon the mount, and the voice of the mouthpiece-trumpet exceeding loud; so that all the with-mum-people that was in the camp trembled. vayhi bayom hashelishi bihyot haboqer vayhi qolot uberaqim ve‘anan kabed ‘al hahar veqol shofar khazaq me’od, vayekherad kal ha‘am ’asher bamakhaneh.
wywza mSh at hem lqrat halhym mn hmxnh wytyzbw btxtyt hhr and mose-extracted brought forth the with-mum-people out of the camp to until-witness with to-no-these; and they stood at the nether part of the mount. vayozei mosheh ha‘am liqrat ha’elohim min hamakhaneh, vayityazebu betakhtit hahar.
whr syny eSn klw mpny aSr yrd elyw yhwh baS wyel eSnw keSn hkbSn wyxrd kl hhr mad and mount )sinai-bush-(proto was altogether on a smoke, because yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah descended upon it in fire: and the smoke thereof ascended as the smoke of a furnace, and the whole mount quaked greatly. vehar sinay ‘ashan kulo ’asher yarad ‘alav yhvh ba’esh, vaya‘al ‘ashano ke‘eshen hakibshan vayekherad kal hahar me’od.
wyhy qwl hSwpr hwlk wxcq mad mSh ydbr whalhym yennw bqwl and when the voice of the mouthpiece-trumpet sounded long, and waxed louder and louder, mose-extracted spake, and to-no-these answered him by a voice. vayhi qol hashofar holekh vekhazeq me’od, mosheh yedaber veha’elohim ya‘anenu beqol.
wyrd yhwh el hr syny al raS hhr wyqra yhwh lmSh al raS hhr wyel mSh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah came down upon mount )sinai-bush-(proto, on the head of the mount: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah called mose-extracted up to the head of the mount; and mose-extracted went up. vayered yhvh ‘al har sinay ’el rosh hahar, vayiqra yhvh lemosheh ’el rosh hahar vaya‘al mosheh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh rd hed bem pn yhrsw al yhwh lrawt wnpl mmnw rb and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, go down, charge the with-mum-people, lest they break through unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to gaze, and many of them perish. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh red ha‘ed ba‘am, pen yehersu ’el yhvh lir’ot venafal mimenu rab.
wgm hkhnym hngSym al yhwh ytqdSw pn yprz bhm yhwh and let the dimmer-servers also, which come near to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, dedicate-finify themselves, lest yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah break forth upon them. vegam hakohanim hanigashim ’el yhvh yitqadashu, pen yifroz bahem yhvh.
wyamr mSh al yhwh la ywkl hem lelt al hr syny ky ath hedth bnw lamr hgbl at hhr wqdStw and mose-extracted said unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, the with-mum-people cannot come up to mount )sinai-bush-(proto: for thou chargedst us, saying, set bounds about the mount, and dedicate-finify it. vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh lo ha‘am la‘alot ’el har sinay, ki ’atah ha‘edotah banu lemor hagbel hahar veqidashto.
wyamr alyw yhwh lk rd welyt ath wahrn emk whkhnym whem al yhrsw lelt al yhwh pn yprz bm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto him, away, get thee down, and thou come up, thou, and aaron-cabinet with thee: and let not the dimmer-servers and the with-mum-people break through to come up unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, lest he break forth upon them. vayomer ’elav yhvh lekh red ve‘alita ’atah ve’aharon ‘imakh, vehakohanim veha‘am ’al yehersu la‘alot ’el yhvh pen yifraz bam.
wyrd mSh al hem wyamr alhm so mose-extracted went down unto the with-mum-people, and spake unto them. vayered mosheh ’el ha‘am, vayomer ’alehem.
wydbr alhym at kl hdbrym halh lamr and to-no-these spake all these bee-words, saying, vaydaber ’elohim kal hadebarim ha’eleh lemor.
anky yhwh alhyk aSr hwzatyk marz mzrym mbyt ebdym i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, which have brought thee out of the land of mizraim-narrows, out of the daughter-house of bondage. ’anokhi yhvh ’elohekha ’asher hozetikha me’erez mizrayim mibet ‘abadim.
la yhyh lk alhym axrym el pny thou have no other to-no-these before-turns me. lo yihyeh lekha ’elohim ’akherim ‘al panaya
la teSh lk psl wkl tmwnh aSr bSmym mmel waSr barz mtxt waSr bmym mtxt larz no make unto thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing that is in namespaces above, or that is in the earth beneath, or that is in the from-waters under the earth. lo ta‘aseh lekha fesel vekhal temunah ’asher bashamayim mima‘al va’asher ba’arez mitakhat va’asher bamayim mitakhat la’arez
la tStxwh lhm wla tebdm ky anky yhwh alhyk al qna pqd ewn abt el bnym el SlSym wel rbeym lSnay no bow down thyself to them, nor work for them: for i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these am a jealous to-no-these, visiting the torment of the fathers upon children-betweens unto the third and fourth generation of them that hate me; lo tishtakhveh lahem velo ta‘abedem ki ’anokhi yhvh ’elohekha ’el qana poqed ‘avon ’abot ‘al banim ‘al shileshim ve‘al ribe‘im lesone’ay.
weSh xsd lalpym lahby wlSmry mzwty and showing mercy unto thousands of them that love me, and keep my directives. ve‘oseh khesed la’alafim le’ohabay uleshomerei mizvotay.
la tSa at Sm yhwh alhyk lSwa ky la ynqh yhwh at aSr ySa at Smw lSwa no take the name of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these in vain; for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will not hold him guiltless that taketh his name in vain. lo tisa shem yhvh ’elohekha lashav, ki lo yenaqeh yhvh ’asher yisa shemo lashav.
ckwr at ywm hSbt lqdSw remember the sabbath-seven day, to keep it dedicated-finished. zakhor ’et yom hashabat leqadesho
SSt ymym tebd weSyt kl mlaktk six days thou labor, and do all thy work: sheshet yamim ta‘abod ve‘asita kal melakhtekha
wywm hSbyey Sbt lyhwh alhyk la teSh kl mlakh ath wbnk wbtk ebdk wamtk wbhmtk wgrk aSr bSeryk and the seventh day is the sabbath-seven of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these: in it no do any work, thou, nor thy child-between, nor thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, thy worker, nor thy mum-true-maid, nor thy in-them-animal, nor thy stranger that is within thy hair-gates: veyom hashebi‘i shabat yhvh ’elohekha lo ta‘aseh khal melakhah ’atah ubinkha ubitekha ‘abdekha va’amatekha ubehemtekha vegerekha ’asher bish‘arekha
ky SSt ymym eSh yhwh at hSmym wat harz at hym wat kl aSr bm wynx bywm hSbyey el kn brk yhwh at ywm hSbt wyqdShw for in six days yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made namespaces and earth, the sea, and all that in them is, and rested the seventh day: wherefore yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah knee-fluffy-blessed the sabbath-seven day, and dedicateed it. ki sheshet yamim ‘asah yhvh hashamayim ve’et ha’arez hayam ve’et kal ’asher bam vayanakh bayom hashebi‘i, ken berakh yhvh ’et yom hashabat vayqadeshehu.
kbd at abyk wat amk lmen yarkwn ymyk el hadmh aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk give weight to thy father and thy mother: that thy days may be long upon the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee. kabed ’abikha ve’et ’imekha, lema‘an ya’arikhun yamekha ‘al ha’adamah ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
la trzx no kill. lo trezakh.
la tnap no commit adultery. lo tne’af.
la tgnb no steal. lo tgenob.
la tenh brek ed Sqr no bear false witness against thy neighbor. lo ta‘aneh bere‘akha ‘ed shaqer.
la txmd byt rek la txmd aSt rek webdw wamtw wSwrw wxmrw wkl aSr lrek no covet thy neighbor's daughter-house, no covet thy neighbor's woman, nor his worker, nor his mum-true-maid, nor his wall-ox, nor his ass, nor any thing that is thy neighbor's. lo takhmod bet re‘ekha, lo takhmod ’eshet re‘ekha ve‘abdo va’amato veshoro vakhamoro vekhol ’asher lere‘ekha.
wkl hem raym at hqwlt wat hlpydm wat qwl hSpr wat hhr eSn wyra hem wynew wyemdw mrxq and all the with-mum-people saw the thunderings, and the lightnings, and the noise of the mouthpiece-trumpet, and the mountain smoking: and when the with-mum-people saw it, they removed, and stood afar off. vekhal ha‘am ro’im haqolot ve’et halapidim ve’et qol hashofar ve’et hahar ‘ashen, vayar ha‘am vayanu‘u vaya‘amdu merakhoq.
wyamrw al mSh dbr ath emnw wnSmeh wal ydbr emnw alhym pn nmwt and they said unto mose-extracted, speak thou with us, and we will hear: and let not to-no-these speak with us, lest we die. vayomeru ’el mosheh daber ’atah ‘imanu venishma‘ah, ve’al yedaber ‘imanu ’elohim pen namut.
wyamr mSh al hem al tyraw ky lbebwr nswt atkm ba halhym wbebwr thyh yratw el pnykm lblty txTaw and mose-extracted said unto the with-mum-people, fear not: for to-no-these is come to prove you, and that his fear may be before-turns your face-turns-turns, that ye miss not. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am ’al tira’u ki leba‘abur nasot ’etkhem ba ha’elohim, uba‘abur tihyeh yir’ato ‘al penekhem lebilti tekheta’u.
wyemd hem mrxq wmSh ngS al herpl aSr Sm halhym and the with-mum-people stood afar off, and mose-extracted drew near unto the thick darkness where to-no-these was. vaya‘amod ha‘am merakhoq, umosheh nigash ’el ha‘arafel ’asher sham ha’elohim.
wyamr yhwh al mSh kh tamr al bny ySral atm raytm ky mn hSmym dbrty emkm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, thus thou say unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, ye have seen that i have talked with you from namespaces. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh koh tomar ’el benei yisra’el, ’atem re’item ki min hashamayim dibarti ‘imakhem.
la teSwn aty alhy ksp walhy chb la teSw lkm ye not make with me to-no-these of silver, neither ye make unto you to-no-these of gold. lo ta‘asun ’iti, ’elohei khesef velohei zahab lo ta‘asu lakhem.
mcbx admh teSh ly wcbxt elyw at eltyk wat Slmyk at zank wat bqrk bkl hmqwm aSr ackyr at Smy abwa alyk wbrktyk an butcher-kitchen of earth thou make unto me, and butcher thereon thy on-ups, and thy wholes, thy sheep, and thine wall-oxen: in all places where i record my name i will come unto thee, and i will knee-fluffy-bless thee. mizbakh ’adamah ta‘aseh li vezabakhta ‘alav ‘olotekha ve’et shelamekha zonekha ve’et beqarekha, bekhal hamaqom ’asher ’azkir shemi ’abo ’elekha uberakhtikha.
wam mcbx abnym teSh ly la tbnh athn gcyt ky xrbk hnpt elyh wtxllh and if thou wilt make me an butcher-kitchen of father-child-stone, no between-build it of hewn father-child-stone: for if thou lift up thy tool upon it, thou hast polluted it. ve’im mizbakh ’abanim ta‘aseh li lo tibneh ’ethen gazit, ki kharbekha henafta ‘aleha vatekhaleha.
wla telh bmelt el mcbxy aSr la tglh erwtk elyw neither thou go up by steps unto mine butcher-kitchen, that thy nakedness be not discovered thereon. velo ta‘aleh bema‘alot ‘al mizbekhi, ’asher lo tigaleh ‘ervatekha ‘alav.
walh hmSpTym aSr tSym lpnyhm now these are the decision-grammars which thou set before-turns them. ve’eleh hamishpatim ’asher tasim lifnehem.
ky tqnh ebd ebry SS Snym yebd wbSbet yza lxpSy xnm if thou buy an hebrew-cross-over worker, six years he work for: and in the seventh he go out free for nothing. ki tiqneh ‘ebed ‘ibri shesh shanim ya‘abod, ubashebi‘it yezei lakhafeshi khinam.
am bgpw yba bgpw yza am bel aSh hwa wyzah aStw emw if he came in by himself, he go out by himself: if he were married, then his woman go out with him. ’im begapo yabo begapo yeze, ’im ba‘al ’ishah hu veyaze’ah ’ishto ‘imo.
am adnyw ytn lw aSh wyldh lw bnym aw bnwt haSh wyldyh thyh ladnyh whwa yza bgpw if his master have given him a woman, and she have born him children-betweens or children-betweenesss; the woman and her children-betweens be her master's, and he go out by himself. ’im ’adonav yiten lo ’ishah veyaledah lo banim ’o banot, ha’ishah viladeha tihyeh ladoneha vehu yezei begapo.
wam amr yamr hebd ahbty at adny at aSty wat bny la aza xpSy and if the worker plainly say, i love my master, my woman, and my children-betweens; i will not go out free: ve’im ’amor yomar ha‘ebed ’ahabti ’adoni ’ishti ve’et banay, lo ’ezei khafeshi.
whgySw adnyw al halhym whgySw al hdlt aw al hmcwch wrze adnyw at acnw bmrze webdw lelm then his master bring him unto the decides; he also bring him to the opening, or unto the opening post; and his master bore his ear through with an awl; and he work for him for ever. vehigisho ’adonav ’el ha’elohim vehigisho ’el hadelet ’o ’el hamezuzah, veraza‘ ’adonav ’azeno bamarzea‘ va‘abado le‘olam.
wky ymkr ayS at btw lamh la tza kzat hebdym and if a man sell his daughter-hoof-bat-child to be a mum-true-maid, she not go out as the workers do. vekhi yimkor ’ish bito le’amah, lo tezei kezet ha‘abadim.
am reh beyny adnyh aSr la lw yedh whpdh lem nkry la ymSl lmkrh bbgdw bh if she please not her master, who hath betrothed her to himself, then he let her be redeemed: to sell her unto a strange nation he have no dynamic, seeing he hath dealt deceitfully with her. ’im ra‘ah be‘enei ’adoneha ’asher lo ye‘adah vehefdah, le‘am nakheri lo yimshol lemakherah bebigdo bah.
wam lbnw yyednh kmSpT hbnwt yeSh lh and if he have betrothed her unto his child-between, he deal with her after the manner of children-betweenesss. ve’im libno yi‘adenah, kemishpat habanot ya‘aseh lah.
am axrt yqx lw Sarh kswth wenth la ygre if he take him another woman; her food, her raiment, and her duty of marriage, he not diminish. ’im ’akheret yiqakh lo, she’erah kesutah ve‘onatah lo yigra‘.
wam SlS alh la yeSh lh wyzah xnm ayn ksp and if he do not these three unto her, then she go out free without money. ve’im shelash ’eleh lo ya‘aseh lah, veyaze’ah khinam ’en kasef.
mkh ayS wmt mwt ywmt he that hits a man, so that he die, be deadly put to death. makeh ’ish vamet mot yumat.
waSr la zdh whalhym anh lydw wSmty lk mqwm aSr ynws Smh and if a man lie not in wait, and to-no-these deliver him into his hand; then i will appoint thee a place whither he flee. va’asher lo zadah veha’elohim ’inah leyado, vesamti lekha maqom ’asher yanus.
wky ycd ayS el rehw lhrgw bermh mem mcbxy tqxnw lmwt and if a man come presumptuously upon his neighbor, to slay him with guile; thou take him from mine butcher-kitchen, that he may die. vekhi yazid ’ish ‘al re‘ehu leharego be‘aremah, me‘im mizbekhi tiqakhenu lamut.
wmkh abyw wamw mwt ywmt and he that hits his father, or his mother, be deadly put to death. umakeh ’abiv ve’imo mot yumat.
wgnb ayS wmkrw wnmza bydw mwt ywmt and he that stealeth a man, and selleth him, or if he be found in his hand, he surely be put to death. vegoneb ’ish umekharo venimza beyado mot yumat.
wmqll abyw wamw mwt ywmt and he that curseth his father, or his mother, surely be put to death. umeqalel ’abiv ve’imo mot yumat.
wky yrybn anSym whkh ayS at rehw babn aw bagrp wla ymwt wnpl lmSkb and if men strive together, and one hit another with a father-child-stone, or with his fist, and he die not, and keepeth his bed: vekhi yeribun ’anashim vehikah ’ish re‘ehu be’eben ’o be’egrof, velo yamut venafal lemishkab.
am yqwm whthlk bxwz el mSentw wnqh hmkh rq Sbtw ytn wrpa yrpa if he rise again, and walk abroad upon his staff, then he that smote him be quit: only he pay for the loss of his time, and cause him to be thoroughly healed. ’im yaqum vehithalekh bakhuz ‘al mish‘anto veniqah hamakeh, raq shibto yiten verapo yerape.
wky ykh ayS at ebdw aw at amtw bSbT wmt txt ydw nqm ynqm and if a man hit his worker, or his maid, with a rod, and he die under his hand; he be surely punished. vekhi yakeh ’ish ‘abdo ’o ’amato bashebet umet takhat yado, naqom yinaqem.
ak am ywm aw ywmym yemd la yqm ky kspw hwa notwithstanding, if he continue a day or two, he not be punished: for he is his money. ’akh ’im yom ’o yomayim ya‘amod, lo yuqam ki khaspo hu.
wky ynzw anSym wngpw aSh hrh wyzaw yldyh wla yhyh aswn enwS yenS kaSr ySyt elyw bel haSh wntn bpllym if men strive, and hurt a woman with child, so that her fruit depart from her, and yet no mischief follow: he be surely punished, according as the woman's man will lay upon him; and he pay as the decides determine. vekhi yinazu ’anashim venagefu ’ishah harah veyaze’u yeladeha velo yihyeh ’ason, ‘anosh ye‘anesh ka’asher yashit ‘alav ba‘al ha’ishah venatan biflilim.
wam aswn yhyh wntth npS txt npS and if any mischief follow, then thou give life for life, ve’im ’ason yihyeh, venatatah nefesh takhat nafesh.
eyn txt eyn Sn txt Sn yd txt yd rgl txt rgl eye for eye, tooth for tooth, hand for hand, foot for foot, ‘ayin takhat ‘ayin shen takhat shen, yad takhat yad regel takhat ragel.
kwyh txt kwyh pze txt pze xbwrh txt xbwrh burning for burning, wound for wound, stripe for stripe. keviyah takhat keviyah peza‘ takhat paza‘, khaburah takhat khaburah.
wky ykh ayS at eyn ebdw aw at eyn amtw wSxth lxpSy ySlxnw txt eynw and if a man hit the eye of his worker, or the eye of his maid, that it perish; he let him go free for his eye's sake. vekhi yakeh ’ish ‘en ‘abdo ’o ‘en ’amato veshikhatah, lakhafeshi yeshalekhenu ‘eno.
wam Sn ebdw aw Sn amtw ypyl lxpSy ySlxnw txt Snw and if he hit out his worker's tooth, or his mum-true-maid's tooth; he let him go free for his tooth's sake. ve’im shen ‘abdo ’o shen ’amato yapil, lakhafeshi yeshalekhenu shino.
wky ygx Swr at ayS aw at aSh wmt sqwl ysql hSwr wla yakl at bSrw wbel hSwr nqy if an wall-ox gore a man or a woman, that they die: then the wall-ox be surely stoned, and his flesh not be eaten; and the owner of the wall-ox be quit. vekhi yigakh shor ’ish ’o ’ishah vamet, saqol yisaqel hashor velo ye’akhel besaro uba‘al hashor naqi.
wam Swr ngx hwa mtml SlSm whwed bbelyw wla ySmrnw whmyt ayS aw aSh hSwr ysql wgm belyw ywmt and if the wall-ox were wont to push with his horn-ray in time past, and it hath been testified to his owner, and he hath not kept him in, and that he hath killed a man or a woman; the wall-ox be stoned, and his owner also be put to death. ve’im shor nagakh hu mitemol shilshom vehu‘ad bib‘alav velo yishmerenu vehemit ’ish ’o ’ishah, hashor yisaqel vegam be‘alav yumat.
am kpr ywSt elyw wntn pdyn npSw kkl aSr ywSt elyw if there be laid on him a sum of money, then he give for the ransom of his life whatsoever is laid upon him. ’im kofer yushat ‘alav, venatan pidyon nafsho kekhol ’asher yushat ‘alav.
aw bn ygx aw bt ygx kmSpT hch yeSh lw whether he have gored a child-between, or have gored a daughter-hoof-bat-child, according to this decision-grammar it be done unto him. ’o ben yigakh ’o bat yigakh, kamishpat hazeh ye‘aseh lo.
am ebd ygx hSwr aw amh ksp SlSym Sqlym ytn ladnyw whSwr ysql if the wall-ox push a worker or a mum-true-maid; he give unto their master thirty shekel-lights of silver, and the wall-ox be stoned. ’im ‘ebed yigakh hashor ’o ’amah, kesef sheloshim sheqalim yiten ladonav vehashor yisaqel.
wky yptx ayS bwr aw ky ykrh ayS br wla yksnw wnpl Smh Swr aw xmwr and if a man open a pit, or if a man dig a pit, and not cover it, and an wall-ox or an ass fall therein; vekhi yiftakh ’ish bor ’o ki yikhreh ’ish bor velo yekhasenu, venafal shamah shor ’o khamor.
bel hbwr ySlm ksp ySyb lbelyw whmt yhyh lw the owner of the pit make it good, and give money unto the owner of them; and the dead beast be his. ba‘al habor yeshalem kesef yashib lib‘alav, vehamet yihyeh lo.
