wky ygp Swr ayS at Swr rehw wmt wmkrw at hSwr hxy wxzw at kspw wgm at hmt yxzwn and if one man's wall-ox hurt another's, that he die; then they sell the live wall-ox, and divide the money of it; and the dead wall-ox also they divide. vekhi yigof shor ’ish re‘ehu vamet, umakheru hashor hakhay vekhazu kaspo vegam ’et hamet yekhezun.
aw nwde ky Swr ngx hwa mtmwl SlSm wla ySmrnw belyw Slm ySlm Swr txt hSwr whmt yhyh lw or if it be hand-known that the wall-ox hath used to push in time past, and his owner hath not kept him in; he surely pay wall-ox for wall-ox; and the dead be his own. ’o noda‘ ki shor nagakh hu mitemol shilshom velo yishmerenu be‘alav, shalem yeshalem shor takhat hashor vehamet yihyeh lo.
ky ygnb ayS Swr aw Sh wTbxw aw mkrw xmSh bqr ySlm txt hSwr warbe zan txt hSh if a man steal an wall-ox, or a sheep, and kill it, or sell it; he restore five wall-oxen for an wall-ox, and four sheep for a sheep. ki yignob ’ish shor ’o seh utebakho ’o mekharo, khamishah baqar yeshalem takhat hashor ve’arba‘ zon takhat haseh.
am bmxtrt ymza hgnb whkh wmt ayn lw dmym if a thief be found breaking up, and be smitten that he die, there no blood be shed for him. ’im bamakhteret yimazei haganab vehukah vamet, ’en lo damim.
am crxh hSmS elyw dmym lw Slm ySlm am ayn lw wnmkr bgnbtw if the sun be risen upon him, there be blood shed for him; for he should make full wholeness; if he have nothing, then he be sold for his theft. ’im zarekhah hashemesh ‘alav damim lo, shalem yeshalem ’im ’en lo venimkar bignebato.
am hmza tmza bydw hgnbh mSwr ed xmwr ed Sh xyym Snym ySlm if the theft be certainly found in his hand alive, whether it be wall-ox, or ass, or sheep; he restore double. ’im himazei timazei beyado hagenebah mishor ‘ad khamor ‘ad seh khayim, shenayim yeshalem.
ky yber ayS Sdh aw krm wSlx at beyrh beyrw wber bSdh axr myTb Sdhw wmyTb krmw ySlm if a man cause a field or vineyard to be eaten, and put in his beast, and feed in another man's field; of the best of his own field, and of the best of his own vineyard, he make wholeness. ki yab‘er ’ish sadeh ’o kherem veshilakh be‘iro ubi‘er bisdeh ’akher, metab sadehu umetab karmo yeshalem.
ky tza aS wmzah qzym wnakl gdyS aw hqmh aw hSdh Slm ySlm hmber at hberh if fire break out, and catch in thorns, so that the stacks of corn-swimming, or the standing corn-swimming, or the field, be consumed therewith; he that kindled the fire surely make wholeness. ki tezei ’esh umaze’ah qozim vene’ekhal gadish ’o haqamah ’o hasadeh, shalem yeshalem hamab‘ir habe‘erah.
ky ytn ayS al rehw ksp aw klym lSmr wgnb mbyt hayS am ymza hgnb ySlm Snym if a man deliver unto his neighbor money or stuff to keep, and it be stolen out of the man's daughter-house; if the thief be found, let him pay double. ki yiten ’ish ’el re‘ehu kesef ’o khelim lishmor vegunab mibet ha’ish, ’im yimazei haganab yeshalem shenayim.
am la ymza hgnb wnqrb bel hbyt al halhym am la Slx ydw bmlakt rehw if the thief be not found, then the master of the daughter-house be brought unto the decides, to see whether he have put his hand unto his neighbor's goods. ’im lo yimazei haganab veniqrab ba‘al habayit ’el ha’elohim, lo shalakh yado bimlekhet re‘ehu.
el kl dbr pSe el Swr el xmwr el Sh el Slmh el kl abdh aSr yamr ky hwa ch ed halhym yba dbr Snyhm aSr yrSyen alhym ySlm Snym lrehw for all manner of fire-name, whether it be for wall-ox, for ass, for sheep, for raiment, or for any manner of lost thing which another challengeth to be his, the cause of both parties come before-turns the decides; and whom the decides condemn, he pay double unto his neighbor. ‘al kal debar pesha‘ ‘al shor ‘al khamor ‘al seh ‘al salmah ‘al kal ’abedah ’asher yomar ki hu zeh ‘ad ha’elohim yabo debar shenehem, ’asher yarshi‘un ’elohim yeshalem shenayim lere‘ehu.
ky ytn ayS al rehw xmwr aw Swr aw Sh wkl bhmh lSmr wmt aw nSbr aw nSbh ayn rah if a man deliver unto his neighbor an ass, or an wall-ox, or a sheep, or any beast, to keep; and it die, or be hurt, or driven away, no man seeing it: ki yiten ’ish ’el re‘ehu khamor ’o shor ’o seh vekhal behemah lishmor, umet ’o nishbar ’o nishbah ’en ro’eh.
Sbet yhwh thyh byn Snyhm am la Slx ydw bmlakt rehw wlqx belyw wla ySlm then an toward-oath of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah be between-bin them both, that he hath not put his hand unto his neighbor's goods; and the owner of it accept thereof, and he not make it good. shebu‘at yhvh tihyeh ben shenehem ’im lo shalakh yado bimlekhet re‘ehu, velaqakh be‘alav velo yeshalem.
wam gnb ygnb memw ySlm lbelyw and if it be stolen from him, he make wholeness unto the owner thereof. ve’im ganob yiganeb me‘imo, yeshalem lib‘alav.
am Trp yTrp ybahw ed hTrph la ySlm if it be torn in pieces, then let him bring it for witness, and he not make good that which was torn. ’im tarof yitaref yebi’ehu ‘ed, haterefah lo yeshalem.
wky ySal ayS mem rehw wnSbr aw mt belyw ayn emw Slm ySlm and if a man borrow ought of his neighbor, and it be hurt, or die, the owner thereof being not with it, he surely make it good. vekhi yish’al ’ish me‘im re‘ehu venishbar ’o met, be‘alav ’en ‘imo shalem yeshalem.
am belyw emw la ySlm am Skyr hwa ba bSkrw and if the owner thereof be with it, he not make it good: if it be an hired thing, it came for his hire. ’im be‘alav ‘imo lo yeshalem, ’im sakhir hu ba biskharo.
wky ypth ayS btwlh aSr la arSh wSkb emh mhr ymhrnh lw laSh and if a man entice a maid that is not betrothed, and lie with her, he surely endow her to be his woman. vekhi yefateh ’ish betulah ’asher lo ’orasah veshakhab ‘imah, mahor yimharenah le’ishah.
am man yman abyh ltth lw ksp ySql kmhr hbtwlt if her father utterly refuse to give her unto him, he pay money according to the dowry of virgins. ’im ma’en yema’en ’abiha letitah lo, kesef yishqol kemohar habetulot.
mkSph la txyh no suffer a spell-caster to live. mekhashefah lo tekhayeh.
kl Skb em bhmh mwt ywmt whosoever lieth with a beast surely be put to death. kal shokheb ‘im behemah mot yumat.
cbx lalhym yxrm blty lyhwh lbdw he that butcherth unto any to-no-these, save unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah only, he be fishing-net-destroyed. zobeakh la’elohim yakhoram, bilti yhvh lebado.
wgr la twnh wla tlxznw ky grym hyytm barz mzrym thou neither vex a stranger, nor oppress him: for ye were strangers in the land of mizraim-narrows. veger lo toneh velo tilkhazenu, ki gerim heyitem be’erez mizrayim.
kl almnh wytwm la tenwn ye not afflict any widow, or fatherless child. kal ’almanah veyatom lo te‘anun.
am enh tenh atw ky am zeq yzeq aly Sme aSme zeqtw if thou afflict them in any wise, and they cry at all unto me, i will surely hear their cry; ’im ‘aneh te‘aneh ’oto, ki ’im za‘oq yiz‘aq ’elay shamoa‘ ’eshma‘ za‘aqato.
wxrh apy whrgty atkm bxrb whyw nSykm almnwt wbnykm ytmym and my wrath wax hot, and i will kill you with the sword; and your women be widows, and your children-betweens fatherless. vekharah ’api veharagti ’etkhem bekhareb, vehayu neshekhem ’almanot ubenekhem yetomim.
am ksp tlwh at emy at heny emk la thyh lw knSh la tSymwn elyw nSk if thou lend money to any of my with-mum-people that is poor by thee, no be to him as an usurer, neither thou lay upon him usury. ’im kesef talveh ’et ‘ami he‘ani ‘imakh lo tihyeh lo kenosheh, lo tesimun ‘alav neshekh.
am xbl txbl Slmt rek ed ba hSmS tSybnw lw if thou at all take thy neighbor's raiment to pledge, thou deliver it unto him by that the sun goeth down: ’im khabol takhbol salmat re‘ekha, ‘ad bo hashemesh teshibenu lo.
ky hwa kswth kswtw lbdh hwa Smltw lerw bmh ySkb whyh ky yzeq aly wSmety ky xnwn any for that is his covering only, it is his raiment for his light-skin: wherein he sleep? and it come to pass, when he crieth unto me, that i will hear; for i am gracious. ki hi khesuto lebadah hi simlato le‘oro, bameh yishkab vehayah ki yiz‘aq ’elay veshama‘ti ki khanun ’ani.
alhym la tqll wnSya bemk la tar no revile the to-no-these, nor curse the ruler of thy with-mum-people. ’elohim lo teqalel, venasi be‘amekha lo ta’or.

la tSa Sme Swa al tSt ydk em rSe lhyt ed xms no raise a false report: put not thine hand with the wicked to be an unrighteous witness. lo tisa shema‘ shav, ’al tashet yadekha ‘im rasha‘ lihyot ‘ed khamas.

wdl la thdr brybw neither thou countenance a poor man in his cause. vedal lo tehdar beribo.

ky trah xmwr Snak rbz txt mSaw wxdlt mecb lw ecb tecb emw if thou see the ass of him that hateth thee lying under his burden, and wouldest forbear to help him, thou surely help with him. ki tir’eh khamor sona’akha robez takhat masa’o vekhadalta me‘azob lo, ‘azob ta‘azob ‘imo.

SlS rglym txg ly bSnh three times thou keep a until-conception unto me in the year. shalosh regalim takhog li bashanah.

wyktb mSh at kl dbry yhwh wySkm bbqr wybn mcbx txt hhr wStym eSrh mzbh lSnym eSr SbTy ySral and mose-extracted wrote all the bee-words of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and rose up early in the morning, and between-between-builded an butcher-kitchen under the hill, and twelve column-stands, according to the twelve branchs of israel-juicy-towards. vayikhtob mosheh kal dibrei yhvh vayashkem baboqer vayiben mizbeakh takhat hahar, ushetem ‘esreh mazebah lishnem ‘asar shibtei yisra’el.

wyamr yhwh al mSh elh aly hhrh whyh Sm watnh lk at lxt habn whtwrh whmzwh aSr ktbty lhwrtm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, come up to me into the mount, and be there: and i will give thee tables of father-child-stone, and a teaching, and directives which i have written; that thou mayest teach them. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘aleh ’elay haharah vehyeh sham, ve’etenah lekha lukhot ha’eben vehatorah vehamizvah ’asher katabti lehorotam.

wmrah kbwd yhwh kaS aklt braS hhr leyny bny ySral and the sight of the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was like devouring fire on the head of the mount in the eyes of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. umar’eh kebod yhvh ke’esh ’okhelet berosh hahar, le‘enei benei yisra’el.

weSw arwn ezy STym amtym wxzy arkw wamh wxzy rxbw wamh wxzy qmtw and they make an cabinet of shitim-sailing wood: two cubits and a half be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof. ve‘asu ’aron ‘azei shitim, ’amatayim vakhezi ’areko ve’amah vakhezi rakhebo ve’amah vakhezi qomato.
wzpyt atw chb Thwr mbyt wmxwz tzpnw weSyt elyw cr chb sbyb and thou overlay it with pure-tahor gold, within and without thou overlay it, and make upon it a frame of gold round about. vezipita ’oto zahab tahor mibayit umikhuz tezapenu, ve‘asita ‘alav zer zahab sabib.
wyzqt lw arbe Tbet chb wntth el arbe pemtyw wSty Tbet el zlew haxt wSty Tbet el zlew hSnyt and thou cast four rings of gold for it, and put them in the four corners thereof; and two rings be in the one side of it, and two rings in the other side of it. veyazaqta lo ’arba‘ tabe‘ot zahab venatatah ‘al ’arba‘ pa‘amotav, ushetei taba‘ot ‘al zal‘o ha’ekhat ushetei taba‘ot ‘al zal‘o hashenit.
weSyt bdy ezy STym wzpyt atm chb and thou make canvas of shitim-sailing wood, and overlay them with gold. ve‘asita badei ‘azei shitim, vezipita ’otam zahab.
whbat at hbdym bTbet el zlet harn lSat at harn bhm and thou put the canvas into the rings by the sides of the cabinet, that the cabinet may be borne with them. vehebeta habadim bataba‘ot ‘al zal‘ot ha’aron, laset ha’aron bahem.
bTbet harn yhyw hbdym la ysrw mmnw the canvas be in the rings of the cabinet: they not be taken from it. betabe‘ot ha’aron yihyu habadim, lo yasuru mimenu.
wntt al harn at hedt aSr atn alyk and thou put into the cabinet the until-witness which i give thee. venatata ’el ha’aron, ha‘edut ’asher ’eten ’elekha.
weSyt kprt chb Thwr amtym wxzy arkh wamh wxzy rxbh and thou make a out-of-townment of pure-tahor gold: two cubits and a half be the length thereof, and a cubit and a half the breadth thereof. ve‘asita khaporet zahab tahor, ’amatayim vakhezi ’arekah ve’amah vakhezi rakhebah.
weSyt Snym krbym chb mqSh teSh atm mSny qzwt hkprt and thou make two inward-cherubim of gold, of beaten work thou make them, in the two ends of the out-of-townment. ve‘asita shenayim kerubim zahab, miqshah ta‘aseh ’otam mishenei qezot hakaporet.
weSh krwb axd mqzh mch wkrwb axd mqzh mch mn hkprt teSw at hkrbym el Sny qzwtyw and make one inward-cherub on the one end, and the other inward-cherub on the other end: even of the out-of-townment ye make the inward-cherubim on the two ends thereof. va‘aseh kerub ’ekhad miqazah mizeh ukherub ’ekhad miqazah mizeh, min hakaporet ta‘asu hakerubim ‘al shenei qezotav.
whyw hkrbym prSy knpym lmelh skkym bknpyhm el hkprt wpnyhm ayS al axyw al hkprt yhyw pny hkrbym and the inward-cherubim stretch forth their wings on high, covering the out-of-townment with their wings, and their face-turns-turns look one to another; toward the out-of-townment the face-turns-turns of the inward-cherubim be. vehayu hakerubim poresei khenafayim lema‘lah sokhekhim bekhanfehem hakaporet ufenehem ’ish ’el ’akhiv, ’el hakaporet yihyu penei hakerubim.
wntt at hkprt el harn mlmelh wal harn ttn at hedt aSr atn alyk and thou put the out-of-townment above upon the cabinet; and in the cabinet thou put the until-witness that i give thee. venatata hakaporet ‘al ha’aron milma‘elah, ve’el ha’aron titen ha‘edut ’asher ’eten ’elekha.
wnwedty lk Sm wdbrty atk mel hkprt mbyn Sny hkrbym aSr el arn hedt at kl aSr azwh awtk al bny ySral and there i will until-witness with thee, and i will commune with thee from above the out-of-townment, from between-bin the two inward-cherubim which are upon the cabinet of the until-witness, of all things which i will give thee in directive unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. veno‘adti lekha sham vedibarti ’itekha me‘al hakaporet miben shenei hakerubim ’asher ‘al ’aron ha‘edut, kal ’asher ’azaveh ’otkha ’el benei yisra’el.
weSyt Slxn ezy STym amtym arkw wamh rxbw wamh wxzy qmtw thou also make a send-table of shitim-sailing wood: two cubits be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof. ve‘asita shulkhan ‘azei shitim, ’amatayim ’areko ve’amah rakhebo ve’amah vakhezi qomato.
wzpyt atw chb Thwr weSyt lw cr chb sbyb and thou overlay it with pure-tahor gold, and make thereto a frame of gold round about. vezipita ’oto zahab tahor, ve‘asita zer zahab sabib.
weSyt lw msgrt Tpx sbyb weSyt cr chb lmsgrtw sbyb and thou make unto it a border of an hand breadth round about, and thou make a golden crown to the border thereof round about. ve‘asita lo misgeret tofakh sabib, ve‘asita zer zahab lemisgarto sabib.
weSyt lw arbe Tbet chb wntt at hTbet el arbe hpat aSr larbe rglyw and thou make for it four rings of gold, and put the rings in the four corners that are on the four feet thereof. ve‘asita lo ’arba‘ tabe‘ot zahab, venatata hataba‘ot ‘al ’arba‘ hape’ot ’asher le’arba‘ raglav.
lemt hmsgrt thyyn hTbet lbtym lbdym lSat at hSlxn over against the border the rings be for places of the canvas to bear the send-table. le‘umat hamisgeret tihyena hataba‘ot, lebatim lebadim laset hashulkhan.
weSyt at hbdym ezy STym wzpyt atm chb wnSa bm at hSlxn and thou make the canvas of shitim-sailing wood, and overlay them with gold, that the send-table may be borne with them. ve‘asita habadim ‘azei shitim vezipita ’otam zahab, venisa bam hashulkhan.
weSyt qertyw wkptyw wqSwtyw wmnqytyw aSr ysk bhn chb Thwr teSh atm and thou make the dishes thereof, and spoons thereof, and covers thereof, and bowls thereof, to cover withal: of pure-tahor gold thou make them. ve‘asita qe‘arotav vekhapotav uqesotav umenaqiyotav yusakh bahen, zahab tahor ta‘aseh ’otam.
wntt el hSlxn lxm pnym lpny tmyd and thou set upon the send-table within-turns-bread before-turns me always. venatata ‘al hashulkhan lekhem panim lefanay tamid.
weSyt mnrt chb Thwr mqSh teSh hmnwrh yrkh wqnh gbyeyh kptryh wprxyh mmnh yhyw and thou make a light-stream-candle of pure-tahor gold: of beaten work the light-stream-candle be made: his shaft, and his branches, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, be of the same. ve‘asita menorat zahab tahor, miqshah te‘aseh hamenorah yerekhah veqanah gebi‘eha kaftoreha uferakheha mimenah yihyu.
wSSh qnym yzaym mzdyh SlSh qny mnrh mzdh haxd wSlSh qny mnrh mzdh hSny and six branches come out of the sides of it; three branches of the light-stream-candle out of the one side, and three branches of the light-stream-candle out of the other side: veshishah qanim yoze’im mizideha, sheloshah qenei menorah mizidah ha’ekhad usheloshah qenei menorah mizidah hasheni.
SlSh gbeym mSqdym bqnh haxd kptr wprx wSlSh gbeym mSqdym bqnh haxd kptr wprx kn lSSt hqnym hyzaym mn hmnrh three bowls made like unto almonds, with a knop and a flower in one branch; and three bowls made like almonds in the other branch, with a knop and a flower: so in the six branches that come out of the light-stream-candle. sheloshah gebi‘im meshuqadim baqaneh ha’ekhad kaftor vaferakh usheloshah gebi‘im meshuqadim baqaneh ha’ekhad kaftor vafarakh, ken lesheshet haqanim hayoze’im min hamenorah.
wbmnrh arbeh gbeym mSqdym kptryh wprxyh and in the light-stream-candles be four bowls made like unto almonds, with their knops and their flowers. ubamenorah ’arba‘ah gebi‘im, meshuqadim kaftoreha uferakheha.
wkptr txt Sny hqnym mmnh wkptr txt Sny hqnym mmnh wkptr txt Sny hqnym mmnh lSSt hqnym hyzaym mn hmnrh and there be a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, and a knop under two branches of the same, according to the six branches that proceed out of the light-stream-candle. vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah, lesheshet haqanim hayoze’im min hamenorah.
kptryhm wqntm mmnh yhyw klh mqSh axt chb Thwr their knops and their branches be of the same: all it be one beaten work of pure-tahor gold. kaftorehem uqenotam mimenah yihyu, kulah miqshah ’akhat zahab tahor.
weSyt at nrtyh Sbeh whelh at nrtyh whayr el ebr pnyh and thou make the seven lamps thereof: and they light the lamps thereof, that they may give light over against it. ve‘asita neroteha shib‘ah, vehe‘elah neroteha vehe’ir ‘al ‘eber paneha.
wmlqxyh wmxttyh chb Thwr and the tongs thereof, and the shutters thereof, be of pure-tahor gold. umalqakheha umakhtoteha zahab tahor.
kkr chb Thwr yeSh ath at kl hklym halh of a talent of pure-tahor gold he make it, with all these tools. kikar zahab tahor ya‘aseh ’otah, ’et kal hakelim ha’eleh.
wrah weSh btbnytm aSr ath mrah bhr and look that thou make them after their pattern, which was showed thee in the mount. ure’eh va‘aseh, betabnitam ’asher ’atah mare’eh bahar.
wat hmSkn teSh eSr yryet SS mScr wtklt wargmn wtlet Sny krbym meSh xSb teSh atm moreover thou make the dwelling with ten curtains six, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars: with inward-cherubim of cunning work thou make them. ve’et hamishkan ta‘aseh ‘eser yeri‘ot, shesh mashezar utekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani kerubim ma‘aseh khosheb ta‘aseh ’otam.
ark hyryeh haxt Smnh weSrym bamh wrxb arbe bamh hyryeh haxt mdh axt lkl hyryet the length of one curtain be eight and double-ten-twenty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and every one of the curtains have one measure. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat shemoneh ve‘esrim ba’amah verokhab ’arba‘ ba’amah hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat lekhal hayri‘ot.
xmS hyryet thyyn xbrt aSh al axth wxmS yryet xbrt aSh al axth the five curtains be coupled together one to another; and other five curtains be coupled one to another. khamesh hayri‘ot tihyena khoberot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah, vekhamesh yeri‘ot khoberot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah.
weSyt llat tklt el Spt hyryeh haxt mqzh bxbrt wkn teSh bSpt hyryeh hqyzwnh bmxbrt hSnyt and thou make loops of blue upon the edge of the one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling; and likewise thou make in the uttermost edge of another curtain, in the coupling of the second. ve‘asita lul’ot tekhelet ‘al sefat hayri‘ah ha’ekhat miqazah bakhobaret, vekhen ta‘aseh bisfat hayri‘ah haqizonah bamakhberet hashenit.
xmSym llat teSh byryeh haxt wxmSym llat teSh bqzh hyryeh aSr bmxbrt hSnyt mqbylt hllat aSh al axth fifty loops thou make in the one curtain, and fifty loops thou make in the edge of the curtain that is in the coupling of the second; that the loops may take hold one of another. khamishim lula’ot ta‘aseh bayri‘ah ha’ekhat vakhamishim lula’ot ta‘aseh biqzeh hayri‘ah ’asher bamakhberet hashenit, maqbilot halula’ot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah.
weSyt xmSym qrsy chb wxbrt at hyryet aSh al axth bqrsym whyh hmSkn axd and thou make fifty taches of gold, and couple the curtains together with the taches: and it be one dwelling. ve‘asita khamishim qarsei zahab, vekhibarta hayri‘ot ’ishah ’el ’akhotah baqerasim vehayah hamishkan ’ekhad.
weSyt yryet ecym lahl el hmSkn eSty eSrh yryet teSh atm and thou make curtains of intense-goats' gate-hair to be a covering upon the dwelling: eleven curtains thou make. ve‘asita yeri‘ot ‘izim le’ohel ‘al hamishkan, ‘ashte ‘esreh yeri‘ot ta‘aseh.
ark hyryeh haxt SlSym bamh wrxb arbe bamh hyryeh haxt mdh axt leSty eSrh yryet the length of one curtain be thirty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and the eleven curtains be all of one measure. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat sheloshim ba’amah verokhab ’arba‘ ba’amah hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat le‘ashtei ‘esreh yeri‘ot.
wxbrt at xmS hyryet lbd wat SS hyryet lbd wkplt at hyryeh hSSyt al mwl pny hahl and thou couple five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves, and double the sixth curtain in the forefront of the oheltabernacle. vekhibarta khamesh hayri‘ot lebad ve’et shesh hayri‘ot lebad, vekhafalta hayri‘ah hashishit mul penei ha’ohel.

whamh mch whamh mch bedp bark yryet hahl yhyh srwx el zdy hmSkn mch wmch lkstw and a cubit on the one side, and a cubit on the other side of that which remaineth in the length of the curtains of the tent, it hang over the sides of the dwelling on this side and on that side, to cover it. veha’amah mizeh veha’amah mizeh ba‘odef be’orekh yeri‘ot ha’ohel, yihyeh saruakh ‘al zidei hamishkan mizeh umizeh lekhasoto.

weSyt syrtyw ldSnw wyeyw wmcrqtyw wmclgtyw wmxttyw lkl klyw teSh nxSt and thou make his pans to receive his ashes, and his shovels, and his basins, and his fleshhooks, and his firepans: all the tools thereof thou make of brass. ve‘asita sirotav ledasheno veya‘av umizreqotav umizlegotav umakhtotav, lekhal kelav ta‘aseh nekhoshet.

weSyt at xzr hmSkn lpat ngb tymnh qleym lxzr SS mScr mah bamh ark lpah haxt and thou make the court of the dwelling: for the south-dry side south-dryward there be hangings for the court six of an hundred cubits long for one side: ve‘asita khazar hamishkan, lif’at negeb temanah qela‘im lekhazer shesh mashezar me’ah ba’amah ’orekh lape’ah ha’ekhat.

wkn lpat zpwn bark qleym mah ark wemdw wemwdyw eSrym wadnyhm eSrym nxSt wwy hemdym wxSqyhm ksp and likewise for the hide-north side in length there be hangings of an hundred cubits long, and his double-ten-twenty column-stands and their double-ten-twenty sockets of brass; the hooks of the column-stands and their fillets of silver. vekhen lif’at zafon ba’orekh qela‘im me’ah ’orekh, ve‘amudav ‘esrim ve’adnehem ‘esrim nekhoshet vavei ha‘amudim vakhashuqehem kasef.
wrxb hxzr lpat ym qleym xmSym amh emdyhm eSrh wadnyhm eSrh and for the breadth of the court on the sea-west side be hangings of fifty cubits: their column-stands ten, and their sockets ten. verokhab hekhazer lif’at yam qela‘im khamishim ’amah, ‘amudehem ‘asarah ve’adnehem ‘asarah.
wrxb hxzr lpat qdmh mcrxh xmSym amh and the breadth of the court on the east side eastward be fifty cubits. verokhab hekhazer lif’at qedemah mizrakhah khamishim ’amah.
wxmS eSrh amh qleym lktp emdyhm SlSh wadnyhm SlSh the hangings of one side of the hair-gate be fifteen cubits: their column-stands three, and their sockets three. vakhamesh ‘esreh ’amah qela‘im lakatef, ‘amudehem sheloshah ve’adnehem sheloshah.
wlktp hSnyt xmS eSrh qleym emdyhm SlSh wadnyhm SlSh and on the other side be hangings fifteen cubits: their column-stands three, and their sockets three. velakatef hashenit khemesh ‘esreh qela‘im, ‘amudehem sheloshah ve’adnehem sheloshah.
wlSer hxzr msk eSrym amh tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS mScr meSh rqm emdyhm arbeh wadnyhm arbeh and for the hair-gate of the court be an hanging of double-ten-twenty cubits, of blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen, wrought with needlework: and their column-stands be four, and their sockets four. ulesha‘ar hekhazer masakh ‘esrim ’amah tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar ma‘aseh roqem, ‘amudehem ’arba‘ah ve’adnehem ’arba‘ah.
kl emwdy hxzr sbyb mxSqym ksp wwyhm ksp wadnyhm nxSt all the column-stands round about the court be filleted with silver; their hooks be of silver, and their sockets of brass. kal ‘amudei hekhazer sabib mekhushaqim kesef vavehem kasef, ve’adnehem nekhoshet.
ark hxzr mah bamh wrxb xmSym bxmSym wqmh xmS amwt SS mScr wadnyhm nxSt the length of the court be an hundred cubits, and the breadth fifty every where, and the height five cubits six, and their sockets of brass. ’orekh hekhazer me’ah ba’amah verokhab khamishim bakhamishim veqomah khamesh ’amot shesh mashezar, ve’adnehem nekhoshet.
lkl kly hmSkn bkl ebdtw wkl ytdtyw wkl ytdt hxzr nxSt all the tools of the dwelling in all the work thereof, and all the pins thereof, and all the pins of the court, be of brass. lekhol kelei hamishkan bekhol ‘abodato, vekhal yetedotav vekhal yitdot hekhazer nekhoshet.
wath tzwh at bny ySral wyqxw alyk Smn cyt ck ktyt lmawr lhelt nr tmyd and thou direct children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they bring thee pure-tahor name-from-oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamp to burn always. ve’atah tezaveh benei yisra’el veyiqkhu ’elekha shemen zayit zakh katit lama’or, leha‘alot ner tamid.
bahl mwed mxwz lprkt aSr el hedt yerk atw ahrn wbnyw merb ed bqr lpny yhwh xqt ewlm ldrtm mat bny ySral in the tent of until-conception without the breaker, which is before-turns the until-witness, aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens order it from evening to morning before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: it be a statute for ever unto their generations on the behalf of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. be’ohel mo‘ed mikhuz laparokhet ’asher ‘al ha‘edut ya‘arokh ’oto ’aharon ubanav me‘ereb ‘ad boqer lifnei yhvh, khuqat ‘olam ledorotam me’et benei yisra’el.
wath hqrb alyk at ahrn axyk wat bnyw atw mtwk bny ySral lkhnw ly ahrn ndb wabyhwa alecr waytmr bny ahrn and take thou unto thee aaron-cabinet thy brother, and his children-betweens with him, from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that he may dimmer-server unto me, even aaron-cabinet, nadab-volunteer and abihu-he-my-pa, eleazar-towards-stop and itamar-with-palm, aaron-cabinet's children-betweens. ve’atah haqreb ’elekha ’aharon ’akhikha ve’et banav ’ito mitokh benei yisra’el lekhahano li, ’aharon nadab va’abihu ’el‘azar ve’itamar benei ’aharon.
weSyt bgdy qdS lahrn axyk lkbwd wltpart and thou make dedicated-finished garments for aaron-cabinet thy brother for heaviness and for beauty. ve‘asita bigde qodesh le’aharon ’akhikha, lekhabod uletif’aret.
wath tdbr al kl xkmy lb aSr mlatyw rwx xkmh weSw at bgdy ahrn lqdSw lkhnw ly and thou speak unto all that are wise hearted, whom i have filled with breath-spirit of wisdom, that they may make aaron-cabinet's garments to fill him, that he may dimmer-server unto me. ve’atah tedaber ’el kal leb ’asher miletiv ruakh khakhmah ve‘asu bigdei ’aharon leqadesho lekhahano li.
walh hbgdym aSr yeSw xSn wapwd wmeyl wktnt tSbz mznpt wabnT weSw bgdy qdS lahrn axyk wlbnyw lkhnw ly and these are the garments which they make; a khashan-bronze-tooth, and an ephod-cash-in, and a robe, and a broidered you-wrote-coat, a branch-bonnet, and a girdle: and they make dedicated-finished garments for aaron-cabinet thy brother, and his children-betweens, that he may dimmer-server unto me. ve’eleh habegadim ’asher ya‘asu khoshen ve’efod ume‘il ukhetonet tashbez miznefet ve’abnet, ve‘asu bigde qodesh le’aharon ’akhikha ulebanav lekhahano li.
whm yqxw at hchb wat htklt wat hargmn wat twlet hSny wat hSS and they take gold, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine linen. vehem yiqkhu ’et hazahab ve’et hatekhelet ve’et ha’argaman, ve’et tola‘at hashani ve’et hashesh.
weSw at hapd chb tklt wargmn twlet Sny wSS mScr meSh xSb and they make the ephod-cash-in of gold, of blue, and of purple, of two caterpillars, and fine twined linen, with cunning work. ve‘asu ha’efod, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman tola‘at shani veshesh mashezar ma‘aseh khosheb.
Sty ktpt xbrt yhyh lw al Sny qzwtyw wxbr it have the two shoulderpieces thereof joined at the two edges thereof; and so it be joined together. shetei khetefot khoberot yihyeh lo ’el shenei qezotav vekhubar.
wxSb apdtw aSr elyw kmeShw mmnw yhyh chb tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS mScr and the accounting of the ephod-cash-in, which is upon it, be of the same, according to the work thereof; even of gold, of blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen. vekhesheb ’afudato ’asher ‘alav kema‘asehu mimenu yihyeh, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar.

SSh mSmtm el habn haxt wat Smwt hSSh hnwtrym el habn hSnyt ktwldtm six of their names on one father-child-stone, and the other six names of the rest on the other father-child-stone, according to their birth. shishah mishemotam ‘al ha’eben ha’ekhat, ve’et shemot hashishah hanotarim ‘al ha’eben hashenit ketoldotam.
meSh xrS abn ptwxy xtm tptx at Sty habnym el Smt bny ySral msbt mSbzwt chb teSh atm with the work of an engraver in father-child-stone, like the engravings of a signet, thou engrave the two stones with the names of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: thou make them to be set in ouches of gold. ma‘aseh kharash ’eben pitukhei khotam tefatakh shetei ha’abanim ‘al shemot benei yisra’el, musabot mishbezot zahab ta‘aseh ’otam.
wSmt at Sty habnym el ktpt hapd abny ckrn lbny ySral wnSa ahrn at Smwtm lpny yhwh el Sty ktpyw lckrn and thou put the two stones upon the shoulders of the ephod-cash-in for stones of memorial unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and aaron-cabinet bear their names before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah upon his two shoulders for a memorial. vesamta shetei ha’abanim ‘al kitfot ha’efod ’abnei zikaron libnei yisra’el, venasa ’aharon shemotam lifnei yhvh ‘al shetei khetefav lezikaron.
weSyt mSbzt chb and thou make ouches of gold; ve‘asita mishbezot zahab.
wSty SrSrt chb Thwr mgblt teSh atm meSh ebt wntth at SrSrt hebtt el hmSbzt and two chains of pure-tahor gold at the ends; of wreathed work thou make them, and fasten the wreathed chains to the ouches. ushetei sharsherot zahab tahor migbalot ta‘aseh ma‘aseh ‘abot, venatatah sharsherot ha‘abotot ‘al hamishbezot.
weSyt xSn mSpT meSh xSb kmeSh apd teSnw chb tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS mScr teSh atw and thou make the khashan-bronze-tooth of decision-grammar with cunning work; after the work of the ephod-cash-in thou make it; of gold, of blue, and of purple, and of two caterpillars, and six, thou make it. ve‘asita khoshen mishpat ma‘aseh khosheb kema‘aseh ’efod ta‘asenu, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar ta‘aseh ’oto.
rbwe yhyh kpwl crt arkw wcrt rxbw foursquare it be being doubled; a span be the length thereof, and a span be the breadth thereof. rabua‘ yihyeh kaful, zeret ’areko vezeret rakhebo.
wmlat bw mlat abn arbeh Twrym abn Twr adm pTdh wbrqt hTwr haxd and thou set in it settings of stones, even four rows of stones: the first row be a red-column-sardius, a topaz, and a temple-carbuncle: this be the first row. umileta bo milu’at ’eben ’arba‘ah turim ’aben, tur ’odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha’ekhad.
whTwr hSny npk spyr wyhlm and the second row be an emerald, a countable-saphire, and a shock-diamond. vehatur hasheni, nofekh sapir veyahalom.

wat Sty qzwt Sty hebtt ttn el Sty hmSbzwt wntth el ktpwt hapd al mwl pnyw and the other two ends of the two wreathed chains thou fasten in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod-cash-in before-turns it. ve’et shetei qezot shetei ha‘abotot titen ‘al shetei hamishbezot, venatatah ‘al kitfot ha’efod ’el mul panav.

wyrksw at hxSn mTbetw mTbetyw al Tbet hapd bptyl tklt lhywt el xSb hapwd wla ycx hxSn mel hapwd and they bind the khashan-bronze-tooth by the rings thereof unto the rings of the ephod-cash-in with a lace of blue, that it may be above the accounting of the ephod-cash-in, and that the khashan-bronze-tooth be not loosed from the ephod-cash-in. veyirkesu hakhoshen mitabe‘oto mitabe‘otav ’el tabe‘ot ha’efod biftil tekhelet lihyot ‘al khesheb ha’efod, velo yizakh hakhoshen me‘al ha’efod.

whyh el mzx ahrn wnSa ahrn at ewn hqdSym aSr yqdySw bny ySral lkl mtnt qdSyhm whyh el mzxw tmyd lrzwn lhm lpny yhwh and it be upon aaron-cabinet's forehead, that aaron-cabinet may bear the torment of the dedicated-finished things, which children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards dedicate-finify in all their dedicated-finished gifts; and it be always upon his forehead, that they may be accepted before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehayah ‘al mezakh ’aharon venasa ’aharon ‘avon haqodashim ’asher yaqdishu benei yisra’el lekhal matenot qadeshehem, vehayah ‘al mizkho tamid lerazon lahem lifnei yhvh.

whyw el ahrn wel bnyw bbam al ahl mwed aw bgStm al hmcbx lSrt bqdS wla ySaw ewn wmtw xqt ewlm lw wlcrew axryw and they be upon aaron-cabinet, and upon his children-betweens, when they come in unto the tent of until-conception, or when they come near unto the butcher-kitchen to in the dedicated-finished place; that they bear not torment, and die: it be a statute for ever unto him and his seed after him. vehayu ‘al ’aharon ve‘al banav bebo’am ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ’o begishtam ’el hamizbeakh lesharet baqodesh velo yis’u ‘avon vametu, khuqat ‘olam lo ulezar‘o ’akharav.
wch hdbr aSr teSh lhm lqdS atm lkhn ly lqx pr axd bn bqr waylm Snym tmymm and this is the thing that thou do unto them to dedicate-finify them, to dimmer-server unto me: take one bull child-between of visit-cattle, and two ram-voicelesss simple, vezeh hadabar ’asher ta‘aseh lahem leqadesh ’otam lekhahen li, leqakh par ’ekhad baqar ve’elim shenayim temimim.
wlxm mzwt wxlt mzt blwlt bSmn wrqyqy mzwt mSxym bSmn slt xTym teSh atm and lit-mazat, and cakes unleavened tempered with name-from-oil, and wafers unleavened lubeed with name-from-oil: of wheaten basket-flour thou make them. velekhem mazot vekhalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen, solet khitim ta‘aseh ’otam.
wntt awtm el sl axd whqrbt atm bsl wat hpr wat Sny haylm and thou put them into one basket, and bring them in the basket, with the bull and the two ram-voicelesss. venatata ’otam ‘al sal ’ekhad vehiqrabta ’otam basal, ve’et hapar ve’et shenei ha’elim.
wat ahrn wat bnyw tqryb al ptx ahl mwed wrxzt atm bmym and aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens thou bring unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, and wash them with from-waters. ve’et ’aharon ve’et banav taqrib ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, verakhazta ’otam bamayim.
wlqxt at hbgdym whlbSt at ahrn at hktnt wat meyl hapd wat hapd wat hxSn wapdt lw bxSb hapd and thou take the garments, and put upon aaron-cabinet the you-wrote-coat, and the robe of the ephod-cash-in, and the ephod-cash-in, and the khashan-bronze-tooth, and gird him with the accounting of the ephod-cash-in: velaqakhta habegadim vehilbashta ’aharon hakutonet ve’et me‘il ha’efod ve’et ha’efod ve’et hakhoshen, ve’afadta lo bekhesheb ha’efod.
wSmt hmznpt el raSw wntt at ncr hqdS el hmznpt and thou put the branch-bonnet upon his head, and put the dedicated-finished crown upon the branch-bonnet. vesamta hamiznefet ‘al rosho, venatata nezer haqodesh ‘al hamiznafet.
wlqxt at Smn hmSxh wyzqt el raSw wmSxt atw then thou take the lubeing name-from-oil, and pour it upon his head, and lube him. velaqakhta shemen hamishkhah veyazaqta ‘al rosho, umashakhta ’oto.
wat bnyw tqryb whlbStm ktnt and thou bring his children-betweens, and put you-wrote-coats upon them. ve’et banav taqrib, vehilbashtam kutonot.
wxgrt atm abnT ahrn wbnyw wxbSt lhm mgbet whyth lhm khnh lxqt ewlm wmlat yd ahrn wyd bnyw and thou gird them with girdles, aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, and put the bonnets on them: and the dimmer-server's office be theirs for a perpetual statute: and thou fill aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens. vekhagarta ’otam ’abnet ’aharon ubanav vekhabashta lahem migba‘ot vehayetah lahem kehunah lekhuqat ‘olam, umileta ’aharon veyad banav.
whqrbt at hpr lpny ahl mwed wsmk ahrn wbnyw at ydyhm el raS hpr and thou cause a bull to be brought before-turns the tent of until-conception: and aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens put their hands upon the head of the bull. vehiqrabta hapar lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed, vesamakh ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh hapar.
wSxTt at hpr lpny yhwh ptx ahl mwed and thou kill the bull before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, by the opening of the tent of until-conception. veshakhata hapar lifnei yhvh, petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wlqxt mdm hpr wntth el qrnt hmcbx bazbek wat kl hdm tSpk al yswd hmcbx and thou take of the blood of the bull, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen with thy finger, and pour all the blood beside the bottom of the butcher-kitchen. velaqakhta midam hapar venatatah ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh be’ezba‘ekha, ve’et kal hadam tishpokh ’el yesod hamizbeakh.
wlqxt at kl hxlb hmksh at hqrb wat hytrt el hkbd wat Sty hklyt wat hxlb aSr elyhn whqTrt hmcbxh and thou take all the fat that covereth the inwards, and the remainder that is above the heavy-liver, and the two eliminate-kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, and burn them upon the butcher-kitchen. velaqakhta kal hakheleb hamkhaseh haqereb ve’et hayoteret ‘al hakabed ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et hakheleb ’asher ‘alehen, vehiqtarta hamizbekhah.
wat bSr hpr wat erw wat prSw tSrp baS mxwz lmxnh xTat hwa and the flesh of the bull, and his light-skin, and his dung, thou burn with fire without the camp: it is a miss. ve’et besar hapar ve’et ‘oro ve’et pirsho tisrof ba’esh mikhuz lamakhaneh, khatat hu.
wat hayl haxd tqx wsmkw ahrn wbnyw at ydyhm el raS hayl thou also take one ram-voiceless; and aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens put their hands upon the head of the ram-voiceless. ve’et ha’ayil ha’ekhad tiqakh, vesamekhu ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh ha’ayil.
wSxTt at hayl wlqxt at dmw wcrqt el hmcbx sbyb and thou slay the ram-voiceless, and thou take his blood, and sprinkle it round about upon the butcher-kitchen. veshakhata ha’ayil, velaqakhta damo vezaraqta ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.
wat hayl tntx lntxyw wrxzt qrbw wkreyw wntt el ntxyw wel raSw and thou cut the ram-voiceless in pieces, and wash the inwards of him, and his legs, and put them unto his pieces, and unto his head. ve’et ha’ayil tenateakh lintakhav, verakhazta qirbo ukhera‘av venatata ‘al netakhav ve‘al rosho.
whqTrt at kl hayl hmcbxh elh hwa lyhwh ryx nyxwx aSh lyhwh hwa and thou burn the whole ram-voiceless upon the butcher-kitchen: it is a on-up unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: it is a smell fragrance, a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehiqtarta kal ha’ayil hamizbekhah ‘olah hu yhvh, reakh nikhoakh ’isheh yhvh hu.
wlqxt at hayl hSny wsmk ahrn wbnyw at ydyhm el raS hayl and thou take the other ram-voiceless; and aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens put their hands upon the head of the ram-voiceless. velaqakhta ha’ayil hasheni, vesamakh ’aharon ubanav yedehem ‘al rosh ha’ayil.
wSxTt at hayl wlqxt mdmw wntth el tnwk acn ahrn wel tnwk acn bnyw hymnyt wel bhn ydm hymnyt wel bhn rglm hymnyt wcrqt at hdm el hmcbx sbyb then thou kill the ram-voiceless, and take of his blood, and put it upon the tip of the right ear of aaron-cabinet, and upon the tip of the right ear of his children-betweens, and upon the thumb of their right hand, and upon the great toe of their right foot, and sprinkle the blood upon the butcher-kitchen round about. veshakhata ha’ayil velaqakhta midamo venatatah ‘al tenukh ’ozen ’aharon ve‘al tenukh ’ozen banav haymanit ve‘al bohen yadam haymanit ve‘al bohen raglam haymanit, vezaraqta hadam ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.
wlqxt mn hdm aSr el hmcbx wmSmn hmSxh whcyt el ahrn wel bgdyw wel bnyw wel bgdy bnyw atw wqdS hwa wbgdyw wbnyw wbgdy bnyw atw and thou take of the blood that is upon the butcher-kitchen, and of the lubeing name-from-oil, and sprinkle it upon aaron-cabinet, and upon his garments, and upon his children-betweens, and upon the garments of his children-betweens with him: and he be dedicateed, and his garments, and his children-betweens, and his children-betweens' garments with him. velaqakhta min hadam ’asher ‘al hamizbeakh umishemen hamishkhah vehizeta ‘al ’aharon ve‘al begadav ve‘al banav ve‘al bigdei banav ’ito, veqadash hu ubegadav ubanav ubigdei banav ’ito.
wlqxt mn hayl hxlb whalyh wat hxlb hmksh at hqrb wat ytrt hkbd wat Sty hklyt wat hxlb aSr elhn wat Swq hymyn ky ayl mlaym hwa also thou take of the ram-voiceless the fat and the rump, and the fat that covereth the inwards, and the remainder above the heavy-liver, and the two eliminate-kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, and the right shoulder; for it is a ram-voiceless of fullness: velaqakhta min ha’ayil hakheleb veha’alyah ve’et hakheleb hamkhaseh haqereb ve’et yoteret hakabed ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et hakheleb ’asher ‘alehen ve’et shoq hayamin, ki ’el milu’im hu.
wkkr lxm axt wxlt lxm Smn axt wrqyq axd msl hmzwt aSr lpny yhwh and one loaf of bread, and one cake of name-from-oiled bread, and one wafer out of the basket of the lit-mazat that is before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: vekhikar lekhem ’akhat vakhalat lekhem shemen ’akhat veraqiq ’ekhad, misal hamazot ’asher lifnei yhvh.
wSmt hkl el kpy ahrn wel kpy bnyw whnpt atm tnwph lpny yhwh and thou put all in the hands of aaron-cabinet, and in the hands of his children-betweens; and sieve-pana them for a sieve before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vesamta hakol ‘al kapei ’aharon ve‘al kapei banav, vehenafta ’otam tenufah lifnei yhvh.
wlqxt atm mydm whqTrt hmcbxh el helh lryx nyxwx lpny yhwh aSh hwa lyhwh and thou receive them of their hands, and burn them upon the butcher-kitchen for a on-up, for a smell fragrance before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: it is a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. velaqakhta ’otam miyadam vehiqtarta hamizbekhah ‘al ha‘olah, lereakh nikhoakh lifnei yhvh ’isheh hu yhvh.
wlqxt at hxch mayl hmlaym aSr lahrn whnpt atw tnwph lpny yhwh whyh lk lmnh and thou take the breast of the ram-voiceless of aaron-cabinet's fullness, and sieve-pana it for a sieve before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and it be thy part. velaqakhta hekhazeh me’el hamilu’im le’aharon vehenafta ’oto tenufah lifnei yhvh, vehayah lekha lemanah.
wqdSt at xch htnwph wat Swq htrwmh aSr hwnp waSr hwrm mayl hmlaym maSr lahrn wmaSr lbnyw and thou dedicate-finify the breast of the sieve, and the shoulder of the raise-rum, which is sieve-panad, and which is raised up, of the ram-voiceless of the fullness, even of that which is for aaron-cabinet, and of that which is for his children-betweens: veqidashta khazeh hatenufah ve’et shoq haterumah ’asher hunaf va’asher huram, me’el hamilu’im me’asher le’aharon ume’asher lebanav.
whyh lahrn wlbnyw lxq ewlm mat bny ySral ky trwmh hwa wtrwmh yhyh mat bny ySral mcbxy Slmyhm trwmtm lyhwh and it be aaron-cabinet's and his children-betweens' by a statute for ever from children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: for it is an raise-rum: and it be an raise-rum from children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards of the butcher of their wholes, even their raise-rum unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehayah le’aharon ulebanav lekhaq ‘olam me’et benei yisra’el ki terumah hu, uterumah yihyeh me’et bene yisra’el mizibkhei shalmehem terumatam yhvh.
wbgdy hqdS aSr lahrn yhyw lbnyw axryw lmSxh bhm wlmla bm at ydm and the dedicated-finished garments of aaron-cabinet be his children-betweens' after him, to be lubeed therein, and to be filld in them. ubigdei haqodesh le’aharon yihyu lebanav ’akharav, lemashekhah bahem ulemale bam.
Sbet ymym ylbSm hkhn txtyw mbnyw aSr yba al ahl mwed lSrt bqdS and that child-between that is dimmer-server in his stead put them on seven days, when he cometh into the tent of until-conception to in the dedicated-finished place. shib‘at yamim yilbasham hakohen takhtav mibanav, ’asher yabo ’el ’ohel mo‘ed lesharet baqodesh.
wat ayl hmlaym tqx wbSlt at bSrw bmqm qdS and thou take the ram-voiceless of the fullness, and seethe his flesh in the dedicated-finished place. ve’et ’el hamilu’im tiqakh, ubishalta besaro bemaqom qadosh.
wakl ahrn wbnyw at bSr hayl wat hlxm aSr bsl ptx ahl mwed and aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens eat the flesh of the ram-voiceless, and the bread that is in the basket by the opening of the tent of until-conception. ve’akhal ’aharon ubanav besar ha’ayil ve’et halekhem ’asher basal, petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
waklw atm aSr kpr bhm lmla at ydm lqdS atm wcr la yakl ky qdS hm and they eat those things wherewith the out-of-town-ment was made, to fill and to dedicate-finify them: and a stranger not eat thereof, because they are dedicated-finished. ve’akhelu ’asher kupar lemalei leqadesh ’otam, vezar lo yokhal ki qodesh hem.
wam ywtr mbSr hmlaym wmn hlxm ed hbqr wSrpt at hnwtr baS la yakl ky qdS hwa and if ought of the flesh of the fullnesss, or of the bread, remain unto the morning, then thou burn the remainder with fire: it not be eaten, because it is dedicated-finished. ve’im yivater mibesar hamilu’im umin halekhem ‘ad haboqer, vesarafta hanotar ba’esh lo ye’akhel ki qodesh hu.
weSyt lahrn wlbnyw kkh kkl aSr zwyty atkh Sbet ymym tmla ydm and thus thou do unto aaron-cabinet, and to his children-betweens, according to all things which i have direct thee: seven days thou fill them. ve‘asita le’aharon ulebanav kakhah kekhol ’asher ziviti ’otakhah, shib‘at yamim temalei yadam.
wpr xTat teSh lywm el hkprym wxTat el hmcbx bkprk elyw wmSxt atw lqdSw and thou inward every day a bull for a miss for out-of-town-ment: and thou miss the butcher-kitchen, when thou hast made an out-of-town-ment for it, and thou lube it, to dedicate-finify it. ufar khatat ta‘aseh layom ‘al hakipurim vekhiteta ‘al hamizbeakh bekhaperkha ‘alav, umashakhta ’oto leqadesho.
Sbet ymym tkpr el hmcbx wqdSt atw whyh hmcbx qdS qdSym kl hnge bmcbx yqdS seven days thou make an out-of-town-ment for the butcher-kitchen, and dedicate-finify it; and it be an butcher-kitchen most dedicated-finished: whatsoever toucheth the butcher-kitchen be dedicated-finished. shib‘at yamim tekhaper ‘al hamizbeakh veqidashta ’oto, vehayah hamizbeakh qodesh qadashim kal hanogea‘ bamizbeakh yiqdash.
wch aSr teSh el hmcbx kbSym bny Snh Snym lywm tmyd now this is that which thou inward upon the butcher-kitchen; two lambs of the first year day by day continually. vezeh ’asher ta‘aseh ‘al hamizbeakh, kebasim bene shanah shenayim layom tamid.
at hkbS haxd teSh bbqr wat hkbS hSny teSh byn herbym the one lamb thou inward in the morning; and the other lamb thou inward at even: hakebes ha’ekhad ta‘aseh baboqer, ve’et hakebes hasheni ta‘aseh ben ha‘arbayim.
weSrn slt blwl bSmn ktyt rbe hhyn wnsk rbeyt hhyn yyn lkbS haxd and with the one lamb a tenth deal of basket-flour mingled with the fourth part of an here-hin of beaten name-from-oil; and the fourth part of an here-hin of wine-inherit for a pouring. ve‘isaron solet balul beshemen katit reba‘ hahin venesekh rebi‘it hahin yayin, lakebes ha’ekhad.
wat hkbS hSny teSh byn herbym kmnxt hbqr wknskh teSh lh lryx nyxx aSh lyhwh and the other lamb thou inward at even, and do thereto according to the absorber of the morning, and according to the pouring thereof, for a smell fragrance, a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ve’et hakebes hasheni ta‘aseh ben ha‘arbayim, keminkhat haboqer ukheniskah ta‘aseh lah lereakh nikhoakh ’isheh yhvh.
elt tmyd ldrtykm ptx ahl mwed lpny yhwh aSr awed lkm Smh ldbr alyk Sm this be a continual on-up throughout your generations at the opening of the tent of until-conception before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: where i will until-witness you, to speak there unto thee. ‘olat tamid ledorotekhem petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lifnei yhvh, ’asher ’iva‘ed lakhem shamah ledaber ’elekha sham.
wnedty Smh lbny ySral wnqdS bkbdy and there i will until-witness with children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and the dwelling be dedicated-finished by my heaviness. veno‘adti shamah libnei yisra’el, veniqdash bikhbodi.
wqdSty at ahl mwed wat hmcbx wat ahrn wat bnyw aqdS lkhn ly and i will dedicate-finify the tent of until-conception, and the butcher-kitchen: i will dedicate-finify also both aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, to dimmer-server to me. veqidashti ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et hamizbeakh, ve’et ’aharon ve’et banav ’aqadesh lekhahen li.
wSknty btwk bny ySral whyyty lhm lalhym and i will dwell among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and will be their to-no-these. veshakhanti betokh benei yisra’el, vehayiti lahem lelohim.
wydew ky any yhwh alhyhm aSr hwzaty atm marz mzrym lSkny btwkm any yhwh alhyhm and they hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah their to-no-these, that brought them forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows, that i may dwell among them: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah their to-no-these. veyade‘u ki ’ani yhvh ’elohehem ’asher hozeti ’otam me’erez mizrayim leshakheni betokham, ’ani yhvh ’elohehem.
weSyt mcbx mqTr qTrt ezy STym teSh atw and thou make an butcher-kitchen to burn incense upon: of shitim-sailing wood thou make it. ve‘asita mizbeakh miqtar qetoret, ‘azei shitim ta‘aseh ’oto.
amh arkw wamh rxbw rbwe yhyh wamtym qmtw mmnw qrntyw a cubit be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof; foursquare it be: and two cubits be the height thereof: the horn-rays thereof be of the same. ’amah ’areko ve’amah rakhebo rabua‘ yihyeh ve’amatayim qomato, mimenu qarnotav.
wzpyt atw chb Thwr at ggw wat qyrtyw sbyb wat qrntyw weSyt lw cr chb sbyb and thou overlay it with pure-tahor gold, the top thereof, and the sides thereof round about, and the horn-rays thereof; and thou make unto it a frame of gold round about. vezipita zahab tahor gago ve’et qirotav sabib ve’et qarnotav, ve‘asita lo zer zahab sabib.
wSty Tbet chb teSh lw mtxt lcrw el Sty zletyw teSh el Sny zdyw whyh lbtym lbdym lSat atw bhmh and two golden rings thou make to it under the crown of it, by the two corners thereof, upon the two sides of it thou make it; and they be for places for the canvas to bear it withal. ushetei tabe‘ot zahab ta‘aseh lo mitakhat lezero ‘al shetei zal‘otav ta‘aseh ‘al shenei zidav, vehayah lebatim lebadim laset ’oto bahemah.
weSyt at hbdym ezy STym wzpyt atm chb and thou make the canvas of shitim-sailing wood, and overlay them with gold. ve‘asita habadim ‘azei shitim, vezipita ’otam zahab.
wntth atw lpny hprkt aSr el arn hedt lpny hkprt aSr el hedt aSr awed lk Smh and thou put it before-turns the breaker that is by the cabinet of the until-witness, before-turns the out-of-townment that is over the until-witness, where i will until-witness with thee. venatatah ’oto lifnei haparokhet ’asher ‘al ’aron ha‘edut, lifnei hakaporet ’asher ‘al ha‘edut ’asher ’iva‘ed lekha.
whqTyr elyw ahrn qTrt smym bbqr bbqr bhyTybw at hnrt yqTyrnh and aaron-cabinet burn thereon smoke drug every morning: when he dresseth the lamps, he burn incense upon it. vehiqtir ‘alav ’aharon qetoret samim, baboqer baboqer behetibo hanerot yaqtirenah.
wbhelt ahrn at hnrt byn herbym yqTyrnh qTrt tmyd lpny yhwh ldrtykm and when aaron-cabinet lighteth the lamps at even, he burn incense upon it, a perpetual incense before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah throughout your generations. ubeha‘alot ’aharon hanerot ben ha‘arbayim yaqtirenah, qetoret tamid lifnei yhvh ledorotekhem.
la telw elyw qTrt crh welh wmnxh wnsk la tskw elyw ye inward no strange incense thereon, nor on-up, nor absorber; neither ye pour pouring thereon. lo ta‘alu ‘alav qetoret zarah ve‘olah uminkhah, venesekh lo tisekhu ‘alav.
wkpr ahrn el qrntyw axt bSnh mdm xTat hkprym axt bSnh ykpr elyw ldrtykm qdS qdSym hwa lyhwh and aaron-cabinet make an out-of-town-ment upon the horn-rays of it once in a year with the blood of the miss of out-of-town-ments: once in the year he make out-of-town-ment upon it throughout your generations: it is most dedicated-finished unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vekhiper ’aharon ‘al qarnotav ’akhat bashanah, midam khatat hakipurim ’akhat bashanah yekhaper ‘alav ledorotekhem qodesh qadashim hu yhvh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
ky tSa at raS bny ySral lpqdyhm wntnw ayS kpr npSw lyhwh bpqd atm wla yhyh bhm ngp bpqd atm when thou takest the sum of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards after their number, then they give every man a ransom for his being unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, when thou numberest them; that there be no obstacle-nagaf among them, when thou numberest them. ki tisa rosh bene yisra’el lifqudehem venatenu ’ish kofer nafsho yhvh bifqod ’otam, velo yihyeh bahem negef bifqod ’otam.
ch ytnw kl hebr el hpqdym mxzyt hSql bSql hqdS eSrym grh hSql mxzyt hSql trwmh lyhwh this they give, every one that passeth among them that are numbered, half a shekel-light after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished: (a shekel-light is double-ten-twenty gera-strangerhs:) an half shekel-light be the plateau-contributeing of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. zeh yitenu kal ‘al hapequdim makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh, ‘esrim gerah hasheqel makhazit hasheqel terumah yhvh.
kl hebr el hpqdym mbn eSrym Snh wmelh ytn trwmt yhwh every one that passeth among them that are numbered, from double-ten-twenty years old and above, give an inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. kol ‘al hapequdim miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘elah, yiten terumat yhvh.
heSyr la yrbh whdl la ymeyT mmxzyt hSql ltt at trwmt yhwh lkpr el npStykm the rich not give more, and the poor not give less than half a shekel-light, when they give an inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to make an out-of-town-ment for your beings. he‘ashir lo yarbeh vehadal lo yam‘it mimakhazit hashaqel, latet terumat yhvh lekhaper ‘al nafshotekhem.
wlqxt at ksp hkprym mat bny ySral wntt atw el ebdt ahl mwed whyh lbny ySral lckrwn lpny yhwh lkpr el npStykm and thou take the out-of-town-ment money of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and appoint it for the work of the tent of until-conception; that it may be a memorial unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to make an out-of-town-ment for your beings. velaqakhta kesef hakipurim me’et benei yisra’el venatata ’oto ‘al ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed, vehayah libnei yisra’el lezikaron lifnei yhvh lekhaper ‘al nafshotekhem.
