weSyt kywr nxSt wknw nxSt lrxzh wntt atw byn ahl mwed wbyn hmcbx wntt Smh mym thou also make a bulging of brass, and his foot also of brass, to wash withal: and thou put it between-bin the tent of until-conception and the butcher-kitchen, and thou put from-waters therein. ve‘asita kiyor nekhoshet vekhano nekhoshet lerakhezah, venatata ’oto ben ’ohel mo‘ed uben hamizbeakh venatata shamah mayim.
wrxzw ahrn wbnyw mmnw at ydyhm wat rglyhm for aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens wash their hands and their feet thereat: verakhazu ’aharon ubanav mimenu, yedehem ve’et raglehem.
bbam al ahl mwed yrxzw mym wla ymtw aw bgStm al hmcbx lSrt lhqTyr aSh lyhwh when they go into the tent of until-conception, they wash with from-waters, that they die not; or when they come near to the butcher-kitchen to , to burn feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: bebo’am ’el ’ohel mo‘ed yirkhazu mayim velo yamutu, ’o begishtam ’el hamizbeakh lesharet lehaqtir ’isheh yhvh.
wrxzw ydyhm wrglyhm wla ymtw whyth lhm xq ewlm lw wlcrew ldrtm so they wash their hands and their feet, that they die not: and it be a statute for ever to them, even to him and to his seed throughout their generations. verakhazu yedehem veraglehem velo yamutu, vehayetah lahem khaq ‘olam lo ulezar‘o ledorotam.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr moreover yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
wath qx lk bSmym raS mr drwr xmS mawt wqnmn bSm mxzytw xmSym wmatym wqnh bSm xmSym wmatym take thou also unto thee head scents, of pure-tahor myrrh five hundred shekel-lights, and of sweet cinnamon half so much, even two hundred and fifty shekel-lights, and of sweet calamus two hundred and fifty shekel-lights, ve’atah qakh lekha besamim rosh mar deror khamesh me’ot veqineman besem makhazito khamishim umatayim, uqeneh bosem khamishim umatayim.
wqdh xmS mawt bSql hqdS wSmn cyt hyn and of cassia five hundred shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished, and of name-from-oil olive an here-hin: veqidah khamesh me’ot besheqel haqodesh, veshemen zayit hin.
weSyt atw Smn mSxt qdS rqx mrqxt meSh rqx Smn mSxt qdS yhyh and thou make it an name-from-oil of dedicated-finished ointment, an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary: it be an dedicated-finished lubeing name-from-oil. ve‘asita ’oto men mishkhat qodesh roqakh mirqakhat ma‘aseh roqeakh, shemen mishkhat qodesh yihyeh.
wmSxt bw at ahl mwed wat arwn hedt and thou lube the tent of until-conception therewith, and the cabinet of the until-witness, umashakhta bo ’ohel mo‘ed, ve’et ’aron ha‘edut.
wat hSlxn wat kl klyw wat hmnrh wat klyh wat mcbx hqTrt and the send-table and all his tools, and the light-stream-candle and his tools, and the butcher-kitchen of incense, ve’et hashulkhan ve’et kal kelav ve’et hamenorah ve’et keleha, ve’et mizbakh haqetoret.
wat mcbx helh wat kl klyw wat hkyr wat knw and the butcher-kitchen of on-up with all his tools, and the bulging and his base. ve’et mizbakh ha‘olah ve’et kal kelav, ve’et hakiyor ve’et kano.
wqdSt atm whyw qdS qdSym kl hnge bhm yqdS and thou dedicate-finify them, that they may be most dedicated-finished: whatsoever toucheth them be dedicated-finished. veqidashta ’otam vehayu qodesh qadashim, kal hanogea‘ bahem yiqdash.
wat ahrn wat bnyw tmSx wqdSt atm lkhn ly and thou lube aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, and fill them, that they may dimmer-server unto me. ve’et ’aharon ve’et banav timshakh, veqidashta ’otam lekhahen li.
wal bny ySral tdbr lamr Smn mSxt qdS yhyh ch ly ldrtykm and thou speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, this be an dedicated-finished lubeing name-from-oil unto me throughout your generations. ve’el benei yisra’el tedaber lemor, men mishkhat qodesh yihyeh zeh li ledorotekhem.
el bSr adm la yysk wbmtkntw la teSw kmhw qdS hwa qdS yhyh lkm upon man's flesh it not be poured, neither ye make any other like it, after the composition of it: it is dedicated-finished, and it be dedicated-finished unto you. ‘al besar ’adam lo yisakh ubematkunto lo ta‘asu kamohu, qodesh hu qodesh yihyeh lakhem.
ayS aSr yrqx kmhw waSr ytn mmnw el cr wnkrt memyw whosoever compoundeth any like it, or whosoever putteth any of it upon a stranger, even be cut off from his with-mum-people. ’ish ’asher yirqakh kamohu va’asher yiten mimenu ‘al zar, venikhrat me‘amav.
wyamr yhwh al mSh qx lk smym nTp wSxlt wxlbnh smym wlbnh ckh bd bbd yhyh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, take unto thee sweet scents, stacte, and onycha, and galbanum; these sweet scents with pure-tahor white-frankincense: of each there be a like weight: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh qakh lekha samim nataf ushekhelet vekhelbenah samim ulebonah zakah, bad bebad yihyeh.
weSyt ath qTrt rqx meSh rwqx mmlx Thwr qdS and thou make it a perfume, a confection after the art of the apothecary, tempered together, pure-tahor and dedicated-finished: ve‘asita ’otah qetoret roqakh ma‘aseh roqeakh, memulakh tahor qodesh.
wSxqt mmnh hdq wntth mmnh lpny hedt bahl mwed aSr awed lk Smh qdS qdSym thyh lkm and thou beat some of it very small, and put of it before-turns the until-witness in the tent of until-conception, where i will until-witness with thee: it be unto you most dedicated-finished. veshakhaqta mimenah hadeq venatatah mimenah lifnei ha‘edut be’ohel mo‘ed ’asher ’iva‘ed lekha. qadashim tihyeh lakhem.
whqTrt aSr teSh bmtknth la teSw lkm qdS thyh lk lyhwh and as for the perfume which thou make, ye not make to yourselves according to the composition thereof: it be unto thee dedicated-finished for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehaqetoret ’asher ta‘aseh bematkuntah lo ta‘asu lakhem, qodesh tihyeh lekha yhvh.
ayS aSr yeSh kmwh lhryx bh wnkrt memyw whosoever make like unto that, to smell thereto, even be cut off from his with-mum-people. ’ish ’asher ya‘aseh khamoha lehariakh bah, venikhrat me‘amav.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
rah qraty bSm bzlal bn awry bn xwr lmTh yhwdh see, i have called by name bezaleel-onion-towards child-between of hur-small-place-prince, child-between of hur-small-place-prince, of the branch of judah-know: re’eh qarati beshem, bezal’el ben ’uri ben khur lemateh yehudah.
wamla atw rwx alhym bxkmh wbtbwnh wbdet wbkl mlakh and i have filled him with breath-spirit of to-no-these, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of message-craft, va’amalei ’oto ruakh ’elohim, bekhakhemah ubitbunah ubeda‘at ubekhal melakhah.
lxSb mxSbt leSwt bchb wbksp wbnxSt to devise cunning works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass, lakhshob makhashabot, la‘asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet.
wbxrSt abn lmlat wbxrSt ez leSwt bkl mlakh and in cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of timber, to work in all manner of message-craft. ubakharoshet ’eben lemalot ubakharoshet ‘ez, la‘asot bekhal melakhah.
wany hnh ntty atw at ahlyab bn axysmk lmTh dn wblb kl xkm lb ntty xkmh weSw at kl aSr zwytk and i, behold, i have given with him aholiab-my-tent-dad, child-between of ahisamakh-my-brother-support, of the branch of dan-discuss: and in the hearts of all that are wise hearted i have put wisdom, that they may make all that i have direct thee; va’ani hineh natati ’ito ’aholi’ab ben ’akhisamakh lemateh dan ubeleb kal khakham leb natati khakhmah ve‘asu kal ’asher zivitikha.
at ahl mwed wat harn ledt wat hkprt aSr elyw wat kl kly hahl the tent of until-conception, and the cabinet of the until-witness, and the out-of-townment that is thereupon, and all the all-tool of the dwelling, ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et ha’aron la‘edut ve’et hakaporet ’asher ‘alav, ve’et kal kelei ha’ohel.
wat hSlxn wat klyw wat hmnrh hThrh wat kl klyh wat mcbx hqTrt and the send-table and his all-tool, and the pure-tahor light-stream-candle with all his all-tool, and the butcher-kitchen of incense, ve’et hashulkhan ve’et kelav ve’et hamenorah hatehorah ve’et kal keleha, ve’et mizbakh haqetoret.
wat mcbx helh wat kl klyw wat hkywr wat knw and the butcher-kitchen of on-up with all his all-tool, and the bulging and his base, ve’et mizbakh ha‘olah ve’et kal kelav, ve’et hakiyor ve’et kano.
wat bgdy hSrd wat bgdy hqdS lahrn hkhn wat bgdy bnyw lkhn and the cloths of work, and the dedicated-finished garments for aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server, and the garments of his children-betweens, to dimmer-server, ve’et bigdei haserad, ve’et bigdei haqodesh le’aharon hakohen ve’et bigdei banav lekhahen.
wat Smn hmSxh wat qTrt hsmym lqdS kkl aSr zwytk yeSw and the lubeing name-from-oil, and smoke drug for the dedicated-finished place: according to all that i have direct thee they do. ve’et shemen hamishkhah ve’et qetoret hasamim laqodesh, kekhol ’asher zivitikha ya‘asu.
wyamr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
wath dbr al bny ySral lamr ak at Sbtty tSmrw ky awt hwa byny wbynykm ldrtykm ldet ky any yhwh mqdSkm speak thou also unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, verily my sabbath-sevens ye keep: for it is a sign between-bin me and you throughout your generations; that ye may hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah that doth dedicate-finify you. ve’atah daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor ’akh shabetotay tishmoru, ki ’ot hi beni ubenekhem ledorotekhem lada‘at ki ’ani yhvh meqadishkhem.
wSmrtm at hSbt ky qdS hwa lkm mxllyh mwt ywmt ky kl heSh bh mlakh wnkrth hnpS hhwa mqrb emyh ye keep the sabbath-seven therefore; for it is dedicated-finished unto you: every one that ceaseth it surely be put to death: for whosoever doeth any work therein, that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. ushemartem hashabat ki qodesh hi lakhem, mekhaleha mot yumat ki kal ha‘oseh bah melakhah venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb ‘ameha.
SSt ymym yeSh mlakh wbywm hSbyey Sbt Sbtwn qdS lyhwh kl heSh mlakh bywm hSbt mwt ywmt six days may work be done; and in the seventh is the sabbath-seven of rest, dedicated-finished to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: whosoever doeth any work in the sabbath-seven day, he surely be put to death. sheshet yamim ye‘aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi‘i shabat shabaton qodesh yhvh, kal ha‘oseh melakhah beyom hashabat mot yumat.
wSmrw bny ySral at hSbt leSwt at hSbt ldrtm bryt ewlm wherefore children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards keep the sabbath-seven, to guard-observe the sabbath-seven throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant. veshameru bene yisra’el hashabat, la‘asot hashabat ledorotam berit ‘olam.
byny wbyn bny ySral awt hwa lelm ky SSt ymym eSh yhwh at hSmym wat harz wbywm hSbyey Sbt wynpS it is a sign between-bin me and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards for ever: for in six days yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made namespaces and earth, and on the seventh day he rested, and was refreshed. beni uben benei yisra’el ’ot hi le‘olam, ki sheshet yamim ‘asah yhvh hashamayim ve’et ha’arez ubayom hashebi‘i shabat vayinafash.
wytn al mSh kkltw ldbr atw bhr syny Sny lxt hedt lxt abn ktbym bazbe alhym and he gave unto mose-extracted, when he had made an end of communing with him upon mount )sinai-bush-(proto, two tables of until-witness, tables of father-child-stone, written with the finger of to-no-these. vayiten ’el mosheh kekhaloto ledaber ’ito behar sinay shenei lukhot ha‘edut, lukhot ’eben ketubim be’ezba‘ ’elohim.
wyra hem ky bSS mSh lrdt mn hhr wyqhl hem el ahrn wyamrw alyw qwm eSh lnw alhym aSr ylkw lpnynw ky ch mSh hayS aSr helnw marz mzrym la ydenw mh hyh lw and when the with-mum-people saw that mose-extracted delayed to come down out of the mount, the with-mum-people added themselves together unto aaron-cabinet, and said unto him, up, make us to-no-these, which go before-turns us; for as for this mose-extracted, the man that brought us up out of the land of mizraim-narrows, we wot not what is become of him. vayar ha‘am ki boshesh mosheh laredet min hahar, vayiqahel ha‘am ‘al ’aharon vayomeru ’elav qum ‘aseh lanu ’elohim ’asher yelekhu lefanenu ki zeh mosheh ha’ish ’asher he‘elanu me’erez mizrayim lo yada‘nu meh hayah lo.
wyamr alhm ahrn prqw ncmy hchb aSr bacny nSykm bnykm wbntykm whbyaw aly and aaron-cabinet said unto them, break off the golden earrings, which are in the ears of your women, of your children-betweens, and of your children-betweenesss, and bring them unto me. vayomer ’alehem ’aharon parequ nizmei hazahab ’asher be’azenei neshekhem benekhem ubenotekhem, vehabi’u ’elay.
wytprqw kl hem at ncmy hchb aSr bacnyhm wybyaw al ahrn and all the with-mum-people brake off the golden earrings which were in their ears, and brought them unto aaron-cabinet. vayitparequ kal ha‘am nizmei hazahab ’asher be’azenehem, vayabi’u ’el ’aharon.
wyqx mydm wyzr atw bxrT wyeShw egl mskh wyamrw alh alhyk ySral aSr helwk marz mzrym and he received them at their hand, and fashioned it with a graving tool, after he had made it a molten calf: and they said, these be thy to-no-these, o israel-juicy-towards, which brought thee up out of the land of mizraim-narrows. vayiqakh miyadam vayazar ’oto bakheret vaya‘asehu ‘egel masekhah, vayomeru ’eleh ’elohekha yisra’el ’asher he‘elukha me’erez mizrayim.
wyra ahrn wybn mcbx lpnyw wyqra ahrn wyamr xg lyhwh mxr and when aaron-cabinet saw it, he between-built an butcher-kitchen before-turns it; and aaron-cabinet made proclamation, and said, to morrow is a until-conception to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayar ’aharon vayiben mizbeakh lefanav, vayiqra ’aharon vayomar khag yhvh makhar.
wySkymw mmxrt wyelw elt wygSw Slmym wySb hem lakl wStw wyqmw lzxq and they rose up early on the morrow, and rose on-ups, and brought wholes; and the with-mum-people sat down to eat and to drink, and rose up to play. vayashkimu mimakhorat vaya‘alu ‘olot vayagishu shelamim, vayesheb ha‘am le’ekhol veshato vayaqumu lezakheq.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lk rd ky Sxt emk aSr helyt marz mzrym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, go, get thee down; for thy with-mum-people, which thou broughtest out of the land of mizraim-narrows, have corrupted themselves: vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh, lekh red ki shikhet ‘amekha ’asher he‘eleta me’erez mizrayim.
srw mhr mn hdrk aSr zwytm eSw lhm egl mskh wyStxww lw wycbxw lw wyamrw alh alhyk ySral aSr helwk marz mzrym they have turned aside quickly out of the way which i direct them: they have made them a molten calf, and have partook-shatakh it, and have butcherd thereunto, and said, these be thy to-no-these, o israel-juicy-towards, which have brought thee up out of the land of mizraim-narrows. saru maher min haderekh ’asher zivitim ‘asu lahem ‘egel masekhah, vayishtakhavu lo vayizbekhu lo vayomeru ’eleh ’elohekha yisra’el ’asher he‘elukha me’erez mizrayim.
wyamr yhwh al mSh rayty at hem hch whnh em qSh erp hwa and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, i have seen this with-mum-people, and, behold, it is a stiffnecked with-mum-people: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh, ra’iti ha‘am hazeh vehineh ‘am qesheh ‘oref hu.
weth hnyxh ly wyxr apy bhm waklm waeSh awtk lgwy gdwl now therefore let me alone, that my wrath may wax hot against them, and that i may consume them: and i will make of thee a great nation. ve‘atah hanikhah li veyikhar ’api bahem va’akhalem, ve’e‘eseh ’otkha lego gadol.
wyxl mSh at pny yhwh alhyw wyamr lmh yhwh yxrh apk bemk aSr hwzat marz mzrym bkx gdwl wbyd xcqh and mose-extracted besought yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah his to-no-these, and said, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, why doth thy wrath wax hot against thy with-mum-people, which thou hast brought forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows with great dynamic, and with a mighty hand? vaykhal mosheh penei yhvh ’elohav, vayomer lamah yhvh yekhereh ’apekha be‘amekha ’asher hozeta me’erez mizrayim bekhoakh gadol ubeyad khazaqah.
lmh yamrw mzrym lamr breh hwzyam lhrg atm bhrym wlkltm mel pny hadmh Swb mxrwn apk whnxm el hreh lemk wherefore should the mizraim-narrowsians speak, and say, for mischief did he bring them out, to slay them in the mountains, and to consume them from the face-turns of the earth? turn from thy fierce wrath, and repent of this bad against thy with-mum-people. lamah yomeru mizrayim lemor bera‘ah hozi’am laharog ’otam beharim ulekhalotam me‘al penei ha’adamah, ub mekharon ’apekha vehinakhem ‘al hara‘ah le‘amekha.
ckr labrhm lyzxq wlySral ebdyk aSr nSbet lhm bk wtdbr alhm arbh at crekm kkwkby hSmym wkl harz hcat aSr amrty atn lcrekm wnxlw lelm remember abraham-their-dick, isaac-laughter, and israel-juicy-towards, thy workers, to whom thou swarest by thine own self, and saidst unto them, i will multiply your seed as the stars of namespaces, and all this land that i have bee-spoken of will i give unto your seed, and they inherit it for ever. zekhor le’abraham leyizkhaq uleyisra’el ‘abadekha ’asher nishba‘ta lahem bakh vatedaber ’alehem ’arbeh zar‘akhem kekhokhbei hashamayim, vekhal ha’arez hazot ’asher ’amarti ’eten lezar‘akhem venakhalu le‘olam.
wynxm yhwh el hreh aSr dbr leSwt lemw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah repented of the bad which he thought to do unto his with-mum-people. vayinakhem yhvh, ‘al hara‘ah ’asher diber la‘asot le‘amo.
wypn wyrd mSh mn hhr wSny lxt hedt bydw lxt ktbym mSny ebryhm mch wmch hm ktbym and mose-extracted turned, and went down from the mount, and the two tables of the until-witness were in his hand: the tables were written on both their sides; on the one side and on the other were they written. vayifen vayered mosheh min hahar ushenei lukhot ha‘edut beyado, lukhot ketubim mishenei ‘ebrehem mizeh umizeh hem ketubim.
whlxt meSh alhym hmh whmktb mktb alhym hwa xrwt el hlxt and the tables were the work of to-no-these, and the writing was the writing of to-no-these, graven upon the tables. vehalukhot ma‘aseh ’elohim hemah, vehamikhtab mikhtab ’elohim hu kharut ‘al halukhot.
wySme yhwSe at qwl hem breh wyamr al mSh qwl mlxmh bmxnh and when joshua-jesus-save heard the noise of the with-mum-people as they shouted, he said unto mose-extracted, there is a noise of war in the camp. vayishma‘ yehoshua‘ qol ha‘am bere‘oh, vayomer ’el mosheh qol milkhamah bamakhaneh
wyamr ayn qwl enwt gbwrh wayn qwl enwt xlwSh qwl enwt anky Sme and he said, it is not the voice of them that shout for mastery, neither is it the voice of them that cry for being overcome: and the noise of them that sing do i hear. vayomer ’en qol ‘anot geburah ve’en qol ‘anot khalushah, qol ‘anot ’anokhi shomea‘.
wyhy kaSr qrb al hmxnh wyra at hegl wmxlt wyxr ap mSh wySlk mydw mydyw at hlxt wySbr atm txt hhr and it came to pass, as soon as he came inward the camp, that he saw the calf, and the dancing: and mose-extracted' nose-anger waxed hot, and he cast the tables out of his hands, and brake them beneath the mount. vayhi ka’asher qarab ’el hamakhaneh vayar ha‘egel umekholot, vayikhar ’af mosheh vayashlekh miyado miyadav halukhot vayshaber ’otam takhat hahar.
wyqx at hegl aSr eSw wySrp baS wyTxn ed aSr dq wycr el pny hmym wySq at bny ySral and he took the calf which they had made, and burnt it in the fire, and ground it to powder, and strewed it upon the from-waters, and made children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards drink of it. vayiqakh ha‘egel ’asher ‘asu vayisrof ba’esh vayitkhan ‘ad ’asher daq, vayizer ‘al penei hamayim vayashq benei yisra’el.
wyamr mSh al ahrn mh eSh lk hem hch ky hbat elyw xTah gdlh and mose-extracted said unto aaron-cabinet, what did this with-mum-people unto thee, that thou hast brought so great a miss upon them? vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon meh ‘asah lekha ha‘am hazeh, ki hebeta ‘alav khata’ah gedolah.
wyamr ahrn al yxr ap adny ath ydet at hem ky bre hwa and aaron-cabinet said, let not the nose-anger of my base-lord wax hot: thou knowest the with-mum-people, that they are set on mischief. vayomer ’aharon ’al yikhar ’af ’adoni, ’atah yada‘ta ha‘am ki bera‘ hu.
wyamrw ly eSh lnw alhym aSr ylkw lpnynw ky ch mSh hayS aSr helnw marz mzrym la ydenw mh hyh lw for they said unto me, make us to-no-these, which go before-turns us: for as for this mose-extracted, the man that brought us up out of the land of mizraim-narrows, we wot not what is become of him. vayomeru li ‘aseh lanu ’elohim ’asher yelekhu lefanenu, ki zeh mosheh ha’ish ’asher he‘elanu me’erez mizrayim lo yada‘nu meh hayah lo.
wamr lhm lmy chb htprqw wytnw ly waSlkhw baS wyza hegl hch and i said unto them, whosoever hath any gold, let them break it off. so they gave it me: then i cast it into the fire, and there came out this calf. va’omar lahem lemi zahab hitparaqu vayitenu li, va’ashlikhehu ba’esh vayezei ha‘egel hazeh.
wyra mSh at hem ky pre hwa ky preh ahrn lSmzh bqmyhm and when mose-extracted saw that the with-mum-people were naked; (for aaron-cabinet had made them naked unto their shame among their father-adversaries:) vayar mosheh ha‘am ki farua‘ hu, ki fera‘oh ’aharon leshimzah beqamehem.
wyemd mSh bSer hmxnh wyamr my lyhwh aly wyaspw alyw kl bny lwy then mose-extracted stood in the hair-gate of the camp, and said, who is on yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's side? let him come unto me. and all children-betweens of levi-join added themselves together unto him. vaya‘amod mosheh besha‘ar hamakhaneh vayomer mi yhvh ’elay, vaye’asefu ’elav kal benei levi.
wyamr lhm kh amr yhwh alhy ySral Symw ayS xrbw el yrkw ebrw wSwbw mSer lSer bmxnh whrgw ayS at axyw wayS at rehw wayS at qrbw and he said unto them, thus saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of israel-juicy-towards, put every man his sword by his side, and go in and out from hair-gate to hair-gate throughout the camp, and slay every man his brother, and every man his companion, and every man his neighbor. vayomer lahem koh ’amar yhvh ’elohei yisra’el simu ’ish kharbo ‘al yerekho, ‘ibru vashubu misha‘ar lasha‘ar bamakhaneh vehirgu ’ish ’akhiv ve’ish re‘ehu ve’ish qerobo.
wyeSw bny lwy kdbr mSh wypl mn hem bywm hhwa kSlSt alpy ayS and children-betweens of levi-join did according to the bee-word of mose-extracted: and there fell of the with-mum-people that day about three thousand men. vaya‘asu bene levi kidbar mosheh, vayipol min ha‘am bayom hahu kishloshet ’alfei ’ish.
wyamr mSh mlaw ydkm hywm lyhwh ky ayS bbnw wbaxyw wltt elykm hywm brkh for mose-extracted had said, fill yourselves today to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, even every man upon his child-between, and upon his brother; that he may bestow upon you a knee-fluffy-blessing this day. vayomer mosheh mil’u yedkhem hayom yhvh ki ’ish bibno ube’akhiv, velatet ‘alekhem hayom berakhah.
wyhy mmxrt wyamr mSh al hem atm xTatm xTah gdlh weth aelh al yhwh awly akprh bed xTatkm and it came to pass on the morrow, that mose-extracted said unto the with-mum-people, ye have missed a great miss: and now i will go up unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; peradventure i make an out-of-town-ment for your miss. vayhi mimakhorat vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘am ’atem khatatem khata’ah gedolah, ve‘atah ’e‘eleh ’el yhvh ’ulay ’akhaperah be‘ad khatatkhem.
wySb mSh al yhwh wyamr ana xTa hem hch xTah gdlh wyeSw lhm alhy chb and mose-extracted returned unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and said, oh, this with-mum-people have missed a great miss, and have made them to-no-these of gold. vayashab mosheh ’el yhvh vayomar, ’ana khata ha‘am hazeh khata’ah gedolah vaya‘asu lahem ’elohei zahab.
weth am tSa xTatm wam ayn mxny na msprk aSr ktbt yet now, if thou wilt forgive their miss--; and if not, blot me, i pray thee, out of thy book which thou hast written. ve‘atah ’im tisa khatatam, ve’im ’ayin mekheni na misifrekha ’asher katabeta.
wyamr yhwh al mSh my aSr xTa ly amxnw mspry and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, whosoever hath missed against me, him will i blot out of my book. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh, mi ’asher khata li ’emkhenu misifri.
weth lk nxh at hem al aSr dbrty lk hnh mlaky ylk lpnyk wbywm pqdy wpqdty elyhm xTatm therefore now go, lead the with-mum-people unto the place of which i have bee-spoken unto thee: behold, mine angel-messanger go before-turns thee: nevertheless in the day when i visit i will visit their miss upon them. ve‘atah lekh nekheh ha‘am ’el ’asher dibarti lakh hineh mal’akhi yelekh lefanekha, ubeyom paqedi ufaqadti ‘alehem khatatam.
wygp yhwh at hem el aSr eSw at hegl aSr eSh ahrn and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah plagued the with-mum-people, because they made the calf, which aaron-cabinet made. vayigof yhvh ha‘am, ‘al ’asher ‘asu ha‘egel ’asher ‘asah ’aharon.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lk elh mch ath whem aSr helyt marz mzrym al harz aSr nSbety labrhm lyzxq wlyeqb lamr lcrek atnnh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, depart, and go up hence, thou and the with-mum-people which thou hast brought up out of the land of mizraim-narrows, unto the land which i sware unto abraham-their-dick, to isaac-laughter, and to jacob-backstreet, saying, unto thy seed will i give it: vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lekh ‘aleh mizeh ’atah veha‘am ’asher he‘elita me’erez mizrayim, ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob lemor lezar‘akha ’etenenah.
wSlxty lpnyk mlak wgrSty at hkneny hamry whxty whprcy hxwy whybwsy and i will send an angel-messanger before-turns thee; and i will drive out the canaan-mobile-tradeite, the amorite-talker, and the hittite-cut, and the perizzite-unwalled, the hivite-experience, and the jebusite-trampler: veshalakhti lefanekha mal’akh, vegerashti hakena‘ani ha’emori vehakhiti vehaperizi hakhivi vehaybusi.
al arz cbt xlb wdbS ky la aelh bqrbk ky em qSh erp ath pn aklk bdrk unto a land flowing with milk and honey: for i will not go up in the inward of thee; for thou art a stiffnecked with-mum-people: lest i consume thee in the way. ’el ’erez zabat khalab udebash, ki lo ’e‘eleh beqirbekha ki ‘am qesheh ‘oref ’atah pen ’akhelkha badarekh.
wySme hem at hdbr hre hch wytablw wla Stw ayS edyw elyw and when the with-mum-people heard these bad tidings, they mourned: and no man did put on him his ornaments. vayishma‘ ha‘am hadabar hara‘ hazeh vayit’abalu, velo shatu ’ish ‘edyo ‘alav.
wyamr yhwh al mSh amr al bny ySral atm em qSh erp rge axd aelh bqrbk wklytyk weth hwrd edyk melyk wadeh mh aeSh lk for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had said unto mose-extracted, say unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, ye are a stiffnecked with-mum-people: i will come up into the qrbmidst of thee in a moment, and consume thee: therefore now put off thy ornaments from thee, that i may hand-know what to do unto thee. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el bene yisra’el ’atem ‘am qesheh ‘oref rega‘ ’ekhad ’e‘eleh beqirbekha vekhilitikha, ve‘atah hored ‘edyekha me‘alekha ve’ede‘ah mah ’e‘eseh lakh.

wmSh yqx at hahl wnTh lw mxwz lmxnh hrxq mn hmxnh wqra lw ahl mwed whyh kl mbqS yhwh yza al ahl mwed aSr mxwz lmxnh and mose-extracted took the dwelling, and pitched it without the camp, afar off from the camp, and called it the tent of until-conception. and it came to pass, that every one which sought yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah went out unto the tent of until-conception, which was without the camp. umosheh yiqakh ha’ohel venatah lo mikhuz lamakhaneh harkheq min hamakhaneh veqara lo ’ohel mo‘ed, vehayah kal mebaqesh yhvh yezei ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ’asher mikhuz lamakhaneh.

wyamr mSh al yhwh rah ath amr aly hel at hem hch wath la hwdetny at aSr tSlx emy wath amrt ydetyk bSm wgm mzat xn beyny and mose-extracted said unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, see, thou sayest unto me, bring up this with-mum-people: and thou hast not let me hand-know whom thou wilt send with me. yet thou hast said, i hand-know thee by name, and thou hast also found attractiveness in my sight. vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh re’eh ’atah ’omer ’elay ha‘al ha‘am hazeh ve’atah lo hoda‘tani ’asher tishlakh ‘imi, ve’atah ’amarta yeda‘tikha beshem vegam mazata khen be‘enay.

Smr lk at aSr anky mzwk hywm hnny grS mpnyk at hamry whkneny whxty whprcy whxwy whybwsy observe thou that which i direct thee this day: behold, i drive out before-turns thee the amorite-talker, and the canaan-mobile-tradeite, and the hittite-cut, and the perizzite-unwalled, and the hivite-experience, and the jebusite-trampler. shemar lekha ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, hini goresh mipanekha ha’emori vehakena‘ani vehakhiti vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi.
hSmr lk pn tkrt bryt lywSb harz aSr ath ba elyh pn yhyh lmwqS bqrbk take heed to thyself, lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land whither thou goest, lest it be for a snare in the midst of thee: hishamer lekha pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha’arez ’asher ’atah ba pen yihyeh lemoqesh beqirbekha.
ky at mcbxtm ttzwn wat mzbtm tSbrwn wat aSryw tkrtwn and ye destroy their butcher-kitchens, break their images, and cut down their groves: ki mizbekhotam titozun ve’et mazebotam teshaberun, ve’et ’asherav tikhrotun.
ky la tStxwh lal axr ky yhwh qna Smw al qna hwa for thou partake-shatakh no other to-no-these: for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, whose name is jealous, is a jealous to-no-these: ki lo tishtakhaveh le’el ’akher, ki yhvh qana shemo ’el qana hu.
pn tkrt bryt lywSb harz wcnw axry alhyhm wcbxw lalhyhm wqra lk waklt mcbxw lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land, and they go a whoring after their to-no-these, and do butcher unto their to-no-these, and one call thee, and thou eat of his butcher; pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha’arez, vezanu ’akharei ’elohehem vezabekhu lelohehem veqara lekha ve’akhalta mizibkho.

at xg hmzwt tSmr Sbet ymym takl mzwt aSr zwytk lmwed xdS habyb ky bxdS habyb yzat mmzrym the until-conception of lit-mazat thou keep. seven days thou eat lit-mazat, as i direct thee, in the time of the month abib-spring: for in the month abib-spring thou camest out from mizraim-narrows. khag hamazot tishmor shib‘at yamim tokhal mazot ’asher zivitikha lemo‘ed khodesh ha’abib, ki bekhodesh ha’abib yazata mimizrayim.

wpTr xmwr tpdh bSh wam la tpdh werptw kl bkwr bnyk tpdh wla yraw pny ryqm and the firstling of an ass thou redeem with a lamb: and if thou redeem him not, then thou break his neck. all the firstborn of thy children-betweens thou redeem. and none appear before-turns me empty. ufeter khamor tifdeh beseh ve’im lo tifdeh va‘arafto, kol bekhor banekha tifdeh velo yera’u fanay reqam.

wyamr yhwh al mSh ktb lk at hdbrym halh ky el py hdbrym halh krty atk bryt wat ySral and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, write thou these bee-words: for after the tenor of these bee-words i have made a covenant with thee and with israel-juicy-towards. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ketab lekha hadebarim ha’eleh, ki ‘al pi hadebarim ha’eleh karati ’itekha berit ve’et yisra’el.
wyhy Sm em yhwh arbeym ywm warbeym lylh lxm la akl wmym la Sth wyktb el hlxt at dbry hbryt eSrt hdbrym and he was there with yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah forty days and forty nights; he did neither eat bread, nor drink from-waters. and he wrote upon the tables the bee-words of the covenant, the ten directives. vayhi sham ‘im yhvh ’arba‘im yom ve’arba‘im laylah lekhem lo ’akhal umayim lo shatah, vayikhtob ‘al halukhot dibrei haberit ‘aseret hadebarim.
wyhy brdt mSh mhr syny wSny lxt hedt byd mSh brdtw mn hhr wmSh la yde ky qrn ewr pnyw bdbrw atw and it came to pass, when mose-extracted came down from mount )sinai-bush-(proto with the two tables of until-witness in mose-extracted' hand, when he came down from the mount, that mose-extracted wist not that the light-skin of his face-turns shone while he talked with him. vayhi beredet mosheh mehar sinay ushenei lukhot ha‘edut beyad mosheh beridto min hahar, umosheh lo yada‘ ki qaran ‘or panav bedabero ’ito.

waxry kn ngSw kl bny ySral wyzwm at kl aSr dbr yhwh atw bhr syny and afterward all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards came nigh: and he gave them in directive all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had bee-spoken with him in mount )sinai-bush-(proto. ve’akhare khen nigeshu kal benei yisra’el, vayzavem kal ’asher diber yhvh ’ito behar sinay.
wykl mSh mdbr atm wytn el pnyw mswh and till mose-extracted had done speaking with them, he put a breaker on his face-turns. vaykhal mosheh midaber ’itam, vayiten ‘al panav masveh.
wbba mSh lpny yhwh ldbr atw ysyr at hmswh ed zatw wyza wdbr al bny ySral at aSr yzwh and when mose-extracted went in before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to speak with him, he took the breaker off, until he came out. and he came out, and spake unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards that which he was direct. ubebo mosheh lifnei yhvh ledaber ’ito yasir hamasveh ‘ad zeto, veyaza vediber ’el benei yisra’el ’asher yezuveh.
wraw bny ySral at pny mSh ky qrn ewr pny mSh whSyb mSh at hmswh el pnyw ed baw ldbr atw and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards saw the face-turns of mose-extracted, that the light-skin of mose-extracted' face-turns shone: and mose-extracted put the breaker upon his face-turns again, until he went in to speak with him. vera’u bene yisra’el penei mosheh ki qaran ‘or penei mosheh, veheshib mosheh hamasveh ‘al panav ‘ad bo’o ledaber ’ito.
wyqhl mSh at kl edt bny ySral wyamr alhm alh hdbrym aSr zwh yhwh leSt atm and mose-extracted added all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards together, and said unto them, these are the bee-words which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct, that ye should do them. vayaqhel mosheh kal ‘adat benei yisra’el vayomer ’alehem, ’eleh hadebarim ’asher zivah yhvh la‘asot.
SSt ymym teSh mlakh wbywm hSbyey yhyh lkm qdS Sbt Sbtwn lyhwh kl heSh bw mlakh ywmt six days work be done, and on the seventh day there be to you an dedicated-finished day, a sabbath-seven of rest to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: whosoever doeth work therein be put to death. sheshet yamim te‘aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi‘i yihyeh lakhem qodesh shabat shabaton yhvh, kal ha‘oseh bo melakhah yumat.
la tberw aS bkl mSbtykm bywm hSbt ye kindle no fire throughout your habitations upon the sabbath-seven day. lo teba‘aru ’esh bekhol moshebotekhem, beyom hashabat.
wyamr mSh al kl edt bny ySral lamr ch hdbr aSr zwh yhwh lamr and mose-extracted spake unto all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, this is the thing which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct, saying, vayomer mosheh ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el lemor, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh lemor.
qxw matkm trwmh lyhwh kl ndyb lbw ybyah at trwmt yhwh chb wksp wnxSt take ye from inward you an inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: whosoever is of a willing heart, let him bring it, an inward of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; gold, and silver, and brass, qekhu me’itekhem terumah yhvh kol nedib libo yebi’eha terumat yhvh, zahab vakhesef unekhoshet.
wtklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS wecym and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine linen, and intense-goats' gate-hair, utekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh ve‘izim.
wert aylm madmym wert txSym wezy STym and ram-voicelesss' light-skins from red-earth-adam, and takhash-feel light-skins, and shitim-sailing wood, ve‘orot ’elim me’adamim ve‘orot tekhashim va‘azei sitim
wSmn lmawr wbSmym lSmn hmSxh wlqTrt hsmym and name-from-oil for the light, and scents for lubeing name-from-oil, and for the smoke drug, veshemen lama’or, ubesamim leshemen hamishkhah veliqtoret hasamim.
wabny Shm wabny mlaym lapwd wlxSn and onyx-that-they stones, and stones to be set for the ephod-cash-in, and for the khashan-bronze-tooth. ve’abne shoham ve’abnei milu’im, la’efod velakhoshen.
wkl xkm lb bkm ybaw wyeSw at kl aSr zwh yhwh and every wise hearted among you come, and make all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct; vekhal khakham leb bakhem, yabo’u veya‘asu kal ’asher zivah yhvh.
at hmSkn at ahlw wat mkshw at qrsyw wat qrSyw at bryxw at emdyw wat adnyw the dwelling, his tent, and his covering, his taches, and his boards, his bars, his column-stands, and his sockets, hamishkan ’aholo ve’et mikhsehu, qerasav ve’et qerashav berikhav ‘amudav ve’et ’adanav.
at harn wat bdyw at hkprt wat prkt hmsk the cabinet, and the canvas thereof, with the out-of-townment, and breaker-screen, ha’aron ve’et badav hakaporet, ve’et parokhet hamasakh.
at hSlxn wat bdyw wat kl klyw wat lxm hpnym the send-table, and his canvas, and all his tools, and the within-turns-bread, hashulkhan ve’et badav ve’et kal kelav, ve’et lekhem hapanim.
wat mnrt hmawr wat klyh wat nrtyh wat Smn hmawr the light-stream-candle also for the light, and his all-tool, and his lamps, with the name-from-oil for the light, ve’et menorat hama’or ve’et keleha ve’et neroteha, ve’et shemen hama’or.
wat mcbx hqTrt wat bdyw wat Smn hmSxh wat qTrt hsmym wat msk hptx lptx hmSkn and the incense butcher-kitchen, and his canvas, and the lubeing name-from-oil, and the smoke drug, and the hanging for the opening at the entering in of the dwelling, ve’et mizbakh haqetoret ve’et badav ve’et shemen hamishkhah ve’et qetoret hasamim, ve’et masakh hapetakh lefetakh hamishkan.
at mcbx helh wat mkbr hnxSt aSr lw at bdyw wat kl klyw at hkyr wat knw the butcher-kitchen of on-up, with his brazen place-of-already-mikhbar, his canvas, and all his tools, the bulging and his base, mizbakh ha‘olah ve’et mikhbar hanekhoshet ’asher lo badav ve’et kal kelav, hakiyor ve’et kano.
at qley hxzr at emdyw wat adnyh wat msk Ser hxzr the hangings of the court, his column-stands, and their sockets, and the hanging for the opening of the court, qal‘ei hekhazer ‘amudav ve’et ’adaneha, ve’et masakh sha‘ar hekhazer.
at ytdt hmSkn wat ytdt hxzr wat mytryhm the pins of the dwelling, and the pins of the court, and their cords, yitdot hamishkan ve’et yitdot hekhazer ve’et meterehem.
at bgdy hSrd lSrt bqdS at bgdy hqdS lahrn hkhn wat bgdy bnyw lkhn the cloths of work, to do work in the dedicated-finished place, the dedicated-finished garments for aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server, and the garments of his children-betweens, to dimmer-server. bigdei haserad lesharet baqodesh, bigdei haqodesh le’aharon hakohen ve’et bigdei banav lekhahen.
wyzaw kl edt bny ySral mlpny mSh and all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards departed from the presence of mose-extracted. vayeze’u kal ‘adat bene yisra’el milifnei mosheh.
wybaw kl ayS aSr nSaw lbw wkl aSr ndbh rwxw atw hbyaw at trwmt yhwh lmlakt ahl mwed wlkl ebdtw wlbgdy hqdS and they came, every one whose heart inwarded him up, and every one whom his breath-spirit made willing, and they brought yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's plateau-contributeing to the work of the tent of until-conception, and for all his work, and for the dedicated-finished garments. vayabo’u kal ’ish ’asher nesa’o libo, vekhol ’asher nadebah rukho hebi’u terumat yhvh limlekhet ’ohel mo‘ed ulekhal ‘abodato ulebigdei haqodesh.
wybaw hanSym el hnSym kl ndyb lb hbyaw xx wncm wTbet wkwmc kl kly chb wkl ayS aSr hnyp tnwpt chb lyhwh and they came, both men and women, as many as were willing hearted, and brought bracelets, and earrings, and rings, and tablets, all jewels of gold: and every man that sieved a sieve of gold unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayabo’u ha’anashim ‘al hanashim, kol nedib leb hebi’u khakh vanezem vetaba‘at vekhumaz kal keli zahab vekhal ’ish ’asher henif tenufat zahab yhvh.
wkl ayS aSr nmza atw tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS wecym wert aylm madmym wert txSym hbyaw and every man, with whom was found blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine linen, and intense-goats' gate-hair, and red light-skins of ram-voicelesss, and takhash-feel light-skins, brought them. vekhal ’ish ’asher nimza ’ito tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh ve‘izim, ve‘orot ’elim me’adamim ve‘orot tekhashim hebi’u.
kl mrym trwmt ksp wnxSt hbyaw at trwmt yhwh wkl aSr nmza atw ezy STym lkl mlakt hebdh hbyaw every one that did plateau-contribute an plateau-contributeing of silver and brass brought yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's plateau-contributeing: and every man, with whom was found shitim-sailing wood for any work of the work, brought it. kal merim terumat kesef unekhoshet hebi’u terumat yhvh, vekhol ’asher nimza ’ito ‘azei shitim lekhal melekhet ha‘abodah hebi’u.
wkl aSh xkmt lb bydyh Tww wybyaw mTwh at htklt wat hargmn at twlet hSny wat hSS and all the women that were wise hearted did spin with their hands, and brought that which they had spun, both of blue, and of purple, and of two caterpillars, and six. vekhal ’ishah khakhmat leb beyadeha tavu, vayabi’u matveh hatekhelet ve’et ha’argaman tola‘at hashani ve’et hashesh.
wkl hnSym aSr nSa lbn atnh bxkmh Tww at hecym and all the women whose heart stirred them up in wisdom spun intense-goats' gate-hair. vekhal hanashim ’asher nasa liban bekhakhemah, tavu ha‘izim.
whnSam hbyaw at abny hShm wat abny hmlaym lapwd wlxSn and the rulers brought onyx-that-they stones, and stones to be set, for the ephod-cash-in, and for the khashan-bronze-tooth; vehanesi’im hebi’u ’abnei hashoham ve’et ’abnei hamilu’im, la’efod velakhoshen.
wat hbSm wat hSmn lmawr wlSmn hmSxh wlqTrt hsmym and spice, and name-from-oil for the light, and for the lubeing name-from-oil, and for the smoke drug. ve’et habosem ve’et hashamen, lema’or uleshemen hamishkhah veliqtoret hasamim.
kl ayS waSh aSr ndb lbm atm lhbya lkl hmlakh aSr zwh yhwh leSwt byd mSh hbyaw bny ySral ndbh lyhwh children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards brought a willing inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, every man and woman, whose heart made them willing to bring for all manner of work, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had direct to be made by the hand of mose-extracted. kal ’ish ve’ishah ’asher nadab libam lehabi lekhal hamelakhah ’asher zivah yhvh la‘asot beyad mosheh, hebi’u bene yisra’el nedabah yhvh.
wyamr mSh al bny ySral raw qra yhwh bSm bzlal bn awry bn xwr lmTh yhwdh and mose-extracted said unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, see, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath called by name bezaleel-onion-towards child-between of hur-small-place-prince, child-between of hur-small-place-prince, of the branch of judah-know; vayomer mosheh ’el benei yisra’el re’u qara yhvh beshem, bezal’el ben ’uri ben khur lemateh yehudah.
wymla atw rwx alhym bxkmh btbwnh wbdet wbkl mlakh and he hath filled him with breath-spirit of to-no-these, in wisdom, in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of message-craft; vaymalei ’oto ruakh ’elohim, bekhakhemah bitbunah ubeda‘at ubekhal melakhah.
wlxSb mxSbt leSt bchb wbksp wbnxSt and to devise curious works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass, velakhshob makhashabot, la‘asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet.
wbxrSt abn lmlat wbxrSt ez leSwt bkl mlakt mxSbt and in the cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of wood, to make any manner of cunning work. ubakharoshet ’eben lemalot ubakharoshet ‘ez, la‘asot bekhal melekhet makhashabet.
wlhwrt ntn blbw hwa wahlyab bn axysmk lmTh dn and he hath put in his heart that he may teach, both he, and aholiab-my-tent-dad, child-between of ahisamakh-my-brother-support, of the branch of dan-discuss. ulehorot natan belibo, hu ve’aholi’ab ben ’akhisamakh lemateh dan.
mla atm xkmt lb leSwt kl mlakt xrS wxSb wrqm btklt wbargmn btwlet hSny wbSS warg eSy kl mlakh wxSby mxSbt them hath he filled with wisdom of heart, to work all manner of work, of the engraver, and of the cunning workman, and of the embroiderer, in blue, and in purple, in two caterpillars, and in fine linen, and of the weaver, even of them that do any work, and of those that devise cunning work. milei ’otam khakhemat leb la‘asot kal melekhet kharash vekhosheb veroqem batekhelet uba’argaman betola‘at hashani ubashesh ve’oreg, ‘osei kal melakhah vekhoshebei makhashabot.
weSh bzlal wahlyab wkl ayS xkm lb aSr ntn yhwh xkmh wtbwnh bhmh ldet leSt at kl mlakt ebdt hqdS lkl aSr zwh yhwh then wrought bezaleel-onion-towards and aholiab-my-tent-dad, and every wise hearted man, in whom yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah put wisdom and understanding to hand-know how to work all manner of work for the work of the dedicated-finished, according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had direct. ve‘asah bezal’el ve’aholi’ab vekhol ’ish khakham leb ’asher natan yhvh khakhmah utebunah bahemah lada‘at la‘asot kal melekhet ‘abodat haqodesh, lekhol ’asher zivah yhvh.
wyqra mSh al bzlal wal ahlyab wal kl ayS xkm lb aSr ntn yhwh xkmh blbw kl aSr nSaw lbw lqrbh al hmlakh leSt ath and mose-extracted called bezaleel-onion-towards and aholiab-my-tent-dad, and every wise hearted man, in whose heart yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had put wisdom, even every one whose heart inwarded him up to come unto the work to do it: vayiqra mosheh ’el bezal’el ve’el ’aholi’ab ve’el kal ’ish khakham leb ’asher natan yhvh khakhmah belibo, kol ’asher nesa’o libo leqarebah ’el hamelakhah la‘asot.
wyqxw mlpny mSh at kl htrwmh aSr hbyaw bny ySral lmlakt ebdt hqdS leSt ath whm hbyaw alyw ewd ndbh bbqr bbqr and they received of mose-extracted all the inward, which children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards had brought for the work of the work of the dedicated-finished, to make it withal. and they brought yet unto him free inwards every morning. vayiqkhu milifnei mosheh kal haterumah ’asher hebi’u benei yisra’el limlekhet ‘abodat haqodesh la‘asot. vehem hebi’u ’elav ‘od nedabah baboqer baboqer.
wybaw kl hxkmym heSym at kl mlakt hqdS ayS ayS mmlaktw aSr hmh eSym and all the wise men, that wrought all the work of the dedicated-finished, came every man from his work which they made; vayabo’u kal hakhakhamim ha‘osim kal melekhet haqodesh, ’ish ’ish mimelakhto ’asher hemah ‘osim.
wyamrw al mSh lamr mrbym hem lhbya mdy hebdh lmlakh aSr zwh yhwh leSt ath and they spake unto mose-extracted, saying, the with-mum-people bring much more than enough for the work of the work, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct to make. vayomeru ’el mosheh lemor marbim ha‘am lehabi, midei ha‘abodah lamelakhah ’asher zivah yhvh la‘asot.
wyzw mSh wyebyrw qwl bmxnh lamr ayS waSh al yeSw ewd mlakh ltrwmt hqdS wykla hem mhbya and mose-extracted gave directive, and they caused it to be proclaimed throughout the camp, saying, let neither man nor woman make any more work for the inward of the dedicated-finished. so the with-mum-people were restrained from bringing. vayzav mosheh vaya‘abiru qol bamakhaneh lemor ’ish ve’ishah ’al ya‘asu ‘od melakhah litrumat haqodesh, vayikalei ha‘am mehabi.
whmlakh hyth dym lkl hmlakh leSwt ath whwtr for the stuff they had was sufficient for all the work to make it, and too much. vehamelakhah hayetah dayam lekhal hamelakhah la‘asot vehoter.
wyeSw kl xkm lb beSy hmlakh at hmSkn eSr yryet SS mScr wtklt wargmn wtwlet Sny krbym meSh xSb eSh atm and every wise hearted man among them that wrought the work of the dwelling made ten curtains six, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars: with inward-cherubim of cunning work made he them. vaya‘asu khal khakham leb be‘osei hamelakhah ’et hamishkan ‘eser yeri‘ot, shesh mashezar utekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani kerubim ma‘aseh khosheb ‘asah ’otam.
ark hyryeh haxt Smnh weSrym bamh wrxb arbe bamh hyryeh haxt mdh axt lkl hyryet the length of one curtain was double-ten-twenty and eight cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: the curtains were all of one size. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat shemoneh ve‘esrim ba’amah verokhab ’arba‘ ba’amah hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat lekhal hayri‘ot.
wyxbr at xmS hyryet axt al axt wxmS yryet xbr axt al axt and he coupled the five curtains one unto another: and the other five curtains he coupled one unto another. vaykhaber khamesh hayri‘ot ’akhat ’el ’ekhat, vekhamesh yeri‘ot khibar ’akhat ’el ’ekhat.
wyeS llat tklt el Spt hyryeh haxt mqzh bmxbrt kn eSh bSpt hyryeh hqyzwnh bmxbrt hSnyt and he made loops of blue on the edge of one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling: likewise he made in the uttermost side of another curtain, in the coupling of the second. vaya‘as lul’ot tekhelet ‘al sefat hayri‘ah ha’ekhat miqazah bamakhbaret, ken ‘asah bisfat hayri‘ah haqizonah bamakhberet hashenit.
xmSym llat eSh byryeh haxt wxmSym llat eSh bqzh hyryeh aSr bmxbrt hSnyt mqbylt hllat axt al axt fifty loops made he in one curtain, and fifty loops made he in the edge of the curtain which was in the coupling of the second: the loops held one curtain to another. khamishim lula’ot ‘asah bayri‘ah ha’ekhat vakhamishim lula’ot ‘asah biqzeh hayri‘ah ’asher bamakhberet hashenit, maqbilot halula’ot ’akhat ’el ’ekhat.
wyeS xmSym qrsy chb wyxbr at hyret axt al axt bqrsym wyhy hmSkn axd and he made fifty taches of gold, and coupled the curtains one unto another with the taches: so it became one dwelling. vaya‘as khamishim qarsei zahab, vaykhaber hayri‘ot ’akhat ’el ’akhat baqerasim vayhi hamishkan ’ekhad.
wyeS yryet ecym lahl el hmSkn eSty eSrh yryet eSh atm and he made curtains of intense-goats' gate-hair for the tent over the dwelling: eleven curtains he made them. vaya‘as yeri‘ot ‘izim le’ohel ‘al hamishkan, ‘ashte ‘esreh yeri‘ot ‘asah.
ark hyryeh haxt SlSym bamh warbe amwt rxb hyryeh haxt mdh axt leSty eSrh yryet the length of one curtain was thirty cubits, and four cubits was the breadth of one curtain: the eleven curtains were of one size. ’orekh hayri‘ah ha’akhat sheloshim ba’amah ve’arba‘ ’amot rokhab hayri‘ah ha’ekhat, midah ’akhat le‘ashtei ‘esreh yeri‘ot.
wyxbr at xmS hyryet lbd wat SS hyryet lbd and he coupled five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves. vaykhaber khamesh hayri‘ot lebad, ve’et shesh hayri‘ot lebad.
wyeS llat xmSym el Spt hyryeh hqyznh bmxbrt wxmSym llat eSh el Spt hyryeh hxbrt hSnyt and he made fifty loops upon the uttermost edge of the curtain in the coupling, and fifty loops made he upon the edge of the curtain which coupleth the second. vaya‘as lula’ot khamishim ‘al sefat hayri‘ah haqizonah bamakhbaret, vakhamishim lula’ot ‘asah ‘al sefat hayri‘ah hakhoberet hashenit.
wyeS qrsy nxSt xmSym lxbr at hahl lhyt axd and he made fifty taches of brass to couple the tent together, that it might be one. vaya‘as qarsei nekhoshet khamishim, lekhaber ha’ohel lihyot ’ekhad.
wyeS mksh lahl ert alym madmym wmksh ert txSym mlmelh and he made a covering for the tent of ram-voicelesss' light-skins from red-earth-adam, and a covering of takhash-feel light-skins above that. vaya‘as mikhseh la’ohel ‘orot ’elim me’adamim, umikhseh ‘orot tekhashim milma‘elah.
wyeS at hqrSym lmSkn ezy STym emdym and he made boards for the dwelling of shitim-sailing wood, standing up. vaya‘as haqerashim lamishkan, ‘azei shitim ‘omedim.
eSr amt ark hqrS wamh wxzy hamh rxb hqrS haxd the length of a board was ten cubits, and the breadth of a board one cubit and a half. ‘eser ’amot ’orekh haqaresh, ve’amah vakhazi ha’amah rokhab haqeresh ha’ekhad.
Sty ydt lqrS haxd mSlbt axt al axt kn eSh lkl qrSy hmSkn one board had two tenons, equally distant one from another: thus did he make for all the boards of the dwelling. shetei yadot laqeresh ha’ekhad meshulabot ’akhat ’el ’ekhat, ken ‘asah lekhol qarshei hamishkan.
wyeS at hqrSym lmSkn eSrym qrSym lpat ngb tymnh and he made boards for the dwelling; double-ten-twenty boards for the south-dry side south-dryward: vaya‘as haqerashim lamishkan, ‘esrim qerashim lif’at negeb temanah.
warbeym adny ksp eSh txt eSrym hqrSym Sny adnym txt hqrS haxd lSty ydtyw wSny adnym txt hqrS haxd lSty ydtyw and forty sockets of silver he made under the double-ten-twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons. ve’arba‘im ’adne khesef ‘asah takhat ‘esrim haqerashim, shenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad lishtei yedotav ushenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad lishtei yedotav.
wlzle hmSkn hSnyt lpat zpwn eSh eSrym qrSym and for the other side of the dwelling, which is toward the hide-north corner, he made double-ten-twenty boards, ulezela‘ hamishkan hashenit lif’at zafon, ‘asah ‘esrim qerashim.
warbeym adnyhm ksp Sny adnym txt hqrS haxd wSny adnym txt hqrS haxd and their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board. ve’arba‘im ’adnehem kasef, shenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad ushenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad.
wlyrkty hmSkn ymh eSh SSh qrSym and for the sides of the dwelling sea-westward he made six boards. uleyarketei hamishkan yamah, ‘asah shishah qerashim.
wSny qrSym eSh lmqzet hmSkn byrktym and two boards made he for the corners of the dwelling in the two sides. ushenei qerashim ‘asah limquz‘ot hamishkan, bayarkhatayim.
whyw twamm mlmTh wyxdw yhyw tmym al raSw al hTbet haxt kn eSh lSnyhm lSny hmqzet and they were coupled beneath, and coupled together at the head thereof, to one ring: thus he did to both of them in both the corners. vehayu to’amim milematah veyakhdav tamim ’el rosho ’el hataba‘at ha’ekhat, ken ‘asah lishnehem lishnei hamiqzo‘ot.
whyw Smnh qrSym wadnyhm ksp SSh eSr adnym Sny adnym Sny adnym txt hqrS haxd and there were eight boards; and their sockets were sixteen sockets of silver, under every board two sockets. vehayu shemonah qerashim ve’adnehem kesef shishah ‘asar ’adanim, shenei ’adanim shenei ’adanim takhat haqeresh ha’ekhad.
wyeS bryxy ezy STym xmSh lqrSy zle hmSkn haxt and he made bars of shitim-sailing wood; five for the boards of the one side of the dwelling, vaya‘as berikhei ‘azei shitim, khamishah leqarshei zela‘ hamishkan ha’ekhat.
wxmSh bryxm lqrSy zle hmSkn hSnyt wxmSh bryxm lqrSy hmSkn lyrktym ymh and five bars for the boards of the other side of the dwelling, and five bars for the boards of the dwelling for the sides sea-westward. vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela‘ hamishkan hashenit, vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei hamishkan layarkhatayim yamah.
wyeS at hbryx htykn lbrx btwk hqrSym mn hqzh al hqzh and he made the middle bar to shoot through the boards from the one end to the other. vaya‘as haberiakh hatikhon, libroakh betokh haqerashim min haqazeh ’el haqazeh.
wat hqrSym zph chb wat Tbetm eSh chb btym lbryxm wyzp at hbryxm chb and he overlaid the boards with gold, and made their rings of gold to be places for the bars, and overlaid the bars with gold. ve’et haqerashim zipah zahab ve’et tabe‘otam ‘asah zahab batim laberikhim, vayzaf haberikhim zahab.
wyeS at hprkt tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS mScr meSh xSb eSh ath krbym and he made a breaker of blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen: with inward-cherubim made he it of cunning work. vaya‘as haparokhet tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar, ma‘aseh khosheb ‘asah ’otah kerubim.

watw ahlyab bn axysmk lmTh dn xrS wxSb wrqm btklt wbargmn wbtwlet hSny wbSS and with him was aholiab-my-tent-dad, child-between of ahisamakh-my-brother-support, of the branch of dan-discuss, an engraver, and a cunning workman, and an embroiderer in blue, and in purple, and in two caterpillars, and fine linen. ve’ito ’aholi’ab ben ’akhisamakh lemateh dan kharash vekhosheb, veroqem batekhelet uba’argaman ubetola‘at hashani ubashesh.

wksp pqwdy hedh mat kkr walp wSbe mawt wxmSh wSbeym Sql bSql hqdS and the silver of them that were numbered of the until-witness was an hundred talents, and a thousand seven hundred and threescore and fifteen shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished: vekhesef pequdei ha‘edah me’at kikar, ve’elef usheba‘ me’ot vakhamishah veshib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh.
bqe lglglt mxzyt hSql bSql hqdS lkl hebr el hpqdym mbn eSrym Snh wmelh lSS mawt alp wSlSt alpym wxmS mawt wxmSym a split-bekah for every man, that is, half a shekel-light, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished, for every one that went to be numbered, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, for six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty men. beqa‘ lagulgolet makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh, lekhol ha‘ober ‘al hapequdim miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah leshesh me’ot ’elef usheloshet ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot vakhamishim.
