wyrqew at pxy hchb wqzz ptylm leSwt btwk htklt wbtwk hargmn wbtwk twlet hSny wbtwk hSS meSh xSb and they did beat the gold into thin plates, and cut it into wires, to work it in the blue, and in the purple, and in the two caterpillars, and in the fine linen, with cunning work. vayraqe‘u ’et pakhei hazahab veqizez petilim la‘asot betokh hatekhelet ubetokh ha’argaman ubetokh tola‘at hashani ubetokh hashesh, ma‘aseh khosheb.
ktpt eSw lw xbrt el Sny qzwwtw qzwtyw xbr they made shoulderpieces for it, to couple it together: by the two edges was it coupled together. ketefot ‘asu lo khoberot, ‘al shenei qezotav khubar.
wxSb apdtw aSr elyw mmnw hwa kmeShw chb tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS mScr kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and the accounting of his ephod-cash-in, that was upon it, was of the same, according to the work thereof; of gold, blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vekhesheb ’afudato ’asher ‘alav mimenu hu kema‘asehu zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyeSw at abny hShm msbt mSbzt chb mptxt ptwxy xwtm el Smwt bny ySral and they wrought onyx-that-they stones inclosed in ouches of gold, graven, as signets are graven, with the names of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vaya‘asu ’abnei hashoham musabot mishbezot zahab, mefutakhot pitukhei khotam ‘al shemot benei yisra’el.
wySm atm el ktpt hapd abny ckrwn lbny ySral kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he put them on the shoulders of the ephod-cash-in, that they should be stones for a memorial to children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayasem ’otam ‘al kitfot ha’efod ’abnei zikaron libnei yisra’el, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyeS at hxSn meSh xSb kmeSh apd chb tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny wSS mScr and he made the khashan-bronze-tooth of cunning work, like the work of the ephod-cash-in; of gold, blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and fine twined linen. vaya‘as hakhoshen ma‘aseh khosheb kema‘aseh ’efod, zahab tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani veshesh mashezar.
rbwe hyh kpwl eSw at hxSn crt arkw wcrt rxbw kpwl it was foursquare; they made the khashan-bronze-tooth double: a span was the length thereof, and a span the breadth thereof, being doubled. rabua‘ hayah kaful ‘asu hakhoshen, zeret ’areko vezeret rakhebo kaful.
wymlaw bw arbeh Twry abn Twr adm pTdh wbrqt hTwr haxd and they set in it four rows of stones: the first row was a red-column-sardius, a topaz, and a temple-carbuncle: this was the first row. vaymal’u bo ’arba‘ah turei ’aben, tur ’odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha’ekhad.
whTwr hSny npk spyr wyhlm and the second row, an emerald, a countable-saphire, and a shock-diamond. vehatur hasheni, nofekh sapir veyahalom.
whTwr hSlySy lSm Sbw waxlmh and the third row, a put-there-opal, an sit-agate, and an amethyst-dream. vehatur hashelishi, leshem shebo ve’akhlamah.
whTwr hrbyey trSyS Shm wySph mwsbt mSbzwt chb bmlatm and the fourth row, a tarshish-chrysolite-aquamarine, an onyx-that-they, and a jasper-smooth: they were inclosed in ouches of gold in their inclosings. vehatur harebi‘i tarshish shoham veyashefeh, musabot mishbezot zahab bemilu’otam.
whabnym el Smt bny ySral hnh Stym eSrh el Smtm ptwxy xtm ayS el Smw lSnym eSr SbT and the stones were according to the names of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, twelve, according to their names, like the engravings of a signet, every one with his name, according to the twelve shfttribes. veha’abanim ‘al shemot bene yisra’el henah shetem ‘esreh ‘al shemotam, pitukhei khotam ’ish ‘al shemo lishnem ‘asar shabet.
wyeSw el hxSn SrSrt gblt meSh ebt chb Thwr and they made upon the khashan-bronze-tooth chains at the ends, of wreathed work of pure-tahor gold. vaya‘asu ‘al hakhoshen sharsherot gablut ma‘aseh ‘abot, zahab tahor.
wyeSw Sty mSbzt chb wSty Tbet chb wytnw at Sty hTbet el Sny qzwt hxSn and they made two ouches of gold, and two gold rings; and put the two rings in the two ends of the khashan-bronze-tooth. vaya‘asu shetei mishbezot zahab ushetei tabe‘ot zahab, vayitenu shetei hataba‘ot ‘al shenei qezot hakhoshen.
wytnw Sty hebtt hchb el Sty hTbet el qzwt hxSn and they put the two wreathed chains of gold in the two rings on the ends of the khashan-bronze-tooth. vayitenu shetei ha‘abotot hazahab ‘al shetei hataba‘ot, ‘al qezot hakhoshen.
wat Sty qzwt Sty hebtt ntnw el Sty hmSbzt wytnm el ktpt hapd al mwl pnyw and the two ends of the two wreathed chains they fastened in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod-cash-in, before-turns it. ve’et shetei qezot shetei ha‘abotot natenu ‘al shetei hamishbezot, vayitenum ‘al kitfot ha’efod ’el mul panav.
wyeSw Sty Tbet chb wySymw el Sny qzwt hxSn el Sptw aSr al ebr hapd byth and they made two rings of gold, and put them on the two ends of the khashan-bronze-tooth, upon the border of it, which was on the side of the ephod-cash-in inward. vaya‘asu shetei tabe‘ot zahab vayasimu ‘al shenei qezot hakhoshen, ‘al sefato ’asher ’el ‘eber ha’efod bayetah.
wyeSw Sty Tbet chb wytnm el Sty ktpt hapd mlmTh mmwl pnyw lemt mxbrtw mmel lxSb hapd and they made two other golden rings, and put them on the two sides of the ephod-cash-in underneath, toward the forepart of it, over against the other coupling thereof, above the accounting of the ephod-cash-in. vaya‘asu shetei tabe‘ot zahab vayitenum ‘al shetei khitfot ha’efod milmatah mimul panav le‘umat mekhbarto, mima‘al lekhesheb ha’efod.
wyrksw at hxSn mTbetyw al Tbet hapd bptyl tklt lhyt el xSb hapd wla ycx hxSn mel hapd kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and they did bind the khashan-bronze-tooth by his rings unto the rings of the ephod-cash-in with a lace of blue, that it might be above the accounting of the ephod-cash-in, and that the khashan-bronze-tooth might not be loosed from the ephod-cash-in; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayirkesu hakhoshen mitabe‘otav ’el tabe‘ot ha’efod biftil tekhelet lihyot ‘al khesheb ha’efod velo yizakh hakhoshen me‘al ha’efod, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyeS at meyl hapd meSh arg klyl tklt and he made the robe of the ephod-cash-in of woven work, all of blue. vaya‘as me‘il ha’efod ma‘aseh ’oreg, kelil tekhelet.
wpy hmeyl btwkw kpy txra Sph lpyw sbyb la yqre and there was an hole in the midst of the robe, as the hole of an habergeon, with a band round about the hole, that it should not rend. ufi hame‘il betokho kefi takhra, safah lefiv sabib lo yiqarea‘.
wyeSw el Swly hmeyl rmwny tklt wargmn wtwlet Sny mScr and they made upon the hems of the robe high-pomegranates of blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, and twined linen. vaya‘asu ‘al shulei hame‘il rimonei tekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani, mashezar.
wyeSw pemny chb Thwr wytnw at hpemnym btwk hrmnym el Swly hmeyl sbyb btwk hrmnym and they made nurture-bells of pure-tahor gold, and put the nurture-bells between-bin the high-pomegranates upon the hem of the robe, round about between-bin the high-pomegranates; vaya‘asu fa‘amonei zahab tahor, vayitenu hapa‘amonim betokh harimonim ‘al shulei hame‘il sabib betokh harimonim.
pemn wrmn pemn wrmn el Swly hmeyl sbyb lSrt kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh a nurture-bell and a high-pomegranate, a nurture-bell and a high-pomegranate, round about the hem of the robe to in; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. pa‘amon verimon pa‘amon verimon shulei hame‘il sabib, lesharet ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyeSw at hktnt SS meSh arg lahrn wlbnyw and they made six you-wrote-coats of woven work for aaron-cabinet, and for his children-betweens, vaya‘asu hakatenot shesh ma‘aseh ’oreg, le’aharon ulebanav.
wat hmznpt SS wat pary hmgbet SS wat mknsy hbd SS mScr and six branch-bonnets, and six adorned hats, and six cloth pants, twined, ve’et hamiznefet shesh ve’et pa’arei hamigba‘ot shesh, ve’et mikhnesei habad mashezar.
wat habnT SS mScr wtklt wargmn wtwlet Sny meSh rqm kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and six girdles, twined, and blue, and purple, and two caterpillars, of needlework; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. ve’et ha’abnet shesh mashezar utekhelet ve’argaman vetola‘at shani ma‘aseh roqem, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyeSw at zyz ncr hqdS chb Thwr wyktbw elyw mktb ptwxy xwtm qdS lyhwh and they made the plate of the dedicated-finished crown of pure-tahor gold, and wrote upon it a writing, like to the engravings of a signet, dedication to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vaya‘asu ziz nezer haqodesh zahab tahor, vayikhtebu ‘alav mikhtab pitukhei khotam qodesh yhvh.
wytnw elyw ptyl tklt ltt el hmznpt mlmelh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and they tied unto it a lace of blue, to fasten it on high upon the branch-bonnet; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayitenu ‘alav petil tekhelet latet ‘al hamiznefet milma‘elah, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wtkl kl ebdt mSkn ahl mwed wyeSw bny ySral kkl aSr zwh yhwh at mSh kn eSw thus was all the work of the dwelling of the tent of until-conception finished: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, so did they. vatekhel kal ‘abodat mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed, vaya‘asu benei yisra’el kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asu.
wybyaw at hmSkn al mSh at hahl wat kl klyw qrsyw qrSyw bryxw bryxyw wemdyw wadnyw and they brought the dwelling unto mose-extracted, the tent, and all his all-tool, his taches, his boards, his bars, and his column-stands, and his sockets, vayabi’u hamishkan ’el mosheh ha’ohel ve’et kal kelav, qerasav qerashav berikhav ve‘amudav va’adanav.
wat mksh ewrt haylm hmadmym wat mksh ert htxSym wat prkt hmsk and the covering of ram-voicelesss' light-skins from red-earth-adam, and the covering of takhash-feel light-skins, and breaker-screen, ve’et mikhseh ‘orot ha’elim ham’adamim ve’et mikhseh ‘orot hatekhashim, ve’et parokhet hamasakh.
at arn hedt wat bdyw wat hkprt the cabinet of the until-witness, and the canvas thereof, and the out-of-townment, ’aron ha‘edut ve’et badav, ve’et hakaporet.
at hSlxn at kl klyw wat lxm hpnym the table, and all the tools thereof, and the within-turns-bread, hashulkhan kal kelav ve’et lekhem hapanim.
at hmnrh hThrh at nrtyh nrt hmerkh wat kl klyh wat Smn hmawr the pure-tahor light-stream-candle, with the lamps thereof, even with the lamps to be set in order, and all the tools thereof, and the name-from-oil for light, hamenorah hatehorah neroteha nerot hama‘arakhah ve’et kal keleha, ve’et shemen hama’or.
wat mcbx hchb wat Smn hmSxh wat qTrt hsmym wat msk ptx hahl and the golden butcher-kitchen, and the lubeing name-from-oil, and the smoke drug, and the hanging for the dwelling opening, ve’et mizbakh hazahab ve’et shemen hamishkhah ve’et qetoret hasamim, ve’et masakh petakh ha’ohel.
at mcbx hnxSt wat mkbr hnxSt aSr lw at bdyw wat kl klyw at hkyr wat knw the brazen butcher-kitchen, and his grate of brass, his canvas, and all his tools, the bulging and his base, mizbakh hanekhoshet ve’et mikhbar hanekhoshet lo badav ve’et kal kelav, hakiyor ve’et kano.
at qley hxzr at emdyh wat adnyh wat hmsk lSer hxzr at mytryw wytdtyh wat kl kly ebdt hmSkn lahl mwed the hangings of the court, his column-stands, and his sockets, and the hanging for the court hair-gate, his cords, and his pins, and all the tools of the work of the dwelling, for the tent of until-conception, qal‘ei hekhazer ‘amudeha ve’et ’adaneha ve’et hamasakh lesha‘ar hekhazer metarav vitedoteha, ve’et kal kelei ‘abodat hamishkan le’ohel mo‘ed.
at bgdy hSrd lSrt bqdS at bgdy hqdS lahrn hkhn wat bgdy bnyw lkhn the cloths of work to do work in the dedicated-finished place, and the dedicated-finished garments for aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server, and his children-betweens' garments, to dimmer-server. bigdei haserad lesharet baqodesh, bigdei haqodesh le’aharon hakohen ve’et bigdei banav lekhahen.
kkl aSr zwh yhwh at mSh kn eSw bny ySral at kl hebdh according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, so children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards made all the work. kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, ken ‘asu benei yisra’el kal ha‘abodah.
wyra mSh at kl hmlakh whnh eSw ath kaSr zwh yhwh kn eSw wybrk atm mSh and mose-extracted did look upon all the work, and, behold, they had done it as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had direct, even so had they done it: and mose-extracted knee-fluffy-blessed them. vayar mosheh kal hamelakhah vehineh ‘asu ’otah ka’asher zivah yhvh ken ‘asu, vaybarekh ’otam mosheh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
bywm hxdS hraSwn baxd lxdS tqym at mSkn ahl mwed on the first day of the first month thou set up the dwelling of the tent of until-conception. beyom hakhodesh harishon be’ekhad lakhodesh, taqim mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed.
wSmt Sm at arwn hedwt wskt el harn at hprkt and thou put therein the cabinet of the until-witness, and cover the cabinet with the breaker. vesamta sham ’aron ha‘edut, vesakota ‘al ha’aron ’et haparokhet.
whbat at hSlxn werkt at erkw whbat at hmnrh whelyt at nrtyh and thou bring in the table, and set in order the things that are to be set in order upon it; and thou bring in the light-stream-candle, and light the lamps thereof. vehebeta hashulkhan ve‘arakhta ‘erko, vehebeta hamenorah veha‘aleta neroteha.
wntth at mcbx hchb lqTrt lpny arwn hedt wSmt at msk hptx lmSkn and thou set the butcher-kitchen of gold for the incense before-turns the cabinet of the until-witness, and put the hanging of the opening to the dwelling. venatatah mizbakh hazahab liqtoret lifnei ’aron ha‘edut, vesamta masakh hapetakh lamishkan.
wntth at mcbx helh lpny ptx mSkn ahl mwed and thou set the butcher-kitchen of the on-up before-turns the opening of the dwelling of the tent of until-conception. venatatah mizbakh ha‘olah, lifnei petakh mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed.
wntt at hkyr byn ahl mwed wbyn hmcbx wntt Sm mym and thou set the bulging between-bin the tent of until-conception and the butcher-kitchen, and put from-waters therein. venatata hakiyor ben ’ohel mo‘ed uben hamizbeakh, venatata sham mayim.
wSmt at hxzr sbyb wntt at msk Ser hxzr and thou set up the court round about, and hang up the hanging at the court hair-gate. vesamta hekhazer sabib, venatata masakh sha‘ar hekhazer.
wlqxt at Smn hmSxh wmSxt at hmSkn wat kl aSr bw wqdSt atw wat kl klyw whyh qdS and thou take the lubeing name-from-oil, and lube the dwelling, and all that is therein, and dedicate-finify it, and all the tools thereof: and it be dedicated-finished. velaqakhta shemen hamishkhah umashakhta hamishkan ve’et kal ’asher bo, veqidashta ’oto ve’et kal kelav vehayah qodesh.
wmSxt at mcbx helh wat kl klyw wqdSt at hmcbx whyh hmcbx qdS qdSym and thou lube the butcher-kitchen of the on-up, and all his tools, and dedicate-finify the butcher-kitchen: and it be an butcher-kitchen most dedicated-finished. umashakhta mizbakh ha‘olah ve’et kal kelav, veqidashta hamizbeakh vehayah hamizbeakh qodesh qadashim.
wmSxt at hkyr wat knw wqdSt atw and thou lube the bulging and his base, and dedicate-finify it. umashakhta hakiyor ve’et kano, veqidashta ’oto.
whqrbt at ahrn wat bnyw al ptx ahl mwed wrxzt atm bmym and thou inward aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, and wash them with from-waters. vehiqrabta ’aharon ve’et banav ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, verakhazta ’otam bamayim.
whlbSt at ahrn at bgdy hqdS wmSxt atw wqdSt atw wkhn ly and thou put upon aaron-cabinet the dedicated-finished garments, and lube him, and dedicate-finify him; that he may dimmer-server unto me. vehilbashta ’aharon ’et bigdei haqodesh, umashakhta ’oto veqidashta ’oto vekhihen li.
wat bnyw tqryb whlbSt atm ktnt and thou bring his children-betweens, and clothe them with you-wrote-coats: ve’et banav taqrib, vehilbashta ’otam kutonot.
wmSxt atm kaSr mSxt at abyhm wkhnw ly whyth lhyt lhm mSxtm lkhnt ewlm ldrtm and thou lube them, as thou didst lube their father, that they may dimmer-server unto me: for their lubeing surely be an everlasting dimmer-serverhood throughout their generations. umashakhta ’otam ka’asher mashakhta ’abihem vekhihanu li, vehayetah lihyot lahem mashekhatam likhhunat ‘olam ledorotam
wyeS mSh kkl aSr zwh yhwh atw kn eSh thus did mose-extracted: according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct him, so did he. vaya‘as mosheh, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh ’oto ken ‘asah.
wyhy bxdS hraSwn bSnh hSnyt baxd lxdS hwqm hmSkn and it came to pass in the first month in the second year, on the first day of the month, that the dwelling was reared up. vayhi bakhodesh harishon bashanah hashenit be’ekhad lakhodesh, huqam hamishkan.
wyqm mSh at hmSkn wytn at adnyw wySm at qrSyw wytn at bryxyw wyqm at emwdyw and mose-extracted reared up the dwelling, and fastened his sockets, and set up the boards thereof, and put in the bars thereof, and reared up his column-stands. vayaqem mosheh hamishkan vayiten ’adanav vayasem qerashav vayiten berikhav, vayaqem ‘amudav.
wyprS at hahl el hmSkn wySm at mksh hahl elyw mlmelh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he spread abroad the tent over the dwelling, and put the covering of the tent above upon it; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayifros ha’ohel ‘al hamishkan vayasem mikhseh ha’ohel ‘alav milma‘elah, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqx wytn at hedt al harn wySm at hbdym el harn wytn at hkprt el harn mlmelh and he took and put the until-witness into the cabinet, and set the canvas on the cabinet, and put the out-of-townment above upon the cabinet: vayiqakh vayiten ha‘edut ’el ha’aron vayasem habadim ‘al ha’aron, vayiten hakaporet ‘al ha’aron milma‘elah.
wyba at harn al hmSkn wySm at prkt hmsk wysk el arwn hedwt kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he brought the cabinet into the dwelling, and set up breaker-screen, and covered the cabinet of the until-witness; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayabei ha’aron ’el hamishkan vayasem parokhet hamasakh vayasekh ‘al ’aron ha‘edut, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wytn at hSlxn bahl mwed el yrk hmSkn zpnh mxwz lprkt and he put the send-table in the tent of until-conception, upon the side of the dwelling hide-northward, without the breaker. vayiten hashulkhan be’ohel mo‘ed ‘al yerekh hamishkan zafonah, mikhuz laparokhet.
wyerk elyw erk lxm lpny yhwh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he set the bread in order upon it before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had direct mose-extracted. vaya‘arokh ‘alav ‘erekh lekhem lifnei yhvh, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wySm at hmnrh bahl mwed nkx hSlxn el yrk hmSkn ngbh and he put the light-stream-candle in the tent of until-conception, over against the table, on the side of the dwelling south-dryward. vayasem hamenorah be’ohel mo‘ed nokhakh hashulkhan, ‘al yerekh hamishkan negbah.
wyel hnrt lpny yhwh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he lighted the lamps before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vaya‘al hanerot lifnei yhvh, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wySm at mcbx hchb bahl mwed lpny hprkt and he put the golden butcher-kitchen in the tent of until-conception before-turns the breaker: vayasem mizbakh hazahab be’ohel mo‘ed, lifnei haparokhet.
wyqTr elyw qTrt smym kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he burnt smoke drug thereon; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayaqter ‘alav qetoret samim, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wySm at msk hptx lmSkn and he set up the hanging at the opening of the dwelling. vayasem masakh hapetakh lamishkan.
wat mcbx helh Sm ptx mSkn ahl mwed wyel elyw at helh wat hmnxh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he put the butcher-kitchen of on-up by the opening of the dwelling of the tent of until-conception, and inwarded upon it the on-up and the absorber; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. ve’et mizbakh ha‘olah sam petakh mishkan ’ohel mo‘ed, vaya‘al ‘alav ha‘olah ve’et haminkhah ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wySm at hkyr byn ahl mwed wbyn hmcbx wytn Smh mym lrxzh and he set the bulging between-bin the tent of until-conception and the butcher-kitchen, and put from-waters there, to wash withal. vayasem hakiyor ben ’ohel mo‘ed uben hamizbeakh, vayiten shamah mayim lerakhezah.
wrxzw mmnw mSh wahrn wbnyw at ydyhm wat rglyhm and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens washed their hands and their feet thereat: verakhazu mimenu mosheh ve’aharon ubanav, yedehem ve’et raglehem.
bbam al ahl mwed wbqrbtm al hmcbx yrxzw kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh when they went into the tent of until-conception, and when they inwarded unto the butcher-kitchen, they washed; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. bebo’am ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ubeqarebatam ’el hamizbeakh yirkhazu, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqm at hxzr sbyb lmSkn wlmcbx wytn at msk Ser hxzr wykl mSh at hmlakh and he reared up the court round about the dwelling and the butcher-kitchen, and set up the hanging of the court hair-gate. so mose-extracted finished the work. vayaqem hekhazer sabib lamishkan velamizbeakh vayiten masakh sha‘ar hekhazer, vaykhal mosheh hamelakhah.
wyks henn at ahl mwed wkbwd yhwh mla at hmSkn then a cloud covered the tent of until-conception, and the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah filled the dwelling. vaykhas he‘anan ’ohel mo‘ed, ukhebod yhvh malei hamishkan.
wla ykl mSh lbwa al ahl mwed ky Skn elyw henn wkbwd yhwh mla at hmSkn and mose-extracted was not able to enter into the tent of until-conception, because the cloud abode thereon, and the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah filled the dwelling. velo yakhol mosheh labo ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ki shakhan ‘alav he‘anan, ukhebod yhvh malei hamishkan.
wbhelwt henn mel hmSkn ysew bny ySral bkl mseyhm and when the cloud was taken up from over the dwelling, children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards went onward in all their journeys: ubehe‘alot he‘anan me‘al hamishkan yis‘u benei yisra’el, bekhol mas‘ehem.
wam la yelh henn wla ysew ed ywm heltw and if the cloud were not taken up, then they journeyed not till the day that it was taken up. ve’im lo ye‘aleh he‘anan, velo yis‘u ‘ad yom he‘aloto.
ky enn yhwh el hmSkn ywmm waS thyh lylh bw leyny kl byt ySral bkl mseyhm for the cloud of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was upon the dwelling by day, and fire was on it by night, in the sight of all the daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards, throughout all their journeys. ki ‘anan yhvh ‘al hamishkan yomam ve’esh tihyeh laylah bo, le‘enei khal bet yisra’el bekhal mas‘ehem.
wyqra al mSh wydbr yhwh alyw mahl mwed lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah called unto mose-extracted, and spake unto him out of the tent of until-conception, saying, vayiqra ’el mosheh, vaydaber yhvh ’elav me’ohel mo‘ed lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm adm ky yqryb mkm qrbn lyhwh mn hbhmh mn hbqr wmn hzan tqrybw at qrbnkm speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, if any man of you inward an inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, ye inward your inward of the in-them-animal, even of the visit-cattle, and of the flock. daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ’adam ki yaqrib mikem qarban yhvh, min habehemah min habaqar umin hazon taqribu qarebankhem.
am elh qrbnw mn hbqr ckr tmym yqrybnw al ptx ahl mwed yqryb atw lrznw lpny yhwh if his inward be a on-up of the visit-cattle, let him inward a rememberer simple: he inward it of his own voluntary will at the opening of the tent of until-conception before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’im ‘olah qarebano min habaqar zakhar tamim yaqribenu, ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed yaqrib ’oto lirzono lifnei yhvh.
wsmk ydw el raS helh wnrzh lw lkpr elyw and he put his hand upon the head of the on-up; and it be accepted for him to make out-of-town-ment for him. vesamakh yado ‘al rosh ha‘olah, venirzah lo lekhaper ‘alav.
wSxT at bn hbqr lpny yhwh whqrybw bny ahrn hkhnym at hdm wcrqw at hdm el hmcbx sbyb aSr ptx ahl mwed and he kill the bull before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and the dimmer-servers, aaron-cabinet's children-betweens, bring the blood, and sprinkle the blood round about upon the butcher-kitchen that is by the opening of the tent of until-conception. veshakhat ben habaqar lifnei yhvh, vehiqribu benei ’aharon hakohanim hadam vezarequ hadam ‘al hamizbeakh sabib ’asher petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
whpSyT at helh wntx ath lntxyh and he simplify-skin the on-up, and chunk it into its chunks. vehifshit ’et ha‘olah, venitakh ’otah lintakheha.
wntnw bny ahrn hkhn aS el hmcbx werkw ezym el haS and children-betweens of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server put fire upon the butcher-kitchen, and arrange the wood on the fire: venatenu benei ’aharon hakohen ’esh ‘al hamizbeakh, ve‘arekhu ‘ezim ‘al ha’esh.
werkw bny ahrn hkhnym at hntxym at hraS wat hpdr el hezym aSr el haS aSr el hmcbx and the dimmer-servers, aaron-cabinet's children-betweens, lay the chunks, the head, and the fat, on the wood on the fire on the butcher-kitchen: ve‘arekhu benei ’aharon hakohanim hanetakhim ’et harosh ve’et hapader, ‘al ha‘ezim ’asher ‘al ha’esh ’asher ‘al hamizbeakh.
wqrbw wkreyw yrxz bmym whqTyr hkhn at hkl hmcbxh elh aSh ryx nyxwx lyhwh and his inwards and his legs he wash in from-waters: and the dimmer-server burn all on the butcher-kitchen, to be a on-up, a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. veqirbo ukhera‘av yirkhaz bamayim, vehiqtir hakohen hakol hamizbekhah ‘olah ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wam mn hzan qrbnw mn hkSbym aw mn hecym lelh ckr tmym yqrybnw and if his inward be of the flocks, namely, of the sheep, or of the intense-goats, for a on-up; he inward it a rememberer simple. ve’im min hazon qarebano min hakesabim ’o min ha‘izim le‘olah, zakhar tamim yaqribenu.
wSxT atw el yrk hmcbx zpnh lpny yhwh wcrqw bny ahrn hkhnym at dmw el hmcbx sbyb and he kill it on the side of the butcher-kitchen hide-northward before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and the dimmer-servers, aaron-cabinet's children-betweens, sprinkle his blood round about upon the butcher-kitchen. veshakhat ’oto ‘al yerekh hamizbeakh zafonah lifnei yhvh, vezarequ benei ’aharon hakohanim damo ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.

whqrb whkreym yrxz bmym whqryb hkhn at hkl whqTyr hmcbxh elh hwa aSh ryx nyxx lyhwh and he wash the inwards and the legs with from-waters: and the dimmer-server inward it all, and burn it upon the butcher-kitchen: it is a on-up, a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehaqereb vehakera‘ayim yirkhaz bamayim, vehiqrib hakohen hakol vehiqtir hamizbekhah ‘olah hu ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wam mn hewp elh qrbnw lyhwh whqryb mn htrym aw mn bny hywnh at qrbnw and if the on-up for his inward to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah be of fowls, then he inward his inward of rises, or of child-betweens of pigeons. ve’im min ha‘of ‘olah qarebano yhvh, vehiqrib min hatorim ’o min benei hayonah qarebano.
whqrybw hkhn al hmcbx wmlq at raSw whqTyr hmcbxh wnmzh dmw el qyr hmcbx and the dimmer-server inward it unto the butcher-kitchen, and wring off his head, and burn it on the butcher-kitchen; and the blood thereof be wrung out at the side of the butcher-kitchen: vehiqribo hakohen ’el hamizbeakh umalaq rosho vehiqtir hamizbekhah, venimzah damo ‘al qir hamizbeakh.

am hkhn hmSyx yxTa laSmt hem whqryb el xTatw aSr xTa pr bn bqr tmym lyhwh lxTat if the dimmer-server that is lubeed do miss according to the miss of the with-mum-people; then let him bring for his miss, which he hath missed, a bull child-between of visit-cattle simple unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for a miss. ’im hakohen hamashiakh yekheta le’ashmat ha‘am, vehiqrib ‘al khatato ’asher khata par ben baqar tamim yhvh lekhatat.

wTbl hkhn at azbew bdm whch mn hdm Sbe pemym lpny yhwh at pny prkt hqdS and the dimmer-server dip his finger in the blood, and sprinkle of the blood seven times before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, before-turns the breaker of the dedicated-finished. vetabal hakohen ’ezba‘o badam, vehizah min hadam sheba‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhvh penei parokhet haqodesh.
wntn hkhn mn hdm el qrnwt mcbx qTrt hsmym lpny yhwh aSr bahl mwed wat kl dm hpr ySpk al yswd mcbx helh aSr ptx ahl mwed and the dimmer-server put some of the blood upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen of smoke drug before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which is in the tent of until-conception; and pour all the blood of the bull at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen of the on-up, which is at the opening of the tent of until-conception. venatan hakohen min hadam ‘al qarnot mizbakh qetoret hasamim lifnei yhvh ’asher be’ohel mo‘ed, ve’et kal dam hapar yishpokh ’el yesod mizbakh ha‘olah ’asher petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wat kl xlb pr hxTat yrym mmnw at hxlb hmksh el hqrb wat kl hxlb aSr el hqrb and he take off from it all the fat of the bull for the miss; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards, ve’et kal kheleb par hakhatat yarim mimenu, hakheleb hamkhaseh haqereb ve’et kal hakheleb ’asher ‘al haqereb.
wat Sty hklyt wat hxlb aSr elyhn aSr el hkslym wat hytrt el hkbd el hklywt ysyrnh and the two eliminate-kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the remainder above the heavy-liver, with the eliminate-kidneys, it he take away, ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et hakheleb ’asher ‘alehen ’asher ‘al hakesalim, ve’et hayoteret ‘al hakabed ‘al hakelayot yesirenah.
kaSr ywrm mSwr cbx hSlmym whqTyrm hkhn el mcbx helh as it was taken off from the bull of the butcher of wholes: and the dimmer-server burn them upon the butcher-kitchen of the on-up. ka’asher yuram mishor zebakh hashelamim, vehiqtiram hakohen ‘al mizbakh ha‘olah.
wat ewr hpr wat kl bSrw el raSw wel kreyw wqrbw wprSw and the light-skin of the bull, and all his flesh, with his head, and with his legs, and his inwards, and his dung, ve’et ‘or hapar ve’et kal besaro ‘al rosho ve‘al kera‘av, veqirbo ufirsho.
whwzya at kl hpr al mxwz lmxnh al mqwm Thwr al Spk hdSn wSrp atw el ezym baS el Spk hdSn ySrp even the whole bull he carry forth without the camp unto a bright-climaxing place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn him on the wood with fire: where the ashes are poured out he be burnt. vehozi kal hapar mikhuz lamakhaneh ’el maqom tahor ’el shefekh hadeshen vesaraf ’oto ‘al ‘ezim ba’esh, ‘al shefekh hadeshen yisaref.
wam kl edt ySral ySgw wnelm dbr meyny hqhl weSw axt mkl mzwt yhwh aSr la teSynh waSmw and if the whole until-witness of israel-juicy-towards miss through ignorance, and the thing be hid from the eyes of the assembly, and they have done somewhat against any of the directives of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah concerning things which should not be done, and are fire-name; ve’im kal ‘adat yisra’el yishgu vene‘lam dabar me‘enei haqahal, ve‘asu ’akhat mikal mizvot yhvh ’asher lo te‘asenah ve’ashemu.
wnwdeh hxTat aSr xTaw elyh whqrybw hqhl pr bn bqr lxTat whbyaw atw lpny ahl mwed when the miss, which they have missed against it, is hand-known, then the until-witness inward a bull child-between of visit-cattle for the miss, and bring him before-turns the tent of until-conception. venod‘ah hakhatat ’asher khate’u ‘aleha, vehiqribu haqahal par baqar lekhatat vehebi’u ’oto lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed.
wsmkw cqny hedh at ydyhm el raS hpr lpny yhwh wSxT at hpr lpny yhwh and the elders of the until-witness lay their hands upon the head of the bull before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and the bull be killed before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vesamekhu ziqnei ha‘edah yedehem ‘al rosh hapar lifnei yhvh, veshakhat hapar lifnei yhvh.
whbya hkhn hmSyx mdm hpr al ahl mwed and the dimmer-server that is lubeed bring of the bull's blood to the tent of until-conception: vehebi hakohen hamashiakh midam hapar, ’el ’ohel mo‘ed.
wTbl hkhn azbew mn hdm whch Sbe pemym lpny yhwh at pny hprkt and the dimmer-server dip his finger in some of the blood, and sprinkle it seven times before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, even before-turns the breaker. vetabal hakohen ’ezba‘o min hadam, vehizah sheba‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhvh penei haparokhet.
wmn hdm ytn el qrnt hmcbx aSr lpny yhwh aSr bahl mwed wat kl hdm ySpk al yswd mcbx helh aSr ptx ahl mwed and he put some of the blood upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen which is before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, that is in the tent of until-conception, and pour out all the blood at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen of the on-up, which is at the opening of the tent of until-conception. umin hadam yiten ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh ’asher lifnei yhvh ’asher be’ohel mo‘ed, ve’et kal hadam yishpokh ’el yesod mizbakh ha‘olah ’asher petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wat kl xlbw yrym mmnw whqTyr hmcbxh and he take all his fat from him, and burn it upon the butcher-kitchen. ve’et kal khelbo yarim mimenu, vehiqtir hamizbekhah.
weSh lpr kaSr eSh lpr hxTat kn yeSh lw wkpr elhm hkhn wnslx lhm and he do with the bull as he did with the bull for a miss, so he do with this: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for them, and it be released them. ve‘asah lapar ka’asher ‘asah lefar hakhatat ken ya‘aseh lo, vekhiper ‘alehem hakohen venislakh lahem.
whwzya at hpr al mxwz lmxnh wSrp atw kaSr Srp at hpr hraSwn xTat hqhl hwa and he carry forth the bull without the camp, and burn him as he burned the first bull: it is a miss for the until-witness. vehozi hapar ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesaraf ’oto ka’asher saraf hapar harishon, khatat haqahal hu.
aSr nSya yxTa weSh axt mkl mzwt yhwh alhyw aSr la teSynh bSggh waSm when a ruler hath missed, and done somewhat through ignorance against any of the directives of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah his to-no-these concerning things which should not be done, and is fire-name; ’asher nasi yekheta, ve‘asah ’akhat mikal mizvot yhvh ’elohav ’asher lo te‘asenah bishgagah ve’ashem.
aw hwde alyw xTatw aSr xTa bh whbya at qrbnw Seyr ecym ckr tmym or if his miss, wherein he hath missed, come to his knowledge; he inward his inward, a kid of the intense-goats, a rememberer simple: ’o hoda‘ ’elav khatato ’asher khata bah, vehebi qarebano se‘ir ‘izim zakhar tamim.
wsmk ydw el raS hSeyr wSxT atw bmqwm aSr ySxT at helh lpny yhwh xTat hwa and he lay his hand upon the head of the intense-goat, and kill it in the place where they kill the on-up before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: it is a miss. vesamakh yado ‘al rosh hasa‘ir veshakhat ’oto bimqom ’asher yishkhat ha‘olah lifnei yhvh, khatat hu.
wlqx hkhn mdm hxTat bazbew wntn el qrnt mcbx helh wat dmw ySpk al yswd mcbx helh and the dimmer-server take of the blood of the miss with his finger, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen of on-up, and pour out his blood at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen of on-up. velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat be’ezba‘o venatan ‘al qarnot mizbakh ha‘olah, ve’et damo yishpokh ’el yesod mizbakh ha‘olah.
wat kl xlbw yqTyr hmcbxh kxlb cbx hSlmym wkpr elyw hkhn mxTatw wnslx lw and he burn all his fat upon the butcher-kitchen, as the fat of the butcher of wholes: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him as concerning his miss, and it be released him. ve’et kal khelbo yaqtir hamizbekhah kekheleb zebakh hashelamim, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen mekhatato venislakh lo.
wam npS axt txTa bSggh mem harz beSth axt mmzwt yhwh aSr la teSynh waSm and if any one of the upstarting with-mum-people miss through ignorance, while he doeth somewhat against any of the directives of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah concerning things which ought not to be done, and be fire-name; ve’im nefesh ’akhat tekheta bishgagah me‘am ha’arez, ba‘asotah ’akhat mimizvot yhvh ’asher lo te‘asenah ve’ashem.
aw hwde alyw xTatw aSr xTa whbya qrbnw Seyrt ecym tmymh nqbh el xTatw aSr xTa or if his miss, which he hath missed, come to his knowledge: then he inward his inward, a kid of the intense-goats, a pierced simple, for his miss which he hath missed. ’o hoda‘ ’elav khatato ’asher khata, vehebi qarebano se‘irat ‘izim temimah neqebah ‘al khatato ’asher khata.
wsmk at ydw el raS hxTat wSxT at hxTat bmqwm helh and he lay his hand upon the head of the miss, and slay the miss in the place of the on-up. vesamakh yado ‘al rosh hakhatat, veshakhat hakhatat bimqom ha‘olah.
wlqx hkhn mdmh bazbew wntn el qrnt mcbx helh wat kl dmh ySpk al yswd hmcbx and the dimmer-server take of the blood thereof with his finger, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen of on-up, and pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen. velaqakh hakohen midamah be’ezba‘o venatan ‘al qarnot mizbakh ha‘olah, ve’et kal damah yishpokh ’el yesod hamizbeakh.
wat kl xlbh ysyr kaSr hwsr xlb mel cbx hSlmym whqTyr hkhn hmcbxh lryx nyxx lyhwh wkpr elyw hkhn wnslx lw and he take away all the fat thereof, as the fat is taken away from off the butcher of wholes; and the dimmer-server burn it upon the butcher-kitchen for a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him, and it be released him. ve’et kal khelbah yasir ka’asher husar kheleb me‘al zebakh hashelamim vehiqtir hakohen hamizbekhah lereakh nikhoakh yhvh, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen venislakh lo.
wam kbS ybya qrbnw lxTat nqbh tmymh ybyanh and if he bring a lamb for a miss, he inward it a pierced simple. ve’im kebes yabi qarebano lekhatat, neqebah temimah yebi’enah.
wsmk at ydw el raS hxTat wSxT ath lxTat bmqwm aSr ySxT at helh and he lay his hand upon the head of the miss, and slay it for a miss in the place where they kill the on-up. vesamakh yado ‘al rosh hakhatat, veshakhat ’otah lekhatat bimqom ’asher yishkhat ha‘olah.
wlqx hkhn mdm hxTat bazbew wntn el qrnt mcbx helh wat kl dmh ySpk al yswd hmcbx and the dimmer-server take of the blood of the miss with his finger, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen of on-up, and pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen: velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat be’ezba‘o venatan ‘al qarnot mizbakh ha‘olah, ve’et kal damah yishpokh ’el yesod hamizbeakh.
wat kl xlbh ysyr kaSr ywsr xlb hkSb mcbx hSlmym whqTyr hkhn atm hmcbxh el aSy yhwh wkpr elyw hkhn el xTatw aSr xTa wnslx lw and he take away all the fat thereof, as the fat of the lamb is taken away from the butcher of the wholes; and the dimmer-server burn them upon the butcher-kitchen, according to the inwards made by fire unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for his miss that he hath committed, and it be released him. ve’et kal khelbah yasir ka’asher yusar kheleb hakeseb mizebakh hashelamim vehiqtir hakohen ’otam hamizbekhah ‘al ’ishei yhvh, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen ‘al khatato ’asher khata venislakh lo.
wnpS ky txTa wSmeh qwl alh whwa ed aw rah aw yde am lwa ygyd wnSa ewnw and if a being miss, and hear the voice of swearing, and is a witness, whether he hath seen or hand-known of it; if he do not utter it, then he bear his torment. venefesh ki tekheta veshame‘ah qol ’alah vehu ‘ed ’o ra’ah ’o yada‘, ’im lo yagid venasa ‘avono.
aw npS aSr tge bkl dbr Tma aw bnblt xyh Tmah aw bnblt bhmh Tmah aw bnblt Srz Tma wnelm mmnw whwa Tma waSm or if a being touch any stained-ceased thing, whether it be a carcass of an stained-ceased beast, or a carcass of stained-ceased in-them-animal, or the carcass of stained-ceased creeping things, and if it be hidden from him; he also be stained-ceased, and fire-name. ’o nefesh ’asher tiga‘ bekhal dabar tamei ’o beniblat khayah teme’ah ’o beniblat behemah teme’ah ’o beniblat sherez tame, vene‘lam mimenu vehu tamei ve’ashem.
aw ky yge bTmat adm lkl Tmatw aSr yTma bh wnelm mmnw whwa yde waSm or if he touch the stained-ceasedness of man, whatsoever stained-ceasedness it be that a man be ceased withal, and it be hid from him; when he knoweth of it, then he be fire-name. ’o khi yiga‘ betum’at ’adam lekhol tum’ato ’asher yitma bah, vene‘lam mimenu vehu yada‘ ve’ashem.
aw npS ky tSbe lbTa bSptym lhre aw lhyTyb lkl aSr ybTa hadm bSbeh wnelm mmnw whwa yde waSm laxt malh or if a being swear, pronouncing with his lips to do bad, or to do good, whatsoever it be that a man pronounce with an toward-oath, and it be hid from him; when he knoweth of it, then he be fire-name in one of these. ’o nefesh ki tishaba‘ lebatei bisfatayim lehara‘ ’o lehetib lekhol ’asher yebatei ha’adam bishbu‘ah vene‘lam mimenu, vehu yada‘ ve’ashem le’akhat me’eleh.
whyh ky yaSm laxt malh whtwdh aSr xTa elyh and it be, when he be fire-name in one of these things, that he confess that he hath missed in that thing: vehayah khi ye’sham le’akhat me’eleh, vehitvadah ’asher khata ‘aleha.
whbya at aSmw lyhwh el xTatw aSr xTa nqbh mn hzan kSbh aw Seyrt ecym lxTat wkpr elyw hkhn mxTatw and he bring his fire-name unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for his miss which he hath missed, a pierced from the flock, a lamb or a gate-hairy intense-goat, for a miss; and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him concerning his miss. vehebi ’ashamo yhvh ‘al khatato ’asher khata neqebah min hazon kisbah ’o se‘irat ‘izim lekhatat, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen mekhatato.
wam la tgye ydw dy Sh whbya at aSmw aSr xTa Sty trym aw Sny bny ywnh lyhwh axd lxTat waxd lelh and if he be not able to bring a lamb, then he inward for his name-fire, which he hath missed, two rises, or two child-betweens of pigeons, unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; one for a miss, and the other for a on-up. ve’im lo tagi‘ seh vehebi ’ashamo ’asher khata shetei torim ’o shenei bene yonah yhvh, ’ekhad lekhatat ve’ekhad le‘olah.
whbya atm al hkhn whqryb at aSr lxTat raSwnh wmlq at raSw mmwl erpw wla ybdyl and he inward them unto the dimmer-server, who inward that which is for the miss first, and wring off his head from his neck, and not divide it asunder: vehebi ’otam ’el hakohen vehiqrib ’asher lakhatat rishonah, umalaq rosho mimul ‘arepo velo yabdil.
whch mdm hxTat el qyr hmcbx whnSar bdm ymzh al yswd hmcbx xTat hwa and he sprinkle of the blood of the miss upon the side of the butcher-kitchen; and the rest of the blood be wrung out at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen: it is a miss. vehizah midam hakhatat ‘al qir hamizbeakh vehanish’ar badam yimazeh ’el yesod hamizbeakh, khatat hu.
wat hSny yeSh elh kmSpT wkpr elyw hkhn mxTatw aSr xTa wnslx lw and he inward the second for a on-up, according to the manner: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him for his miss which he hath missed, and it be released him. ve’et hasheni ya‘aseh ‘olah kamishpat, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen mekhatato ’asher khata venislakh lo.
wam la tSyg ydw lSty trym aw lSny bny ywnh whbya at qrbnw aSr xTa eSyrt haph slt lxTat la ySym elyh Smn wla ytn elyh lbnh ky xTat hya and if he be not able to bring two rises, or two child-betweens of pigeons, then he that missed bring for his inward the tenth part of an ephah-tired of fine basket-flour for a miss; he put no name-from-oil upon it, neither he put any white-frankincense thereon: for it is a miss. ve’im lo tasig lishtei torim ’o lishnei bene yonah vehebi qarebano ’asher khata ‘asirit ha’efah solet lekhatat, lo yasim ‘aleha shemen velo yiten ‘aleha lebonah ki khatat hi.
whbyah al hkhn wqmz hkhn mmnh mlwa qmzw at ackrth whqTyr hmcbxh el aSy yhwh xTat hwa then he bring it to the dimmer-server, and the dimmer-server take his handful of it, even a memorial thereof, and burn it on the butcher-kitchen, according to the inwards made by fire unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: it is a miss. vehebi’ah ’el hakohen veqamaz hakohen mimenah melo qumzo ’azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbekhah ‘al ’ishei yhvh, khatat hi
wkpr elyw hkhn el xTatw aSr xTa maxt malh wnslx lw whyth lkhn kmnxh and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him as touching his miss that he hath missed in one of these, and it be released him: and the remnant be the dimmer-server's, as a absorber. vekhiper ‘alav hakohen ‘al khatato ’asher khata me’akhat me’eleh venislakh lo, vehayetah lakohen kaminkhah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
npS ky tmel mel wxTah bSggh mqdSy yhwh whbya at aSmw lyhwh ayl tmym mn hzan berkk ksp Sqlym bSql hqdS laSm if a being goes over the top, and miss through ignorance, in the dedicated-finished things of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; then he inward for his fire-name unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah a ram-voiceless simple out of the flocks, with thy estimation by shekel-lights of silver, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished, for a fire-name. nefesh ki tim‘ol ma‘al vekhate’ah bishgagah miqadeshei yhvh, vehebi ’ashamo yhvh ’ayil tamim min hazon be‘erkekha kesef sheqalim besheqel haqodesh le’asham.
wat aSr xTa mn hqdS ySlm wat xmyStw ywsp elyw wntn atw lkhn whkhn ykpr elyw bayl haSm wnslx lw and he peacify that which he had missed in the dedicated-finished thing, and add the fifth part thereto, and give it unto the dimmer-server: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him with the ram-voiceless of the fire-name, and it be released him. ve’et ’asher khata min haqodesh yeshalem ve’et khamishito yosef ‘alav venatan ’oto lakohen, vehakohen yekhaper ‘alav be’el ha’asham venislakh lo.
wam npS ky txTa weSth axt mkl mzwt yhwh aSr la teSynh wla yde waSm wnSa ewnw and if a being miss, and commit any of these things which are forbidden to be done by the directives of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; though he wist it not, yet is he fire-name, and bear his torment. ve’im nefesh tekheta ve‘asetah ’akhat mikal mizvot yhvh ’asher lo te‘asenah, velo yada‘ ve’ashem venasa ‘avono.
whbya ayl tmym mn hzan berkk laSm al hkhn wkpr elyw hkhn el Sggtw aSr Sgg whwa la yde wnslx lw and he inward a ram-voiceless simple out of the flock, with thy estimation, for a fire-name, unto the dimmer-server: and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him concerning his ignorance wherein he erred and wist it not, and it be released him. vehebi ’ayil tamim min hazon be‘erkekha le’asham ’el hakohen, vekhiper ‘alav hakohen ‘al shiggato ’asher shagag vehu lo yada‘ venislakh lo.
aSm hwa aSm aSm lyhwh it is a fire-name: he hath certainly fire-nameed to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’asham hu, ’ashom ’asham yhvh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
npS ky txTa wmelh mel byhwh wkxS bemytw bpqdwn aw btSwmt yd aw bgcl aw eSq at emytw if a being miss, and goes over the top to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and lie unto his neighbor in that which was delivered him to keep, or in fellowship, or in a thing taken away by violence, or hath deceived his neighbor; nefesh ki tekheta uma‘alah ma‘al yhvh, vekhikhesh ba‘amito befiqadon ’o bitsumet yad ’o begazel ’o ‘ashaq ‘amito.
aw mza abdh wkxS bh wnSbe el Sqr el axt mkl aSr yeSh hadm lxTa bhnh or have found that which was lost, and lieth concerning it, and sweareth falsely; in any of all these that a man doeth, missing therein: ’o maza ’abedah vekhikhesh bah venishba‘ ‘al shaqer, ‘al ’akhat mikol ’asher ya‘aseh ha’adam lakhato bahenah.
whyh ky yxTa waSm whSyb at hgclh aSr gcl aw at heSq aSr eSq aw at hpqdwn aSr hpqd atw aw at habdh aSr mza then it be, because he hath missed, and is fire-name, that he restore that which he took violently away, or the thing which he hath deceitfully gotten, or that which was delivered him to keep, or the lost thing which he found, vehayah ki yekheta ve’ashem veheshib hagezelah ’asher gazal ’o ha‘osheq ’asher ‘ashaq ’o ’asher hafeqad ’ito, ’o ha’abedah ’asher maza.
aw mkl aSr ySbe elyw lSqr wSlm atw braSw wxmStyw ysp elyw laSr hwa lw ytnnw bywm aSmtw or all that about which he hath sworn falsely; he even restore it in the principal, and add the fifth part more thereto, and give it unto him to whom it appertaineth, in the day of his fire-name. ’o mikol ’asher yishaba‘ ‘alav lasheqer veshilam berosho vakhamishitav yosef ‘alav, la’asher hu lo yitenenu beyom ’ashmato.
wat aSmw ybya lyhwh ayl tmym mn hzan berkk laSm al hkhn and he inward his fire-name unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, a ram-voiceless simple out of the flock, with thy estimation, for a fire-name, unto the dimmer-server: ve’et ’ashamo yabi yhvh, ’ayil tamim min hazon be‘erkekha le’asham ’el hakohen.
wkpr elyw hkhn lpny yhwh wnslx lw el axt mkl aSr yeSh laSmh bh and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and it be released him for any thing of all that he hath done in fire-nameing therein. vekhiper ‘alav hakohen lifnei yhvh venislakh lo, ‘al ’akhat mikol ’asher ya‘aseh le’ashmah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
zw at ahrn wat bnyw lamr cat twrt helh hwa helh el mwqdh el hmcbx kl hlylh ed hbqr waS hmcbx twqd bw direct aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, saying, this is the teaching of the on-up: it is the on-up, because of the burning upon the butcher-kitchen all night unto the morning, and the fire of the butcher-kitchen be burning in it. zav ’aharon ve’et banav lemor zot torat ha‘olah, hi ha‘olah ‘al moqdah ‘al hamizbeakh kal halaylah ‘ad haboqer ve’esh hamizbeakh tuqad bo.
wlbS hkhn mdw bd wmknsy bd ylbS el bSrw whrym at hdSn aSr takl haS at helh el hmcbx wSmw azl hmcbx and the dimmer-server put on his linen garment, and his linen trousers he put upon his flesh, and take up the ashes which the fire hath consumed with the on-up on the butcher-kitchen, and he put them beside the butcher-kitchen. velabash hakohen mido bad umikhnese bad yilbash ‘al besaro veherim hadeshen ’asher tokhal ha’esh ’et ha‘olah ‘al hamizbeakh, vesamo ’ezel hamizbeakh.
wpST at bgdyw wlbS bgdym axrym whwzya at hdSn al mxwz lmxnh al mqwm Thwr and he put off his garments, and put on other garments, and carry forth the ashes without the camp unto a bright-climaxing place. ufashat begadav velabash begadim ’akherim, vehozi hadeshen mikhuz lamakhaneh ’el maqom tahor.
whaS el hmcbx twqd bw la tkbh wber elyh hkhn ezym bbqr bbqr werk elyh helh whqTyr elyh xlby hSlmym and the fire upon the butcher-kitchen be burning in it; it not be put out: and the dimmer-server burn wood on it every morning, and lay the on-up in order upon it; and he burn thereon the fat of the wholes. veha’esh ‘al hamizbeakh tuqad bo lo tikhbeh ubi‘er ‘aleha hakohen ‘ezim baboqer baboqer, ve‘arakh ‘aleha ha‘olah vehiqtir ‘aleha khelbei hashelamim.
aS tmyd twqd el hmcbx la tkbh the fire ever be burning upon the butcher-kitchen; it never go out. ’esh tamid tuqad ‘al hamizbeakh lo tikhbeh
wcat twrt hmnxh hqrb ath bny ahrn lpny yhwh al pny hmcbx and this is the teaching of the absorber: children-betweens of aaron-cabinet inward it before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, before-turns the butcher-kitchen. vezot torat haminkhah, haqreb ’otah bene ’aharon lifnei yhvh ’el penei hamizbeakh.
whrym mmnw bqmzw mslt hmnxh wmSmnh wat kl hlbnh aSr el hmnxh whqTyr hmcbx ryx nyxx ackrth lyhwh and he take of it his handful, of the basket-flour of the absorber, and of the name-from-oil thereof, and all the white-frankincense which is upon the absorber, and burn it upon the butcher-kitchen for a smell fragrance, even the memorial of it, unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. veherim mimenu bequmzo misolet haminkhah umishamnah ve’et kal halebonah ’asher ‘al haminkhah, vehiqtir hamizbeakh reakh nikhoakh ’azkaratah yhvh.
whnwtrt mmnh yaklw ahrn wbnyw mzwt takl bmqwm qdS bxzr ahl mwed yaklwh and the remainder thereof aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens eat: with lit-mazat it be eaten in the dedicated-finished place; in the court of the tent of until-conception they eat it. vehanoteret mimenah yokhelu ’aharon ubanav, mazot te’akhel bemaqom qadosh bakhazar ’ohel mo‘ed yokheluha.
la taph xmz xlqm ntty ath maSy qdS qdSym hwa kxTat wkaSm it not be baked with leaven. i have given it unto them for their portion of my inwards made by fire; it is most dedicated-finished, as is the miss, and as the fire-name. lo te’afeh khamez khelqam natati ’otah me’ishay, qodesh qadashim hi kakhatat vekha’asham.
kl ckr bbny ahrn yaklnh xq ewlm ldrtykm maSy yhwh kl aSr yge bhm yqdS all the rememberers among children-betweens of aaron-cabinet eat of it. it be a statute for ever in your generations concerning the inwards of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire: every one that toucheth them be dedicated-finished. kal zakhar bibnei ’aharon yokhalenah khaq ‘olam ledorotekhem me’ishei yhvh, kol ’asher yiga‘ bahem yiqdash.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
ch qrbn ahrn wbnyw aSr yqrybw lyhwh bywm hmSx atw eSyrt haph slt mnxh tmyd mxzyth bbqr wmxzyth berb this is the inward of aaron-cabinet and of his children-betweens, which they inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in the day when he is lubeed; the tenth part of an ephah-tired of fine basket-flour for a absorber perpetual, half of it in the morning, and half thereof at night. zeh qareban ’aharon ubanav ’asher yaqribu yhvh beyom himashakh ’oto ‘asirit ha’efah solet minkhah tamid, makhazitah baboqer umakhazitah ba‘areb.
el mxbt bSmn teSh mrbkt tbyanh tpyny mnxt ptym tqryb ryx nyxx lyhwh in a pan it be made with name-from-oil; and when it is baked, thou bring it in: and the baked pieces of the absorber thou inward for a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ‘al makhabat bashemen te‘aseh murbekhet tebi’enah, tufinei minkhat pitim taqrib reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
whkhn hmSyx txtyw mbnyw yeSh ath xq ewlm lyhwh klyl tqTr and the dimmer-server of his children-betweens that is lubeed in his stead inward it: it is a statute for ever unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; it be wholly burnt. vehakohen hamashiakh takhtav mibanav ya‘aseh ’otah, khaq ‘olam yhvh kalil taqetar.

hkhn hmxTa ath yaklnh bmqwm qdS takl bxzr ahl mwed the dimmer-server that inwardeth it for miss eat it: in the dedicated-finished place it be eaten, in the court of the tent of until-conception. hakohen hamkhatei yokhalenah, bemaqom qadosh te’akhel bakhazar ’ohel mo‘ed.
kl aSr yge bbSrh yqdS waSr ych mdmh el hbgd aSr ych elyh tkbs bmqwm qdS whatsoever touch the flesh thereof be dedicated-finished: and when there is sprinkled of the blood thereof upon any garment, thou wash that whereon it was sprinkled in the dedicated-finished place. kol ’asher yiga‘ bibsarah yiqdash, va’asher yizeh midamah ‘al habeged ’asher yizeh tekhabes bemaqom qadosh.
wkly xrS aSr tbSl bw ySbr wam bkly nxSt bSlh wmrq wSTp bmym and the earthen tool wherein it is sodden be broken: and if it be sodden in a brazen pot, it be both scoured, and rinsed in from-waters. ukheli kheres ’asher tebushal bo yishaber, ve’im bikhli nekhoshet bushalah umoraq veshutaf bamayim.
kl ckr bkhnym yakl ath qdS qdSym hwa all the rememberers among the dimmer-servers eat thereof: it is most dedicated-finished. kal zakhar bakohanim yokhal qodesh qadashim hi
wkl xTat aSr ywba mdmh al ahl mwed lkpr bqdS la takl baS tSrp and no miss, whereof any of the blood is brought into the tent of until-conception to reconcile withal in the dedicated-finished place, be eaten: it be burnt in the fire. vekhal khatat ’asher yuba midamah ’el ’ohel mo‘ed lekhaper baqodesh lo te’akhel, ba’esh tisaref.
wcat twrt haSm qdS qdSym hwa likewise this is the teaching of the fire-name: it is most dedicated-finished. vezot torat ha’asham, qodesh qadashim hu.
bmqwm aSr ySxTw at helh ySxTw at haSm wat dmw ycrq el hmcbx sbyb in the place where they kill the on-up they kill the fire-name: and the blood thereof he sprinkle round about upon the butcher-kitchen. bimqom ’asher yishkhatu ha‘olah yishkhatu ha’asham, ve’et damo yizroq ‘al hamizbeakh sabib.
wat kl xlbw yqryb mmnw at halyh wat hxlb hmksh at hqrb and he inward of it all the fat thereof; the rump, and the fat that covereth the inwards, ve’et kal khelbo yaqrib mimenu, ha’alyah ve’et hakheleb hamkhaseh haqereb.
wat Sty hklyt wat hxlb aSr elyhn aSr el hkslym wat hytrt el hkbd el hklyt ysyrnh and the two eliminate-kidneys, and the fat that is on them, which is by the flanks, and the remainder that is above the heavy-liver, with the eliminate-kidneys, it he take away: ve’et shetei hakelayot ve’et hakheleb ’asher ‘alehen ’asher ‘al hakesalim, ve’et hayoteret ‘al hakabed ‘al hakelayot yesirenah.
whqTyr atm hkhn hmcbxh aSh lyhwh aSm hwa and the dimmer-server burn them upon the butcher-kitchen for a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: it is a fire-name. vehiqtir ’otam hakohen hamizbekhah ’isheh yhvh, ’asham hu.
kl ckr bkhnym yaklnw bmqwm qdwS yakl qdS qdSym hwa every rememberer among the dimmer-servers eat thereof: it be eaten in the dedicated-finished place: it is most dedicated-finished. kal zakhar bakohanim yokhelenu, bemaqom qadosh ye’akhel qodesh qadashim hu.
kxTat kaSm twrh axt lhm hkhn aSr ykpr bw lw yhyh as the miss is, so is the fire-name: there is one teaching for them: the dimmer-server that maketh out-of-town-ment therewith have it. kakhatat ka’asham torah ’akhat lahem, hakohen ’asher yekhaper bo lo yihyeh.
whkhn hmqryb at elt ayS ewr helh aSr hqryb lkhn lw yhyh and the dimmer-server that inwardeth any man's on-up, even the dimmer-server have to himself the light-skin of the on-up which he hath inwarded. vehakohen hamaqrib ‘olat ’ish, ‘or ha‘olah ’asher hiqrib lakohen lo yihyeh.
wkl mnxh aSr taph btnwr wkl neSh bmrxSt wel mxbt lkhn hmqryb ath lw thyh and all the absorber that is baked in the oven, and all that is dressed in the frying pan, and in the pan, be the dimmer-server's that inwardeth it. vekhal minkhah ’asher te’afeh batanur vekhal na‘asah bamarkheshet ve‘al makhabat, lakohen hamaqrib ’otah lo tihyeh.
wkl mnxh blwlh bSmn wxrbh lkl bny ahrn thyh ayS kaxyw and every absorber, mingled with name-from-oil, and dry, all children-betweens of aaron-cabinet have, one as much as another. vekhal minkhah belulah bashemen vakharebah, lekhal benei ’aharon tihyeh ’ish ke’akhiv.
wcat twrt cbx hSlmym aSr yqryb lyhwh and this is the teaching of the butcher of wholes, which he inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vezot torat zebakh hashelamim, ’asher yaqrib yhvh.
am el twdh yqrybnw whqryb el cbx htwdh xlwt mzwt blwlt bSmn wrqyqy mzwt mSxym bSmn wslt mrbkt xlt blwlt bSmn if he inward it for a thanksgiving, then he inward with the butcher of thanksgiving unleavened cakes mingled with name-from-oil, and unleavened wafers lubeed with name-from-oil, and cakes mingled with name-from-oil, of fine basket-flour, fried. ’im ‘al todah yaqribenu vehiqrib ‘al zebakh hatodah khalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen, vesolet khalot belulot bashamen.
el xlt lxm xmz yqryb qrbnw el cbx twdt Slmyw besides the cakes, he inward for his inward leaven with the butcher of thanksgiving of his wholes. ‘al khalot lekhem khamez yaqrib qarebano, ‘al zebakh todat shelamav.
whqryb mmnw axd mkl qrbn trwmh lyhwh lkhn hcrq at dm hSlmym lw yhyh and of it he inward one out of the whole inward for an raise-rum unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and it be the dimmer-server's that sprinkleth the blood of the wholes. vehiqrib mimenu ’ekhad mikal qarban terumah yhvh, lakohen hazoreq dam hashelamim lo yihyeh.
wbSr cbx twdt Slmyw bywm qrbnw yakl la ynyx mmnw ed bqr and the flesh of the butcher of his wholes for thanksgiving be eaten the same day that it is inwarded; he not leave any of it until the morning. ubesar zebakh todat shelamav beyom qarebano ye’akhel, lo yaniakh mimenu ‘ad boqer.
wam ndr aw ndbh cbx qrbnw bywm hqrybw at cbxw yakl wmmxrt whnwtr mmnw yakl and if the butcher of his inward be a vow, or a voluntary inward, it be eaten the same day that he inwardeth his butcher: and on the morrow also the remainder of it be eaten: ve’im neder ’o nedabah zebakh qarebano beyom haqribo zibkho ye’akhel, umimakhorat vehanotar mimenu ye’akhel.
whnwtr mbSr hcbx bywm hSlySy baS ySrp and the remainder of the flesh of the butcher on the third day be burnt with fire. vehanotar mibesar hazabakh, bayom hashelishi ba’esh yisaref.
wam hakl yakl mbSr cbx Slmyw bywm hSlySy la yrzh hmqryb atw la yxSb lw pgwl yhyh whnpS haklt mmnw ewnh tSa and if any of the flesh of the butcher of his wholes be eaten at all on the third day, it not be accepted, neither it be imputed unto him that inwardeth it: it be an abomination, and the being that eateth of it bear his torment. ve’im he’akhol ye’akhel mibesar zebakh shelamav bayom hashelishi lo yerazeh hamaqrib ’oto lo yekhasheb lo pigul yihyeh, vehanefesh ha’okhelet mimenu ‘avonah tisa.
whbSr aSr yge bkl Tma la yakl baS ySrp whbSr kl Thwr yakl bSr and the flesh that toucheth any stained-ceased thing not be eaten; it be burnt with fire: and as for the flesh, all that be bright-climaxing eat thereof. vehabasar ’asher yiga‘ bekhal tamei lo ye’akhel ba’esh yisaref, vehabasar kal tahor yokhal basar.
whnpS aSr takl bSr mcbx hSlmym aSr lyhwh wTmatw elyw wnkrth hnpS hhwa memyh and the being that eateth of the flesh of the butcher of wholes, that pertain unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, having his stained-ceasedness upon him, even that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. vehanefesh ’asher tokhal basar mizebakh hashelamim ’asher yhvh vetum’ato ‘alav, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘ameha.
wnpS ky tge bkl Tma bTmat adm aw bbhmh Tmah aw bkl Sqz Tma wakl mbSr cbx hSlmym aSr lyhwh wnkrth hnpS hhwa memyh moreover the being that touch any stained-ceased thing, as the stained-ceasedness of man, or any stained-ceased beast, or any abominable stained-ceased thing, and eat of the flesh of the butcher of wholes, which pertain unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, even that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. venefesh tiga‘ bekhal tame betum’at ’adam ’o bibhemah teme’ah ’o bekhal sheqez tame ve’akhal mibesar zebakh hashelamim ’asher yhvh, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘ameha.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral lamr kl xlb Swr wkSb wec la taklw speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, ye eat no manner of fat, of wall-ox, or of sheep, or of intense-goat. daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor, kheleb shor vekheseb va‘ez lo tokhelu.
wxlb nblh wxlb Trph yeSh lkl mlakh wakl la taklhw and the fat of the beast that dieth of itself, and the fat of that which is torn with beasts, may be used in any other use: and ye in no wise eat of it. vekheleb nebelah vekheleb terefah ye‘aseh lekhal melakhah, ve’akhol lo tokheluhu.
ky kl akl xlb mn hbhmh aSr yqryb mmnh aSh lyhwh wnkrth hnpS haklt memyh for whosoever eateth the fat of the beast, of which men inward a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, even the being that eateth it be cut off from his with-mum-people. ki kal ’okhel kheleb min habehemah ’asher yaqrib ’isheh yhvh, venikhretah hanefesh ha’okhelet me‘ameha.
wkl dm la taklw bkl mwSbtykm lewp wlbhmh moreover ye eat no manner of blood, whether it be of fowl or of beast, in any of your dwellings. vekhal dam lo tokhelu bekhol moshebotekhem, la‘of velabehemah.
kl npS aSr takl kl dm wnkrth hnpS hhwa memyh whatsoever being it be that eateth any manner of blood, even that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. kal nefesh tokhal kal dam, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘ameha.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.

ydyw tbyaynh at aSy yhwh at hxlb el hxch ybyanw at hxch lhnyp atw tnwph lpny yhwh his own hands bring the inwards of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire, the fat with the breast, it he bring, that the breast may be sieve-panad for a sieve before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. yadav tebi’enah ’ishei yhvh, hakheleb ‘al hekhazeh yebi’enu hekhazeh lehanif tenufah lifnei yhvh.
whqTyr hkhn at hxlb hmcbxh whyh hxch lahrn wlbnyw and the dimmer-server burn the fat upon the butcher-kitchen: and the breast be aaron-cabinet's and his children-betweens'. vehiqtir hakohen hakheleb hamizbekhah, vehayah hekhazeh le’aharon ulebanav.
wat Swq hymyn ttnw trwmh lkhn mcbxy Slmykm and the right shoulder ye give unto the dimmer-server for an raise-rum of the butchers of your wholes. ve’et shoq hayamin titenu terumah lakohen, mizibkhei shalmekhem.
hmqryb at dm hSlmym wat hxlb mbny ahrn lw thyh Swq hymyn lmnh he among children-betweens of aaron-cabinet, that inwardeth the blood of the wholes, and the fat, have the right shoulder for his part. hamaqrib dam hashelamim ve’et hakheleb mibenei ’aharon, lo tihyeh shoq hayamin lemanah.
ky at xch htnwph wat Swq htrwmh lqxty mat bny ySral mcbxy Slmyhm watn atm lahrn hkhn wlbnyw lxq ewlm mat bny ySral for the sieve-pana breast and the raise shoulder have i taken of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards from off the butchers of their wholes, and have given them unto aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server and unto his children-betweens by a statute for ever from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. ki khazeh hatenufah ve’et shoq haterumah laqakhti me’et bene yisra’el mizibkhei shalmehem, va’eten ’otam le’aharon hakohen ulebanav lekhaq ‘olam me’et benei yisra’el.
cat mSxt ahrn wmSxt bnyw maSy yhwh bywm hqryb atm lkhn lyhwh this is the portion of the lubeing of aaron-cabinet, and of the lubeing of his children-betweens, out of the inwards of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire, in the day when he presented them to unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in the dimmer-server's office; zot mishkhat ’aharon umishkhat banav me’ishei yhvh, beyom hiqrib ’otam lekhahen yhvh.
aSr zwh yhwh ltt lhm bywm mSxw atm mat bny ySral xqt ewlm ldrtm which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct to be given them of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, in the day that he lubeed them, by a statute for ever throughout their generations. ’asher zivah yhvh latet lahem beyom mashekho ’otam me’et benei yisra’el, khuqat ‘olam ledorotam.
cat htwrh lelh lmnxh wlxTat wlaSm wlmlwaym wlcbx hSlmym this is the teaching of the on-up, of the absorber, and of the miss, and of the fire-name, and of the fullnesss, and of the butcher of the wholes; zot hatorah la‘olah laminkhah velakhatat vela’asham, velamilu’im ulezebakh hashelamim.
aSr zwh yhwh at mSh bhr syny bywm zwtw at bny ySral lhqryb at qrbnyhm lyhwh bmdbr syny which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted in mount )sinai-bush-(proto, in the day that he direct children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards to inward their inwards unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto. ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh behar sinay, beyom zavoto benei yisra’el lehaqrib qarebenehem yhvh bemidbar sinay.

qx at ahrn wat bnyw atw wat hbgdym wat Smn hmSxh wat pr hxTat wat Sny haylym wat sl hmzwt take aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens with him, and the garments, and the lubeing name-from-oil, and a bull for the miss, and two ram-voicelesss, and a basket of lit-mazat; qakh ’aharon ve’et banav ’ito ve’et habegadim ve’et shemen hamishkhah, ve’et par hakhatat ve’et shenei ha’elim ve’et sal hamazot.
wat kl hedh hqhl al ptx ahl mwed and gather thou all the until-witness together unto the opening of the tent of until-conception. ve’et kal ha‘edah haqhel, ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wyeS mSh kaSr zwh yhwh atw wtqhl hedh al ptx ahl mwed and mose-extracted did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct him; and the assembly was added together unto the opening of the tent of until-conception. vaya‘as mosheh ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto, vatiqahel ha‘edah ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wyamr mSh al hedh ch hdbr aSr zwh yhwh leSwt and mose-extracted said unto the until-witness, this is the thing which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct to be done. vayomer mosheh ’el ha‘edah, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh la‘asot.
wyqrb mSh at ahrn wat bnyw wyrxz atm bmym and mose-extracted brought aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, and washed them with from-waters. vayaqreb mosheh ’aharon ve’et banav, vayirkhaz ’otam bamayim.
wytn elyw at hktnt wyxgr atw babnT wylbS atw at hmeyl wytn elyw at hapd wyxgr atw bxSb hapd wyapd lw bw and he gave him the you-wrote-coat, and girded him with the girdle, and clothed him with the robe, and put the ephod-cash-in upon him, and he girded him with the accounting of the ephod-cash-in, and bound it unto him therewith. vayiten ‘alav hakutonet vayakhgor ’oto ba’abnet vayalbesh ’oto ’et hame‘il vayiten ‘alav ha’efod, vayakhgor ’oto bekhesheb ha’efod vaye’pod lo bo.
wySm elyw at hxSn wytn al hxSn at hawrym wat htmym and he put the khashan-bronze-tooth upon him: also he put in the khashan-bronze-tooth the urim-fires and the thummim-naively-finished. vayasem ‘alav hakhoshen, vayiten ’el hakhoshen ha’urim ve’et hatumim.
wySm at hmznpt el raSw wySm el hmznpt al mwl pnyw at zyz hchb ncr hqdS kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and he put the branch-bonnet upon his head; also upon the branch-bonnet, even upon his forefront, did he put the golden plate, the dedicated-finished crown; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayasem hamiznefet ‘al rosho, vayasem ‘al hamiznefet ’el mul panav ziz hazahab nezer haqodesh ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqx mSh at Smn hmSxh wymSx at hmSkn wat kl aSr bw wyqdS atm and mose-extracted took the lubeing name-from-oil, and lubeed the dwelling and all that was therein, and dedicated-finished them. vayiqakh mosheh shemen hamishkhah vayimshakh hamishkan ve’et kal ’asher bo, vayqadesh ’otam.
wyc mmnw el hmcbx Sbe pemym wymSx at hmcbx wat kl klyw wat hkyr wat knw lqdSm and he sprinkled thereof upon the butcher-kitchen seven times, and lubeed the butcher-kitchen and all his tools, both the bulging and his base, to dedicate-finify them. vayaz mimenu ‘al hamizbeakh sheba‘ pe‘amim, vayimshakh hamizbeakh ve’et kal kelav ve’et hakiyor ve’et kano leqadesham.
wyzq mSmn hmSxh el raS ahrn wymSx atw lqdSw and he poured of the lubeing name-from-oil upon aaron-cabinet's head, and lubeed him, to dedicate-finify him. vayizoq mishemen hamishkhah ‘al rosh ’aharon, vayimshakh ’oto leqadesho.
wyqrb mSh at bny ahrn wylbSm ktnt wyxgr atm abnT wyxbS lhm mgbewt kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and mose-extracted brought aaron-cabinet's children-betweens, and put you-wrote-coats upon them, and girded them with girdles, and put bonnets upon them; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayaqreb mosheh benei ’aharon vayalbishem kutonot vayakhgor ’otam ’abnet vayakhabosh lahem migba‘ot, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.

wySxT wyqx mSh at hdm wytn el qrnwt hmcbx sbyb bazbew wyxTa at hmcbx wat hdm yzq al yswd hmcbx wyqdShw lkpr elyw and he slew it; and mose-extracted took the blood, and put it upon the horn-rays of the butcher-kitchen round about with his finger, and missed the butcher-kitchen, and poured the blood at the bottom of the butcher-kitchen, and dedicated-finished it, to make reconciliation upon it. vayishkhat vayiqakh mosheh hadam vayiten ‘al qarnot hamizbeakh sabib be’ezba‘o vaykhatei hamizbeakh, ve’et hadam yazaq ’el yesod hamizbeakh vayqadeshehu lekhaper ‘alav.

wmsl hmzwt aSr lpny yhwh lqx xlt mzh axt wxlt lxm Smn axt wrqyq axd wySm el hxlbym wel Swq hymyn and out of the basket of lit-mazat, that was before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, he took one unleavened cake, and a cake of name-from-oiled bread, and one wafer, and put them on the fat, and upon the right shoulder: umisal hamazot ’asher lifnei yhvh laqakh khalat mazah ’akhat vekhalat lekhem shemen ’akhat veraqiq ’ekhad, vayasem ‘al hakhalabim ve‘al shoq hayamin.

wyamr mSh al ahrn wal bnyw bSlw at hbSr ptx ahl mwed wSm taklw atw wat hlxm aSr bsl hmlaym kaSr zwyty lamr ahrn wbnyw yaklhw and mose-extracted said unto aaron-cabinet and to his children-betweens, grace-boil the flesh at the opening of the tent of until-conception: and there eat it with the bread that is in the basket of fullnesss, as i direct, saying, aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens eat it. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon ve’el banav bashelu habasar petakh ’ohel mo‘ed vesham tokhelu ’oto ve’et halekhem ’asher besal hamilu’im, ka’asher ziveti lemor ’aharon ubanav yokheluhu.

kaSr eSh bywm hch zwh yhwh leSt lkpr elykm as he hath done this day, so yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct to do, to make an out-of-town-ment for you. ka’asher ‘asah bayom hazeh, zivah yhvh la‘asot lekhaper ‘alekhem.

wyeS ahrn wbnyw at kl hdbrym aSr zwh yhwh byd mSh so aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens did all things which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct by the hand of mose-extracted. vaya‘as ’aharon ubanav, kal hadebarim ’asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh.
wyhy bywm hSmyny qra mSh lahrn wlbnyw wlcqny ySral and it came to pass on the eighth day, that mose-extracted called aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, and the elders of israel-juicy-towards; vayhi bayom hashemini qara mosheh le’aharon ulebanav, uleziqnei yisra’el.

wySa ahrn at ydw ydyw al hem wybrkm wyrd meSt hxTat whelh whSlmym and aaron-cabinet lifted up his hand toward the with-mum-people, and knee-fluffy-blessed them, and came down from inward of the miss, and the on-up, and wholes. vayisa ’aharon yadav ’el ha‘am vaybarekhem, vayered me‘asot hakhatat veha‘olah vehashelamim.
wyba mSh wahrn al ahl mwed wyzaw wybrkw at hem wyra kbwd yhwh al kl hem and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet went into the tent of until-conception, and came out, and knee-fluffy-blessed the with-mum-people: and the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appeared unto all the with-mum-people. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el ’ohel mo‘ed vayeze’u vaybarakhu ha‘am, vayera khebod yhvh ’el kal ha‘am.
wtza aS mlpny yhwh wtakl el hmcbx at helh wat hxlbym wyra kl hem wyrnw wyplw el pnyhm and there came a fire out from before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and consumed upon the butcher-kitchen the on-up and the fat: which when all the with-mum-people saw, they shouted, and fell on their face-turns-turns. vatezei ’esh milifnei yhvh vatokhal ‘al hamizbeakh ha‘olah ve’et hakhalabim, vayar kal ha‘am vayaronu vayipelu ‘al penehem.
wyqxw bny ahrn ndb wabyhwa ayS mxttw wytnw bhn aS wySymw elyh qTrt wyqrbw lpny yhwh aS crh aSr la zwh atm and nadab-volunteer and abihu-he-my-pa, children-betweens of aaron-cabinet, took either of them his censer, and put fire therein, and put incense thereon, and inwarded strange fire before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which he direct them not. vayiqkhu bene ’aharon nadab va’abihu ’ish makhtato vayitenu bahen ’esh vayasimu ‘aleha qetoret, vayaqribu lifnei yhvh ’esh zarah ’asher lo zivah ’otam.

wyamr mSh al ahrn hwa aSr dbr yhwh lamr bqrby aqdS wel pny kl hem akbd wydm ahrn then mose-extracted said unto aaron-cabinet, this is it that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake, saying, i will be dedicated-finished in them that come nigh me, and before-turns all the with-mum-people i will be heavied. and aaron-cabinet held his peace. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon hu ’asher diber yhvh lemor biqrobay ’eqadesh ve‘al penei khal ha‘am ’ekabed, vayidom ’aharon.
wyqra mSh al mySal wal alzpn bny ecyal dd ahrn wyamr alhm qrbw Saw at axykm mat pny hqdS al mxwz lmxnh and mose-extracted called mishael-towards-poll and elzaphan-towards-cipher, children-betweens of uz-gooseziel the uncle of aaron-cabinet, and said unto them, come near, carry your brethren from before-turns the dedicated-finished out of the camp. vayiqra mosheh ’el misha’el ve’el ’elzafan benei ‘uzi’el dod ’aharon, vayomer ’alehem qirbu se’u ’akhekhem me’et pene haqodesh ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh.
wyqrbw wySam bktntm al mxwz lmxnh kaSr dbr mSh so they went near, and carried them in their you-wrote-coats out of the camp; as mose-extracted had said. vayiqrebu vayisa’um bekhutonotam ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh, ka’asher diber mosheh.
wyamr mSh al ahrn wlalecr wlaytmr bnyw raSykm al tprew wbgdykm la tprmw wla tmtw wel kl hedh yqzp waxykm kl byt ySral ybkw at hSrph aSr Srp yhwh and mose-extracted said unto aaron-cabinet, and unto eleazar-towards-stop and unto itamar-with-palm, his children-betweens, uncover not your heads, neither rend your clothes; lest ye die, and lest wrath come upon all the with-mum-people: and let your brethren, the whole daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards, bewail the burning which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath kindled. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon ule’el‘azar ule’itamar banav rashekhem ’al tifra‘u ubigdekhem lo tifromu velo tamutu ve‘al kal ha‘edah yiqzof, va’akhekhem kal bet yisra’el yibku haserefah ’asher saraf yhvh.
wmptx ahl mwed la tzaw pn tmtw ky Smn mSxt yhwh elykm wyeSw kdbr mSh and ye not go out from the opening of the tent of until-conception, lest ye die: for the lubeing name-from-oil of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is upon you. and they did according to the bee-word of mose-extracted. umipetakh ’ohel mo‘ed lo teze’u pen tamutu ki shemen mishkhat yhvh ‘alekhem, vaya‘asu kidbar mosheh.
wydbr yhwh al ahrn lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto aaron-cabinet, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el ’aharon lemor.
yyn wSkr al tSt ath wbnyk atk bbakm al ahl mwed wla tmtw xqt ewlm ldrtykm do not drink wine-inherit nor strong drink, thou, nor thy children-betweens with thee, when ye go into the tent of until-conception, lest ye die: it be a statute for ever throughout your generations: yayin veshekhar ’al teshet ’atah ubanekha ’itakh bebo’akhem ’el ’ohel mo‘ed velo tamutu, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem.
wlhbdyl byn hqdS wbyn hxl wbyn hTma wbyn hThwr and that ye may put difference between-bin dedicated-finished and starting, and between-bin stained-ceased and bright-climaxing; ulahabdil ben haqodesh uben hakhol, uben hatamei uben hatahor.
wlhwrt at bny ySral at kl hxqym aSr dbr yhwh alyhm byd mSh and that ye may teach children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards all the statutes which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath bee-spoken unto them by the hand of mose-extracted. ulehorot benei yisra’el, kal hakhuqim ’asher diber yhvh ’alehem beyad mosheh.
wydbr mSh al ahrn wal alecr wal aytmr bnyw hnwtrym qxw at hmnxh hnwtrt maSy yhwh waklwh mzwt azl hmcbx ky qdS qdSym hwa and mose-extracted spake unto aaron-cabinet, and unto eleazar-towards-stop and unto itamar-with-palm, his children-betweens that were left, take the absorber that remaineth of the inwards of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire, and eat it without leaven beside the butcher-kitchen: for it is most dedicated-finished: vaydaber mosheh ’el ’aharon ve’el ’el‘azar ve’el ’itamar banav hanotarim qekhu haminkhah hanoteret me’ishei yhvh ve’ikhluha mazot ’ezel hamizbeakh, ki qadashim hi
wakltm ath bmqwm qdS ky xqk wxq bnyk hwa maSy yhwh ky kn zwyty and ye eat it in the dedicated-finished place, because it is thy due, and thy children-betweens' due, of the butchers of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire: for so i am direct. va’akhaltem ’otah bemaqom qadosh ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha hi me’ishei yhvh, ki khen zuveti.
wat xch htnwph wat Swq htrwmh taklw bmqwm Thwr ath wbnyk wbntyk atk ky xqk wxq bnyk ntnw mcbxy Slmy bny ySral and the sieve-pana breast and raise shoulder ye eat in a bright-climaxing place; thou, and thy children-betweens, and thy children-betweenesss with thee: for they be thy due, and thy children-betweens' due, which are given out of the butchers of wholes of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. ve’et khazeh hatenufah ve’et shoq haterumah tokhelu bemaqom tahor ’atah ubanekha ubenotekha ’itakh, ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha nitenu mizibkhei shalmei benei yisra’el.
Swq htrwmh wxch htnwph el aSy hxlbym ybyaw lhnyp tnwph lpny yhwh whyh lk wlbnyk atk lxq ewlm kaSr zwh yhwh the raise shoulder and the sieve-pana breast they bring with the inwards made by fire of the fat, to sieve-pana it for a sieve before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and it be thine, and thy children-betweens' with thee, by a statute for ever; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct. shoq haterumah vakhazeh hatenufah ‘al ’ishei hakhalabim yabi’u lehanif tenufah lifnei yhvh, vehayah lekha ulebanekha ’itekha lekhaq ‘olam ka’asher zivah yhvh.
wat Seyr hxTat drS drS mSh whnh Srp wyqzp el alecr wel aytmr bny ahrn hnwtrm lamr and mose-extracted diligently sought the intense-goat of the miss, and, behold, it was burnt: and he was angry with eleazar-towards-stop and itamar-with-palm, children-betweens of aaron-cabinet which were left alive, saying, ve’et se‘ir hakhatat darosh darash mosheh vehineh soraf, vayiqzof ‘al ’el‘azar ve‘al ’itamar benei ’aharon hanotarim lemor.
mdwe la akltm at hxTat bmqwm hqdS ky qdS qdSym hwa wath ntn lkm lSat at ewn hedh lkpr elyhm lpny yhwh wherefore have ye not eaten the miss in the dedicated-finished place, seeing it is most dedicated-finished, and to-no-these hath given it you to bear the torment of the until-witness, to make out-of-town-ment for them before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah? madua‘ lo ’akhaltem hakhatat bimqom haqodesh ki qadashim hi ve’otah natan lakhem laset ‘avon ha‘edah lekhaper ‘alehem lifnei yhvh.
hn la hwba at dmh al hqdS pnymh akwl taklw ath bqdS kaSr zwyty behold, the blood of it was not brought in within the dedicated-finished place: ye should indeed have eaten it in the dedicated-finished place, as i direct. hen lo huba damah ’el haqodesh. ’akhol tokhelu ’otah baqodesh ka’asher ziveti.
