whyth cat lkm lxqt ewlm lkpr el bny ySral mkl xTatm axt bSnh wyeS kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and this be an everlasting statute unto you, to make an out-of-town-ment for children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards for all their misses once a year. and he did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vehayetah zot lakhem lekhuqat ‘olam lekhaper ‘al benei yisra’el mikal khatotam ’akhat bashanah, vaya‘as ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al ahrn wal bnyw wal kl bny ySral wamrt alyhm ch hdbr aSr zwh yhwh lamr speak unto aaron-cabinet, and unto his children-betweens, and unto all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them; this is the thing which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct, saying, daber ’el ’aharon ve’el banav ve’el kal benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh lemor.
ayS ayS mbyt ySral aSr ySxT Swr aw kSb aw ec bmxnh aw aSr ySxT mxwz lmxnh what man soever there be of the daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards, that killeth an wall-ox, or lamb, or intense-goat, in the camp, or that killeth it out of the camp, ’ish mibet yisra’el ’asher yishkhat shor ’o kheseb ’o ‘ez bamakhaneh, ’o ’asher yishkhat mikhuz lamakhaneh.
wal ptx ahl mwed la hbyaw lhqryb qrbn lyhwh lpny mSkn yhwh dm yxSb layS hhwa dm Spk wnkrt hayS hhwa mqrb emw and bringeth it not unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, to inward an inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah before-turns the dwelling of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; blood be imputed unto that man; he hath shed blood; and that man be cut off from his with-mum-people: ve’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lo hebi’o lehaqrib qarban yhvh lifnei mishkan yhvh, dam yekhasheb la’ish hahu dam shafakh venikhrat ha’ish hahu miqereb ‘amo.
lmen aSr ybyaw bny ySral at cbxyhm aSr hm cbxym el pny hSdh whbyam lyhwh al ptx ahl mwed al hkhn wcbxw cbxy Slmym lyhwh awtm to the end that children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards may bring their butchers, which they inward in the open field, even that they may bring them unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, unto the dimmer-server, and inward them for wholes unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. lema‘an ’asher yabi’u benei yisra’el zibkhehem ’asher hem zobekhim ‘al penei hasadeh vehebi’um yhvh ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed ’el hakohen, vezabekhu zibkhei shelamim yhvh ’otam.
wcrq hkhn at hdm el mcbx yhwh ptx ahl mwed whqTyr hxlb lryx nyxx lyhwh and the dimmer-server sprinkle the blood upon the butcher-kitchen of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah at the opening of the tent of until-conception, and burn the fat for a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vezaraq hakohen hadam ‘al mizbakh yhvh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, vehiqtir hakheleb lereakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wla ycbxw ewd at cbxyhm lSeyrm aSr hm cnym axryhm xqt ewlm thyh cat lhm ldrtm and they no more inward their butchers unto devils, after whom they have gone a whoring. this be a statute for ever unto them throughout their generations. velo yizbekhu ‘od zibkhehem lase‘irim ’asher hem zonim ’akharehem, khuqat ‘olam tihyeh zot lahem ledorotam.
walhm tamr ayS ayS mbyt ySral wmn hgr aSr ygwr btwkm aSr yelh elh aw cbx and thou say unto them, whatsoever man there be of the daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards, or of the strangers which sojourn among you, that inwardeth a on-up or butcher, va’alehem tomar ’ish mibet yisra’el umin hager ’asher yagur betokham, ’asher ya‘aleh ‘olah ’o zabakh.
wal ptx ahl mwed la ybyanw leSwt atw lyhwh wnkrt hayS hhwa memyw and bringeth it not unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, to inward it unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; even that man be cut off from his with-mum-people. ve’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lo yebi’enu la‘asot ’oto yhvh, venikhrat ha’ish hahu me‘amav.
wayS ayS mbyt ySral wmn hgr hgr btwkm aSr yakl kl dm wntty pny bnpS haklt at hdm whkrty ath mqrb emh and whatsoever man there be of the daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards, or of the strangers that sojourn among you, that eateth any manner of blood; i will even set my face-turns against that being that eateth blood, and will cut him off from inward his with-mum-people. ve’ish ’ish mibet yisra’el umin hager hagar betokham ’asher yokhal kal dam, venatati fanay banefesh ha’okhelet hadam vehikhrati miqereb ‘amah.
ky npS hbSr bdm hwa wany nttyw lkm el hmcbx lkpr el npStykm ky hdm hwa bnpS ykpr for the life of the flesh is in the blood: and i have given it to you upon the butcher-kitchen to make an out-of-town-ment for your beings: for it is the blood that maketh an out-of-town-ment for the being. ki nefesh habasar badam hi va’ani netativ lakhem ‘al hamizbeakh lekhaper ‘al nafshotekhem, ki hadam hu banefesh yekhaper.
el kn amrty lbny ySral kl npS mkm la takl dm whgr hgr btwkkm la yakl dm therefore i said unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, no being of you eat blood, neither any stranger that sojourneth among you eat blood. ‘al ken ’amarti libnei yisra’el kal nefesh mikem lo tokhal dam, vehager hagar betokhkhem lo yokhal dam.
wayS ayS mbny ySral wmn hgr hgr btwkm aSr yzwd zyd xyh aw ewp aSr yakl wSpk at dmw wkshw bepr and whatsoever man there be of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, or of the strangers that sojourn among you, which hunteth and catcheth any beast or fowl that may be eaten; he even pour out the blood thereof, and cover it with dust. ve’ish ’ish mibenei yisra’el umin hager hagar betokham ’asher yazud zed khayah ’o ‘of ’asher ye’akhel, veshafakh damo vekhisahu be‘afar.
ky npS kl bSr dmw bnpSw hwa wamr lbny ySral dm kl bSr la taklw ky npS kl bSr dmw hwa kl aklyw ykrt for it is the life of all flesh; the blood of it is for the life thereof: therefore i said unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, ye eat the blood of no manner of flesh: for the life of all flesh is the blood thereof: whosoever eateth it be cut off. ki nefesh kal basar damo benafsho hu va’omar libnei yisra’el dam kal basar lo tokhelu, ki nefesh kal basar damo hi kal ’okhelav yikaret.
wkl npS aSr takl nblh wTrph bacrx wbgr wkbs bgdyw wrxz bmym wTma ed herb wThr and every being that eateth that which died of itself, or that which was torn with beasts, whether it be one of your own country, or a stranger, he both wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even: then he be bright-climaxing. vekhal nefesh ’asher tokhal nebelah uterefah ba’ezrakh ubager, vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei ‘ad ha‘ereb vetaher.
wam la ykbs wbSrw la yrxz wnSa ewnw and if he wash them not, nor bathe his flesh; then he bear his torment. ve’im lo yekhabes ubesaro yirkhaz, venasa ‘avono.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm any yhwh alhykm speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
kmeSh arz mzrym aSr ySbtm bh la teSw wkmeSh arz knen aSr any mbya atkm Smh la teSw wbxqtyhm la tlkw after the doings of the land of mizraim-narrows, wherein ye dwelt, ye not do: and after the doings of the land of canaan-mobile-trade, whither i bring you, ye not do: neither ye walk in their ordinances. kema‘aseh ’erez mizrayim ’asher yeshabtem bah lo ta‘asu, ukhema‘aseh ’erez kena‘an ’asher ’ani mebi ’etkhem lo ta‘asu ubekhuqotehem lo telekhu.
at mSpTy teSw wat xqty tSmrw llkt bhm any yhwh alhykm ye do my decision-grammars, and keep mine ordinances, to walk therein: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. mishpatay ta‘asu ve’et khuqotay tishmeru lalekhet bahem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wSmrtm at xqty wat mSpTy aSr yeSh atm hadm wxy bhm any yhwh ye therefore keep my statutes, and my decision-grammars: which if a man do, he live in them: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ushemartem khuqotay ve’et mishpatay ’asher ya‘aseh. ha’adam vakhay bahem, ’ani yhvh.
ayS ayS al kl Sar bSrw la tqrbw lglwt erwh any yhwh none of you approach to any that is near of kin to him, to uncover their nakedness: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’ish ’ish ’el kal she’er besaro lo tiqrebu legalot ‘ervah, ’ani yhvh.
erwt abyk werwt amk la tglh amk hwa la tglh erwth the nakedness of thy father, or the nakedness of thy mother, thou not uncover: she is thy mother; no uncover her nakedness. ‘ervat ’abikha ve‘ervat ’imekha lo tegaleh, ’imekha hi lo tegaleh ‘ervatah.
erwt aSt abyk la tglh erwt abyk hwa the nakedness of thy father's woman thou not uncover: it is thy father's nakedness. ‘ervat ’eshet ’abikha lo tegaleh, ‘ervat ’abikha hi
erwt axwtk bt abyk aw bt amk mwldt byt aw mwldt xwz la tglh erwtn the nakedness of thy sister, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of thy father, or daughter-hoof-bat-child of thy mother, whether she be born at home, or born abroad, even their nakedness no uncover. ‘ervat ’akhotkha bat ’abikha ’o bat ’imekha moledet bayit ’o moledet khuz, lo tegaleh ‘ervatan.
erwt bt bnk aw bt btk la tglh erwtn ky erwtk hnh the nakedness of thy child-between's daughter-hoof-bat-child, or of thy daughter-hoof-bat-child's daughter-hoof-bat-child, even their nakedness no uncover: for theirs is thine own nakedness. ‘ervat bat binkha ’o bat bitekha lo tegaleh ‘ervatan, ki ‘ervatekha henah.
erwt bt aSt abyk mwldt abyk axwtk hwa la tglh erwth the nakedness of thy father's woman's daughter-hoof-bat-child, begotten of thy father, she is thy sister, no uncover her nakedness. ‘ervat bat ’eshet ’abikha moledet ’abikha ’akhotkha hi lo tegaleh ‘ervatah.
erwt axwt abyk la tglh Sar abyk hwa no uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she is thy father's near kinswoman. ‘ervat ’akhot ’abikha lo tegaleh, she’er ’abikha hi
erwt axwt amk la tglh ky Sar amk hwa no uncover the nakedness of thy mother's sister: for she is thy mother's near kinswoman. ‘ervat ’akhot ’imekha lo tegaleh, ki she’er ’imekha hi
erwt axy abyk la tglh al aStw la tqrb ddtk hwa no uncover the nakedness of thy father's brother, no approach to his woman: she is thine aunt. ‘ervat ’akhi ’abikha lo tegaleh, ’el ’ishto lo tiqrab dodatekha hi
erwt kltk la tglh aSt bnk hwa la tglh erwth no uncover the nakedness of thy daughter-hoof-bat-child in teaching: she is thy child-between's woman; no uncover her nakedness. ‘ervat kalatekha lo tegaleh, ’eshet binkha hi lo tegaleh ‘ervatah.
erwt aSt axyk la tglh erwt axyk hwa no uncover the nakedness of thy brother's woman: it is thy brother's nakedness. ‘ervat ’eshet ’akhikha lo tegaleh, ‘ervat ’akhikha hi
erwt aSh wbth la tglh at bt bnh wat bt bth la tqx lglwt erwth Sarh hnh cmh hwa no uncover the nakedness of a woman and her daughter-hoof-bat-child, neither thou take her child-between's daughter-hoof-bat-child, or her daughter-hoof-bat-child's daughter-hoof-bat-child, to uncover her nakedness; for they are her near kinswomen: it is wickedness. ‘ervat ’ishah ubitah lo tegaleh, ’et bat benah ve’et bat bitah lo tiqakh legalot ‘ervatah sha’arah henah zimah hi
waSh al axth la tqx lzrr lglwt erwth elyh bxyyh neither thou take a woman to her sister, to vex her, to uncover her nakedness, beside the other in her life time. ve’ishah ’el ’akhotah lo tiqakh, lizror legalot ‘ervatah bekhayeha.
wal aSh bndt Tmath la tqrb lglwt erwth also no approach unto a woman to uncover her nakedness, as long as she is put apart for her stained-ceasedness. ve’el ’ishah benidat tum’atah, lo tiqrab legalot ‘ervatah.
wal aSt emytk la ttn Skbtk lcre lTmah bh moreover no lie carnally with thy neighbor's woman, to cease thyself with her. ve’el ’eshet ‘amitekha lo titen shekhabetekha lezara‘, letame’ah bah.
wmcrek la ttn lhebyr lmlk wla txll at Sm alhyk any yhwh and no let any of thy seed pass through the fire to molech-king-moloch, neither thou profane the name of thy to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. umizar‘akha lo titen leha‘abir lamolekh, velo tekhalel shem ’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
wat ckr la tSkb mSkby aSh twebh hwa no lie with mankind, as with womankind: it is abomination. ve’et zakhar lo tishkab mishkebei ’ishah, to‘ebah hi
wbkl bhmh la ttn Skbtk lTmah bh waSh la temd lpny bhmh lrbeh tbl hwa neither thou lie with any beast to cease thyself therewith: neither any woman stand before-turns a beast to lie down thereto: it is confusion. ubekhal behemah lo titen shekhabetekha letame’ah bah, ve’ishah lo ta‘amod lifnei behemah lerib‘ah tebel hu.
al tTmaw bkl alh ky bkl alh nTmaw hgwym aSr any mSlx mpnykm cease not ye yourselves in any of these things: for in all these the nations are ceased which i cast out before-turns you: ’al titame’u bekhal ’eleh, ki bekhal ’eleh nitme’u hagoyim ’asher ’ani meshaleakh mipenekhem.
wtTma harz wapqd ewnh elyh wtqa harz at ySbyh and the land is ceased: therefore i do visit the torment thereof upon it, and the land itself vomiteth out her inhabitants. vatitma ha’arez va’efqod ‘avonah ‘aleha, vataqi ha’arez yoshebeha.
wSmrtm atm at xqty wat mSpTy wla teSw mkl htwebt halh hacrx whgr hgr btwkkm ye therefore keep my statutes and my decision-grammars, and not commit any of these abominations; neither any of your own nation, nor any stranger that sojourneth among you: ushemartem ’atem khuqotay ve’et mishpatay velo ta‘asu mikol hato‘ebot ha’eleh, ha’ezrakh vehager hagar betokhkhem.
ky at kl htwebt hal eSw anSy harz aSr lpnykm wtTma harz (for all these abominations have the men of the land done, which were before-turns you, and the land is ceased;) ki kal hato‘ebot ha’el ‘asu ’anshe ha’arez ’asher lifnekhem, vatitma ha’arez.
wla tqya harz atkm bTmakm ath kaSr qah at hgwy aSr lpnykm that the land spue not you out also, when ye cease it, as it spued out the nations that were before-turns you. velo taqi ha’arez betama’akhem ka’asher qa’ah hago ’asher lifnekhem.
ky kl aSr yeSh mkl htwebwt halh wnkrtw hnpSwt heSt mqrb emm for whosoever commit any of these abominations, even the beings that commit them be cut off from inward their with-mum-people. ki kal ’asher ya‘aseh mikol hato‘ebot ha’eleh, venikhretu hanefashot ha‘osot miqereb ‘amam.
wSmrtm at mSmrty lblty eSwt mxqwt htwebt aSr neSw lpnykm wla tTmaw bhm any yhwh alhykm therefore ye keep mine ordinance, that ye commit not any one of these abominable customs, which were committed before-turns you, and that ye cease not yourselves therein: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ushemartem mishmarti lebilti ‘asot mekhuqot hato‘ebot ’asher na‘asu lifnekhem velo titame’u bahem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor
dbr al kl edt bny ySral wamrt alhm qdSym thyw ky qdwS any yhwh alhykm speak unto all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, ye be dedicated-finished: for i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these am dedicated-finished. daber ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem qedoshim tihyu, ki qadosh ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
ayS amw wabyw tyraw wat Sbtty tSmrw any yhwh alhykm ye fear every man his mother, and his father, and keep my sabbath-sevens: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ’ish ’imo ve’abiv tira’u ve’et shabetotay tishmoru, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
al tpnw al halylym walhy mskh la teSw lkm any yhwh alhykm turn ye not unto idols, nor make to yourselves molten to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ’al tifnu ’el ha’elilim velohei masekhah lo ta‘asu lakhem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wky tcbxw cbx Slmym lyhwh lrznkm tcbxhw and if ye inward a butcher of wholes unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, ye inward it at your own will. vekhi tizbekhu zebakh shelamim yhvh, lirzonekhem tizbakhuhu.
bywm cbxkm yakl wmmxrt whnwtr ed ywm hSlySy baS ySrp it be eaten the same day ye inward it, and on the morrow: and if ought remain until the third day, it be burnt in the fire. beyom zibkhakhem ye’akhel umimakhorat, vehanotar ‘ad yom hashelishi ba’esh yisaref.
wam hakl yakl bywm hSlySy pgwl hwa la yrzh and if it be eaten at all on the third day, it is abominable; it not be accepted. ve’im he’akhol ye’akhel bayom hashelishi, pigul hu lo yerazeh.
waklyw ewnw ySa ky at qdS yhwh xll wnkrth hnpS hhwa memyh therefore every one that eateth it bear his torment, because he hath profaned the dedicateed thing of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. ve’okhelav ‘avono yisa ki qodesh yhvh khilel, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘ameha.
wbqzrkm at qzyr arzkm la tklh pat Sdk lqzr wlqT qzyrk la tlqT and when ye reap the harvest of your land, no wholly reap the corners of thy field, neither thou gather the gleanings of thy harvest. ubequzrekhem qezir ’arzekhem lo tekhaleh pe’at sadekha veleqet qezirekha lo telaqet.
wkrmk la tewll wprT krmk la tlqT leny wlgr tecb atm any yhwh alhykm and no glean thy vineyard, neither thou gather every grape of thy vineyard; thou leave them for the poor and stranger: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. vekharmekha lo te‘olel uferet karmekha lo telaqet, le‘ani velager ta‘azob ’otam ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
la tgnbw wla tkxSw wla tSqrw ayS bemytw ye not steal, neither deal falsely, neither lie one to another. lo tignobu, velo tekhakhashu velo teshaqeru ’ish ba‘amito.
wla tSbew bSmy lSqr wxllt at Sm alhyk any yhwh and ye not swear by my name falsely, neither thou profane the name of thy to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. velo tishabe‘u bishmi lashaqer, vekhilalta shem ’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
la teSq at rek wla tgcl la tlyn pelt Skyr atk ed bqr no defraud thy neighbor, neither rob him: the wages of him that is hired not abide with thee all night until the morning. lo ta‘ashoq re‘akha velo tigzol, lo talin pe‘ulat sakhir ’itekha ‘ad boqer.
la tqll xrS wlpny ewr la ttn mkSl wyrat malhyk any yhwh no curse the deaf, nor put a stumbling-block before-turns the blind, and fear thy to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. lo teqalel kheresh velifnei ‘iver lo titen mikhshol, veyareta me’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
la teSw ewl bmSpT la tSa pny dl wla thdr pny gdwl bzdq tSpT emytk ye do no not being right in decision-grammar: no respect the person of the poor, nor honor the person of the mighty: and in being right thou decide thy neighbor. lo ta‘asu ‘avel bamishpat lo tisa fene dal velo tehdar penei gadol, bezedeq tishpot ‘amitekha.
la tlk rkyl bemyk la temd el dm rek any yhwh no go up and down as a talebearer among thy with-mum-people: neither thou stand against the blood of thy neighbor; i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. lo telekh rakhil be‘amekha lo ta‘amod ‘al dam re‘ekha, ’ani yhvh.
la tSna at axyk blbbk hwkx twkyx at emytk wla tSa elyw xTa no hate thy brother in thine heart: thou in any wise rebuke thy neighbor, and not suffer miss upon him. lo tisna ’akhikha bilbabekha, hokheakh tokhiakh ‘amitekha velo tisa ‘alav khet.
la tqm wla tTr at bny emk wahbt lrek kmwk any yhwh no avenge, nor bear any grudge against children-betweens of thy with-mum-people, and thou love thy neighbor as thyself: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. lo tiqom velo titor ’et benei ‘amekha ve’ahabta lere‘akha kamokha, ’ani yhvh.
at xqty tSmrw bhmtk la trbye klaym Sdk la tcre klaym wbgd klaym SeTnc la yelh elyk ye keep my statutes. no let thy in-them-animal gender with a diverse kind: no sow thy field with mingled seed: neither a garment mingled of linen and woolen come upon thee. khuqotay tishmoru behemtekha lo tarbia‘ kil’ayim sadekha lo tizra‘ kil’ayim, ubeged kil’ayim sha‘atnez lo ya‘aleh ‘alekha.
wayS ky ySkb at aSh Skbt cre whwa Spxh nxrpt layS whpdh la npdth aw xpSh la ntn lh bqrt thyh la ywmtw ky la xpSh and whosoever lieth carnally with a woman, that is a bondmaid, betrothed to an man, and not at all redeemed, nor freedom given her; she be scourged; they not be put to death, because she was not free. ve’ish ki yishkab ’et ’ishah shikhbat zera‘ vehiv shifkhah nekherefet le’ish vehafedeh lo nifdatah ’o khufshah lo nitan lah, biqoret tihyeh lo yumetu ki lo khupashah.
whbya at aSmw lyhwh al ptx ahl mwed ayl aSm and he inward his fire-name unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, even a ram-voiceless for a fire-name. vehebi ’ashamo yhvh ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, ’el ’asham.
wkpr elyw hkhn bayl haSm lpny yhwh el xTatw aSr xTa wnslx lw mxTatw aSr xTa and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for him with the ram-voiceless of the fire-name before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for his miss which he hath done: and the miss which he hath done be released him. vekhiper ‘alav hakohen be’el ha’asham lifnei yhvh ‘al khatato ’asher khata, venislakh lo mekhatato ’asher khata.
wky tbaw al harz wnTetm kl ez makl werltm erltw at pryw SlS Snym yhyh lkm erlym la yakl and when ye come into the land, and have planted all manner of trees for food, then ye count the fruit thereof as foreskinned: three years it be as foreskinned unto you: it not be eaten of. vekhi tabo’u ’el ha’arez uneta‘tem kal ‘ez ma’akhal va‘araltem ‘arelato piryo, shalosh shanim yihyeh lakhem ‘arelim lo ye’akhel.
wbSnh hrbyet yhyh kl pryw qdS hlwlym lyhwh and in the fourth year all the fruit thereof be dedicated-finished to praise yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah withal. ubashanah harebi‘it yihyeh kal piryo, qodesh hilulim yhvh.
wbSnh hxmySt taklw at pryw lhwsyp lkm tbwatw any yhwh alhykm and in the fifth year ye eat of the fruit thereof, that it may yield unto you the increase thereof: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ubashanah hakhamishit tokhelu piryo lehosif lakhem tebu’ato, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
la taklw el hdm la tnxSw wla tewnnw ye not eat any thing with the blood: neither ye use enchantment, nor guard-observe times. lo tokhelu ‘al hadam, lo tenakhashu velo te‘onenu.
la tqpw pat raSkm wla tSxyt at pat cqnk ye not round the corners of your heads, neither thou mar the corners of thy beard. lo taqifu pe’at roshekhem, velo tashkhit pe’at zeqanekha.
wSrT lnpS la ttnw bbSrkm wktbt qeqe la ttnw bkm any yhwh ye not make any cuttings in your flesh for the dead, nor print any marks upon you: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. veseret lanefesh lo titenu bibsarkhem ukhetobet qa‘aqa‘ lo titenu bakhem, ’ani yhvh.
al txll at btk lhcnwth wla tcnh harz wmlah harz cmh do not prostitute thy daughter-hoof-bat-child, to cause her to be a whore; lest the land fall to whoredom, and the land become full of wickedness. ’al tekhalel bitekha lehaznotah, velo tizneh ha’arez umale’ah ha’arez zimah.
at Sbtty tSmrw wmqdSy tyraw any yhwh ye keep my sabbath-sevens, and reverence my dedicated-finished: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. shabetotay tishmoru umiqdashi tira’u, ’ani yhvh.
al tpnw al habt wal hydenym al tbqSw lTmah bhm any yhwh alhykm regard not them that have familiar breath-spirits, neither seek after wizards, to be ceased by them: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ’al tifnu ’el ha’obot ve’el hayide‘onim ’al tebaqshu letame’ah bahem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
mpny Sybh tqwm whdrt pny cqn wyrat malhyk any yhwh thou rise up before-turns the hoary head, and honor the face-turns of the old man, and fear thy to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. mipenei sebah taqum vehadarta penei zaqen, veyareta me’elohekha ’ani yhvh.
wky ygwr atk gr barzkm la twnw atw and if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land, ye not vex him. vekhi yagur ’itekha ger be’arzekhem, lo tonu ’oto.
kacrx mkm yhyh lkm hgr hgr atkm wahbt lw kmwk ky grym hyytm barz mzrym any yhwh alhykm and the stranger that dwelleth with you be unto you as one born among you, and thou love him as thyself; for ye were strangers in the land of mizraim-narrows: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ke’ezrakh mikem yihyeh lakhem hager hagar ’itekhem ve’ahabta lo kamokha ki gerim heyitem be’erez mizrayim, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
la teSw ewl bmSpT bmdh bmSql wbmSwrh ye do no not being right in decision-grammar, in meteyard, in weight, or in measure. lo ta‘asu ‘avel bamishpat, bamidah bamishqal ubamesurah.
macny zdq abny zdq aypt zdq whyn zdq yhyh lkm any yhwh alhykm aSr hwzaty atkm marz mzrym just balances, just weights, a just ephah-tired, and a just here-hin, ye have: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, which brought you out of the land of mizraim-narrows. mozenei zedeq ’abne zedeq ’efat zedeq vehin zedeq yihyeh lakhem, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim.
wSmrtm at kl xqty wat kl mSpTy weSytm atm any yhwh therefore ye guard-observe all my statutes, and all my decision-grammars, and do them: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ushemartem kal khuqotay ve’et kal mishpatay va‘asitem ’otam, ’ani yhvh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
wal bny ySral tamr ayS ayS mbny ySral wmn hgr hgr bySral aSr ytn mcrew lmlk mwt ywmt em harz yrgmhw babn again, thou say to children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, whosoever he be of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, or of the strangers that sojourn in israel-juicy-towards, that giveth any of his seed unto molech-king-moloch; he surely be put to death: the with-mum-people of the land father-child-stone him with stones. ve’el benei yisra’el tomar ’ish mibenei yisra’el umin hager hagar beyisra’el ’asher yiten mizar‘o lamolekh mot yumat, ‘am ha’arez yirgemuhu ba’aben.
wany atn at pny bayS hhwa whkrty atw mqrb emw ky mcrew ntn lmlk lmen Tma at mqdSy wlxll at Sm qdSy and i will set my face-turns against that man, and will cut him off from inward his with-mum-people; because he hath given of his seed unto molech-king-moloch, to cease my dedicated-finished, and to profane my dedicated-finished name. va’ani ’eten panay ba’ish hahu vehikhrati miqereb ‘amo, ki mizar‘o natan lamolekh lema‘an tamei miqdashi ulekhalel shem qadshi
wam helm yelymw em harz at eynyhm mn hayS hhwa bttw mcrew lmlk lblty hmyt atw and if the with-mum-people of the land do any ways hide their eyes from the man, when he giveth of his seed unto molech-king-moloch, and kill him not: ve’im ha‘lem ya‘limu ‘am ha’arez ‘enehem min ha’ish hahu betito mizar‘o lamolekh, lebilti hamit ’oto.
wSmty any at pny bayS hhwa wbmSpxtw whkrty atw wat kl hcnym axryw lcnwt axry hmlk mqrb emm then i will set my face-turns against that man, and against his family, and will cut him off, and all that go a whoring after him, to prostitute with molech-king-moloch, from inward their with-mum-people. vesamti ’ani panay ba’ish hahu ubemishpakhto, vehikhrati ’oto ve’et kal hazonim ’akharav liznot ’akharei hamolekh miqereb ‘amam.
whnpS aSr tpnh al habt wal hydenym lcnwt axryhm wntty at pny bnpS hhwa whkrty atw mqrb emw and the being that turneth after such as have familiar breath-spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, i will even set my face-turns against that being, and will cut him off from inward his with-mum-people. vehanefesh ’asher tifneh ’el ha’obot ve’el hayide‘onim liznot ’akharehem, venatati panay banefesh hahiv vehikhrati ’oto miqereb ‘amo.
whtqdStm whyytm qdSym ky any yhwh alhykm dedicate-finify yourselves therefore, and be ye dedicated-finished: for i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. vehitqadishtem vihyitem qedoshim, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wSmrtm at xqty weSytm atm any yhwh mqdSkm and ye keep my statutes, and do them: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah which dedicate-finify you. ushemartem khuqotay va‘asitem ’otam, ’ani yhvh meqadishkhem.
ky ayS ayS aSr yqll at abyw wat amw mwt ywmt abyw wamw qll dmyw bw for every one that curseth his father or his mother be deadly put to death: he hath cursed his father or his mother; his blood be upon him. ki ’ish ’ish ’asher yeqalel ’abiv ve’et ’imo mot yumat, ’abiv ve’imo qilel damav bo.
wayS aSr ynap at aSt ayS aSr ynap at aSt rehw mwt ywmt hnap whnapt and the man that committeth adultery with another man's woman, even he that committeth adultery with his neighbor's woman, the adulterer and the adulteress surely be put to death. ve’ish ’asher yin’af ’et ’eshet ’ish ’asher yin’af ’et ’eshet re‘ehu, mot yumat hano’ef vehano’afet.
wayS aSr ySkb at aSt abyw erwt abyw glh mwt ywmtw Snyhm dmyhm bm and the man that lieth with his father's woman hath uncovered his father's nakedness: both of them surely be put to death; their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et ’eshet ’abiv ‘ervat ’abiv gilah, mot yumetu shenehem demehem bam.
wayS aSr ySkb at kltw mwt ywmtw Snyhm tbl eSw dmyhm bm and if a man lie with his daughter-hoof-bat-child in teaching, both of them surely be put to death: they have wrought confusion; their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et kalato mot yumetu shenehem, tebel ‘asu demehem bam.
wayS aSr ySkb at ckr mSkby aSh twebh eSw Snyhm mwt ywmtw dmyhm bm if a man also lie with mankind, as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination: they surely be put to death; their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et zakhar mishkebei ’ishah to‘ebah ‘asu shenehem, mot yumatu demehem bam.
wayS aSr yqx at aSh wat amh cmh hwa baS ySrpw atw wathn wla thyh cmh btwkkm and if a man take a woman and her mother, it is wickedness: they be burnt with fire, both he and they; that there be no wickedness among you. ve’ish ’asher yiqakh ’ishah ve’et ’imah zimah hi ba’esh yisrefu ’oto ve’ethen velo tihyeh zimah betokhkhem.
wayS aSr ytn Skbtw bbhmh mwt ywmt wat hbhmh thrgw and if a man lie with a beast, he surely be put to death: and ye slay the beast. ve’ish ’asher yiten shekhabeto bibhemah mot yumat, ve’et habehemah taharogu.
waSh aSr tqrb al kl bhmh lrbeh ath whrgt at haSh wat hbhmh mwt ywmtw dmyhm bm and if a woman approach unto any beast, and lie down thereto, thou kill the woman, and the beast: they surely be put to death; their blood be upon them. ve’ishah ’asher tiqrab ’el kal behemah lerib‘ah ’otah veharagta ha’ishah ve’et habehemah, mot yumatu demehem bam.
wayS aSr yqx at axtw bt abyw aw bt amw wrah at erwth whya trah at erwtw xsd hwa wnkrtw leyny bny emm erwt axtw glh ewnw ySa and if a man take his sister, his father's daughter-hoof-bat-child, or his mother's daughter-hoof-bat-child, and see her nakedness, and she see his nakedness; it is a wicked thing; and they be cut off in the sight of their with-mum-people: he hath uncovered his sister's nakedness; he bear his torment. ve’ish ’asher yiqakh ’akhoto bat ’abiv ’o bat ’imo vera’ah ‘ervatah vehi tir’eh ‘ervato khesed hu venikhretu le‘enei benei ‘amam, ‘ervat ’akhoto gilah ‘avono yisa.
wayS aSr ySkb at aSh dwh wglh at erwth at mqrh herh whya glth at mqwr dmyh wnkrtw Snyhm mqrb emm and if a man lie with a woman having her sickness, and uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them be cut off from inward their with-mum-people. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et ’ishah davah vegilah ‘ervatah meqorah he‘erah vehi giletah meqor dameha, venikhretu shenehem miqereb ‘amam.
werwt axwt amk waxwt abyk la tglh ky at Sarw herh ewnm ySaw and no uncover the nakedness of thy mother's sister, nor of thy father's sister: for he uncovereth his near kin: they bear their torment. ve‘ervat ’akhot ’imekha va’akhot ’abikha lo tegaleh, ki she’ero he‘erah ‘avonam yisa’u.
wayS aSr ySkb at ddtw erwt ddw glh xTam ySaw eryrym ymtw and if a man lie with his uncle's woman, he hath uncovered his uncle's nakedness: they bear their miss; they die childless. ve’ish ’asher yishkab ’et dodato ‘ervat dodo gilah, khet’am yisa’u ‘aririm yamutu.
wayS aSr yqx at aSt axyw ndh hwa erwt axyw glh eryrym yhyw and if a man take his brother's woman, it is an stained-ceased thing: he hath uncovered his brother's nakedness; they be childless. ve’ish ’asher yiqakh ’eshet ’akhiv nidah hi ‘ervat ’akhiv gilah ‘aririm yihyu.
wSmrtm at kl xqty wat kl mSpTy weSytm atm wla tqya atkm harz aSr any mbya atkm Smh lSbt bh ye therefore keep all my statutes, and all my decision-grammars, and do them: that the land, whither i bring you to dwell therein, spue you not out. ushemartem kal khuqotay ve’et kal mishpatay va‘asitem ’otam, velo taqi ’etkhem ha’arez ’asher ’ani mebi ’etkhem lashebet bah.
wla tlkw bxqt hgwy aSr any mSlx mpnykm ky at kl alh eSw waqz bm and ye not walk in the manners of the nation, which i cast out before-turns you: for they committed all these things, and therefore i crave-abhorred them. velo telekhu bekhuqot hago ’asher ’ani meshaleakh mipenekhem, ki kal ’eleh ‘asu va’aquz bam.
wamr lkm atm tyrSw at admtm wany atnnh lkm lrSt ath arz cbt xlb wdbS any yhwh alhykm aSr hbdlty atkm mn hemym and i have said unto you, ye inherit their land, and i will give it unto you to possess it, a land that floweth with milk and honey: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, which have separated you from other with-mum-people. va’omar lakhem ’atem tireshu ’admatam va’ani ’etenenah lakhem lareshet ’erez zabat khalab udebash, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hibdalti ’etkhem min ha‘amim.
whbdltm byn hbhmh hThrh lTmah wbyn hewp hTma lThr wla tSqzw at npStykm bbhmh wbewp wbkl aSr trmS hadmh aSr hbdlty lkm lTma ye therefore put difference between-bin bright-climaxing beasts and stained-ceased, and between-bin stained-ceased fowls and bright-climaxing: and ye not make your beings abominable by beast, or by fowl, or by any manner of living thing that creepeth on the ground, which i have separated from you as stained-ceased. vehibdaltem ben habehemah hatehorah lateme’ah uben ha‘of hatamei latahor, velo teshaqezu nafshotekhem babehemah uba‘of ubekhol ’asher tirmos ha’adamah ’asher hibdalti lakhem letame.
whyytm ly qdSym ky qdwS any yhwh wabdl atkm mn hemym lhywt ly and ye be dedicated-finished unto me: for i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah am dedicated-finished, and have severed you from other with-mum-people, that ye should be mine. vihyitem li qedoshim ki qadosh ’ani yhvh, va’abdil ’etkhem min ha‘amim lihyot li.
wayS aw aSh ky yhyh bhm awb aw ydeny mwt ywmtw babn yrgmw atm dmyhm bm a man also or woman that hath a familiar breath-spirit, or that is a wizard, surely be put to death: they father-child-stone them with stones: their blood be upon them. ve’ish ’o ’ishah ki yihyeh ’ob ’o yide‘oni mot yumatu, ba’eben yirgemu ’otam demehem bam.
wyamr yhwh al mSh amr al hkhnym bny ahrn wamrt alhm lnpS la yTma bemyw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, speak unto the dimmer-servers children-betweens of aaron-cabinet, and say unto them, there none be ceased for the dead among his with-mum-people: vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’emor ’el hakohanim benei ’aharon, ve’amarta ’alehem lenefesh lo yitama be‘amav.
ky am lSarw hqrb alyw lamw wlabyw wlbnw wlbtw wlaxyw and for his kin, that is near unto him, that is, for his mother, and for his father, and for his child-between, and for his daughter-hoof-bat-child, and for his brother. ki ’im lish’ero haqarob ’elav, le’imo ule’abiv velibno ulebito ule’akhiv.
wlaxtw hbtwlh hqrwbh alyw aSr la hyth layS lh yTma and for his sister a virgin, that is nigh unto him, which hath had no man; for her may he be ceased. vela’akhoto habetulah haqerobah ’elav ’asher lo hayetah le’ish, lah yitama.
la yTma bel bemyw lhxlw and he not cease himself, being a chief man among his with-mum-people, to profane himself. lo yitama ba‘al be‘amav, lehekhalo.
la yqrxh yqrxw qrxh braSm wpat cqnm la yglxw wbbSrm la ySrTw SrTt they not make baldness upon their head, neither they shave off the corner of their beard, nor make any cuttings in their flesh. lo yiqrekhu qarekhah berosham ufe’at zeqanam lo yegalekhu, ubibsaram lo yisretu saratet.
qdSym yhyw lalhyhm wla yxllw Sm alhyhm ky at aSy yhwh lxm alhyhm hm mqrybm whyw qdS they be dedicated-finished unto their to-no-these, and not profane the name of their to-no-these: for the inwards of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire, and the bread of their to-no-these, they do inward: therefore they be dedicated-finished. qedoshim yihyu lelohehem velo yekhalelu shem ’elohehem, ki ’ishei yhvh lekhem ’elohehem hem maqribim vehayu qodesh.
aSh cnh wxllh la yqxw waSh grwSh maySh la yqxw ky qdS hwa lalhyw they not take a woman that is a whore, or profane; neither they take a woman put away from her man: for he is dedicated-finished unto his to-no-these. ’ishah zonah vakhalalah lo yiqakhu ve’ishah gerushah me’ishah lo yiqakhu, ki qadosh hu lelohav.
wqdStw ky at lxm alhyk hwa mqryb qdS yhyh lk ky qdwS any yhwh mqdSkm thou dedicate-finify him therefore; for he inwardeth the bread of thy to-no-these: he be dedicated-finished unto thee: for i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which dedicate-finify you, am dedicated-finished. veqidashto ki lekhem ’elohekha hu maqrib, qadosh yihyeh lakh ki qadosh ’ani yhvh meqadishkhem.
wbt ayS khn ky txl lcnwt at abyh hya mxllt baS tSrp and the daughter-hoof-bat-child of any dimmer-server, if she profane herself by playing the whore, she profaneth her father: she be burnt with fire. ubat ’ish kohen ki tekhel liznot, ’abiha hi mekhalelet ba’esh tisaref.
whkhn hgdwl maxyw aSr ywzq el raSw Smn hmSxh wmla at ydw llbS at hbgdym at raSw la ypre wbgdyw la yprm and he that is the high dimmer-server among his brethren, upon whose head the lubeing name-from-oil was poured, and that is filld to put on the garments, not uncover his head, nor rend his clothes; vehakohen hagadol me’ekhav ’asher yuzaq ‘al rosho shemen hamishkhah umilei yado lilbosh habegadim, rosho lo yifra‘ ubegadav lo yifrom.
wel kl npSt mt la yba labyw wlamw la yTma neither he go in to any dead body, nor cease himself for his father, or for his mother; ve‘al kal nafshot met lo yabo, le’abiv ule’imo lo yitama.
wmn hmqdS la yza wla yxll at mqdS alhyw ky ncr Smn mSxt alhyw elyw any yhwh neither he go out of the dedicated-finished, nor profane the dedicated-finished of his to-no-these; for the crown of the lubeing name-from-oil of his to-no-these is upon him: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. umin hamiqdash lo yeze velo yekhalel miqdash ’elohav, ki nezer shemen mishkhat ’elohav ‘alav ’ani yhvh.
whwa aSh bbtwlyh yqx and he take a woman in her virginity. vehu ’ishah bibtuleha yiqakh.
almnh wgrwSh wxllh cnh at alh la yqx ky am btwlh memyw yqx aSh a widow, or a divorced woman, or profane, or an harlot, these he not take: and he take a virgin of his own with-mum-people to woman. ’almanah ugerushah vakhalalah zonah ’eleh lo yiqakh, ’im betulah me‘amav yiqakh ’ishah.
wla yxll crew bemyw ky any yhwh mqdSw neither he profane his seed among his with-mum-people: for i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah do dedicate-finify him. velo yekhalel zar‘o be‘amav, ki ’ani yhvh meqadesho.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al ahrn lamr ayS mcrek ldrtm aSr yhyh bw mwm la yqrb lhqryb lxm alhyw speak unto aaron-cabinet, saying, whosoever he be of thy seed in their generations that hath any blemish, let him not approach to inward the bread of his to-no-these. daber ’el ’aharon lemor, ’ish mizar‘akha ledorotam ’asher yihyeh bo mum lo yiqrab lehaqrib lekhem ’elohav.
ky kl ayS aSr bw mwm la yqrb ayS ewr aw psx aw xrm aw Srwe for whatsoever man he be that hath a blemish, he not approach: a blind man, or a lame, or he that hath a flat nose, or any thing superfluous, ki khal ’ish ’asher bo mum lo yiqrab, ’ish ‘iver ’o fiseakh ’o kharum ’o sarua‘.
aw ayS aSr yhyh bw Sbr rgl aw Sbr yd or a man that is broken-footed, or broken-handed, ’o ’ish ’asher yihyeh bo sheber ragel, ’o sheber yad.
aw gbn aw dq aw tbll beynw aw grb aw ylpt aw mrwx aSk or crookbacked, or a dwarf, or that hath a blemish in his eye, or be scurvy, or scabbed, or hath his stones broken; ’o giben ’o daq ’o tebalul be‘eno, ’o garab ’o yalefet ’o ’ashekh.
kl ayS aSr bw mwm mcre ahrn hkhn la ygS lhqryb at aSy yhwh mwm bw at lxm alhyw la ygS lhqryb no man that hath a blemish of the seed of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server come nigh to inward the inwards of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire: he hath a blemish; he not come nigh to inward the bread of his to-no-these. kal ’ish ’asher bo mum mizera‘ ’aharon hakohen lo yigash lehaqrib ’ishei yhvh, mum bo. lekhem ’elohav lo yigash lehaqrib.
lxm alhyw mqdSy hqdSym wmn hqdSym yakl he eat the bread of his to-no-these, both of the most dedicated-finished, and of the dedicated-finished. lekhem ’elohav haqodashim, umin haqodashim yokhel.
ak al hprkt la yba wal hmcbx la ygS ky mwm bw wla yxll at mqdSy ky any yhwh mqdSm only he not go in unto the breaker, nor come nigh unto the butcher-kitchen, because he hath a blemish; that he profane not my finishes: for i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah do dedicate-finify them. ’akh ’el haparokhet lo yabo ve’el hamizbeakh lo yigash ki mum bo, velo yekhalel miqdashay ki ’ani yhvh meqadesham.
wydbr mSh al ahrn wal bnyw wal kl bny ySral and mose-extracted told it unto aaron-cabinet, and to his children-betweens, and unto all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vaydaber mosheh ’el ’aharon ve’el banav, ve’el kal benei yisra’el.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al ahrn wal bnyw wyncrw mqdSy bny ySral wla yxllw at Sm qdSy aSr hm mqdSym ly any yhwh speak unto aaron-cabinet and to his children-betweens, that they separate themselves from the dedicated-finished things of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and that they profane not my dedicated-finished name in those things which they dedicate-finify unto me: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. daber ’el ’aharon ve’el banav veyinazeru miqadeshei bene yisra’el velo yekhalelu shem qadshi ’asher hem maqdishim li ’ani yhvh.
amr alhm ldrtykm kl ayS aSr yqrb mkl crekm al hqdSym aSr yqdySw bny ySral lyhwh wTmatw elyw wnkrth hnpS hhwa mlpny any yhwh say unto them, whosoever he be of all your seed among your generations, that goeth unto the dedicated-finished things, which children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards dedicate-finify unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, having his stained-ceasedness upon him, that being be cut off from my presence: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’emor ’alehem ledorotekhem kal ’asher yiqrab mikal zar‘akhem ’el haqodashim ’asher yaqdishu bene yisra’el yhvh vetum’ato ‘alav, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv milefanay ’ani yhvh.
ayS ayS mcre ahrn whwa zrwe aw cb bqdSym la yakl ed aSr yThr whnge bkl Tma npS aw ayS aSr tza mmnw Skbt cre what man soever of the seed of aaron-cabinet is a speckled-waspish, or hath a running issue; he not eat of the dedicated-finished things, until he be bright-climaxing. and whoso toucheth any thing that is stained-ceased by the dead, or a man whose seed goeth from him; ’ish ’ish mizera‘ ’aharon vehu zarua‘ ’o zab baqodashim lo yokhal ‘ad ’asher yithar, vehanogea‘ bekhal teme nefesh ’o ’ish ’asher tezei mimenu shikhbat zara‘.
aw ayS aSr yge bkl Srz aSr yTma lw aw badm aSr yTma lw lkl Tmatw or whosoever toucheth any creeping thing, whereby he may be made stained-ceased, or a man of whom he may take stained-ceasedness, whatsoever stained-ceasedness he hath; ’o ’ish ’asher yiga‘ bekhal sherez ’asher yitma lo, ’o be’adam ’asher yitma lo lekhol tum’ato.
npS aSr tge bw wTmah ed herb wla yakl mn hqdSym ky am rxz bSrw bmym the being which hath touched any such be stained-ceased until even, and not eat of the dedicated-finished things, unless he wash his flesh with from-waters. nefesh ’asher tiga‘ bo vetame’ah ‘ad ha‘areb, velo yokhal min haqodashim ki ’im rakhaz besaro bamayim.
wba hSmS wThr waxr yakl mn hqdSym ky lxmw hwa and when the sun is down, he be bright-climaxing, and afterward eat of the dedicated-finished things; because it is his food. uba hashemesh vetaher, ve’akhar yokhal min haqodashim ki lakhmo hu.
nblh wTrph la yakl lTmah bh any yhwh that which dieth of itself, or is torn with beasts, he not eat to cease himself therewith; i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. nebelah uterefah lo yokhal letame’ah bah, ’ani yhvh.
wSmrw at mSmrty wla ySaw elyw xTa wmtw bw ky yxllhw any yhwh mqdSm they therefore keep mine ordinance, lest they bear miss for it, and die therefore, if they profane it: i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah do dedicate-finify them. veshameru mishmarti velo yis’u ‘alav khet umetu bo ki yekhaleluhu, ’ani yhvh meqadesham.
wkl cr la yakl qdS twSb khn wSkyr la yakl qdS there no stranger eat of the dedicated-finished thing: a sojourner of the dimmer-server, or an hired worker, not eat of the dedicated-finished thing. vekhal zar lo yokhal qodesh, toshab kohen vesakhir lo yokhal qodesh.
wkhn ky yqnh npS qnyn kspw hwa yakl bw wylyd bytw hm yaklw blxmw and if the dimmer-server buy any being with his money, he eat of it, and he that is born in his daughter-house: they eat of his meat. vekhohen ki yiqneh nefesh qinyan kaspo hu yokhal bo, vilid beto hem yokhelu belakhmo.
wbt khn ky thyh layS cr hwa btrwmt hqdSym la takl if the dimmer-server's daughter-hoof-bat-child also be married unto a stranger, she may not eat of an inward of the dedicated-finished things. ubat kohen ki tihyeh le’ish zar, hi bitrumat haqodashim lo tokhel.
wbt khn ky thyh almnh wgrwSh wcre ayn lh wSbh al byt abyh knewryh mlxm abyh takl wkl cr la yakl bw and if the dimmer-server's daughter-hoof-bat-child be a widow, or divorced, and have no child, and is returned unto her father's daughter-house, as in her youth, she eat of her father's meat: and there be no stranger eat thereof. ubat kohen ki tihyeh ’almanah ugerushah vezera‘ ’en lah veshabah ’el bet ’abiha kin‘ureha milekhem ’abiha tokhel, vekhal zar lo yokhal bo.
wayS ky yakl qdS bSggh wysp xmSytw elyw wntn lkhn at hqdS and if a man eat of the dedicated-finished thing unwittingly, then he put the fifth part thereof unto it, and give it unto the dimmer-server with the dedicated-finished thing. ve’ish ki yokhal qodesh bishgagah, veyasaf khamishito ‘alav venatan lakohen haqodesh.
wla yxllw at qdSy bny ySral at aSr yrymw lyhwh and they not profane the dedicated-finished things of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which they inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; velo yekhalelu qadeshei benei yisra’el, ’asher yarimu yhvh.
whSyaw awtm ewn aSmh baklm at qdSyhm ky any yhwh mqdSm or suffer them to bear the torment of fire-name, when they eat their dedicated-finished things: for i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah do dedicate-finify them. vehisi’u ’otam ‘avon ’ashmah be’akhelam qadeshehem, ki ’ani yhvh meqadesham.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al ahrn wal bnyw wal kl bny ySral wamrt alhm ayS ayS mbyt ySral wmn hgr bySral aSr yqryb qrbnw lkl ndryhm wlkl ndbwtm aSr yqrybw lyhwh lelh speak unto aaron-cabinet, and to his children-betweens, and unto all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, whatsoever he be of the daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards, or of the strangers in israel-juicy-towards, that will inward his inward for all his vows, and for all his volunteers, which they will inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for a on-up; daber ’el ’aharon ve’el banav ve’el kal benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ish ’ish mibet yisra’el umin hager beyisra’el ’asher yaqrib qarebano lekhal nidrehem ulekhal nidbotam ’asher yaqribu yhvh le‘olah.
lrznkm tmym ckr bbqr bkSbym wbecym ye inward at your own will a rememberer simple, of the beeves, of the sheep, or of the intense-goats. lirzonekhem, tamim zakhar babaqar bakesabim uba‘izim.
kl aSr bw mwm la tqrybw ky la lrzwn yhyh lkm and whatsoever hath a blemish, that ye not inward: for it not be acceptable for you. kol ’asher bo mum lo taqribu, ki lo lerazon yihyeh lakhem.
wayS ky yqryb cbx Slmym lyhwh lpla ndr aw lndbh bbqr aw bzan tmym yhyh lrzwn kl mwm la yhyh bw and whosoever inwardeth a butcher of wholes unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to accomplish his vow, or a volunteer in beeves or sheep, it be perfect to be accepted; there be no blemish therein. ve’ish yaqrib zebakh shelamim yhvh lefale neder ’o lindabah babaqar ’o bazon, tamim yihyeh lerazon kal mum lo yihyeh bo.
ewrt aw Sbwr aw xrwz aw yblt aw grb aw ylpt la tqrybw alh lyhwh waSh la ttnw mhm el hmcbx lyhwh blind, or broken, or maimed, or having a wen, or scurvy, or scabbed, ye not inward these unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, nor make an inward by fire of them upon the butcher-kitchen unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ‘averet ’o shabur ’o kharuz ’o yabelet ’o garab ’o yalefet lo taqribu ’eleh yhvh, ve’isheh titenu mehem ‘al hamizbeakh yhvh.
wSwr wSh Srwe wqlwT ndbh teSh atw wlndr la yrzh either a bull or a lamb that hath any thing superfluous or lacking in his parts, that mayest thou inward for a volunteer; and for a vow it not be accepted. veshor vaseh sarua‘ veqalut, nedabah ta‘aseh uleneder lo yerazeh.
wmewk wktwt wntwq wkrwt la tqrybw lyhwh wbarzkm la teSw ye not inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah that which is bruised, or crushed, or broken, or cut; neither ye make any inward thereof in your land. uma‘ukh vekhatut venatuq vekharut lo taqribu yhvh, ube’arzekhem lo ta‘asu.
wmyd bn nkr la tqrybw at lxm alhykm mkl alh ky mSxtm bhm mwm bm la yrzw lkm neither from a stranger's hand ye inward the bread of your to-no-these of any of these; because their corruption is in them, and blemishes be in them: they not be accepted for you. umiyad ben nekhar lo taqribu ’et lekhem ’elohekhem mikal ’eleh, ki mashekhatam bahem mum bam lo yerazu lakhem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Swr aw kSb aw ec ky ywld whyh Sbet ymym txt amw wmywm hSmyny whlah yrzh lqrbn aSh lyhwh when a bull, or a sheep, or a intense-goat, is brought forth, then it be seven days under the dam; and from the eighth day and thenceforth it be accepted for a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. shor ’o kheseb ’o ‘ez ki yivaled vehayah shib‘at yamim takhat ’imo, umiyom hashemini vahale’ah yerazeh leqareban ’isheh yhvh.
wSwr aw Sh atw wat bnw la tSxTw bywm axd and whether it be cow, or ewe, ye not kill it and her young both in one day. veshor ’o seh, ’oto ve’et beno lo tishkhatu beyom ’ekhad.
wky tcbxw cbx twdh lyhwh lrznkm tcbxw and when ye will inward a butcher of thanksgiving unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, inward it at your own will. vekhi tizbekhu zebakh todah yhvh, lirzonekhem tizbakhu.
bywm hhwa yakl la twtyrw mmnw ed bqr any yhwh on the same day it be eaten up; ye leave none of it until the morrow: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. bayom hahu ye’akhel lo totiru mimenu ‘ad boqer, ’ani yhvh.
wSmrtm mzwty weSytm atm any yhwh therefore ye keep my directives, and do them: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ushemartem mizvotay va‘asitem ’otam, ’ani yhvh.
wla txllw at Sm qdSy wnqdSty btwk bny ySral any yhwh mqdSkm neither ye profane my dedicated-finished name; and i will be dedicateed among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah which dedicate-finify you, velo tekhalelu shem qadshi veniqdashti betokh benei yisra’el, ’ani yhvh meqadishkhem.
hmwzya atkm marz mzrym lhywt lkm lalhym any yhwh that brought you out of the land of mizraim-narrows, to be your to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. hamozi me’erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem lelohim, ’ani yhvh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm mwedy yhwh aSr tqraw atm mqray qdS alh hm mwedy speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, concerning the until-conceptions of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which ye proclaim to be dedicated-finished convocations, even these are my until-conceptions. daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem mo‘adei yhvh ’asher tiqre’u miqra’ei qodesh, ’eleh hem mo‘aday.
SSt ymym teSh mlakh wbywm hSbyey Sbt Sbtwn mqra qdS kl mlakh la teSw Sbt hwa lyhwh bkl mwSbtykm six days work be done: and the seventh day is the sabbath-seven of rest, an dedicated-finished convocation; ye do no work therein: it is the sabbath-seven of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in all your dwellings. sheshet yamim te‘aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi‘i shabat shabaton miqra qodesh kal melakhah lo ta‘asu, shabat hi yhvh bekhol moshebotekhem.
alh mwedy yhwh mqray qdS aSr tqraw atm bmwedm these are the until-conceptions of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, even dedicated-finished convocations, which ye proclaim in their seasons. ’eleh mo‘adei yhvh miqra’ei qodesh, ’asher tiqre’u bemo‘adam.
bxdS hraSwn barbeh eSr lxdS byn herbym psx lyhwh in the fourteenth day of the first month at even is yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's passover. bakhodesh harishon be’arba‘ah ‘asar lakhodesh ben ha‘arbayim, pesakh yhvh.
wbxmSh eSr ywm lxdS hch xg hmzwt lyhwh Sbet ymym mzwt taklw and on the fifteenth day of the same month is the until-conception of lit-mazat unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: seven days ye eat lit-mazat. ubakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hazeh khag hamazot yhvh, shib‘at yamim mazot tokhelu.
bywm hraSwn mqra qdS yhyh lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSw in the first day ye have an dedicated-finished convocation: ye do no servile work therein. bayom harishon miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem, kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
whqrbtm aSh lyhwh Sbet ymym bywm hSbyey mqra qdS kl mlakt ebdh la teSw and ye inward a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah seven days: in the seventh day is an dedicated-finished convocation: ye do no servile work therein. vehiqrabtem ’isheh yhvh shib‘at yamim, bayom hashebi‘i miqra qodesh kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ky tbaw al harz aSr any ntn lkm wqzrtm at qzyrh whbatm at emr raSyt qzyrkm al hkhn speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when ye be come into the land which i give unto you, and reap the harvest thereof, then ye bring a sheaf of the firstfruits of your harvest unto the dimmer-server: daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ki tabo’u ’el ha’arez ’asher ’ani noten lakhem uqezartem qezirah, vahabetem ‘omer reshit qezirekhem ’el hakohen.
whnyp at hemr lpny yhwh lrznkm mmxrt hSbt ynypnw hkhn and he sieve-pana the sheaf before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to be accepted for you: on the morrow after the sabbath-seven the dimmer-server sieve-pana it. vehenif ha‘omer lifnei yhvh lirzonekhem, mimakhorat hashabat yenifenu hakohen.
weSytm bywm hnypkm at hemr kbS tmym bn Sntw lelh lyhwh and ye inward that day when ye sieve-pana the sheaf an he lamb simple of the first year for a on-up unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. va‘asitem beyom hanifekhem ha‘omer, kebes tamim ben shenato le‘olah yhvh.
wmnxtw Sny eSrnym slt blwlh bSmn aSh lyhwh ryx nyxx wnskh yyn rbyet hhyn and the absorber thereof be two tenth deals of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil, a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for a smell fragrance: and the pouring thereof be of wine-inherit, the fourth part of an here-hin. uminkhato shenei ‘esronim solet belulah bashemen ’isheh yhvh reakh nikhoakh, veniskoh yayin rebi‘it hahin.
wlxm wqly wkrml la taklw ed ezm hywm hch ed hbyakm at qrbn alhykm xqt ewlm ldrtykm bkl mSbtykm and ye eat neither bread, nor parched corn-swimming, nor green ears, until the selfsame day that ye have brought an inward unto your to-no-these: it be a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings. velekhem veqali vekharmel lo tokhelu ‘ad ‘ezem hayom hazeh ‘ad habi’akhem qareban ’elohekhem, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem bekhol moshebotekhem.
wsprtm lkm mmxrt hSbt mywm hbyakm at emr htnwph Sbe Sbtwt tmymt thyynh and ye count unto you from the morrow after the sabbath-seven, from the day that ye brought the sheaf of the sieve; seven sabbath-sevens be complete: usefartem lakhem mimakhorat hashabat miyom habi’akhem ‘omer hatenufah, sheba‘ shabatot temimot tihyenah.
ed mmxrt hSbt hSbyet tsprw xmSym ywm whqrbtm mnxh xdSh lyhwh even unto the morrow after the seventh sabbath-seven ye number fifty days; and ye inward a new absorber unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ‘ad mimakhorat hashabat hashebi‘it tisperu khamishim yom, vehiqrabtem minkhah khadashah yhvh.
mmwSbtykm tbyaw lxm tnwph Stym Sny eSrnym slt thyynh xmz tapynh bkwrym lyhwh ye bring out of your habitations two sieve-pana loaves of two tenth deals; they be of fine basket-flour; they be baked with leaven; they are the firstfruits unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. mimoshebotekhem tabi’’u lekhem tenufah tayim shenei ‘esronim solet tihyenah khamez te’afenah, bikurim yhvh.
whqrbtm el hlxm Sbet kbSym tmymm bny Snh wpr bn bqr axd waylm Snym yhyw elh lyhwh wmnxtm wnskyhm aSh ryx nyxx lyhwh and ye inward with the bread seven lambs simple of the first year, and one bull child-between of visit-cattle, and two ram-voicelesss: they be for a on-up unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, with their absorber, and their pourings, even a feminine-firy, of smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehiqrabtem ‘al halekhem shib‘at kebasim temimim benei shanah ufar ben baqar ’ekhad ve’elim shenayim, yihyu ‘olah yhvh uminkhatam veniskehem ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
weSytm Seyr ecym axd lxTat wSny kbSym bny Snh lcbx Slmym then ye butcher one kid of the intense-goats for a miss, and two lambs of the first year for a butcher of wholes. va‘asitem se‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat, ushenei khebasim benei shanah lezebakh shelamim.
whnyp hkhn atm el lxm hbkwrym tnwph lpny yhwh el Sny kbSym qdS yhyw lyhwh lkhn and the dimmer-server sieve-pana them with the bread of the firstfruits for a sieve before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, with the two lambs: they be dedicated-finished to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for the dimmer-server. vehenif hakohen ’otam ‘al lekhem habikurim tenufah lifnei yhvh ‘al shenei kebasim, qodesh yihyu yhvh lakohen.
wqratm bezm hywm hch mqra qdS yhyh lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSw xqt ewlm bkl mwSbtykm ldrtykm and ye proclaim on the selfsame day, that it may be an dedicated-finished convocation unto you: ye do no servile work therein: it be a statute for ever in all your dwellings throughout your generations. uqeratem be‘ezem hayom hazeh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu, khuqat ‘olam bekhal moshebotekhem ledorotekhem.
wbqzrkm at qzyr arzkm la tklh pat Sdk bqzrk wlqT qzyrk la tlqT leny wlgr tecb atm any yhwh alhykm and when ye reap the harvest of your land, no make bright-climaxing riddance of the corners of thy field when thou reapest, neither thou gather any gleaning of thy harvest: thou leave them unto the poor, and to the stranger: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ubequzrekhem qezir ’arzekhem lo tekhaleh pe’at sadekha bequzrekha veleqet qezirekha lo telaqet, le‘ani velager ta‘azob ’otam ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
