kl mlakt ebdh la teSw whqrbtm aSh lyhwh ye do no servile work therein: and ye inward a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu, vehiqrabtem ’isheh yhvh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
ak beSwr lxdS hSbyey hch ywm hkprym hwa mqra qdS yhyh lkm wenytm at npStykm whqrbtm aSh lyhwh also on the tenth day of this seventh month there be a day of out-of-town-ment: it be an dedicated-finished convocation unto you; and ye pauper your beings, and inward a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’akh be‘asor lakhodesh hashebi‘i hazeh yom hakipurim hu miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem ve‘initem nafshotekhem, vehiqrabtem ’isheh yhvh.
wkl mlakh la teSw bezm hywm hch ky ywm kprym hwa lkpr elykm lpny yhwh alhykm and ye do no work in that same day: for it is a day of out-of-town-ment, to make an out-of-town-ment for you before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. vekhal melakhah lo ta‘asu be‘ezem hayom hazeh, ki yom kipurim hu lekhaper ‘alekhem lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem
ky kl hnpS aSr la tenh bezm hywm hch wnkrth memyh for whatsoever being it be that not be afflicted in that same day, he be cut off from his with-mum-people. ki khal hanefesh ’asher lo te‘uneh be‘ezem hayom hazeh, venikhretah me‘ameha.
wkl hnpS aSr teSh kl mlakh bezm hywm hch whabdty at hnpS hhwa mqrb emh and whatsoever being it be that doeth any work in that same day, the same being will i destroy from inward his with-mum-people. vekhal hanefesh ’asher ta‘aseh kal melakhah be‘ezem hayom hazeh, veha’abadti hanefesh hahiv miqereb ‘amah.
kl mlakh la teSw xqt ewlm ldrtykm bkl mSbtykm ye do no manner of work: it be a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings. kal melakhah lo ta‘asu, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem bekhol moshebotekhem.
Sbt Sbtwn hwa lkm wenytm at npStykm btSeh lxdS berb merb ed erb tSbtw Sbtkm it be unto you a sabbath-seven of rest, and ye pauper your beings: in the ninth day of the month at even, from even unto even, ye celebrate your sabbath-seven. shabat shabaton hu lakhem ve‘initem nafshotekhem, betish‘ah lakhodesh ba‘ereb me‘ereb ‘ad ‘ereb tishbetu shabatekhem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral lamr bxmSh eSr ywm lxdS hSbyey hch xg hskwt Sbet ymym lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, the fifteenth day of this seventh month be the until-conception of dwellings for seven days unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor, bakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hashebi‘i hazeh khag hasukot shib‘at yamim yhvh.
bywm hraSwn mqra qdS kl mlakt ebdh la teSw on the first day be an dedicated-finished convocation: ye do no servile work therein. bayom harishon miqra qodesh, kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
Sbet ymym tqrybw aSh lyhwh bywm hSmyny mqra qdS yhyh lkm whqrbtm aSh lyhwh ezrt hwa kl mlakt ebdh la teSw seven days ye inward a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: on the eighth day be an dedicated-finished convocation unto you; and ye inward a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: it is a solemn assembly; and ye do no servile work therein. shib‘at yamim taqribu ’isheh yhvh, bayom hashemini miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem vehiqrabtem ’isheh yhvh ‘azeret hi melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
alh mwedy yhwh aSr tqraw atm mqray qdS lhqryb aSh lyhwh elh wmnxh cbx wnskym dbr ywm bywmw these are the until-conceptions of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, which ye proclaim to be dedicated-finished convocations, to inward a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, a on-up, and a absorber, a butcher, and pourings, every thing upon his day: ’eleh mo‘adei yhvh ’asher tiqre’u miqra’ei qodesh, lehaqrib ’isheh yhvh ‘olah uminkhah zebakh unesakhim debar yom beyomo.
mlbd Sbtt yhwh wmlbd mtnwtykm wmlbd kl ndrykm wmlbd kl ndbwtykm aSr ttnw lyhwh beside the sabbath-sevens of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and beside your gifts, and beside all your vows, and beside all your volunteers, which ye give unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. milebad shabetot yhvh, umilebad matenotekhem umilebad kal nidrekhem umilebad kal nidbotekhem ’asher titenu yhvh.
ak bxmSh eSr ywm lxdS hSbyey baspkm at tbwat harz txgw at xg yhwh Sbet ymym bywm hraSwn Sbtwn wbywm hSmyny Sbtwn also in the fifteenth day of the seventh month, when ye have added in the fruit of the land, ye keep a until-conception unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah seven days: on the first day be a sabbath-seven, and on the eighth day be a sabbath-seven. ’akh bakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hashebi‘i be’asepekhem tebu’at ha’arez takhogu khag yhvh shib‘at yamim, bayom harishon shabaton ubayom hashemini shabaton.
wlqxtm lkm bywm hraSwn pry ez hdr kpt tmrym wenp ez ebt werby nxl wSmxtm lpny yhwh alhykm Sbet ymym and ye take you on the first day the boughs of goodly trees, branches of palm trees, and the boughs of thick trees, and willows of the brook; and ye rejoice before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these seven days. uleqakhtem lakhem bayom harishon peri ‘ez hadar kapot temarim va‘anaf ‘ez ‘abot ve‘arbe nakhal, usemakhtem lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem shib‘at yamim.
wxgtm atw xg lyhwh Sbet ymym bSnh xqt ewlm ldrtykm bxdS hSbyey txgw atw and ye do it a until-conception unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah seven days in the year. it be a statute for ever in your generations: ye celebrate it in the seventh month. vekhagotem ’oto khag yhvh shib‘at yamim bashanah, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem bakhodesh hashebi‘i takhogu ’oto.
bskt tSbw Sbet ymym kl hacrx bySral ySbw bskt ye dwell in booths seven days; all that are israel-juicy-towardsites born dwell in booths: basukot teshebu shib‘at yamim, kal ha’ezrakh beyisra’el yeshebu basukot.
lmen ydew drtykm ky bskwt hwSbty at bny ySral bhwzyay awtm marz mzrym any yhwh alhykm that your generations may hand-know that i made children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards to dwell in booths, when i brought them out of the land of mizraim-narrows: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. lema‘an yede‘u dorotekhem ki basukot hoshabti benei yisra’el behozi’i me’erez mizrayim, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wydbr mSh at medy yhwh al bny ySral and mose-extracted declared unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards the until-conceptions of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vaydaber mosheh mo‘adei yhvh, ’el benei yisra’el.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
zw at bny ySral wyqxw alyk Smn cyt ck ktyt lmawr lhelt nr tmyd direct children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they bring unto thee pure-tahor name-from-oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamps to burn continually. zav benei yisra’el veyiqkhu ’elekha shemen zayit zakh katit lama’or, leha‘alot ner tamid.
mxwz lprkt hedt bahl mwed yerk atw ahrn merb ed bqr lpny yhwh tmyd xqt ewlm ldrtykm without the breaker of the until-witness, in the tent of until-conception, aaron-cabinet order it from the evening unto the morning before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah continually: it be a statute for ever in your generations. mikhuz lefarokhet ha‘edut be’ohel mo‘ed ya‘arokh ’oto ’aharon me‘ereb ‘ad boqer lifnei yhvh tamid, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem.
el hmnrh hThrh yerk at hnrwt lpny yhwh tmyd he order the lamps upon the pure-tahor light-stream-candle before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah continually. ‘al hamenorah hatehorah ya‘arokh ’et hanerot, lifnei yhvh tamid.
wlqxt slt wapyt ath Stym eSrh xlwt Sny eSrnym yhyh hxlh haxt and thou take fine basket-flour, and bake twelve cakes thereof: two tenth deals be in one cake. velaqakhta solet ve’afita ’otah shetem ‘esreh khalot, shenei ‘esronim yihyeh hakhalah ha’ekhat.
wSmt awtm Stym merkwt SS hmerkt el hSlxn hThr lpny yhwh and thou set them in two rows, six on a row, upon the pure-tahor send-table before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vesamta ’otam shetayim ma‘arakhot shesh hama‘arakhet, ‘al hashulkhan hatahor lifnei yhvh.
wntt el hmerkt lbnh ckh whyth llxm lackrh aSh lyhwh and thou put pure-tahor white-frankincense upon each row, that it may be on the bread for a memorial, even a feminine-firy unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. venatata ‘al hama‘arekhet lebonah zakah, vehayetah lalekhem le’azkarah ’isheh yhvh.
bywm hSbt bywm hSbt yerknw lpny yhwh tmyd mat bny ySral bryt ewlm every sabbath-seven he set it in order before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah continually, being taken from children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards by an everlasting covenant. hashabat beyom hashabat ya‘arkhenu lifnei yhvh tamid, me’et bene yisra’el berit ‘olam.
whyth lahrn wlbnyw waklhw bmqwm qdS ky qdS qdSym hwa lw maSy yhwh xq ewlm and it be aaron-cabinet's and his children-betweens'; and they eat it in the dedicated-finished place: for it is most dedicated-finished unto him of the inwards of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made by fire by a perpetual statute. vehayetah le’aharon ulebanav va’akhaluhu bemaqom qadosh, ki qodesh qadashim hu lo me’ishei yhvh khaq ‘olam.
wyza bn aSh ySralyt whwa bn ayS mzry btwk bny ySral wynzw bmxnh bn hySralyt wayS hySraly and child-between of an israel-juicy-towardsitish woman, whose father was an mizraim-narrowsian, went out among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and this child-between of the israel-juicy-towardsitish woman and a man of israel-juicy-towards strove together in the camp; vayezei ben ’ishah yisre’elit vehu ben ’ish mizri betokh benei yisra’el, vayinazu bamakhaneh ben hayisre’elit ve’ish hayisre’eli.
wyqb bn haSh hySralyt at hSm wyqll wybyaw atw al mSh wSm amw Slmyt bt dbry lmTh dn and the israel-juicy-towardsitish woman's child-between blasphemed the name of the base-lord, and cursed. and they brought him unto mose-extracted: (and his mother's name was shelomi-my-peaceth, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of dibri, of the branch of dan-discuss:) vayiqob ben ha’ishah hayisre’elit hashem vayqalel vayabi’u ’oto ’el mosheh, veshem ’imo shelomit bat dibri lemateh dan.
wynyxhw bmSmr lprS lhm el py yhwh and they put him in ward, that the mind of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah might be showed them. vayanikhuhu bamishmar, lifrosh lahem pi yhvh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
hwza at hmqll al mxwz lmxnh wsmkw kl hSmeym at ydyhm el raSw wrgmw atw kl hedh bring forth him that hath cursed without the camp; and let all that heard him lay their hands upon his head, and let all the until-witness father-child-stone him. hozei hamqalel ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesamekhu khal hashome‘im yedehem ‘al rosho, veragemu ’oto kal ha‘edah.
wal bny ySral tdbr lamr ayS ayS ky yqll alhyw wnSa xTaw and thou speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, whosoever curseth his to-no-these bear his miss. ve’el benei yisra’el tedaber lemor, ’ish ki yeqalel ’elohav venasa khet’o.
wnqb Sm yhwh mwt ywmt rgwm yrgmw bw kl hedh kgr kacrx bnqbw Sm ywmt and he that blasphemeth the name of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, he surely be put to death, and all the until-witness certainly father-child-stone him: as well the stranger, as he that is born in the land, when he blasphemeth the name of the base-lord, be put to death. venoqeb shem yhvh mot yumat ragom yirgemu bo kal ha‘edah, kager ka’ezrakh benaqebo shem yumat.
wayS ky ykh kl npS adm mwt ywmt and he that killeth any man surely be put to death. ve’ish yakeh kal ’adam, mot yumat.
wmkh npS bhmh ySlmnh npS txt npS and he that killeth a beast make it good; beast for beast. umakeh nefesh behemah yeshalemenah, nefesh takhat nafesh.
wayS ky ytn mwm bemytw kaSr eSh kn yeSh lw and if a man cause a blemish in his neighbor; as he hath done, so it be done to him; ve’ish ki yiten mum ba‘amito, ka’asher ‘asah ken ye‘aseh lo.
Sbr txt Sbr eyn txt eyn Sn txt Sn kaSr ytn mwm badm kn yntn bw breach for breach, eye for eye, tooth for tooth: as he hath caused a blemish in a man, so it be done to him again. ber takhat sheber ‘ayin takhat ‘ayin shen takhat shen, ka’asher yiten mum ba’adam ken yinaten bo.
wmkh bhmh ySlmnh wmkh adm ywmt and he that killeth a beast, he restore it: and he that killeth a man, he be put to death. umakeh behemah yeshalemenah, umakeh ’adam yumat.
mSpT axd yhyh lkm kgr kacrx yhyh ky any yhwh alhykm ye have one manner of teaching, as well for the stranger, as for one of your own country: for i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. mishpat ’ekhad yihyeh lakhem kager ka’ezrakh yihyeh, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wydbr mSh al bny ySral wywzyaw at hmqll al mxwz lmxnh wyrgmw atw abn wbny ySral eSw kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and mose-extracted spake to children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they should bring forth him that had cursed out of the camp, and father-child-stone him with stones. and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vaydaber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el vayozi’u hamqalel mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu ’oto ’aben, ubene yisra’el ‘asu ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh bhr syny lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted in mount )sinai-bush-(proto, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh behar sinay lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ky tbaw al harz aSr any ntn lkm wSbth harz Sbt lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when ye come into the land which i give you, then the land keep a sabbath-seven unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ki tabo’u ’el ha’arez ’asher ’ani noten lakhem, veshabetah ha’arez shabat yhvh.
SS Snym tcre Sdk wSS Snym tcmr krmk waspt at tbwath six years thou sow thy field, and six years thou prune thy vineyard, and gather in the fruit thereof; shesh shanim tizra‘ sadekha veshesh shanim tizmor karmekha, ve’asafta tebu’atah.
wbSnh hSbyet Sbt Sbtwn yhyh larz Sbt lyhwh Sdk la tcre wkrmk la tcmr and in the seventh year be a sabbath-seven of rest unto the land, a sabbath-seven for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: thou neither sow thy field, nor prune thy vineyard. ubashanah hashebi‘it shabat shabaton yihyeh la’arez shabat yhvh, sadekha lo tizra‘ vekharmekha lo tizmor.
at spyx qzyrk la tqzwr wat enby ncyrk la tbzr Snt Sbtwn yhyh larz that which groweth of its own accord of thy harvest no reap, neither gather the grapes of thy vine undressed: for it is a year of rest unto the land. sefiakh qezirekha lo tiqzor ve’et ‘inebei nezirekha lo tibzor, shenat shabaton yihyeh la’arez.
whyth Sbt harz lkm laklh lk wlebdk wlamtk wlSkyrk wltwSbk hgrym emk and the sabbath-seven of the land be meat for you; for thee, and for thy worker, and for thy maid, and for thy hired worker, and for thy stranger that sojourneth with thee. vehayetah shabat ha’arez lakhem le’akhlah lekha ule‘abdekha vela’amatekha, veliskhirekha uletoshabekha hagarim ‘imakh.
wlbhmtk wlxyh aSr barzk thyh kl tbwath lakl and for thy in-them-animal, and for the beast that are in thy land, all the increase thereof be meat. velibhemtekha velakhayah ’asher be’arzekha, tihyeh khal tebu’atah le’ekhol.
wsprt lk Sbe Sbtt Snym Sbe Snym Sbe pemym whyw lk ymy Sbe Sbtt hSnym tSe warbeym Snh and thou number seven sabbath-sevens of years unto thee, seven times seven years; and the space of the seven sabbath-sevens of years be unto thee forty and nine years. vesafarta lekha ba‘ shabetot shanim sheba‘ shanim sheba‘ pe‘amim, vehayu lekha yemei ba‘ shabetot hashanim tesha‘ ve’arba‘im shanah.
whebrt Swpr trweh bxdS hSbey beSwr lxdS bywm hkprym tebyrw Swpr bkl arzkm then thou cause the mouthpiece-trumpet of the river-jubilee to sound on the tenth day of the seventh month, in the day of out-of-town-ment ye make the mouthpiece-trumpet sound throughout all your land. veha‘abarta shofar teru‘ah bakhodesh hashebi‘i be‘asor lakhodesh, beyom hakipurim ta‘abiru shofar bekhal ’arzekhem.
wqdStm at Snt hxmSym Snh wqratm drwr barz lkl ySbyh ywbl hwa thyh lkm wSbtm ayS al axctw wayS al mSpxtw tSbw and ye dedicate-finify the fiftieth year, and proclaim liberty throughout all the land unto all the inhabitants thereof: it be a river-jubilee unto you; and ye return every man unto his possession, and ye return every man unto his family. veqidashtem shenat hakhamishim shanah uqeratem deror ba’arez lekhal yoshebeha, yobel hi tihyeh lakhem veshabtem ’ish ’el ’akhuzato ve’ish ’el mishpakhto tashubu.
ywbl hwa Snt hxmSym Snh thyh lkm la tcrew wla tqzrw at spyxyh wla tbzrw at ncryh a river-jubilee that fiftieth year be unto you: ye not sow, neither reap that which groweth of itself in it, nor gather the grapes in it of thy vine undressed. yobel hi shenat hakhamishim shanah tihyeh lakhem, lo tizra‘u velo tiqzeru ’et sefikheha velo tibzeru nezireha.
ky ywbl hwa qdS thyh lkm mn hSdh taklw at tbwath for it is the river-jubilee; it be dedicated-finished unto you: ye eat the increase thereof out of the field. ki yobel hi qodesh tihyeh lakhem, min hasadeh tokhelu tebu’atah.
bSnt hywbl hcat tSbw ayS al axctw in the year of this river-jubilee ye return every man unto his possession. bishnat hayobel hazot, tashubu ’ish ’el ’akhuzato.
wky tmkrw mmkr lemytk aw qnh myd emytk al twnw ayS at axyw and if thou sell ought unto thy neighbor, or buyest ought of thy neighbor's hand, ye not oppress one another: vekhi timkeru mimkar la‘amitekha ’o qanoh miyad ‘amitekha, ’al tonu ’ish ’akhiv.
bmspr Snym axr hywbl tqnh mat emytk bmspr Sny tbwat ymkr lk according to the number of years after the river-jubilee thou buy of thy neighbor, and according unto the number of years of the fruits he sell unto thee: bemispar shanim ’akhar hayobel tiqneh me’et ‘amitekha, bemispar shene tebu’ot yimkar lakh.
lpy rb hSnym trbh mqntw wlpy meT hSnym tmeyT mqntw ky mspr tbwat hwa mkr lk according to the multitude of years thou increase the price thereof, and according to the fewness of years thou diminish the price of it: for according to the number of the years of the fruits doth he sell unto thee. lefi rob hashanim tarbeh miqnato ulefi me‘ot hashanim tam‘it miqnato, ki mispar tebu’ot hu mokher lakh.
wla twnw ayS at emytw wyrat malhyk ky any yhwh alhykm ye not therefore oppress one another; and thou fear thy to-no-these: for i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. velo tonu ’ish ‘amito veyareta me’elohekha, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
weSytm at xqty wat mSpTy tSmrw weSytm atm wySbtm el harz lbTx wherefore ye do my statutes, and keep my decision-grammars, and do them; and ye dwell in the land in safety. va‘asitem khuqotay ve’et mishpatay tishmeru va‘asitem ’otam, vishabtem ‘al ha’arez labetakh.
wntnh harz pryh wakltm lSbe wySbtm lbTx elyh and the land yield her fruit, and ye eat your fill, and dwell therein in safety. venatenah ha’arez piryah va’akhaltem lasoba‘, vishabtem labetakh ‘aleha.
wky tamrw mh nakl bSnh hSbyet hn la ncre wla nasp at tbwatnw and if ye say, what we eat the seventh year? behold, we not sow, nor gather in our increase: vekhi tomeru mah nokhal bashanah hashebi‘it, hen lo nizra‘ velo ne’esof tebu’atenu.
wzwyty at brkty lkm bSnh hSSyt weSt at htbwah lSlS hSnym then i will direct my knee-fluffy-blessing upon you in the sixth year, and it bring forth fruit for three years. veziviti birkhati lakhem bashanah hashishit, ve‘asat hatebu’ah lishlosh hashanim.
wcretm at hSnh hSmynt wakltm mn htbwah ySn ed hSnh htSyet ed bwa tbwath taklw ySn and ye sow the eighth year, and eat yet of old fruit until the ninth year; until her fruits come in ye eat of the old store. uzera‘tem hashanah hasheminit va’akhaltem min hatebu’ah yashan, ‘ad hashanah hateshi‘it ‘ad bo tebu’atah tokhelu yashan.
wharz la tmkr lzmtt ky ly harz ky grym wtwSbym atm emdy the land not be sold for ever: for the land is mine, for ye are strangers and sojourners with me. veha’arez lo timakher lizmitut ki li ha’arez, ki gerim vetoshabim ’atem ‘imadi.
wbkl arz axctkm galh ttnw larz and in all the land of your possession ye grant a redemption for the land. ubekhol ’erez ’akhuzatkhem, ge’ulah titenu la’arez.
ky ymwk axyk wmkr maxctw wba galw hqrb alyw wgal at mmkr axyw if thy brother be waxen poor, and hath sold away some of his possession, and if any of his kin come to redeem it, then he redeem that which his brother sold. ki yamukh ’akhikha umakhar me’akhuzato, uba go’alo haqarob ’elav vega’al mimkar ’akhiv.
wayS ky la yhyh lw gal whSygh ydw wmza kdy galtw and if the man have none to redeem it, and himself be able to redeem it; ve’ish ki lo yihyeh lo go’el, vehisigah yado umaza kedei ge’ulato.
wxSb at Sny mmkrw whSyb at hedp layS aSr mkr lw wSb laxctw then let him count the years of the sale thereof, and restore the overplus unto the man to whom he sold it; that he may return unto his possession. vekhishab shenei mimkaro veheshib ha‘odef la’ish ’asher makhar lo, veshab la’akhuzato.
wam la mzah ydw dy hSyb lw whyh mmkrw byd hqnh atw ed Snt hywbl wyza bybl wSb laxctw and if he be not able to restore it to him, then that which is sold remain in the hand of him that hath bought it until the year of river-jubilee: and in the river-jubilee it go out, and he return unto his possession. ve’im lo maze’ah yado dei hashib lo vehayah mimkaro beyad haqoneh ’oto ‘ad shenat hayobel, veyaza bayobel veshab la’akhuzato.
wayS ky ymkr byt mwSb eyr xwmh whyth galtw ed tm Snt mmkrw ymym thyh galtw and if a man sell a dwelling daughter-house in a walled light-city, then he may redeem it within a whole year after it is sold; within a full year may he redeem it. ve’ish ki yimkor bet moshab ‘ir khomah vehayetah ge’ulato ‘ad tom shenat mimkaro, yamim tihyeh ge’ulato.
wam la ygal ed mlat lw Snh tmymh wqm hbyt aSr beyr aSr la lw xmh lzmytt lqnh atw ldrtyw la yza bybl and if it be not redeemed within the space of a full year, then the daughter-house that is in the walled light-city be established for ever to him that bought it throughout his generations: it not go out in the river-jubilee. ve’im lo yiga’el ‘ad melot lo shanah temimah veqam habayit ’asher ba‘ir ’asher lo khomah lazemitut laqoneh ’oto ledorotav, lo yezei bayobel.
wbty hxzrym aSr ayn lhm xmh sbyb el Sdh harz yxSb galh thyh lw wbybl yza and the daughter-houses of the villages which have no wall round about them be counted as the fields of the country: they may be redeemed, and they go out in the river-jubilee. ubatei hakhazerim ’asher ’en khomah sabib ‘al sedeh ha’arez yekhasheb, ge’ulah tihyeh lo ubayobel yeze.
wery hlwym bty ery axctm galt ewlm thyh llwym notwithstanding the cities of the levi-jointes, and the daughter-houses of the cities of their possession, may the levi-jointes redeem at any time. ve‘arei halviyim batei ‘arei ’akhuzatam, ge’ulat ‘olam lalviyim.
waSr ygal mn hlwym wyza mmkr byt weyr axctw bybl ky bty ery hlwym hwa axctm btwk bny ySral and if a man purchase of the levi-jointes, then the daughter-house that was sold, and the light-city of his possession, go out in the year of river-jubilee: for the daughter-houses of the cities of the levi-jointes are their possession among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. va’asher yig’al min halviyim veyaza mimkar bayit ve‘ir ’akhuzato bayobel, ki batei ‘arei halviyim hi ’akhuzatam betokh benei yisra’el.
wSdh mgrS eryhm la ymkr ky axct ewlm hwa lhm and the field of the plots of their cities may not be sold; for it is their perpetual possession. usedeh migrash ‘arehem lo yimakher, ki ’akhuzat ‘olam hu lahem.
wky ymwk axyk wmTh ydw emk whxcqt bw gr wtwSb wxy emk and if thy brother be waxen poor, and fallen in decay with thee; then thou relieve him: yea, though he be a stranger, or a sojourner; that he may live with thee. vekhi yamukh ’akhikha umatah ‘imakh, vehekhezaqta bo ger vetoshab vakhay ‘imakh.
al tqx matw nSk wtrbyt wyrat malhyk wxy axyk emk take thou no usury of him, or increase: and fear thy to-no-these; that thy brother may live with thee. ’al tiqakh me’ito neshekh vetarbit veyareta me’elohekha, vekhei ’akhikha ‘imakh.
at kspk la ttn lw bnSk wbmrbyt la ttn aklk no give him thy money upon usury, nor lend him thy victuals for increase. kaspekha lo titen lo beneshekh, ubemarbit lo titen ’akhelekha.
any yhwh alhykm aSr hwzaty atkm marz mzrym ltt lkm at arz knen lhywt lkm lalhym i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, which brought you forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows, to give you the land of canaan-mobile-trade, and to be your to-no-these. ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim, latet lakhem ’erez kena‘an lihyot lakhem lelohim.
wky ymwk axyk emk wnmkr lk la tebd bw ebdt ebd and if thy brother that dwelleth by thee be waxen poor, and be sold unto thee; no compel him to work for as a bondservant: vekhi yamukh ’akhikha ‘imakh venimkar lakh, lo ta‘abod bo ‘abodat ‘abed.
kSkyr ktwSb yhyh emk ed Snt hybl yebd emk and as an hired worker, and as a sojourner, he be with thee, and work for thee unto the year of river-jubilee. kesakhir ketoshab yihyeh ‘imakh, ‘ad shenat hayobel ya‘abod ‘imakh.
wyza memk hwa wbnyw emw wSb al mSpxtw wal axct abtyw ySwb and then he depart from thee, both he and his children-betweens with him, and return unto his own family, and unto the possession of his fathers he return. veyaza me‘imakh hu ubanav ‘imo, veshab ’el mishpakhto ve’el ’akhuzat ’abotav yashub.
ky ebdy hm aSr hwzaty atm marz mzrym la ymkrw mmkrt ebd for they are my workers, which i brought forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows: they not be sold as workers. ki ‘abaday hem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim, lo yimakheru mimkeret ‘abed.
la trdh bw bprk wyrat malhyk no rule over him with rigor; and fear thy to-no-these. lo tirdeh bo befarekh, veyareta me’elohekha.
webdk wamtk aSr yhyw lk mat hgwym aSr sbybtykm mhm tqnw ebd wamh both thy workers, and thy bondmaids, which thou have, be of the nations that are round about you; of them ye buy workers and bondmaids. ve‘abdekha va’amatekha ’asher yihyu lakh, me’et hagoyim ’asher sebibotekhem mehem tiqnu ‘ebed ve’amah.
wgm mbny htwSbym hgrym emkm mhm tqnw wmmSpxtm aSr emkm aSr hwlydw barzkm whyw lkm laxch moreover of children-betweens of the strangers that do sojourn among you, of them ye buy, and of their families that are with you, which they begat in your land: and they be your possession. vegam mibenei hatoshabim hagarim ‘imakhem mehem tiqnu umimishpakhtam ’asher ‘imakhem ’asher holidu be’arzekhem, vehayu lakhem la’akhuzah.
whtnxltm atm lbnykm axrykm lrSt axch lelm bhm tebdw wbaxykm bny ySral ayS baxyw la trdh bw bprk and ye take them as an inheritance for your children-betweens after you, to inherit them for a possession; they be your workers for ever: and over your brethren children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, ye not rule one over another with rigor. vehitnakhaltem ’otam libnekhem ’akharekhem lareshet ’akhuzah le‘olam bahem ta‘abodu, ube’akhekhem bene yisra’el ’ish be’akhiv lo tirdeh bo befarekh.
wky tSyg yd gr wtwSb emk wmk axyk emw wnmkr lgr twSb emk aw leqr mSpxt gr and if a sojourner or stranger wax rich by thee, and thy brother that dwelleth by him wax poor, and sell himself unto the stranger or sojourner by thee, or to the stock of the stranger's family: vekhi tasig ger vetoshab ‘imakh umakh ’akhikha ‘imo, venimkar leger toshab ‘imakh ’o le‘eqer mishpakhat ger.
axry nmkr galh thyh lw axd maxyw ygalnw after that he is sold he may be redeemed again; one of his brethren may redeem him: ’akharei nimkar ge’ulah tihyeh lo, ’ekhad me’ekhav yig’alenu.
aw ddw aw bn ddw ygalnw aw mSar bSrw mmSpxtw ygalnw aw hSygh ydw wngal either his uncle, or his uncle's child-between, may redeem him, or any that is nigh of kin unto him of his family may redeem him; or if he be able, he may redeem himself. ’o dodo ’o ben dodo yig’alenu ’o mishe’er besaro mimishpakhto yig’alenu, ’o hisigah yado venig’al.
wxSb em qnhw mSnt hmkrw lw ed Snt hybl whyh ksp mmkrw bmspr Snym kymy Skyr yhyh emw and he reckon with him that bought him from the year that he was sold to him unto the year of river-jubilee: and the price of his sale be according unto the number of years, according to the time of an hired worker it be with him. vekhishab ‘im qonehu mishenat himakhero lo ‘ad shenat hayobel, vehayah kesef mimkaro bemispar shanim kimei sakhir yihyeh ‘imo.
am ewd rbwt bSnym lpyhn ySyb galtw mksp mqntw if there be yet many years behind, according unto them he give again the price of his redemption out of the money that he was bought for. ’im ‘od rabot bashanim, lefihen yashib ge’ulato mikesef miqnato.
wam meT nSar bSnym ed Snt hybl wxSb lw kpy Snyw ySyb at galtw and if there remain and few years unto the year of river-jubilee, then he count with him, and according unto his years he give him again the price of his redemption. ve’im me‘at nish’ar bashanim ‘ad shenat hayobel vekhishab lo, kefi shanav yashib ge’ulato.
kSkyr Snh bSnh yhyh emw la yrdnw bprk leynyk and as a yearly hired worker he be with him: and the other not rule with rigor over him in thy sight. kiskhir shanah beshanah yihyeh ‘imo, lo yirdenu beferekh le‘enekha.
wam la ygal balh wyza bSnt hybl hwa wbnyw emw and if he be not redeemed in these years, then he go out in the year of river-jubilee, both he, and his children-betweens with him. ve’im lo yiga’el be’eleh, veyaza bishnat hayobel hu ubanav ‘imo.
ky ly bny ySral ebdym ebdy hm aSr hwzaty awtm marz mzrym any yhwh alhykm for unto me children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards are workers; they are my workers whom i brought forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ki li bene yisra’el ‘abadim ‘abaday hem ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
la teSw lkm alylm wpsl wmzbh la tqymw lkm wabn mSkyt la ttnw barzkm lhStxwt elyh ky any yhwh alhykm ye make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither ye set up any image of father-child-stone in your land, to partake in it: for i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. lo ta‘asu lakhem ’elilim ufesel umazebah lo taqimu lakhem ve’eben maskit lo titenu be’arzekhem lehishtakhavot ‘aleha, ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
at Sbtty tSmrw wmqdSy tyraw any yhwh ye keep my sabbath-sevens, and reverence my dedicated-finished: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. shabetotay tishmoru umiqdashi tira’u, ’ani yhvh.
am bxqty tlkw wat mzwty tSmrw weSytm atm if ye walk in my statutes, and keep my directives, and do them; ’im bekhuqotay telekhu, ve’et mizvotay tishmeru va‘asitem ’otam.
wntty gSmykm betm wntnh harz ybwlh wez hSdh ytn pryw then i will give you rain in due season, and the land yield her increase, and the trees of the field yield their fruit. venatati gishmekhem be‘itam, venatenah ha’arez yebulah ve‘ez hasadeh yiten piryo.
whSyg lkm dyS at bzyr wbzyr ySyg at cre wakltm lxmkm lSbe wySbtm lbTx barzkm and your threshing reach unto the vintage, and the vintage reach unto the sowing time: and ye eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely. vehisig lakhem dayish bazir ubazir yasig zara‘, va’akhaltem lakhmekhem lasoba‘ vishabtem labetakh be’arzekhem.
wntty Slwm barz wSkbtm wayn mxryd whSbty xyh reh mn harz wxrb la tebr barzkm and i will give peace in the land, and ye lie down, and none make you afraid: and i will rid bad beasts out of the land, neither the sword go through your land. venatati shalom ba’arez ushekhabtem ve’en makharid, vehishbati khayah ra‘ah min ha’arez vekhereb lo ta‘abor be’arzekhem.

wam la tSmew ly wla teSw at kl hmzwt halh and if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these directives; ve’im lo tishme‘u li, velo ta‘asu kal hamizvot ha’eleh.

ap any aeSh cat lkm whpqdty elykm bhlh at hSxpt wat hqdxt mklwt eynym wmdybt npS wcretm lryq crekm waklhw aybykm i also will do this unto you; i will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye sow your seed in vain, for your father-adversaries eat it. ’af ’ani ’e‘eseh zot lakhem vehifqadti ‘alekhem behalah hashakhefet ve’et haqadakhat mekhalot ‘enayim umedibot nafesh, uzera‘tem lariq zar‘akhem va’akhaluhu ’oyebekhem.

wtm lryq kxkm wla ttn arzkm at ybwlh wez harz la ytn pryw and your strength be spent in vain: for your land not yield her increase, neither the trees of the land yield their fruits. vetam lariq kokhakhem, velo titen ’arzekhem yebulah ve‘ez ha’arez lo yiten piryo.
wam tlkw emy qry wla tabw lSme ly wyspty elykm mkh Sbe kxTatykm and if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; i will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your misses. ve’im telekhu ‘imi qeri velo tobu lishmoa‘ li, veyasafti ‘alekhem makah sheba‘ kekhatotekhem.
whSlxty bkm at xyt hSdh wSklh atkm whkryth at bhmtkm whmeyTh atkm wnSmw drkykm i will also send wild beasts among you, which rob you of your children-betweens, and destroy your in-them-animal, and make you few in number; and your high ways be desolate. vehishlakhti bakhem khayat hasadeh veshikelah ’etkhem vehikhritah behemtekhem vehim‘itah ’etkhem, venashamu darkhekhem.

ac trzh harz at Sbttyh kl ymy hSmh watm barz aybykm ac tSbt harz whrzt at Sbttyh then the land enjoy her sabbath-sevens, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your father-adversaries' land; even then the land rest, and enjoy her sabbath-sevens. ’az tirzeh ha’arez shabetoteha kol yemei hoshamah ve’atem be’erez ’oyebekhem, ’az tishbat ha’arez vehirzat shabetoteha.

wabdtm bgwym waklh atkm arz aybykm and ye perish among the nations, and the land of your father-adversaries eat you up. va’abadtem bagoyim, ve’akhelah ’etkhem ’erez ’oyebekhem.
whnSarym bkm ymqw bewnm barzt aybykm wap bewnt abtm atm ymqw and they that are left of you pine away in their torment in your father-adversaries' lands; and also in the seasons of their fathers they pine away with them. vehanish’arim bakhem yimaqu ba‘avonam be’arzot ’oyebekhem, ve’af ba‘avonot ’abotam ’itam yimaqu.
whtwdw at ewnm wat ewn abtm bmelm aSr melw by wap aSr hlkw emy bqry if they confess their torment, and the torment of their fathers, with their fire-name which they fire-nameed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me; vehitvadu ‘avonam ve’et ‘avon ’abotam bema‘alam ’asher ma‘alu bi, ve’af ’asher halekhu ‘imi beqeri.
ap any alk emm bqry whbaty atm barz aybyhm aw ac ykne lbbm herl wac yrzw at ewnm and that i also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their father-adversaries; if then their foreskinned hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their torment: ’af ’ani ’elekh ‘imam beqeri vehebeti ’otam be’erez ’oyebehem, ’o ’az yikana‘ lebabam he‘arel ve’az yirzu ‘avonam.
wckrty at bryty yeqwb wap at bryty yzxq wap at bryty abrhm ackr wharz ackr then will i remember my covenant with jacob-backstreet, and also my covenant with isaac-laughter, and also my covenant with abraham-their-dick will i remember; and i will remember the land. vezakharti beriti ya‘aqob, ve’af beriti yizkhaq ve’af beriti ’abraham ’ezkor veha’arez ’ezkor.
wharz tecb mhm wtrz at Sbttyh bhSmh mhm whm yrzw at ewnm yen wbyen bmSpTy masw wat xqty gelh npSm the land also be left of them, and enjoy her sabbath-sevens, while she lieth desolate without them: and they accept of the punishment of their torment: because, even because they despised my decision-grammars, and because their being crave-abhorred my statutes. veha’arez te‘azeb mehem vetirez shabetoteha baheshamah mehem vehem yirzu ‘avonam, ya‘an ubeya‘an bemishpatay ma’asu ve’et khuqotay ga‘alah nafsham.

wckrty lhm bryt raSnym aSr hwzaty atm marz mzrym leyny hgwym lhyt lhm lalhym any yhwh and i will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom i brought forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows in the sight of the nations, that i might be their to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vezakharti lahem berit rishonim, ’asher hozeti me’erez mizrayim le‘enei hagoyim lihyot lahem lelohim ’ani yhvh.
alh hxqym whmSpTym whtwrt aSr ntn yhwh bynw wbyn bny ySral bhr syny byd mSh these are the statutes and decision-grammars and teachings, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah made between-bin him and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in mount )sinai-bush-(proto by the hand of mose-extracted. ’eleh hakhuqim vehamishpatim vehatorot ’asher natan yhvh beno uben benei yisra’el, behar sinay beyad mosheh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ayS ky ypla ndr berkk npSt lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when a man make a singular vow, the persons be for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah by thy estimation. daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ’ish ki yafli neder, be‘erkekha nefashot yhvh.
whyh erkk hckr mbn eSrym Snh wed bn SSym Snh whyh erkk xmSym Sql ksp bSql hqdS and thy estimation be of the rememberer from double-ten-twenty years old even unto sixty years old, even thy estimation be fifty shekel-lights of silver, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished. vehayah ‘erkekha hazakhar miben ‘esrim shanah ve‘ad ben shishim shanah, vehayah ‘erkekha khamishim sheqel kesef besheqel haqodesh.
wam nqbh hwa whyh erkk SlSym Sql and if it be a pierced, then thy estimation be thirty shekel-lights. ve’im neqebah hi vehayah ‘erkekha sheloshim shaqel.
wam mbn xmS Snym wed bn eSrym Snh whyh erkk hckr eSrym Sqlym wlnqbh eSrt Sqlym and if it be from five years old even unto double-ten-twenty years old, then thy estimation be of the rememberer double-ten-twenty shekel-lights, and for the pierced ten shekel-lights. ve’im miben khamesh shanim ve‘ad ben ‘esrim shanah vehayah ‘erkekha hazakhar ‘esrim sheqalim, velaneqebah ‘aseret sheqalim.
wam mbn xdS wed bn xmS Snym whyh erkk hckr xmSh Sqlym ksp wlnqbh erkk SlSt Sqlym ksp and if it be from a month old even unto five years old, then thy estimation be of the rememberer five shekel-lights of silver, and for the pierced thy estimation be three shekel-lights of silver. ve’im miben khodesh ve‘ad ben khamesh shanim vehayah ‘erkekha hazakhar khamishah sheqalim kasef, velaneqebah ‘erkekha sheloshet sheqalim kasef.
wam mbn SSym Snh wmelh am ckr whyh erkk xmSh eSr Sql wlnqbh eSrh Sqlym and if it be from sixty years old and above; if it be a rememberer, then thy estimation be fifteen shekel-lights, and for the pierced ten shekel-lights. ve’im miben shishim shanah vama‘lah ’im zakhar vehayah ‘erkekha khamishah ‘asar shaqel, velaneqebah ‘asarah sheqalim.
wam mk hwa merkk whemydw lpny hkhn wheryk atw hkhn el py aSr tSyg yd hndr yeryknw hkhn and if he be poorer than thy estimation, then he present himself before-turns the dimmer-server, and the dimmer-server value him; according to his ability that vowed the dimmer-server value him. ve’im makh hu me‘erkekha vehe‘emido lifnei hakohen vehe‘erikh ’oto hakohen, ‘al pi ’asher tasig yad hanoder ya‘arikhenu hakohen.
wam bhmh aSr yqrybw mmnh qrbn lyhwh kl aSr ytn mmnw lyhwh yhyh qdS and if it be a beast, whereof men bring an inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, all that any man giveth of such unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah be dedicated-finished. ve’im behemah ’asher yaqribu qarban yhvh, kol ’asher yiten mimenu yhvh yihyeh qodesh.
la yxlypnw wla ymyr atw Twb bre aw re bTwb wam hmr ymyr bhmh bbhmh whyh hwa wtmwrtw yhyh qdS he not alter it, nor change it, a good for a bad, or a bad for a good: and if he at all change beast for beast, then it and the exchange thereof be dedicated-finished. lo yakhalifenu velo yamir ’oto tob bera‘ ’o ra‘ betob, ve’im hamer yamir behemah bibhemah vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh.
wam kl bhmh Tmah aSr la yqrybw mmnh qrbn lyhwh whemyd at hbhmh lpny hkhn and if it be any stained-ceased beast, of which they do not inward a butcher unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, then he present the beast before-turns the dimmer-server: ve’im kal behemah teme’ah ’asher lo yaqribu qarban yhvh, vehe‘emid habehemah lifnei hakohen.
wheryk hkhn ath byn Twb wbyn re kerkk hkhn kn yhyh and the dimmer-server value it, whether it be good or bad: as thou valuest it, who art the dimmer-server, so it be. vehe‘erikh hakohen ’otah ben tob uben ra‘, ke‘erkekha hakohen ken yihyeh.
wam gal ygalnh wysp xmyStw el erkk and if he will at all redeem it, then he add a fifth part thereof unto thy estimation. ve’im ga’ol yig’alenah, veyasaf khamishito ‘al ‘erkekha.
wayS ky yqdS at bytw qdS lyhwh wherykw hkhn byn Twb wbyn re kaSr yeryk atw hkhn kn yqwm and when a man dedicate-finify his daughter-house to be dedicated-finished unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, then the dimmer-server estimate it, whether it be good or bad: as the dimmer-server estimate it, so it stand. ve’ish ki yaqdish beto qodesh yhvh vehe‘erikho hakohen ben tob uben ra‘, ka’asher ya‘arikh ’oto hakohen ken yaqum.
wam hmqdyS ygal at bytw wysp xmySyt ksp erkk elyw whyh lw and if he that dedicated-finished it will redeem his daughter-house, then he add the fifth part of the money of thy estimation unto it, and it be his. ve’im hamaqdish yig’al beto, veyasaf khamishit kesef ‘erkekha ‘alav vehayah lo.
wam mSdh axctw yqdyS ayS lyhwh whyh erkk lpy crew cre xmr Serym bxmSym Sql ksp and if a man dedicate-finify unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah some part of a field of his possession, then thy estimation be according to the seed thereof: an homer of gates-barley seed be valued at fifty shekel-lights of silver. ve’im misedeh ’akhuzato yaqdish ’ish yhvh vehayah ‘erkekha lefi zar‘o, zera‘ khomer se‘orim bakhamishim sheqel kasef.
am mSnt hybl yqdyS Sdhw kerkk yqwm if he dedicate-finify his field from the year of river-jubilee, according to thy estimation it stand. ’im mishenat hayobel yaqdish sadehu, ke‘erkekha yaqum.
wam axr hybl yqdyS Sdhw wxSb lw hkhn at hksp el py hSnym hnwtrt ed Snt hybl wngre merkk and if he dedicate-finify his field after the river-jubilee, then the dimmer-server reckon unto him the money according to the years that remain, even unto the year of the river-jubilee, and it be abated from thy estimation. ve’im ’akhar hayobel yaqdish sadehu vekhishab lo hakohen hakesef ‘al hashanim hanotarot ‘ad shenat hayobel, venigra‘ me‘erkekha.
wam gal ygal at hSdh hmqdyS atw wysp xmSyt ksp erkk elyw wqm lw and if he that dedicated-finished the field will in any wise redeem it, then he add the fifth part of the money of thy estimation unto it, and it be assured to him. ve’im ga’ol yig’al hasadeh hamaqdish ’oto, veyasaf khamishit kesef ‘erkekha ‘alav veqam lo.
wam la ygal at hSdh wam mkr at hSdh layS axr la ygal ewd and if he will not redeem the field, or if he have sold the field to another man, it not be redeemed any more. ve’im lo yig’al hasadeh ve’im makhar hasadeh le’ish ’akher, lo yiga’el ‘od.
whyh hSdh bzatw bybl qdS lyhwh kSdh hxrm lkhn thyh axctw and the field, when it goeth out in the river-jubilee, be dedicated-finished unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, as a field devoted; the possession thereof be the dimmer-server's. vehayah hasadeh bezeto bayobel qodesh yhvh kisdeh hakherem, lakohen tihyeh ’akhuzato.
wam at Sdh mqntw aSr la mSdh axctw yqdyS lyhwh and if a man dedicate-finify unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah a field which he hath bought, which is not of the fields of his possession; ve’im sedeh miqnato ’asher lo misedeh ’akhuzato, yaqdish yhvh.
wxSb lw hkhn at mkst herkk ed Snt hybl wntn at herkk bywm hhwa qdS lyhwh then the dimmer-server reckon unto him the worth of thy estimation, even unto the year of the river-jubilee: and he give thine estimation in that day, as a dedicated-finished thing unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vekhishab lo hakohen mikhsat ha‘erkekha ‘ad shenat hayobel, venatan ha‘erkekha bayom hahu qodesh yhvh.
bSnt hywbl ySwb hSdh laSr qnhw matw laSr lw axct harz in the year of the river-jubilee the field return unto him of whom it was bought, even to him to whom the possession of the land did belong. bishnat hayobel yashub hasadeh la’asher qanahu me’ito, la’asher lo ’akhuzat ha’arez.
wkl erkk yhyh bSql hqdS eSrym grh yhyh hSql and all thy estimations be according to the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished: double-ten-twenty gera-strangerhs be the shekel-light. vekhal ‘erkekha yihyeh besheqel haqodesh, ‘esrim gerah yihyeh hashaqel.
ak bkwr aSr ybkr lyhwh bbhmh la yqdyS ayS atw am Swr am Sh lyhwh hwa only the firstling of the beasts, which should be yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's firstling, no man dedicate-finify it; whether it be wall-ox, or sheep: it is yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's. ’akh bekhor ’asher yebukar yhvh bibhemah lo yaqdish ’ish ’im shor ’im seh yhvh hu.
wam bbhmh hTmah wpdh berkk wysp xmStw elyw wam la ygal wnmkr berkk and if it be of an stained-ceased beast, then he redeem it according to thine estimation, and add a fifth part of it thereto: or if it be not redeemed, then it be sold according to thy estimation. ve’im babehemah hateme’ah ufadah be‘erkekha veyasaf khamishito ‘alav, ve’im lo yiga’el venimkar be‘erkekha.
ak kl xrm aSr yxrm ayS lyhwh mkl aSr lw madm wbhmh wmSdh axctw la ymkr wla ygal kl xrm qdS qdSym hwa lyhwh notwithstanding no devoted thing, that a man devote unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah of all that he hath, both of man and beast, and of the field of his possession, be sold or redeemed: every devoted thing is most dedicated-finished unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’akh kherem ’asher yakharim ’ish yhvh mikal ’asher lo me’adam ubehemah umisedeh ’akhuzato lo yimakher velo yiga’el, kal kherem qodesh qadashim hu yhvh.
kl xrm aSr yxrm mn hadm la ypdh mwt ywmt none devoted, which be devoted of men, be redeemed; and surely be put to death. kal kherem ’asher yakhoram min ha’adam lo yipadeh, mot yumat.
wkl meSr harz mcre harz mpry hez lyhwh hwa qdS lyhwh and all the tithe of the land, whether of the seed of the land, or of the fruit of the tree, is yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's: it is dedicated-finished unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vekhal ma‘sar ha’arez mizera‘ ha’arez miperi ha‘ez yhvh hu, qodesh yhvh.
wam gal ygal ayS mmeSrw xmSytw ysp elyw and if a man will at all redeem ought of his tithes, he add thereto the fifth part thereof. ve’im ga’ol yig’al ’ish mima‘asro, khamishito yosef ‘alav.
wkl meSr bqr wzan kl aSr yebr txt hSbT heSyry yhyh qdS lyhwh and concerning the tithe of the visit-cattle, or of the flock, even of whatsoever passeth under the pen, the tenth be dedicated-finished unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vekhal ma‘sar baqar vazon kol ’asher ya‘abor takhat hashabet, ha‘asiri yihyeh qodesh yhvh.
la ybqr byn Twb lre wla ymyrnw wam hmr ymyrnw whyh hwa wtmwrtw yhyh qdS la ygal he not search whether it be good or bad, neither he change it: and if he change it at all, then both it and the change thereof be dedicated-finished; it not be redeemed. lo yebaqer ben tob lara‘ velo yemirenu, ve’im hamer yemirenu vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh lo yiga’el.
alh hmzwt aSr zwh yhwh at mSh al bny ySral bhr syny these are the directives, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted for children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in mount )sinai-bush-(proto. ’eleh hamizvot ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ’el benei yisra’el, behar sinay.
wydbr yhwh al mSh bmdbr syny bahl mwed baxd lxdS hSny bSnh hSnyt lzatm marz mzrym lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto, in the tent of until-conception, on the first day of the second month, in the second year after they were come out of the land of mizraim-narrows, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh bemidbar sinay be’ohel mo‘ed, be’ekhad lakhodesh hasheni bashanah hashenit lezetam me’erez mizrayim lemor.
Saw at raS kl edt bny ySral lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smwt kl ckr lglgltm take ye the sum of all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, with the number of their names, every rememberer by their polls; se’u rosh kal ‘adat bene yisra’el lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot kal zakhar legulgelotam.
mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba bySral tpqdw atm lzbatm ath wahrn from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that are able to go forth to war in israel-juicy-towards: thou and aaron-cabinet number them by their troop-clusters. miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kal yozei zaba beyisra’el, tifqedu ’otam lezib’otam ’atah ve’aharon.
watkm yhyw ayS ayS lmTh ayS raS lbyt abtyw hwa and with you there be a man of every branch; every one head of the daughter-house of his fathers. ve’itekhem yihyu ’ish ’ish lamateh, ’ish rosh lebet ’abotav hu.
walh Smwt hanSym aSr yemdw atkm lrawbn alyzwr bn Sdyawr and these are the names of the men that stand with you: of the branch of reuben-see-child; elizur-my-towards-flint child-between of shediur-my-breast-light. ve’eleh shemot ha’anashim ’asher ya‘amdu ’itekhem, lir’uben ’elizur ben shede’ur.
lSmewn Slmyal bn zwrySdy of simeon-hear-home; towards-my-whole child-between of zur-flintishaddai-my-flint-my-breast. leshim‘on shelumi’el ben zurishaday.
lyhwdh nxSwn bn emyndb of judah-know; nahshon-pioneer child-between of aminadab-my-people-contribute. lihudah nakhshon ben ‘aminadab.
lySSkr ntnal bn zwer of issachar-wage; nethaneel-given-towards child-between of zuar-junior. leyisashkhar netan’el ben zu‘ar.
lcbwln alyab bn xln of zebulun-fertile; elia-my-towardsb-my-towards-dad child-between of helon-success-sick. lizbulun ’eli’ab ben khelon.
lbny ywsp laprym alySme bn emyhwd lmnSh gmlyal bn pdhzwr of children-betweens of joseph-add: of ephraim-fruitful; elisha-towards-savesma child-between of amihud-with-my-glory: of manasseh-place-of-sleep; gamaliel-my-detox-ripen-camel-towards child-between of pedahzur-cash-in-flint. libnei yosef le’efrayim ’elishama‘ ben ‘amihud, limnasheh gamli’el ben pedahzur.
lbnymn abydn bn gdeny of benjamin-he-between-of-righthand; abidan-my-father-deals-with child-between of gideoni-my-cut-down. lebinyamin ’abidan ben gid‘oni.
ldn axyecr bn emySdy of dan-discuss; ahiezer-my-brother-help child-between of amishadai-my-with-my-breast. ledan ’akhi‘ezer ben ‘amishaday.
laSr pgeyal bn ekrn of asher-bliss; pagiel-my-injury-towards child-between of ocran-disturb. le’asher pag‘i’el ben ‘akheran.
lgd alysp bn dewal of gad-tell-luck; elia-my-towardssaph-my-towards-adds child-between of deuel-know-towards. legad ’elyasaf ben de‘u’el.
lnptly axyre bn eynn of naphtali-twisted; ahira-my-brother-ra child-between of enan-torture-eye. lenaftali ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
alh qryay qrway hedh nSyay mTwt abwtm raSy alpy ySral hm these were the renowned of the until-witness, princes of the branchs of their fathers, heads of thousands in israel-juicy-towards. ’eleh qeru’ei ha‘edah nesi’ei matot ’abotam, rashei ’alfei yisra’el hem.
wyqx mSh wahrn at hanSym halh aSr nqbw bSmwt and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet took these men which are expressed by their names: vayiqakh mosheh ve’aharon, ha’anashim ha’eleh ’asher niqebu beshemot.
wat kl hedh hqhylw baxd lxdS hSny wytyldw el mSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smwt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh lglgltm and they assembled all the until-witness together on the first day of the second month, and they declared their pedigrees after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, by their polls. ve’et kal ha‘edah hiqhilu be’ekhad lakhodesh hasheni vayityaldu ‘al mishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah legulgelotam.
kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh wypqdm bmdbr syny as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, so he numbered them in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto. ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, vayifqedem bemidbar sinay.
wyhyw bny rawbn bkr ySral twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smwt lglgltm kl ckr mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba and children-betweens of reuben-see-child, israel-juicy-towards's eldest child-between, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, by their polls, every rememberer from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; vayihyu bene re’uben bekhor yisra’el toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh rawbn SSh warbeym alp wxmS mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of reuben-see-child, were forty and six thousand and five hundred. pequdehem lemateh re’uben, shishah ve’arba‘im ’elef vakhamesh me’ot.
lbny Smewn twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm pqdyw bmspr Smwt lglgltm kl ckr mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of simeon-hear-home, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, those that were order-numbered of them, according to the number of the names, by their polls, every rememberer from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei shim‘on toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, pequdav bemispar shemot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh Smewn tSeh wxmSym alp wSlS mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of simeon-hear-home, were fifty and nine thousand and three hundred. pequdehem lemateh shim‘on, tish‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ushelosh me’ot.
lbny gd twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smwt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of gad-tell-luck, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei gad toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh gd xmSh warbeym alp wSS mawt wxmSym those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of gad-tell-luck, were forty and five thousand six hundred and fifty. pequdehem lemateh gad, khamishah ve’arba‘im ’elef veshesh me’ot vakhamishim.
lbny yhwdh twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of judah-know, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei yehudah toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh yhwdh arbeh wSbeym alp wSS mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of judah-know, were threescore and fourteen thousand and six hundred. pequdehem lemateh yehudah, ’arba‘ah veshib‘im ’elef veshesh me’ot.
lbny ySSkr twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of issachar-wage, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei yisashkhar toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh ySSkr arbeh wxmSym alp warbe mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of issachar-wage, were fifty and four thousand and four hundred. pequdehem lemateh yisashkhar, ’arba‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
lbny cbwln twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of zebulun-fertile, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei zebulun toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh cbwln Sbeh wxmSym alp warbe mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of zebulun-fertile, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred. pequdehem lemateh zebulun, shib‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
lbny ywsp lbny aprym twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of joseph-add, namely, of children-betweens of ephraim-fruitful, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei yosef libnei ’efrayim toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh aprym arbeym alp wxmS mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of ephraim-fruitful, were forty thousand and five hundred. pequdehem lemateh ’efrayim, ’arba‘im ’elef vakhamesh me’ot.
lbny mnSh twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smwt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of manasseh-place-of-sleep, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei menasheh toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh mnSh Snym wSlSym alp wmatym those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of manasseh-place-of-sleep, were thirty and two thousand and two hundred. pequdehem lemateh menasheh, shenayim usheloshim ’elef umatayim.
lbny bnymn twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of benjamin-he-between-of-righthand, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei binyamin toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh bnymn xmSh wSlSym alp warbe mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of benjamin-he-between-of-righthand, were thirty and five thousand and four hundred. pequdehem lemateh binyamin, khamishah usheloshim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
lbny dn twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of dan-discuss, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei dan toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh dn Snym wSSym alp wSbe mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of dan-discuss, were threescore and two thousand and seven hundred. pequdehem lemateh dan, shenayim veshishim ’elef usheba‘ me’ot.
lbny aSr twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of asher-bliss, by their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; libnei ’asher toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh aSr axd warbeym alp wxmS mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of asher-bliss, were forty and one thousand and five hundred. pequdehem lemateh ’asher, ’ekhad ve’arba‘im ’elef vakhamesh me’ot.
bny nptly twldtm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm bmspr Smt mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba of children-betweens of naphtali-twisted, throughout their generations, after their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters; benei naftali toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, bemispar shemot miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kol yozei zaba.
pqdyhm lmTh nptly SlSh wxmSym alp warbe mawt those that were order-numbered of them, even of the branch of naphtali-twisted, were fifty and three thousand and four hundred. pequdehem lemateh naftali, sheloshah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
alh hpqdym aSr pqd mSh wahrn wnSyay ySral Snym eSr ayS ayS axd lbyt abtyw hyw these are those that were numbered, which mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet numbered, and the princes of israel-juicy-towards, being twelve men: each one was for the daughter-house of his fathers. ’eleh hapequdim ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon unesi’ei yisra’el shenem ‘asar ’ish, ’ish ’ekhad lebet ’abotav hayu.
wyhyw kl pqwdy bny ySral lbyt abtm mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kl yza zba bySral so were all those that were numbered of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, by the daughter-house of their fathers, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, all that came out in troop-clusters in israel-juicy-towards; vayihyu kal pequdei bene yisra’el lebet ’abotam, miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah kal yozei zaba beyisra’el.
wyhyw kl hpqdym SS mawt alp wSlSt alpym wxmS mawt wxmSym even all they that were numbered were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty. vayihyu kal hapequdim shesh me’ot ’elef usheloshet ’alafim, vakhamesh me’ot vakhamishim.
whlwym lmTh abtm la htpqdw btwkm and the levi-jointes after the branch of their fathers were not numbered among them. vehalviyim lemateh ’abotam, lo hatepaqedu betokham.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had bee-spoken unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
ak at mTh lwy la tpqd wat raSm la tSa btwk bny ySral only no number the branch of levi-join, neither take the sum of them among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: ’akh mateh levi lo tifqod ve’et rosham lo tisa, betokh benei yisra’el.
wath hpqd at hlwym el mSkn hedt wel kl klyw wel kl aSr lw hmh ySaw at hmSkn wat kl klyw whm ySrthw wsbyb lmSkn yxnw and thou appoint the levi-jointes over the dwelling of until-witness, and over all the tools thereof, and over all things that belong to it: they bear the dwelling, and all the tools thereof; and they unto it, and encamp round about the dwelling. ve’atah hafqed halviyim ‘al mishkan ha‘edut ve‘al kal kelav ve‘al kal ’asher lo hemah yis’u hamishkan ve’et kal kelav vehem yesharetuhu, vesabib lamishkan yakhanu.
wbnse hmSkn ywrydw atw hlwym wbxnt hmSkn yqymw atw hlwym whcr hqrb ywmt and when the dwelling setteth forward, the levi-jointes take it down: and when the dwelling is to be pitched, the levi-jointes set it up: and the stranger that cometh nigh be put to death. ubinsoa‘ hamishkan yoridu ’oto halviyim ubakhanot hamishkan yaqimu ’oto halviyim, vehazar haqareb yumat.
wxnw bny ySral ayS el mxnhw wayS el dglw lzbatm and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards pitch their tents, every man by his own camp, and every man by his own standard, throughout their troop-clusters. vekhanu benei yisra’el, ’ish ‘al makhanehu ve’ish ‘al diglo lezib’otam.
whlwym yxnw sbyb lmSkn hedt wla yhyh qzp el edt bny ySral wSmrw hlwym at mSmrt mSkn hedwt and the levi-jointes pitch round about the dwelling of until-witness, that there be no wrath upon the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and the levi-jointes keep the charge of the dwelling of until-witness. vehalviyim yakhanu sabib lemishkan ha‘edut velo yihyeh qezef ‘al ‘adat benei yisra’el, veshameru halviyim mishmeret mishkan ha‘edut.
wyeSw bny ySral kkl aSr zwh yhwh at mSh kn eSw and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, so did they. vaya‘asu benei yisra’el, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asu.
wydbr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and unto aaron-cabinet, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
ayS el dglw batt lbyt abtm yxnw bny ySral mngd sbyb lahl mwed yxnw every man of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards pitch by his own standard, with the ensign of their father's daughter-house: far off about the tent of until-conception they pitch. ’ish ‘al diglo be’otot lebet ’abotam yakhanu benei yisra’el, mineged sabib le’ohel mo‘ed yakhanu.
whxnym qdmh mcrxh dgl mxnh yhwdh lzbatm wnSya lbny yhwdh nxSwn bn emyndb and on the east side toward the rising of the sun they of the standard of the camp of judah-know pitch throughout their troop-clusters: and nahshon-pioneer child-between of aminadab-my-people-contribute be captain of children-betweens of judah-know. vehakhonim qedemah mizrakhah degel makhaneh yehudah lezib’otam, venasi libnei yehudah nakhshon ben ‘aminadab.
wzbaw wpqdyhm arbeh wSbeym alp wSS mawt and his troop-cluster, and those that were order-numbered of them, were threescore and fourteen thousand and six hundred. uzeba’o ufequdehem, ’arba‘ah veshib‘im ’elef veshesh me’ot.
whxnym elyw mTh ySSkr wnSya lbny ySSkr ntnal bn zwer and those that do pitch next unto him be the branch of issachar-wage: and nethaneel-given-towards child-between of zuar-junior be captain of children-betweens of issachar-wage. vehakhonim ‘alav mateh yisashkhar, venasi libnei yisashkhar netan’el ben zu‘ar.
wzbaw wpqdyw arbeh wxmSym alp warbe mawt and his troop-cluster, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and four thousand and four hundred. uzeba’o ufequdav, ’arba‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
mTh cbwln wnSya lbny cbwln alyab bn xln then the branch of zebulun-fertile: and elia-my-towardsb-my-towards-dad child-between of helon-success-sick be captain of children-betweens of zebulun-fertile. mateh zebulun, venasi libnei zebulun ’eli’ab ben khelon.
wzbaw wpqdyw Sbeh wxmSym alp warbe mawt and his troop-cluster, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred. uzeba’o ufequdav, shib‘ah vakhamishim ’elef ve’arba‘ me’ot.
kl hpqdym lmxnh yhwdh mat alp wSmnym alp wSSt alpym warbe mawt lzbatm raSnh ysew all that were numbered in the camp of judah-know were an hundred thousand and fourscore thousand and six thousand and four hundred, throughout their troop-clusters. these first set forth. kal hapequdim lemakhaneh yehudah me’at ’elef ushemonim ’elef vesheshet ’alafim ve’arba‘ me’ot lezib’otam, rishonah yisa‘u.

alh pqwdy bny ySral lbyt abtm kl pqwdy hmxnt lzbatm SS mawt alp wSlSt alpym wxmS mawt wxmSym these are those which were numbered of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards by the daughter-house of their fathers: all those that were numbered of the camps throughout their troop-clusters were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty. ’eleh pequdei bene yisra’el lebet ’abotam, kal pequdei hamakhanot lezib’otam shesh me’ot ’elef usheloshet ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot vakhamishim.

wyeSw bny ySral kkl aSr zwh yhwh at mSh kn xnw ldglyhm wkn nsew ayS lmSpxtyw el byt abtyw and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted: so they pitched by their standards, and so they set forward, every one after their families, according to the daughter-house of their fathers. vaya‘asu benei yisra’el, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ken khanu lediglehem vekhen nasa‘u ’ish lemishpekhotav ‘al bet ’abotav.
walh twldt ahrn wmSh bywm dbr yhwh at mSh bhr syny these also are the generations of aaron-cabinet and mose-extracted in the day that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake with mose-extracted in mount )sinai-bush-(proto. ve’eleh toldot ’aharon umosheh, beyom diber yhvh ’et mosheh behar sinay.
walh Smwt bny ahrn hbkwr ndb wabyhwa alecr waytmr and these are the names of children-betweens of aaron-cabinet; nadab-volunteer the firstborn, and abihu-he-my-pa, eleazar-towards-stop, and itamar-with-palm. ve’eleh shemot bene ’aharon habekhor nadab, va’abihu ’el‘azar ve’itamar.
alh Smwt bny ahrn hkhnym hmSxym aSr mla ydm lkhn these are the names of children-betweens of aaron-cabinet, the dimmer-servers which were lubeed, whom he filld to dimmer-server. ’eleh shemot benei ’aharon hakohanim hameshukhim, ’asher milei yadam lekhahen.
wymt ndb wabyhwa lpny yhwh bhqrbm aS crh lpny yhwh bmdbr syny wbnym la hyw lhm wykhn alecr waytmr el pny ahrn abyhm and nadab-volunteer and abihu-he-my-pa died before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, when they inwarded strange fire before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto, and they had no children-betweens: and eleazar-towards-stop and itamar-with-palm ed in the dimmer-server's office in the sight of aaron-cabinet their father. vayamat nadab va’abihu lifnei yhvh behaqribam ’esh zarah lifnei yhvh bemidbar sinay ubanim lo hayu. vaykhahen ’el‘azar ve’itamar ‘al penei ’aharon ’abihem.
