wSmrw at mSmrtw wat mSmrt kl hedh lpny ahl mwed lebd at ebdt hmSkn and they keep his charge, and the charge of the whole until-witness before-turns the tent of until-conception, to do the work of the dwelling. veshameru mishmarto ve’et mishmeret kal ha‘edah lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed, la‘abod ‘abodat hamishkan.
wSmrw at kl kly ahl mwed wat mSmrt bny ySral lebd at ebdt hmSkn and they keep all the instruments of the tent of until-conception, and the charge of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, to do the work of the dwelling. veshameru kal kelei ’ohel mo‘ed ve’et mishmeret benei yisra’el, la‘abod ‘abodat hamishkan.
wntth at hlwym lahrn wlbnyw ntwnm ntwnm hmh lw mat bny ySral and thou give the levi-jointes unto aaron-cabinet and to his children-betweens: they are wholly given unto him out of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. venatatah halviyim le’aharon ulebanav, netunim netunim hemah lo me’et benei yisra’el.
wat ahrn wat bnyw tpqd wSmrw at khntm whcr hqrb ywmt and thou appoint aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, and they wait on their dimmer-server's office: and the stranger that cometh nigh be put to death. ve’et ’aharon ve’et banav tifqod veshameru kehunatam, vehazar haqareb yumat.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
wany hnh lqxty at hlwym mtwk bny ySral txt kl bkwr pTr rxm mbny ySral whyw ly hlwym and i, behold, i have taken the levi-jointes from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards instead of all the firstborn that openeth the womb-matrix among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: therefore the levi-jointes be mine; va’ani hineh laqakhti halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el takhat kal bekhor peter rekhem mibenei yisra’el, vehayu li halviyim.
ky ly kl bkwr bywm hkty kl bkwr barz mzrym hqdSty ly kl bkwr bySral madm ed bhmh ly yhyw any yhwh because all the firstborn are mine; for on the day that i smote all the firstborn in the land of mizraim-narrows i dedicateed unto me all the firstborn in israel-juicy-towards, both man and beast: mine they be: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ki li kal bekhor beyom hakoti khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim hiqdashti li khal bekhor beyisra’el me’adam ‘ad behemah, li yihyu ’ani yhvh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh bmdbr syny lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh bemidbar sinay lemor.
pqd at bny lwy lbyt abtm lmSpxtm kl ckr mbn xdS wmelh tpqdm number children-betweens of levi-join after the daughter-house of their fathers, by their families: every rememberer from a month old and upward thou number them. peqod benei levi lebet ’abotam lemishpekhotam, kal zakhar miben khodesh vama‘lah tifqedem.
wypqd atm mSh el py yhwh kaSr zwh and mose-extracted numbered them according to the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, as he was direct. vayifqod ’otam mosheh ‘al pi yhvh, ka’asher zuvah.
wyhyw alh bny lwy bSmtm grSwn wqht wmrry and these were children-betweens of levi-join by their names; gershon-drive-out, and kohath-obedient-hope, and merari-bitter. vayihyu ’eleh bene levi bishmotam, gereshon uqehat umerari.
walh Smwt bny grSwn lmSpxtm lbny wSmey and these are the names of children-betweens of gershon-drive-out by their families; libni-to-build-my-white, and shimei. ve’eleh shemot bene gereshon lemishpekhotam, libni veshim‘i.
wbny qht lmSpxtm emrm wyzhr xbrwn wecyal and children-betweens of kohath-obedient-hope by their families; amram-people-high, and izehar, hebron-friend-joy, and uz-gooseziel. ubenei qehat lemishpekhotam, ‘amram veyizhar khebron ve‘uzi’el.
wbny mrry lmSpxtm mxly wmwSy alh hm mSpxt hlwy lbyt abtm and children-betweens of merari-bitter by their families; mahli, and mushi-my-draw. these are the families of the levi-jointes according to the daughter-house of their fathers. ubenei merari lemishpekhotam makhli umushi, ’eleh hem mishpekhot halevi lebet ’abotam.
lgrSwn mSpxt hlbny wmSpxt hSmey alh hm mSpxt hgrSny of gershon-drive-out was the family of the libni-to-build-my-whitetes, and the family of the shimi-my-hearingtes: these are the families of the gershon-drive-outites. legereshon mishpakhat halibni umishpakhat hashim‘i, ’eleh hem mishpekhot hagereshuni.
pqdyhm bmspr kl ckr mbn xdS wmelh pqdyhm Sbet alpym wxmS mawt those that were order-numbered of them, according to the number of all the rememberers, from a month old and upward, even those that were order-numbered of them were seven thousand and five hundred. pequdehem bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama‘elah, pequdehem shib‘at ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot.
mSpxt hgrSny axry hmSkn yxnw ymh the families of the gershon-drive-outites pitch behind the dwelling sea-westward. mishpekhot hagereshuni, ’akharei hamishkan yakhanu yamah.
wnSya byt ab lgrSny alysp bn lal and the chief of the daughter-house of the father of the gershon-drive-outites be elia-my-towardssaph-my-towards-adds child-between of lael. unesi bet ’ab lagereshuni, ’elyasaf ben la’el.
wmSmrt bny grSwn bahl mwed hmSkn whahl mkshw wmsk ptx ahl mwed and the charge of children-betweens of gershon-drive-out in the tent of until-conception be the dwelling, and the tent, the covering thereof, and the hanging for the opening of the tent of until-conception, umishmeret bene gereshon be’ohel mo‘ed hamishkan veha’ohel, mikhsehu umasakh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wqley hxzr wat msk ptx hxzr aSr el hmSkn wel hmcbx sbyb wat mytryw lkl ebdtw and the hangings of the court, and the curtain for the opening of the court, which is by the dwelling, and by the butcher-kitchen round about, and the cords of it for all the work thereof. veqal‘ei hekhazer ve’et masakh petakh hekhazer ’asher ‘al hamishkan ve‘al hamizbeakh sabib, ve’et metarav lekhol ‘abodato.
wlqht mSpxt hemrmy wmSpxt hyzhry wmSpxt hxbrny wmSpxt hecyaly alh hm mSpxt hqhty and of kohath-obedient-hope was the family of the amram-people-highites, and the family of the izeharites, and the family of the hebron-friend-joyites, and the family of the uz-goosezielites: these are the families of the kohath-obedient-hopeites. veliqhat mishpakhat ha‘amrami umishpakhat hayizhari umishpakhat hakhebroni umishpakhat ha‘azi’eli, ’eleh hem mishpekhot haqehati.
bmspr kl ckr mbn xdS wmelh Smnt alpym wSS mawt Smry mSmrt hqdS in the number of all the rememberers, from a month old and upward, were eight thousand and six hundred, keeping the charge of the dedicated-finished. bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama‘elah, shemonat ’alafim veshesh me’ot shomerei mishmeret haqodesh.
mSpxt bny qht yxnw el yrk hmSkn tymnh the families of children-betweens of kohath-obedient-hope pitch on the side of the dwelling south-dryward. mishpekhot bene qehat yakhanu, ‘al yerekh hamishkan temanah.
wnSya byt ab lmSpxt hqhty alyzpn bn ecyal and the chief of the daughter-house of the father of the families of the kohath-obedient-hopeites be elizaphan child-between of uz-gooseziel. unesi bet ’ab lemishpekhot haqehati, ’elizafan ben ‘uzi’el.
wmSmrtm harn whSlxn whmnrh whmcbxt wkly hqdS aSr ySrtw bhm whmsk wkl ebdtw and their charge be the cabinet, and the table, and the light-stream-candle, and the butcher-kitchens, and the tools of the dedicated-finished wherewith they , and the hanging, and all the work thereof. umishmartam ha’aron vehashulkhan vehamenorah vehamizbekhot ukhelei haqodesh ’asher yesharetu bahem, vehamasakh vekhol ‘abodato.
wnSya nSyay hlwy alecr bn ahrn hkhn pqdt Smry mSmrt hqdS and eleazar-towards-stop child-between of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server be chief over the chief of the levi-jointes, and have the oversight of them that keep the charge of the dedicated-finished. unesi nesi’ei halevi ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen, pequdat shomerei mishmeret haqodesh.
lmrry mSpxt hmxly wmSpxt hmwSy alh hm mSpxt mrry of merari-bitter was the family of the mahlites-disease-forgive, and the family of the mushi-my-drawtes: these are the families of merari-bitter. limrari mishpakhat hamakhli umishpakhat hamushi, ’eleh hem mishpekhot merari.
wpqdyhm bmspr kl ckr mbn xdS wmelh SSt alpym wmatym and those that were order-numbered of them, according to the number of all the rememberers, from a month old and upward, were six thousand and two hundred. ufequdehem bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama‘elah, sheshet ’alafim umatayim.
wnSya byt ab lmSpxt mrry zwryal bn abyxyl el yrk hmSkn yxnw zpnh and the chief of the daughter-house of the father of the families of merari-bitter was zur-flintiel child-between of abihail: these pitch on the side of the dwelling hide-northward. unesi bet ’ab lemishpekhot merari zuri’el ben ’abikhayil, ‘al yerekh hamishkan yakhanu zafonah.
wpqdt mSmrt bny mrry qrSy hmSkn wbryxyw wemdyw wadnyw wkl klyw wkl ebdtw and under the custody and charge of children-betweens of merari-bitter be the boards of the dwelling, and the bars thereof, and the column-stands thereof, and the sockets thereof, and all the tools thereof, and all that serveth thereto, ufequdat mishmeret benei merari qarshei hamishkan uberikhav ve‘amudav va’adanav, vekhal kelav vekhol ‘abodato.
wemdy hxzr sbyb wadnyhm wytdtm wmytryhm and the column-stands of the court round about, and their sockets, and their pins, and their cords. ve‘amudei hekhazer sabib ve’adnehem, vitedotam umeterehem.
whxnym lpny hmSkn qdmh lpny ahl mwed mcrxh mSh wahrn wbnyw Smrym mSmrt hmqdS lmSmrt bny ySral whcr hqrb ywmt and those that encamp before-turns the dwelling toward the east, even before-turns the tent of until-conception eastward, be mose-extracted, and aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens, keeping the charge of the dedicated-finished for the charge of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; and the stranger that cometh nigh be put to death. vehakhonim lifnei hamishkan qedemah lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed mizrakhah mosheh ve’aharon ubanav shomerim mishmeret hamiqdash lemishmeret benei yisra’el, vehazar haqareb yumat.
kl pqwdy hlwym aSr pqd mSh wahrn el py yhwh lmSpxtm kl ckr mbn xdS wmelh Snym weSrym alp all that were numbered of the levi-jointes, which mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet numbered at the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, throughout their families, all the rememberers from a month old and upward, were double-ten-twenty and two thousand. kal pequdei halviyim ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon ‘al pi yhvh lemishpekhotam, kal zakhar miben khodesh vama‘lah shenayim ve‘esrim ’alef.
wyamr yhwh al mSh pqd kl bkr ckr lbny ySral mbn xdS wmelh wSa at mspr Smtm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, number all the firstborn of the rememberers of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards from a month old and upward, and take the number of their names. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh peqod kal bekhor zakhar libnei yisra’el miben khodesh vama‘elah, vesa mispar shemotam.
wlqxt at hlwym ly any yhwh txt kl bkr bbny ySral wat bhmt hlwym txt kl bkwr bbhmt bny ySral and thou take the levi-jointes for me (i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah) instead of all the firstborn among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; and the in-them-animal of the levi-jointes instead of all the firstlings among the in-them-animal of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. velaqakhta halviyim li ’ani yhvh takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el, ve’et behemat halviyim takhat kal bekhor bebehemat benei yisra’el.
wypqd mSh kaSr zwh yhwh atw at kl bkr bbny ySral and mose-extracted numbered, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct him, all the firstborn among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayifqod mosheh ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto, kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el.
wyhy kl bkwr ckr bmspr Smwt mbn xdS wmelh lpqdyhm Snym weSrym alp SlSh wSbeym wmatym and all the firstborn rememberers by the number of names, from a month old and upward, of those that were order-numbered of them, were double-ten-twenty and two thousand two hundred and threescore and thirteen. vayhi khal bekhor zakhar bemispar shemot miben khodesh vama‘lah lifqudehem, shenayim ve‘esrim ’elef sheloshah veshib‘im umatayim.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qx at hlwym txt kl bkwr bbny ySral wat bhmt hlwym txt bhmtm whyw ly hlwym any yhwh take the levi-jointes instead of all the firstborn among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and the in-them-animal of the levi-jointes instead of their in-them-animal; and the levi-jointes be mine: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. qakh halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el ve’et behemat halviyim takhat behemtam, vehayu li halviyim ’ani yhvh.
wat pdwyy hSlSh whSbeym whmatym hedpym el hlwym mbkwr bny ySral and for those that are to be redeemed of the two hundred and threescore and thirteen of the firstborn of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which are more than the levi-jointes; ve’et peduyei hasheloshah vehashib‘im vehamatayim, ha‘odefim ‘al halviyim mibekhor benei yisra’el.
wlqxt xmSt xmSt Sqlym lglglt bSql hqdS tqx eSrym grh hSql thou even take five shekel-lights apiece by the poll, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished thou take them: (the shekel-light is double-ten-twenty gera-strangerhs:) velaqakhta khameshet khameshet sheqalim lagulgolet, besheqel haqodesh tiqakh ‘esrim gerah hashaqel.
wntth hksp lahrn wlbnyw pdwyy hedpym bhm and thou give the money, wherewith the odd number of them is to be redeemed, unto aaron-cabinet and to his children-betweens. venatatah hakesef le’aharon ulebanav, peduyei ha‘odefim bahem.
wyqx mSh at ksp hpdywm mat hedpym el pdwyy hlwym and mose-extracted took the redemption money of them that were over and above them that were redeemed by the levi-jointes: vayiqakh mosheh kesef hapidyom, me’et ha‘odefim ‘al peduyei halviyim.
mat bkwr bny ySral lqx at hksp xmSh wSSym wSlS mawt walp bSql hqdS of the firstborn of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards took he the money; a thousand three hundred and threescore and five shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished: me’et bekhor benei yisra’el laqakh hakasef, khamishah veshishim ushelosh me’ot va’elef besheqel haqodesh.
wytn mSh at ksp hpdym lahrn wlbnyw el py yhwh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and mose-extracted gave the money of them that were redeemed unto aaron-cabinet and to his children-betweens, according to the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayiten mosheh kesef hapeduyim le’aharon ulebanav ‘al pi yhvh, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.

mbn SlSym Snh wmelh wed bn xmSym Snh kl ba lzba leSwt mlakh bahl mwed from thirty years old and upward even until fifty years old, all that enter into the troop-cluster, to do the work in the tent of until-conception. miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal ba lazaba la‘asot melakhah be’ohel mo‘ed.
cat ebdt bny qht bahl mwed qdS hqdSym this be the work of children-betweens of kohath-obedient-hope in the tent of until-conception, about the most dedicated-finished things: zot ‘abodat bene qehat be’ohel mo‘ed, qodesh haqodashim.
wba ahrn wbnyw bnse hmxnh whwrdw at prkt hmsk wksw bh at arn hedt and when the camp setteth forward, aaron-cabinet come, and his children-betweens, and they take down the covering breaker, and cover the cabinet of until-witness with it: uba ’aharon ubanav binsoa‘ hamakhaneh vehoridu parokhet hamasakh, vekhisu bah ’et ’aron ha‘edut.
wntnw elyw kswy ewr txS wprSw bgd klyl tklt mlmelh wSmw bdyw and put thereon the covering of takhash-feel light-skins, and spread over it a cloth wholly of blue, and put in the canvas thereof. venatenu ‘alav kesui ‘or takhash ufaresu beged kelil tekhelet milma‘elah, vesamu badav.
wel Slxn hpnym yprSw bgd tklt wntnw elyw at hqert wat hkpt wat hmnqyt wat qSwt hnsk wlxm htmyd elyw yhyh and upon the table of within-turns-bread they spread a cloth of blue, and put thereon the dishes, and the spoons, and the bowls, and covers to cover withal: and the continual bread be thereon: ve‘al shulkhan hapanim yifresu beged tekhelet venatenu ‘alav haqe‘arot ve’et hakapot ve’et hamenaqiyot ve’et qesot hanasekh, velekhem hatamid ‘alav yihyeh.
wprSw elyhm bgd twlet Sny wksw atw bmksh ewr txS wSmw at bdyw and they spread upon them a cloth of two caterpillars, and cover the same with a covering of takhash-feel light-skins, and put in the canvas thereof. ufaresu ‘alehem beged tola‘at shani vekhisu ’oto bemikhseh ‘or takhash, vesamu badav.
wlqxw bgd tklt wksw at mnrt hmawr wat nrtyh wat mlqxyh wat mxttyh wat kl kly Smnh aSr ySrtw lh bhm and they take a cloth of blue, and cover the light-stream-candle of the light, and his lamps, and his tongs, and his shutters, and all the name-from-oil tools thereof, wherewith they unto it: velaqekhu beged tekhelet vekhisu menorat hama’or ve’et neroteha ve’et malqakheha ve’et makhtoteha, ve’et kal kelei shamnah ’asher yesharetu lah bahem.
wntnw ath wat kl klyh al mksh ewr txS wntnw el hmwT and they put it and all the tools thereof within a covering of takhash-feel light-skins, and put it upon a bar. venatenu ’otah ve’et kal keleha ’el mikhseh ‘or takhash, venatenu ‘al hamot.
wel mcbx hchb yprSw bgd tklt wksw atw bmksh ewr txS wSmw at bdyw and upon the golden butcher-kitchen they spread a cloth of blue, and cover it with a covering of takhash-feel light-skins, and put to the canvas thereof: ve‘al mizbakh hazahab yifresu beged tekhelet vekhisu ’oto bemikhseh ‘or takhash, vesamu badav.
wlqxw at kl kly hSrt aSr ySrtw bm bqdS wntnw al bgd tklt wksw awtm bmksh ewr txS wntnw el hmwT and they take all the instruments of ministry, wherewith they in the dedicated-finished, and put them in a cloth of blue, and cover them with a covering of takhash-feel light-skins, and put them on a bar: velaqekhu kal kelei hasharet ’asher yesharetu bam baqodesh venatenu ’el beged tekhelet vekhisu ’otam bemikhseh ‘or takhash, venatenu ‘al hamot.
wdSnw at hmcbx wprSw elyw bgd argmn and they take away the ashes from the butcher-kitchen, and spread a purple cloth thereon: vedishenu hamizbeakh, ufaresu ‘alav beged ’argaman.
wntnw elyw at kl klyw aSr ySrtw elyw bhm at hmxtt at hmclgt wat hyeym wat hmcrqt kl kly hmcbx wprSw elyw kswy ewr txS wSmw bdyw and they put upon it all the tools thereof, wherewith they about it, even the censers, the fleshhooks, and the shovels, and the basins, all the tools of the butcher-kitchen; and they spread upon it a covering of takhash-feel light-skins, and put to the canvas of it. venatenu ‘alav kal kelav ’asher yesharetu ‘alav bahem hamakhtot hamizlagot ve’et haya‘im ve’et hamizraqot kol kelei hamizbeakh, ufaresu ‘alav kesui ‘or takhash vesamu badav.
wklh ahrn wbnyw lkst at hqdS wat kl kly hqdS bnse hmxnh waxry kn ybaw bny qht lSat wla ygew al hqdS wmtw alh mSa bny qht bahl mwed and when aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens have made an end of covering the dedicated-finished, and all the tools of the dedicated-finished, as the camp is to set forward; after that, children-betweens of kohath-obedient-hope come to bear it: and they not touch any dedicated-finished thing, lest they die. these things are the burden of children-betweens of kohath-obedient-hope in the tent of until-conception. vekhilah ’aharon ubanav lekhasot haqodesh ve’et kal kelei haqodesh binsoa‘ hamakhaneh ve’akhare khen yabo’u bene qehat laset velo yige‘u ’el haqodesh vametu, ’eleh masa bene qehat be’ohel mo‘ed.
wpqdt alecr bn ahrn hkhn Smn hmawr wqTrt hsmym wmnxt htmyd wSmn hmSxh pqdt kl hmSkn wkl aSr bw bqdS wbklyw and to the office of eleazar-towards-stop child-between of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server pertaineth the name-from-oil for the light, and the smoke drug, and the daily absorber, and the lubeing name-from-oil, and the oversight of all the dwelling, and of all that therein is, in the dedicated-finished, and in the tools thereof. ufequdat ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen shemen hama’or uqetoret hasamim uminkhat hatamid veshemen hamishkhah, pequdat kal hamishkan vekhal ’asher bo beqodesh ubekhelav.

wcat eSw lhm wxyw wla ymtw bgStm at qdS hqdSym ahrn wbnyw ybaw wSmw awtm ayS ayS el ebdtw wal mSaw and thus do unto them, that they may live, and not die, when they approach unto the most dedicated-finished things: aaron-cabinet and his children-betweens go in, and appoint them every one to his work and to his burden: vezot ‘asu lahem vekhayu velo yamutu begishtam qodesh haqodashim, ’aharon ubanav yabo’u vesamu ’ish ’ish ‘al ‘abodato ve’el masa’o.
wla ybaw lrawt kble at hqdS wmtw and they not go in to see when the dedicated-finished things are covered, lest they die. velo yabo’u lir’ot kebala‘ haqodesh vametu.

wnSaw at yryet hmSkn wat ahl mwed mkshw wmksh htxS aSr elyw mlmelh wat msk ptx ahl mwed and they bear the curtains of the dwelling, and the tent of until-conception, his covering, and the covering of the takhash-feel light-skins that is above upon it, and the hanging for the opening of the tent of until-conception, venase’u yeri‘ot hamishkan ve’et ’ohel mo‘ed mikhsehu umikhseh hatakhash ’asher ‘alav ve’et masakh petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wat qley hxzr wat msk ptx Ser hxzr aSr el hmSkn wel hmcbx sbyb wat mytryhm wat kl kly ebdtm wat kl aSr yeSh lhm webdw and the hangings of the court, and the hanging for the opening of the hair-gate of the court, which is by the dwelling and by the butcher-kitchen round about, and their cords, and all the instruments of their work, and all that is made for them: so they work for. ve’et qal‘ei hekhazer ve’et masakh petakh sha‘ar hekhazer ’asher ‘al hamishkan ve‘al hamizbeakh sabib ve’et meterehem ve’et kal kelei ‘abodatam, ve’et kal ’asher ye‘aseh lahem ve‘abadu.

wyhyw pqdyhm lmSpxtm lbyt abtm alpym wSS mawt wSlSym even those that were order-numbered of them, throughout their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, were two thousand and six hundred and thirty. vayihyu pequdehem lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam, ’alpayim veshesh me’ot usheloshim.
alh pqwdy mSpxt bny grSwn kl hebd bahl mwed aSr pqd mSh wahrn el py yhwh these are they that were numbered of the families of children-betweens of gershon-drive-out, of all that might do work in the tent of until-conception, whom mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet did number according to the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’eleh fequde mishpekhot benei gereshon kal ha‘obed be’ohel mo‘ed, ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon ‘al pi yhvh.
wpqwdy mSpxt bny mrry lmSpxtm lbyt abtm and those that were numbered of the families of children-betweens of merari-bitter, throughout their families, by the daughter-house of their fathers, ufequdei mishpekhot benei merari, lemishpekhotam lebet ’abotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wmelh wed bn xmSym Snh kl hba lzba lebdh bahl mwed from thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that entereth into the work, for the work in the tent of until-conception, miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal haba lazaba la‘abodah be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyhyw pqdyhm lmSpxtm SlSt alpym wmatym even those that were order-numbered of them after their families, were three thousand and two hundred. vayihyu fequdehem lemishpekhotam, sheloshet ’alafim umatayim.
alh pqwdy mSpxt bny mrry aSr pqd mSh wahrn el py yhwh byd mSh these be those that were numbered of the families of children-betweens of merari-bitter, whom mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet numbered according to the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah by the hand of mose-extracted. ’eleh fequde mishpekhot benei merari, ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon ‘al pi yhvh beyad mosheh.
kl hpqdym aSr pqd mSh wahrn wnSyay ySral at hlwym lmSpxtm wlbyt abtm all those that were numbered of the levi-jointes, whom mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet and the chief of israel-juicy-towards numbered, after their families, and after the daughter-house of their fathers, kal hapequdim ’asher paqad mosheh ve’aharon unesi’ei yisra’el halviyim, lemishpekhotam ulebet ’abotam.
mbn SlSym Snh wmelh wed bn xmSym Snh kl hba lebd ebdt ebdh webdt mSa bahl mwed from thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old, every one that came to do the work of the ministry, and the work of the burden in the tent of until-conception. miben sheloshim shanah vama‘lah ve‘ad ben khamishim shanah, kal haba la‘abod ‘abodat ‘abodah va‘abodat masa be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyhyw pqdyhm Smnt alpym wxmS mawt wSmnym even those that were order-numbered of them, were eight thousand and five hundred and fourscore, vayihyu pequdehem, shemonat ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot ushemonim.
el py yhwh pqd awtm byd mSh ayS ayS el ebdtw wel mSaw wpqdyw aSr zwh yhwh at mSh according to the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah they were numbered by the hand of mose-extracted, every one according to his work, and according to his burden: thus were they numbered of him, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. ‘al pi yhvh paqad beyad mosheh ’ish ’ish ‘al ‘abodato ve‘al masa’o, ufequdav ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
zw at bny ySral wySlxw mn hmxnh kl zrwe wkl cb wkl Tma lnpS direct children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they put out of the camp every speckled-waspish, and every one that hath an issue, and whosoever is ceased by the dead: zav benei yisra’el vishalekhu min hamakhaneh kal zarua‘ vekhal zab, vekhol tamei lanafesh.
mckr ed nqbh tSlxw al mxwz lmxnh tSlxwm wla yTmaw at mxnyhm aSr any Skn btwkm both rememberer and pierced ye put out, without the camp ye put them; that they cease not their camps, in the midst whereof i dwell. mizakhar ‘ad neqebah teshalekhu ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh teshalekhum, velo yetame’u makhanehem ’asher ’ani shokhen betokham.
wyeSw kn bny ySral wySlxw awtm al mxwz lmxnh kaSr dbr yhwh al mSh kn eSw bny ySral and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards did so, and put them out without the camp: as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, so did children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vaya‘asu khen benei yisra’el vayshalekhu ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh, ka’asher diber yhvh ’el mosheh ken ‘asu benei yisra’el.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral ayS aw aSh ky yeSw mkl xTat hadm lmel mel byhwh waSmh hnpS hhwa speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, when a man or woman commit any miss that men commit, to do a fire-name to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and that person be fire-name; daber ’el benei yisra’el ’ish ’o ’ishah ki ya‘asu mikal khatot ha’adam lim‘ol ma‘al yhvh, ve’ashemah hanefesh hahiv.
whtwdw at xTatm aSr eSw whSyb at aSmw braSw wxmyStw ysp elyw wntn laSr aSm lw then they confess their miss which they have done: and he recompense his fire-name with the principal thereof, and add unto it the fifth part thereof, and give it unto him against whom he hath fire-nameed. vehitvadu khatatam ’asher ‘asu veheshib ’ashamo berosho vakhamishito yosef ‘alav, venatan la’asher ’asham lo.
wam ayn layS gal lhSyb haSm alyw haSm hmwSb lyhwh lkhn mlbd ayl hkprym aSr ykpr bw elyw and if the man have no kinsman to recompense the fire-name unto, let the fire-name be recompensed unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, even to the dimmer-server; beside the ram-voiceless of the out-of-town-ment, whereby an out-of-town-ment be made for him. ve’im ’en la’ish go’el lehashib ha’asham ’elav ha’asham hamushab yhvh lakohen, milebad ’el hakipurim ’asher yekhaper bo ‘alav.
wkl trwmh lkl qdSy bny ySral aSr yqrybw lkhn lw yhyh and every inward of all the dedicated-finished things of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which they bring unto the dimmer-server, be his. vekhal terumah lekhal qadeshei bene yisra’el ’asher yaqribu lakohen lo yihyeh.
wayS at qdSyw lw yhyw ayS aSr ytn lkhn lw yhyh and every man's dedicateed things be his: whatsoever any man giveth the dimmer-server, it be his. ve’ish qodashav lo yihyu, ’ish ’asher yiten lakohen lo yihyeh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ayS ayS ky tSTh aStw wmelh bw mel speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, if any man's woman go aside, and commit a trespass against him, daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ish ’ish ki tisteh ’ishto uma‘alah bo ma‘al.
wSkb ayS ath Skbt cre wnelm meyny aySh wnstrh whya nTmah wed ayn bh whwa la ntpSh and a man lie with her carnally, and it be hid from the eyes of her man, and be kept close, and she be ceased, and there be no witness against her, neither she be taken with the manner; veshakhab ’ish ’otah shikhbat zera‘ vene‘lam me‘enei ’ishah venisterah vehi nitma’ah, ve‘ed ’en bah vehiv lo nitpasah.
webr elyw rwx qnah wqna at aStw whwa nTmah aw ebr elyw rwx qnah wqna at aStw whya la nTmah and breath-spirit of jealousy come upon him, and he be jealous of his woman, and she be ceased: or if breath-spirit of jealousy come upon him, and he be jealous of his woman, and she be not ceased: ve‘abar ‘alav ruakh qin’ah veqinei ’ishto vehiv nitma’ah, ’o ‘abar ‘alav ruakh qin’ah veqinei ’et ’ishto vehi lo nitma’ah.
whbya hayS at aStw al hkhn whbya at qrbnh elyh eSyrt hayph qmx Serym la yzq elyw Smn wla ytn elyw lbnh ky mnxt qnat hwa mnxt ckrwn mckrt ewn then the man bring his woman unto the dimmer-server, and he inward her inward for her, the tenth part of an ephah-tired of gates-barley meal; he pour no name-from-oil upon it, nor put white-frankincense thereon; for it is an inward of jealousy, an rest-absorber of remembering, bringing torment to remembrance. vehebi ha’ish ’ishto ’el hakohen vehebi qarebanah ‘aleha ‘asirit ha’efah qemakh se‘orim, lo yizoq ‘alav shemen velo yiten ‘alav lebonah ki minkhat qena’ot hu minkhat zikaron mazkeret ‘avon.
whqryb ath hkhn whemdh lpny yhwh and the dimmer-server bring her near, and set her before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: vehiqrib hakohen, vehe‘emidah lifnei yhvh.
wlqx hkhn mym qdSym bkly xrS wmn hepr aSr yhyh bqrqe hmSkn yqx hkhn wntn al hmym and the dimmer-server take dedicated-finished from-waters in an earthen tool; and of the dust that is in the floor of the dwelling the dimmer-server take, and put it into the from-waters: velaqakh hakohen mayim qedoshim bikhli khares, umin he‘afar ’asher yihyeh beqarqa‘ hamishkan yiqakh hakohen venatan ’el hamayim.
whemyd hkhn at haSh lpny yhwh wpre at raS haSh wntn el kpyh at mnxt hckrwn mnxt qnat hwa wbyd hkhn yhyw my hmrym hmarrym and the dimmer-server set the woman before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and uncover the woman's head, and put the rest-absorber of remembering in her hands, which is the jealousy mnkhtabsorber: and the dimmer-server have in his hand the bitter from-waters of the curse: vehe‘emid hakohen ha’ishah lifnei yhvh ufara‘ rosh ha’ishah venatan ‘al kapeha minkhat hazikaron minkhat qena’ot hi ubeyad hakohen yihyu mei hamarim ham’ararim
whSbye ath hkhn wamr al haSh am la Skb ayS atk wam la STyt Tmah txt aySk hnqy mmy hmrym hmarrym halh and the dimmer-server charge her by an toward-oath, and say unto the woman, if no man have lain with thee, and if thou hast not gone aside to stained-ceasedness with another instead of thy man, be thou free from this bitter from-waters of the curse: vehishbia‘ ’otah hakohen ve’amar ’el ha’ishah ’im lo shakhab ’ish ’otakh ve’im lo satit tum’ah takhat ’ishekh, hinaqi mimei hamarim ham’ararim ha’eleh.
wat ky STyt txt aySk wky nTmat wytn ayS bk at Skbtw mbledy aySk and if thou hast gone aside to another instead of thy man, and if thou be ceased, and some man have lain with thee beside thine man: ve’at ki satit takhat ’ishekh vekhi nitmet, vayiten ’ish bakh shekhabeto mibal‘adei ’ishekh.
whSbye hkhn at haSh bSbet halh wamr hkhn laSh ytn yhwh awtk lalh wlSbeh btwk emk btt yhwh at yrkk nplt wat bTnk zbh then the dimmer-server charge the woman with an toward-oath of cursing, and the dimmer-server say unto the woman, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah make thee a curse and an toward-oath among thy with-mum-people, when yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah doth make thy thigh to rot, and thy nurture-belly to swell; vehishbia‘ hakohen ha’ishah bishbu‘at ha’alah ve’amar hakohen la’ishah yiten yhvh ’otakh le’alah velishbu‘ah betokh ‘amekh, betet yhvh yerekhekh nofelet ve’et bitnekh zabah.
wbaw hmym hmarrym halh bmeyk lzbwt bTn wlnpl yrk wamrh haSh amn amn and this from-waters of the curse go into thy bowels, to plow thy gut, and to fall thy thigh: and the woman say, amen-nurture, amen-nurture. uba’u hamayim ham’arerim ha’eleh beme‘ayikh lazbot beten velanpil yarekh, ve’amerah ha’ishah ’amen ’amen.
wktb at halt halh hkhn bspr wmxh al my hmrym and the dimmer-server write these tops in a book, and he blot them out with the bitter from-waters: vekhatab ha’alot ha’eleh hakohen basefer, umakhah ’el mei hamarim.
whSqh at haSh at my hmrym hmarrym wbaw bh hmym hmarrym lmrym and he cause the woman to drink the bitter from-waters of the curse: and the from-waters of the curse enter into her, and become bitter. vehishqah ’et ha’ishah mei hamarim ham’ararim, uba’u bah hamayim ham’ararim lemarim.
wlqx hkhn myd haSh at mnxt hqnat whnyp at hmnxh lpny yhwh whqryb ath al hmcbx then the dimmer-server take the jealousy mnkhtabsorber out of the woman's hand, and sieve-pana the inward before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and inward it upon the butcher-kitchen: velaqakh hakohen miyad ha’ishah minkhat haqena’ot, vehenif haminkhah lifnei yhvh vehiqrib ’otah ’el hamizbeakh.
wqmz hkhn mn hmnxh at ackrth whqTyr hmcbxh waxr ySqh at haSh at hmym and the dimmer-server take an handful of the inward, even the memorial thereof, and burn it upon the butcher-kitchen, and afterward cause the woman to drink the from-waters. veqamaz hakohen min haminkhah ’azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbekhah, ve’akhar yashqeh ’et ha’ishah hamayim.
whSqh at hmym whyth am nTmah wtmel mel baySh wbaw bh hmym hmarrym lmrym wzbth bTnh wnplh yrkh whyth haSh lalh bqrb emh and when he hath made her to drink the from-waters, then it come to pass, that, if she be ceased, and have done fire-name against her man, that the from-waters of the curse enter into her, and become bitter, and her nurture-belly swell, and her thigh rot: and the woman be a ontop among her with-mum-people. vehishqah hamayim vehayetah ’im nitme’ah vatim‘ol ma‘al be’ishah uba’u bah hamayim ham’ararim lemarim vezabetah bitnah venafelah yerekhah, vehayetah ha’ishah le’alah beqereb ‘amah.
wam la nTmah haSh wThrh hwa wnqth wncreh cre and if the woman be not ceased, and be bright-climaxing; then she be cleaned, and be sown with seed. ve’im lo nitme’ah ha’ishah utehorah hi veniqetah venizre‘ah zara‘.
cat twrt hqnat aSr tSTh aSh txt aySh wnTmah this is the teaching of jealousies, when a woman goeth aside to another instead of her man, and is ceased; zot torat haqena’ot, ’asher tisteh ’ishah takhat ’ishah venitma’ah.
aw ayS aSr tebr elyw rwx qnah wqna at aStw whemyd at haSh lpny yhwh weSh lh hkhn at kl htwrh hcat or when breath-spirit of jealousy cometh upon him, and he be jealous over his woman, and set the woman before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and the dimmer-server execute upon her all this teaching. ’o ’asher ta‘abor ‘alav ruakh qin’ah veqinei ’et ’ishto, vehe‘emid ha’ishah lifnei yhvh ve‘asah lah hakohen kal hatorah hazot.
wnqh hayS mewn whaSh hhwa tSa at ewnh then the man be guiltless from torment, and this woman bear her torment. veniqah ha’ish me‘avon, veha’ishah hahiv tisa ‘avonah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ayS aw aSh ky ypla lndr ndr ncyr lhcyr lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when either man or woman separate themselves to vow a vow of a nazarite-seperate, to separate themselves unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ’ish ’o ’ishah ki yafli lindor neder nazir lehazir yhvh.
myyn wSkr ycyr xmz yyn wxmz Skr la ySth wkl mSrt enbym la ySth wenbym lxym wybSym la yakl he separate himself from wine-inherit and strong drink, and drink no vinegar of wine-inherit, or vinegar of strong drink, neither he drink any liquor of grapes, nor eat moist grapes, or dried. miyayin veshekhar yazir khomez yayin vekhomez shekhar lo yishteh, vekhal mishrat ‘anabim lo yishteh va‘anabim lakhim vibeshim lo yokhel.
kl ymy ncrw mkl aSr yeSh mgpn hyyn mxrznym wed cg la yakl all the days of his separation he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree, from the kernels even to the husk. kol yemei nizro, mikol ’asher ye‘aseh migefen hayayin mekharzanim ve‘ad zag lo yokhel.
kl ymy ndr ncrw ter la yebr el raSw ed mlat hymm aSr ycyr lyhwh qdS yhyh gdl pre Ser raSw all the days of the vow of his separation there no razor come upon his head: until the days be fulfilled, in the which he separateth himself unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, he be dedicated-finished, and let the locks of the gate-hair of his head grow. kal yemei neder nizro ta‘ar lo ya‘abor ‘al rosho, ‘ad melot hayamim ’asher yazir yhvh qadosh yihyeh gadel pera‘ se‘ar rosho.
kl ymy hcyrw lyhwh el npS mt la yba all the days that he separateth himself unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah he come at no dead body. kal yemei haziro yhvh, nefesh met lo yabo.
labyw wlamw laxyw wlaxtw la yTma lhm bmtm ky ncr alhyw el raSw he not make himself stained-ceased for his father, or for his mother, for his brother, or for his sister, when they die: because the fullness of his to-no-these is upon his head. le’abiv ule’imo le’akhiv ule’akhoto lo yitama bemotam, ki nezer ’elohav ‘al rosho.
kl ymy ncrw qdS hwa lyhwh all the days of his separation he is dedicated-finished unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. kol yemei nizro, qadosh hu yhvh.
wky ymwt mt elyw bpte ptam wTma raS ncrw wglx raSw bywm Thrtw bywm hSbyey yglxnw and if any man die very suddenly by him, and he hath ceased the head of his fullness; then he shave his head in the day of his bright-climaxingsing, on the seventh day he shave it. vekhi yamut met ‘alav befeta‘ pit’om vetimei rosh nizro, vegilakh rosho beyom tahorato bayom hashebi‘i yegalekhenu.
wbywm hSmyny yba Sty trym aw Sny bny ywnh al hkhn al ptx ahl mwed and on the eighth day he inward two turtles, or two child-betweens of pigeons, to the dimmer-server, to the opening of the tent of until-conception: ubayom hashemini yabi shetei torim ’o shenei benei yonah, ’el hakohen ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
weSh hkhn axd lxTat waxd lelh wkpr elyw maSr xTa el hnpS wqdS at raSw bywm hhwa and the dimmer-server inward the one for a miss, and the other for a on-up, and make an out-of-town-ment for him, for that he missed by the dead, and dedicate-finify his head that same day. ve‘asah hakohen ’ekhad lekhatat ve’ekhad le‘olah vekhiper ‘alav me’asher khata ‘al hanafesh, veqidash rosho bayom hahu.
whcyr lyhwh at ymy ncrw whbya kbS bn Sntw laSm whymym hraSnym yplw ky Tma ncrw and he fill unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah the days of his separation, and bring a lamb of the first year for a fire-name: and the days that were before-turns be lost, because his separation was ceased. vehizir yhvh yemei nizro vehebi kebes ben shenato le’asham, vehayamim harishonim yipelu ki tamei nizro.
wcat twrt hncyr bywm mlat ymy ncrw ybya atw al ptx ahl mwed and this is the teaching of the nazarite-seperate, when the days of his separation are fulfilled: he be brought unto the opening of the tent of until-conception: vezot torat hanazir, beyom melot yemei nizro yabi ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
whqryb at qrbnw lyhwh kbS bn Sntw tmym axd lelh wkbSh axt bt Snth tmymh lxTat wayl axd tmym lSlmym and he inward his inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, one he lamb of the first year simple for a on-up, and one ewe lamb of the first year simple for a miss, and one ram-voiceless simple for wholes, vehiqrib qarebano yhvh kebes ben shenato tamim ’ekhad le‘olah vekhabsah ’akhat bat shenatah temimah lekhatat, ve’ayil ’ekhad tamim lishlamim.
wsl mzwt slt xlt blwlt bSmn wrqyqy mzwt mSxym bSmn wmnxtm wnskyhm and a basket of lit-mazat, cakes of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil, and wafers of lit-mazat lubeed with name-from-oil, and their absorber, and their pourings. vesal mazot solet khalot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen, uminkhatam veniskehem.
whqryb hkhn lpny yhwh weSh at xTatw wat eltw and the dimmer-server bring them before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and inward his miss, and his on-up: vehiqrib hakohen lifnei yhvh, ve‘asah khatato ve’et ‘olato.
wat hayl yeSh cbx Slmym lyhwh el sl hmzwt weSh hkhn at mnxtw wat nskw and he inward the ram-voiceless for a butcher of wholes unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, with the basket of lit-mazat: the dimmer-server inward also his absorber, and his pouring. ve’et ha’ayil ya‘aseh zebakh shelamim yhvh ‘al sal hamazot, ve‘asah hakohen minkhato ve’et nisko.
wglx hncyr ptx ahl mwed at raS ncrw wlqx at Ser raS ncrw wntn el haS aSr txt cbx hSlmym and the nazarite-seperate shave the head of his separation at the opening of the tent of until-conception, and take the gate-hair of the head of his separation, and put it in the fire which is under the butcher of the wholes. vegilakh hanazir petakh ’ohel mo‘ed rosh nizro, velaqakh se‘ar rosh nizro venatan ‘al ha’esh ’asher takhat zebakh hashelamim.
wlqx hkhn at hcre bSlh mn hayl wxlt mzh axt mn hsl wrqyq mzh axd wntn el kpy hncyr axr htglxw at ncrw and the dimmer-server take the sodden shoulder of the ram-voiceless, and one unleavened cake out of the basket, and one unleavened wafer, and put them upon the hands of the nazarite-seperate, after the gate-hair of his separation is shaven: velaqakh hakohen hazeroa‘ beshelah min ha’ayil vekhalat mazah ’akhat min hasal ureqiq mazah ’ekhad, venatan ‘al kapei hanazir ’akhar hitgalekho nizro.
whnyp awtm hkhn tnwph lpny yhwh qdS hwa lkhn el xch htnwph wel Swq htrwmh waxr ySth hncyr yyn and the dimmer-server sieve-pana them for a sieve before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: this is dedicated-finished for the dimmer-server, with the sieve-pana breast and raise shoulder: and after that the nazarite-seperate may drink wine-inherit. vehenif ’otam hakohen tenufah lifnei yhvh qodesh hu lakohen ‘al khazeh hatenufah ve‘al shoq haterumah, ve’akhar yishteh hanazir yayin.
cat twrt hncyr aSr ydr qrbnw lyhwh el ncrw mlbd aSr tSyg ydw kpy ndrw aSr ydr kn yeSh el twrt ncrw this is the teaching of the nazarite-seperate who hath vowed, and of his inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for his separation, beside that that his hand get: according to the vow which he vowed, so he must do after the teaching of his separation. zot torat hanazir ’asher yidor qarebano yhvh ‘al nizro milebad ’asher tasig yado, kefi nidro ’asher yidor ken ya‘aseh ‘al torat nizro.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al ahrn wal bnyw lamr kh tbrkw at bny ySral amwr lhm speak unto aaron-cabinet and unto his children-betweens, saying, on this wise ye knee-fluffy-bless children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying unto them, daber ’el ’aharon ve’el banav lemor koh tebarakhu benei yisra’el, ’amor lahem.
ybrkk yhwh wySmrk yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah knee-fluffy-bless thee, and keep thee: yebarekhkha yhvh veyishmerekha.
yar yhwh pnyw alyk wyxnk yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah make his face-turns shine upon thee, and be attracted unto thee: ya’er yhvh panav ’elekha vikhuneka.
ySa yhwh pnyw alyk wySm lk Slwm yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah lift up his countenance upon thee, and give thee peace. yisa yhvh panav ’elekha veyasem lekha shalom.
wSmw at Smy el bny ySral wany abrkm and they put my name upon children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and i will knee-fluffy-bless them. vesamu shemi ‘al benei yisra’el, va’ani ’abarakhem.
wyhy bywm klwt mSh lhqym at hmSkn wymSx atw wyqdS atw wat kl klyw wat hmcbx wat kl klyw wymSxm wyqdS atm and it came to pass on the day that mose-extracted had fully set up the dwelling, and had lubeed it, and dedicated-finished it, and all the instruments thereof, both the butcher-kitchen and all the tools thereof, and had lubeed them, and dedicated-finished them; vayhi beyom kalot mosheh lehaqim hamishkan vayimshakh ’oto vayqadesh ’oto ve’et kal kelav ve’et hamizbeakh ve’et kal kelav, vayimshakhem vayqadesh ’otam.
wyqrybw nSyay ySral raSy byt abtm hm nSyay hmTt hm hemdym el hpqdym that the princes of israel-juicy-towards, heads of the daughter-house of their fathers, who were the princes of the branchs, and were over them that were numbered, inwarded: vayaqribu nesi’ei yisra’el rashei bet ’abotam, hem nesi’ei hamatot hem ha‘omedim ‘al hapequdim.
wybyaw at qrbnm lpny yhwh SS eglt zb wSny eSr bqr eglh el Sny hnSaym wSwr laxd wyqrybw awtm lpny hmSkn and they brought their inward before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, six covered wagons, and twelve wall-oxen; a wagon for two of the princes, and for each one an wall-ox: and they brought them before-turns the dwelling. vayabi’u qarebanam lifnei yhvh shesh ‘eglot zab ushenei ‘asar baqar ‘agalah ‘al shenei hanesi’im veshor le’ekhad, vayaqribu ’otam lifnei hamishkan.
wyamr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qx matm whyw lebd at ebdt ahl mwed wntth awtm al hlwym ayS kpy ebdtw take it of them, that they may be to do the work of the tent of until-conception; and thou give them unto the levi-jointes, to every man according to his work. qakh me’itam vehayu la‘abod ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed, venatatah ’otam ’el halviyim ’ish kefi ‘abodato.
wyqx mSh at heglt wat hbqr wytn awtm al hlwym and mose-extracted took the wagons and the wall-oxen, and gave them unto the levi-jointes. vayiqakh mosheh ha‘agalot ve’et habaqar, vayiten ’otam ’el halviyim.
at Sty heglt wat arbet hbqr ntn lbny grSwn kpy ebdtm two wagons and four wall-oxen he gave unto children-betweens of gershon-drive-out, according to their work: shetei ha‘agalot ve’et ’arba‘at habaqar natan libnei gereshon, kefi ‘abodatam.
wat arbe heglt wat Smnt hbqr ntn lbny mrry kpy ebdtm byd aytmr bn ahrn hkhn and four wagons and eight wall-oxen he gave unto children-betweens of merari-bitter, according unto their work, under the hand of itamar-with-palm child-between of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server. ve’et ’arba‘ ha‘agalot ve’et shemonat habaqar natan libnei merari, kefi ‘abodatam beyad ’itamar ben ’aharon hakohen.
wlbny qht la ntn ky ebdt hqdS elhm bktp ySaw and unto children-betweens of kohath-obedient-hope he gave none: because the work of the dedicated-finished belonging unto them was that they should bear upon their shoulders. velibnei qehat lo natan, ki ‘abodat haqodesh ‘alehem bakatef yisa’u.
wyqrybw hnSaym at xnkt hmcbx bywm hmSx atw wyqrybw hnSyam at qrbnm lpny hmcbx and the princes inwarded for dedicating of the butcher-kitchen in the day that it was lubeed, even the princes inwarded their inward before-turns the butcher-kitchen. vayaqribu hanesi’im khanukat hamizbeakh beyom himashakh vayaqribu hanesi’im qarebanam lifnei hamizbeakh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh nSya axd lywm nSya axd lywm yqrybw at qrbnm lxnkt hmcbx and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, they inward their inward, each prince on his day, for the dedicating of the butcher-kitchen. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh, nasi ’ekhad layom nasi ’ekhad layom yaqribu qarebanam lakhanukat hamizbeakh.
wyhy hmqryb bywm hraSwn at qrbnw nxSwn bn emyndb lmTh yhwdh and he that inwarded his inward the first day was nahshon-pioneer child-between of aminadab-my-people-contribute, of the branch of judah-know: vayhi hamaqrib bayom harishon qarebano, nakhshon ben ‘aminadab lemateh yehudah.
wqrbnw qert ksp axt SlSym wmah mSqlh mcrq axd ksp Sbeym Sql bSql hqdS Snyhm mlaym slt blwlh bSmn lmnxh and his inward was one silver charger, the weight thereof was an hundred and thirty shekel-lights, one silver bowl of seventy shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished; both of them were full of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber: veqarebano qa‘arat kesef ’akhat sheloshim ume’ah mishqalah mizraq ’ekhad kesef shib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh, shenehem mele’im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah.
kp axt eSrh chb mlah qTrt one spoon of ten shekel-lights of gold, full of incense: kaf ’akhat ‘asarah zahab mele’ah qetoret.
pr axd bn bqr ayl axd kbS axd bn Sntw lelh one bull child-between of visit-cattle, one ram-voiceless, one lamb of the first year, for a on-up: par ’ekhad ben baqar ’ayil ’ekhad kebes ’ekhad ben shenato le‘olah.
Seyr ecym axd lxTat one kid of the intense-goats for a miss: se‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat.
wlcbx hSlmym bqr Snym aylm xmSh etwdym xmSh kbSym bny Snh xmSh ch qrbn nxSwn bn emyndb and for a butcher of wholes, two wall-oxen, five ram-voicelesss, five he intense-goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the inward of nahshon-pioneer child-between of aminadab-my-people-contribute. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim ’elim khamishah ‘atudim khamishah kebasim bene shanah khamishah, zeh qareban nakhshon ben ‘aminadab.

bywm eSty eSr ywm nSya lbny aSr pgeyal bn ekrn on the eleventh day pagiel-my-injury-towards child-between of ocran-disturb, prince of children-betweens of asher-bliss, inwarded: beyom ‘ashtei ‘asar yom nasi libnei ’asher, pag‘i’el ben ‘akheran.
qrbnw qert ksp axt SlSym wmah mSqlh mcrq axd ksp Sbeym Sql bSql hqdS Snyhm mlaym slt blwlh bSmn lmnxh his inward was one silver charger, the weight whereof was an hundred and thirty shekel-lights, one silver bowl of seventy shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished; both of them full of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber: qarebano qa‘arat kesef ’akhat sheloshim ume’ah mishqalah mizraq ’ekhad kesef shib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh, shenehem mele’im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah.
kp axt eSrh chb mlah qTrt one golden spoon of ten shekel-lights, full of incense: kaf ’akhat ‘asarah zahab mele’ah qetoret.
pr axd bn bqr ayl axd kbS axd bn Sntw lelh one bull child-between of visit-cattle, one ram-voiceless, one lamb of the first year, for a on-up: par ’ekhad ben baqar ’ayil ’ekhad kebes ’ekhad ben shenato le‘olah.
Seyr ecym axd lxTat one kid of the intense-goats for a miss: se‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat.
wlcbx hSlmym bqr Snym aylm xmSh etdym xmSh kbSym bny Snh xmSh ch qrbn pgeyal bn ekrn and for a butcher of wholes, two wall-oxen, five ram-voicelesss, five he intense-goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the inward of pagiel-my-injury-towards child-between of ocran-disturb. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim ’elim khamishah ‘atudim khamishah kebasim bene shanah khamishah, zeh qareban pag‘i’el ben ‘akheran.
bywm Snym eSr ywm nSya lbny nptly axyre bn eynn on the twelfth day ahira-my-brother-ra child-between of enan-torture-eye, prince of children-betweens of naphtali-twisted, inwarded: beyom shenem ‘asar yom nasi libnei naftali, ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
qrbnw qert ksp axt SlSym wmah mSqlh mcrq axd ksp Sbeym Sql bSql hqdS Snyhm mlaym slt blwlh bSmn lmnxh his inward was one silver charger, the weight whereof was an hundred and thirty shekel-lights, one silver bowl of seventy shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished; both of them full of fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil for a absorber: qarebano qa‘arat kesef ’akhat sheloshim ume’ah mishqalah mizraq ’ekhad kesef shib‘im sheqel besheqel haqodesh, shenehem mele’im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah.
kp axt eSrh chb mlah qTrt one golden spoon of ten shekel-lights, full of incense: kaf ’akhat ‘asarah zahab mele’ah qetoret.
pr axd bn bqr ayl axd kbS axd bn Sntw lelh one bull child-between of visit-cattle, one ram-voiceless, one lamb of the first year, for a on-up: par ’ekhad ben baqar ’ayil ’ekhad kebes ’ekhad ben shenato le‘olah.
Seyr ecym axd lxTat one kid of the intense-goats for a miss: se‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat.
wlcbx hSlmym bqr Snym aylm xmSh etdym xmSh kbSym bny Snh xmSh ch qrbn axyre bn eynn and for a butcher of wholes, two wall-oxen, five ram-voicelesss, five he intense-goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the inward of ahira-my-brother-ra child-between of enan-torture-eye. ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim ’elim khamishah ‘atudim khamishah kebasim bene shanah khamishah, zeh qareban ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
cat xnkt hmcbx bywm hmSx atw mat nSyay ySral qert ksp Stym eSrh mcrqy ksp Snym eSr kpwt chb Stym eSrh this was the dedication of the butcher-kitchen, in the day when it was lubeed, by the princes of israel-juicy-towards: twelve chargers of silver, twelve silver bowls, twelve spoons of gold: zot khanukat hamizbeakh beyom himashakh ’oto me’et nesi’ei yisra’el, qa‘arot kesef shetem ‘esreh mizreqe khesef shenem ‘asar kapot zahab shetem ‘esreh.
SlSym wmah hqerh haxt ksp wSbeym hmcrq haxd kl ksp hklym alpym warbe mawt bSql hqdS each charger of silver weighing an hundred and thirty shekel-lights, each bowl seventy: all the silver tools weighed two thousand and four hundred shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished: sheloshim ume’ah haqe‘arah ha’akhat kesef veshib‘im hamizraq ha’ekhad, kol kesef hakelim ’alpayim ve’arba‘ me’ot besheqel haqodesh.
kpwt chb Stym eSrh mlat qTrt eSrh eSrh hkp bSql hqdS kl chb hkpwt eSrym wmah the golden spoons were twelve, full of incense, weighing ten shekel-lights apiece, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished: all the gold of the spoons was an hundred and double-ten-twenty shekel-lights. kapot zahab shetem ‘esreh mele’ot qetoret ‘asarah ‘asarah hakaf besheqel haqodesh, kal zehab hakapot ‘esrim ume’ah.
kl hbqr lelh Snym eSr prym aylm Snym eSr kbSym bny Snh Snym eSr wmnxtm wSeyry ecym Snym eSr lxTat all the wall-oxen for the on-up were twelve bulls, the ram-voicelesss twelve, the lambs of the first year twelve, with their absorber: and the kids of the intense-goats for miss twelve. kal habaqar la‘olah shenem ‘asar parim ’elim shenem ‘asar kebasim bene shanah shenem ‘asar uminkhatam, use‘irei ‘izim shenem ‘asar lekhatat.
wkl bqr cbx hSlmym eSrym warbeh prym aylm SSym etdym SSym kbSym bny Snh SSym cat xnkt hmcbx axry hmSx atw and all the wall-oxen for the butcher of the wholes were double-ten-twenty and four bulls, the ram-voicelesss sixty, the he intense-goats sixty, the lambs of the first year sixty. this was the dedication of the butcher-kitchen, after that it was lubeed. vekhol beqar zebakh hashelamim ‘esrim ve’arba‘ah parim ’elim shishim ‘atudim shishim kebasim bene shanah shishim, zot khanukat hamizbeakh ’akharei himashakh ’oto.
wbba mSh al ahl mwed ldbr atw wySme at hqwl mdbr alyw mel hkprt aSr el arn hedt mbyn Sny hkrbym wydbr alyw and when mose-extracted was gone into the tent of until-conception to speak with him, then he heard the voice of one speaking unto him from off the out-of-townment that was upon the cabinet of until-witness, from between-bin the two inward-cherubim: and he spake unto him. ubebo mosheh ’el ’ohel mo‘ed ledaber ’ito vayishma‘ haqol midaber ’elav me‘al hakaporet ’asher ‘al ’aron ha‘edut miben shenei hakerubim, vaydaber ’elav.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al ahrn wamrt alyw bheltk at hnrt al mwl pny hmnwrh yayrw Sbet hnrwt speak unto aaron-cabinet and say unto him, when thou lightest the lamps, the seven lamps give light over against the light-stream-candle. daber ’el ’aharon ve’amarta ’elav, beha‘alotekha hanerot ’el mul penei hamenorah ya’iru shib‘at hanerot.
wyeS kn ahrn al mwl pny hmnwrh helh nrtyh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and aaron-cabinet did so; he lighted the lamps thereof over against the light-stream-candle, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vaya‘as ken ’aharon mul penei hamenorah he‘elah neroteha, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wch meSh hmnrh mqSh chb ed yrkh ed prxh mqSh hwa kmrah aSr hrah yhwh at mSh kn eSh at hmnrh and this work of the light-stream-candle was of beaten gold, unto the shaft thereof, unto the flowers thereof, was beaten work: according unto the pattern which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had showed mose-extracted, so he made the light-stream-candle. vezeh ma‘aseh hamenorah miqshah zahab ‘ad yerekhah ‘ad pirkhah miqshah hi kamar’eh ’asher her’ah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asah hamenorah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qx at hlwym mtwk bny ySral wThrt atm take the levi-jointes from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and bright-climaxingse them. qakh halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el, vetiharta ’otam.
wkh teSh lhm lThrm hch elyhm my xTat whebyrw ter el kl bSrm wkbsw bgdyhm whThrw and thus thou do unto them, to bright-climaxingse them: sprinkle from-waters of purifying upon them, and let them shave all their flesh, and let them wash their clothes, and so make themselves bright-climaxing. vekhoh ta‘aseh lahem letaharam hazeh ‘alehem mei khatat, vehe‘ebiru ta‘ar ‘al kal besaram vekhibesu bigdehem vehiteharu.
wlqxw pr bn bqr wmnxtw slt blwlh bSmn wpr Sny bn bqr tqx lxTat then let them take a bull child-between of visit-cattle with his absorber, even fine basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil, and another bull child-between of visit-cattle thou take for a miss. velaqekhu par ben baqar uminkhato solet belulah bashamen, ufar sheni ben baqar tiqakh lekhatat.
whqrbt at hlwym lpny ahl mwed whqhlt at kl edt bny ySral and thou bring the levi-jointes before-turns the tent of until-conception: and thou gather the whole assembly of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards together: vehiqrabta halviyim lifnei ’ohel mo‘ed, vehiqhalta kal ‘adat benei yisra’el.
whqrbt at hlwym lpny yhwh wsmkw bny ySral at ydyhm el hlwym and thou bring the levi-jointes before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards put their hands upon the levi-jointes: vehiqrabta halviyim lifnei yhvh, vesamekhu bene yisra’el yedehem ‘al halviyim.
whnyp ahrn at hlwym tnwph lpny yhwh mat bny ySral whyw lebd at ebdt yhwh and aaron-cabinet inward the levi-jointes before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for an inward of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they may execute the work of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehenif ’aharon halviyim tenufah lifnei yhvh me’et benei yisra’el, vehayu la‘abod ‘abodat yhvh.
whlwym ysmkw at ydyhm el raS hprym weSh at haxd xTat wat haxd elh lyhwh lkpr el hlwym and the levi-jointes lay their hands upon the heads of the bulls: and thou inward the one for a miss, and the other for a on-up, unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to make an out-of-town-ment for the levi-jointes. vehalviyim yismekhu yedehem ‘al rosh haparim, va‘aseh ha’ekhad khatat ve’et ha’ekhad ‘olah yhvh lekhaper ‘al halviyim.
whemdt at hlwym lpny ahrn wlpny bnyw whnpt atm tnwph lyhwh and thou set the levi-jointes before-turns aaron-cabinet, and before-turns his children-betweens, and inward them for an inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. veha‘amadta halviyim lifnei ’aharon velifnei banav, vehenafta ’otam tenufah yhvh.
whbdlt at hlwym mtwk bny ySral whyw ly hlwym thus thou separate the levi-jointes from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and the levi-jointes be mine. vehibdalta halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el, vehayu li halviyim.
waxry kn ybaw hlwym lebd at ahl mwed wThrt atm whnpt atm tnwph and after that the levi-jointes go in to do the work of the tent of until-conception: and thou bright-climaxingse them, and inward them for an inward. ve’akhare khen yabo’u halviyim la‘abod ’ohel mo‘ed, vetiharta ’otam vehenafta ’otam tenufah.
ky ntnym ntnym hmh ly mtwk bny ySral txt pTrt kl rxm bkwr kl mbny ySral lqxty atm ly for they are wholly given unto me from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; instead of such as open every womb, even instead of the firstborn of all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, have i taken them unto me. ki netunim netunim hemah li mitokh benei yisra’el, takhat pitrat kal rekhem bekhor kol mibenei yisra’el laqakhti ’otam li.
ky ly kl bkwr bbny ySral badm wbbhmh bywm hkty kl bkwr barz mzrym hqdSty atm ly for all the firstborn of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards are mine, both man and beast: on the day that i smote every firstborn in the land of mizraim-narrows i dedicated-finished them for myself. ki li khal bekhor bibnei yisra’el ba’adam ubabehemah, beyom hakoti khal bekhor be’erez mizrayim hiqdashti ’otam li.
waqx at hlwym txt kl bkwr bbny ySral and i have taken the levi-jointes for all the firstborn of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. va’eqakh halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra’el.
watnh at hlwym ntnym lahrn wlbnyw mtwk bny ySral lebd at ebdt bny ySral bahl mwed wlkpr el bny ySral wla yhyh bbny ySral ngp bgSt bny ySral al hqdS and i have given the levi-jointes as a gift to aaron-cabinet and to his children-betweens from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, to do the work of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in the tent of until-conception, and to make an out-of-town-ment for children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: that there be no plague among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, when children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards come nigh unto the dedicated-finished. va’etenah halviyim netunim le’aharon ulebanav mitokh benei yisra’el la‘abod ‘abodat bene yisra’el be’ohel mo‘ed ulekhaper ‘al benei yisra’el, velo yihyeh bibnei yisra’el negef begeshet bene yisra’el ’el haqodesh.
wyeS mSh wahrn wkl edt bny ySral llwym kkl aSr zwh yhwh at mSh llwym kn eSw lhm bny ySral and mose-extracted, and aaron-cabinet, and all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, did to the levi-jointes according unto all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted concerning the levi-jointes, so did children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards unto them. vaya‘as mosheh ve’aharon vekhal ‘adat bene yisra’el lalviyim, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh lalviyim ken ‘asu lahem benei yisra’el.
wytxTaw hlwym wykbsw bgdyhm wynp ahrn atm tnwph lpny yhwh wykpr elyhm ahrn lThrm and the levi-jointes were purified, and they washed their clothes; and aaron-cabinet inwarded them as an inward before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and aaron-cabinet made an out-of-town-ment for them to bright-climaxingse them. vayitkhate’u halviyim vaykhabesu bigdehem vayanef ’aharon ’otam tenufah lifnei yhvh, vaykhaper ‘alehem ’aharon letaharam.
waxry kn baw hlwym lebd at ebdtm bahl mwed lpny ahrn wlpny bnyw kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh el hlwym kn eSw lhm and after that went the levi-jointes in to do their work in the tent of until-conception before-turns aaron-cabinet, and before-turns his children-betweens: as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had direct mose-extracted concerning the levi-jointes, so did they unto them. ve’akhare khen ba’u halviyim la‘abod ‘abodatam be’ohel mo‘ed lifnei ’aharon velifnei banav, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ‘al halviyim ken ‘asu lahem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
cat aSr llwym mbn xmS weSrym Snh wmelh ybwa lzba zba bebdt ahl mwed this is it that belongeth unto the levi-jointes: from double-ten-twenty and five years old and upward they go in to wait upon the work of the tent of until-conception: zot ’asher lalviyim, miben khamesh ve‘esrim shanah vama‘lah yabo lizbo zaba ba‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed.
wmbn xmSym Snh ySwb mzba hebdh wla yebd ewd and from the age of fifty years they cease waiting upon the work thereof, and work for no more: umiben khamishim shanah yashub mizeba ha‘abodah, velo ya‘abod ‘od.
wSrt at axyw bahl mwed lSmr mSmrt webdh la yebd kkh teSh llwym bmSmrtm and with their brethren in the tent of until-conception, to keep the charge, and do no work. thus thou do unto the levi-jointes touching their charge. vesheret ’et ’ekhav be’ohel mo‘ed lishmor mishmeret va‘abodah lo ya‘abod, kakhah ta‘aseh lalviyim bemishmerotam.
wydbr yhwh al mSh bmdbr syny bSnh hSnyt lzatm marz mzrym bxdS hraSwn lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto, in the first month of the second year after they were come out of the land of mizraim-narrows, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh bemidbar sinay bashanah hashenit lezetam me’erez mizrayim bakhodesh harishon lemor.
wyeSw bny ySral at hpsx bmwedw let children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards also keep the passover at his appointed season. veya‘asu bene yisra’el hapasakh bemo‘ado.
barbeh eSr ywm bxdS hch byn herbym teSw atw bmwedw kkl xqtyw wkkl mSpTyw teSw atw in the fourteenth day of this month, at even, ye do it in his appointed season: according to all the rites of it, and according to all the ceremonies thereof, ye keep it. be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom bakhodesh hazeh ben ha‘arbayim ta‘asu ’oto bemo‘ado, kekhal khuqotav ukhekhal mishpatav ta‘asu ’oto.
wydbr mSh al bny ySral leSt hpsx and mose-extracted spake unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they should keep the passover. vaydaber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el la‘asot hapasakh.
wyeSw at hpsx braSwn barbeh eSr ywm lxdS byn herbym bmdbr syny kkl aSr zwh yhwh at mSh kn eSw bny ySral and they kept the passover on the fourteenth day of the first month at even in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto: according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, so did children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vaya‘asu hapesakh barishon be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom lakhodesh ben ha‘arbayim bemidbar sinay, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ken ‘asu benei yisra’el.
wyhy anSym aSr hyw Tmaym lnpS adm wla yklw leSt hpsx bywm hhwa wyqrbw lpny mSh wlpny ahrn bywm hhwa and there were certain men, who were ceased by the dead body of a man, that they could not keep the passover on that day: and they came before-turns mose-extracted and before-turns aaron-cabinet on that day: vayhi ’anashim ’asher hayu teme’im lenefesh ’adam velo yakhelu la‘asot hapesakh bayom hahu, vayiqrebu lifnei mosheh velifnei ’aharon bayom hahu.
wyamrw hanSym hhmh alyw anxnw Tmaym lnpS adm lmh ngre lblty hqrb at qrbn yhwh bmedw btwk bny ySral and those men said unto him, we are ceased by the dead body of a man: wherefore are we kept back, that we may not inward an inward of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in his appointed season among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards? vayomeru ha’anashim hahemah ’elav ’anakhnu teme’im lenefesh ’adam, lamah nigara‘ lebilti haqrib qareban yhvh bemo‘ado betokh benei yisra’el.
wyamr alhm mSh emdw waSmeh mh yzwh yhwh lkm and mose-extracted said unto them, stand still, and i will hear what yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will direct concerning you. vayomer ’alehem mosheh, ‘imdu ve’eshme‘ah mah yezaveh yhvh lakhem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral lamr ayS ayS ky yhyh Tma lnpS aw bdrk rxqh lkm aw ldrtykm weSh psx lyhwh speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, if any man of you or of your posterity be stained-ceased by reason of a dead body, or be in a journey afar off, yet he keep the passover unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. daber ’el benei yisra’el lemor, ’ish ’ish ki yihyeh tamei lanefesh ’o bederekh rekhoqah lakhem ’o ledorotekhem ve‘asah fesakh yhvh.
bxdS hSny barbeh eSr ywm byn herbym yeSw atw el mzwt wmrrym yaklhw the fourteenth day of the second month at even they do it, and eat it with lit-mazat and bitter herbs. bakhodesh hasheni be’arba‘ah ‘asar yom ben ha‘arbayim ya‘asu ’oto, ‘al mazot umerorim yokheluhu.
la ySayrw mmnw ed bqr wezm la ySbrw bw kkl xqt hpsx yeSw atw they leave none of it unto the morning, nor break any bone of it: according to all the ordinances of the passover they do it. lo yash’iru mimenu ‘ad boqer ve‘ezem lo yishberu bo, kekhal khuqat hapesakh ya‘asu ’oto.
whayS aSr hwa Thwr wbdrk la hyh wxdl leSwt hpsx wnkrth hnpS hhwa memyh ky qrbn yhwh la hqryb bmedw xTaw ySa hayS hhwa and the man that is bright-climaxing, and is not in a journey, and forbeareth to keep the passover, even the same being be cut off from his with-mum-people: because he brought not the inward of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in his appointed season, that man bear his miss. veha’ish ’asher hu tahor ubederekh lo hayah vekhadal la‘asot hapesakh venikhretah hanefesh hahiv me‘ameha, ki qareban yhvh lo hiqrib bemo‘ado khet’o yisa ha’ish hahu.
wky ygwr atkm gr weSh psx lyhwh kxqt hpsx wkmSpTw kn yeSh xqh axt yhyh lkm wlgr wlacrx harz and if a stranger sojourn among you, and will keep the passover unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; according to the ordinance of the passover, and according to the manner thereof, so he do: ye have one ordinance, both for the stranger, and for him that was born in the land. vekhi yagur ’itekhem ger ve‘asah fesakh yhvh kekhuqat hapesakh ukhemishpato ken ya‘aseh, khuqah ’akhat yihyeh lakhem velager ule’ezrakh ha’arez.
wbywm hqym at hmSkn ksh henn at hmSkn lahl hedt wberb yhyh el hmSkn kmrah aS ed bqr and on the day that the dwelling was reared up the cloud covered the dwelling, namely, the tent of the until-witness: and at even there was upon the dwelling as it were the appearance of fire, until the morning. ubeyom haqim ’et hamishkan kisah he‘anan hamishkan le’ohel ha‘edut, uba‘ereb yihyeh ‘al hamishkan kemar’eh ’esh ‘ad boqer.
kn yhyh tmyd henn yksnw wmrah aS lylh so it was alway: the cloud covered it by day, and the appearance of fire by night. ken yihyeh tamid he‘anan yekhasenu, umar’eh ’esh layelah.
wlpy helt henn mel hahl waxry kn ysew bny ySral wbmqwm aSr ySkn Sm henn Sm yxnw bny ySral and when the cloud was taken up from the dwelling, then after that children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards journeyed: and in the place where the cloud abode, there children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards pitched their tents. ulefi he‘alot he‘anan me‘al ha’ohel ve’akhare khen yis‘u benei yisra’el, ubimqom ’asher yishkan sham he‘anan sham yakhanu benei yisra’el.
el py yhwh ysew bny ySral wel py yhwh yxnw kl ymy aSr ySkn henn el hmSkn yxnw at the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards journeyed, and at the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah they pitched: as long as the cloud abode upon the dwelling they rested in their tents. ‘al pi yhvh yis‘u benei yisra’el ve‘al pi yhvh yakhanu, kal yeme ’asher yishkon he‘anan ‘al hamishkan yakhanu.
wbharyk henn el hmSkn ymym rbym wSmrw bny ySral at mSmrt yhwh wla ysew and when the cloud tarried long upon the dwelling many days, then children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards kept the charge of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and journeyed not. ubeha’arikh he‘anan ‘al hamishkan yamim rabim, veshameru bene yisra’el mishmeret yhvh velo yisa‘u.
wyS aSr yhyh henn ymym mspr el hmSkn el py yhwh yxnw wel py yhwh ysew and so it was, when the cloud was a few days upon the dwelling; according to the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah they abode in their tents, and according to the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah they journeyed. veyesh ’asher yihyeh he‘anan yamim mispar ‘al hamishkan, ‘al pi yhvh yakhanu ve‘al pi yhvh yisa‘u.
wyS aSr yhyh henn merb ed bqr wnelh henn bbqr wnsew aw ywmm wlylh wnelh henn wnsew and so it was, when the cloud abode from even unto the morning, and that the cloud was taken up in the morning, then they journeyed: whether it was by day or by night that the cloud was taken up, they journeyed. veyesh ’asher yihyeh he‘anan me‘ereb ‘ad boqer vena‘alah he‘anan baboqer venasa‘u, ’o yomam valaylah vena‘alah he‘anan venasa‘u.
aw ymym aw xdS aw ymym bharyk henn el hmSkn lSkn elyw yxnw bny ySral wla ysew wbheltw ysew or whether it were two days, or a month, or a year, that the cloud tarried upon the dwelling, remaining thereon, children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards abode in their tents, and journeyed not: and when it was taken up, they journeyed. ’o yomayim ’o khodesh ’o yamim beha’arikh he‘anan ‘al hamishkan lishkon ‘alav yakhanu bene yisra’el velo yisa‘u, ubehe‘aloto yisa‘u.
el py yhwh yxnw wel py yhwh ysew at mSmrt yhwh Smrw el py yhwh byd mSh at the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah they rested in the tents, and at the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah they journeyed: they kept the charge of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, at the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah by the hand of mose-extracted. ‘al pi yhvh yakhanu ve‘al pi yhvh yisa‘u, mishmeret yhvh shamaru ‘al pi yhvh beyad mosheh.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
eSh lk Sty xzwzrt ksp mqSh teSh atm whyw lk lmqra hedh wlmse at hmxnwt make thee two mouthpiece-trumpets of silver; of a whole piece thou make them: that thou mayest use them for the calling of the assembly, and for the journeying of the camps. ‘aseh lekha shetei khazozrot kesef miqshah ta‘aseh ’otam, vehayu lekha lemiqra ha‘edah ulemasa‘ ’et hamakhanot.
wtqew bhn wnwedw alyk kl hedh al ptx ahl mwed and when they blow with them, all the assembly assemble themselves to thee at the opening of the tent of until-conception. vetaqe‘u bahen, veno‘adu ’elekha kal ha‘edah ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wam baxt ytqew wnwedw alyk hnSyaym raSy alpy ySral and if they blow and with one mouthpiece-trumpet, then the princes, which are heads of the thousands of israel-juicy-towards, gather themselves unto thee. ve’im be’akhat yitqa‘u, veno‘adu ’elekha hanesi’im rashei ’alfei yisra’el.
wtqetm trweh wnsew hmxnwt hxnym qdmh when ye blow an alarm, then the camps that lie on the east parts go forward. uteqa‘tem teru‘ah, venase‘u hamakhanot hakhonim qedemah.
wtqetm trweh Snyt wnsew hmxnwt hxnym tymnh trweh ytqew lmseyhm when ye blow an alarm the second time, then the camps that lie on the south-dry side take their journey: they blow an alarm for their journeys. uteqa‘tem teru‘ah shenit venase‘u hamakhanot hakhonim temanah, teru‘ah yitqe‘u lemas‘ehem.
wbhqhyl at hqhl ttqew wla tryew and when the until-witness is to be added together, ye blow, and ye not sound an alarm. ubehaqhil haqahal, titqe‘u velo tari‘u.
wbny ahrn hkhnym ytqew bxzzrwt whyw lkm lxqt ewlm ldrtykm and children-betweens of aaron-cabinet, the dimmer-servers, blow with the mouthpiece-trumpets; and they be to you for an ordinance for ever throughout your generations. ubenei ’aharon hakohanim yitqe‘u bakhazozerot, vehayu lakhem lekhuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem.
wky tbaw mlxmh barzkm el hzr hzrr atkm whretm bxzzrwt wnckrtm lpny yhwh alhykm wnwSetm maybykm and if ye go to war in your land against the enemy that oppresseth you, then ye blow an alarm with the mouthpiece-trumpets; and ye be remembered before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, and ye be saved from your father-adversaries. vekhi tabo’u milkhamah be’arzekhem ‘al hazar hazorer ’etkhem vahare‘otem bakhazozerot, vanizkartem lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem venosha‘tem me’oyebekhem.
wbywm Smxtkm wbmwedykm wbraSy xdSykm wtqetm bxzzrt el eltykm wel cbxy Slmykm whyw lkm lckrwn lpny alhykm any yhwh alhykm also in the day of your gladness, and in your solemn days, and in the beginnings of your months, ye blow with the mouthpiece-trumpets over your on-ups, and over the butchers of your wholes; that they may be to you for a memorial before-turns your to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ubeyom simkhatkhem ubemo‘adekhem uberashei khadeshekhem uteqa‘tem bakhazozerot ‘al ‘olotekhem ve‘al zibkhei shalmekhem, vehayu lakhem lezikaron lifnei ’elohekhem ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wyhy bSnh hSnyt bxdS hSny beSrym bxdS nelh henn mel mSkn hedt and it came to pass on the twentieth day of the second month, in the second year, that the cloud was taken up from off the dwelling of the until-witness. vayhi bashanah hashenit bakhodesh hasheni be‘esrim bakhodesh, na‘alah he‘anan me‘al mishkan ha‘edut.
wysew bny ySral lmseyhm mmdbr syny wySkn henn bmdbr parn and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards took their journeys out of the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto; and the cloud rested in the place-of-word-desert of paran-magnificence. vayis‘u bene yisra’el lemas‘ehem mimidbar sinay, vayishkon he‘anan bemidbar paran.
wysew braSnh el py yhwh byd mSh and they first took their journey according to the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah by the hand of mose-extracted. vayis‘u barishonah, ‘al pi yhvh beyad mosheh.
wyse dgl mxnh bny yhwdh braSnh lzbatm wel zbaw nxSwn bn emyndb in the first place went the standard of the camp of children-betweens of judah-know according to their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was nahshon-pioneer child-between of aminadab-my-people-contribute. vayisa‘ degel makhaneh bene yehudah barishonah lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o nakhshon ben ‘aminadab.
wel zba mTh bny ySSkr ntnal bn zwer and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of issachar-wage was nethaneel-given-towards child-between of zuar-junior. ve‘al zeba mateh benei yisashkhar, netan’el ben zu‘ar.
wel zba mTh bny cbwln alyab bn xlwn and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of zebulun-fertile was elia-my-towardsb-my-towards-dad child-between of helon-success-sick. ve‘al zeba mateh benei zebulun, ’eli’ab ben khelon.
whwrd hmSkn wnsew bny grSwn wbny mrry nSay hmSkn and the dwelling was taken down; and children-betweens of gershon-drive-out and children-betweens of merari-bitter set forward, bearing the dwelling. vehurad hamishkan, venase‘u bene gereshon ubenei merari nose’ei hamishkan.
wnse dgl mxnh rawbn lzbatm wel zbaw alyzwr bn Sdyawr and the standard of the camp of reuben-see-child set forward according to their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was elizur-my-towards-flint child-between of shediur-my-breast-light. venasa‘ degel makhaneh re’uben lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o ’elizur ben shede’ur.
wel zba mTh bny Smewn Slmyal bn zwry Sdy and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of simeon-hear-home was towards-my-whole child-between of zur-flintishaddai-my-flint-my-breast. ve‘al zeba mateh benei shim‘on, shelumi’el ben zuri shaday.
wel zba mTh bny gd alysp bn dewal and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of gad-tell-luck was elia-my-towardssaph-my-towards-adds child-between of deuel-know-towards. ve‘al zeba mateh bene gad, ’elyasaf ben de‘u’el.
wnsew hqhtym nSay hmqdS whqymw at hmSkn ed bam and the kohath-obedient-hopeites set forward, bearing the dedicated-finished: and the other did set up the dwelling against they came. venase‘u haqehatim nose’ei hamiqdash, veheqimu hamishkan ‘ad bo’am.
wnse dgl mxnh bny aprym lzbatm wel zbaw alySme bn emyhwd and the standard of the camp of children-betweens of ephraim-fruitful set forward according to their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was elisha-towards-savesma child-between of amihud-with-my-glory. venasa‘ degel makhaneh bene ’efrayim lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o ’elishama‘ ben ‘amihud.
wel zba mTh bny mnSh gmlyal bn pdh zwr and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of manasseh-place-of-sleep was gamaliel-my-detox-ripen-camel-towards child-between of pedahzur-cash-in-flint. ve‘al zeba mateh benei menasheh, gamli’el ben pedah
wel zba mTh bny bnymn abydn bn gdewny and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of benjamin-he-between-of-righthand was abidan-my-father-deals-with child-between of gideoni-my-cut-down. ve‘al zeba mateh benei binyamin, ’abidan ben gid‘oni.
wnse dgl mxnh bny dn masp lkl hmxnt lzbatm wel zbaw axyecr bn emySdy and the standard of the camp of children-betweens of dan-discuss set forward, which was the rearward of all the camps throughout their troop-clusters: and over his troop-cluster was ahiezer-my-brother-help child-between of amishadai-my-with-my-breast. venasa‘ degel makhaneh bene dan me’asef lekhal hamakhanot lezib’otam, ve‘al zeba’o ’akhi‘ezer ben ‘amishaday
wel zba mTh bny aSr pgeyal bn ekrn and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of asher-bliss was pagiel-my-injury-towards child-between of ocran-disturb. ve‘al zeba mateh benei ’asher, pag‘i’el ben ‘akheran.
wel zba mTh bny nptly axyre bn eynn and over the troop-cluster of the branch of children-betweens of naphtali-twisted was ahira-my-brother-ra child-between of enan-torture-eye. ve‘al zeba mateh benei naftali, ’akhira‘ ben ‘enan.
alh msey bny ySral lzbatm wysew thus were the journeyings of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards according to their troop-clusters, when they set forward. ’eleh mas‘ei bene yisra’el lezib’otam, vayisa‘u.
