wyamr mSh lxbb bn rewal hmdyny xtn mSh nseym anxnw al hmqwm aSr amr yhwh atw atn lkm lkh atnw whTbnw lk ky yhwh dbr Twb el ySral and mose-extracted said unto hobab, child-between of raguel the midian-place-of-discussed-teachingite, mose-extracted' father in law, we are journeying unto the place of which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said, i will give it you: come thou with us, and we will do thee good: for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath bee-spoken good concerning israel-juicy-towards. vayomer mosheh lekhobab ben re‘u’el hamidyani khoten mosheh nose‘im ’anakhnu ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar yhvh ’oto ’eten lakhem, lekhah ’itanu vehetabnu lakh ki yhvh diber tob ‘al yisra’el.
wyamr alyw la alk ky am al arzy wal mwldty alk and he said unto him, i will not go; and i will depart to mine own land, and to my kindred. vayomer ’elav lo ’elekh, ki ’im ’el ’arzi ve’el moladti ’elekh.
wyamr al na tecb atnw ky el kn ydet xntnw bmdbr whyyt lnw leynym and he said, leave us not, i pray thee; forasmuch as thou knowest how we are to encamp in the place-of-word-desert, and thou mayest be to us instead of eyes. vayomer ’al na ta‘azob ki ‘al ken yada‘ta khanotenu bamidbar vehayita lanu le‘enayim.
whyh ky tlk emnw whyh hTwb hhwa aSr yyTyb yhwh emnw whTbnw lk and it be, if thou go with us, yea, it be, that what goodness yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah do unto us, the same will we do unto thee. vehayah ki telekh ‘imanu, vehayah hatob hahu ’asher yetib yhvh ‘imanu vehetabnu lakh.
wysew mhr yhwh drk SlSt ymym warwn bryt yhwh nse lpnyhm drk SlSt ymym ltwr lhm mnwxh and they departed from the mount of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah three days' journey: and the cabinet of the covenant of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah went before-turns them in the three days' journey, to search out a resting place for them. vayis‘u mehar yhvh derekh sheloshet yamim, va’aron berit yhvh nosea‘ lifnehem derekh sheloshet yamim latur lahem menukhah.
wenn yhwh elyhm ywmm bnsem mn hmxnh and the cloud of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was upon them by day, when they went out of the camp. va‘anan yhvh ‘alehem yomam, benase‘am min hamakhaneh.
wyhy bnse harn wyamr mSh qwmh yhwh wypzw aybyk wynsw mSnayk mpnyk and it came to pass, when the cabinet set forward, that mose-extracted said, rise up, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and let thine father-adversaries be scattered; and let them that hate thee flee before-turns thee. vayhi binsoa‘ ha’aron vayomer mosheh, qumah yhvh veyafuzu ’oyebekha veyanusu mesan’ekha mipanekha.
wbnxh yamr Swbh yhwh rbbwt alpy ySral and when it rested, he said, return, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, unto the many thousands of israel-juicy-towards. ubenukhoh yomar, shubah yhvh ribbot ’alfei yisra’el.
wyhy hem kmtannym re bacny yhwh wySme yhwh wyxr apw wtber bm aS yhwh wtakl bqzh hmxnh and when the with-mum-people complained, it displeased yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah heard it; and his nose-anger was kindled; and the fire of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah burnt among them, and consumed them that were in the uttermost parts of the camp. vayhi ha‘am kemit’onenim ra‘ be’azenei yhvh, vayishma‘ yhvh vayikhar ’apo vatib‘ar bam ’esh yhvh vatokhal biqzeh hamakhaneh.
wyzeq hem al mSh wytpll mSh al yhwh wtSqe haS and the with-mum-people cried unto mose-extracted; and when mose-extracted prayed unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, the fire was quenched. vayiz‘aq ha‘am ’el mosheh, vayitpalel mosheh ’el yhvh vatishqa‘ ha’esh.
wyqra Sm hmqwm hhwa tberh ky berh bm aS yhwh and he called the name of the place taberah-conflagration: because the fire of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah burnt among them. vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu tab‘erah, ki ba‘arah bam ’esh yhvh.
whaspsp aSr bqrbw htaww tawh wySbw wybkw gm bny ySral wyamrw my yaklnw bSr and the mixed multitude that was among them fell a lusting: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards also wept again, and said, who give us flesh to eat? vehasafsuf ’asher beqirbo hit’avu ta’avah, vayashubu vayibku gam benei yisra’el vayomeru mi ya’akhilenu basar.
ckrnw at hdgh aSr nakl bmzrym xnm at hqSaym wat habTxym wat hxzyr wat hbzlym wat hSwmym we remember the fish, which we did eat in mizraim-narrows freely; the cucumbers, and the melons, and the leeks, and the onions, and the garlic: zakharnu hadagah ’asher nokhal bemizrayim khinam, haqishu’im ve’et ha’abatikhim ve’et hekhazir ve’et habezalim ve’et hashumim.
weth npSnw ybSh ayn kl blty al hmn eynynw and now our being is dried away: there is nothing at all, beside this manna-whats-that, before-turns our eyes. ve‘atah nafshenu yebeshah ’en kol, bilti ’el haman ‘enenu.
whmn kcre gd hwa weynw keyn hbdlx and the manna-whats-that was as coriander seed, and the color thereof as the color of bdellium. vehaman kizra‘ gad hu, ve‘eno ke‘en habedolakh.
STw hem wlqTw wTxnw brxym aw dkw bmdkh wbSlw bprwr weSw atw egwt whyh Temw kTem lSd hSmn and the with-mum-people went about, and added it, and ground it in mills, or beat it in a mortar, and baked it in pans, and made cakes of it: and the taste of it was as the taste of fresh name-from-oil. shatu ha‘am velaqetu vetakhanu barekhayim ’o dakhu bamedokhah ubishelu baparur ve‘asu ’oto ‘ugot, vehayah ta‘mo keta‘am leshad hashamen.
wbrdt hTl el hmxnh lylh yrd hmn elyw and when the dew fell upon the camp in the night, the manna-whats-that fell upon it. uberedet hatal ‘al hamakhaneh layelah, yered haman ‘alav.
wySme mSh at hem bkh lmSpxtyw ayS lptx ahlw wyxr ap yhwh mad wbeyny mSh re then mose-extracted heard the with-mum-people weep throughout their families, every man in the opening of his tent: and the nose-anger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was kindled greatly; mose-extracted also was displeased. vayishma‘ mosheh ha‘am bokheh lemishpekhotav ’ish lefetakh ’aholo, vayikhar ’af yhvh me’od ube‘enei mosheh ra‘.
wyamr mSh al yhwh lmh hret lebdk wlmh la mzty xn beynyk lSwm at mSa kl hem hch ely and mose-extracted said unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, wherefore hast thou afflicted thy worker? and wherefore have i not found favor in thy sight, that thou layest the burden of all this with-mum-people upon me? vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh lamah hare‘ota le‘abdekha velamah lo mazati khen be‘enekha, lasum masa kal ha‘am hazeh ‘alay.
hanky hryty at kl hem hch am anky yldtyhw ky tamr aly Sahw bxyqk kaSr ySa hamn at hynq el hadmh aSr nSbet labtyw have i conceived all this with-mum-people? have i begotten them, that thou shouldest say unto me, carry them in thy bosom, as a nursing father beareth the sucking child, unto the land which thou swarest unto their fathers? he’anokhi hariti kal ha‘am hazeh ’im ’anokhi yelidtihu, ki tomar ’elay sa’ehu bekheqekha ka’asher yisa ha’omen hayoneq ‘al ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ta la’abotav.
mayn ly bSr ltt lkl hem hch ky ybkw ely lamr tnh lnw bSr wnaklh whence should i have flesh to give unto all this with-mum-people? for they weep unto me, saying, give us flesh, that we may eat. me’ayin li basar latet lekhal ha‘am hazeh, ki yibku ‘alay lemor tenah lanu basar venokhelah.
la awkl anky lbdy lSat at kl hem hch ky kbd mmny i am not able to bear all this with-mum-people alone, because it is too heavy for me. lo ’ukhal ’anokhi lebadi laset kal ha‘am hazeh, ki khabed mimeni.
wam kkh at eSh ly hrgny na hrg am mzaty xn beynyk wal arah brety and if thou deal thus with me, kill me, i pray thee, out of hand, if i have found favor in thy sight; and let me not see my wretchedness. ve’im kakhah ’at ‘oseh li haregeni na harog ’im mazati khen be‘enekha, ve’al ’er’eh bera‘ati.
wyamr yhwh al mSh asph ly Sbeym ayS mcqny ySral aSr ydet ky hm cqny hem wSTryw wlqxt atm al ahl mwed whtyzbw Sm emk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, gather unto me seventy men of the elders of israel-juicy-towards, whom thou knowest to be the elders of the with-mum-people, and officers over them; and bring them unto the tent of until-conception, that they may stand there with thee. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’esfah li shib‘im ’ish miziqnei yisra’el ’asher yada‘ta ki hem ziqnei ha‘am veshoterav, velaqakhta ’otam ’el ’ohel mo‘ed vehityazebu sham ‘imakh.
wyrdty wdbrty emk Sm wazlty mn hrwx aSr elyk wSmty elyhm wnSaw atk bmSa hem wla tSa ath lbdk and i will come down and talk with thee there: and i will take of breath-spirit which is upon thee, and will put it upon them; and they bear the burden of the with-mum-people with thee, that thou bear it not thyself alone. veyaradti vedibarti ‘imekha sham ve’azalti min haruakh ’asher ‘alekha vesamti ‘alehem, venase’u ’itekha bemasa ha‘am velo tisa ’atah lebadekha.
wal hem tamr htqdSw lmxr wakltm bSr ky bkytm bacny yhwh lamr my yaklnw bSr ky Twb lnw bmzrym wntn yhwh lkm bSr wakltm and say thou unto the with-mum-people, dedicate-finify yourselves against to morrow, and ye eat flesh: for ye have wept in the ears of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, saying, who give us flesh to eat? for it was well with us in mizraim-narrows: therefore yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will give you flesh, and ye eat. ve’el ha‘am tomar hitqadeshu lemakhar va’akhaltem basar ki bekhitem be’azenei yhvh lemor mi ya’akhilenu basar ki tob lanu bemizrayim, venatan yhvh lakhem basar va’akhaltem.
la ywm axd taklwn wla ywmym wla xmSh ymym wla eSrh ymym wla eSrym ywm ye not eat one day, nor two days, nor five days, neither ten days, nor double-ten-twenty days; lo yom ’ekhad tokhelun velo yomayim, velo khamishah yamim velo ‘asarah yamim velo ‘esrim yom.
ed xdS ymym ed aSr yza mapkm whyh lkm lcra yen ky mastm at yhwh aSr bqrbkm wtbkw lpnyw lamr lmh ch yzanw mmzrym and even a whole month, until it come out at your nostrils, and it be loathsome unto you: because that ye have despised yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah which is among you, and have wept before-turns him, saying, why came we forth out of mizraim-narrows? ‘ad khodesh yamim ‘ad ’asher yezei me’apekhem vehayah lakhem lezara, ya‘an ki me’astem yhvh ’asher beqirbekhem vatibku lefanav lemor lamah zeh yazanu mimizrayim.
wyamr mSh SS mawt alp rgly hem aSr anky bqrbw wath amrt bSr atn lhm waklw xdS ymym and mose-extracted said, the with-mum-people, among whom i am, are six hundred thousand footmen; and thou hast said, i will give them flesh, that they may eat a whole month. vayomer mosheh shesh me’ot ’elef ragli ha‘am ’asher ’anokhi beqirbo, ve’atah ’amarta basar ’eten lahem ve’akhelu khodesh yamim.
hzan wbqr ySxT lhm wmza lhm am at kl dgy hym yasp lhm wmza lhm the flocks and the visit-cattles be slain for them, to suffice them? or all the fish of the sea be added together for them, to suffice them? hazon ubaqar yishakhet lahem umaza lahem, ’im kal degei hayam ye’asef lahem umaza lahem.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hyd yhwh tqzr eth trah hyqrk dbry am la and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, is yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's hand waxed short? thou see now whether my bee-word come to pass unto thee or not. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hayad yhvh tiqzar, ‘atah tir’eh hayiqrekha debari ’im lo.
wyza mSh wydbr al hem at dbry yhwh wyasp Sbeym ayS mcqny hem wyemd atm sbybt hahl and mose-extracted went out, and told the with-mum-people the bee-words of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and added the seventy men of the elders of the with-mum-people, and set them round about the dwelling. vayezei mosheh vaydaber ’el ha‘am dibrei yhvh, vaye’esof shib‘im ’ish miziqnei ha‘am vaya‘amed ’otam sebibot ha’ohel.
wyrd yhwh benn wydbr alyw wyazl mn hrwx aSr elyw wytn el Sbeym ayS hcqnym wyhy knwx elyhm hrwx wytnbaw wla yspw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah came down in a cloud, and spake unto him, and took of breath-spirit that was upon him, and gave it unto the seventy elders: and it came to pass, that, when breath-spirit rested upon them, they brought-prophesied, and did not cease. vayered yhvh be‘anan vaydaber ’elav vayazel min haruakh ’asher ‘alav vayiten ‘al shib‘im hazeqenim, vayhi kenoakh ‘alehem haruakh vayitnabe’u velo yasafu.
wySarw Sny anSym bmxnh Sm haxd aldd wSm hSny mydd wtnx elyhm hrwx whmh bktbym wla yzaw hahlh wytnbaw bmxnh and there remained two of the men in the camp, the name of the one was eldad-on-chest, and the name of the other medad-from-chest: and breath-spirit rested upon them; and they were of them that were written, and went not out unto the dwelling: and they brought-prophesied in the camp. vayisha’aru shene ’anashim bamakhaneh shem ha’ekhad ’eldad veshem hasheni medad vatanakh ‘alehem haruakh vehemah baketubim velo yaze’u ha’ohelah, vayitnabe’u bamakhaneh.
wyrz hner wygd lmSh wyamr aldd wmydd mtnbaym bmxnh and there ran a young man, and told mose-extracted, and said, eldad-on-chest and medad-from-chest do bring-prophesy in the camp. vayaraz hana‘ar vayaged lemosheh vayomar, ’eldad umedad mitnabe’im bamakhaneh.
wyen yhwSe bn nwn mSrt mSh mbxryw wyamr adny mSh klam and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish, the worker of mose-extracted, one of his young men, answered and said, my base-lord mose-extracted, forbid them. vaya‘an yehoshua‘ bin nun mesharet mosheh mibekhurav vayomar, ’adoni mosheh kela’em.
wyamr lw mSh hmqna ath ly wmy ytn kl em yhwh nbyaym ky ytn yhwh at rwxw elyhm and mose-extracted said unto him, enviest thou for my sake? would to-no-these that all yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's with-mum-people were bringers, and that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah would put his breath-spirit upon them! vayomer lo mosheh hamqanei ’atah umi yiten kal ‘am yhvh nebi’im ki yiten yhvh rukho ‘alehem.
wyasp mSh al hmxnh hwa wcqny ySral and mose-extracted gat him into the camp, he and the elders of israel-juicy-towards. vaye’asef mosheh ’el hamakhaneh, hu veziqnei yisra’el.
wrwx nse mat yhwh wygc Slwym mn hym wyTS el hmxnh kdrk ywm kh wkdrk ywm kh sbybwt hmxnh wkamtym el pny harz and there went forth a wind from yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and brought quails from the sea, and let them fall by the camp, as it were a day's journey on this side, and as it were a day's journey on the other side, round about the camp, and as it were two cubits high upon the face-turns of the earth. veruakh nasa‘ me’et yhvh vayagaz salvim min hayam vayitosh ‘al hamakhaneh kederekh yom koh ukhederekh yom koh sebibot hamakhaneh, ukhe’amatayim ‘al penei ha’arez.
wyqm hem kl hywm hhwa wkl hlylh wkl ywm hmxrt wyaspw at hSlw hmmeyT asp eSrh xmrym wySTxw lhm STwx sbybwt hmxnh and the with-mum-people stood up all that day, and all that night, and all the next day, and they added the quails: he that added least added ten homers: and they spread them all abroad for themselves round about the camp. vayaqam ha‘am kal hayom hahu vekhal halaylah vekhol yom hamakhorat vaya’asfu haselav hamam‘it ’asaf ‘asarah khomarim, vayishtekhu lahem shatoakh sebibot hamakhaneh.
hbSr ewdnw byn Snyhm Trm ykrt wap yhwh xrh bem wyk yhwh bem mkh rbh mad and while the flesh was yet between-bin their teeth, ere it was chewed, the wrath of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was kindled against the with-mum-people, and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah smote the with-mum-people with a very great plague. habasar ‘odenu ben shinehem terem yikaret, ve’af yhvh kharah ba‘am vayakh yhvh ba‘am makah rabah me’od.
wyqra at Sm hmqwm hhwa qbrwt htawh ky Sm qbrw at hem hmtawym and he called the name of that place hatavah-graveyard-of-craving-kibrot: because there they buried the with-mum-people that craved. vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu hata’avah, ki sham qaberu ha‘am hamit’avim.
mqbrwt htawh nsew hem xzrwt wyhyw bxzrwt and the with-mum-people journeyed from hatavah-graveyard-of-craving-kibrot unto hazerot-gardens; and abode at hazerot-gardens. miqibrot hata’avah nase‘u ha‘am khazerot, vayihyu bakhazerot.
wtdbr mrym wahrn bmSh el adwt haSh hkSyt aSr lqx ky aSh kSyt lqx and miriam-rebel-bitter and aaron-cabinet spake against mose-extracted because of the cush-spindle-spindlen woman whom he had married: for he had married an cush-spindle-spindlen woman. vatedaber miryam ve’aharon bemosheh ‘al ’odot ha’ishah hakushit ’asher laqakh, ki ’ishah khushit laqakh.
wyamrw hrq ak bmSh dbr yhwh hla gm bnw dbr wySme yhwh and they said, hath yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah indeed bee-spoken only by mose-extracted? hath he not bee-spoken also by us? and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah heard it. vayomeru haraq ’akh bemosheh diber yhvh halo gam banu diber, vayishma‘ yhvh.
whayS mSh enw enyw mad mkl hadm aSr el pny hadmh (now the man mose-extracted was very meek, above all the men which were upon the face-turns of the earth.) veha’ish mosheh ‘anav me’od, mikol ha’adam ’asher ‘al penei ha’adamah.
wyamr yhwh ptam al mSh wal ahrn wal mrym zaw SlStkm al ahl mwed wyzaw SlStm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake suddenly unto mose-extracted, and unto aaron-cabinet, and unto miriam-rebel-bitter, come out ye three unto the tent of until-conception. and they three came out. vayomer yhvh pit’om ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ve’el miryam ze’u shelashetekhem ’el ’ohel mo‘ed, vayeze’u shelashetam.
wyrd yhwh bemwd enn wyemd ptx hahl wyqra ahrn wmrym wyzaw Snyhm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah came down in the page-column-erection of the cloud, and stood in the opening of the dwelling, and called aaron-cabinet and miriam-rebel-bitter: and they both came forth. vayered yhvh be‘amud ‘anan vaya‘amod petakh ha’ohel, vayiqra ’aharon umiryam vayeze’u shenehem.
wyamr Smew na dbry am yhyh nbyakm yhwh bmrah alyw atwde bxlwm adbr bw and he said, hear now my bee-words: if there be a bringer among you, i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will make myself hand-known unto him in a vision, and will speak unto him in a dream. vayomer shim‘u na debaray, ’im yihyeh nebi’akhem yhvh bamar’ah ’elav ’etvada‘ bakhalom ’adaber bo.
la kn ebdy mSh bkl byty namn hwa my worker mose-extracted is not so, who is faith-trainingful in all mine daughter-house. lo khen ‘abdi mosheh, bekhal beti ne’eman hu.
ph al ph adbr bw wmrah wla bxydt wtmnt yhwh ybyT wmdwe la yratm ldbr bebdy bmSh with him will i speak mouth to mouth, even apparently, and not in dark speeches; and the similitude of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah he behold: wherefore then were ye not afraid to speak against my worker mose-extracted? peh ’el peh ’adaber bo umar’eh velo bekhidot utemunat yhvh yabit, umadua‘ lo yeretem ledaber be‘abdi bemosheh.
wyxr ap yhwh bm wylk and the nose-anger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was kindled against them; and he departed. vayikhar ’af yhvh bam vayelakh.
whenn sr mel hahl whnh mrym mzret kSlg wypn ahrn al mrym whnh mzret and the cloud departed from off the dwelling; and, behold, miriam-rebel-bitter became speckled-waspish-speckled, to-between-bin-between-build-white as snow: and aaron-cabinet looked upon miriam-rebel-bitter, and, behold, she was speckled-waspish-speckled. vehe‘anan sar me‘al ha’ohel vehineh miryam mezora‘at kashaleg, vayifen ’aharon ’el miryam vehineh mezora‘at.
wyamr ahrn al mSh by adny al na tSt elynw xTat aSr nwalnw waSr xTanw and aaron-cabinet said unto mose-extracted, alas, my base-lord, i beseech thee, lay not the miss upon us, wherein we have done foolishly, and wherein we have missed. vayomer ’aharon ’el mosheh, bi ’adoni ’al na tashet ‘alenu khatat ’asher no’alnu va’asher khatanu.
al na thy kmt aSr bzatw mrxm amw wyakl xzy bSrw let her not be as one dead, of whom the flesh is half consumed when he cometh out of his mother's womb. ’al na tehi kamet, ’asher bezeto merekhem ’imo vaye’akhel khazi besaro.
wyzeq mSh al yhwh lamr al na rpa na lh and mose-extracted cried unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, saying, heal her now, o to-no-these, i beseech thee. vayiz‘aq mosheh ’el yhvh lemor, ’el na refa na lah.
wyamr yhwh al mSh wabyh yrq yrq bpnyh hla tklm Sbet ymym tsgr Sbet ymym mxwz lmxnh waxr tasp and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, if her father had and spit in her face-turns, should she not be ashamed seven days? let her be shut out from the camp seven days, and after that let her be received in again. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’abiha yaroq yaraq befaneha halo tikalem shib‘at yamim, tisager shib‘at yamim mikhuz lamakhaneh ve’akhar te’asef.
wtsgr mrym mxwz lmxnh Sbet ymym whem la nse ed hasp mrym and miriam-rebel-bitter was shut out from the camp seven days: and the with-mum-people journeyed not till miriam-rebel-bitter was brought in again. vatisager miryam mikhuz lamakhaneh shib‘at yamim, veha‘am lo nasa‘ ‘ad he’asef miryam.
waxr nsew hem mxzrwt wyxnw bmdbr parn and afterward the with-mum-people removed from hazerot-gardens, and pitched in the place-of-word-desert of paran-magnificence. ve’akhar nase‘u ha‘am mekhazerot, vayakhanu bemidbar paran.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Slx lk anSym wytrw at arz knen aSr any ntn lbny ySral ayS axd ayS axd lmTh abtyw tSlxw kl nSya bhm send thou men, that they may search the land of canaan-mobile-trade, which i give unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: of every branch of their fathers ye send a man, every one a ruler among them. shelakh ’anashim veyaturu ’erez kena‘an ’asher ’ani noten libnei yisra’el, ’ish ’ekhad ’ish ’ekhad lemateh ’abotav tishlakhu kol nasi bahem.
wySlx atm mSh mmdbr parn el py yhwh klm anSym raSy bny ySral hmh and mose-extracted by the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sent them from the place-of-word-desert of paran-magnificence: all those men were heads of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayishlakh ’otam mosheh mimidbar paran ‘al pi yhvh, kulam ’anashim rashei bene yisra’el hemah.
walh Smwtm lmTh rawbn Smwe bn ckwr and these were their names: of the branch of reuben-see-child, shamua-hear child-between of zakur-remember. ve’eleh shemotam, lemateh re’uben shamua‘ ben zakur.
lmTh Smewn SpT bn xwry of the branch of simeon-hear-home, shaphat-lip-judge child-between of hori-my-hole. lemateh shim‘on shafat ben khori.
lmTh yhwdh klb bn ypnh of the branch of judah-know, caleb-as-heart-dog child-between of jephuneh-turn. lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh.
lmTh ySSkr ygal bn ywsp of the branch of issachar-wage, igal-free child-between of joseph-add. lemateh yisashkhar yig’al ben yosef.
lmTh aprym hwSe bn nwn of the branch of ephraim-fruitful, esus-save child-between of nun-fish. lemateh ’efrayim hoshea‘ bin nun.
lmTh bnymn plTy bn rpwa of the branch of benjamin-he-between-of-righthand, palti-emit child-between of raphu-medicine. lemateh binyamin palti ben rafu.
lmTh cbwln gdyal bn swdy of the branch of zebulun-fertile, gad-tell-luckdiel child-between of sodi-secret. lemateh zebulun gadi’el ben sodi.
lmTh ywsp lmTh mnSh gdy bn swsy of the branch of joseph-add, namely, of the branch of manasseh-place-of-sleep, gad-tell-luckdi child-between of horse-my. lemateh yosef lemateh menasheh, gadi ben susi.
lmTh dn emyal bn gmly of the branch of dan-discuss, towards-my-with child-between of ripen-camel-my. lemateh dan ‘ami’el ben gemali.
lmTh aSr stwr bn mykal of the branch of asher-bliss, sethur-unkempt-contradict child-between of towards-who-like. lemateh ’asher setur ben mikha’el.
lmTh nptly nxby bn wpsy of the branch of naphtali-twisted, nahbi-rest-owe child-between of vophsi-stripe. lemateh naftali nakhbi ben vafesi.
lmTh gd gawal bn mky of the branch of gad-tell-luck, geuel-rise-towards child-between of machi-of-beat. lemateh gad ge’u’el ben makhi.
alh Smwt hanSym aSr Slx mSh ltwr at harz wyqra mSh lhwSe bn nwn yhwSe these are the names of the men which mose-extracted sent to spy out the land. and mose-extracted called esus-save child-between of nun-fish jesus-save. ’eleh shemot ha’anashim ’asher shalakh mosheh latur ha’arez, vayiqra mosheh lehoshea‘ bin nun yehoshua‘.
wySlx atm mSh ltwr at arz knen wyamr alhm elw ch bngb welytm at hhr and mose-extracted sent them to spy out the land of canaan-mobile-trade, and said unto them, get you up this way south-dryward, and go up into the mountain: vayishlakh ’otam mosheh latur ’erez kena‘an, vayomer ’alehem ‘alu zeh banegeb va‘alitem ’et hahar.
wraytm at harz mh hwa wat hem hySb elyh hxcq hwa hrph hmeT hwa am rb and see the land, what it is, and the with-mum-people that dwelleth therein, whether they be strong or weak, few or many; ure’item ha’arez mah hi ve’et ha‘am hayosheb ‘aleha hekhazaq hu harafeh ham‘at hu ’im rab.
wmh harz aSr hwa ySb bh hTwbh hwa am reh wmh herym aSr hwa ywSb bhnh hbmxnym am bmbzrym and what the land is that they dwell in, whether it be good or bad; and what cities they be that they dwell in, whether in tents, or in strong holds; umah ha’arez ’asher hu yosheb bah hatobah hi ’im ra‘ah, umah he‘arim ’asher hu yosheb bahenah habemakhanim ’im bemibzarim.
wmh harz hSmnh hwa am rch hyS bh ez am ayn whtxcqtm wlqxtm mpry harz whymym ymy bkwry enbym and what the land is, whether it be fat or lean, whether there be wood therein, or not. and be ye of good courage, and bring of the fruit of the land. now the time was the time of the first ripe grapes. umah ha’arez hashemenah hi ’im razah hayesh bah ‘ez ’im ’ayin vehitkhazaqtem uleqakhtem miperi ha’arez, vehayamim yemei bikurei ‘anabim.
wyelw wytrw at harz mmdbr zn ed rxb lba xmt so they went up, and searched the land from the place-of-word-desert of zin-briar unto rehob-wide, as men come to ham-hotath. vaya‘alu vayaturu ha’arez, mimidbar zin ‘ad rekhob lebo khamat.
wyelw bngb wyba ed xbrwn wSm axymn SSy wtlmy ylydy henq wxbrwn Sbe Snym nbnth lpny zen mzrym and they ascended by the south-dry, and came unto hebron-friend-joy; where ahiman-my-brother-from, sheshai-my-six, and talmai-furrow, the natives of anak-giant, were. (now hebron-friend-joy was between-built seven years before-turns zoan-ten in mizraim-narrows.) vaya‘alu banegeb vayabo ‘ad khebron vesham ’akhiman sheshay vetalmay yelidei ha‘anaq, vekhebron sheba‘ shanim nibnetah lifnei zo‘an mizrayim.
wybaw ed nxl aSkl wykrtw mSm cmwrh waSkwl enbym axd wySahw bmwT bSnym wmn hrmnym wmn htanym and they came unto the brook of eshcol-fire-all, and cut down from thence a branch with one cluster of grapes, and they bare it between-bin two upon a staff; and they brought of the high-pomegranates, and of the figs. vayabo’u ‘ad nakhal ’eshkol vayikhretu misham zemorah ve’eshkol ‘anabim ’ekhad vayisa’uhu bamot bishnayim, umin harimonim umin hate’enim.
lmqwm hhwa qra nxl aSkwl el adwt haSkwl aSr krtw mSm bny ySral the place was called the brook eshcol-fire-all, because of the cluster of grapes which children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards cut down from thence. lamaqom hahu qara nakhal ’eshkol, ‘al ’odot ha’eshkol ’asher karetu misham benei yisra’el.
wySbw mtwr harz mqz arbeym ywm and they returned from searching of the land after forty days. vayashubu mitur ha’arez, miqez ’arba‘im yom.
wylkw wybaw al mSh wal ahrn wal kl edt bny ySral al mdbr parn qdSh wySybw awtm dbr wat kl hedh wyrawm at pry harz and they went and came to mose-extracted, and to aaron-cabinet, and to all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, unto the place-of-word-desert of paran-magnificence, to kadesh-dedicated-finished; and brought back bee-word unto them, and unto all the until-witness, and showed them the fruit of the land. vayelekhu vayabo’u ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ve’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el ’el midbar paran qadeshah, vayashibu ’otam dabar ve’et kal ha‘edah vayar’um peri ha’arez.
wysprw lw wyamrw banw al harz aSr Slxtnw wgm cbt xlb wdbS hwa wch pryh and they told him, and said, we came unto the land whither thou sentest us, and surely it floweth with milk and honey; and this is the fruit of it. vaysaperu lo vayomeru banu ’el ha’arez ’asher shelakhtanu, vegam zabat khalab udebash hi vezeh piryah.
aps ky ec hem hySb barz wherym bzrwt gdlt mad wgm yldy henq raynw Sm nevertheless the with-mum-people be strong that dwell in the land, and the cities are walled, and very great: and moreover we saw the natives of anak-giant there. ’efes ki ‘az ha‘am hayosheb ba’arez, vehe‘arim bezurot gedolot me’od vegam yelidei ha‘anaq ra’inu sham.
emlq ywSb barz hngb whxty whybwsy whamry ywSb bhr whkneny ySb el hym wel yd hyrdn the amalek-labour-king-molochites dwell in the land of the south-dry: and the hittite-cuts-tusk, and the jebusite-tramplers, and the amorite-talkers, dwell in the mountains: and the canaan-mobile-tradeites dwell by the sea, and by the coast of jordan-its-going-down. ‘amaleq yosheb be’erez hanegeb, vehakhiti vehaybusi veha’emori yosheb bahar vehakena‘ani yosheb ‘al hayam ve‘al yad hayarden.
wyhs klb at hem al mSh wyamr elh nelh wyrSnw ath ky ykwl nwkl lh and caleb-as-heart-dog stilled the with-mum-people before-turns mose-extracted, and said, let us go up at once, and possess it; for we are well able to overcome it. vayahas kaleb ha‘am ’el mosheh, vayomer ‘aloh na‘aleh veyarashnu ki yakhol nukhal lah.
whanSym aSr elw emw amrw la nwkl lelwt al hem ky xcq hwa mmnw and the men that went up with him said, we be not able to go up against the with-mum-people; for they are stronger than we. veha’anashim ’asher ‘alu ‘imo ’ameru lo nukhal la‘alot ’el ha‘am, ki khazaq hu mimenu.
wywzyaw dbt harz aSr trw ath al bny ySral lamr harz aSr ebrnw bh ltwr ath arz aklt ywSbyh hwa wkl hem aSr raynw btwkh anSy mdwt and they brought up an bad report of the land which they had searched unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, the land, through which we have gone to search it, is a land that eateth up the inhabitants thereof; and all the with-mum-people that we saw in it are men of a great stature. vayozi’u dibat ha’arez ’asher taru ’el benei yisra’el lemor, ha’arez ’asher ‘abarnu bah latur ’erez ’okhelet yoshebeha hi vekhal ha‘am ’asher ra’inu betokhah ’anshei midot.
wSm raynw at hnpylym bny enq mn hnplym wnhy beynynw kxgbym wkn hyynw beynyhm and there we saw the giants, children-betweens of anak-giant, which come of the giants: and we were in our own sight as grasshoppers, and so we were in their sight. vesham ra’inu hanefilim benei ‘anaq min hanefilim, vanehi be‘enenu kakhagabim vekhen hayinu be‘enehem.
wtSa kl hedh wytnw at qwlm wybkw hem blylh hhwa and all the until-witness lifted up their voice, and cried; and the with-mum-people wept that night. vatisa kal ha‘edah vayitenu qolam, vayibku ha‘am balaylah hahu.
wylnw el mSh wel ahrn kl bny ySral wyamrw alhm kl hedh lw mtnw barz mzrym aw bmdbr hch lw mtnw and all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards murmured against mose-extracted and against aaron-cabinet: and the whole until-witness said unto them, would to-no-these that we had died in the land of mizraim-narrows! or would to-no-these we had died in this place-of-word-desert! vayilonu ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon kol benei yisra’el, vayomeru ’alehem kal ha‘edah lu matnu be’erez mizrayim ’o bamidbar hazeh lu matenu.
wlmh yhwh mbya atnw al harz hcat lnpl bxrb nSynw wTpnw yhyw lbc hlwa Twb lnw Swb mzrymh and wherefore hath yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought us unto this land, to fall by the sword, that our women and our children-betweens should be a prey? were it not better for us to return into mizraim-narrows? velamah yhvh mebi ’otanu ’el ha’arez hazot linpol bakhereb nashenu vetapenu yihyu labaz, halo tob lanu shub mizrayemah.
wyamrw ayS al axyw ntnh raS wnSwbh mzrymh and they said one to another, let us make a captain, and let us return into mizraim-narrows. vayomeru ’ish ’el ’akhiv, nitenah rosh venashubah mizrayemah.
wypl mSh wahrn el pnyhm lpny kl qhl edt bny ySral then mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet fell on their face-turns-turns before-turns all the assembly of the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayipol mosheh ve’aharon ‘al penehem, lifnei kal qehal ‘adat benei yisra’el.
wyhwSe bn nwn wklb bn ypnh mn htrym at harz qrew bgdyhm and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish, and caleb-as-heart-dog child-between of jephuneh-turn, which were of them that searched the land, rent their clothes: vihoshua‘ bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh min hatarim ha’arez, qare‘u bigdehem.
wyamrw al kl edt bny ySral lamr harz aSr ebrnw bh ltwr ath Twbh harz mad mad and they spake unto all the company of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, the land, which we passed through to search it, is an exceeding good land. vayomeru ’el kal ‘adat bene yisra’el lemor, ha’arez ’asher ‘abarnu bah latur tobah ha’arez me’od me’od.
am xpz bnw yhwh whbya atnw al harz hcat wntnh lnw arz aSr hwa cbt xlb wdbS if yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah delight in us, then he will bring us into this land, and give it us; a land which floweth with milk and honey. ’im khafez banu yhvh vehebi ’otanu ’el ha’arez hazot unetanah lanu, ’erez ’asher hi zabat khalab udebash.
ak byhwh al tmrdw watm al tyraw at em harz ky lxmnw hm sr zlm melyhm wyhwh atnw al tyram only rebel not ye to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, neither fear ye the with-mum-people of the land; for they are bread for us: their defense is departed from them, and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is with us: fear them not. ’akh yhvh ’al timrodu ve’atem ’al tire’u ‘am ha’arez ki lakhmenu hem, sar zilam me‘alehem yhvh ’itanu ’al tira’um.
wyamrw kl hedh lrgwm atm babnym wkbwd yhwh nrah bahl mwed al kl bny ySral and all the until-witness bade father-child-stone them with stones. and the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appeared in the tent of until-conception before-turns all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayomeru kal ha‘edah lirgom ’otam ba’abanim, ukhebod yhvh nir’ah be’ohel mo‘ed ’el kal benei yisra’el.
wyamr yhwh al mSh ed anh ynazny hem hch wed anh la yamynw by bkl hatwt aSr eSyty bqrbw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, how long will this with-mum-people provoke me? and how long will it be ere they be coached by me, for all the signs which i have showed among them? vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘ad ’anah yena’azuni ha‘am hazeh, ve‘ad ’anah lo ya’aminu bi bekhol ha’otot ’asher ‘asiti beqirbo.
aknw bdbr wawrSnw waeSh atk lgwy gdwl wezwm mmnw i will hit them with the pestilence, and disinherit them, and will make of thee a greater nation and mightier than they. ’akenu badeber ve’orishenu, ve’e‘eseh ’otekha lego gadol ve‘azum mimenu.
wyamr mSh al yhwh wSmew mzrym ky helyt bkxk at hem hch mqrbw and mose-extracted said unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, then the mizraim-narrowsians hear it, (for thou broughtest up this with-mum-people in thy might from among them;) vayomer mosheh ’el yhvh, veshame‘u mizrayim ki he‘elita bekhokhakha ha‘am hazeh miqirbo.
wamrw al ywSb harz hcat Smew ky ath yhwh bqrb hem hch aSr eyn beyn nrah ath yhwh wennk emd elhm wbemd enn ath hlk lpnyhm ywmm wbemwd aS lylh and they will tell it to the inhabitants of this land: for they have heard that thou yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah art among this with-mum-people, that thou yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah art seen face-turns to face-turns, and that thy cloud standeth over them, and that thou goest before-turns them, by day time in a page-column-erection of a cloud, and in a page-column-erection of fire by night. ve’ameru ’el yosheb ha’arez hazot shame‘u ki ’atah yhvh beqereb ha‘am hazeh, ’asher ‘ayin be‘ayin nir’ah ’atah yhvh va‘ananekha ‘omed ‘alehem ube‘amud ‘anan ’atah holekh lifnehem yomam ube‘amud ’esh layelah.
whmth at hem hch kayS axd wamrw hgwym aSr Smew at Smek lamr now if thou kill all this with-mum-people as one man, then the nations which have heard the fame of thee will speak, saying, vehematah ha‘am hazeh ke’ish ’ekhad, ve’ameru hagoyim ’asher shame‘u shim‘akha lemor.
mblty yklt yhwh lhbya at hem hch al harz aSr nSbe lhm wySxTm bmdbr because yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was not able to bring this with-mum-people into the land which he sware unto them, therefore he hath slain them in the place-of-word-desert. mibilti yekholet yhvh lehabi ha‘am hazeh ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ lahem, vayishkhatem bamidbar.
weth ygdl na kx adny kaSr dbrt lamr and now, i beseech thee, let the dynamic of my base-lord be great, according as thou hast bee-spoken, saying, ve‘atah yigdal na koakh ’adonay, ka’asher dibarta lemor.
yhwh ark apym wrb xsd nSa ewn wpSe wnqh la ynqh pqd ewn abwt el bnym el SlSym wel rbeym yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is long-suffering, and of great mercy, forgiving torment and crime, and by no means clearing the fire-name, visiting the torment of the fathers upon children-betweens unto the third and fourth generation. yhvh ’erekh ’apayim verab khesed nosei ‘avon vafasha‘, venaqeh lo yenaqeh poqed ‘avon ’abot ‘al banim ‘al shileshim ve‘al ribe‘im.
slx na lewn hem hch kgdl xsdk wkaSr nSath lem hch mmzrym wed hnh pardon, i beseech thee, the torment of this with-mum-people according unto the greatness of thy mercy, and as thou hast released this with-mum-people, from mizraim-narrows even until now. selakh na la‘avon ha‘am hazeh kegodel khasdekha, vekha’asher nasatah la‘am hazeh mimizrayim ve‘ad henah.
wyamr yhwh slxty kdbrk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said, i have pardoned according to thy bee-word: vayomer yhvh salakhti kidbarekha.
wawlm xy any wymla kbwd yhwh at kl harz and as truly as i live, all the earth be filled with the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ve’ulam khay ’ani, veyimalei khebod yhvh kal ha’arez.
ky kl hanSym hraym at kbdy wat atty aSr eSyty bmzrym wbmdbr wynsw aty ch eSr pemym wla Smew bqwly because all those men which have seen my heaviness, and my miracles, which i did in mizraim-narrows and in the place-of-word-desert, and have tempted me now these ten times, and have not hearkened to my voice; ki khal ha’anashim haro’im kebodi ve’et ’ototay ’asher ‘asiti bemizrayim ubamidbar, vaynasu ’oti zeh ‘eser pe‘amim velo shame‘u beqoli.
am yraw at harz aSr nSbety labtm wkl mnazy la yrawh surely they not see the land which i sware unto their fathers, neither any of them that provoked me see it: ’im yir’u ’et ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti la’abotam, vekhal mena’azay lo yir’uha.
webdy klb eqb hyth rwx axrt emw wymla axry whbyatyw al harz aSr ba Smh wcrew ywrSnh and my worker caleb-as-heart-dog, because he had another breath-spirit with him, and hath followed me fully, him will i bring into the land whereinto he went; and his seed possess it. ve‘abdi khaleb ‘eqeb hayetah ruakh ’akheret ‘imo vaymalei ’akharay, vahabi’otiv ’el ha’arez ’asher ba shamah vezar‘o yorishenah.
whemlqy whkneny ywSb bemq mxr pnw wsew lkm hmdbr drk ym swp (now the amalek-labour-king-molochites and the canaan-mobile-tradeites dwelt in the valley.) tomorrow turn you, and get you into the place-of-word-desert by the way of the end sea. veha‘amaleqi vehakena‘ani yosheb ba‘emeq, makhar penu use‘u lakhem hamidbar derekh yam suf.
wydbr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and unto aaron-cabinet, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
ed mty ledh hreh hcat aSr hmh mlynym ely at tlnwt bny ySral aSr hmh mlynym ely Smety how long i bear with this bad until-witness, which murmur against me? i have heard the murmurings of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which they murmur against me. ‘ad matay la‘edah hara‘ah hazot ’asher hemah malinim ‘alay, telunot benei yisra’el ’asher hemah malinim ‘alay shama‘eti.
amr alhm xy any nam yhwh am la kaSr dbrtm bacny kn aeSh lkm say unto them, as truly as i live, saith yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, as ye have bee-spoken in mine ears, so will i do to you: ’emor ’alehem khay ’ani ne’um yhvh ’im lo ka’asher dibartem be’azenay, ken ’e‘eseh lakhem.
bmdbr hch yplw pgrykm wkl pqdykm lkl msprkm mbn eSrym Snh wmelh aSr hlyntm ely your carcasses fall in this place-of-word-desert; and all that were numbered of you, according to your whole number, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward which have murmured against me. bamidbar hazeh yipelu figrekhem vekhal pequdekhem lekhal misparkhem miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘elah, ’asher halinotem ‘alay.
am atm tbaw al harz aSr nSaty at ydy lSkn atkm bh ky am klb bn ypnh wyhwSe bn nwn doubtless ye not come into the land, concerning which i sware to make you dwell therein, save caleb-as-heart-dog child-between of jephuneh-turn, and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish. ’im ’atem tabo’u ’el ha’arez ’asher nasati yadi leshaken ’etkhem bah, ki ’im kaleb ben yefuneh vihoshua‘ bin nun.
wTpkm aSr amrtm lbc yhyh whbyaty atm wydew at harz aSr mastm bh and your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, them will i bring in, and they hand-know the land which ye have despised. vetapekhem ’asher ’amartem labaz yihyeh, vehebeti veyade‘u ha’arez ’asher me’astem bah.
wpgrykm atm yplw bmdbr hch and as for you, your carcasses, they fall in this place-of-word-desert. ufigrekhem ’atem, yipelu bamidbar hazeh.
wbnykm yhyw reym bmdbr arbeym Snh wnSaw at cnwtykm ed tm pgrykm bmdbr and your children-betweens wander in the place-of-word-desert forty years, and bear your whoredoms, until your carcasses be wasted in the place-of-word-desert. ubenekhem yihyu ro‘im bamidbar ’arba‘im shanah venase’u ’et zenutekhem, ‘ad tom pigrekhem bamidbar.
bmspr hymym aSr trtm at harz arbeym ywm ywm lSnh ywm lSnh tSaw at ewntykm arbeym Snh wydetm at tnwaty after the number of the days in which ye searched the land, even forty days, each day for a year, ye bear your seasons, even forty years, and ye hand-know my breach of promise. bemispar hayamim ’asher tartem ’et ha’arez ’arba‘im yom yom lashanah yom lashanah tis’u ‘avonotekhem ’arba‘im shanah, vida‘tem tenu’ati.
any yhwh dbrty am la cat aeSh lkl hedh hreh hcat hnwedym ely bmdbr hch ytmw wSm ymtw i yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah have said, i will surely do it unto all this bad until-witness, that are added together against me: in this place-of-word-desert they be consumed, and there they die. ’ani yhvh dibarti ’im lo zot ’e‘eseh lekhal ha‘edah hara‘ah hazot hano‘adim ‘alay, bamidbar hazeh yitamu vesham yamutu.
whanSym aSr Slx mSh ltwr at harz wySbw wylwnw wylynw elyw at kl hedh lhwzya dbh el harz and the men, which mose-extracted sent to search the land, who returned, and made all the until-witness to murmur against him, by bringing up a slander upon the land, veha’anashim ’asher shalakh mosheh latur ha’arez, vayashubu vayalinu ‘alav kal ha‘edah lehozi dibah ‘al ha’arez.
wymtw hanSym mwzay dbt harz reh bmgph lpny yhwh even those men that did bring up the bad report upon the land, died by the plague before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayamutu ha’anashim mozi’ei dibat ha’arez ra‘ah, bamagefah lifnei yhvh.
wyhwSe bn nwn wklb bn ypnh xyw mn hanSym hhm hhlkym ltwr at harz and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish, and caleb-as-heart-dog child-between of jephuneh-turn, which were of the men that went to search the land, lived still. vihoshua‘ bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh, khayu min ha’anashim hahem haholekhim latur ha’arez.
wydbr mSh at hdbrym halh al kl bny ySral wytablw hem mad and mose-extracted told these sayings unto all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and the with-mum-people mourned greatly. vaydaber mosheh hadebarim ha’eleh ’el kal benei yisra’el, vayit’abelu ha‘am me’od.
wySkmw bbqr wyelw al raS hhr lamr hnnw welynw al hmqwm aSr amr yhwh ky xTanw and they rose up early in the morning, and gat them up into the head of the mountain, saying, lo, we be here, and will go up unto the stand-up-place which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath promised: for we have missed. vayashkimu baboqer vaya‘alu ’el rosh hahar lemor, hinenu ve‘alinu ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar yhvh ki khatanu.
wyamr mSh lmh ch atm ebrym at py yhwh whwa la tzlx and mose-extracted said, wherefore now do ye transgress the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah? and it not prosper. vayomer mosheh lamah zeh ’atem ‘oberim pi yhvh, vehiv lo tizlakh.
al telw ky ayn yhwh bqrbkm wla tngpw lpny aybykm go not up, for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is not among you; that ye be not smitten before-turns your father-adversaries. ’al ta‘alu ki ’en yhvh beqirbekhem, velo tinagefu lifnei ’oyebekhem.
ky hemlqy whkneny Sm lpnykm wnpltm bxrb ky el kn Sbtm maxry yhwh wla yhyh yhwh emkm for the amalek-labour-king-molochites and the canaan-mobile-tradeites are there before-turns you, and ye fall by the sword: because ye are turned away from yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, therefore yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will not be with you. ki ha‘amaleqi vehakena‘ani sham lifnekhem unefaltem bekhareb, ki ‘al ken shabtem me’akharei yhvh velo yihyeh yhvh ‘imakhem.
wyeplw lelwt al raS hhr warwn bryt yhwh wmSh la mSw mqrb hmxnh and they presumed to go up unto the hill top: nevertheless the cabinet of the covenant of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and mose-extracted, departed not out of the camp. vaya‘pilu la‘alot ’el rosh hahar, va’aron berit yhvh umosheh lo mashu miqereb hamakhaneh.
wyrd hemlqy whkneny hySb bhr hhwa wykwm wyktwm ed hxrmh then the amalek-labour-king-molochites came down, and the canaan-mobile-tradeites which dwelt in that hill, and smote them, and discomfited them, even unto hormah-boycott-fishing-net. vayered ha‘amaleqi vehakena‘ani hayosheb bahar hahu, vayakum vayaketum ‘ad hakharemah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ky tbaw al arz mwSbtykm aSr any ntn lkm speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when ye be come into the land of your habitations, which i give unto you, daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ki tabo’u ’el ’erez moshebotekhem ’asher ’ani noten lakhem.
weSytm aSh lyhwh elh aw cbx lpla ndr aw bndbh aw bmedykm leSwt ryx nyxx lyhwh mn hbqr aw mn hzan and will make an inward by fire unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, a on-up, or a butcher in performing a vow, or in a volunteer, or in your solemn until-conceptions, to make a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, of the visit-cattle or of the flock: va‘asitem ’isheh yhvh ‘olah ’o zebakh lefale neder ’o bindabah ’o bemo‘adekhem, la‘asot reakh nikhoakh yhvh min habaqar ’o min hazon.
whqryb hmqryb qrbnw lyhwh mnxh slt eSrwn blwl brbeyt hhyn Smn then he that inwardeth his inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bring a absorber of a tenth deal of basket-flour mingled with the fourth part of an here-hin of name-from-oil. vehiqrib hamaqrib qarebano yhvh, minkhah solet ‘isaron balul birbi‘it hahin shamen.
wyyn lnsk rbyeyt hhyn teSh el helh aw lcbx lkbS haxd and the fourth part of an here-hin of wine-inherit for a pouring thou prepare with the on-up or butcher, for one lamb. veyayin lanesekh rebi‘it hahin ta‘aseh ‘al ha‘olah ’o lazabakh, lakebes ha’ekhad.
aw layl teSh mnxh slt Sny eSrnym blwlh bSmn SlSyt hhyn or for a ram-voiceless, thou prepare for a absorber two tenth deals of basket-flour mingled with the third part of an here-hin of name-from-oil. ’o la’ayil ta‘aseh minkhah solet shenei ‘esronim, belulah bashemen shelishit hahin.
wyyn lnsk SlSyt hhyn tqryb ryx nyxx lyhwh and for a pouring thou inward the third part of an here-hin of wine-inherit, for a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. veyayin lanesekh shelishit hahin, taqrib reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wky teSh bn bqr elh aw cbx lpla ndr aw Slmym lyhwh and when thou preparest a bull for a on-up, or for a butcher in performing a vow, or wholes unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: vekhi ta‘aseh ben baqar ‘olah ’o zabakh, lefale neder ’o shelamim yhvh.
whqryb el bn hbqr mnxh slt SlSh eSrnym blwl bSmn xzy hhyn then he bring with a bull a absorber of three tenth deals of basket-flour mingled with half an here-hin of name-from-oil. vehiqrib ‘al ben habaqar minkhah solet sheloshah ‘esronim, balul bashemen khazi hahin.
wyyn tqryb lnsk xzy hhyn aSh ryx nyxx lyhwh and thou bring for a pouring half an here-hin of wine-inherit, for a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. veyayin taqrib lanesekh khazi hahin, ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
kkh yeSh lSwr haxd aw layl haxd aw lSh bkbSym aw becym thus it be done for one bull, or for one ram-voiceless, or for a lamb, or a kid. kakhah ye‘aseh lashor ha’ekhad ’o la’ayil ha’ekhad, ’o laseh bakebasim ’o ba‘izim.
kmspr aSr teSw kkh teSw laxd kmsprm according to the number that ye prepare, so ye do to every one according to their number. kamispar ’asher ta‘asu, kakhah ta‘asu la’ekhad kemisparam.
kl hacrx yeSh kkh at alh lhqryb aSh ryx nyxx lyhwh all that are born of the country do these things after this manner, in inward a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. kal ha’ezrakh ya‘aseh kakhah ’eleh, lehaqrib ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wky ygwr atkm gr aw aSr btwkkm ldrtykm weSh aSh ryx nyxx lyhwh kaSr teSw kn yeSh and if a stranger sojourn with you, or whosoever be among you in your generations, and will inward a feminine-firy, of a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; as ye do, so he do. vekhi yagur ’itekhem ger ’o ’asher betokhkhem ledorotekhem ve‘asah ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh, ka’asher ta‘asu ken ya‘aseh.
hqhl xqh axt lkm wlgr hgr xqt ewlm ldrtykm kkm kgr yhyh lpny yhwh one ordinance be both for you of the until-witness, and also for the stranger that sojourneth with you, an ordinance for ever in your generations: as ye are, so the stranger be before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. haqahal khuqah ’akhat lakhem velager hagar, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem kakhem kager yihyeh lifnei yhvh.
twrh axt wmSpT axd yhyh lkm wlgr hgr atkm one teaching and one manner be for you, and for the stranger that sojourneth with you. torah ’akhat umishpat ’ekhad yihyeh lakhem, velager hagar ’itekhem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm bbakm al harz aSr any mbya atkm Smh speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when ye come into the land whither i bring you, daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, bebo’akhem ’el ha’arez ’asher ’ani mebi ’etkhem shamah.
whyh baklkm mlxm harz trymw trwmh lyhwh then it be, that, when ye eat of the bread of the land, ye inward up an raise-rum unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vehayah ba’akhalekhem milekhem ha’arez, tarimu terumah yhvh.
raSyt erstkm xlh trymw trwmh ktrwmt grn kn trymw ath ye inward up a cake of the first of your dough for an raise-rum: as ye do the raise-rum of the threshingfloor, so ye raise it. reshit ‘arisotekhem khalah tarimu terumah, kitrumat goren ken tarimu ’otah.
mraSyt erstykm ttnw lyhwh trwmh ldrtykm of the first of your dough ye give unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah an raise-rum in your generations. mereshit ‘arisotekhem titenu yhvh terumah, ledorotekhem.
wky tSgw wla teSw at kl hmzwt halh aSr dbr yhwh al mSh and if ye have erred, and not guard-observed all these directives, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath bee-spoken unto mose-extracted, vekhi tishgu velo ta‘asu kal hamizvot ha’eleh, ’asher diber yhvh ’el mosheh.
at kl aSr zwh yhwh alykm byd mSh mn hywm aSr zwh yhwh whlah ldrtykm even all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct you by the hand of mose-extracted, from the day that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, and henceforward among your generations; kal ’asher zivah yhvh ’alekhem beyad mosheh, min hayom ’asher zivah yhvh vahale’ah ledorotekhem.
whyh am meyny hedh neSth lSggh weSw kl hedh pr bn bqr axd lelh lryx nyxx lyhwh wmnxtw wnskw kmSpT wSeyr ecym axd lxTt then it be, if ought be committed by ignorance without the knowledge of the until-witness, that all the until-witness inward one bull child-between of visit-cattle for a on-up, for a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, with his absorber, and his pouring, according to the manner, and one kid of the intense-goats for a miss. vehayah ’im me‘enei ha‘edah ne‘estah lishgagah ve‘asu khal ha‘edah par ben baqar ’ekhad le‘olah lereakh nikhoakh yhvh uminkhato venisko kamishpat, use‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad lekhatat.
wkpr hkhn el kl edt bny ySral wnslx lhm ky Sggh hwa whm hbyaw at qrbnm aSh lyhwh wxTatm lpny yhwh el Sggtm and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and it be released them; for it is ignorance: and they bring their inward, a butcher made by fire unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and their miss before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, for their ignorance: vekhiper hakohen ‘al kal ‘adat benei yisra’el venislakh lahem, ki shegagah hi vehem hebi’u qarebanam ’isheh yhvh vekhatatam lifnei yhvh ‘al shiggatam.
wnslx lkl edt bny ySral wlgr hgr btwkm ky lkl hem bSggh and it be released all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and the stranger that sojourneth among them; seeing all the with-mum-people were in ignorance. venislakh lekhal ‘adat benei yisra’el velager hagar betokham, ki lekhal ha‘am bishgagah.
wam npS axt txTa bSggh whqrybh ec bt Snth lxTat and if any being miss through ignorance, then he inward a she intense-goat of the first year for a miss. ve’im nefesh ’akhat tekheta bishgagah, vehiqribah ‘ez bat shenatah lekhatat.
wkpr hkhn el hnpS hSggt bxTah bSggh lpny yhwh lkpr elyw wnslx lw and the dimmer-server make an out-of-town-ment for the being that sinneth ignorantly, when he sinneth by ignorance before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to make an out-of-town-ment for him; and it be released him. vekhiper hakohen ‘al hanefesh hashogeget bekhet’ah bishgagah lifnei yhvh, lekhaper ‘alav venislakh lo.
hacrx bbny ySral wlgr hgr btwkm twrh axt yhyh lkm leSh bSggh ye have one teaching for him that sinneth through ignorance, both for him that is born among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and for the stranger that sojourneth among them. ha’ezrakh bibnei yisra’el velager hagar betokham, torah ’akhat lakhem la‘oseh bishgagah.
whnpS aSr teSh byd rmh mn hacrx wmn hgr at yhwh hwa mgdp wnkrth hnpS hhwa mqrb emh and the being that doeth ought presumptuously, whether he be born in the land, or a stranger, the same reproacheth yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and that being be cut off from his with-mum-people. vehanefesh ’asher ta‘aseh beyad ramah min ha’ezrakh umin hager yhvh hu megadef, venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb ‘amah.
ky dbr yhwh bch wat mzwtw hpr hkrt tkrt hnpS hhwa ewnh bh because he hath despised the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and hath broken his directive, that being utterly be cut off; his torment be upon him. ki debar yhvh bazah ve’et mizvato hefar, hikaret tikaret hanefesh hahiv ‘avonah bah.
wyhyw bny ySral bmdbr wymzaw ayS mqSS ezym bywm hSbt and while children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards were in the place-of-word-desert, they found a man that added sticks upon the sabbath-seven day. vayihyu bene yisra’el bamidbar, vayimze’u ’ish meqoshesh ‘ezim beyom hashabat.
wyqrybw atw hmzaym atw mqSS ezym al mSh wal ahrn wal kl hedh and they that found him gathering sticks brought him unto mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, and unto all the until-witness. vayaqribu ’oto hamoze’im ’oto meqoshesh ‘ezim, ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ve’el kal ha‘edah.
wynyxw atw bmSmr ky la prS mh yeSh lw and they put him in ward, because it was not declared what should be done to him. vayanikhu ’oto bamishmar, ki lo forash mah ye‘aseh lo.
wyamr yhwh al mSh mwt ywmt hayS rgwm atw babnym kl hedh mxwz lmxnh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, the man be deadly put to death: all the until-witness father-child-stone him with stones without the camp. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh mot yumat ha’ish, ragom ’oto ba’abanim kal ha‘edah mikhuz lamakhaneh.
wyzyaw atw kl hedh al mxwz lmxnh wyrgmw atw babnym wymt kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and all the until-witness brought him without the camp, and stoned him with stones, and he died; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayozi’u ’oto kal ha‘edah ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu ’oto ba’abanim vayamot, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm weSw lhm zyzt el knpy bgdyhm ldrtm wntnw el zyzt hknp ptyl tklt speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and bid them that they make them fringes in the borders of their garments throughout their generations, and that they put upon the fringe of the borders a ribband of blue: daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ve‘asu lahem zizit ‘al kanfei bigdehem ledorotam, venatenu ‘al zizit hakanaf petil tekhelet.
whyh lkm lzyzt wraytm atw wckrtm at kl mzwt yhwh weSytm atm wla ttrw axry lbbkm waxry eynykm aSr atm cnym axryhm and it be unto you for a fringe, that ye may look upon it, and remember all the directives of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and do them; and that ye seek not after your own heart and your own eyes, after which ye use to go a whoring: vehayah lakhem lezizit ure’item ’oto uzekhartem kal mizvot yhvh va‘asitem ’otam, velo taturu ’akharei lebabkhem ve’akharei ‘enekhem ’asher ’atem zonim ’akharehem.
lmen tckrw weSytm at kl mzwty whyytm qdSym lalhykm that ye may remember, and do all my directives, and be dedicated-finished unto your to-no-these. lema‘an tizkeru va‘asitem kal mizvotay, vihyitem qedoshim lelohekhem.
any yhwh alhykm aSr hwzaty atkm marz mzrym lhywt lkm lalhym any yhwh alhykm i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, which brought you out of the land of mizraim-narrows, to be your to-no-these: i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem ’asher hozeti ’etkhem me’erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem lelohim, ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wyqx qrx bn yzhr bn qht bn lwy wdtn wabyrm bny alyab wawn bn plt bny rawbn now korah-bald-ice, child-between of izhar-aperture, child-between of kohath-obedient-hope, child-between of levi-join, and dathan-their-faith-training and abiram-my-father-high, children-betweens of elia-my-towardsb-my-towards-dad, and on, child-between of peleth-fallen, children-betweens of reuben-see-child, took men: vayiqakh qorakh ben yizhar ben qehat ben levi, vedatan va’abiram benei ’eli’ab ve’on ben pelet benei re’uben.
wyqmw lpny mSh wanSym mbny ySral xmSym wmatym nSyay edh qray mwed anSy Sm and they rose up before-turns mose-extracted, with certain of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, two hundred and fifty princes of the assembly, famous in the until-witness, men of renown: vayaqumu lifnei mosheh va’anashim mibene yisra’el khamishim umatayim, nesi’ei ‘edah qeri’ei mo‘ed ’anshe shem.
wyqhlw el mSh wel ahrn wyamrw alhm rb lkm ky kl hedh klm qdSym wbtwkm yhwh wmdwe ttnSaw el qhl yhwh and they added themselves together against mose-extracted and against aaron-cabinet, and said unto them, ye take too much upon you, seeing all the until-witness are dedicated-finished, every one of them, and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah is among them: wherefore then lift ye up yourselves above the until-witness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah? vayiqahalu ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon vayomeru ’alehem rab lakhem ki khal ha‘edah kulam qedoshim ubetokham yhvh, umadua‘ titnase’u ‘al qehal yhvh.
wySme mSh wypl el pnyw and when mose-extracted heard it, he fell upon his face-turns: vayishma‘ mosheh vayipol ‘al panav.
wydbr al qrx wal kl edtw lamr bqr wyde yhwh at aSr lw wat hqdwS whqryb alyw wat aSr ybxr bw yqryb alyw and he spake unto korah-bald-ice and unto all his company, saying, even to morrow yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will show who are his, and who is dedicated-finished; and will cause him to come near unto him: even him whom he hath chosen will he cause to come near unto him. vaydaber ’el qorakh ve’el kal ‘adato lemor boqer veyoda‘ yhvh ’asher lo ve’et haqadosh vehiqrib ’elav, ve’et ’asher yibkhar bo yaqrib ’elav.
cat eSw qxw lkm mxtwt qrx wkl edtw this do; take you censers, korah-bald-ice, and all his company; zot ‘asu, qekhu lakhem makhtot qorakh vekhal ‘adato.
wtnw bhn aS wSymw elyhn qTrt lpny yhwh mxr whyh hayS aSr ybxr yhwh hwa hqdwS rb lkm bny lwy and put fire therein, and put incense in them before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to morrow: and it be that the man whom yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah doth choose, he be dedicated-finished: ye take too much upon you, ye children-betweens of levi-join. utenu bahen ’esh vesimu ‘alehen qetoret lifnei yhvh makhar vehayah ha’ish ’asher yibkhar yhvh hu haqadosh, rab lakhem benei levi.
wyamr mSh al qrx Smew na bny lwy and mose-extracted said unto korah-bald-ice, hear, i pray you, ye children-betweens of levi-join: vayomer mosheh ’el qorakh, shim‘u na benei levi.
hmeT mkm ky hbdyl alhy ySral atkm medt ySral lhqryb atkm alyw lebd at ebdt mSkn yhwh wlemd lpny hedh lSrtm seemeth it and a small thing unto you, that the to-no-these of israel-juicy-towards hath separated you from the until-witness of israel-juicy-towards, to bring you near to himself to do the work of the dwelling of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and to stand before-turns the until-witness to unto them? ham‘at mikem ki hibdil ’elohei yisra’el ’etkhem me‘adat yisra’el lehaqrib ’etkhem ’elav, la‘abod ‘abodat mishkan yhvh vela‘amod lifnei ha‘edah lesharetam.
wyqrb atk wat kl axyk bny lwy atk wbqStm gm khnh and he hath brought thee near to him, and all thy brethren children-betweens of levi-join with thee: and seek ye the dimmer-serverhood also? vayaqreb ’otekha ve’et kal ’akhekha bene levi ’itakh, ubiqashtem gam kehunah.
lkn ath wkl edtk hnedym el yhwh wahrn mh hwa ky tlwnw tlynw elyw for which cause both thou and all thy company are added together to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and what is aaron-cabinet, that ye murmur against him? lakhen ’atah vekhal ‘adatekha hano‘adim ‘al yhvh, ve’aharon mah hu ki talinu ‘alav.
wySlx mSh lqra ldtn wlabyrm bny alyab wyamrw la nelh and mose-extracted sent to call dathan-their-faith-training and abiram-my-father-high, children-betweens of elia-my-towardsb-my-towards-dad: which said, we will not come up: vayishlakh mosheh liqro ledatan vela’abiram benei ’eli’ab, vayomeru lo na‘aleh.
hmeT ky helytnw marz cbt xlb wdbS lhmytnw bmdbr ky tStrr elynw gm hStrr is it a small thing that thou hast brought us up out of a land that floweth with milk and honey, to kill us in the place-of-word-desert, except thou make thyself altogether a prince over us? ham‘at ki he‘elitanu me’erez zabat khalab udebash lahamitenu bamidbar, ki tistarer ‘alenu gam histarer.
ap la al arz cbt xlb wdbS hbyatnw wttn lnw nxlt Sdh wkrm heyny hanSym hhm tnqr la nelh moreover thou hast not brought us into a land that floweth with milk and honey, or given us inheritance of fields and vineyards: wilt thou put out the eyes of these men? we will not come up. ’af lo ’el ’erez zabat khalab udebash habi’otanu vatiten lanu nakhalat sadeh vakharem, ha‘enei ha’anashim hahem tenaqer lo na‘aleh.
wyxr lmSh mad wyamr al yhwh al tpn al mnxtm la xmwr axd mhm nSaty wla hrety at axd mhm and mose-extracted was very wroth, and said unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, respect not thou their inward: i have not taken one ass from them, neither have i hurt one of them. vayikhar lemosheh me’od vayomer ’el yhvh ’al tefen ’el minkhatam, lo khamor ’ekhad mehem nasati velo hare‘oti ’akhad mehem.
wyamr mSh al qrx ath wkl edtk hyw lpny yhwh ath whm wahrn mxr and mose-extracted said unto korah-bald-ice, be thou and all thy company before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, thou, and they, and aaron-cabinet, to morrow: vayomer mosheh ’el qorakh ’atah vekhal ‘adatekha heyu lifnei yhvh, ’atah vahem ve’aharon makhar.
wqxw ayS mxttw wnttm elyhm qTrt whqrbtm lpny yhwh ayS mxttw xmSym wmatym mxtt wath wahrn ayS mxttw and take every man his censer, and put incense in them, and bring ye before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah every man his censer, two hundred and fifty censers; thou also, and aaron-cabinet, each of you his censer. uqekhu ’ish makhtato unetatem ‘alehem qetoret vehiqrabtem lifnei yhvh ’ish makhtato khamishim umatayim makhtot, ve’atah ve’aharon ’ish makhtato.
wyqxw ayS mxttw wytnw elyhm aS wySymw elyhm qTrt wyemdw ptx ahl mwed wmSh wahrn and they took every man his censer, and put fire in them, and laid incense thereon, and stood in the opening of the tent of until-conception with mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet. vayiqkhu ’ish makhtato vayitenu ‘alehem ’esh vayasimu ‘alehem qetoret, vaya‘amdu petakh ’ohel mo‘ed umosheh ve’aharon.
wyqhl elyhm qrx at kl hedh al ptx ahl mwed wyra kbwd yhwh al kl hedh and korah-bald-ice added all the until-witness against them unto the opening of the tent of until-conception: and the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appeared unto all the until-witness. vayaqhel ‘alehem qorakh kal ha‘edah ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, vayera khebod yhvh ’el kal ha‘edah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and unto aaron-cabinet, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
hbdlw mtwk hedh hcat waklh atm krge separate yourselves from inward this until-witness, that i may consume them in a moment. hibadelu mitokh ha‘edah hazot, va’akhaleh ’otam keraga‘.
wyplw el pnyhm wyamrw al alhy hrwxt lkl bSr hayS axd yxTa wel kl hedh tqzp and they fell upon their face-turns-turns, and said, o to-no-these, the to-no-these of breath-spirits of all flesh, one man miss, and wilt thou be wroth with all the until-witness? vayipelu ‘al penehem vayomeru ’el ’elohei harukhot lekhal basar, ha’ish ’ekhad yekheta ve‘al kal ha‘edah tiqzof.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al hedh lamr helw msbyb lmSkn qrx dtn wabyrm speak unto the until-witness, saying, get you up from about the dwelling of korah-bald-ice, dathan-their-faith-training, and abiram-my-father-high. daber ’el ha‘edah lemor, he‘alu misabib lemishkan qorakh datan va’abiram.
wyqm mSh wylk al dtn wabyrm wylkw axryw cqny ySral and mose-extracted rose up and went unto dathan-their-faith-training and abiram-my-father-high; and the elders of israel-juicy-towards followed him. vayaqam mosheh vayelekh ’el datan va’abiram, vayelekhu ’akharav ziqnei yisra’el.
wydbr al hedh lamr swrw na mel ahly hanSym hrSeym halh wal tgew bkl aSr lhm pn tspw bkl xTatm and he spake unto the until-witness, saying, depart, i pray you, from the tents of these wicked men, and touch nothing of theirs, lest ye be consumed in all their misses. vaydaber ’el ha‘edah lemor suru na me‘al ’aholei ha’anashim haresha‘im ha’eleh ve’al tige‘u bekhal ’asher lahem, pen tisafu bekhal khatotam.
wyelw mel mSkn qrx dtn wabyrm msbyb wdtn wabyrm yzaw nzbym ptx ahlyhm wnSyhm wbnyhm wTpm so they gat up from the dwelling of korah-bald-ice, dathan-their-faith-training, and abiram-my-father-high, on every side: and dathan-their-faith-training and abiram-my-father-high came out, and stood in the opening of their tents, and their women, and their children-betweens, and their little children-betweens. vaye‘alu me‘al mishkan qorekh datan va’abiram misabib, vedatan va’abiram yaze’u nizabim petakh ’aholehem uneshehem ubenehem vetapam.
wyamr mSh bcat tdewn ky yhwh Slxny leSwt at kl hmeSym halh ky la mlby and mose-extracted said, hereby ye hand-know that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath sent me to do all these works; for i have not done them of mine own mind. vayomer mosheh bezot tede‘un ki yhvh shelakhani la‘asot kal hama‘asim ha’eleh, ki lo milibi.
am kmwt kl hadm ymtwn alh wpqdt kl hadm ypqd elyhm la yhwh Slxny if these men die the upstarting death of all men, or if they be visited after the visitation of all men; then yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath not sent me. ’im kemot kal ha’adam yemutun ’eleh ufequdat kal ha’adam yipaqed ‘alehem, lo yhvh shelakhani.
wam bryah ybra yhwh wpzth hadmh at pyh wbleh atm wat kl aSr lhm wyrdw xyym Salh wydetm ky nazw hanSym halh at yhwh and if yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah make a new thing, and the earth open her mouth, and swallow them up, with all that appertain unto them, and they go down quick into the pit; then ye understand that these men have provoked yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ve’im beri’ah yibra yhvh ufazetah ha’adamah piha ubale‘ah ’otam ve’et kal ’asher lahem veyaredu khayim she’olah, vida‘tem ki ni’azu ha’anashim ha’eleh yhvh.
wyhy kkltw ldbr at kl hdbrym halh wtbqe hadmh aSr txtyhm and it came to pass, as he had made an end of speaking all these bee-words, that the ground clave asunder that was under them: vayhi kekhaloto ledaber kal hadebarim ha’eleh, vatibaqa‘ ha’adamah ’asher takhtehem.
wtptx harz at pyh wtble atm wat btyhm wat kl hadm aSr lqrx wat kl hrkwS and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up, and their daughter-houses, and all the men that appertained unto korah-bald-ice, and all their goods. vatiftakh ha’arez piha vatibla‘ ve’et batehem, ve’et kal ha’adam ’asher leqorakh ve’et kal harakhush.
wyrdw hm wkl aSr lhm xyym Salh wtks elyhm harz wyabdw mtwk hqhl they, and all that appertained to them, went down alive into the pit, and the earth closed upon them: and they perished from inward the until-witness. vayeredu hem vekhal ’asher lahem khayim she’olah, vatekhas ‘alehem ha’arez vayobedu mitokh haqahal.
wkl ySral aSr sbybtyhm nsw lqlm ky amrw pn tblenw harz and all israel-juicy-towards that were round about them fled at the cry of them: for they said, lest the earth swallow us up also. vekhal yisra’el ’asher sebibotehem nasu leqolam, ki ’ameru pen tibla‘enu ha’arez.
waS yzah mat yhwh wtakl at hxmSym wmatym ayS mqryby hqTrt and there came out a fire from yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and consumed the two hundred and fifty men that inwarded incense. ve’esh yaze’ah me’et yhvh, vatokhal ’et hakhamishim umatayim ’ish maqribei haqetoret.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
amr al alecr bn ahrn hkhn wyrm at hmxtt mbyn hSrph wat haS crh hlah ky qdSw speak unto eleazar-towards-stop child-between of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server, that he take up the censers out of the burning, and scatter thou the fire yonder; for they are dedicateed. ’emor ’el ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen veyarem hamakhtot miben haserefah ve’et ha’esh zereh hale’ah, ki qadeshu.
at mxtwt hxTaym halh bnpStm weSw atm rqey pxym zpwy lmcbx ky hqrybm lpny yhwh wyqdSw wyhyw lawt lbny ySral the censers of these fauters against their own beings, let them make them broad plates for a covering of the butcher-kitchen: for they inwarded them before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, therefore they are dedicateed: and they be a sign unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. makhtot hakhata’im ha’eleh benafshotam ve‘asu ’otam riqu‘ei fakhim zipui lamizbeakh ki hiqribum lifne yhvh vayiqdashu, veyihyu le’ot libnei yisra’el.
wyqx alecr hkhn at mxtwt hnxSt aSr hqrybw hSrpym wyrqewm zpwy lmcbx and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server took the brazen censers, wherewith they that were burnt had inwarded; and they were made broad plates for a covering of the butcher-kitchen: vayiqakh ’el‘azar hakohen makhtot hanekhoshet ’asher hiqribu haserufim, vayraqe‘um zipui lamizbeakh.
ckrwn lbny ySral lmen aSr la yqrb ayS cr aSr la mcre ahrn hwa lhqTyr qTrt lpny yhwh wla yhyh kqrx wkedtw kaSr dbr yhwh byd mSh lw to be a memorial unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that no stranger, which is not of the seed of aaron-cabinet, come near to inward incense before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; that he be not as korah-bald-ice, and as his company: as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said to him by the hand of mose-extracted. zikaron libnei yisra’el lema‘an lo yiqrab ’ish zar ’asher lo mizera‘ ’aharon hu lehaqtir qetoret lifnei yhvh, velo yihyeh kheqorakh vekha‘adato ka’asher diber yhvh beyad mosheh lo.
wylnw kl edt bny ySral mmxrt el mSh wel ahrn lamr atm hmtm at em yhwh and on the morrow all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards murmured against mose-extracted and against aaron-cabinet, saying, ye have killed the with-mum-people of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayilonu kal ‘adat bene yisra’el mimakhorat ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon lemor, ’atem hamitem ‘am yhvh.
wyhy bhqhl hedh el mSh wel ahrn wypnw al ahl mwed whnh kshw henn wyra kbwd yhwh and it came to pass, when the until-witness was added against mose-extracted and against aaron-cabinet, that they looked toward the tent of until-conception: and, behold, the cloud covered it, and the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appeared. vayhi behiqahel ha‘edah ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon vayifnu ’el ’ohel mo‘ed vehineh khisahu he‘anan, vayera kebod yhvh.
wyba mSh wahrn al pny ahl mwed and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet came before-turns the tent of until-conception. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon ’el penei ’ohel mo‘ed.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
hrmw mtwk hedh hcat waklh atm krge wyplw el pnyhm get you up from inward this until-witness, that i may consume them as in a moment. and they fell upon their face-turns-turns. heromu mitokh ha‘edah hazot va’akhaleh ’otam keraga‘, vayipelu ‘al penehem.
wyamr mSh al ahrn qx at hmxth wtn elyh aS mel hmcbx wSym qTrt whwlk mhrh al hedh wkpr elyhm ky yza hqzp mlpny yhwh hxl hngp and mose-extracted said unto aaron-cabinet, take a censer, and put fire therein from off the butcher-kitchen, and put on incense, and go quickly unto the until-witness, and make an out-of-town-ment for them: for there is wrath gone out from yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; the plague is begun. vayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon qakh hamakhtah veten ‘aleha ’esh me‘al hamizbeakh vesim qetoret veholekh meherah ’el ha‘edah vekhaper ‘alehem, ki yaza haqezef milifnei yhvh hekhel hanagef.
wyqx ahrn kaSr dbr mSh wyrz al twk hqhl whnh hxl hngp bem wytn at hqTrt wykpr el hem and aaron-cabinet took as mose-extracted direct, and ran into the midst of the until-witness; and, behold, the plague was begun among the with-mum-people: and he put on incense, and made an out-of-town-ment for the with-mum-people. vayiqakh ’aharon ka’asher diber mosheh vayaraz ’el tokh haqahal vehineh hekhel hanegef ba‘am, vayiten haqetoret vaykhaper ‘al ha‘am.
wyemd byn hmtym wbyn hxyym wtezr hmgph and he stood between-bin the dead and the living; and the plague was stayed. vaya‘amod ben hametim uben hakhayim, vate‘azar hamagefah.
wyhyw hmtym bmgph arbeh eSr alp wSbe mawt mlbd hmtym el dbr qrx now they that died in the plague were fourteen thousand and seven hundred, beside them that died about the matter of korah-bald-ice. vayihyu hametim bamagefah ’arba‘ah ‘asar ’elef usheba‘ me’ot, milebad hametim ‘al debar qorakh.
wySb ahrn al mSh al ptx ahl mwed whmgph nezrh and aaron-cabinet returned unto mose-extracted unto the opening of the tent of until-conception: and the plague was stayed. vayashab ’aharon ’el mosheh ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed, vehamagefah ne‘ezarah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wqx matm mTh mTh lbyt ab mat kl nSyahm lbyt abtm Snym eSr mTwt ayS at Smw tktb el mThw speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and take of every one of them a pen according to the daughter-house of their fathers, of all their leaders according to the daughter-house of their fathers twelve pens: write thou every man's name upon his pen. daber ’el benei yisra’el veqakh me’itam mateh mateh lebet ’ab kal nesi’ehem lebet ’abotam shenem ‘asar matot, ’ish shemo tikhtob ‘al matehu.
wat Sm ahrn tktb el mTh lwy ky mTh axd lraS byt abwtm and thou write aaron-cabinet's name upon the pen of levi-join: for one pen be for the head of the daughter-house of their fathers. ve’et shem ’aharon tikhtob ‘al mateh levi, ki mateh ’ekhad lerosh bet ’abotam.
whnxtm bahl mwed lpny hedwt aSr awed lkm Smh and thou lay them up in the tent of until-conception before-turns the until-witness, where i will until-witness with you. vehinakhtam be’ohel mo‘ed, lifnei ha‘edut ’asher ’iva‘ed lakhem shamah.
whyh hayS aSr abxr bw mThw yprx whSkty mely at tlnwt bny ySral aSr hm mlynm elykm and it come to pass, that the man's pen, whom i choose, blossom: and i will make to cease from me the murmurings of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, whereby they murmur against you. vehayah ha’ish ’asher ’ebkhar bo matehu yifrakh, vahashikoti me‘alay telunot benei yisra’el ’asher hem malinim ‘alekhem.
wydbr mSh al bny ySral wytnw alyw kl nSyayhm mTh lnSya axd mTh lnSya axd lbyt abtm Snym eSr mTwt wmTh ahrn btwk mTwtm and mose-extracted spake unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and every one of their leaders gave him a pen apiece, for each leader one, according to their fathers' daughter-houses, even twelve pens: and the pen of aaron-cabinet was among their pens. vaydaber mosheh ’el benei yisra’el vayitenu ’elav kal nesi’ehem mateh lenasi ’ekhad mateh lenasi ’ekhad lebet ’abotam shenem ‘asar matot, umateh ’aharon betokh matotam.
wynx mSh at hmTt lpny yhwh bahl hedt and mose-extracted laid up the pens before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in the dwelling of witness. vayanakh mosheh hamatot lifnei yhvh, be’ohel ha‘edut.
wyhy mmxrt wyba mSh al ahl hedwt whnh prx mTh ahrn lbyt lwy wyza prx wyzz zyz wygml Sqdym and it came to pass, that on the morrow mose-extracted went into the dwelling of witness; and, behold, the pen of aaron-cabinet for the daughter-house of levi-join was budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds. vayhi mimakhorat vayabo mosheh ’el ’ohel ha‘edut vehineh parakh mateh ’aharon lebet levi, vayozei ferakh vayazez ziz vayigmol sheqedim.
wyza mSh at kl hmTt mlpny yhwh al kl bny ySral wyraw wyqxw ayS mThw and mose-extracted brought out all the pens from before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah unto all children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: and they looked, and took every man his pen. vayozei mosheh kal hamatot milifnei yhvh ’el kal benei yisra’el, vayir’u vayiqkhu ’ish matehu.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hSb at mTh ahrn lpny hedwt lmSmrt lawt lbny mry wtkl tlwntm mely wla ymtw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, bring aaron-cabinet's pen again before-turns the until-witness, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hasheb mateh ’aharon lifnei ha‘edut lemishmeret le’ot libne meri, utekhal telunotam me‘alay velo yamutu.
wyeS mSh kaSr zwh yhwh atw kn eSh and mose-extracted did so: as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct him, so did he. vaya‘as mosheh, ka’asher zivah yhvh ’oto ken ‘asah.
wyamrw bny ySral al mSh lamr hn gwenw abdnw klnw abdnw and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards spake unto mose-extracted, saying, behold, we die, we perish, we all perish. vayomeru benei yisra’el ’el mosheh lemor, hen gava‘nu ’abadnu kulanu ’abadnu.
kl hqrb hqrb al mSkn yhwh ymwt ham tmnw lgwe whosoever cometh any thing near unto the dwelling of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah die: we be consumed with dying? kol haqareb haqareb ’el mishkan yhvh yamut, ha’im tamnu ligvoa‘.
wyamr yhwh al ahrn ath wbnyk wbyt abyk atk tSaw at ewn hmqdS wath wbnyk atk tSaw at ewn khntkm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto aaron-cabinet, thou and thy children-betweens and thy father's daughter-house with thee bear the torment of the dedicated-finished: and thou and thy children-betweens with thee bear the torment of your dimmer-serverhood. vayomer yhvh ’el ’aharon ’atah ubanekha ubet ’abikha ’itakh tis’u ‘avon hamiqdash, ve’atah ubanekha ’itakh tis’u ‘avon kehunatkhem.
wgm at axyk mTh lwy SbT abyk hqrb atk wylww elyk wySrtwk wath wbnyk atk lpny ahl hedt and thy brethren also of the branch of levi-join, the branch of thy father, bring thou with thee, that they may be joined unto thee, and unto thee: and thou and thy children-betweens with thee before-turns the dwelling of witness. vegam ’akhekha mateh levi shebet ’abikha haqreb ’itakh veyilavu ‘alekha visharetukha, ve’atah ubanekha ’itakh lifnei ’ohel ha‘edut.
wSmrw mSmrtk wmSmrt kl hahl ak al kly hqdS wal hmcbx la yqrbw wla ymtw gm hm gm atm and they keep thy charge, and the charge of all the dwelling: only they not come nigh the tools of the dedicated-finished and the butcher-kitchen, that neither they, nor ye also, die. veshameru mishmartekha umishmeret kal ha’ohel, ’akh ’el kelei haqodesh ve’el hamizbeakh lo yiqrabu velo yamutu gam hem gam ’atem.
wnlww elyk wSmrw at mSmrt ahl mwed lkl ebdt hahl wcr la yqrb alykm and they be joined unto thee, and keep the charge of the tent of until-conception, for all the work of the dwelling: and a stranger not come nigh unto you. venilvu ‘alekha veshameru mishmeret ’ohel mo‘ed lekhol ‘abodat ha’ohel, vezar lo yiqrab ’alekhem.
wSmrtm at mSmrt hqdS wat mSmrt hmcbx wla yhyh ewd qzp el bny ySral and ye keep the charge of the dedicated-finished, and the charge of the butcher-kitchen: that there be no wrath any more upon children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. ushemartem mishmeret haqodesh ve’et mishmeret hamizbeakh, velo yihyeh ‘od qezef ‘al benei yisra’el.
wany hnh lqxty at axykm hlwym mtwk bny ySral lkm mtnh ntnym lyhwh lebd at ebdt ahl mwed and i, behold, i have taken your brethren the levi-jointes from inward children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: to you they are given as a gift for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to do the work of the tent of until-conception. va’ani hineh laqakhti ’akhekhem halviyim mitokh benei yisra’el, lakhem matanah netunim yhvh la‘abod ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed.
