wath wbnyk atk tSmrw at khntkm lkl dbr hmcbx wlmbyt lprkt webdtm ebdt mtnh atn at khntkm whcr hqrb ywmt therefore thou and thy children-betweens with thee keep your dimmer-server's office for everything of the butcher-kitchen, and within the breaker; and ye work for: i have given your dimmer-server's office unto you as a work of gift: and the stranger that cometh nigh be put to death. ve’atah ubanekha ’itekha tishmeru kehunatkhem lekhal debar hamizbeakh ulemibet laparokhet va‘abadtem, ‘abodat matanah ’eten kehunatkhem vehazar haqareb yumat.
wydbr yhwh al ahrn wany hnh ntty lk at mSmrt trwmty lkl qdSy bny ySral lk nttym lmSxh wlbnyk lxq ewlm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto aaron-cabinet, behold, i also have given thee the charge of mine raise-rums of all the dedicateed things of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; unto thee have i given them by reason of the lubeing, and to thy children-betweens, by an ordinance for ever. vaydaber yhvh ’el ’aharon va’ani hineh natati lekha mishmeret terumotay, lekhal qadeshei bene yisra’el lekha netatim lemashekhah ulebanekha lekhaq ‘olam.
ch yhyh lk mqdS hqdSym mn haS kl qrbnm lkl mnxtm wlkl xTatm wlkl aSmm aSr ySybw ly qdS qdSym lk hwa wlbnyk this be thine of the most dedicated-finished things, reserved from the fire: every inward of theirs, every absorber of theirs, and every miss of theirs, and every fire-name of theirs which they render unto me, be most dedicated-finished for thee and for thy children-betweens. zeh yihyeh lekha miqodesh haqodashim min ha’esh, kal qarebanam lekhal minkhatam ulekhal khatatam ulekhal ’ashamam ’asher yashibu li qadashim lekha hu ulebanekha.
bqdS hqdSym taklnw kl ckr yakl atw qdS yhyh lk in the most dedicated-finished place thou eat it; every rememberer eat it: it be dedicated-finished unto thee. beqodesh haqodashim tokhalenu, kal zakhar yokhal ’oto qodesh yihyeh lakh.
wch lk trwmt mtnm lkl tnwpt bny ySral lk nttym wlbnyk wlbntyk atk lxq ewlm kl Thwr bbytk yakl atw and this is thine; the raise-rum of their gift, with all the sieves of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: i have given them unto thee, and to thy children-betweens and to thy children-betweenesss with thee, by a statute for ever: every one that is bright-climaxing in thy daughter-house eat of it. vezeh lekha terumat matanam lekhal tenufot benei yisra’el lekha netatim ulebanekha velibnotekha ’itekha lekhaq ‘olam, kal tahor bebetekha yokhal ’oto.
kl xlb yzhr wkl xlb tyrwS wdgn raSytm aSr ytnw lyhwh lk nttym all the best of the name-from-oil, and all the best of the wine-inherit, and of the wheat, the firstfruits of them which they inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, them have i given thee. kol kheleb yizhar vekhal kheleb tirosh vedagan, reshitam ’asher yitenu yhvh lekha netatim.
bkwry kl aSr barzm aSr ybyaw lyhwh lk yhyh kl Thwr bbytk yaklnw and whatsoever is first ripe in the land, which they bring unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, be thine; every one that is bright-climaxing in thine daughter-house eat of it. bikurei kal ’asher be’arzam ’asher yabi’u yhvh lekha yihyeh, kal tahor bebetekha yokhalenu.
kl xrm bySral lk yhyh every thing devoted in israel-juicy-towards be thine. kal kherem beyisra’el lekha yihyeh.
kl pTr rxm lkl bSr aSr yqrybw lyhwh badm wbbhmh yhyh lk ak pdh tpdh at bkwr hadm wat bkwr hbhmh hTmah tpdh every thing that openeth the womb-matrix in all flesh, which they bring unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, whether it be of men or beasts, be thine: nevertheless the firstborn of man thou surely redeem, and the firstling of stained-ceased beasts thou redeem. kal peter rekhem lekhal basar ’asher yaqribu yhvh ba’adam ubabehemah yihyeh lakh, ’akh padoh tifdeh bekhor ha’adam ve’et bekhor habehemah hateme’ah tifdeh.
wpdwyw mbn xdS tpdh berkk ksp xmSt Sqlym bSql hqdS eSrym grh hwa and those that are to be redeemed from a month old thou redeem, according to thine estimation, for the money of five shekel-lights, after the shekel-light of the dedicated-finished, which is double-ten-twenty gera-strangerhs. ufeduyav miben khodesh tifdeh be‘erkekha kesef khameshet sheqalim besheqel haqodesh, ‘esrim gerah hu.
ak bkwr Swr aw bkwr kSb aw bkwr ec la tpdh qdS hm at dmm tcrq el hmcbx wat xlbm tqTyr aSh lryx nyxx lyhwh and the firstling of a cow, or the firstling of a sheep, or the firstling of a intense-goat, no redeem; they are dedicated-finished: thou sprinkle their blood upon the butcher-kitchen, and burn their fat for a feminine-firy, for a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. ’akh bekhor shor ’o bekhor keseb ’o bekhor ‘ez lo tifdeh qodesh hem, damam tizroq ‘al hamizbeakh ve’et khelbam taqtir ’isheh lereakh nikhoakh yhvh.
wbSrm yhyh lk kxch htnwph wkSwq hymyn lk yhyh and the flesh of them be thine, as the sieve-pana breast and as the right shoulder are thine. ubesaram yihyeh lakh, kakhazeh hatenufah ukheshoq hayamin lekha yihyeh.
kl trwmt hqdSym aSr yrymw bny ySral lyhwh ntty lk wlbnyk wlbntyk atk lxq ewlm bryt mlx ewlm hwa lpny yhwh lk wlcrek atk all the raise-rums of the dedicated-finished things, which children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards inward unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, have i given thee, and thy children-betweens and thy children-betweenesss with thee, by a statute for ever: it is a covenant of salt for ever before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah unto thee and to thy seed with thee. kol terumot haqodashim ’asher yarimu bene yisra’el yhvh natati lekha ulebanekha velibnotekha ’itekha lekhaq ‘olam, berit melakh ‘olam hi lifnei yhvh lekha ulezar‘akha ’itakh.
wyamr yhwh al ahrn barzm la tnxl wxlq la yhyh lk btwkm any xlqk wnxltk btwk bny ySral and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto aaron-cabinet, thou have no inheritance in their land, neither thou have any part among them: i am thy part and thine inheritance among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayomer yhvh ’el ’aharon be’arzam lo tinkhal vekheleq lo yihyeh lekha betokham, ’ani khelqekha venakhalatekha betokh benei yisra’el.
wlbny lwy hnh ntty kl meSr bySral lnxlh xlp ebdtm aSr hm ebdym at ebdt ahl mwed and, behold, i have given children-betweens of levi-join all the tenth in israel-juicy-towards for an inheritance, for their work which they work for, even the work of the tent of until-conception. velibnei levi hineh natati kal ma‘aser beyisra’el lenakhalah, khelef ‘abodatam ’asher hem ‘obedim ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed.
wla yqrbw ewd bny ySral al ahl mwed lSat xTa lmwt neither must children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards henceforth come nigh the tent of until-conception, lest they bear miss, and die. velo yiqrebu ‘od benei yisra’el ’el ’ohel mo‘ed, laset khet lamut.
webd hlwy hwa at ebdt ahl mwed whm ySaw ewnm xqt ewlm ldrtykm wbtwk bny ySral la ynxlw nxlh and the levi-jointes do the work of the tent of until-conception, and they bear their torment: it be a statute for ever throughout your generations, that among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards they have no inheritance. ve‘abad halevi hu ‘abodat ’ohel mo‘ed vehem yis’u ‘avonam, khuqat ‘olam ledorotekhem ubetokh benei yisra’el lo yinkhalu nakhalah.
ky at meSr bny ySral aSr yrymw lyhwh trwmh ntty llwym lnxlh el kn amrty lhm btwk bny ySral la ynxlw nxlh and the tithes of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which they inward as an raise-rum unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, i have given to the levi-jointes to inherit: therefore i have said unto them, among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards they have no inheritance. ki ma‘sar bene yisra’el ’asher yarimu yhvh terumah natati lalviyim lenakhalah, ‘al ken ’amarti lahem betokh benei yisra’el lo yinkhalu nakhalah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
wal hlwym tdbr wamrt alhm ky tqxw mat bny ySral at hmeSr aSr ntty lkm matm bnxltkm whrmtm mmnw trwmt yhwh meSr mn hmeSr thus speak unto the levi-jointes, and say unto them, when ye take of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards the tithes which i have given you from them for your inheritance, then ye inward up an raise-rum of it for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, even a tenth part of the tithe. ve’el halviyim tedaber ve’amarta ’alehem ki tiqkhu me’et bene yisra’el hama‘aser ’asher natati lakhem me’itam benakhalatkhem, vaharemotem mimenu terumat yhvh ma‘aser min hama‘aser.
wnxSb lkm trwmtkm kdgn mn hgrn wkmlah mn hyqb and this your raise-rum be reckoned unto you, as though it were the corn-swimming of the threshingfloor, and as the fulness of the wine-inheritpress. venekhshab lakhem terumatkhem, kadagan min hagoren vekhamle’ah min hayaqeb.
kn trymw gm atm trwmt yhwh mkl meSrtykm aSr tqxw mat bny ySral wnttm mmnw at trwmt yhwh lahrn hkhn thus ye also inward an raise-rum unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah of all your tithes, which ye receive of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards; and ye give thereof yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's raise-rum to aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server. ken tarimu gam ’atem terumat yhvh mikol ma‘serotekhem ’asher tiqkhu me’et benei yisra’el, unetatem mimenu terumat yhvh le’aharon hakohen.
mkl mtntykm trymw at kl trwmt yhwh mkl xlbw at mqdSw mmnw out of all your gifts ye inward every raise-rum of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, of all the best thereof, even the dedicateed part thereof out of it. mikol matenotekhem tarimu kal terumat yhvh, mikal khelbo miqdesho mimenu.
wamrt alhm bhrymkm at xlbw mmnw wnxSb llwym ktbwat grn wktbwat yqb therefore thou say unto them, when ye have raised the best thereof from it, then it be counted unto the levi-jointes as the increase of the threshingfloor, and as the increase of the wine-inheritpress. ve’amarta ’alehem, baharimekhem khelbo mimenu venekhshab lalviyim kitbu’at goren vekhitbu’at yaqeb.
wakltm atw bkl mqwm atm wbytkm ky Skr hwa lkm xlp ebdtkm bahl mwed and ye eat it in every place, ye and your daughter-households: for it is your reward for your work in the tent of until-conception. va’akhaltem ’oto bekhal maqom ’atem ubetekhem, ki sakhar hu lakhem khelef ‘abodatkhem be’ohel mo‘ed.
wla tSaw elyw xTa bhrymkm at xlbw mmnw wat qdSy bny ySral la txllw wla tmwtw and ye bear no miss by reason of it, when ye have raised from it the best of it: neither ye pollute the dedicated-finished things of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, lest ye die. velo tis’u ‘alav khet baharimekhem khelbo mimenu, ve’et qadeshei bene yisra’el lo tekhalelu velo tamutu.
wydbr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and unto aaron-cabinet, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon lemor.
cat xqt htwrh aSr zwh yhwh lamr dbr al bny ySral wyqxw alyk prh admh tmymh aSr ayn bh mwm aSr la elh elyh el this is the ordinance of the teaching which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct, saying, speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they bring thee a red heifer without spot, wherein is no blemish, and upon which never came yoke: zot khuqat hatorah ’asher zivah yhvh lemor, daber ’el benei yisra’el veyiqkhu ’elekha farah ’adumah temimah ’asher ’en bah mum ’asher lo ‘alah ‘aleha ‘ol.
wnttm ath al alecr hkhn whwzya ath al mxwz lmxnh wSxT ath lpnyw and ye give her unto eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, that he may bring her forth without the camp, and one slay her before-turns his face-turns: unetatem ’otah ’el ’el‘azar hakohen, vehozi ’otah ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh veshakhat ’otah lefanav.
wlqx alecr hkhn mdmh bazbew whch al nkx pny ahl mwed mdmh Sbe pemym and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server take of her blood with his finger, and sprinkle of her blood directly before-turns the tent of until-conception seven times: velaqakh ’el‘azar hakohen midamah be’ezba‘o, vehizah ’el nokhakh penei ’ohel mo‘ed midamah sheba‘ pe‘amim.
wSrp at hprh leynyw at erh wat bSrh wat dmh el prSh ySrp and one burn the heifer in his sight; her light-skin, and her flesh, and her blood, with her dung, he burn: vesaraf haparah le‘enav, ‘orah ve’et besarah ve’et damah ‘al pirshah yisrof.
wlqx hkhn ez arc wacwb wSny twlet whSlyk al twk Srpt hprh and the dimmer-server take cedar wood, and hyssop-discharging, and two caterpillars, and cast it into the midst of the burning of the heifer. velaqakh hakohen ‘ez ’erez ve’ezob usheni tola‘at, vehishlikh ’el tokh serefat haparah.
wkbs bgdyw hkhn wrxz bSrw bmym waxr ybwa al hmxnh wTma hkhn ed herb then the dimmer-server wash his clothes, and he bathe his flesh in from-waters, and afterward he come into the camp, and the dimmer-server be stained-ceased until the even. vekhibes begadav hakohen verakhaz besaro bamayim ve’akhar yabo ’el hamakhaneh, vetamei hakohen ‘ad ha‘areb.
whSrp ath ykbs bgdyw bmym wrxz bSrw bmym wTma ed herb and he that burneth her wash his clothes in from-waters, and bathe his flesh in from-waters, and be stained-ceased until the even. vehasoref ’otah yekhabes begadav bamayim verakhaz besaro bamayim, vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb.
wasp ayS Thwr at apr hprh whnyx mxwz lmxnh bmqwm Thwr whyth ledt bny ySral lmSmrt lmy ndh xTat hwa and a man that is bright-climaxing gather up the ashes of the heifer, and lay them up without the camp in a bright-climaxing place, and it be kept for the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards for a from-waters of separation: it is a bright-highness for miss. ve’asaf ’ish tahor ’efer haparah vehiniakh mikhuz lamakhaneh bemaqom tahor, vehayetah la‘adat bene yisra’el lemishmeret lemei nidah khatat hi
wkbs hasp at apr hprh at bgdyw wTma ed herb whyth lbny ySral wlgr hgr btwkm lxqt ewlm and he that gathereth the ashes of the heifer wash his clothes, and be stained-ceased until the even: and it be unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and unto the stranger that sojourneth among them, for a statute for ever. vekhibes ha’osef ’efer haparah begadav vetamei ‘ad ha‘areb, vehayetah libnei yisra’el velager hagar betokham lekhuqat ‘olam.
hnge bmt lkl npS adm wTma Sbet ymym he that toucheth the dead body of any man be stained-ceased seven days. hanogea‘ bemet lekhal nefesh ’adam, vetamei shib‘at yamim.
hwa ytxTa bw bywm hSlySy wbywm hSbyey yThr wam la ytxTa bywm hSlySy wbywm hSbyey la yThr he purify himself with it on the third day, and on the seventh day he be bright-climaxing: and if he purify not himself the third day, then the seventh day he not be bright-climaxing. hu yitkhata bo bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i yithar, ve’im lo yitkhata bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i lo yithar.
kl hnge bmt bnpS hadm aSr ymwt wla ytxTa at mSkn yhwh Tma wnkrth hnpS hhwa mySral ky my ndh la crq elyw Tma yhyh ewd Tmatw bw whosoever toucheth the dead body of any man that is dead, and purifieth not himself, ceaseth the dwelling of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and that being be cut off from israel-juicy-towards: because the from-waters of separation was not sprinkled upon him, he be stained-ceased; his stained-ceasedness is yet upon him. kal hanogea‘ bemet benefesh ha’adam ’asher yamut velo yitkhata mishkan yhvh time venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra’el, ki mei nidah lo zoraq ‘alav tamei yihyeh ‘od tum’ato bo.
cat htwrh adm ky ymwt bahl kl hba al hahl wkl aSr bahl yTma Sbet ymym this is the teaching, when a man dieth in a tent: all that come into the tent, and all that is in the tent, be stained-ceased seven days. zot hatorah ’adam ki yamut be’ohel, kal haba ’el ha’ohel vekhal ’asher ba’ohel yitma shib‘at yamim.
wkl kly ptwx aSr ayn zmyd ptyl elyw Tma hwa and every open tool, which hath no covering bound upon it, is stained-ceased. vekhol keli fatuakh ’asher ’en zamid patil ‘alav, tamei hu.
wkl aSr yge el pny hSdh bxll xrb aw bmt aw bezm adm aw bqbr yTma Sbet ymym and whosoever toucheth one that is slain with a sword in the open fields, or a dead body, or a bone of a man, or a grave, be stained-ceased seven days. vekhol ’asher yiga‘ ‘al penei hasadeh bakhalal khereb ’o bemet ’o be‘ezem ’adam ’o beqaber, yitma shib‘at yamim.
wlqxw lTma mepr Srpt hxTat wntn elyw mym xyym al kly and for an stained-ceased person they take of the ashes of the burnt heifer of bright-highness for miss, and running from-waters be put thereto in a tool: velaqekhu latame me‘afar serefat hakhatat, venatan ‘alav mayim khayim ’el keli.
wlqx acwb wTbl bmym ayS Thwr whch el hahl wel kl hklym wel hnpSwt aSr hyw Sm wel hnge bezm aw bxll aw bmt aw bqbr and a bright-climaxing person take hyssop-discharging, and dip it in the from-waters, and sprinkle it upon the tent, and upon all the tools, and upon the persons that were there, and upon him that touched a bone, or one slain, or one dead, or a grave: velaqakh ’ezob vetabal bamayim ’ish tahor vehizah ‘al ha’ohel ve‘al kal hakelim ve‘al hanefashot ’asher hayu sham, ve‘al hanogea‘ ba‘ezem ’o bekhalal ’o bamet ’o baqaber.
whch hThr el hTma bywm hSlySy wbywm hSbyey wxTaw bywm hSbyey wkbs bgdyw wrxz bmym wThr berb and the bright-climaxing person sprinkle upon the stained-ceased on the third day, and on the seventh day: and on the seventh day he purify himself, and wash his clothes, and bathe himself in from-waters, and be bright-climaxing at even. vehizah hatahor ‘al hatame bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i, vekhite’o bayom hashebi‘i vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetaher ba‘areb.
wayS aSr yTma wla ytxTa wnkrth hnpS hhwa mtwk hqhl ky at mqdS yhwh Tma my ndh la crq elyw Tma hwa and the man that be stained-ceased, and not purify himself, that being be cut off from inward the until-witness, because he hath ceased the dedicated-finished of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: the from-waters of separation hath not been sprinkled upon him; he is stained-ceased. ve’ish ’asher yitma velo yitkhata venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mitokh haqahal, ki miqdash yhvh time mei nidah lo zoraq ‘alav tamei hu.
whyth lhm lxqt ewlm wmch my hndh ykbs bgdyw whnge bmy hndh yTma ed herb and it be a perpetual statute unto them, that he that sprinkleth the from-waters of separation wash his clothes; and he that toucheth the from-waters of separation be stained-ceased until even. vehayetah lahem lekhuqat ‘olam, umazeh me hanidah yekhabes begadav vehanogea‘ bemei hanidah yitma ‘ad ha‘areb.
wkl aSr yge bw hTma yTma whnpS hnget tTma ed herb and whatsoever the stained-ceased person toucheth be stained-ceased; and the being that toucheth it be stained-ceased until even. vekhol ’asher yiga‘ bo hatamei yitma, vehanefesh hanoga‘at titma ‘ad ha‘areb.
wybaw bny ySral kl hedh mdbr zn bxdS hraSwn wySb hem bqdS wtmt Sm mrym wtqbr Sm then came children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, even the whole until-witness, into the place-of-word-desert of zin-briar in the first month: and the with-mum-people abode in kadesh-dedicated-finished; and miriam-rebel-bitter died there, and was buried there. vayabo’u bene yisra’el kal ha‘edah midbar zin bakhodesh harishon vayesheb ha‘am beqadesh, vatamat sham miryam vatiqaber sham.
wla hyh mym ledh wyqhlw el mSh wel ahrn and there was no from-waters for the until-witness: and they added themselves together against mose-extracted and against aaron-cabinet. velo hayah mayim la‘edah, vayiqahalu ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon.
wyrb hem em mSh wyamrw lamr wlw gwenw bgwe axynw lpny yhwh and the with-mum-people chode with mose-extracted, and spake, saying, would to-no-these that we had died when our brethren died before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah! vayareb ha‘am ‘im mosheh, vayomeru lemor velu gava‘nu bigva‘ ’akhenu lifnei yhvh.
wlmh hbatm at qhl yhwh al hmdbr hch lmwt Sm anxnw wbeyrnw and why have ye brought up the until-witness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah into this place-of-word-desert, that we and our in-them-animal should die there? velamah habetem qehal yhvh ’el hamidbar hazeh, lamut sham ’anakhnu ube‘irenu.
wlmh helytnw mmzrym lhbya atnw al hmqwm hre hch la mqwm cre wtanh wgpn wrmwn wmym ayn lStwt and wherefore have ye made us to come up out of mizraim-narrows, to bring us in unto this bad place? it is no place of seed, or of figs, or of vines, or of high-pomegranates; neither is there any from-waters to drink. velamah he‘elitunu mimizrayim lehabi ’otanu ’el hamaqom hara‘ hazeh, lo meqom zera‘ ute’enah vegefen verimon umayim ’ayin lishtot.
wyba mSh wahrn mpny hqhl al ptx ahl mwed wyplw el pnyhm wyra kbwd yhwh alyhm and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet went from the presence of the assembly unto the opening of the tent of until-conception, and they fell upon their face-turns-turns: and the heaviness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appeared unto them. vayabo mosheh ve’aharon mipenei haqahal ’el petakh ’ohel mo‘ed vayipelu ‘al penehem, vayera khebod yhvh ’alehem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
qx at hmTh whqhl at hedh ath wahrn axyk wdbrtm al hsle leynyhm wntn mymyw whwzat lhm mym mn hsle whSqyt at hedh wat beyrm take the pen, and gather thou the assembly together, thou, and aaron-cabinet thy brother, and speak ye unto the rock before-turns their eyes; and it give forth his from-waters, and thou bring forth to them from-waters out of the rock: so thou give the until-witness and their beasts drink. qakh hamateh vehaqhel ha‘edah ’atah ve’aharon ’akhikha vedibartem ’el hasela‘ le‘enehem venatan memav, vehozeta lahem mayim min hasela‘ vehishqita ha‘edah ve’et be‘iram.
wyqx mSh at hmTh mlpny yhwh kaSr zwhw and mose-extracted took the pen from before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, as he direct him. vayiqakh mosheh hamateh milifnei yhvh, ka’asher zivahu.
wyqhlw mSh wahrn at hqhl al pny hsle wyamr lhm Smew na hmrym hmn hsle hch nwzya lkm mym and mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet added the until-witness together before-turns the rock, and he said unto them, hear now, ye rebels; must we fetch you from-waters out of this rock? vayaqhilu mosheh ve’aharon haqahal ’el penei hasala‘, vayomer lahem shim‘u na hamorim hamin hasela‘ hazeh nozi lakhem mayim.
wyrm mSh at ydw wyk at hsle bmThw pemym wyzaw mym rbym wtSt hedh wbeyrm and mose-extracted lifted up his hand, and with his pen he smote the rock twice: and the from-waters came out abundantly, and the until-witness drank, and their beasts also. vayarem mosheh yado vayakh hasela‘ bematehu pa‘amayim, vayeze’u mayim rabim vateshet ha‘edah ube‘iram.
wyamr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn yen la hamntm by lhqdySny leyny bny ySral lkn la tbyaw at hqhl hch al harz aSr ntty lhm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet, because ye was coached by me not, to dedicate-finify me in the eyes of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, therefore ye not bring this until-witness into the land which i have given them. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon ya‘an lo he’emantem bi lehaqdisheni le‘enei benei yisra’el, lakhen lo tabi’u haqahal hazeh ’el ha’arez ’asher natati lahem.
hmh my mrybh aSr rbw bny ySral at yhwh wyqdS bm this is the from-waters of meribah-jam; because children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards strove with yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and he was dedicated-finished in them. hemah mei meribah ’asher rabu bene yisra’el ’et yhvh, vayiqadesh bam.
wySlx mSh mlakym mqdS al mlk adwm kh amr axyk ySral ath ydet at kl htlah aSr mzatnw and mose-extracted sent messengers from kadesh-dedicated-finished unto the king-moloch of edom-man, thus saith thy brother israel-juicy-towards, thou knowest all the travail that hath befallen us: vayishlakh mosheh mal’akhim miqadesh ’el melekh ’edom, koh ’amar ’akhikha yisra’el ’atah yada‘ta kal hatela’ah ’asher meza’atenu.
wyrdw abtynw mzrymh wnSb bmzrym ymym rbym wyrew lnw mzrym wlabtynw how our fathers went down into mizraim-narrows, and we have dwelt in mizraim-narrows a long time; and the mizraim-narrowsians vexed us, and our fathers: vayeredu ’abotenu mizraymah vanesheb bemizrayim yamim rabim, vayare‘u lanu mizrayim vela’abotenu.
wnzeq al yhwh wySme qlnw wySlx mlak wyzanw mmzrym whnh anxnw bqdS eyr qzh gbwlk and when we cried unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, he heard our voice, and sent an angel-messanger, and hath brought us forth out of mizraim-narrows: and, behold, we are in kadesh-dedicated-finished, a light-city in the uttermost of thy border: vaniz‘aq ’el yhvh vayishma‘ qolenu vayishlakh mal’akh vayozi’enu mimizrayim, vehineh ’anakhnu beqadesh ‘ir qezeh gebulekha.
nebrh na barzk la nebr bSdh wbkrm wla nSth my bar drk hmlk nlk la nTh ymyn wSmawl ed aSr nebr gbwlk let us pass, i pray thee, through thy country: we will not pass through the fields, or through the vineyards, neither will we drink of the from-waters of the wells: we will go by the king-moloch's high way, we will not turn to the right hand nor to the left, until we have passed thy borders. na‘berah na be’arzekha lo na‘abor besadeh ubekherem velo nishteh mei be’er, derekh hamelekh nelekh lo niteh yamin usemol ‘ad ’asher na‘abor gebulekha.
wyamr alyw adwm la tebr by pn bxrb aza lqratk and edom-man said unto him, no pass by me, lest i come out against thee with the sword. vayomer ’elav ’edom lo ta‘abor bi, pen bakhereb ’ezei liqratekha.
wyamrw alyw bny ySral bmslh nelh wam mymyk nSth any wmqny wntty mkrm rq ayn dbr brgly aebrh and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards said unto him, we will go by the high way: and if i and my in-them-animal drink of thy from-waters, then i will pay for it: i will only, without doing anything else, go through on my feet. vayomeru ’elav bene yisra’el bamsilah na‘aleh ve’im memekha nishteh ’ani umiqnay venatati mikhram, raq ’en beraglay ’e‘eborah.
wyamr la tebr wyza adwm lqratw bem kbd wbyd xcqh and he said, no go through. and edom-man came out against him with much with-mum-people, and with a strong hand. vayomer lo ta‘abor, vayezei ’edom liqrato be‘am kabed ubeyad khazaqah.
wyman adwm ntn at ySral ebr bgblw wyT ySral melyw thus edom-man refused to give israel-juicy-towards passage through his border: wherefore israel-juicy-towards turned away from him. vayma’en ’edom neton yisra’el ‘abor bigbulo, vayet yisra’el me‘alav.
wysew mqdS wybaw bny ySral kl hedh hr hhr and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, even the whole until-witness, journeyed from kadesh-dedicated-finished, and came unto mount hor-mount. vayis‘u miqadesh, vayabo’u bene yisra’el kal ha‘edah hor hahar.
wyamr yhwh al mSh wal ahrn bhr hhr el gbwl arz adwm lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet in mount hor-mount, by the coast of the land of edom-man, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’aharon behor hahar, ‘al gebul ’erez ’edom lemor.
yasp ahrn al emyw ky la yba al harz aSr ntty lbny ySral el aSr mrytm at py lmy mrybh aaron-cabinet be added unto his with-mum-people: for he not enter into the land which i have given unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, because ye rebelled against my bee-word at the from-waters of meribah-jam. ye’asef ’aharon ’el ‘amav ki lo yabo ’el ha’arez ’asher natati libnei yisra’el, ‘al ’asher meritem pi lemei meribah.
qx at ahrn wat alecr bnw whel atm hr hhr take aaron-cabinet and eleazar-towards-stop his child-between, and bring them up unto mount hor-mount: qakh ’aharon ve’et ’el‘azar beno, veha‘al ’otam hor hahar.
whpST at ahrn at bgdyw whlbStm at alecr bnw wahrn yasp wmt Sm and strip aaron-cabinet of his garments, and put them upon eleazar-towards-stop his child-between: and aaron-cabinet be added unto his with-mum-people, and die there. vehafshet ’aharon begadav vehilbashtam ’el‘azar beno, ve’aharon ye’asef umet sham.
wyeS mSh kaSr zwh yhwh wyelw al hr hhr leyny kl hedh and mose-extracted did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct: and they went up into mount hor-mount in the sight of all the until-witness. vaya‘as mosheh ka’asher zivah yhvh, vaya‘alu ’el hor hahar le‘enei kal ha‘edah.
wypST mSh at ahrn at bgdyw wylbS atm at alecr bnw wymt ahrn Sm braS hhr wyrd mSh walecr mn hhr and mose-extracted stripped aaron-cabinet of his garments, and put them upon eleazar-towards-stop his child-between; and aaron-cabinet died there in the head of the mount: and mose-extracted and eleazar-towards-stop came down from the mount. vayafshet mosheh ’aharon begadav vayalbesh ’otam ’el‘azar beno vayamat ’aharon sham berosh hahar, vayered mosheh ve’el‘azar min hahar.
wyraw kl hedh ky gwe ahrn wybkw at ahrn SlSym ywm kl byt ySral and when all the until-witness saw that aaron-cabinet was dead, they mourned for aaron-cabinet thirty days, even all the daughter-house of israel-juicy-towards. vayir’u kal ha‘edah ki gava‘ ’aharon, vayibku ’et ’aharon sheloshim yom kol bet yisra’el.
wySme hkneny mlk erd ySb hngb ky ba ySral drk hatrym wylxm bySral wySb mmnw Sby and when king-moloch arad-bronze the canaan-mobile-tradeite, which dwelt in the south-dry, heard tell that israel-juicy-towards came by the way of the spies; then he fought against israel-juicy-towards, and took some of them prisoners. vayishma‘ hakena‘ani melekh ‘arad yosheb hanegeb ki ba yisra’el derekh ha’atarim, vayilakhem beyisra’el vayishb mimenu shebi.
wydr ySral ndr lyhwh wyamr am ntn ttn at hem hch bydy whxrmty at eryhm and israel-juicy-towards vowed a vow unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and said, if thou wilt indeed deliver this with-mum-people into my hand, then i will utterly destroy their cities. vayidar yisra’el neder yhvh vayomar, ’im naton titen ha‘am hazeh beyadi vehakharamti ‘arehem.
wySme yhwh bqwl ySral wytn at hkneny wyxrm athm wat eryhm wyqra Sm hmqwm xrmh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hearkened to the voice of israel-juicy-towards, and delivered up the canaan-mobile-tradeites; and they fishing-net-destroyed them and their cities: and he called the name of the place hormah-boycott-fishing-net. vayishma‘ yhvh beqol yisra’el vayiten hakena‘ani vayakharem ’ethem ve’et ‘arehem, vayiqra shem hamaqom kharemah.
wysew mhr hhr drk ym swp lsbb at arz adwm wtqzr npS hem bdrk and they journeyed from mount hor-mount by the way of the end sea, to compass the land of edom-man: and the being of the with-mum-people was much discouraged because of the way. vayis‘u mehor hahar derekh yam suf lisbob ’erez ’edom, vatiqzar nefesh ha‘am badarekh.
wydbr hem balhym wbmSh lmh helytnw mmzrym lmwt bmdbr ky ayn lxm wayn mym wnpSnw qzh blxm hqlql and the with-mum-people spake against to-no-these, and against mose-extracted, wherefore have ye brought us up out of mizraim-narrows to die in the place-of-word-desert? for there is no bread, neither is there any from-waters; and our being loatheth this light bread. vaydaber ha‘am belohim ubemosheh lamah he‘elitunu mimizrayim lamut bamidbar, ki ’en lekhem ve’en mayim venafshenu qazah balekhem haqeloqel.
wySlx yhwh bem at hnxSym hSrpym wynSkw at hem wymt em rb mySral and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sent fiery serpents among the with-mum-people, and they bit the with-mum-people; and much with-mum-people of israel-juicy-towards died. vayshalakh yhvh ba‘am hanekhashim haserafim vaynashekhu ha‘am, vayamat ‘am rab miyisra’el.
wyba hem al mSh wyamrw xTanw ky dbrnw byhwh wbk htpll al yhwh wysr melynw at hnxS wytpll mSh bed hem therefore the with-mum-people came to mose-extracted, and said, we have missed, for we have bee-spoken against yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and against thee; pray unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, that he take away the serpents from us. and mose-extracted prayed for the with-mum-people. vayabo ha‘am ’el mosheh vayomeru khatanu ki dibarnu yhvh vabakh hitpalel ’el yhvh veyaser me‘alenu hanakhash, vayitpalel mosheh be‘ad ha‘am.
wyamr yhwh al mSh eSh lk Srp wSym atw el ns whyh kl hnSwk wrah atw wxy and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, make thee a fiery serpent, and set it upon a pole: and it come to pass, that every one that is bitten, when he looketh upon it, live. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ‘aseh lekha saraf vesim ’oto ‘al nes, vehayah kal hanashukh vera’ah ’oto vakhay.
wyeS mSh nxS nxSt wySmhw el hns whyh am nSk hnxS at ayS whbyT al nxS hnxSt wxy and mose-extracted made a serpent of brass, and put it upon a pole, and it came to pass, that if a serpent had bitten any man, when he beheld the serpent of brass, he lived. vaya‘as mosheh nekhash nekhoshet vaysimehu ‘al hanes, vehayah ’im nashakh hanakhash ’ish vehibit ’el nekhash hanekhoshet vakhay.
wysew bny ySral wyxnw babt and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards set forward, and pitched in oboth-thick. vayis‘u benei yisra’el, vayakhanu be’obot.
wysew mabt wyxnw beyy hebrym bmdbr aSr el pny mwab mmcrx hSmS and they journeyed from oboth-thick, and pitched at ijeabarim-heaps-crossings, in the place-of-word-desert which is before-turns moab-from-father, toward the sunrising. vayis‘u me’obot, vayakhanu be‘iyei ha‘abarim bamidbar ’asher ‘al penei mo’ab mimizrakh hashamesh.
mSm nsew wyxnw bnxl crd from thence they removed, and pitched in the valley of zared-twig. misham nasa‘u, vayakhanu benakhal zared.
mSm nsew wyxnw mebr arnwn aSr bmdbr hyza mgbwl hamry ky arnwn gbwl mwab byn mwab wbyn hamry from thence they removed, and pitched on the other side of arnon-pine, which is in the place-of-word-desert that cometh out of the coasts of the amorite-talkers: for arnon-pine is the border of moab-from-father, between-bin moab-from-father and the amorite-talkers. misham nasa‘u vayakhanu me‘eber ’arnon ’asher bamidbar hayozei migebul ha’emori, ki ’arnon gebul mo’ab ben mo’ab uben ha’emori.
el kn yamr bspr mlxmt yhwh at whb bswph wat hnxlym arnwn wherefore it is said in the book of the wars of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, what he did in the end sea, and in the brooks of arnon-pine, ‘al ken ye’amar besefer milkhamot yhvh, vaheb besufah ve’et hanekhalim ’arnon.
waSd hnxlym aSr nTh lSbt er wnSen lgbwl mwab and at the stream of the brooks that goeth down to the dwelling of ar-awake, and lieth upon the border of moab-from-father. ve’eshed hanekhalim ’asher natah leshebet ‘ar, venish‘an ligbul mo’ab.
wmSm barh hwa hbar aSr amr yhwh lmSh asp at hem watnh lhm mym and from thence they went to beer-well: that is the well whereof yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, gather the with-mum-people together, and i will give them from-waters. umisham be’erah, hi habe’er ’asher ’amar yhvh lemosheh ’esof ha‘am ve’etenah lahem mayim.
ac ySyr ySral at hSyrh hcat ely bar enw lh then israel-juicy-towards sang this song, spring up, o well; sing ye unto it: ’az yashir yisra’el hashirah hazot, ‘ali be’er ‘enu lah.
bar xprwh Srym krwh ndyby hem bmxqq bmSentm wmmdbr mtnh the princes digged the well, the nobles of the with-mum-people digged it, by the direction of the teachinggiver, with their canvas. and from the place-of-word-desert they went to matenah-data-gift: be’er khafaruha sarim karuha nedibei ha‘am bimkhoqeq bemish‘anotam, umimidbar matanah.
wmmtnh nxlyal wmnxlyal bmwt and from matenah-data-gift to stream-towards-my: and from stream-towards-my to bamot-death-stage: umimatanah nakhali’el, uminakhali’el bamot.
wmbmwt hgya aSr bSdh mwab raS hpsgh wnSqph el pny hySymn and from bamot-death-stage in the valley, that is in the country of moab-from-father, to the top of pisgah-summit, which looketh toward jeshimon-will-apply. umibamot hagay ’asher bisdeh mo’ab rosh hapisgah, venishqafah ‘al penei hayshimon.
wySlx ySral mlakym al syxn mlk hamry lamr and israel-juicy-towards sent messengers unto sihon-curly king-moloch of the amorite-talkers, saying, vayishlakh yisra’el mal’akhim ’el sikhon melekh ha’emori lemor.
aebrh barzk la nTh bSdh wbkrm la nSth my bar bdrk hmlk nlk ed aSr nebr gblk let me pass through thy land: we will not turn into the fields, or into the vineyards; we will not drink of the from-waters of the well: and we will go along by the king-moloch's high way, until we be past thy borders. ’e‘berah be’arzekha lo niteh besadeh ubekherem lo nishteh mei be’er, bederekh hamelekh nelekh ‘ad ’asher na‘abor gebulekha.
wla ntn syxn at ySral ebr bgblw wyasp syxn at kl emw wyza lqrat ySral hmdbrh wyba yhzh wylxm bySral and sihon-curly would not suffer israel-juicy-towards to pass through his border: and sihon-curly added all his with-mum-people together, and went out against israel-juicy-towards into the place-of-word-desert: and he came to jahaz-stress, and fought against israel-juicy-towards. velo natan sikhon yisra’el ‘abor bigbulo vaye’esof sikhon kal ‘amo vayezei liqrat yisra’el hamidbarah vayabo yahezah, vayilakhem beyisra’el.
wykhw ySral lpy xrb wyyrS at arzw marnn ed ybq ed bny emwn ky ec gbwl bny emwn and israel-juicy-towards smote him with the edge of the sword, and possessed his land from arnon-pine unto jaboq-boxwood, even unto children-betweens of ammon-with: for the border of children-betweens of ammon-with was strong. vayakehu yisra’el lefi khareb, vayirash ’et ’arzo me’arnon ‘ad yaboq ‘ad benei ‘amon ki ‘az gebul benei ‘amon.
wyqx ySral at kl herym halh wySb ySral bkl ery hamry bxSbwn wbkl bntyh and israel-juicy-towards took all these cities: and israel-juicy-towards dwelt in all the cities of the amorite-talkers, in heshbon-score-supposition, and in all the villages-daughters thereof. vayiqakh yisra’el kal he‘arim ha’eleh, vayesheb yisra’el bekhal ‘arei ha’emori bekheshbon ubekhal benoteha.
ky xSbwn eyr syxn mlk hamry hwa whwa nlxm bmlk mwab hraSwn wyqx at kl arzw mydw ed arnn for heshbon-score-supposition was the light-city of sihon-curly the king-moloch of the amorite-talkers, who had fought against the former king-moloch of moab-from-father, and taken all his land out of his hand, even unto arnon-pine. ki kheshbon ‘ir sikhon melekh ha’emori hi vehu nilkham bemelekh mo’ab harishon vayiqakh kal ’arzo miyado ‘ad ’arnon.
el kn yamrw hmSlym baw xSbwn tbnh wtkwnn eyr syxwn wherefore they that speak in proverbs say, come into heshbon-score-supposition, let the light-city of sihon-curly be between-built and prepared: ‘al ken yomeru hamoshelim bo’u kheshbon, tibaneh vetikonen ‘ir sikhon.
ky aS yzah mxSbwn lhbh mqryt syxn aklh er mwab bely bmwt arnn for there is a fire gone out of heshbon-score-supposition, a flame from the light-city of sihon-curly: it hath consumed ar-awake of moab-from-father, and the base-lords of the high places of arnon-pine. ki ’esh yaze’ah mekheshbon lehabah miqiryat sikhon, ’akhelah ‘ar mo’ab ba‘alei bamot ’arnon.
awy lk mwab abdt em kmwS ntn bnyw plyTm wbntyw bSbyt lmlk amry syxwn woe to thee, moab-from-father! thou art undone, o with-mum-people of chemosh: he hath given his children-betweens that escaped, and his children-betweenesss, into captivity unto sihon-curly king-moloch of the amorite-talkers. ’o lekha mo’ab ’abadta ‘am kemosh, natan banav peletim ubenotav bashebit lemelekh ’emori sikhon.
wnyrm abd xSbwn ed dybwn wnSym ed npx aSr ed mydba we have shot at them; heshbon-score-supposition is perished even unto dibon-slander, and we have laid them waste even unto nophah-volume, which reacheth unto medeba-bear-come. vaniram ’abad kheshbon ‘ad dibon, vanashim ‘ad nofakh ’asher ‘ad medeba.
wySb ySral barz hamry thus israel-juicy-towards dwelt in the land of the amorite-talkers. vayesheb yisra’el be’erez ha’emori.
wySlx mSh lrgl at yecr wylkdw bntyh wyyrS wywrS at hamry aSr Sm and mose-extracted sent to spy out jaazer-help, and they took the villages thereof, and drove out the amorite-talkers that were there. vayishlakh mosheh leragel ya‘zer vayilkedu benoteha, vayoresh ha’emori ’asher sham.
wypnw wyelw drk hbSn wyza ewg mlk hbSn lqratm hwa wkl emw lmlxmh adrey and they turned and went up by the way of bashan-at-tooth: and og-mock the king-moloch of bashan-at-tooth went out against them, he, and all his with-mum-people, to the battle at edrei-live-prohibit. vayifnu vaya‘alu derekh habashan, vayezei ‘og melekh habashan liqratam hu vekhal ‘amo lamilkhamah ’edre‘i.
wyamr yhwh al mSh al tyra atw ky bydk ntty atw wat kl emw wat arzw weSyt lw kaSr eSyt lsyxn mlk hamry aSr ywSb bxSbwn and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, fear him not: for i have delivered him into thy hand, and all his with-mum-people, and his land; and thou do to him as thou didst unto sihon-curly king-moloch of the amorite-talkers, which dwelt at heshbon-score-supposition. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ’al tira ’oto ki beyadekha natati ’oto ve’et kal ‘amo ve’et ’arzo, ve‘asita lo ka’asher ‘asita lesikhon melekh ha’emori ’asher yosheb bekheshbon.
wykw atw wat bnyw wat kl emw ed blty hSayr lw Sryd wyyrSw at arzw so they smote him, and his children-betweens, and all his with-mum-people, until there was none left him alive: and they possessed his land. vayaku ’oto ve’et banav ve’et kal ‘amo ‘ad bilti hish’ir lo sarid, vayireshu ’et ’arzo.
wysew bny ySral wyxnw berbwt mwab mebr lyrdn yrxw and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards set forward, and pitched in the plains of moab-from-father on this side jordan-its-going-down by jericho-moon-smell. vayis‘u benei yisra’el, vayakhanu be‘arbot mo’ab me‘eber leyarden yerekho.
wyra blq bn zpwr at kl aSr eSh ySral lamry and balak-beat child-between of zipor-bird saw all that israel-juicy-towards had done to the amorite-talkers. vayar balaq ben zipor, kal ’asher ‘asah yisra’el la’emori.
wygr mwab mpny hem mad ky rb hwa wyqz mwab mpny bny ySral and moab-from-father was sore afraid of the with-mum-people, because they were many: and moab-from-father was distressed because of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayagar mo’ab mipenei ha‘am me’od ki rab hu, vayaqaz mo’ab mipenei benei yisra’el.
wyamr mwab al cqny mdyn eth ylxkw hqhl at kl sbybtynw klxk hSwr at yrq hSdh wblq bn zpwr mlk lmwab bet hhwa and moab-from-father said unto the elders of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching, now this company lick up all that are round about us, as the wall-ox licketh up the grass of the field. and balak-beat child-between of zipor-bird was king-moloch of the moab-from-fatherites at that time. vayomer mo’ab ’el ziqnei midyan ‘atah yelakhakhu haqahal kal sebibotenu kilkhokh hashor yereq hasadeh, ubalaq ben zipor melekh lemo’ab ba‘et hahiv.
wySlx mlakym al blem bn bewr ptwrh aSr el hnhr arz bny emw lqra lw lamr hnh em yza mmzrym hnh ksh at eyn harz whwa ySb mmly he sent messengers therefore unto baalam-swallow child-between of beor-in-the-skin to pethor, which is by the river of the land of children-betweens of his with-mum-people, to call him, saying, behold, there is a with-mum-people come out from mizraim-narrows: behold, they cover the face-turns of the earth, and they abide over against me: vayishlakh mal’akhim ’el bil‘am ben be‘or petorah ’asher ‘al hanahar ’erez bene ‘amo liqro lo, lemor hineh ‘am yaza mimizrayim hineh khisah ‘en ha’arez vehu yosheb mimuli.
weth lkh na arh ly at hem hch ky ezwm hwa mmny awly awkl nkh bw wagrSnw mn harz ky ydety at aSr tbrk mbrk waSr tar ywar come now therefore, i pray thee, curse me this with-mum-people; for they are too mighty for me: peradventure i prevail, that we may hit them, and that i may drive them out of the land: for i wot that he whom thou knee-fluffy-blessest is knee-fluffy-blessed, and he whom thou cursest is cursed. ve‘atah lekhah na ’arah li ha‘am hazeh ki ‘azum hu mimeni ’ulay ’ukhal nakeh bo va’agareshenu min ha’arez, ki yada‘ti ’asher tebarekh meborakh va’asher ta’or yu’ar.
wylkw cqny mwab wcqny mdyn wqsmym bydm wybaw al blem wydbrw alyw dbry blq and the elders of moab-from-father and the elders of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching departed with the rewards of divination in their hand; and they came unto baalam-swallow, and spake unto him the bee-words of balak-beat. vayelekhu ziqnei mo’ab veziqnei midyan uqesamim beyadam, vayabo’u ’el bil‘am vaydaberu ’elav dibrei balaq.
wyamr alyhm lynw ph hlylh whSbty atkm dbr kaSr ydbr yhwh aly wySbw Sry mwab em blem and he said unto them, lodge here this night, and i will bring you bee-word again, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah speak unto me: and the princes of moab-from-father abode with baalam-swallow. vayomer ’alehem linu foh halaylah vahashiboti ’etkhem dabar ka’asher yedaber yhvh ’elay, vayeshebu sare mo’ab ‘im bil‘am.
wyba alhym al blem wyamr my hanSym halh emk and to-no-these came unto baalam-swallow, and said, what men are these with thee? vayabo ’elohim ’el bil‘am, vayomer mi ha’anashim ha’eleh ‘imakh.
wyamr blem al halhym blq bn zpr mlk mwab Slx aly and baalam-swallow said unto to-no-these, balak-beat child-between of zipor-bird, king-moloch of moab-from-father, hath sent unto me, saying, vayomer bil‘am ’el ha’elohim, balaq ben zipor melekh mo’ab shalakh ’elay.
hnh hem hyza mmzrym wyks at eyn harz eth lkh qbh ly atw awly awkl lhlxm bw wgrStyw behold, there is a with-mum-people come out of mizraim-narrows, which covereth the face-turns of the earth: come now, curse me them; peradventure i be able to overcome them, and drive them out. hineh ha‘am hayozei mimizrayim vaykhas ‘en ha’arez, ‘atah lekhah qabah li ’oto ’ulay ’ukhal lehilakhem bo vegerashtiv.
wyamr alhym al blem la tlk emhm la tar at hem ky brwk hwa and to-no-these said unto baalam-swallow, no go with them; no curse the with-mum-people: for they are knee-fluffy-blessed. vayomer ’elohim ’el bil‘am lo telekh ‘imahem, lo ta’or ha‘am ki barukh hu.
wyqm blem bbqr wyamr al Sry blq lkw al arzkm ky man yhwh ltty lhlk emkm and baalam-swallow rose up in the morning, and said unto the princes of balak-beat, get you into your land: for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah refuseth to give me leave to go with you. vayaqam bil‘am baboqer vayomer ’el sarei balaq lekhu ’el ’arzekhem, ki me’en yhvh letiti lahalokh ‘imakhem.
wyqwmw Sry mwab wybaw al blq wyamrw man blem hlk emnw and the princes of moab-from-father rose up, and they went unto balak-beat, and said, baalam-swallow refuseth to come with us. vayaqumu sarei mo’ab vayabo’u ’el balaq, vayomeru me’en bil‘am halokh ‘imanu.
wysp ewd blq Slx Srym rbym wnkbdym malh and balak-beat sent yet again princes, more, and more honorable than they. vayosef ‘od balaq, sheloakh sarim rabim venikhbadim me’eleh.
wybaw al blem wyamrw lw kh amr blq bn zpwr al na tmne mhlk aly and they came to baalam-swallow, and said to him, thus saith balak-beat child-between of zipor-bird, let nothing, i pray thee, here-hinder thee from coming unto me: vayabo’u ’el bil‘am, vayomeru lo koh ’amar balaq ben zipor ’al na timana‘ mehalokh ’elay.
ky kbd akbdk mad wkl aSr tamr aly aeSh wlkh na qbh ly at hem hch for i will promote thee unto very great honor, and i will do whatsoever thou sayest unto me: come therefore, i pray thee, curse me this with-mum-people. ki khabed ’akhabedkha me’od vekhol ’asher tomar ’elay ’e‘eseh, ulekhah na qabah li ha‘am hazeh.
wyen blem wyamr al ebdy blq am ytn ly blq mla bytw ksp wchb la awkl lebr at py yhwh alhy leSwt qTnh aw gdwlh and baalam-swallow answered and said unto the workers of balak-beat, if balak-beat would give me his daughter-house full of silver and gold, i cannot go beyond the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah my to-no-these, to do less or more. vaya‘an bil‘am vayomer ’el ‘abdei balaq ’im yiten li balaq melo beto kesef vezahab, lo ’ukhal la‘abor pi yhvh ’elohay la‘asot qetanah ’o gedolah.
weth Sbw na bch gm atm hlylh wadeh mh ysp yhwh dbr emy now therefore, i pray you, tarry ye also here this night, that i may hand-know what yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will say unto me more. ve‘atah shebu na bazeh gam ’atem halayelah, ve’ede‘ah mah yosef yhvh daber ‘imi.
wyba alhym al blem lylh wyamr lw am lqra lk baw hanSym qwm lk atm wak at hdbr aSr adbr alyk atw teSh and to-no-these came unto baalam-swallow at night, and said unto him, if the men come to call thee, rise up, and go with them; and yet the bee-word which i say unto thee, that thou do. vayabo ’elohim ’el bil‘am laylah vayomer lo ’im liqro lekha ba’u ha’anashim qum lekh ’itam, ve’akh hadabar ’asher ’adaber ’elekha ’oto ta‘aseh.
wyqm blem bbqr wyxbS at atnw wylk em Sry mwab and baalam-swallow rose up in the morning, and saddled his ass, and went with the princes of moab-from-father. vayaqam bil‘am baboqer vayakhabosh ’atono, vayelekh ‘im sarei mo’ab.
wyxr ap alhym ky hwlk hwa wytyzb mlak yhwh bdrk lSTn lw whwa rkb el atnw wSny neryw emw and to-no-these's nose-anger was kindled because he went: and the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah stood in the way for an adversary-satan against him. now he was riding upon his ass, and his two workers were with him. vayikhar ’af ’elohim ki holekh hu vayityazeb mal’akh yhvh baderekh lesatan lo, vehu rokheb ‘al ’atono ushenei ne‘arav ‘imo.
wtra hatwn at mlak yhwh nzb bdrk wxrbw Slwph bydw wtT hatwn mn hdrk wtlk bSdh wyk blem at hatwn lhTth hdrk and the ass saw the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and the ass turned aside out of the way, and went into the field: and baalam-swallow smote the ass, to turn her into the way. vatere ha’aton mal’akh yhvh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado vatet ha’aton min haderekh vatelekh basadeh, vayakh bil‘am ha’aton lehatotah hadarekh.
wyemd mlak yhwh bmSewl hkrmym gdr mch wgdr mch and the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah stood in a path of the vineyards, a wall being on this side, and a wall on that side. vaya‘amod mal’akh yhvh bemish‘ol hakeramim, gader mizeh vegader mizeh.
wtra hatwn at mlak yhwh wtlxz al hqyr wtlxz at rgl blem al hqyr wysp lhkth and when the ass saw the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, she thrust herself unto the wall, and crushed baalam-swallow's foot against the wall: and he smote her again. vatere ha’aton mal’akh yhvh vatilakhez ’el haqir vatilkhaz regel bil‘am ’el haqir, vayosef lehakotah.
wywsp mlak yhwh ebwr wyemd bmqwm zr aSr ayn drk lnTwt ymyn wSmawl and the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah went further, and stood in a narrow place, where was no way to turn either to the right hand or to the left. vayosef mal’akh yhvh ‘abor, vaya‘amod bemaqom zar ’asher ’en derekh lintot yamin usemol.
wtra hatwn at mlak yhwh wtrbz txt blem wyxr ap blem wyk at hatwn bmql and when the ass saw the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, she fell down under baalam-swallow: and baalam-swallow's nose-anger was kindled, and he smote the ass with a staff. vatere ha’aton mal’akh yhvh vatirbaz takhat bil‘am, vayikhar ’af bil‘am vayakh ha’aton bamaqel.
wyptx yhwh at py hatwn wtamr lblem mh eSyty lk ky hkytny ch SlS rglym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah opened the mouth of the ass, and she said unto baalam-swallow, what have i done unto thee, that thou hast smitten me these three times? vayiftakh yhvh pi ha’aton, vatomer lebil‘am meh ‘asiti lekha ki hikitani zeh shalosh regalim.
wyamr blem latwn ky htellt by lw yS xrb bydy ky eth hrgtyk and baalam-swallow said unto the ass, because thou hast mocked me: i would there were a sword in mine hand, for now would i kill thee. vayomer bil‘am la’aton ki hit‘alalt bi, lu yesh khereb beyadi ki ‘atah haragtikh.
wtamr hatwn al blem hlwa anky atnk aSr rkbt ely mewdk ed hywm hch hhskn hsknty leSwt lk kh wyamr la and the ass said unto baalam-swallow, am not i thine ass, upon which thou hast ridden ever since i was thine unto this day? was i ever wont to do so unto thee? and he said, nay. vatomer ha’aton ’el bil‘am halo ’anokhi ’atonekha ’asher rakhabta ‘alay me‘odkha ‘ad hayom hazeh hahasken hiskanti la‘asot lekha koh, vayomer lo.
wygl yhwh at eyny blem wyra at mlak yhwh nzb bdrk wxrbw Slph bydw wyqd wyStxw lapyw then yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah opened the eyes of baalam-swallow, and he saw the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and he bowed down his head, and fell flat on his face-turns. vaygal yhvh ‘enei bil‘am vayar mal’akh yhvh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado, vayiqod vayishtakhu le’apav.
wyamr alyw mlak yhwh el mh hkyt at atnk ch SlwS rglym hnh anky yzaty lSTn ky yrT hdrk lngdy and the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto him, wherefore hast thou smitten thine ass these three times? behold, i went out to withstand-satan thee, because thy way is perverse before-turns me: vayomer ’elav mal’akh yhvh ‘al mah hikita ’atonekha zeh shalosh regalim, hineh ’anokhi yazati lesatan ki yarat haderekh lenegdi.
wtrany hatwn wtT lpny ch SlS rglym awly nTth mpny ky eth gm atkh hrgty wawth hxyyty and the ass saw me, and turned from me these three times: unless she had turned from me, surely now also i had slain thee, and saved her alive. vatir’ani ha’aton vatet lefanay zeh shalosh regalim, ’ulay natetah mipanay ki ‘atah gam ’otekhah haragti ve’otah hekheyeti.
wyamr blem al mlak yhwh xTaty ky la ydety ky ath nzb lqraty bdrk weth am re beynyk aSwbh ly and baalam-swallow said unto the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, i have missed; for i hand-knew not that thou stoodest in the way against me: now therefore, if it is bad in you eyes, i will get me back again. vayomer bil‘am ’el mal’akh yhvh khatati ki lo yada‘ti ki ’atah nizab liqrati badarekh, ve‘atah ’im ra‘ be‘enekha ’ashubah li.
wyamr mlak yhwh al blem lk em hanSym waps at hdbr aSr adbr alyk atw tdbr wylk blem em Sry blq and the angel-messanger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto baalam-swallow, go with the men: and only the bee-word that i speak unto thee, that thou speak. so baalam-swallow went with the princes of balak-beat. vayomer mal’akh yhvh ’el bil‘am lekh ‘im ha’anashim ve’efes hadabar ’asher ’adaber ’elekha tedaber, vayelekh bil‘am ‘im sarei balaq.
wySme blq ky ba blem wyza lqratw al eyr mwab aSr el gbwl arnn aSr bqzh hgbwl and when balak-beat heard that baalam-swallow was come, he went out to until-witness him unto a light-city of moab-from-father, which is in the border of arnon-pine, which is in the utmost coast. vayishma‘ balaq ki ba bil‘am, vayezei liqrato ’el ‘ir mo’ab ’asher ‘al gebul ’arnon ’asher biqzeh hagebul.
wyamr blq al blem hla Slx Slxty alyk lqra lk lmh la hlkt aly hamnm la awkl kbdk and balak-beat said unto baalam-swallow, did i not earnestly send unto thee to call thee? wherefore camest thou not unto me? am i not able indeed to promote thee to honor? vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am halo shaloakh shalakhti ’elekha liqro lakh lamah lo halakhta ’elay, ha’umnam lo ’ukhal kabedekha.
wyamr blem al blq hnh baty alyk eth hykwl awkl dbr mawmh hdbr aSr ySym alhym bpy atw adbr and baalam-swallow said unto balak-beat, lo, i am come unto thee: have i now any dynamic at all to say any thing? the bee-word that to-no-these putteth in my mouth, that i speak. vayomer bil‘am ’el balaq hineh bati ’elekha ‘atah hayakhol ’ukhal daber me’umah, hadabar ’asher yasim ’elohim befi ’oto ’adaber.
wylk blem em blq wybaw qryt xzwt and baalam-swallow went with balak-beat, and they came unto kirjathuzot-district-of-midnight. vayelekh bil‘am ‘im balaq, vayabo’u khuzot.
wycbx blq bqr wzan wySlx lblem wlSrym aSr atw and balak-beat butchered wall-oxen and flock, and sent to baalam-swallow, and to the princes that were with him. vayizbakh balaq baqar vazon, vayshalakh lebil‘am velasarim ’asher ’ito.
wyhy bbqr wyqx blq at blem wyelhw bmwt bel wyra mSm qzh hem and it came to pass on the morrow, that balak-beat took baalam-swallow, and brought him up into the high places of baal-owner, that thence he might see the utmost part of the with-mum-people. vayhi baboqer vayiqakh balaq bil‘am vaya‘alehu bamot ba‘al, vayar misham qezeh ha‘am.
wyamr blem al blq bnh ly bch Sbeh mcbxt whkn ly bch Sbeh prym wSbeh aylym and baalam-swallow said unto balak-beat, between-build me here seven butcher-kitchens, and prepare me here seven bulls and seven ram-voicelesss. vayomer bil‘am ’el balaq beneh li bazeh shib‘ah mizbekhot, vehakhen li bazeh shib‘ah farim veshib‘ah ’elim.
wyeS blq kaSr dbr blem wyel blq wblem pr wayl bmcbx and balak-beat did as baalam-swallow had bee-spoken; and balak-beat and baalam-swallow inwarded on every butcher-kitchen a bull and a ram-voiceless. vaya‘as balaq ka’asher diber bil‘am, vaya‘al balaq ubil‘am par va’ayil bamizbeakh.
wyamr blem lblq htyzb el eltk walkh awly yqrh yhwh lqraty wdbr mh yrany whgdty lk wylk Spy and baalam-swallow said unto balak-beat, stand by thy on-up, and i will go: peradventure yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will come to meet me: and whatsoever he showeth me i will tell thee. and he went to an high place. vayomer bil‘am lebalaq hityazeb ‘al ‘olatekha ve’elekhah ’ulay yiqareh yhvh liqrati udebar mah yar’eni vehigadti lakh, vayelekh shefi.
wyqr alhym al blem wyamr alyw at Sbet hmcbxt erkty wael pr wayl bmcbx and to-no-these met baalam-swallow: and he said unto him, i have prepared seven butcher-kitchens, and i have inwarded upon every butcher-kitchen a bull and a ram-voiceless. vayiqar ’elohim ’el bil‘am, vayomer ’elav shib‘at hamizbekhot ‘arakhti va’a‘al par va’ayil bamizbeakh.
wySm yhwh dbr bpy blem wyamr Swb al blq wkh tdbr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah put a bee-word in baalam-swallow's mouth, and said, return unto balak-beat, and thus thou speak. vayasem yhvh dabar befi bil‘am, vayomer shub ’el balaq vekhoh tedaber.
wySb alyw whnh nzb el eltw hwa wkl Sry mwab and he returned unto him, and, lo, he stood by his on-up, he, and all the princes of moab-from-father. vayashab ’elav vehineh nizab ‘al ‘olato, hu vekhal sarei mo’ab.
wySa mSlw wyamr mn arm ynxny blq mlk mwab mhrry qdm lkh arh ly yeqb wlkh cemh ySral and he took up his parable, and said, balak-beat the king-moloch of moab-from-father hath brought me from aram-high, out of the mountains of the east, saying, come, curse me jacob-backstreet, and come, defy israel-juicy-towards. vayisa meshalo vayomar, min ’aram yankheni balaq melekh mo’ab meharre qedem lekhah ’arah li ya‘aqob ulekhah zo‘amah yisra’el.
mh aqb la qbh al wmh acem la cem yhwh how i curse, whom to-no-these hath not cursed? or how i defy, whom yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath not defied? mah ’eqob lo qaboh ’el, umah ’ez‘om lo za‘am yhvh.
ky mraS zrym aranw wmgbewt aSwrnw hn em lbdd ySkn wbgwym la ytxSb for from the top of the rocks i see him, and from the hills i behold him: lo, the with-mum-people dwell alone, and not be reckoned among the nations. ki merosh zurim ’er’enu umigeba‘ot ’ashurenu, hen ‘am lebadad yishkon ubagoyim lo yitkhashab.
my mnh epr yeqb wmspr at rbe ySral tmt npSy mwt ySrym wthy axryty kmhw who can count the dust of jacob-backstreet, and the number of the fourth part of israel-juicy-towards? let me die the death of the just, and let my last end be like his! mi manah ‘afar ya‘aqob umispar roba‘ yisra’el, tamot nafshi mot yesharim utehi ’akhariti kamohu.
wyamr blq al blem mh eSyt ly lqb ayby lqxtyk whnh brkt brk and balak-beat said unto baalam-swallow, what hast thou done unto me? i took thee to curse mine father-adversaries, and, behold, thou hast knee-fluffy-blessed them altogether. vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am meh ‘asita li, laqob ’oyebay leqakhtikha vehineh berakhta barekh.
wyen wyamr hla at aSr ySym yhwh bpy atw aSmr ldbr and he answered and said, must i not take heed to speak that which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath put in my mouth? vaya‘an vayomar, halo ’asher yasim yhvh befi ’eshmor ledaber.
wyamr alyw blq lk lkh na aty al mqwm axr aSr tranw mSm aps qzhw trah wklw la trah wqbnw ly mSm and balak-beat said unto him, come, i pray thee, with me unto another place, from whence thou mayest see them: thou see and the utmost part of them, and not see them all: and curse me them from thence. vayomer ’elav balaq lekhah ’iti ’el maqom ’akher ’asher tir’enu misham ’efes qazehu tir’eh vekhulo lo tir’eh, veqabeno li misham.
wyqxhw Sdh zpym al raS hpsgh wybn Sbeh mcbxt wyel pr wayl bmcbx and he brought him into the field of zophim-floats, to the top of pisgah-summit, and between-built seven butcher-kitchens, and inwarded a bull and a ram-voiceless on every butcher-kitchen. vayiqakhehu sedeh zofim ’el rosh hapisgah, vayiben shib‘ah mizbekhot vaya‘al par va’ayil bamizbeakh.
wyamr al blq htyzb kh el eltk wanky aqrh kh and he said unto balak-beat, stand here by thy on-up, while i until-witness yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah yonder. vayomer ’el balaq hityazeb koh ‘al ‘olatekha, ve’anokhi ’iqareh koh.
wyqr yhwh al blem wySm dbr bpyw wyamr Swb al blq wkh tdbr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah met baalam-swallow, and put a bee-word in his mouth, and said, go again unto balak-beat, and say thus. vayiqar yhvh ’el bil‘am vayasem dabar befiv, vayomer shub ’el balaq vekhoh tedaber.
wyba alyw whnw nzb el eltw wSry mwab atw wyamr lw blq mh dbr yhwh and when he came to him, behold, he stood by his on-up, and the princes of moab-from-father with him. and balak-beat said unto him, what hath yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bee-spoken? vayabo ’elav vehino nizab ‘al ‘olato vesarei mo’ab ’ito, vayomer lo balaq mah diber yhvh.
wySa mSlw wyamr qwm blq wSme hacynh edy bnw zpr and he took up his parable, and said, rise up, balak-beat, and hear; hearken unto me, thou child-between of zipor-bird: vayisa meshalo vayomar, qum balaq ushama‘ ha’azinah ‘aday beno zipor.
la ayS al wykcb wbn adm wytnxm hhwa amr wla yeSh wdbr wla yqymnh to-no-these is not a man, that he should lie; neither child-between of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and he not do it? or hath he bee-spoken, and he not make it good? lo ’ish ’el vikhazeb uben ’adam veyitnekham, hahu ’amar velo ya‘aseh vediber velo yeqimenah.
hnh brk lqxty wbrk wla aSybnh behold, i have received directive to knee-fluffy-bless: and he hath knee-fluffy-blessed; and i cannot reverse it. hineh barekh laqakheti, uberekh velo ’ashibenah.
la hbyT awn byeqb wla rah eml bySral yhwh alhyw emw wtrwet mlk bw he hath not beheld torment in jacob-backstreet, neither hath he seen perverseness in israel-juicy-towards: yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah his to-no-these is with him, and the shout of a king-moloch is among them. lo hibit ’aven beya‘aqob velo ra’ah ‘amal beyisra’el, yhvh ’elohav ‘imo uteru‘at melekh bo.
al mwzyam mmzrym ktwept ram lw to-no-these brought them out of mizraim-narrows; he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn. ’el mozi’am mimizrayim, keto‘afot re’em lo.
ky la nxS byeqb wla qsm bySral ket yamr lyeqb wlySral mh pel al surely there is no enchantment against jacob-backstreet, neither is there any divination against israel-juicy-towards: according to this time it be said of jacob-backstreet and of israel-juicy-towards, what hath to-no-these wrought! ki lo nakhash beya‘aqob velo qesem beyisra’el, ka‘et ye’amer leya‘aqob uleyisra’el mah pa‘al ’el.
hn em klbya yqwm wkary ytnSa la ySkb ed yakl Trp wdm xllym ySth behold, the with-mum-people rise up as a gather-lion, and lift up himself as a gather-lion: he not lie down until he eat of the prey, and drink the blood of the slain. hen ‘am kelabi yaqum vekha’ari yitnasa, lo yishkab ‘ad yokhal teref vedam khalalim yishteh.
wyamr blq al blem gm qb la tqbnw gm brk la tbrknw and balak-beat said unto baalam-swallow, neither curse them at all, nor knee-fluffy-bless them at all. vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am gam qob lo tiqobenu, gam barekh lo tebarakhenu.
wyen blem wyamr al blq hla dbrty alyk lamr kl aSr ydbr yhwh atw aeSh and baalam-swallow answered and said unto balak-beat, told not i thee, saying, all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah speaketh, that i must do? vaya‘an bil‘am vayomer ’el balaq, halo dibarti ’elekha lemor kol ’asher yedaber yhvh ’oto ’e‘eseh.
wyamr blq al blem lkh na aqxk al mqwm axr awly yySr beyny halhym wqbtw ly mSm and balak-beat said unto baalam-swallow, come, i pray thee, i will bring thee unto another place; peradventure it will please to-no-these that thou mayest curse me them from thence. vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am lekhah na ’eqakhakha ’el maqom ’akher, ’ulay yishar be‘enei ha’elohim veqaboto li misham.
wyqx blq at blem raS hpewr hnSqp el pny hySymn and balak-beat brought baalam-swallow unto the top of peor, that looketh toward jeshimon-will-apply. vayiqakh balaq bil‘am, rosh hape‘or hanishqaf ‘al penei hayshimon.
wyamr blem al blq bnh ly bch Sbeh mcbxt whkn ly bch Sbeh prym wSbeh aylym and baalam-swallow said unto balak-beat, between-build me here seven butcher-kitchens, and prepare me here seven bulls and seven ram-voicelesss. vayomer bil‘am ’el balaq beneh li bazeh shib‘ah mizbekhot, vehakhen li bazeh shib‘ah farim veshib‘ah ’elim.
wyeS blq kaSr amr blem wyel pr wayl bmcbx and balak-beat did as baalam-swallow had said, and inwarded a bull and a ram-voiceless on every butcher-kitchen. vaya‘as balaq ka’asher ’amar bil‘am, vaya‘al par va’ayil bamizbeakh.
wyra blem ky Twb beyny yhwh lbrk at ySral wla hlk kpem bpem lqrat nxSym wySt al hmdbr pnyw and when baalam-swallow saw that it was good in the eyes of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to knee-fluffy-bless israel-juicy-towards, he went not, as at other times, to seek for enchantments, and he set his face-turns toward the place-of-word-desert. vayar bil‘am ki tob be‘enei yhvh lebarekh yisra’el velo halakh kefa‘am befa‘am liqrat nekhashim, vayashet ’el hamidbar panav.
wySa blem at eynyw wyra at ySral Skn lSbTyw wthy elyw rwx alhym and baalam-swallow lifted up his eyes, and he saw israel-juicy-towards abiding in his tents according to their branchs; and breath-spirit of to-no-these came upon him. vayisa bil‘am ‘enav vayar yisra’el shokhen lishbatav, vatehi ‘alav ruakh ’elohim.
wySa mSlw wyamr nam blem bnw ber wnam hgbr Stm heyn and he took up his parable, and said, baalam-swallow child-between of beor-in-the-skin hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said: vayisa meshalo vayomar, ne’um bil‘am beno be‘or une’um hageber shetum ha‘ayin.
nam Sme amry al aSr mxch Sdy yxch npl wglwy eynym he hath said, which heard the bee-words of to-no-these, which saw the vision of the almighty, falling into a trance, and having his eyes open: ne’um shomea‘ ’imre ’el, ’asher makhazeh shaday yekhezeh nofel ugelui ‘enayim.
mh Tbw ahlyk yeqb mSkntyk ySral how goodly are thy tents, o jacob-backstreet, and thy dwellings, o israel-juicy-towards! mah tobu ’ohalekha ya‘aqob, mishkenotekha yisra’el.
knxlym nTyw kgnt ely nhr kahlym nTe yhwh karcym ely mym as the valleys are they spread forth, as gardens by the river's side, as the trees of lign aloes which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath planted, and as cedar trees beside the from-waters. kinkhalim nitayu keganot ‘alei nahar, ka’ahalim nata‘ yhvh ka’arazim ‘ale mayim.
ycl mym mdlyw wcrew bmym rbym wyrm magg mlkw wtnSa mlktw he pour the from-waters out of his buckets, and his seed be in many from-waters, and his king-moloch be higher than agag-roof, and his king-molochdom be exalted. yizal mayim midaleyav vezar‘o bemayim rabim, veyarom me’agag malko vetinasei malkhuto.
al mwzyaw mmzrym ktwept ram lw yakl gwym zryw wezmtyhm ygrm wxzyw ymxz to-no-these brought him forth out of mizraim-narrows; he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn: he eat up the nations his father-adversaries, and break their bones, and pierce them through with his arrows. ’el mozi’o mimizrayim keto‘afot re’em lo, yokhal goyim zarav ve‘azmotehem yegarem vekhizav yimkhaz.
kre Skb kary wklbya my yqymnw mbrkyk brwk warryk arwr he couched, he lay down as a gather-lion, and as a gather-lion: who stir him up? knee-fluffy-blessed is he that knee-fluffy-blesseth thee, and cursed is he that curseth thee. kara‘ shakhab ka’ari ukhelabi mi yeqimenu, mebarakhekha barukh ve’orerekha ’arur.
wyxr ap blq al blem wyspq at kpyw wyamr blq al blem lqb ayby qratyk whnh brkt brk ch SlS pemym and balak-beat's nose-anger was kindled against baalam-swallow, and he smote his hands together: and balak-beat said unto baalam-swallow, i called thee to curse mine father-adversaries, and, behold, thou hast altogether knee-fluffy-blessed them these three times. vayikhar ’af balaq ’el bil‘am vayispoq kapav, vayomer balaq ’el bil‘am laqob ’oyebay qeratikha vehineh berakhta barekh zeh shalosh pe‘amim.
weth brx lk al mqwmk amrty kbd akbdk whnh mnek yhwh mkbwd therefore now flee thou to thy place: i thought to promote thee unto great honor; and, lo, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath kept thee back from honor. ve‘atah berakh lekha ’el meqomekha, ’amarti kabed ’akhabedkha vehineh mena‘akha yhvh mikabod.
wyamr blem al blq hla gm al mlakyk aSr Slxt aly dbrty lamr and baalam-swallow said unto balak-beat, spake i not also to thy messengers which thou sentest unto me, saying, vayomer bil‘am ’el balaq, halo gam ’el mal’akhekha ’asher shalakhta ’elay dibarti lemor.
am ytn ly blq mla bytw ksp wchb la awkl lebr at py yhwh leSwt Twbh aw reh mlby aSr ydbr yhwh atw adbr if balak-beat would give me his daughter-house full of silver and gold, i cannot go beyond the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to do either good or bad of mine own mind; and what yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah saith, that will i speak? ’im yiten li balaq melo beto kesef vezahab lo ’ukhal la‘abor pi yhvh la‘asot tobah ’o ra‘ah milibi, ’asher yedaber yhvh ’oto ’adaber.
weth hnny hwlk lemy lkh ayezk aSr yeSh hem hch lemk baxryt hymym and now, behold, i go unto my with-mum-people: come therefore, and i will advertise thee what this with-mum-people do to thy with-mum-people in the latter days. ve‘atah hini holekh le‘ami, lekhah ’i‘azekha ’asher ya‘aseh ha‘am hazeh le‘amekha be’akharit hayamim.
wySa mSlw wyamr nam blem bnw ber wnam hgbr Stm heyn and he took up his parable, and said, baalam-swallow child-between of beor-in-the-skin hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said: vayisa meshalo vayomar, ne’um bil‘am beno be‘or une’um hageber shetum ha‘ayin.
nam Sme amry al wyde det elywn mxch Sdy yxch npl wglwy eynym he hath said, which heard the bee-words of to-no-these, and hand-knew the knowledge of the most high, which saw the vision of the almighty, falling into a trance, and having his eyes open: ne’um shomea‘ ’imre ’el veyodea‘ da‘at ‘elyon, makhazeh shaday yekhezeh nofel ugelui ‘enayim.
aranw wla eth aSwrnw wla qrwb drk kwkb myeqb wqm SbT mySral wmxz paty mwab wqrqr kl bny St i see him, and not now: i behold him, and not nigh: there come a star out of jacob-backstreet, and a sceptre rise out of israel-juicy-towards, and hit the corners of moab-from-father, and destroy all children-betweens of sheth-drink-put. ’er’enu velo ‘atah ’ashurenu velo qarob, darakh kokhab miya‘aqob veqam shebet miyisra’el umakhaz pa’atei mo’ab veqarqar kal bene shet.
whyh adwm yrSh whyh yrSh Seyr aybyw wySral eSh xyl and edom-man be a possession, seir-hair-style also be a possession for his father-adversaries; and israel-juicy-towards do valiantly. vehayah ’edom yereshah vehayah yereshah se‘ir ’oyebav, veyisra’el ‘oseh khayil.
wyrd myeqb whabyd Sryd meyr out of jacob-backstreet come he that have dominion, and destroy him that remaineth of the light-city. veyered miya‘aqob, vehe’ebid sarid me‘ir.
wyra at emlq wySa mSlw wyamr raSyt gwym emlq waxrytw edy abd and when he looked on amalek-labour-king-moloch, he took up his parable, and said, amalek-labour-king-moloch was the first of the nations; and his latter end be that he perish for ever. vayar ‘amaleq vayisa meshalo vayomar, reshit goyim ‘amaleq ve’akharito ‘adei ’obed.
wyra at hqyny wySa mSlw wyamr aytn mwSbk wSym bsle qnk and he looked on the kenite-nests-nest, and took up his parable, and said, strong is thy dwelling place, and thou puttest thy nest in a rock. vayar haqeni vayisa meshalo vayomar, ’etan moshabekha vesim basela‘ qinekha.
ky am yhyh lber qyn ed mh aSwr tSbk nevertheless the kenite-nest be wasted, until asshur-beech carry thee away captive. ki ’im yihyeh leba‘er qayin, ‘ad mah ’ashur tishbeka.
wySa mSlw wyamr awy my yxyh mSmw al and he took up his parable, and said, alas, who live when to-no-these doeth this! vayisa meshalo vayomar, ’o mi yikhyeh misumo ’el.
wzym myd ktym wenw aSwr wenw ebr wgm hwa edy abd and ships come from the coast of chitim-stains, and afflict asshur-beech, and afflict eber-pass, and he also perish for ever. vezim miyad kitim ve‘inu ’ashur ve‘inu ‘eber, vegam hu ‘adei ’obed.
wyqm blem wylk wySb lmqmw wgm blq hlk ldrkw and baalam-swallow rose up, and went and returned to his place: and balak-beat also went his way. vayaqam bil‘am vayelekh vayashab limqomo, vegam balaq halakh ledarko.
wySb ySral bSTym wyxl hem lcnwt al bnwt mwab and israel-juicy-towards abode in shitim-sailing, and the with-mum-people began to prostitute with children-betweenesss of moab-from-father. vayesheb yisra’el bashitim, vayakhel ha‘am liznot ’el benot mo’ab.
wtqran lem lcbxy alhyhn wyakl hem wyStxww lalhyhn and they called the with-mum-people unto the butchers of their to-no-these: and the with-mum-people did eat, and bowed down to their to-no-these. vatiqrena la‘am lezibkhei ’elohehen, vayokhal ha‘am vayishtakhavu lelohehen.
wyzmd ySral lbel pewr wyxr ap yhwh bySral and israel-juicy-towards joined himself unto baalpeor-own-wide-open: and the nose-anger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was kindled against israel-juicy-towards. vayizamed yisra’el leba‘al pe‘or, vayikhar ’af yhvh beyisra’el.
wyamr yhwh al mSh qx at kl raSy hem whwqe awtm lyhwh ngd hSmS wySb xrwn ap yhwh mySral and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, take all the heads of the with-mum-people, and hang them up before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah against the sun, that the fierce nose-anger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah may be turned away from israel-juicy-towards. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh qakh kal rashei ha‘am vehoqa‘ ’otam yhvh neged hashamesh, veyashob kharon ’af yhvh miyisra’el.
wyamr mSh al SpTy ySral hrgw ayS anSyw hnzmdym lbel pewr and mose-extracted said unto the decides of israel-juicy-towards, slay ye every one his men that were joined unto baalpeor-own-wide-open. vayomer mosheh ’el shofetei yisra’el, hirgu ’ish ’anashav hanizmadim leba‘al pe‘or.
whnh ayS mbny ySral ba wyqrb al axyw at hmdynyt leyny mSh wleyny kl edt bny ySral whmh bkym ptx ahl mwed and, behold, one of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards came and inwarded unto his brethren a midian-place-of-discussed-teachingitish woman in the sight of mose-extracted, and in the sight of all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, who were weeping before-turns the opening of the tent of until-conception. vehineh ’ish mibenei yisra’el ba vayaqreb ’el ’ekhav hamidyanit le‘enei mosheh ule‘enei kal ‘adat bene yisra’el, vehemah bokhim petakh ’ohel mo‘ed.
wyra pynxs bn alecr bn ahrn hkhn wyqm mtwk hedh wyqx rmx bydw and when pinehas-mouth-attempt, child-between of eleazar-towards-stop, child-between of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server, saw it, he rose up from inward the until-witness, and took a javelin in his hand; vayar pinekhas ben ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen, vayaqam mitokh ha‘edah vayiqakh romakh beyado.
wyba axr ayS ySral al hqbh wydqr at Snyhm at ayS ySral wat haSh al qbth wtezr hmgph mel bny ySral and he went after the man of israel-juicy-towards into the tent, and thrust both of them through, the man of israel-juicy-towards, and the woman through her nurture-belly. so the plague was stayed from children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayabo ’akhar ’ish yisra’el ’el haqubah vayidqor shenehem ’ish yisra’el ve’et ha’ishah ’el qobatah, vate‘azar hamagefah me‘al benei yisra’el.
wyhyw hmtym bmgph arbeh weSrym alp and those that died in the plague were double-ten-twenty and four thousand. vayihyu hametim bamagefah, ’arba‘ah ve‘esrim ’alef.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
pynxs bn alecr bn ahrn hkhn hSyb at xmty mel bny ySral bqnaw at qnaty btwkm wla klyty at bny ySral bqnaty pinehas-mouth-attempt, child-between of eleazar-towards-stop, child-between of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server, hath turned my wrath away from children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, while he was zealous for my sake among them, that i consumed not children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in my jealousy. pinekhas ben ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen heshib khamati me‘al bene yisra’el beqan’o qin’ati betokham, velo khiliti bene yisra’el beqin’ati.
lkn amr hnny ntn lw at bryty Slwm wherefore say, behold, i give unto him my covenant of peace: lakhen ’emor, hini noten lo beriti shalom.
whyth lw wlcrew axryw bryt khnt ewlm txt aSr qna lalhyw wykpr el bny ySral and he have it, and his seed after him, even the covenant of an everlasting dimmer-serverhood; because he was zealous for his to-no-these, and made an out-of-town-ment for children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vehayetah lo ulezar‘o ’akharav berit kehunat ‘olam, takhat ’asher qinei lelohav vaykhaper ‘al benei yisra’el.
wSm ayS ySral hmkh aSr hkh at hmdynyt cmry bn slwa nSya byt ab lSmeny now the name of the israel-juicy-towardsite that was slain, even that was slain with the midian-place-of-discussed-teachingitish woman, was zimri-my-songster, child-between of salu-basket, a leader of a chief daughter-house among the simeon-hear-homeites. veshem ’ish yisra’el hamukeh ’asher hukah ’et hamidyanit zimri ben salu, nesi bet ’ab lashim‘oni.
wSm haSh hmkh hmdynyt kcby bt zwr raS amwt byt ab bmdyn hwa and the name of the midian-place-of-discussed-teachingitish woman that was slain was cozbi-false, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of zur-flint; he was head over a with-mum-people, and of a chief daughter-house in midian-place-of-discussed-teaching. veshem ha’ishah hamukah hamidyanit kazebi bat zur, rosh ’umot bet ’ab bemidyan hu.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
zrwr at hmdynym whkytm awtm vex the midian-place-of-discussed-teachingites, and hit them: zaror hamidyanim, vehikitem ’otam.
ky zrrym hm lkm bnklyhm aSr nklw lkm el dbr pewr wel dbr kcby bt nSya mdyn axtm hmkh bywm hmgph el dbr pewr wyhy axry hmgph for they vex you with their wiles, wherewith they have beguiled you in the matter of peor, and in the matter of cozbi-false, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of a prince of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching, their sister, which was slain in the day of the plague for peor's sake. ki zorerim hem lakhem benikhlehem ’asher nikelu lakhem ‘al debar pe‘or, ve‘al debar kazebi bat nesi midyan ’akhotam hamukah beyom hamagefah ‘al debar pe‘or. vayhi ’akharei hamagefah,
wyamr yhwh al mSh wal alecr bn ahrn hkhn lamr and it came to pass after the plague, that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted and unto eleazar-towards-stop child-between of aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh ve’el ’el‘azar ben ’aharon hakohen lemor.
Saw at raS kl edt bny ySral mbn eSrym Snh wmelh lbyt abtm kl yza zba bySral take the sum of all the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, throughout their fathers' daughter-house, all that are able to go to troop-cluster in israel-juicy-towards. se’u rosh kal ‘adat bene yisra’el miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah lebet ’abotam, kal yozei zaba beyisra’el.
wydbr mSh walecr hkhn atm berbt mwab el yrdn yrxw lamr and mose-extracted and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server spake with them in the plains of moab-from-father by jordan-its-going-down near jericho-moon-smell, saying, vaydaber mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen ’otam be‘arbot mo’ab, ‘al yarden yerekho lemor.
mbn eSrym Snh wmelh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh wbny ySral hyzaym marz mzrym take the sum of the with-mum-people, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which went forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows. miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘elah, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ubenei yisra’el hayoze’im me’erez mizrayim.
rawbn bkwr ySral bny rawbn xnwk mSpxt hxnky lplwa mSpxt hplay reuben-see-child, the eldest child-between of israel-juicy-towards: children-betweens of reuben-see-child; hanoch-educated, of whom cometh the family of the hanoch-educatedites: of pallu-wonder, the family of the pallu-wonderites: re’uben bekhor yisra’el, benei re’uben khanokh mishpakhat hakhanokhi lefalu mishpakhat hapalu’i.
lxzrn mSpxt hxzrwny lkrmy mSpxt hkrmy of hezron-courtyard, the family of the hezron-courtyardites: of carmi-my-wine-inherityard, the family of the carmi-my-wine-inherityardtes. lekhezron mishpakhat hakhezroni, lekharmi mishpakhat hakarmi.
alh mSpxt hrawbny wyhyw pqdyhm SlSh warbeym alp wSbe mawt wSlSym these are the families of the reuben-see-childites: and they that were numbered of them were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty. ’eleh mishpekhot haru’ubeni, vayihyu fequdehem sheloshah ve’arba‘im ’elef usheba‘ me’ot usheloshim.
wbny plwa alyab and children-betweens of pallu-wonder; elia-my-towardsb-my-towards-dad. ubenei falu ’eli’ab.
wbny alyab nmwal wdtn wabyrm hwa dtn wabyrm qrway qryay hedh aSr hzw el mSh wel ahrn bedt qrx bhztm el yhwh and children-betweens of elia-my-towardsb-my-towards-dad; nemuel, and dathan-their-faith-training, and abiram-my-father-high. this is that dathan-their-faith-training and abiram-my-father-high, which were famous in the until-witness, who strove against mose-extracted and against aaron-cabinet in the company of korah-bald-ice, when they strove to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: ubenei ’eli’ab nemu’el vedatan va’abiram, hu datan va’abiram qeri’ei ha‘edah ’asher hizu ‘al mosheh ve‘al ’aharon ba‘adat qorakh behazotam ‘al yhvh.
