wtptx harz at pyh wtble atm wat qrx bmwt hedh bakl haS at xmSym wmatym ayS wyhyw lns and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up together with korah-bald-ice, when that company died, what time the fire devoured two hundred and fifty men: and they became a sign. vatiftakh ha’arez piha vatibla‘ ’otam ve’et qorakh bemot ha‘edah, ba’akhol ha’esh khamishim umatayim ’ish vayihyu lenes.
wbny qrx la mtw notwithstanding children-betweens of korah-bald-ice died not. ubene qorakh lo metu.

alh pqwdy bny ySral SS mawt alp walp Sbe mawt wSlSym these were the numbered of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, six hundred thousand and a thousand seven hundred and thirty. ’eleh pequdei benei yisra’el shesh me’ot ’elef va’alef, sheba‘ me’ot usheloshim.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
lalh txlq harz bnxlh bmspr Smwt unto these the land be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names. la’eleh tekhaleq ha’arez benakhalah bemispar shemot.
lrb trbh nxltw wlmeT tmeyT nxltw ayS lpy pqdyw ytn nxltw to many thou give the more inheritance, and to few thou give the less inheritance: to every one his inheritance be given according to those that were numbered of him. larab tarbeh nakhalato velam‘at tam‘it nakhalato, ’ish lefi fequdav yutan nakhalato.
ak bgwrl yxlq at harz lSmwt mTwt abtm ynxlw notwithstanding the land be divided by lot-cover: according to the names of the branchs of their fathers they inherit. ’akh begoral yekhaleq ha’arez, lishmot matot ’abotam yinkhalu.
el py hgwrl txlq nxltw byn rb lmeT according to the lot-cover the possession thereof be divided between-bin many and few. ‘al pi hagoral tekhaleq nakhalato, ben rab lim‘at.
walh pqwdy hlwy lmSpxtm lgrSwn mSpxt hgrSny lqht mSpxt hqhty lmrry mSpxt hmrry and these are they that were numbered of the levi-jointes after their families: of gershon-drive-out, the family of the gershon-drive-outites: of kohath-obedient-hope, the family of the kohath-obedient-hopeites: of merari-bitter, the family of the merari-bittertes. ve’eleh fequdei halevi lemishpekhotam legereshon mishpakhat hagereshuni liqhat mishpakhat haqehati, limrari mishpakhat hamerari.
alh mSpxt lwy mSpxt hlbny mSpxt hxbrny mSpxt hmxly mSpxt hmwSy mSpxt hqrxy wqht hwld at emrm these are the families of the levi-jointes: the family of the libni-to-build-my-whitetes, the family of the hebron-friend-joyites, the family of the mahlites-disease-forgive, the family of the mushi-my-drawtes, the family of the korathites-bald-ice. and kohath-obedient-hope begat amram-people-high. ’eleh mishpekhot levi mishpakhat halibni mishpakhat hakhebroni mishpakhat hamakhli mishpakhat hamushi mishpakhat haqarekhi, uqehat holid ‘amram.
wSm aSt emrm ywkbd bt lwy aSr yldh ath llwy bmzrym wtld lemrm at ahrn wat mSh wat mrym axtm and the name of amram-people-high's woman was jochebed-made-heavy, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of levi-join, whom her mother conceived-of to levi-join in mizraim-narrows: and she conceived-of unto amram-people-high aaron-cabinet and mose-extracted, and miriam-rebel-bitter their sister. veshem ’eshet ‘amram yokhebed bat levi ’asher yaledah lelevi bemizrayim, vateled le‘amram ’aharon ve’et mosheh ve’et miryam ’akhotam.
wywld lahrn at ndb wat abyhwa at alecr wat aytmr and unto aaron-cabinet was born nadab-volunteer, and abihu-he-my-pa, eleazar-towards-stop, and itamar-with-palm. vayivaled le’aharon nadab ve’et ’abihu, ’el‘azar ve’et ’itamar.
wymt ndb wabyhwa bhqrybm aS crh lpny yhwh and nadab-volunteer and abihu-he-my-pa died, when they inwarded strange fire before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayamat nadab va’abihu, behaqribam ’esh zarah lifnei yhvh.
wyhyw pqdyhm SlSh weSrym alp kl ckr mbn xdS wmelh ky la htpqdw btwk bny ySral ky la ntn lhm nxlh btwk bny ySral and those that were order-numbered of them were double-ten-twenty and three thousand, all rememberers from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, because there was no inheritance given them among children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayihyu fequdehem sheloshah ve‘esrim ’elef kal zakhar miben khodesh vama‘elah, ki lo hatepaqedu betokh benei yisra’el ki lo nitan lahem nakhalah betokh benei yisra’el.
alh pqwdy mSh walecr hkhn aSr pqdw at bny ySral berbt mwab el yrdn yrxw these are they that were numbered by mose-extracted and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, who numbered children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in the plains of moab-from-father by jordan-its-going-down near jericho-moon-smell. ’eleh pequdei mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen, ’asher paqedu benei yisra’el be‘arbot mo’ab ‘al yarden yerekho.
wbalh la hyh ayS mpqwdy mSh wahrn hkhn aSr pqdw at bny ySral bmdbr syny and among these there was not a man of them whom mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server numbered, when they numbered children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto. ube’eleh lo hayah ’ish mipequdei mosheh ve’aharon hakohen, ’asher paqedu benei yisra’el bemidbar sinay.
ky amr yhwh lhm mwt ymtw bmdbr wla nwtr mhm ayS ky am klb bn ypnh wyhwSe bn nwn for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had said of them, they surely die in the place-of-word-desert. and there was not left a man of them, save caleb-as-heart-dog child-between of jephuneh-turn, and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish. ki ’amar yhvh lahem mot yamutu bamidbar, velo notar mehem ’ish ki ’im kaleb ben yefuneh vihoshua‘ bin nun.
wtqrbnh bnwt zlpxd bn xpr bn gled bn mkyr bn mnSh lmSpxt mnSh bn ywsp walh Smwt bntyw mxlh neh wxglh wmlkh wtrzh then came children-betweenesss of zelophehad-whip-sharp, child-between of hepher-dig-spy, child-between of gilead-roll-until-heap, child-between of machi-of-beatr-recognize, child-between of manasseh-place-of-sleep, of the families of manasseh-place-of-sleep child-between of joseph-add: and these are the names of his children-betweenesss; mahlah-illness, noah-rest, and hoglah-partridge, and milcah-queen, and tirzah-want-placate-solve. vatiqrabnah benot zelafekhad ben khefer ben gil‘ad ben makhir ben menasheh lemishpekhot menasheh ben yosef, ve’eleh shemot benotav makhlah no‘ah vekhagelah umilkah vetirzah.
wtemdnh lpny mSh wlpny alecr hkhn wlpny hnSyam wkl hedh ptx ahl mwed lamr and they stood before-turns mose-extracted, and before-turns eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, and before-turns the princes and all the until-witness, by the opening of the tent of until-conception, saying, vata‘amodenah lifnei mosheh velifnei ’el‘azar hakohen velifnei hanesi’im vekhal ha‘edah, petakh ’ohel mo‘ed lemor.
abynw mt bmdbr whwa la hyh btwk hedh hnwedym el yhwh bedt qrx ky bxTaw mt wbnym la hyw lw our father died in the place-of-word-desert, and he was not in the company of them that added themselves together to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in the company of korah-bald-ice; and died in his own miss, and had no children-betweens. ’abinu met bamidbar vehu lo hayah betokh ha‘edah hano‘adim ‘al yhvh ba‘adat qorakh, ki bekhet’o met ubanim lo hayu lo.
lmh ygre Sm abynw mtwk mSpxtw ky ayn lw bn tnh lnw axch btwk axy abynw why should the name of our father be done away from inward his family, because he hath no child-between? give unto us therefore a possession among the brethren of our father. lamah yigara‘ shem ’abinu mitokh mishpakhto ki ’en lo ben, tenah lanu ’akhuzah betokh ’akhei ’abinu.
wyqrb mSh at mSpTn lpny yhwh and mose-extracted brought their cause before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayaqreb mosheh mishpatan lifnei yhvh.

kn bnwt zlpxd dbrt ntn ttn lhm axct nxlh btwk axy abyhm whebrt at nxlt abyhn lhn children-betweenesss of zelophehad-whip-sharp speak right: thou surely give them a possession of an inheritance among their father's brethren; and thou cause the inheritance of their father to pass unto them. ken benot zelafekhad doberot naton titen lahem ’akhuzat nakhalah betokh ’akhei ’abihem, veha‘abarta nakhalat ’abihen lahen.

wam ayn lw axym wnttm at nxltw laxy abyw and if he have no brethren, then ye give his inheritance unto his father's brethren. ve’im ’en lo ’akhim, unetatem nakhalato la’akhei ’abiv.
wam ayn axym labyw wnttm at nxltw lSarw hqrb alyw mmSpxtw wyrS ath whyth lbny ySral lxqt mSpT kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and if his father have no brethren, then ye give his inheritance unto his kinsman that is next to him of his family, and he possess it: and it be unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards a statute of decision-grammar, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. ve’im ’en ’akhim le’abiv unetatem nakhalato lish’ero haqarob ’elav mimishpakhto veyarash ’otah, vehayetah libnei yisra’el lekhuqat mishpat ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.

aSr yza lpnyhm waSr yba lpnyhm waSr ywzyam waSr ybyam wla thyh edt yhwh kzan aSr ayn lhm reh which may go out before-turns them, and which may go in before-turns them, and which may lead them out, and which may bring them in; that the until-witness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah be not as sheep which have no shepherd. ’asher yezei lifnehem va’asher yabo lifnehem va’asher yozi’em va’asher yebi’em, velo tihyeh ‘adat yhvh kazon ’asher ’en lahem ro‘eh.

at hkbS axd teSh bbqr wat hkbS hSny teSh byn herbym the one lamb thou inward in the morning, and the other lamb thou inward at even; hakebes ’ekhad ta‘aseh baboqer, ve’et hakebes hasheni ta‘aseh ben ha‘arbayim.

wnskyhm xzy hhyn yhyh lpr wSlySt hhyn layl wrbyet hhyn lkbS yyn cat elt xdS bxdSw lxdSy hSnh and their pourings be half an here-hin of wine-inherit unto a bull, and the third part of an here-hin unto a ram-voiceless, and a fourth part of an here-hin unto a lamb: this is the on-up of every month throughout the months of the year. veniskehem khazi hahin yihyeh lapar ushelishit hahin la’ayil urebi‘it hahin lakebes yayin, zot ‘olat khodesh bekhadesho lekhadeshei hashanah.

whqrbtm aSh elh lyhwh prym bny bqr Snym wayl axd wSbeh kbSym bny Snh tmymm yhyw lkm and ye inward a butcher made by fire for a on-up unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; two bull child-between of visit-cattles, and one ram-voiceless, and seven lambs of the first year: they be unto you simple: vehiqrabtem ’isheh ‘olah yhvh parim bene baqar shenayim ve’ayil ’ekhad, veshib‘ah khebasim benei shanah temimim yihyu lakhem.

wbeSwr lxdS hSbyey hch mqra qdS yhyh lkm wenytm at npStykm kl mlakh la teSw and ye have on the tenth day of this seventh month an dedicated-finished convocation; and ye pauper your beings: ye not do any work therein: ube‘asor lakhodesh hashebi‘i hazeh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem ve‘initem nafshotekhem, kal melakhah lo ta‘asu.
whqrbtm elh lyhwh ryx nyxx pr bn bqr axd ayl axd kbSym bny Snh Sbeh tmymm yhyw lkm and ye inward a on-up unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah for a smell fragrance; one bull child-between of visit-cattle, one ram-voiceless, and seven lambs of the first year; they be unto you simple: vehiqrabtem ‘olah yhvh reakh nikhoakh par ben baqar ’ekhad ’ayil ’ekhad, kebasim bene shanah shib‘ah temimim yihyu lakhem.
wmnxtm slt blwlh bSmn SlSh eSrnym lpr Sny eSrnym layl haxd and their absorber be of basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil, three tenth deals to a bull, and two tenth deals to one ram-voiceless, uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen, sheloshah ‘esronim lapar shenei ‘esronim la’ayil ha’ekhad.
eSrwn eSrwn lkbS haxd lSbet hkbSym a several tenth deal for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs: ‘isaron ‘isaron lakebes ha’ekhad, leshib‘at hakebasim.
Seyr ecym axd xTat mlbd xTat hkprym welt htmyd wmnxth wnskyhm one kid of the intense-goats for a miss; beside the miss of out-of-town-ment, and the continual on-up, and the absorber of it, and their pourings. se‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad khatat, milebad khatat hakipurim ve‘olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskehem.
wbxmSh eSr ywm lxdS hSbyey mqra qdS yhyh lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSw wxgtm xg lyhwh Sbet ymym and on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye have an dedicated-finished convocation; ye do no servile work, and ye keep a until-conception unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah seven days: ubakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh hashebi‘i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu, vekhagotem khag yhvh shib‘at yamim.
whqrbtm elh aSh ryx nyxx lyhwh prym bny bqr SlSh eSr aylm Snym kbSym bny Snh arbeh eSr tmymm yhyw and ye inward a on-up, a butcher made by fire, of a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; thirteen bull child-between of visit-cattles, two ram-voicelesss, and fourteen lambs of the first year; they be simple: vehiqrabtem ‘olah ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh parim bene baqar sheloshah ‘asar ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim yihyu.
wmnxtm slt blwlh bSmn SlSh eSrnym lpr haxd lSlSh eSr prym Sny eSrnym layl haxd lSny haylm and their absorber be of basket-flour mingled with name-from-oil, three tenth deals unto every bull of the thirteen bulls, two tenth deals to each ram-voiceless of the two ram-voicelesss, uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen, sheloshah ‘esronim lapar ha’ekhad lishloshah ‘asar parim shenei ‘esronim la’ayil ha’ekhad lishnei ha’elim.
weSrwn eSrwn lkbS haxd larbeh eSr kbSym and a several tenth deal to each lamb of the fourteen lambs: ve‘isaron ‘isaron lakebes ha’ekhad, le’arba‘ah ‘asar kebasim.
wSeyr ecym axd xTat mlbd elt htmyd mnxth wnskh and one kid of the intense-goats for a miss; beside the continual on-up, his absorber, and his pouring. use‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad khatat, milebad ‘olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah.
wbywm hSny prym bny bqr Snym eSr aylm Snym kbSym bny Snh arbeh eSr tmymm and on the second day ye inward twelve bull child-between of visit-cattles, two ram-voicelesss, fourteen lambs of the first year without spot: ubayom hasheni parim bene baqar shenem ‘asar ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim.
wmnxtm wnskyhm lprym laylm wlkbSym bmsprm kmSpT and their absorber and their pourings for the bulls, for the ram-voicelesss, and for the lambs, be according to their number, after the manner: uminkhatam veniskehem laparim la’elim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat.
wSeyr ecym axd xTat mlbd elt htmyd wmnxth wnskyhm and one kid of the intense-goats for a miss; beside the continual on-up, and the absorber thereof, and their pourings. use‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad khatat, milebad ‘olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskehem.
wbywm hSlySy prym eSty eSr aylm Snym kbSym bny Snh arbeh eSr tmymm and on the third day eleven bulls, two ram-voicelesss, fourteen lambs of the first year simple; ubayom hashelishi parim ‘ashte ‘asar ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim.
wmnxtm wnskyhm lprym laylm wlkbSym bmsprm kmSpT and their absorber and their pourings for the bulls, for the ram-voicelesss, and for the lambs, be according to their number, after the manner: uminkhatam veniskehem laparim la’elim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat.
wSeyr xTat axd mlbd elt htmyd wmnxth wnskh and one intense-goat for a miss; beside the continual on-up, and his absorber, and his pouring. use‘ir khatat ’ekhad, milebad ‘olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah.
wbywm hrbyey prym eSrh aylm Snym kbSym bny Snh arbeh eSr tmymm and on the fourth day ten bulls, two ram-voicelesss, and fourteen lambs of the first year simple: ubayom harebi‘i parim ‘asarah ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim.
mnxtm wnskyhm lprym laylm wlkbSym bmsprm kmSpT their absorber and their pourings for the bulls, for the ram-voicelesss, and for the lambs, be according to their number, after the manner: minkhatam veniskehem laparim la’elim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat.
wSeyr ecym axd xTat mlbd elt htmyd mnxth wnskh and one kid of the intense-goats for a miss; beside the continual on-up, his absorber, and his pouring. use‘ir ‘izim ’ekhad khatat, milebad ‘olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah.
wbywm hxmySy prym tSeh aylm Snym kbSym bny Snh arbeh eSr tmymm and on the fifth day nine bulls, two ram-voicelesss, and fourteen lambs of the first year without spot: ubayom hakhamishi parim tish‘ah ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim.
wmnxtm wnskyhm lprym laylm wlkbSym bmsprm kmSpT and their absorber and their pourings for the bulls, for the ram-voicelesss, and for the lambs, be according to their number, after the manner: uminkhatam veniskehem laparim la’elim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat.
wSeyr xTat axd mlbd elt htmyd wmnxth wnskh and one intense-goat for a miss; beside the continual on-up, and his absorber, and his pouring. use‘ir khatat ’ekhad, milebad ‘olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah.
wbywm hSSy prym Smnh aylm Snym kbSym bny Snh arbeh eSr tmymm and on the sixth day eight bulls, two ram-voicelesss, and fourteen lambs of the first year simple: ubayom hashishi parim shemonah ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim.
wmnxtm wnskyhm lprym laylm wlkbSym bmsprm kmSpT and their absorber and their pourings for the bulls, for the ram-voicelesss, and for the lambs, be according to their number, after the manner: uminkhatam veniskehem laparim la’elim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat.
wSeyr xTat axd mlbd elt htmyd mnxth wnskyh and one intense-goat for a miss; beside the continual on-up, his absorber, and his pouring. use‘ir khatat ’ekhad, milebad ‘olat hatamid minkhatah unesakheha.
wbywm hSbyey prym Sbeh aylm Snym kbSym bny Snh arbeh eSr tmymm and on the seventh day seven bulls, two ram-voicelesss, and fourteen lambs of the first year simple: ubayom hashebi‘i parim shib‘ah ’elim shenayim, kebasim bene shanah ’arba‘ah ‘asar temimim.
wmnxtm wnskhm lprym laylm wlkbSym bmsprm kmSpTm and their absorber and their pourings for the bulls, for the ram-voicelesss, and for the lambs, be according to their number, after the manner: uminkhatam veniskehem laparim la’elim velakebasim bemisparam kemishpatam.
wSeyr xTat axd mlbd elt htmyd mnxth wnskh and one intense-goat for a miss; beside the continual on-up, his absorber, and his pouring. use‘ir khatat ’ekhad, milebad ‘olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah.
bywm hSmyny ezrt thyh lkm kl mlakt ebdh la teSw on the eighth day ye have a solemn assembly: ye do no servile work therein: bayom hashemini ‘azeret tihyeh lakhem, kal melekhet ‘abodah lo ta‘asu.
whqrbtm elh aSh ryx nyxx lyhwh pr axd ayl axd kbSym bny Snh Sbeh tmymm and ye inward a on-up, a butcher made by fire, of a smell fragrance unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: one bull, one ram-voiceless, seven lambs of the first year simple: vehiqrabtem ‘olah ’isheh reakh nikhoakh yhvh par ’ekhad ’ayil ’ekhad, kebasim bene shanah shib‘ah temimim.
mnxtm wnskyhm lpr layl wlkbSym bmsprm kmSpT their absorber and their pourings for the bull, for the ram-voiceless, and for the lambs, be according to their number, after the manner: minkhatam veniskehem lapar la’ayil velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat.
wSeyr xTat axd mlbd elt htmyd wmnxth wnskh and one intense-goat for a miss; beside the continual on-up, and his absorber, and his pouring. use‘ir khatat ’ekhad, milebad ‘olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah.
alh teSw lyhwh bmwedykm lbd mndrykm wndbtykm leltykm wlmnxtykm wlnskykm wlSlmykm these things ye do unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in your set until-conceptions, beside your vows, and your volunteers, for your on-ups, and for your absorbers, and for your pourings, and for your wholes. ’eleh ta‘asu yhvh bemo‘adekhem, lebad minidrekhem venidbotekhem le‘olotekhem uleminkhotekhem uleniskekhem uleshalmekhem.
wyamr mSh al bny ySral kkl aSr zwh yhwh at mSh and mose-extracted told children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards according to all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayomer mosheh ’el benei yisra’el, kekhol ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wydbr mSh al raSy hmTwt lbny ySral lamr ch hdbr aSr zwh yhwh and mose-extracted spake unto the heads of the branchs concerning children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, this is the thing which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath direct. vaydaber mosheh ’el rashei hamatot libnei yisra’el lemor, zeh hadabar ’asher zivah yhvh.
ayS ky ydr ndr lyhwh aw hSbe Sbeh lasr asr el npSw la yxl dbrw kkl hyza mpyw yeSh if a man vow a vow unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, or swear an toward-oath to bind his being with a bond; he not break his bee-word, he do according to all that proceedeth out of his mouth. ’ish ki yidor neder yhvh ’o hishaba‘ shebu‘ah le’sor ’isar ‘al nafsho lo yakhel debaro, kekhal hayozei mipiv ya‘aseh.
waSh ky tdr ndr lyhwh wasrh asr bbyt abyh bneryh if a woman also vow a vow unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and bind herself by a bond, being in her father's daughter-house in her youth; ve’ishah ki tidor neder yhvh, ve’aserah ’isar bebet ’abiha bin‘ureha.
wSme abyh at ndrh wasrh aSr asrh el npSh whxryS lh abyh wqmw kl ndryh wkl asr aSr asrh el npSh yqwm and her father hear her vow, and her bond wherewith she hath bound her being, and her father hold his peace at her; then all her vows stand, and every bond wherewith she hath bound her being stand. veshama‘ ’abiha nidrah ve’esarah ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah vehekherish lah ’abiha, veqamu kal nedareha vekhal ’isar ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqum.
wam hnya abyh ath bywm Smew kl ndryh wasryh aSr asrh el npSh la yqwm wyhwh yslx lh ky hnya abyh ath and if her father disallow her in the day that he heareth; not any of her vows, or of her bonds wherewith she hath bound her being, stand: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah forgive her, because her father disallowed her. ve’im heni ’abiha ’otah beyom shame‘o kal nedareha ve’esareha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah lo yaqum, yhvh yislakh lah ki heni ’abiha ’otah.
wam hyw thyh layS wndryh elyh aw mbTa Sptyh aSr asrh el npSh and if she had at all an man, when she vowed, or uttered ought out of her lips, wherewith she bound her being; ve’im hayo tihyeh le’ish unedareha ‘aleha, ’o mibta sefateha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah.
wSme aySh bywm Smew whxryS lh wqmw ndryh wasrh aSr asrh el npSh yqmw and her man heard it, and held his peace at her in the day that he heard it: then her vows stand, and her bonds wherewith she bound her being stand. veshama‘ ’ishah beyom shame‘o vehekherish lah, veqamu nedareha ve’esareha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqumu.
wam bywm Sme aySh ynya awth whpr at ndrh aSr elyh wat mbTa Sptyh aSr asrh el npSh wyhwh yslx lh and if her man disallowed her on the day that he heard it; then he make her vow which she vowed, and that which she uttered with her lips, wherewith she bound her being, of none effect: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah forgive her. ve’im beyom shemoa‘ ’ishah yani ’otah vehefer nidrah ’asher ‘aleha ve’et mibta sefateha ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah, yhvh yislakh lah.
wndr almnh wgrwSh kl aSr asrh el npSh yqwm elyh and every vow of a widow, and of her that is divorced, wherewith they have bound their beings, stand against her. veneder ’almanah ugerushah, kol ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqum ‘aleha.
wam byt aySh ndrh aw asrh asr el npSh bSbeh and if she vowed in her man's daughter-house, or bound her being by a bond with an toward-oath; ve’im bet ’ishah nadarah, ’o ’aserah ’isar ‘al nafshah bishbu‘ah.
wSme aySh whxrS lh la hnya ath wqmw kl ndryh wkl asr aSr asrh el npSh yqwm and her man heard it, and held his peace at her, and disallowed her not: then all her vows stand, and every bond wherewith she bound her being stand. veshama‘ ’ishah vehekherish lah lo heni ’otah, veqamu kal nedareha vekhal ’isar ’asher ’aserah ‘al nafshah yaqum.
wam hpr ypr atm aySh bywm Smew kl mwza Sptyh lndryh wlasr npSh la yqwm aySh hprm wyhwh yslx lh and if her man hath utterly made them void on the day he heard them; then whatsoever proceeded out of her lips concerning her vows, or concerning the bond of her being, not stand: her man hath made them void; and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah forgive her. ve’im hafer yafer ’otam ’ishah beyom shame‘o kal moza sefateha lindareha ule’isar nafshah lo yaqum, ’ishah haferam yhvh yislakh lah.
kl ndr wkl Sbet asr lent npS aySh yqymnw waySh yprnw every vow, and every binding toward-oath to afflict the being, her man may establish it, or her man may make it void. kal neder vekhal shebu‘at ’isar le‘anot nafesh, ’ishah yeqimenu ve’ishah yeferenu.
wam hxrS yxryS lh aySh mywm al ywm whqym at kl ndryh aw at kl asryh aSr elyh hqym atm ky hxrS lh bywm Smew and if her man altogether hold his peace at her from day to day; then he establisheth all her vows, or all her bonds, which are upon her: he confirmeth them, because he held his peace at her in the day that he heard them. ve’im hakharesh yakharish lah ’ishah miyom ’el yom veheqim kal nedareha ’o kal ’esareha ’asher ‘aleha, heqim ’otam ki hekherish lah beyom shame‘o.
wam hpr ypr atm axry Smew wnSa at ewnh and if he any ways make them void after that he hath heard them; then he bear her torment. ve’im hafer yafer ’otam ’akharei shame‘o, venasa ‘avonah.
alh hxqym aSr zwh yhwh at mSh byn ayS laStw byn ab lbtw bneryh byt abyh these are the statutes, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted, between-bin a man and his woman, between-bin the father and his daughter-hoof-bat-child, being yet in her youth in her father's daughter-house. ’eleh hakhuqim ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh ben ’ish le’ishto, ben ’ab lebito bin‘ureha bet ’abiha.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
nqm nqmt bny ySral mat hmdynym axr tasp al emyk avenge children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards of the midian-place-of-discussed-teachingites: afterward thou be added unto thy with-mum-people. neqom niqmat benei yisra’el me’et hamidyanim, ’akhar te’asef ’el ‘amekha.
wydbr mSh al hem lamr hxlzw matkm anSym lzba wyhyw el mdyn ltt nqmt yhwh bmdyn and mose-extracted spake unto the with-mum-people, saying, arm some of yourselves unto the troop-cluster, and let them go against the midian-place-of-discussed-teachingites, and avenge yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching. vaydaber mosheh ’el ha‘am lemor hekhalezu me’itekhem ’anashim lazaba, veyihyu ‘al midyan latet niqmat yhvh bemidyan.
alp lmTh alp lmTh lkl mTwt ySral tSlxw lzba of every branch a thousand, throughout all the branchs of israel-juicy-towards, ye send to the troop-cluster. ’elef lamateh ’elef lamateh, lekhol matot yisra’el tishlekhu lazaba.
wymsrw malpy ySral alp lmTh Snym eSr alp xlwzy zba so there were delivered out of the thousands of israel-juicy-towards, a thousand of every branch, twelve thousand armed for troop-cluster. vayimaseru me’alfei yisra’el ’elef lamateh, shenem ‘asar ’elef khaluzei zaba.
wySlx atm mSh alp lmTh lzba atm wat pynxs bn alecr hkhn lzba wkly hqdS wxzzrwt htrweh bydw and mose-extracted sent them to the troop-cluster, a thousand of every branch, them and pinehas-mouth-attempt child-between of eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, to the troop-cluster, with the dedicated-finished instruments, and the mouthpiece-trumpets to blow in his hand. vayishlakh ’otam mosheh ’elef lamateh lazaba, ’otam ve’et pinekhas ben ’el‘azar hakohen lazaba ukhelei haqodesh vakhazozerot hateru‘ah beyado.
wyzbaw el mdyn kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh wyhrgw kl ckr and they troop-clusterred against the midian-place-of-discussed-teachingites, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted; and they slew all the rememberers. vayizbe’u ‘al midyan ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh, vayahargu kal zakhar.
wat mlky mdyn hrgw el xllyhm at awy wat rqm wat zwr wat xwr wat rbe xmSt mlky mdyn wat blem bn bewr hrgw bxrb and they slew the king-molochs of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching, beside the rest of them that were slain; namely, evi-my-desire, and rekem-weave, and zur-flint, and hur-small-place-prince, and reba-one-fourth-great-grandson, five king-molochs of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching: baalam-swallow also child-between of beor-in-the-skin they slew with the sword. ve’et malkhei midyan haregu ‘al khalehem ’evi ve’et reqem ve’et zur ve’et khur ve’et reba‘ khameshet malkhei midyan, ve’et bil‘am ben be‘or haregu bekhareb.
wySbw bny ySral at nSy mdyn wat Tpm wat kl bhmtm wat kl mqnhm wat kl xylm bccw and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards took all the women of midian-place-of-discussed-teaching captives, and their little ones, and took the spoil of all their in-them-animal, and all their flocks, and all their goods. vayishbu bene yisra’el neshei midyan ve’et tapam, ve’et kal behemtam ve’et kal miqnehem ve’et kal khelam bazazu.
wat kl eryhm bmwSbtm wat kl Tyrtm Srpw baS and they burnt all their cities wherein they dwelt, and all their goodly castles, with fire. ve’et kal ‘arehem bemoshebotam ve’et kal tirotam, sarefu ba’esh.
wyqxw at kl hSll wat kl hmlqwx badm wbbhmh and they took all the spoil, and all the prey, both of men and of beasts. vayiqkhu kal hashalal ve’et kal hamalqoakh, ba’adam ubabehemah.
wybaw al mSh wal alecr hkhn wal edt bny ySral at hSby wat hmlqwx wat hSll al hmxnh al erbt mwab aSr el yrdn yrxw and they brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil, unto mose-extracted, and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, and unto the until-witness of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, unto the camp at the plains of moab-from-father, which are by jordan-its-going-down near jericho-moon-smell. vayabi’u ’el mosheh ve’el ’el‘azar hakohen ve’el ‘adat bene yisra’el hashebi ve’et hamalqoakh ve’et hashalal ’el hamakhaneh, ’el ‘arbot mo’ab ’asher ‘al yarden yerekho.
wyzaw mSh walecr hkhn wkl nSyay hedh lqratm al mxwz lmxnh and mose-extracted, and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, and all the princes of the until-witness, went forth to until-witness them without the camp. vayeze’u mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen vekhal nesi’ei ha‘edah liqratam, ’el mikhuz lamakhaneh.
wyqzp mSh el pqwdy hxyl Sry halpym wSry hmawt hbaym mzba hmlxmh and mose-extracted was wroth with the officers of the troop-cluster, with the captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, which came from the battle. vayiqzof mosheh ‘al pequdei hekhayil, sarei ha’alafim vesarei hame’ot haba’im mizeba hamilkhamah.
wyamr alyhm mSh hxyytm kl nqbh and mose-extracted said unto them, have ye saved all the women alive? vayomer ’alehem mosheh, hakhiyitem kal neqebah.
hn hnh hyw lbny ySral bdbr blem lmsr mel byhwh el dbr pewr wthy hmgph bedt yhwh behold, these caused children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, through the counsel of baalam-swallow, to commit fire-name to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah in the matter of peor, and there was a plague among the until-witness of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. hen henah hayu libnei yisra’el bidbar bil‘am limsar ma‘al yhvh ‘al debar pe‘or, vatehi hamagefah ba‘adat yhvh.
weth hrgw kl ckr bTp wkl aSh ydet ayS lmSkb ckr hrgw now therefore kill every rememberer among the little ones, and kill every woman that hath hand-known man by lying with him. ve‘atah hirgu khal zakhar bataf, vekhal ’ishah yoda‘at ’ish lemishkab zakhar harogu.
wkl hTp bnSym aSr la ydew mSkb ckr hxyw lkm and all the women children-betweens, that have not hand-known a man by lying with him, keep alive for yourselves. vekhol hataf banashim ’asher lo yade‘u mishkab zakhar, hakhayu lakhem.
watm xnw mxwz lmxnh Sbet ymym kl hrg npS wkl nge bxll ttxTaw bywm hSlySy wbywm hSbyey atm wSbykm and do ye abide without the camp seven days: whosoever hath killed any person, and whosoever hath touched any slain, purify both yourselves and your captives on the third day, and on the seventh day. ve’atem khanu mikhuz lamakhaneh shib‘at yamim, kol horeg nefesh vekhol nogea‘ bekhalal titkhate’u bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi‘i ’atem ushebikhem.
wkl bgd wkl kly ewr wkl meSh ecym wkl kly ez ttxTaw and purify all your raiment, and all that is made of light-skins, and all work of intense-goats' gate-hair, and all things made of wood. vekhal beged vekhal keli ‘or vekhal ma‘aseh ‘izim vekhal ‘ez, titkhata’u.
wyamr alecr hkhn al anSy hzba hbaym lmlxmh cat xqt htwrh aSr zwh yhwh at mSh and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server said unto the men of troop-cluster which went to the battle, this is the ordinance of the teaching which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted; vayomer ’el‘azar hakohen ’el ’anshei hazaba haba’im lamilkhamah, zot khuqat hatorah ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
ak at hchb wat hksp at hnxSt at hbrcl at hbdyl wat heprt only the gold, and the silver, the brass, the iron, the tin, and the lead, ’akh hazahab ve’et hakasef, hanekhoshet habarzel habedil ve’et ha‘ofaret.
kl dbr aSr yba baS tebyrw baS wThr ak bmy ndh ytxTa wkl aSr la yba baS tebyrw bmym every thing that may abide the fire, ye make it go through the fire, and it be bright-climaxing: nevertheless it be purified with the from-waters of separation: and all that abideth not the fire ye make go through the from-waters. kal dabar ’asher yabo ba’esh ta‘abiru ba’esh vetaher ’akh bemei nidah yitkhata, vekhol ’asher lo yabo ba’esh ta‘abiru bamayim.
wkbstm bgdykm bywm hSbyey wThrtm waxr tbaw al hmxnh and ye wash your clothes on the seventh day, and ye be bright-climaxing, and afterward ye come into the camp. vekhibastem bigdekhem bayom hashebi‘i utehartem, ve’akhar tabo’u ’el hamakhaneh.
wyamr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
Sa at raS mlqwx hSby badm wbbhmh ath walecr hkhn wraSy abwt hedh take the sum of the prey that was taken, both of man and of beast, thou, and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, and the chief fathers of the until-witness: sa rosh malqoakh hashebi ba’adam ubabehemah, ’atah ve’el‘azar hakohen verashei ’abot ha‘edah.
wxzyt at hmlqwx byn tpSy hmlxmh hyzaym lzba wbyn kl hedh and divide the prey into two parts; between-bin them that took the war upon them, who went out to battle, and between-bin all the until-witness: vekhazita hamalqoakh ben tofesei hamilkhamah hayoze’im lazaba, uben kal ha‘edah.
whrmt mks lyhwh mat anSy hmlxmh hyzaym lzba axd npS mxmS hmawt mn hadm wmn hbqr wmn hxmrym wmn hzan and levy a tribute unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah of the men of troop-cluster which went out to battle: one being of five hundred, both of the persons, and of the beeves, and of the asses, and of the sheep: vaharemota mekhes yhvh me’et ’anshei hamilkhamah hayoze’im lazaba ’ekhad nefesh mekhamesh hame’ot, min ha’adam umin habaqar umin hakhamorim umin hazon.
mmxzytm tqxw wntth lalecr hkhn trwmt yhwh take it of their half, and give it unto eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, for an raise-rum of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. mimakhazitam tiqakhu, venatatah le’el‘azar hakohen terumat yhvh.
wmmxzt bny ySral tqx axd axc mn hxmSym mn hadm mn hbqr mn hxmrym wmn hzan mkl hbhmh wntth atm llwym Smry mSmrt mSkn yhwh and of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards's half, thou take one portion of fifty, of the beings of man, of the beeves, of the asses, and of the flocks, of all manner of beasts, and give them unto the levi-jointes, which keep the charge of the dwelling of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. umimakhazit bene yisra’el tiqakh ’ekhad ’akhuz min hakhamishim min ha’adam min habaqar min hakhamorim umin hazon mikal habehemah, venatatah ’otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan yhvh.
wyeS mSh walecr hkhn kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and mose-extracted and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vaya‘as mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen, ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyhy hmlqwx ytr hbc aSr bccw em hzba zan SS mawt alp wSbeym alp wxmSt alpym and the booty, being the rest of the prey which the men of troop-cluster had caught, was six hundred thousand and seventy thousand and five thousand sheep, vayhi hamalqoakh yeter habaz ’asher bazezu ‘am hazaba, zon shesh me’ot ’elef veshib‘im ’elef vakhameshet ’alafim
wbqr Snym wSbeym alp and threescore and twelve thousand beeves, ubaqar shenayim veshib‘im ’alef.
wxmrym axd wSSym alp and threescore and one thousand asses, vakhamorim ’ekhad veshishim ’alef.
wnpS adm mn hnSym aSr la ydew mSkb ckr kl npS Snym wSlSym alp and thirty and two thousand beings of man in all, of women that had not hand-known remember-man by lying with him. venefesh ’adam min hanashim ’asher lo yade‘u mishkab zakhar, kal nefesh shenayim usheloshim ’alef.
wthy hmxzh xlq hyzaym bzba mspr hzan SlS mawt alp wSlSym alp wSbet alpym wxmS mawt and the half, which was the portion of them that went out to troop-cluster, was in number three hundred thousand and seven and thirty thousand and five hundred sheep: vatehi hamekhezah kheleq hayoze’im bazaba, mispar hazon shelosh me’ot ’elef usheloshim ’elef veshib‘at ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot.
wyhy hmks lyhwh mn hzan SS mawt xmS wSbeym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's tribute of the sheep was six hundred and threescore and fifteen. vayhi hamekhes yhvh min hazon, shesh me’ot khamesh veshib‘im.
whbqr SSh wSlSym alp wmksm lyhwh Snym wSbeym and the beeves were thirty and six thousand; of which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's tribute was threescore and twelve. vehabaqar shishah usheloshim ’alef, umikhsam yhvh shenayim veshib‘im.
wxmrym SlSym alp wxmS mawt wmksm lyhwh axd wSSym and the asses were thirty thousand and five hundred; of which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's tribute was threescore and one. vakhamorim sheloshim ’elef vakhamesh me’ot, umikhsam yhvh ’ekhad veshishim.
wnpS adm SSh eSr alp wmksm lyhwh Snym wSlSym npS and the beings of man were sixteen thousand; of which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's tribute was thirty and two beings of man. venefesh ’adam shishah ‘asar ’alef, umikhsam yhvh shenayim usheloshim nafesh.

wthy mxzt hedh mn hzan SlS mawt alp wSlSym alp Sbet alpym wxmS mawt (now the half that pertained unto the until-witness was three hundred thousand and thirty thousand and seven thousand and five hundred sheep, vatehi mekhezat ha‘edah min hazon, shelosh me’ot ’elef usheloshim ’elef shib‘at ’alafim vakhamesh me’ot.

wyqx mSh mmxzt bny ySral at haxc axd mn hxmSym mn hadm wmn hbhmh wytn atm llwym Smry mSmrt mSkn yhwh kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh even of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards's half, mose-extracted took one portion of fifty, both of man and of beast, and gave them unto the levi-jointes, which kept the charge of the dwelling of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vayiqakh mosheh mimakhazit bene yisra’el ha’akhuz ’ekhad min hakhamishim min ha’adam umin habehemah, vayiten ’otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan yhvh ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wyqrbw al mSh hpqdym aSr lalpy hzba Sry halpym wSry hmawt and the officers which were over thousands of the troop-cluster, the prince-soakeds of thousands, and prince-soakeds of hundreds, came near unto mose-extracted: vayiqrebu ’el mosheh hapequdim ’asher le’alfei hazaba, sarei ha’alafim vesarei hame’ot.
wyamrw al mSh ebdyk nSaw at raS anSy hmlxmh aSr bydnw wla npqd mmnw ayS and they said unto mose-extracted, thy workers have taken the sum of the men of war which are under our charge, and there lacketh not one man of us. vayomeru ’el mosheh ‘abadekha nase’u rosh ’anshei hamilkhamah ’asher beyadenu, velo nifqad mimenu ’ish.
wnqrb at qrbn yhwh ayS aSr mza kly chb azedh wzmyd Tbet egyl wkwmc lkpr el npStynw lpny yhwh we have therefore brought an inward for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, what every man hath gotten, of jewels of gold, chains, and bracelets, rings, earrings, and tablets, to make an out-of-town-ment for our beings before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vanaqreb qareban yhvh ’ish ’asher maza kheli zahab ’ez‘adah vezamid taba‘at ‘agil vekhumaz, lekhaper ‘al nafshotenu lifnei yhvh.
wyqx mSh walecr hkhn at hchb matm kl kly meSh and mose-extracted and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server took the gold of them, even all wrought jewels. vayiqakh mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen hazahab me’itam, kol keli ma‘aseh.
wyhy kl chb htrwmh aSr hrymw lyhwh SSh eSr alp Sbe mawt wxmSym Sql mat Sry halpym wmat Sry hmawt and all the gold of the inward that they inwarded up to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, of the captains of thousands, and of the captains of hundreds, was sixteen thousand seven hundred and fifty shekel-lights. vayhi kal zehab haterumah ’asher herimu yhvh shishah ‘asar ’elef sheba‘ me’ot vakhamishim shaqel, me’et sarei ha’alafim ume’et sarei hame’ot.
anSy hzba bccw ayS lw (for the men of war had taken spoil, every man for himself.) ’anshei hazaba bazezu ’ish lo.
wyqx mSh walecr hkhn at hchb mat Sry halpym whmawt wybaw atw al ahl mwed ckrwn lbny ySral lpny yhwh and mose-extracted and eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server took the gold of the captains of thousands and of hundreds, and brought it into the tent of until-conception, for a memorial for children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayiqakh mosheh ve’el‘azar hakohen hazahab me’et sarei ha’alafim vehame’ot, vayabi’u ’oto ’el ’ohel mo‘ed zikaron libne yisra’el lifnei yhvh.
wmqnh rb hyh lbny rawbn wlbny gd ezwm mad wyraw at arz yecr wat arz gled whnh hmqwm mqwm mqnh now children-betweens of reuben-see-child and children-betweens of gad-tell-luck had a very great multitude of in-them-animal: and when they saw the land of jazer-help, and the land of gilead-roll-until-heap, that, behold, the place was a place for in-them-animal; umiqneh rab hayah libnei re’uben velibne gad ‘azum me’od, vayir’u ’erez ya‘zer ve’et ’erez gil‘ad vehineh hamaqom meqom miqneh.
wybaw bny gd wbny rawbn wyamrw al mSh wal alecr hkhn wal nSyay hedh lamr children-betweens of gad-tell-luck and children-betweens of reuben-see-child came and spake unto mose-extracted, and to eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, and unto the princes of the until-witness, saying, vayabo’u bene gad ubenei re’uben, vayomeru ’el mosheh ve’el ’el‘azar hakohen ve’el nesi’ei ha‘edah lemor.
eTrwt wdybn wyecr wnmrh wxSbwn walelh wSbm wnbw wben atarot-decorate-crown, and dibon-slander, and jazer-help, and nimrah, and heshbon-score-supposition, and eleale-top-to-no, and sheba-comingm, and nebo-at-him, and beon, ‘atarot vedibon veya‘zer venimrah vekheshbon ve’el‘aleh, usebam unebo ube‘on.
harz aSr hkh yhwh lpny edt ySral arz mqnh hwa wlebdyk mqnh even the country which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah smote before-turns the until-witness of israel-juicy-towards, is a land for in-them-animal, and thy workers have in-them-animal: ha’arez ’asher hikah yhvh lifnei ‘adat yisra’el ’erez miqneh hi vela‘abadekha miqneh.
wyamrw am mzanw xn beynyk ytn at harz hcat lebdyk laxch al tebrnw at hyrdn wherefore, said they, if we have found attractiveness in thy sight, let this land be given unto thy workers for a possession, and bring us not over jordan-its-going-down. vayomeru ’im mazanu khen be‘enekha yutan ha’arez hazot la‘abadekha la’akhuzah, ’al ta‘abirenu hayarden.
wyamr mSh lbny gd wlbny rawbn haxykm ybaw lmlxmh watm tSbw ph and mose-extracted said unto children-betweens of gad-tell-luck and to children-betweens of reuben-see-child, your brethren go to war, and ye sit here? vayomer mosheh libne gad velibnei re’uben, ha’akhekhem yabo’u lamilkhamah ve’atem teshebu foh.
wlmh tnwawn tnyawn at lb bny ySral mebr al harz aSr ntn lhm yhwh and wherefore discourage ye the heart of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards from going over into the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath given them? velamah teni’un leb benei yisra’el, me‘abor ’el ha’arez ’asher natan lahem yhvh.
kh eSw abtykm bSlxy atm mqdS brne lrawt at harz thus did your fathers, when i sent them from kadeshbarnea-finished-desert-staggering to see the land. koh ‘asu ’abotekhem, beshalekhi ’otam miqadesh barnea‘ lir’ot ha’arez.
wyelw ed nxl aSkwl wyraw at harz wynyaw at lb bny ySral lblty ba al harz aSr ntn lhm yhwh for when they went up unto the valley of eshcol-fire-all, and saw the land, they discouraged the heart of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they should not go into the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had given them. vaya‘alu ‘ad nakhal ’eshkol vayir’u ha’arez vayani’u leb benei yisra’el, lebilti bo ’el ha’arez ’asher natan lahem yhvh.
wyxr ap yhwh bywm hhwa wySbe lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's nose-anger was kindled the same time, and he sware, saying, vayikhar ’af yhvh bayom hahu, vayishaba‘ lemor.
am yraw hanSym helym mmzrym mbn eSrym Snh wmelh at hadmh aSr nSbety labrhm lyzxq wlyeqb ky la mlaw axry surely none of the men that came up out of mizraim-narrows, from double-ten-twenty years old and upward, see the land which i sware unto abraham-their-dick, unto isaac-laughter, and unto jacob-backstreet; because they have not wholly followed me: ’im yir’u ha’anashim ha‘olim mimizrayim miben ‘esrim shanah vama‘lah ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ti le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob, ki lo mil’u ’akharay.
blty klb bn ypnh hqncy wyhwSe bn nwn ky mlaw axry yhwh save caleb-as-heart-dog child-between of jephuneh-turn the kenezite, and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish: for they have wholly followed yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. bilti kaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi vihoshua‘ bin nun, ki mil’u ’akharei yhvh.
wyxr ap yhwh bySral wynem bmdbr arbeym Snh ed tm kl hdwr heSh hre beyny yhwh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's nose-anger was kindled against israel-juicy-towards, and he made them wander in the place-of-word-desert forty years, until all the generation, that had done bad in the sight of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, was consumed. vayikhar ’af yhvh beyisra’el vayni‘em bamidbar ’arba‘im shanah, ‘ad tom kal hador ha‘oseh hara‘ be‘enei yhvh.
whnh qmtm txt abtykm trbwt anSym xTaym lspwt ewd el xrwn ap yhwh al ySral and, behold, ye are risen up in your fathers' stead, an increase of missing men, to augment yet the fierce nose-anger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah toward israel-juicy-towards. vehineh qamtem takhat ’abotekhem tarbut ’anashim khata’im, lispot ‘od ‘al kharon ’af yhvh ’el yisra’el.
ky tSwbn maxryw wysp ewd lhnyxw bmdbr wSxtm lkl hem hch for if ye turn away from after him, he will yet again leave them in the place-of-word-desert; and ye destroy all this with-mum-people. ki teshubun me’akharav veyasaf ‘od lehanikho bamidbar, veshikhatem lekhal ha‘am hazeh.
wygSw alyw wyamrw gdrt zan nbnh lmqnnw ph werym lTpnw and they came near unto him, and said, we will between-build sheepfolds here for our in-them-animal, and cities for our little ones: vayigeshu ’elav vayomeru gidrot zon nibneh lemiqnenu poh, ve‘arim letapenu.
wanxnw nxlz xSym lpny bny ySral ed aSr am hbyanm al mqwmm wySb Tpnw bery hmbzr mpny ySby harz and we ourselves will go ready armed before-turns children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, until we have brought them unto their place: and our little ones dwell in the fenced cities because of the inhabitants of the land. va’anakhnu nekhalez khushim lifnei benei yisra’el ‘ad ’asher ’im habi’onum ’el meqomam, veyashab tapenu be‘arei hamibzar mipenei yoshebei ha’arez.
la nSwb al btynw ed htnxl bny ySral ayS nxltw we will not return unto our daughter-houses, until children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards have inherited every man his inheritance. lo nashub ’el batenu, ‘ad hitnakhel benei yisra’el ’ish nakhalato.
ky la nnxl atm mebr lyrdn whlah ky bah nxltnw alynw mebr hyrdn mcrxh for we will not inherit with them on yonder side jordan-its-going-down, or forward; because our inheritance is fallen to us on this side jordan-its-going-down eastward. ki lo ninkhal ’itam me‘eber layarden vahale’ah, ki ba’ah nakhalatenu ’elenu me‘eber hayarden mizrakhah.
wyamr alyhm mSh am teSwn at hdbr hch am txlzw lpny yhwh lmlxmh and mose-extracted said unto them, if ye will do this thing, if ye will go armed before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to war, vayomer ’alehem mosheh ’im ta‘asun hadabar hazeh, ’im tekhalezu lifnei yhvh lamilkhamah.
webr lkm kl xlwz at hyrdn lpny yhwh ed hwrySw at aybyw mpnyw and will go all of you pioneering over jordan-its-going-down before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, until he hath driven out his father-adversaries from before-turns him, ve‘abar lakhem kal khaluz hayarden lifnei yhvh, ‘ad horisho ’oyebav mipanav.
wnkbSh harz lpny yhwh waxr tSbw whyytm nqyym myhwh wmySral whyth harz hcat lkm laxch lpny yhwh and the land be lambed before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: then afterward ye return, and be guiltless before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and before-turns israel-juicy-towards; and this land be your possession before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. venikhbeshah ha’arez lifnei yhvh ve’akhar tashubu vihyitem neqiyim yhvh umiyisra’el, vehayetah ha’arez hazot lakhem la’akhuzah lifnei yhvh.
wam la teSwn kn hnh xTatm lyhwh wdew xTatkm aSr tmza atkm and if ye will not do so, behold, ye have missed to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and be sure your miss will find you out. ve’im lo ta‘asun ken hineh khatatem yhvh, ude‘u khatatkhem ’asher timza ’etkhem.
bnw lkm erym lTpkm wgdrt lznakm whyza mpykm teSw between-build you cities for your little ones, and folds for your sheep; and do that which hath proceeded out of your mouth. benu lakhem ‘arim letapekhem ugederot lezona’akhem, vehayozei mipikhem ta‘asu.
wyamr bny gd wbny rawbn al mSh lamr ebdyk yeSw kaSr adny mzwh and children-betweens of gad-tell-luck and children-betweens of reuben-see-child spake unto mose-extracted, saying, thy workers will do as my base-lord directeth. vayomer bene gad ubenei re’uben ’el mosheh lemor, ‘abadekha ya‘asu ka’asher ’adoni mezaveh.
Tpnw nSynw mqnnw wkl bhmtnw yhyw Sm bery hgled our little ones, our women, our flocks, and all our in-them-animal, be there in the cities of gilead-roll-until-heap: tapenu nashenu miqnenu vekhal behemtenu, yihyu sham be‘arei hagil‘ad.
webdyk yebrw kl xlwz zba lpny yhwh lmlxmh kaSr adny dbr and thy workers will pass over, every man armed for war, before-turns the base-lord to battle, as my base-lord saith. va‘abadekha ya‘abru kal khaluz zaba lifnei yhvh lamilkhamah, ka’asher ’adoni dober.
wyzw lhm mSh at alecr hkhn wat yhwSe bn nwn wat raSy abwt hmTwt lbny ySral so concerning them mose-extracted direct eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish, and the chief fathers of the branchs of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: vayzav lahem mosheh ’el‘azar hakohen ve’et yehoshua‘ bin nun, ve’et rashei ’abot hamatot libnei yisra’el.
wyamr mSh alhm am yebrw bny gd wbny rawbn atkm at hyrdn kl xlwz lmlxmh lpny yhwh wnkbSh harz lpnykm wnttm lhm at arz hgled laxch and mose-extracted said unto them, if children-betweens of gad-tell-luck and children-betweens of reuben-see-child will pass with you over jordan-its-going-down, every man armed to battle, before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and the land be subdued before-turns you; then ye give them the land of gilead-roll-until-heap for a possession: vayomer mosheh ’alehem ’im ya‘abru bene gad ubene re’uben ’itekhem hayarden kal khaluz lamilkhamah lifnei yhvh venikhbeshah ha’arez lifnekhem, unetatem lahem ’erez hagil‘ad la’akhuzah.
wam la yebrw xlwzym atkm wnaxcw btkkm barz knen and if they will not pass over with you pioneering, they have possessions among you in the land of canaan-mobile-trade. ve’im lo ya‘abru khaluzim ’itekhem, venokhazu betokhekhem be’erez kena‘an.
wyenw bny gd wbny rawbn lamr at aSr dbr yhwh al ebdyk kn neSh and children-betweens of gad-tell-luck and children-betweens of reuben-see-child answered, saying, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath said unto thy workers, so will we do. vaya‘anu bene gad ubenei re’uben lemor, ’asher diber yhvh ’el ‘abadekha ken na‘aseh.
nxnw nebr xlwzym lpny yhwh arz knen watnw axct nxltnw mebr lyrdn we will pass over pioneering before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah into the land of canaan-mobile-trade, that the possession of our inheritance on this side jordan-its-going-down may be ours. nakhnu na‘abor khaluzim lifnei yhvh ’erez kena‘an, ve’itanu ’akhuzat nakhalatenu me‘eber layarden.
wytn lhm mSh lbny gd wlbny rawbn wlxzy SbT mnSh bn ywsp at mmlkt syxn mlk hamry wat mmlkt ewg mlk hbSn harz leryh bgblt ery harz sbyb and mose-extracted gave unto them, even to children-betweens of gad-tell-luck, and to children-betweens of reuben-see-child, and unto half the branch of manasseh-place-of-sleep child-between of joseph-add, the king-molochdom of sihon-curly king-moloch of the amorite-talkers, and the king-molochdom of og-mock king-moloch of bashan-at-tooth, the land, with the cities thereof in the coasts, even the cities of the country round about. vayiten lahem mosheh libne gad velibnei re’uben velakhazi shebet menasheh ben yosef mamlekhet sikhon melekh ha’emori ve’et mamlekhet ‘og melekh habashan, ha’arez le‘areha bigbulot ‘arei ha’arez sabib.
wybnw bny gd at dybn wat eTrt wat erer and children-betweens of gad-tell-luck between-built dibon-slander, and atarot-decorate-crown, and aroer-juniper-object, vayibnu bene gad dibon ve’et ‘atarot, ve’et ‘aro‘er.
wat eTrt Swpn wat yecr wygbhh and atrot-decorate-crown, shophan-rabbit, and jaazer-help, and jogbehah-rise, ve’et shofan ve’et ya‘zer veyagebohah.
wat byt nmrh wat byt hrn ery mbzr wgdrt zan and betnimrah-house-of-leopardess, and betharan-house-of-sing, fenced cities: and folds for sheep. ve’et bet nimrah ve’et bet haran, ‘arei mibzar vegidrot zon.
wbny rawbn bnw at xSbwn wat alela wat qrytym and children-betweens of reuben-see-child between-built heshbon-score-supposition, and eleale-top-to-no, and kirjatim-towns, ubenei re’uben banu kheshbon ve’et ’el‘ale, ve’et qiryatayim.
wat nbw wat bel mewn mwsbt Sm wat Sbmh wyqraw bSmt at Smwt herym aSr bnw and nebo-at-him, and baalmeon-residence-of-baal-owner, (their names being changed,) and shibmah-stage: and gave other names unto the cities which they between-between-builded. ve’et nebo ve’et ba‘al me‘on musabot shem ve’et sibmah, vayiqre’u shemot he‘arim ’asher banu.
wylkw bny mkyr bn mnSh gledh wylkdh wywrS at hamry aSr bh and children-betweens of machi-of-beatr-recognize child-between of manasseh-place-of-sleep went to gilead-roll-until-heap, and took it, and dispossessed the amorite-talker which was in it. vayelekhu benei makhir ben menasheh gil‘adah vayilkeduha, vayoresh ha’emori ’asher bah.
wytn mSh at hgled lmkyr bn mnSh wySb bh and mose-extracted gave gilead-roll-until-heap unto machi-of-beatr-recognize child-between of manasseh-place-of-sleep; and he dwelt therein. vayiten mosheh hagil‘ad lemakhir ben menasheh, vayesheb bah.
wyayr bn mnSh hlk wylkd at xwtyhm wyqra athn xwt yayr and jair-glow child-between of manasseh-place-of-sleep went and took the small towns thereof, and called them havotjair-farm-of-glow. veya’ir ben menasheh halakh vayilkod khavotehem, vayiqra ’ethen khavot ya’ir.
wnbx hlk wylkd at qnt wat bntyh wyqra lh nbx bSmw and nobah-bark-abuse went and took kenat-elegy, and the villages thereof, and called it nobah-bark-abuse, after his own name. venobakh halakh vayilkod qenat ve’et benoteha, vayiqra lah nobakh bishmo.
alh msey bny ySral aSr yzaw marz mzrym lzbatm byd mSh wahrn these are the journeys of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, which went forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows with their troop-clusters under the hand of mose-extracted and aaron-cabinet. ’eleh mas‘ei bene yisra’el ’asher yaze’u me’erez mizrayim lezib’otam, beyad mosheh ve’aharon.
wyktb mSh at mwzayhm lmseyhm el py yhwh walh mseyhm lmwzayhm and mose-extracted wrote their goings out according to their journeys by the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: and these are their journeys according to their goings out. vayikhtob mosheh moza’ehem lemas‘ehem ‘al pi yhvh, ve’eleh mas‘ehem lemoza’ehem.
wysew mremss bxdS hraSwn bxmSh eSr ywm lxdS hraSwn mmxrt hpsx yzaw bny ySral byd rmh leyny kl mzrym and they departed from ram-voicelessses-born-by-ra in the first month, on the fifteenth day of the first month; on the morrow after the passover children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards went out with an high hand in the sight of all the mizraim-narrowsians. vayis‘u mera‘meses bakhodesh harishon bakhamishah ‘asar yom lakhodesh harishon, mimakhorat hapesakh yaze’u bene yisra’el beyad ramah le‘enei kal mizrayim.
wmzrym mqbrym at aSr hkh yhwh bhm kl bkwr wbalhyhm eSh yhwh SpTym for the mizraim-narrowsians buried all their firstborn, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah had smitten among them: upon their to-no-these also yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah executed decision-grammars. umizrayim meqaberim ’asher hikah yhvh bahem kal bekhor, ubelohehem ‘asah yhvh shefatim.
wysew bny ySral mremss wyxnw bskt and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards removed from ram-voicelessses-born-by-ra, and pitched in succoth-booths. vayis‘u bene yisra’el mera‘meses, vayakhanu besukot.
wysew mskt wyxnw batm aSr bqzh hmdbr and they departed from succoth-booths, and pitched in etam-you, which is in the edge of the place-of-word-desert. vayis‘u misukot, vayakhanu be’etam ’asher biqzeh hamidbar.
wysew matm wySb el py hxyrt aSr el pny bel zpwn wyxnw lpny mgdl and they removed from etam-you, and turned again unto pihahirot-mouth-of-the-choice, which is before-turns baalzephon-owner-of-cipher: and they pitched before-turns migdol-tower. vayis‘u me’etam vayashab ‘al hakhirot ’asher ‘al penei ba‘al zefon, vayakhanu lifnei migdol.
wysew mpny hxyrt wyebrw btwk hym hmdbrh wylkw drk SlSt ymym bmdbr atm wyxnw bmrh and they departed from before-turns pihahirot-mouth-of-the-choice, and passed through the midst of the sea into the place-of-word-desert, and went three days' journey in the place-of-word-desert of etam-you, and pitched in marah-bitter. vayis‘u mipenei hakhirot vaya‘abru betokh hayam hamidbarah, vayelekhu derekh sheloshet yamim bemidbar ’etam vayakhanu bemarah.
wysew mmrh wybaw aylmh wbaylm Stym eSrh eynt mym wSbeym tmrym wyxnw Sm and they removed from marah-bitter, and came unto elim-bind: and in elim-bind were twelve fountains of from-waters, and threescore and ten palm trees; and they pitched there. vayis‘u mimarah vayabo’u ’elimah, ube’elim shetem ‘esreh ‘enot mayim veshib‘im temarim vayakhanu sham.
wysew maylm wyxnw el ym swp and they removed from elim-bind, and encamped by the end sea. vayis‘u me’elim, vayakhanu ‘al yam suf.
wysew mym swp wyxnw bmdbr syn and they removed from the end sea, and encamped in the place-of-word-desert of miss. vayis‘u miyam suf, vayakhanu bemidbar sin.
wysew mmdbr syn wyxnw bdpqh and they took their journey out of the place-of-word-desert of miss, and encamped in dophkah-knock. vayis‘u mimidbar sin, vayakhanu bedafeqah.
wysew mdpqh wyxnw balwS and they departed from dophkah-knock, and encamped in alush-knead. vayis‘u midafeqah, vayakhanu be’alush.
wysew malwS wyxnw brpydm wla hyh Sm mym lem lStwt and they removed from alush-knead, and encamped at rephidim-upholstery, where was no from-waters for the with-mum-people to drink. vayis‘u me’alush, vayakhanu birfidim velo hayah sham mayim la‘am lishtot.
wysew mrpydm wyxnw bmdbr syny and they departed from rephidim-upholstery, and pitched in the place-of-word-desert of )sinai-bush-(proto. vayis‘u merefidim, vayakhanu bemidbar sinay.
wysew mmdbr syny wyxnw bqbrt htawh and they removed from the place-of-word-desert of bush-missai, and pitched at hatavah-graveyard-of-craving-kibrot. vayis‘u mimidbar sinay, vayakhanu beqibrot hata’avah.
wysew mqbrt htawh wyxnw bxzrt and they departed from hatavah-graveyard-of-craving-kibrot, and encamped at hazerot-gardens. vayis‘u miqibrot hata’avah, vayakhanu bakhazerot.
wysew mxzrt wyxnw brtmh and they departed from hazerot-gardens, and pitched in ritmah-harness. vayis‘u mekhazerot, vayakhanu beritmah.
wysew mrtmh wyxnw brmn prz and they departed from ritmah-harness, and pitched at rimonparez-pomegranate-breach. vayis‘u meritmah, vayakhanu berimon parez.
wysew mrmn prz wyxnw blbnh and they departed from rimonparez-pomegranate-breach, and pitched in libnah-white-build. vayis‘u merimon parez, vayakhanu belibnah.
wysew mlbnh wyxnw brsh and they removed from libnah-white-build, and pitched at risah-her-eyelash. vayis‘u milibnah, vayakhanu berisah.
wysew mrsh wyxnw bqhlth and they journeyed from risah-her-eyelash, and pitched in kelelatah-her-congregation. vayis‘u merisah, vayakhanu biqhelatah.
wysew mqhlth wyxnw bhr Spr and they went from kelelatah-her-congregation, and pitched in mount shapher-boost-bull. vayis‘u miqehelatah, vayakhanu behar shafer.
wysew mhr Spr wyxnw bxrdh and they removed from mount shapher-boost-bull, and encamped in haradah-anxiety. vayis‘u mehar shafer, vayakhanu bakharadah.
wysew mxrdh wyxnw bmqhlt and they removed from haradah-anxiety, and pitched in makheloth-of-community. vayis‘u mekharadah, vayakhanu bemaqhelot.
wysew mmqhlt wyxnw btxt and they removed from makheloth-of-community, and encamped at tahat-under. vayis‘u mimaqhelot, vayakhanu betakhat.
wysew mtxt wyxnw btrx and they departed from tahat-under, and pitched at tarah-effort. vayis‘u mitakhat, vayakhanu betarakh.
wysew mtrx wyxnw bmtqh and they removed from tarah-effort, and pitched in mitcah-sweetening. vayis‘u mitarakh, vayakhanu bemitqah.
wysew mmtqh wyxnw bxSmnh and they went from mitcah-sweetening, and pitched in hashmonah-eight-rain. vayis‘u mimitqah, vayakhanu bekhashmonah.
wysew mxSmnh wyxnw bmsrwt and they departed from hashmonah-eight-rain, and encamped at moseroth-deliveries. vayis‘u mekhashmonah, vayakhanu bemoserot.
wysew mmsrwt wyxnw bbny yeqn and they departed from moseroth-deliveries, and pitched in benejaakan-between-children-of-corner. vayis‘u mimoserot, vayakhanu bibnei ya‘aqan.
wysew mbny yeqn wyxnw bxr hgdgd and they removed from benejaakan-between-children-of-corner, and encamped at tickle-the. vayis‘u mibenei ya‘aqan, vayakhanu bekhor hagidgad.
wysew mxr hgdgd wyxnw byTbth and they went from tickle-the, and pitched in jotbatah-her-fourth-month. vayis‘u mekhor hagidgad, vayakhanu beyatebatah.
wysew myTbth wyxnw bebrnh and they removed from jotbatah-her-fourth-month, and encamped at ebronah-pass-traverse. vayis‘u miyatebatah, vayakhanu be‘abronah.
wysew mebrnh wyxnw bezywn gbr and they departed from ebronah-pass-traverse, and encamped at eziongaber-wood-strong-man. vayis‘u me‘abronah, vayakhanu be‘ezyon gaber.
wysew mezywn gbr wyxnw bmdbr zn hwa qdS and they removed from eziongaber-wood-strong-man, and pitched in the place-of-word-desert of zin-briar, which is kadesh-dedicated-finished. vayis‘u me‘ezyon gaber, vayakhanu bemidbar zin hi qadesh.
wysew mqdS wyxnw bhr hhr bqzh arz adwm and they removed from kadesh-dedicated-finished, and pitched in mount hor-mount, in the edge of the land of edom-man. vayis‘u miqadesh, vayakhanu behor hahar biqzeh ’erez ’edom.
wyel ahrn hkhn al hr hhr el py yhwh wymt Sm bSnt harbeym lzat bny ySral marz mzrym bxdS hxmySy baxd lxdS and aaron-cabinet the dimmer-server went up into mount hor-mount at the directive of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and died there, in the fortieth year after children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards were come out of the land of mizraim-narrows, in the first day of the fifth month. vaya‘al ’aharon hakohen ’el hor hahar ‘al pi yhvh vayamat sham, bishnat ha’arba‘im lezet bene yisra’el me’erez mizrayim bakhodesh hakhamishi be’ekhad lakhodesh.
wahrn bn SlS weSrym wmat Snh bmtw bhr hhr and aaron-cabinet was an hundred and double-ten-twenty and three years old when he died in mount hor-mount. ve’aharon ben shalosh ve‘esrim ume’at shanah, bemoto behor hahar.
wySme hkneny mlk erd whwa ySb bngb barz knen bba bny ySral and king-moloch arad-bronze the canaan-mobile-tradeite, which dwelt in the south-dry in the land of canaan-mobile-trade, heard of the coming of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayishma‘ hakena‘ani melekh ‘arad vehu yosheb banegeb be’erez kena‘an, bebo benei yisra’el.
wysew mhr hhr wyxnw bzlmnh and they departed from mount hor-mount, and pitched in zalmonah-image-idol. vayis‘u mehor hahar, vayakhanu bezalmonah.
wysew mzlmnh wyxnw bpwnn and they departed from zalmonah-image-idol, and pitched in punon-found. vayis‘u mizalmonah, vayakhanu befunon.
wysew mpwnn wyxnw babt and they departed from punon-found, and pitched in oboth-thick. vayis‘u mipunon, vayakhanu be’obot.
wysew mabt wyxnw beyy hebrym bgbwl mwab and they departed from oboth-thick, and pitched in ijeabarim-heaps-crossings, in the border of moab-from-father. vayis‘u me’obot, vayakhanu be‘iyei ha‘abarim bigbul mo’ab.
wysew meyym wyxnw bdybn gd and they departed from iim-islands, and pitched in dibon-slandergad. vayis‘u me‘iyim, vayakhanu bedibon gad.
wysew mdybn gd wyxnw belmn dbltymh and they removed from dibon-slandergad, and encamped in diblataim-the-hidden-fig-cakes-almon. vayis‘u midibon gad, vayakhanu be‘almon diblatayemah.
wysew melmn dbltymh wyxnw bhry hebrym lpny nbw and they removed from diblataim-the-hidden-fig-cakes-almon, and pitched in the mountains of abarim-crossings-over, before-turns nebo-at-him. vayis‘u me‘almon diblatayemah, vayakhanu beharei ha‘abarim lifnei nebo.
wysew mhry hebrym wyxnw berbt mwab el yrdn yrxw and they departed from the mountains of abarim-crossings-over, and pitched in the plains of moab-from-father by jordan-its-going-down near jericho-moon-smell. vayis‘u meharei ha‘abarim, vayakhanu be‘arbot mo’ab ‘al yarden yerekho.
wyxnw el hyrdn mbyt hySmt ed abl hSTym berbt mwab and they pitched by jordan-its-going-down, from betjesimot-desolate-house even unto abel-vaporshittim in the plains of moab-from-father. vayakhanu ‘al hayarden mibet hayshimot ‘ad hashitim, be‘arbot mo’ab.
wydbr yhwh al mSh berbt mwab el yrdn yrxw lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted in the plains of moab-from-father by jordan-its-going-down near jericho-moon-smell, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh be‘arbot mo’ab, ‘al yarden yerekho lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ky atm ebrym at hyrdn al arz knen speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when ye are passed over jordan-its-going-down into the land of canaan-mobile-trade; daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ki ’atem ‘oberim hayarden ’el ’erez kena‘an.
whwrStm at kl ySby harz mpnykm wabdtm at kl mSkytm wat kl zlmy msktm tabdw wat kl bmtm tSmydw then ye drive out all the inhabitants of the land from before-turns you, and destroy all their pictures, and destroy all their images, and quite pluck down all their high places: vehorashtem kal yoshebei ha’arez mipenekhem ve’ibadtem kal maskiyotam, ve’et kal zalmei masekhotam te’abedu ve’et kal bamotam tashmidu.
whwrStm at harz wySbtm bh ky lkm ntty at harz lrSt ath and ye dispossess the inhabitants of the land, and dwell therein: for i have given you the land to possess it. vehorashtem ha’arez vishabtem bah, ki lakhem natati ha’arez lareshet.
whtnxltm at harz bgwrl lmSpxtykm lrb trbw at nxltw wlmeT tmeyT at nxltw al aSr yza lw Smh hgwrl lw yhyh lmTwt abtykm ttnxlw and ye divide the land by lot-cover for an inheritance among your families: and to the more ye give the more inheritance, and to the fewer ye give the less inheritance: every man's inheritance be in the place where his lot-cover falleth; according to the branchs of your fathers ye inherit. vehitnakhaltem ha’arez begoral lemishpekhotekhem larab tarbu nakhalato velam‘at tam‘it nakhalato ’el ’asher yezei lo shamah hagoral lo yihyeh, lematot ’abotekhem titnekhalu.
wam la twrySw at ySby harz mpnykm whyh aSr twtyrw mhm lSkym beynykm wlznynm bzdykm wzrrw atkm el harz aSr atm ySbym bh and if ye will not drive out the inhabitants of the land from before-turns you; then it come to pass, that those which ye let remain of them be pricks in your eyes, and thorns in your sides, and vex you in the land wherein ye dwell. ve’im lo torishu yoshebei ha’arez mipenekhem vehayah ’asher totiru mehem lesikim be‘enekhem velizninim bezidekhem, vezararu ’etkhem ‘al ha’arez ’asher ’atem yoshebim bah.
whyh kaSr dmyty leSwt lhm aeSh lkm moreover it come to pass, that i do unto you, as i thought to do unto them. vehayah ka’asher dimiti la‘asot lahem ’e‘eseh lakhem.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
zw at bny ySral wamrt alhm ky atm baym al harz knen cat harz aSr tpl lkm bnxlh arz knen lgbltyh direct children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when ye come into the land of canaan-mobile-trade; (this is the land that fall unto you for an inheritance, even the land of canaan-mobile-trade with the coasts thereof:) zav benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem ki ’atem ba’im ’el ha’arez kena‘an, zot ha’arez ’asher tipol lakhem benakhalah ’erez kena‘an ligbuloteha.
whyh lkm pat ngb mmdbr zn el ydy adwm whyh lkm gbwl ngb mqzh ym hmlx qdmh then your south-dry quarter be from the place-of-word-desert of zin-briar along by the coast of edom-man, and your south-dry border be the outmost coast of the salt sea eastward: vehayah lakhem pe’at negeb mimidbar zin ‘al yedei ’edom, vehayah lakhem gebul negeb miqzeh yam hamelakh qedemah.
wnsb lkm hgbwl mngb lmelh eqrbym webr znh whyh whyw twzatyw mngb lqdS brne wyza xzr adr webr ezmnh and your border turn from the south-dry to the ascent of akrabim-scorpions, and pass on to zin-briar: and the going forth thereof be from the south-dry to kadeshbarnea-finished-desert-staggering, and go on to adar-garden-maple-hazar, and pass on to azmon-skeleton: venasab lakhem hagebul minegeb lema‘aleh ‘aqrabim ve‘abar zinah vehayah vehayu toz’otav minegeb leqadesh barnea‘, veyaza ’adar ve‘abar ‘azmonah.
wnsb hgbwl mezmwn nxlh mzrym whyw twzatyw hymh and the border fetch a compass from azmon-skeleton unto the river of mizraim-narrows, and the goings out of it be at the sea. venasab hagebul me‘azmon nakhlah mizrayim, vehayu toz’otav hayamah.
wgbwl ym whyh lkm hym hgdwl wgbwl ch yhyh lkm gbwl ym and as for the sea-western border, ye even have the great sea for a border: this be your sea-west border. ugebul yam vehayah lakhem hayam hagadol ugebul, zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul yam.
wch yhyh lkm gbwl zpwn mn hym hgdl ttaw lkm hr hhr and this be your hide-north border: from the great sea ye point out for you mount hor-mount: vezeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon, min hayam hagadol teta’u lakhem hor hahar.
mhr hhr ttaw lba xmt whyw twzat hgbl zddh from mount hor-mount ye point out your border unto the entrance of ham-hotath; and the goings forth of the border be to zedad-flank: mehor hahar teta’u lebo khamat, vehayu toz’ot hagebul zedadah.
wyza hgbl cprnh whyw twzatyw xzr eynn ch yhyh lkm gbwl zpwn and the border go on to ziphron-sweet-smell, and the goings out of it be at hazarenan-garden-eye: this be your hide-north border. veyaza hagebul zifronah vehayu toz’otav ‘enan, zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon.
whtawytm lkm lgbwl qdmh mxzr eynn Spmh and ye point out your east border from hazarenan-garden-eye to shepham-moustache: vehit’avitem lakhem ligbul qedemah, mekhazar ‘enan shefamah.
wyrd hgbl mSpm hrblh mqdm leyn wyrd hgbwl wmxh el ktp ym knrt qdmh and the coast go down from shepham-moustache to riblah-fight, on the east side of ai-islandn-eye; and the border descend, and reach unto the side of the sea of kineret-like-candle eastward: veyarad hagebul mishefam hariblah miqedem la‘ayin, veyarad hagebul umakhah ‘al ketef yam kineret qedemah.
wyrd hgbwl hyrdnh whyw twzatyw ym hmlx cat thyh lkm harz lgbltyh sbyb and the border go down to jordan-its-going-down, and the goings out of it be at the salt sea: this be your land with the coasts thereof round about. veyarad hagebul hayardenah vehayu toz’otav yam hamelakh, zot tihyeh lakhem ha’arez ligbuloteha sabib.
wyzw mSh at bny ySral lamr cat harz aSr ttnxlw ath bgwrl aSr zwh yhwh ltt ltSet hmTwt wxzy hmTh and mose-extracted direct children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, saying, this is the land which ye inherit by lot-cover, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct to give unto the nine branchs, and to the half branch: vayzav mosheh benei yisra’el lemor, zot ha’arez ’asher titnakhalu ’otah begoral ’asher zivah yhvh latet letish‘at hamatot vakhazi hamateh.
ky lqxw mTh bny hrawbny lbyt abtm wmTh bny hgdy lbyt abtm wxzy mTh mnSh lqxw nxltm for the branch of children-betweens of reuben-see-child according to the daughter-house of their fathers, and the branch of children-betweens of gad-tell-luck according to the daughter-house of their fathers, have received their inheritance; and half the branch of manasseh-place-of-sleep have received their inheritance: ki laqekhu mateh benei har’ubeni lebet ’abotam umateh bene hagadi lebet ’abotam, vakhazi mateh menasheh laqekhu nakhalatam.
Sny hmTwt wxzy hmTh lqxw nxltm mebr lyrdn yrxw qdmh mcrxh the two branchs and the half branch have received their inheritance on this side jordan-its-going-down near jericho-moon-smell eastward, toward the sunrising. shenei hamatot vakhazi hamateh, laqekhu nakhalatam me‘eber leyarden yerekho qedemah mizrakhah.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
alh Smwt hanSym aSr ynxlw lkm at harz alecr hkhn wyhwSe bn nwn these are the names of the men which divide the land unto you: eleazar-towards-stop the dimmer-server, and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish. ’eleh shemot ha’anashim ’asher yinkhalu lakhem ha’arez, ’el‘azar hakohen vihoshua‘ bin nun.
wnSya axd nSya axd mmTh tqxw lnxl at harz and ye take one prince of every branch, to divide the land by inheritance. venasi ’ekhad nasi ’ekhad mimateh, tiqkhu linkhol ha’arez.
walh Smwt hanSym lmTh yhwdh klb bn ypnh and the names of the men are these: of the branch of judah-know, caleb-as-heart-dog child-between of jephuneh-turn. ve’eleh shemot ha’anashim, lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh.
wlmTh bny Smewn Smwal bn emyhwd and of the branch of children-betweens of simeon-hear-home, shemuel child-between of amihud-with-my-glory. ulemateh benei shim‘on shemu’el ben ‘amihud.
lmTh bnymn alydd bn kslwn of the branch of benjamin-he-between-of-righthand, elidad-my-towards-breast child-between of chislon-fool-basket. lemateh binyamin ’elidad ben kislon.
wlmTh bny dn nSya bqy bn ygly and the branch of children-betweens of dan-discuss, buki-skilled child-between of jogli-my-roll. ulemateh bene dan nasi, buqi ben yageli.
lbny ywsp lmTh bny mnSh nSya xnyal bn apd the prince of children-betweens of joseph-add, for the branch of children-betweens of manasseh-place-of-sleep, haniel-grace-towards child-between of ephod-cash-in. libnei yosef lemateh bene menasheh nasi, khani’el ben ’efod.
wlmTh bny aprym nSya qmwal bn SpTn and the branch of children-betweens of ephraim-fruitful, kemuel-get-up-towards child-between of shiphtan-lip. ulemateh bene ’efrayim nasi, qemu’el ben shiftan.
wlmTh bny cbwln nSya alyzpn bn prnk and the branch of children-betweens of zebulun-fertile, elizaphan child-between of parnach-bull. ulemateh bene zebulun nasi, ’elizafan ben parnakh.
wlmTh bny ySSkr nSya plTyal bn ecn and the branch of children-betweens of issachar-wage, palti-emitel child-between of azan-goat-courage. ulemateh bene yisashkhar nasi, palti’el ben ‘azan.
wlmTh bny aSr nSya axyhwd bn Slmy and the branch of children-betweens of asher-bliss, ahihud child-between of shelomi-my-peace. ulemateh bene ’asher nasi, ’akhihud ben shelomi.
wlmTh bny nptly nSya pdhal bn emyhwd and the branch of children-betweens of naphtali-twisted, pedahel-redemption-towards child-between of amihud-with-my-glory. ulemateh bene naftali nasi, pedah’el ben ‘amihud.
alh aSr zwh yhwh lnxl at bny ySral barz knen these are they whom yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct to divide the inheritance unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in the land of canaan-mobile-trade. ’eleh ’asher zivah yhvh, lenakhel bene yisra’el be’erez kena‘an.
wydbr yhwh al mSh berbt mwab el yrdn yrxw lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted in the plains of moab-from-father by jordan-its-going-down near jericho-moon-smell, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh be‘arbot mo’ab, ‘al yarden yerekho lemor.
zw at bny ySral wntnw llwym mnxlt axctm erym lSbt wmgrS lerym sbybtyhm ttnw llwym direct children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, that they give unto the levi-jointes of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and ye give also unto the levi-jointes plots for the cities round about them. zav benei yisra’el venatenu lalviyim minakhalat ’akhuzatam ‘arim lashabet, umigrash le‘arim sebibotehem titenu lalviyim.
whyw herym lhm lSbt wmgrSyhm yhyw lbhmtm wlrkSm wlkl xytm and the cities they have to dwell in; and the plots of them be for their in-them-animal, and for their goods, and for all their beasts. vehayu he‘arim lahem lashabet, umigreshehem yihyu libhemtam velirkhusham ulekhol khayatam.
wmgrSy herym aSr ttnw llwym mqyr heyr wxwzh alp amh sbyb and the plots of the cities, which ye give unto the levi-jointes, reach from the wall of the light-city and outward a thousand cubits round about. umigreshei he‘arim ’asher titenu lalviyim, miqir ha‘ir vakhuzah ’elef ’amah sabib.
wmdtm mxwz leyr at pat qdmh alpym bamh wat pat ngb alpym bamh wat pat ym alpym bamh wat pat zpwn alpym bamh wheyr btwk ch yhyh lhm mgrSy herym and ye measure from without the light-city on the east side two thousand cubits, and on the south-dry side two thousand cubits, and on the sea-west side two thousand cubits, and on the hide-north side two thousand cubits; and the light-city be in the midst: this be to them the plots of the cities. umadotem mikhuz la‘ir pe’at qedemah ’alpayim ba’amah ve’et pe’at negeb ’alpayim ba’amah ve’et pe’at yam ’alpayim ba’amah ve’et pe’at zafon ’alpayim ba’amah veha‘ir batavekh, zeh yihyeh lahem migreshei he‘arim.
wat herym aSr ttnw llwym at SS ery hmqlT aSr ttnw lns Smh hrzx welyhm ttnw arbeym wStym eyr and among the cities which ye give unto the levi-jointes there be six cities for refuge, which ye appoint for the manslayer, that he may flee thither: and to them ye add forty and two cities. ve’et he‘arim ’asher titenu lalviyim shesh ‘arei hamiqlat ’asher titenu lanus shamah harozeakh, va‘alehem titenu ’arba‘im ushetayim ‘ir.
kl herym aSr ttnw llwym arbeym wSmnh eyr athn wat mgrSyhn so all the cities which ye give to the levi-jointes be forty and eight cities: them ye give with their plots. kal he‘arim ’asher titenu lalviyim ’arba‘im ushemoneh ‘ir, ’ethen ve’et migreshehen.
wherym aSr ttnw maxct bny ySral mat hrb trbw wmat hmeT tmeyTw ayS kpy nxltw aSr ynxlw ytn meryw llwym and the cities which ye give be of the possession of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: from them that have many ye give many; and from them that have few ye give few: every one give of his cities unto the levi-jointes according to his inheritance which he inheriteth. vehe‘arim ’asher titenu me’akhuzat bene yisra’el me’et harab tarbu ume’et ham‘at tam‘itu, ’ish kefi nakhalato ’asher yinkhalu yiten me‘arav lalviyim.
wydbr yhwh al mSh lamr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah spake unto mose-extracted, saying, vaydaber yhvh ’el mosheh lemor.
dbr al bny ySral wamrt alhm ky atm ebrym at hyrdn arzh knen speak unto children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and say unto them, when ye be come over jordan-its-going-down into the land of canaan-mobile-trade; daber ’el benei yisra’el ve’amarta ’alehem, ki ’atem ‘oberim hayarden ’arzah kena‘an.
whqrytm lkm erym ery mqlT thyynh lkm wns Smh rzx mkh npS bSggh then ye appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you; that the slayer may flee thither, which killeth any person at unawares. vehiqritem lakhem ‘arim ‘arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem, venas shamah rozeakh makeh nefesh bishgagah.
whyw lkm herym lmqlT mgal wla ymwt hrzx ed emdw lpny hedh lmSpT and they be unto you cities for refuge from the avenger; that the manslayer die not, until he stand before-turns the until-witness in decision-grammar. vehayu lakhem he‘arim lemiqlat migo’el, velo yamut harozeakh ‘ad ‘amedo lifnei ha‘edah lamishpat.
wherym aSr ttnw SS ery mqlT thyynh lkm and of these cities which ye give six cities ye have for refuge. vehe‘arim ’asher titenu, shesh ‘arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem.
at SlS herym ttnw mebr lyrdn wat SlS herym ttnw barz knen ery mqlT thyynh ye give three cities on this side jordan-its-going-down, and three cities ye give in the land of canaan-mobile-trade, which be cities of refuge. shelosh he‘arim titenu me‘eber layarden ve’et shelosh he‘arim titenu be’erez kena‘an, ‘arei miqlat tihyenah.
lbny ySral wlgr wltwSb btwkm thyynh SS herym halh lmqlT lnws Smh kl mkh npS bSggh these six cities be a refuge, both for children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards, and for the stranger, and for the sojourner among them: that every one that killeth any person unawares may flee thither. libnei yisra’el velager velatoshab betokham tihyenah shesh he‘arim ha’eleh lemiqlat, lanus shamah kal makeh nefesh bishgagah.
wam bkly brcl hkhw wymt rzx hwa mwt ywmt hrzx and if he hit him with an instrument of iron, so that he die, he is a murderer: the murderer surely be put to death. ve’im bikhli barzel hikahu vayamot rozeakh hu, mot yumat harozeakh.
