arbeym yknw la ysyp pn ysyp lhktw el alh mkh rbh wnqlh axyk leynyk forty stripes he may give him, and not exceed: lest, if he should exceed, and beat him above these with many stripes, then thy brother should seem vile unto thee. ’arba‘im yakenu lo yosif, pen yosif lehakoto ‘al ’eleh makah rabah veniqlah ’akhikha le‘enekha.
la txsm Swr bdySw no muzzle the wall-ox when he treadeth out the corn-swimming. lo takhsom shor bedisho.
ky ySbw axym yxdw wmt axd mhm wbn ayn lw la thyh aSt hmt hxwzh layS cr ybmh yba elyh wlqxh lw laSh wybmh if brethren dwell together, and one of them die, and have no child, the woman of the dead not marry without unto a stranger: her man's brother go in unto her, and take her to him to woman, and perform the duty of an man's brother unto her. ki yeshebu ’akhim yakhdav umet ’akhad mehem uben ’en lo lo tihyeh ’eshet hamet hakhuzah le’ish zar, yebamah yabo ‘aleha uleqakhah lo le’ishah veyibemah.
whyh hbkwr aSr tld yqwm el Sm axyw hmt wla ymxh Smw mySral and it be, that the firstborn which she beareth succeed in the name of his brother which is dead, that his name be not put out of israel-juicy-towards. vehayah habekhor ’asher teled yaqum ‘al shem ’akhiv hamet, velo yimakheh shemo miyisra’el.
wam la yxpz hayS lqxt at ybmtw welth ybmtw hSerh al hcqnym wamrh mayn ybmy lhqym laxyw Sm bySral la abh ybmy and if the man like not to take his brother's woman, then let his brother's woman go up to the hair-gate unto the elders, and say, my man's brother refuseth to raise up unto his brother a name in israel-juicy-towards, he will not perform the duty of my man's brother. ve’im lo yakhpoz ha’ish laqakhat yebimto, ve‘aletah yebimto hasha‘rah ’el hazeqenim ve’amerah me’en yebami lehaqim le’akhiv shem beyisra’el lo ’abah yabemi.
wqraw lw cqny eyrw wdbrw alyw wemd wamr la xpzty lqxth then the elders of his light-city call him, and speak unto him: and if he stand to it, and say, i like not to take her; veqare’u lo ziqne ‘iro vediberu ’elav, ve‘amad ve’amar lo khafazti leqakhtah.
wngSh ybmtw alyw leyny hcqnym wxlzh nelw mel rglw wyrqh bpnyw wenth wamrh kkh yeSh layS aSr la ybnh at byt axyw then his brother's woman come unto him in the presence of the elders, and loose his shoe from off his foot, and spit in his face-turns, and answer and say, so it be done unto that man that will not between-build up his brother's daughter-house. venigeshah yebimto ’elav le‘enei hazeqenim vekhalezah na‘alo me‘al raglo veyareqah befanav, ve‘anetah ve’amerah kakhah ye‘aseh la’ish ’asher lo yibneh bet ’akhiv.
wnqra Smw bySral byt xlwz hnel and his name be called in israel-juicy-towards, the daughter-house of him that hath his shoe loosed. veniqra shemo beyisra’el, bet khaluz hana‘al.
ky ynzw anSym yxdw ayS waxyw wqrbh aSt haxd lhzyl at aySh myd mkhw wSlxh ydh whxcyqh bmbSyw when men strive together one with another, and the woman of the one draweth near for to deliver her man out of the hand of him that hits him, and putteth forth her hand, and taketh him by the secrets: ki yinazu ’anashim yakhdav ’ish ve’akhiv veqarebah ’eshet ha’ekhad lehazil ’ishah miyad makehu, veshalekhah yadah vehekheziqah bimbushav.
wqzth at kph la txws eynk then thou cut off her hand, thine eye not pity her. veqazotah kapah, lo takhos ‘enekha.
la yhyh lk bkysk abn wabn gdwlh wqTnh no have in thy bag divers weights, a great and a small. lo yihyeh lekha bekhisekha ’eben va’aben, gedolah uqetanah.
la yhyh lk bbytk ayph wayph gdwlh wqTnh no have in thine daughter-house divers measures, a great and a small. lo yihyeh lekha bebetekha ’efah ve’efah, gedolah uqetanah.
abn Slmh wzdq yhyh lk ayph Slmh wzdq yhyh lk lmen yarykw ymyk el hadmh aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk and thou have a perfect and just weight, a perfect and just measure thou have: that thy days may be lengthened in the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee. ’eben shelemah vazedeq yihyeh lakh ’efah shelemah vazedeq yihyeh lakh, lema‘an ya’arikhu yamekha ‘al ha’adamah ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
ky twebt yhwh alhyk kl eSh alh kl eSh ewl for all that do such things, and all that do unrighteously, are an abomination unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these. ki to‘abat yhvh ’elohekha kal ‘oseh ’eleh, kol ‘oseh ‘avel..
ckwr at aSr eSh lk emlq bdrk bzatkm mmzrym remember what amalek-labour-king-moloch did unto thee by the way, when ye were come forth out of mizraim-narrows; zakhor ’asher ‘asah lekha ‘amaleq, baderekh bezetekhem mimizrayim.
aSr qrk bdrk wycnb bk kl hnxSlym axryk wath eyp wyge wla yra alhym how he met thee by the way, and smote the here-hindmost of thee, even all that were feeble behind thee, when thou wast faint and weary; and he feared not to-no-these. ’asher qarekha baderekh vayzaneb bekha kal hanekheshalim ’akharekha ve’atah ‘ayef veyagea‘, velo yarei ’elohim.
whyh bhnyx yhwh alhyk lk mkl aybyk msbyb barz aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk nxlh lrSth tmxh at ckr emlq mtxt hSmym la tSkx therefore it be, when yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these hath given thee rest from all thine father-adversaries round about, in the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee for an inheritance to possess it, that thou blot out the remembrance of amalek-labour-king-moloch from under namespaces; no forget it. vehayah behaniakh yhvh ’elohekha lekha mikal ’oyebekha misabib ba’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lerishtah timkheh zekher ‘amaleq mitakhat hashamayim, lo tishkakh.
whyh ky tbwa al harz aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk nxlh wyrSth wySbt bh and it be, when thou art come in unto the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee for an inheritance, and possessest it, and dwellest therein; vehayah ki tabo ’el ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha nakhalah, virishtah veyashabta bah.
wlqxt mraSyt kl pry hadmh aSr tbya marzk aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk wSmt bTna whlkt al hmqwm aSr ybxr yhwh alhyk lSkn Smw Sm that thou take of the first of all the fruit of the earth, which thou bring of thy land that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee, and put it in a basket, and go unto the stand-up-place which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these choose to place his name there. velaqakhta mereshit kal peri ha’adamah ’asher tabi me’arzekha ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh vesamta batene, vehalakhta ’el hamaqom ’asher yibkhar yhvh ’elohekha leshaken shemo sham.
wbat al hkhn aSr yhyh bymym hhm wamrt alyw hgdty hywm lyhwh alhyk ky baty al harz aSr nSbe yhwh labtynw ltt lnw and thou go unto the dimmer-server that be in those days, and say unto him, i profess this day unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, that i am come unto the country which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sware unto our fathers for to give us. ubata ’el hakohen ’asher yihyeh bayamim hahem, ve’amarta ’elav higadti hayom yhvh ’elohekha ki bati ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotenu latet lanu.
wlqx hkhn hTna mydk whnyxw lpny mcbx yhwh alhyk and the dimmer-server take the basket out of thine hand, and set it down before-turns the butcher-kitchen of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these. velaqakh hakohen hatene miyadekha, vehinikho lifnei mizbakh yhvh ’elohekha.
wenyt wamrt lpny yhwh alhyk army abd aby wyrd mzrymh wygr Sm bmty meT wyhy Sm lgwy gdwl ezwm wrb and thou speak and say before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, a arami-high ready to perish was my father, and he went down into mizraim-narrows, and sojourned there with a few, and became there a nation, great, mighty, and populous: ve‘anita ve’amarta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha ’arami ’obed ’abi vayered mizraymah vayagar sham bimtei me‘at, vayhi sham lego gadol ‘azum varab.
wyrew atnw hmzrym wyenwnw wytnw elynw ebdh qSh and the mizraim-narrowsians bad entreated us, and afflicted us, and laid upon us hard bondage: vayare‘u ’otanu hamizrim vay‘anunu, vayitenu ‘alenu ‘abodah qashah.
wnzeq al yhwh alhy abtynw wySme yhwh at qlnw wyra at enynw wat emlnw wat lxznw and when we cried unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of our fathers, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah heard our voice, and looked on our affliction, and our labor, and our oppression: vaniz‘aq ’el yhvh ’elohei ’abotenu, vayishma‘ yhvh qolenu vayar ‘aneyenu ve’et ‘amalenu ve’et lakhazenu.
wywzanw yhwh mmzrym byd xcqh wbcre nTwyh wbmra gdl wbatwt wbmptym and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah brought us forth out of mizraim-narrows with a mighty hand, and with an outstretched arm, and with great terribleness, and with signs, and with wonders: vayozi’enu yhvh mimizrayim beyad khazaqah ubizroa‘ netuyah ubemora gadol, ube’otot ubemofetim.
wybanw al hmqwm hch wytn lnw at harz hcat arz cbt xlb wdbS and he hath brought us into this place, and hath given us this land, even a land that floweth with milk and honey. vaybi’enu ’el hamaqom hazeh, vayiten lanu ha’arez hazot ’erez zabat khalab udebash.
weth hnh hbaty at raSyt pry hadmh aSr ntth ly yhwh whnxtw lpny yhwh alhyk whStxwyt lpny yhwh alhyk and now, behold, i have brought the firstfruits of the land, which thou, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, hast given me. and thou set it before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, and partake-shatakh before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these: ve‘atah hineh hebeti reshit peri ha’adamah ’asher natatah li yhvh, vehinakhto lifnei yhvh ’elohekha vehishtakhavita lifnei yhvh ’elohekha.
wSmxt bkl hTwb aSr ntn lk yhwh alhyk wlbytk ath whlwy whgr aSr bqrbk and thou rejoice in every good thing which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these hath given unto thee, and unto thine daughter-house, thou, and the levi-jointe, and the stranger that is among you. vesamakhta bekhal hatob ’asher natan lekha yhvh ’elohekha ulebetekha, ’atah vehalevi vehager ’asher beqirbekha.
ky tklh leSr at kl meSr tbwatk bSnh hSlySt Snt hmeSr wntth llwy lgr lytwm wlalmnh waklw bSeryk wSbew when thou hast made an end of tithing all the tithes of thine increase the third year, which is the year of tithing, and hast given it unto the levi-jointe, the stranger, the fatherless, and the widow, that they may eat within thy hair-gates, and be filled; ki tekhaleh la‘ser kal ma‘sar tebu’atekha bashanah hashelishit shenat hama‘aser, venatatah lalevi lager layatom vela’almanah ve’akhelu bish‘arekha vesabe‘u.
wamrt lpny yhwh alhyk berty hqdS mn hbyt wgm nttyw llwy wlgr lytwm wlalmnh kkl mzwtk aSr zwytny la ebrty mmzwtyk wla Skxty then thou say before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, i have brought away the dedicateed things out of mine daughter-house, and also have given them unto the levi-jointe, and unto the stranger, to the fatherless, and to the widow, according to all thy directives which thou hast direct me: i have not transgressed thy directives, neither have i forgotten them. ve’amarta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha bi‘arti haqodesh min habayit vegam netativ lalevi velager layatom vela’almanah kekhal mizvatekha ’asher zivitani, lo ‘abarti mimizvotekha velo shakhakheti.
la aklty bany mmnw wla berty mmnw bTma wla ntty mmnw lmt Smety bqwl yhwh alhy eSyty kkl aSr zwytny i have not eaten thereof in my mourning, neither have i taken away ought thereof for any stained-ceased use, nor given ought thereof for the dead: and i have hearkened to the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah my to-no-these, and have done according to all that thou hast direct me. lo ’akhalti be’oni mimenu velo bi‘arti mimenu betame velo natati mimenu lemet, shama‘ti beqol yhvh ’elohay ‘asiti kekhol ’asher zivitani.
hSqyph mmewn qdSk mn hSmym wbrk at emk at ySral wat hadmh aSr ntth lnw kaSr nSbet labtynw arz cbt xlb wdbS look down from thy dedicated-finished habitation, from namespaces, and knee-fluffy-bless thy with-mum-people israel-juicy-towards, and the land which thou hast given us, as thou swarest unto our fathers, a land that floweth with milk and honey. hashqifah mime‘on qadshekha min hashamayim ubarekh ‘amekha yisra’el ve’et ha’adamah ’asher natatah lanu, ka’asher nishba‘ta la’abotenu ’erez zabat khalab udebash.
hywm hch yhwh alhyk mzwk leSwt at hxqym halh wat hmSpTym wSmrt weSyt awtm bkl lbbk wbkl npSk this day yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these hath direct thee to do these statutes and decision-grammars: thou therefore keep and do them with all thine heart, and with all thy being. hayom hazeh yhvh ’elohekha mezavekha la‘asot hakhuqim ha’eleh ve’et hamishpatim, veshamarta ve‘asita ’otam bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha.
at yhwh hamrt hywm lhywt lk lalhym wllkt bdrkyw wlSmr xqyw wmzwtyw wmSpTyw wlSme bqlw thou hast avouched yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah this day to be thy to-no-these, and to walk in his ways, and to keep his statutes, and his directives, and his decision-grammars, and to hearken unto his voice: yhvh he’emarta hayom, lihyot lekha lelohim velalekhet bidrakhav velishmor khuqav umizvotav umishpatav velishmoa‘ beqolo.
wyhwh hamyrk hywm lhywt lw lem sglh kaSr dbr lk wlSmr kl mzwtyw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath avouched thee this day to be his peculiar with-mum-people, as he hath promised thee, and that thou shouldest keep all his directives; yhvh he’emirekha hayom lihyot lo le‘am segulah ka’asher diber lakh, velishmor kal mizvotav.
wlttk elywn el kl hgwym aSr eSh lthlh wlSm wltpart wlhytk em qdS lyhwh alhyk kaSr dbr and to make thee high above all nations which he hath made, in praise, and in name, and in honor; and that thou mayest be an dedicated-finished with-mum-people unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, as he hath bee-spoken. uletitekha ‘elyon ‘al kal hagoyim ’asher ‘asah lithilah uleshem uletif’aret, velihyotekha ‘am qadosh yhvh ’elohekha ka’asher diber.
wyzw mSh wcqny ySral at hem lamr Smr at kl hmzwh aSr anky mzwh atkm hywm and mose-extracted with the elders of israel-juicy-towards direct the with-mum-people, saying, keep all the directives which i direct you this day. vayzav mosheh veziqnei yisra’el ha‘am lemor, shamor kal hamizvah ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom.
whyh bywm aSr tebrw at hyrdn al harz aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk whqmt lk abnym gdlwt wSdt atm bSyd and it be on the day when ye pass over jordan-its-going-down unto the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee, that thou set thee up great stones, and plaster them with plaster: vehayah bayom ’asher ta‘abru hayarden ’el ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh, vahaqemota lekha ’abanim gedolot vesadta ’otam basid.
wktbt elyhn at kl dbry htwrh hcat bebrk lmen aSr tba al harz aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk arz cbt xlb wdbS kaSr dbr yhwh alhy abtyk lk and thou write upon them all the bee-words of this teaching, when thou art passed over, that thou mayest go in unto the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee, a land that floweth with milk and honey; as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of thy fathers hath promised thee. vekhatabta ‘alehen kal dibrei hatorah hazot be‘aberekha, lema‘an tabo ’el ha’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lekha ’erez zabat khalab udebash ka’asher diber yhvh ’elohe ’abotekha lakh.
whyh bebrkm at hyrdn tqymw at habnym halh aSr anky mzwh atkm hywm bhr eybl wSdt awtm bSyd therefore it be when ye be gone over jordan-its-going-down, that ye set up these stones, which i direct you this day, in mount ebal-mourning, and thou plaster them with plaster. vehayah be‘aberekhem hayarden taqimu ha’abanim ha’eleh ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom behar ‘ebal, vesadta ’otam basid.
wbnyt Sm mcbx lyhwh alhyk mcbx abnym la tnyp elyhm brcl and there thou between-build an butcher-kitchen unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, an butcher-kitchen of stones: no lift up any iron tool upon them. ubanita sham mizbeakh yhvh ’elohekha, mizbakh ’abanim lo tanif ‘alehem barzel.
abnym Slmwt tbnh at mcbx yhwh alhyk whelyt elyw ewlt lyhwh alhyk thou between-build the butcher-kitchen of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these of whole stones: and thou inward on-ups thereon unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these: ’abanim shelemot tibneh mizbakh yhvh ’elohekha, veha‘alita ‘alav ‘olot yhvh ’elohekha.
wcbxt Slmym waklt Sm wSmxt lpny yhwh alhyk and thou inward wholes, and eat there, and rejoice before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these. vezabakhta shelamim ve’akhalta sham, vesamakhta lifnei yhvh ’elohekha.
wktbt el habnym at kl dbry htwrh hcat bar hyTb and thou write upon the stones all the bee-words of this teaching very plainly. vekhatabta ‘al ha’abanim kal dibrei hatorah hazot ba’er heteb.
wydbr mSh whkhnym hlwym al kl ySral lamr hskt wSme ySral hywm hch nhyyt lem lyhwh alhyk and mose-extracted and the dimmer-servers the levi-jointes spake unto all israel-juicy-towards, saying, take heed, and hearken, o israel-juicy-towards; this day thou art become the with-mum-people of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these. vaydaber mosheh vehakohanim halviyim ’el kal yisra’el lemor, hasket ushema‘ yisra’el hayom hazeh nihyeta le‘am yhvh ’elohekha.
wSmet bqwl yhwh alhyk weSyt at mzwtw wat xqyw aSr anky mzwk hywm thou therefore obey the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, and do his directives and his statutes, which i direct thee this day. veshama‘ta beqol yhvh ’elohekha, ve‘asita mizvotav ve’et khuqav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom.
wyzw mSh at hem bywm hhwa lamr and mose-extracted charged the with-mum-people the same day, saying, vayzav mosheh ha‘am bayom hahu lemor.
alh yemdw lbrk at hem el hr grcym bebrkm at hyrdn Smewn wlwy wyhwdh wySSkr wywsp wbnymn these stand upon mount gerizim-grasses to knee-fluffy-bless the with-mum-people, when ye are come over jordan-its-going-down; simeon-hear-home, and levi-join, and judah-know, and issachar-wage, and joseph-add, and benjamin-he-between-of-righthand: ’eleh ya‘amdu lebarekh ha‘am ‘al har gerizim be‘aberekhem hayarden, shim‘on velevi vihudah veyisashkhar veyosef ubinyamin.
walh yemdw el hqllh bhr eybl rawbn gd waSr wcbwln dn wnptly and these stand upon mount ebal-mourning to curse; reuben-see-child, gad-tell-luck, and asher-bliss, and zebulun-fertile, dan-discuss, and naphtali-twisted. ve’eleh ya‘amdu ‘al haqelalah behar ‘ebal, re’uben gad ve’asher uzebulun dan venaftali.
wenw hlwym wamrw al kl ayS ySral qwl rm and the levi-jointes speak, and say unto all the men of israel-juicy-towards with a loud voice, ve‘anu halviyim ve’ameru ’el kal ’ish yisra’el qol ram.
arwr hayS aSr yeSh psl wmskh twebt yhwh meSh ydy xrS wSm bstr wenw kl hem wamrw amn cursed be the man that maketh any graven or molten image, an abomination unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, the work of the hands of the craftsman, and putteth it in a secret place. and all the with-mum-people answer and say, amen-nurture. ’arur ha’ish ’asher ya‘aseh fesel umasekhah to‘abat yhvh ma‘aseh yedei kharash vesam basater, ve‘anu khal ha‘am ve’ameru ’amen.
arwr mqlh abyw wamw wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that setteth light by his father or his mother. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur maqleh ’abiv ve’imo, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr msyg gbwl rehw wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that removeth his neighbor's landmark. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur masig gebul re‘ehu, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr mSgh ewr bdrk wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that maketh the blind to wander out of the way. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur mashgeh ‘iver badarekh, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr mTh mSpT gr ytwm walmnh wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that perverteth the decision-grammar of the stranger, fatherless, and widow. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur mateh mishpat ger yatom ve’almanah, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr Skb em aSt abyw ky glh knp abyw wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that lieth with his father's woman; because he uncovereth his father's skirt. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur shokheb ‘im ’eshet ’abiv ki gilah kenaf ’abiv, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr Skb em kl bhmh wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that lieth with any manner of beast. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur shokheb ‘im kal behemah, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr Skb em axtw bt abyw aw bt amw wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that lieth with his sister, the daughter-hoof-bat-child of his father, or the daughter-hoof-bat-child of his mother. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur shokheb ‘im ’akhoto bat ’abiv ’o bat ’imo, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr Skb em xtntw wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that lieth with his mother in teaching. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur shokheb ‘im khotanto, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr mkh rehw bstr wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that hits his neighbor secretly. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur makeh re‘ehu basater, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr lqx Sxd lhkwt npS dm nqy wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that taketh reward to slay an innocent person. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur loqeakh shokhad lehakot nefesh dam naqi, ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
arwr aSr la yqym at dbry htwrh hcat leSwt awtm wamr kl hem amn cursed be he that confirmeth not all the bee-words of this teaching to do them. and all the with-mum-people say, amen-nurture. ’arur ’asher lo yaqim dibrei hatorah hazot la‘asot ve’amar kal ha‘am ’amen.
whyh am Smwe tSme bqwl yhwh alhyk lSmr leSwt at kl mzwtyw aSr anky mzwk hywm wntnk yhwh alhyk elywn el kl gwyy harz and it come to pass, if thou hearken diligently unto the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, to guard-observe and to do all his directives which i direct thee this day, that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these will set thee on high above all nations of the earth: vehayah ’im shamoa‘ tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor la‘asot kal mizvotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, unetanekha yhvh ’elohekha ‘elyon ‘al kal goyei ha’arez.
wbaw elyk kl hbrkwt halh whSygk ky tSme bqwl yhwh alhyk and all these knee-fluffy-blessings come on thee, and overtake thee, if thou hearken unto the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these. uba’u ‘alekha kal haberakhot ha’eleh vehisigukha, ki tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha.
brwk ath beyr wbrwk ath bSdh knee-fluffy-blessed thou be in the light-city, and knee-fluffy-blessed thou be in the field. barukh ’atah ba‘ir, ubarukh ’atah basadeh.
brwk pry bTnk wpry admtk wpry bhmtk Sgr alpyk weStrwt zank knee-fluffy-blessed be the fruit of thy body, and the fruit of thy ground, and the fruit of thy in-them-animal, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep. barukh peri bitnekha uferi ’admatekha uferi behemtekha, shegar ’alafekha ve‘ashterot zonekha.
brwk Tnak wmSartk knee-fluffy-blessed be thy basket and thy store. barukh tan’akha umish’artekha.
brwk ath bbak wbrwk ath bzatk knee-fluffy-blessed thou be when thou comest in, and knee-fluffy-blessed thou be when thou goest out. barukh ’atah bebo’ekha, ubarukh ’atah bezetekha.
ytn yhwh at aybyk hqmym elyk ngpym lpnyk bdrk axd yzaw alyk wbSbeh drkym ynwsw lpnyk yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah cause thine father-adversaries that rise up against thee to be smitten before-turns thy face-turns: they come out against thee one way, and flee before-turns thee seven ways. yiten yhvh ’oyebekha haqamim ‘alekha nigafim lefanekha, bederekh ’ekhad yeze’u ’elekha ubeshib‘ah derakhim yanusu lefanekha.
yzw yhwh atk at hbrkh basmyk wbkl mSlx ydk wbrkk barz aSr yhwh alhyk ntn lk yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct the knee-fluffy-blessing upon thee in thy storehouses, and in all that thou settest thine hand unto; and he knee-fluffy-bless thee in the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these giveth thee. yezav yhvh ’itekha haberakhah ba’asamekha ubekhol mishlakh yadekha, uberakhkha ba’arez ’asher yhvh ’elohekha noten lakh.
yqymk yhwh lw lem qdwS kaSr nSbe lk ky tSmr at mzwt yhwh alhyk whlkt bdrkyw yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah establish thee an dedicated-finished with-mum-people unto himself, as he hath sworn unto thee, if thou keep the directives of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, and walk in his ways. yeqimekha yhvh lo le‘am qadosh ka’asher nishba‘ lakh, ki tishmor mizvot yhvh ’elohekha vehalakhta bidrakhav.
wraw kl emy harz ky Sm yhwh nqra elyk wyraw mmk and all with-mum-people of the earth see that thou art called by the name of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and they be afraid of thee. vera’u kal ‘amei ha’arez ki shem yhvh niqra ‘alekha, veyare’u mimeka.
whwtrk yhwh lTwbh bpry bTnk wbpry bhmtk wbpry admtk el hadmh aSr nSbe yhwh labtyk ltt lk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah make thee plenteous in goods, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy in-them-animal, and in the fruit of thy ground, in the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sware unto thy fathers to give thee. vehotirkha yhvh letobah bifri bitnekha ubifri behamtekha ubifri ’admatekha, ‘al ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekha latet lakh.
yptx yhwh lk at awzrw hTwb at hSmym ltt mTr arzk betw wlbrk at kl meSh ydk whlwyt gwym rbym wath la tlwh yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah open unto thee his good treasure, the namespaces to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to knee-fluffy-bless all the work of thine hand: and thou lend unto many nations, and no borrow. yiftakh yhvh lekha ’ozaro hatob hashamayim latet metar ’arzekha be‘ito ulebarekh kal ma‘aseh yadekha, vehilvita goyim rabim ve’atah lo tilveh.
wntnk yhwh lraS wla lcnb whyyt rq lmelh wla thyh lmTh ky tSme al mzwt yhwh alhyk aSr anky mzwk hywm lSmr wleSwt and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah make thee the head, and not the tail; and thou be above only, and no be beneath; if that thou hearken unto the directives of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, which i direct thee this day, to guard-observe and to do them: unetanekha yhvh lerosh velo lezanab vehayita raq lema‘lah velo tihyeh lematah, ki tishma‘ ’el mizvot yhvh ’elohekha ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom lishmor vela‘asot.
wla tswr mkl hdbrym aSr anky mzwh atkm hywm ymyn wSmawl llkt axry alhym axrym lebdm and no go aside from any of the bee-words which i direct thee this day, to the right hand, or to the left, to go after other to-no-these to work for them. velo tasur mikal hadebarim ’asher ’anokhi mezaveh ’etkhem hayom yamin usemol, lalekhet ’akharei ’elohim ’akherim le‘abedam.
whyh am la tSme bqwl yhwh alhyk lSmr leSwt at kl mzwtyw wxqtyw aSr anky mzwk hywm wbaw elyk kl hqllwt halh whSygwk and it come to pass, if thou wilt not hearken unto the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, to guard-observe to do all his directives and his statutes which i direct thee this day; that all these curses come upon thee, and overtake thee: vehayah ’im lo tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor la‘asot kal mizvotav vekhuqotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, uba’u ‘alekha kal haqelalot ha’eleh vehisigukha.
arwr ath beyr warwr ath bSdh cursed thou be in the light-city, and cursed thou be in the field. ’arur ’atah ba‘ir, ve’arur ’atah basadeh.
arwr Tnak wmSartk cursed be thy basket and thy store. ’arur tan’akha umish’artekha.
arwr pry bTnk wpry admtk Sgr alpyk weStrwt zank cursed be the fruit of thy body, and the fruit of thy land, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep. ’arur peri bitnekha uferi ’admatekha, shegar ’alafekha ve‘ashterot zonekha.
arwr ath bbak warwr ath bzatk cursed thou be when thou comest in, and cursed thou be when thou goest out. ’arur ’atah bebo’ekha, ve’arur ’atah bezetekha.
ySlx yhwh bk at hmarh at hmhwmh wat hmgert bkl mSlx ydk aSr teSh ed hSmdk wed abdk mhr mpny re mellyk aSr ecbtny yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah send upon thee cursing, vexation, and rebuke, in all that thou settest thine hand unto for to do, until thou be destroyed, and until thou perish quickly; because of the wickedness of thy doings, whereby thou hast forsaken me. yeshalakh yhvh bekha hame’erah hamehumah ve’et hamig‘eret bekhal mishlakh yadekha ’asher ta‘aseh, ‘ad hishamedkha ve‘ad ’abadekha maher mipenei roa‘ ma‘alalekha ’asher ‘azabtani.
ydbq yhwh bk at hdbr ed kltw atk mel hadmh aSr ath ba Smh lrSth yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah make the pestilence cleave unto thee, until he have consumed thee from off the land, whither thou goest to possess it. yadbeq yhvh bekha ’et hadaber, ‘ad kaloto ’otekha me‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah.
ykkh yhwh bSxpt wbqdxt wbdlqt wbxrxr wbxrb wbSdpwn wbyrqwn wrdpwk ed abdk yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hit thee with a consumption, and with a fever, and with an inflammation, and with an extreme burning, and with the sword, and with blasting, and with mildew; and they pursue thee until thou perish. yakekhah yhvh bashakhefet ubaqadakhat ubadaleqet ubakharkhur ubakhereb ubashidafon ubayeraqon, uredafukha ‘ad ’abedekha.
whyw Smyk aSr el raSk nxSt wharz aSr txtyk brcl and thy namespaces that is over thy head be brass, and the earth that is under thee be iron. vehayu shamekha ’asher ‘al roshekha nekhoshet, veha’arez ’asher takhtekha barzel.
ytn yhwh at mTr arzk abq wepr mn hSmym yrd elyk ed hSmdk yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah make the rain of thy land powder and dust: from namespaces it come down upon thee, until thou be destroyed. yiten yhvh metar ’arzekha ’abaq ve‘afar, min hashamayim yered ‘alekha ‘ad hishamedakh.
ytnk yhwh ngp lpny aybyk bdrk axd tza alyw wbSbeh drkym tnws lpnyw whyyt lcewh lkl mmlkwt harz yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah cause thee to be smitten before-turns thine father-adversaries: thou go out one way against them, and flee seven ways before-turns them: and be removed into all the king-molochdoms of the earth. yitenkha yhvh nigaf lifnei ’oyebekha bederekh ’ekhad tezei ’elav ubeshib‘ah derakhim tanus lefanav, vehayita leza‘avah lekhol mamlekhot ha’arez.
whyth nbltk lmakl lkl ewp hSmym wlbhmt harz wayn mxryd and thy carcass be meat unto all fowls of the ai-islandr, and unto the beasts of the earth, and no man fray them away. vehayetah niblatekha lema’akhal lekhal ‘of hashamayim ulebehemat ha’arez, ve’en makharid.
ykkh yhwh bSxyn mzrym wbeplym wbTxrym wbgrb wbxrs aSr la twkl lhrpa yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will hit thee with the botch of mizraim-narrows, and with the emerods, and with the scab, and with the itch, whereof thou canst not be healed. yakekhah yhvh bishkhin mizrayim ubatekhorim ubagarab ubekhares, ’asher lo tukhal leherafe.
ykkh yhwh bSgewn wbewrwn wbtmhwn lbb yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hit thee with madness, and blindness, and astonishment of heart: yakekhah yhvh beshiga‘on ube‘ivaron, ubetimhon lebab.
whyyt mmSS bzhrym kaSr ymSS hewr baplh wla tzlyx at drkyk whyyt ak eSwq wgcwl kl hymym wayn mwSye and thou grope at noonday, as the blind gropeth in darkness, and no prosper in thy ways: and thou be only oppressed and spoiled evermore, and no man save thee. vehayita memashesh bazahorayim ka’asher yemashesh ha‘iver ba’afelah velo tazliakh derakhekha, vehayita ’akh ‘ashuq vegazul kal hayamim ve’en moshia‘.
aSh tarS wayS axr ySglnh ySkbnh byt tbnh wla tSb bw krm tTe wla txllnw thou betroth a woman, and another man lie with her: thou between-build an daughter-house, and no dwell therein: thou plant a vineyard, and not gather the grapes thereof. ’ishah te’ares ve’ish ’akher yishkabenah bayit tibneh velo tesheb bo, kerem tita‘ velo tekhalelenu.
Swrk Tbwx leynyk wla takl mmnw xmrk gcwl mlpnyk wla ySwb lk zank ntnwt laybyk wayn lk mwSye thine wall-ox be slain before-turns thine eyes, and no eat thereof: thine ass be violently taken away from before-turns thy face-turns, and not be restored to thee: thy sheep be given unto thine father-adversaries, and thou have none to rescue them. shorkha tabuakh le‘enekha velo tokhal mimenu khamorekha gazul milefanekha velo yashub lakh, zonekha netunot le’oyebekha ve’en lekha moshia‘.
bnyk wbntyk ntnym lem axr weynyk rawt wklwt alyhm kl hywm wayn lal ydk thy children-betweens and thy children-betweenesss be given unto another with-mum-people, and thine eyes look, and fail with longing for them all the day long; and there be no might in thine hand. banekha ubenotekha netunim le‘am ’akher ve‘enekha ro’ot vekhalot ’alehem kal hayom, ve’en le’el yadekha.
pry admtk wkl ygyek yakl em aSr la ydet whyyt rq eSwq wrzwz kl hymym the fruit of thy land, and all thy labors, a nation which thou knowest not eat up; and thou be only oppressed and crushed alway: peri ’admatekha vekhal yegi‘akha yokhal ‘am ’asher lo yada‘eta, vehayita raq ‘ashuq verazuz kal hayamim.
whyyt mSge mmrah eynyk aSr trah so that thou be mad for the sight of thine eyes which thou see. vehayita meshuga‘, mimar’eh ‘enekha ’asher tir’eh.
ykkh yhwh bSxyn re el hbrkym wel hSqym aSr la twkl lhrpa mkp rglk wed qdqdk yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hit thee in the knees, and in the legs, with a sore botch that cannot be healed, from the sole of thy foot unto the top of thy head. yakekhah yhvh bishkhin ra‘ ‘al habirkayim ve‘al hashoqayim ’asher lo leherafe, mikaf raglekha ve‘ad qadeqodekha.
ywlk yhwh atk wat mlkk aSr tqym elyk al gwy aSr la ydet ath wabtyk webdt Sm alhym axrym ez wabn yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bring thee, and thy king-moloch which thou set over thee, unto a nation which neither thou nor thy fathers have hand-known; and there thou work for other to-no-these, wood and father-child-stone. yolekh yhvh ’otekha ve’et malkekha ’asher taqim ‘alekha ’el go ’asher lo yada‘ta ’atah va’abotekha, ve‘abadta sham ’elohim ’akherim ‘ez va’aben.
whyyt lSmh lmSl wlSnynh bkl hemym aSr ynhgk yhwh Smh and thou become an astonishment, a proverb, and a byword, among all nations whither yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah lead thee. vehayita leshamah lemashal velishninah, bekhol ha‘amim ’asher yenahegkha yhvh shamah.
cre rb twzya hSdh wmeT tasp ky yxslnw harbh thou carry much seed out into the field, and gather and little in; for the locust consume it. zera‘ rab tozi hasadeh, ume‘at te’esof ki yakhselenu ha’arbeh.
krmym tTe webdt wyyn la tSth wla tagr ky taklnw htlet thou plant vineyards, and dress them, and neither drink of the wine-inherit, nor gather the grapes; for the worms eat them. keramim tita‘ ve‘abadeta, veyayin lo tishteh velo te’egor ki tokhelenu hatola‘at.
cytym yhyw lk bkl gbwlk wSmn la tswk ky ySl cytk thou have olive trees throughout all thy coasts, and no lube thyself with the name-from-oil; for thine olive cast his fruit. zetim yihyu lekha bekhal gebulekha, veshemen lo tasukh ki yishal zetekha.
bnym wbnwt twlyd wla yhyw lk ky ylkw bSby thou beget children-betweens and children-betweenesss, and no enjoy them; for they go into captivity. banim ubanot tolid, velo yihyu lakh ki yelekhu bashebi.
kl ezk wpry admtk yyrS hzlzl all thy trees and fruit of thy land the locust consume. kal ‘ezekha uferi ’admatekha, yeyaresh hazelazal.
hgr aSr bqrbk yelh elyk melh melh wath trd mTh mTh the stranger that is within thee get up above thee very high; and thou come down very low. hager ’asher beqirbekha ya‘aleh ‘alekha ma‘lah ma‘elah, ve’atah tered matah matah.
hwa ylwk wath la tlwnw hwa yhyh lraS wath thyh lcnb he lend to thee, and no lend to him: he be the head, and thou be the tail. hu yalvekha ve’atah lo talvenu, hu yihyeh lerosh ve’atah tihyeh lezanab.
wbaw elyk kl hqllwt halh wrdpwk whSygwk ed hSmdk ky la Smet bqwl yhwh alhyk lSmr mzwtyw wxqtyw aSr zwk moreover all these curses come upon thee, and pursue thee, and overtake thee, till thou be destroyed; because thou hearkenedst not unto the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, to keep his directives and his statutes which he direct thee: uba’u ‘alekha kal haqelalot ha’eleh uredafukha vehisigukha ‘ad hishamedakh, ki lo shama‘ta beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav ’asher zivakh.
whyw bk lawt wlmwpt wbcrek ed ewlm and they be upon thee for a sign and for a wonder, and upon thy seed for ever. vehayu bekha le’ot ulemofet, ubezar‘akha ‘ad ‘olam.
txt aSr la ebdt at yhwh alhyk bSmxh wbTwb lbb mrb kl because thou worked forst not yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these with joyfulness, and with gladness of heart, for the abundance of all things; takhat ’asher lo ‘abadta yhvh ’elohekha besimkhah ubetub lebab, merob kol.
webdt at aybyk aSr ySlxnw yhwh bk breb wbzma wbeyrm wbxsr kl wntn el brcl el zwark ed hSmydw atk therefore thou work for thine father-adversaries which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah send against thee, in hunger, and in thirst, and in nakedness, and in want of all things: and he put a yoke of iron upon thy neck, until he have destroyed thee. ve‘abadta ’oyebekha ’asher yeshalekhenu yhvh bakh bera‘ab ubezama ube‘erom ubekhoser kol, venatan ‘ol barzel ‘al zavarekha ‘ad hishmido ’otakh.
ySa yhwh elyk gwy mrxwq mqzh harz kaSr ydah hnSr gwy aSr la tSme lSnw yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bring a nation against thee from far, from the end of the earth, as swift as the drop-eagle flieth; a nation whose tongue no understand; yisa yhvh ‘alekha go merakhoq miqzeh ha’arez ka’asher yid’eh hanasher, go ’asher lo tishma‘ leshono.
gwy ec pnym aSr la ySa pnym lcqn wner la yxn a nation of fierce countenance, which not regard the person of the old, nor show favor to the young: go ‘az panim, ’asher lo yisa fanim lezaqen vena‘ar lo yakhon.
wakl pry bhmtk wpry admtk ed hSmdk aSr la ySayr lk dgn tyrwS wyzhr Sgr alpyk weStrt zank ed habydw atk and he eat the fruit of thy in-them-animal, and the fruit of thy land, until thou be destroyed: which also not leave thee either corn-swimming, wine-inherit, or name-from-oil, or the increase of thy kine, or flocks of thy sheep, until he have destroyed thee. ve’akhal peri behemtekha uferi ’admatekha ‘ad hishamedakh ’asher lo yash’ir lekha dagan tirosh veyizhar shegar ’alafekha ve‘ashterot zonekha, ‘ad ha’abido ’otakh.
whzr lk bkl Seryk ed rdt xmtyk hgbhwt whbzrwt aSr ath bTx bhn bkl arzk whzr lk bkl Seryk bkl arzk aSr ntn yhwh alhyk lk and he besiege thee in all thy hair-gates, until thy high and fenced walls come down, wherein thou trustedst, throughout all thy land: and he besiege thee in all thy hair-gates throughout all thy land, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these hath given thee. vehezar lekha bekhal she‘arekha ‘ad redet khomotekha hagebohot vehabezurot ’asher ’atah boteakh bahen bekhal ’arzekha, vehezar lekha bekhal she‘arekha bekhal ’arzekha ’asher natan yhvh ’elohekha lakh.
waklt pry bTnk bSr bnyk wbntyk aSr ntn lk yhwh alhyk bmzwr wbmzwq aSr yzyq lk aybk and thou eat the fruit of thine own body, the flesh of thy children-betweens and of thy children-betweenesss, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these hath given thee, in the siege, and in the straitness, wherewith thine father-adversaries distress thee: ve’akhalta feri bitnekha besar banekha ubenotekha ’asher natan lekha yhvh ’elohekha, bemazor ubemazoq ’asher yaziq lekha ’oyebekha.
hayS hrk bk wheng mad tre eynw baxyw wbaSt xyqw wbytr bnyw aSr ywtyr so that the man that is tender among you, and very delicate, his eye be bad toward his brother, and toward the woman of his bosom, and toward the remnant of his children-betweens which he leave: ha’ish harakh bekha vehe‘anog me’od, tera‘ ‘eno be’akhiv ube’eshet kheqo ubeyeter banav ’asher yotir.
mtt laxd mhm mbSr bnyw aSr yakl mbly hSayr lw kl bmzwr wbmzwq aSr yzyq lk aybk bkl Seryk so that he will not give to any of them of the flesh of his children-betweens whom he eat: because he hath nothing left him in the siege, and in the straitness, wherewith thine father-adversaries distress thee in all thy hair-gates. mitet le’akhad mehem mibesar banav ’asher yokhel mibeli hish’ir lo kol, bemazor ubemazoq ’asher yaziq lekha ’oyibkha bekhal she‘arekha.
hrkh bk whengh aSr la nsth kp rglh hzg el harz mhteng wmrk tre eynh bayS xyqh wbbnh wbbth the tender and delicate woman among you, which would not adventure to set the sole of her foot upon the ground for delicateness and tenderness, her eye be bad toward the man of her bosom, and toward her child-between, and toward her daughter-hoof-bat-child, harakah bekha veha‘anugah ’asher lo nisetah khaf raglah hazeg ‘al ha’arez mehit‘aneg umerokh, tera‘ ‘enah be’ish kheqah ubibnah ubebitah.
wbSlyth hywzt mbyn rglyh wbbnyh aSr tld ky taklm bxsr kl bstr bmzwr wbmzwq aSr yzyq lk aybk bSeryk and toward her young one that cometh out from between-bin her feet, and toward her children-betweens which she bear: for she eat them for want of all things secretly in the siege and straitness, wherewith thine enemy distress thee in thy hair-gates. ubeshilyatah hayozet miben ragleha ubebaneha ’asher teled ki tokhelem bekhoser kol basater, bemazor ubemazoq ’asher yaziq lekha ’oyibkha bish‘arekha.
am la tSmr leSwt at kl dbry htwrh hcat hktwbym bspr hch lyrah at hSm hnkbd whnwra hch at yhwh alhyk if thou wilt not guard-observe to do all the bee-words of this teaching that are written in this book, that thou mayest fear this glorious and fearful name, yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these; ’im lo tishmor la‘asot kal dibrei hatorah hazot haketubim basefer hazeh, leyir’ah hashem hanikhbad vehanora hazeh yhvh ’elohekha.
whpla yhwh at mktk wat mkwt crek mkwt gdlwt wnamnwt wxlym reym wnamnym then yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will make thy plagues wonderful, and the plagues of thy seed, even great plagues, and of long continuance, and sore sicknesses, and of long continuance. vehifla yhvh makotekha ve’et makot zar‘ekha, makot gedolot vene’emanot vakholayim ra‘im vene’emanim.
whSyb bk at kl mdwh mzrym aSr ygrt mpnyhm wdbqw bk moreover he will bring upon thee all the diseases of mizraim-narrows, which thou wast afraid of; and they cleave unto thee. veheshib bekha kal madveh mizrayim ’asher yagoreta mipenehem, vedabequ bakh.
gm kl xly wkl mkh aSr la ktwb bspr htwrh hcat yelm yhwh elyk ed hSmdk also every sickness, and every plague, which is not written in the book of this teaching, them will yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bring upon thee, until thou be destroyed. gam kal kholi vekhal makah ’asher lo khatub besefer hatorah hazot, ya‘lem yhvh ‘alekha ‘ad hishamedakh.
wnSartm bmty meT txt aSr hyytm kkwkby hSmym lrb ky la Smet bqwl yhwh alhyk and ye be left few in number, whereas ye were as the stars of namespaces for multitude; because thou wouldest not obey the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these. venish’artem bimtei me‘at takhat ’asher heyitem kekhokhbei hashamayim larob, ki lo shama‘ta beqol yhvh ’elohekha.
whyh kaSr SS yhwh elykm lhyTyb atkm wlhrbwt atkm kn ySyS yhwh elykm lhabyd atkm wlhSmyd atkm wnsxtm mel hadmh aSr ath ba Smh lrSth and it come to pass, that as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah rejoiced over you to do you good, and to multiply you; so yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will rejoice over you to destroy you, and to bring you to nought; and ye be plucked from off the land whither thou goest to possess it. vehayah ka’asher sas yhvh ‘alekhem lehetib ’etkhem uleharbot ’etkhem ken yasis yhvh ‘alekhem leha’abid ’etkhem ulehashmid ’etkhem, venisakhtem me‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah.
whpyzk yhwh bkl hemym mqzh harz wed qzh harz webdt Sm alhym axrym aSr la ydet ath wabtyk ez wabn and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah scatter thee among all with-mum-people, from the one end of the earth even unto the other; and there thou work for other to-no-these, which neither thou nor thy fathers have hand-known, even wood and father-child-stone. vehefizekha yhvh bekhal ha‘amim miqzeh ha’arez ve‘ad qezeh ha’arez, ve‘abadta sham ’elohim ’akherim ’asher lo yada‘ta ’atah va’abotekha ‘ez va’aben.
wbgwym hhm la trgye wla yhyh mnwx lkp rglk wntn yhwh lk Sm lb rgc wklywn eynym wdabwn npS and among these nations thou find no ease, neither the sole of thy foot have rest: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah give thee there a trembling heart, and failing of eyes, and sorrow of mind: ubagoyim hahem lo targia‘ velo yihyeh manoakh lekhaf raglekha, venatan yhvh lekha sham leb ragaz vekhilyon ‘enayim veda’abon nafesh.
whyw xyyk tlaym lk mngd wpxdt lylh wywmm wla tamyn bxyyk and thy life hang in doubt before-turns thee; and thou fear day and night, and have none assurance of thy life: vehayu khayekha telu’im lekha mineged, ufakhadta laylah veyomam velo ta’amin bekhayekha.
bbqr tamr my ytn erb wberb tamr my ytn bqr mpxd lbbk aSr tpxd wmmrah eynyk aSr trah in the morning thou say, would to-no-these it were even! and at even thou say, would to-no-these it were morning! for the fear of thine heart wherewith thou fear, and for the sight of thine eyes which thou see. baboqer tomar mi yiten ‘ereb uba‘ereb tomar mi yiten boqer, mipakhad lebabekha ’asher tifkhad umimar’eh ‘enekha ’asher tir’eh.
whSybk yhwh mzrym banywt bdrk aSr amrty lk la tsyp ewd lrath whtmkrtm Sm laybyk lebdym wlSpxwt wayn qnh and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah bring thee into mizraim-narrows again with ships, by the way whereof i spake unto thee, thou see it no more again: and there ye be sold unto your father-adversaries for workers and bondwomen, and no man buy you. veheshibekha yhvh mizrayim ba’oniyot baderekh ’asher ’amarti lekha lo tosif ‘od lir’otah, vehitmakartem sham le’oyebekha la‘abadim velishfakhot ve’en qoneh.
alh dbry hbryt aSr zwh yhwh at mSh lkrt at bny ySral barz mwab mlbd hbryt aSr krt atm bxrb these are the bee-words of the covenant, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted to make with children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards in the land of moab-from-father, beside the covenant which he made with them in horeb-sword. ’eleh dibrei haberit ’asher zivah yhvh mosheh likhrot ’et benei yisra’el be’erez mo’ab, milebad haberit ’asher karat ’itam bekhoreb.
wyqra mSh al kl ySral wyamr alhm atm raytm at kl aSr eSh yhwh leynykm barz mzrym lpreh wlkl ebdyw wlkl arzw and mose-extracted called unto all israel-juicy-towards, and said unto them, ye have seen all that yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah did before-turns your eyes in the land of mizraim-narrows unto pharaoh-big-house, and unto all his workers, and unto all his land; vayiqra mosheh ’el kal yisra’el vayomer ’alehem, ’atem re’item kal ’asher ‘asah yhvh le‘enekhem be’erez mizrayim lefar‘oh ulekhal ‘abadav ulekhal ’arzo.
hmswt hgdlt aSr raw eynyk hatt whmptym hgdlym hhm the great temptations which thine eyes have seen, the signs, and those great miracles: hamasot hagedolot ’asher ra’u ‘enekha, ha’otot vehamofetim hagedolim hahem.
wla ntn yhwh lkm lb ldet weynym lrawt wacnym lSme ed hywm hch yet yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath not given you an heart to perceive, and eyes to see, and ears to hear, unto this day. velo natan yhvh lakhem leb lada‘at ve‘enayim lir’ot ve’azenayim lishmoa‘, ‘ad hayom hazeh.
wawlk atkm arbeym Snh bmdbr la blw Slmtykm melykm wnelk la blth mel rglk and i have led you forty years in the place-of-word-desert: your clothes are not waxen old upon you, and thy shoe is not waxen old upon thy foot. va’olekh ’etkhem ’arba‘im shanah bamidbar, lo balu salmotekhem me‘alekhem vena‘alkha lo baletah me‘al raglekha.
lxm la akltm wyyn wSkr la Stytm lmen tdew ky any yhwh alhykm ye have not eaten bread, neither have ye drunk wine-inherit or strong drink: that ye might hand-know that i am yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these. lekhem lo ’akhaltem veyayin veshekhar lo shetitem, lema‘an tede‘u ki ’ani yhvh ’elohekhem.
wtbaw al hmqwm hch wyza syxn mlk xSbwn wewg mlk hbSn lqratnw lmlxmh wnkm and when ye came unto this place, sihon-curly the king-moloch of heshbon-score-supposition, and og-mock the king-moloch of bashan-at-tooth, came out against us unto battle, and we smote them: vatabo’u ’el hamaqom hazeh, vayezei sikhon melekh kheshbon ve‘og melekh habashan liqratenu lamilkhamah vanakem.
wnqx at arzm wntnh lnxlh lrawbny wlgdy wlxzy SbT hmnSy and we took their land, and gave it for an inheritance unto the reuben-see-childites, and to the gad-tell-luckites, and to the half branch of manasseh-place-of-sleep. vaniqakh ’arzam vanitenah lenakhalah lar’ubeni velagadi, velakhazi shebet hamnashi.
wSmrtm at dbry hbryt hcat weSytm atm lmen tSkylw at kl aSr teSwn keep therefore the bee-words of this covenant, and do them, that ye may prosper in all that ye do. ushemartem dibrei haberit hazot va‘asitem ’otam, lema‘an taskilu kal ’asher ta‘asun.
atm nzbym hywm klkm lpny yhwh alhykm raSykm SbTykm cqnykm wSTrykm kl ayS ySral ye stand this day all of you before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these; your captains of your branchs, your elders, and your officers, with all the men of israel-juicy-towards, ’atem nizabim hayom kulekhem lifnei yhvh ’elohekhem, rashekhem shibtekhem ziqnekhem veshoterekhem kol ’ish yisra’el.
Tpkm nSykm wgrk aSr bqrb mxnyk mxTb ezyk ed Sab mymyk your little ones, your women, and thy stranger that is in thy camp, from the hewer of thy wood unto the drawer of thy from-waters: tapekhem neshekhem vegerekha ’asher beqereb makhanekha, mekhoteb ‘ezekha ‘ad sho’eb memekha.
lebrk bbryt yhwh alhyk wbaltw aSr yhwh alhyk krt emk hywm that thou shouldest enter into covenant with yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, and into his toward-oath, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these maketh with thee this day: le‘aberekha bibrit yhvh ’elohekha ube’alato, ’asher yhvh ’elohekha koret ‘imekha hayom.
lmen hqym atk hywm lw lem whwa yhyh lk lalhym kaSr dbr lk wkaSr nSbe labtyk labrhm lyzxq wlyeqb that he may establish thee to day for a with-mum-people unto himself, and that he may be unto thee a to-no-these, as he hath said unto thee, and as he hath sworn unto thy fathers, to abraham-their-dick, to isaac-laughter, and to jacob-backstreet. lema‘an haqim ’otekha hayom lo le‘am vehu yihyeh lekha lelohim ka’asher diber lakh, vekha’asher nishba‘ la’abotekha le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob.
wla atkm lbdkm anky krt at hbryt hcat wat halh hcat neither with you only do i make this covenant and this toward-oath; velo ’itekhem lebadekhem, ’anokhi koret haberit hazot ve’et ha’alah hazot.
ky at aSr ySnw ph emnw emd hywm lpny yhwh alhynw wat aSr aynnw ph emnw hywm and with him that standeth here with us this day before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these, and also with him that is not here with us this day: ki ’et ’asher yeshno poh ‘imanu ‘omed hayom lifnei yhvh ’elohenu, ve’et ’asher ’enenu poh ‘imanu hayom.
ky atm ydetm at aSr ySbnw barz mzrym wat aSr ebrnw bqrb hgwym aSr ebrtm (for ye hand-know how we have dwelt in the land of mizraim-narrows; and how we came through the nations which ye passed by; ki ’atem yeda‘tem ’asher yashabnu be’erez mizrayim, ve’et ’asher ‘abarnu beqereb hagoyim ’asher ‘abartem.
wtraw at Sqwzyhm wat gllyhm ez wabn ksp wchb aSr emhm and ye have seen their thorny-abominations, and their heap-idols, wood and father-child-stone, silver and gold, which were among them:) vatir’u shiquzehem ve’et gilulehem, ‘ez va’eben kesef vezahab ’asher ‘imahem.
pn yS bkm ayS aw aSh aw mSpxh aw SbT aSr lbbw pnh hywm mem yhwh alhynw llkt lebd at alhy hgwym hhm pn yS bkm SrS prh raS wlenh lest there should be among you man, or woman, or family, or branch, whose heart turneth away this day from yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these, to go and work for the to-no-these of these nations; lest there should be among you a root that beareth gall and wormwood; pen yesh bakhem ’ish ’o ’ishah ’o mishpakhah ’o shebet ’asher lebabo foneh hayom me‘im yhvh ’elohenu lalekhet la‘abod ’elohei hagoyim hahem, pen yesh bakhem shoresh poreh rosh vela‘anah.
whyh bSmew at dbry halh hcat whtbrk blbbw lamr Slwm yhyh ly ky bSrrwt lby alk lmen spwt hrwh at hzmah and it come to pass, when he heareth the bee-words of this curse, that he knee-fluffy-bless himself in his heart, saying, i have peace, though i walk in the imagination of mine heart, to add drunkenness to thirst: vehayah beshame‘o dibrei ha’alah hazot vehitbarekh bilbabo lemor shalom yihyeh li ki bishrirut libi ’elekh, lema‘an sefot haravah ’et hazeme’ah.
la yabh yhwh slx lw ky ac yeSn ap yhwh wqnatw bayS hhwa wrbzh bw kl halh hktwbh bspr hch wmxh yhwh at Smw mtxt hSmym yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will not spare him, and then the nose-anger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah and his jealousy smoke against that man, and all the curses that are written in this book lie upon him, and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah blot out his name from under namespaces. lo yobeh yhvh seloakh lo ki ’az ye‘shan ’af yhvh veqin’ato ba’ish hahu verabezah bo kal ha’alah haketubah basefer hazeh, umakhah yhvh shemo mitakhat hashamayim.
whbdylw yhwh lreh mkl SbTy ySral kkl alwt hbryt hktwbh bspr htwrh hch and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah separate him unto bad out of all the branchs of israel-juicy-towards, according to all the curses of the covenant that are written in this book of the teaching: vehibdilo yhvh lera‘ah mikol shibtei yisra’el, kekhol ’alot haberit haketubah besefer hatorah hazeh.
wamr hdwr haxrwn bnykm aSr yqwmw maxrykm whnkry aSr yba marz rxwqh wraw at mkwt harz hhwa wat txlayh aSr xlh yhwh bh so that the generation to come of your children-betweens that rise up after you, and the stranger that come from a far land, say, when they see the plagues of that land, and the sicknesses which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath laid upon it; ve’amar hador ha’akharon benekhem ’asher yaqumu me’akharekhem vehanakheri ’asher yabo me’erez rekhoqah, vera’u makot ha’arez hahiv ve’et takhalu’eha ’asher khilah yhvh bah.
gpryt wmlx Srph kl arzh la tcre wla tzmx wla yelh bh kl eSb kmhpkt sdm wemrh admh wzbyym wzbwym aSr hpk yhwh bapw wbxmtw and that the whole land thereof is brimstone, and salt, and burning, that it is not sown, nor beareth, nor any grass groweth therein, like the overthrow of sodom-splint-blood, and gomorrah-sheaves, admah-earth, and zeboim-swollen, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah overthrew in his nose-anger, and in his wrath: gaferit vamelakh serefah khal ’arzah lo tizara‘ velo tazmiakh velo ya‘aleh bah kal ‘eseb, kemahpekhat sedom va‘amorah ’admah uzebyim uzeboyim ’asher hafakh yhvh be’apo ubakhamato.
wamrw kl hgwym el mh eSh yhwh kkh larz hcat mh xry hap hgdwl hch even all nations say, wherefore hath yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah done thus unto this land? what meaneth the heat of this great nose-anger? ve’ameru kal hagoyim ‘al meh ‘asah yhvh kakhah la’arez hazot, meh khori ha’af hagadol hazeh.
wamrw el aSr ecbw at bryt yhwh alhy abtm aSr krt emm bhwzyaw atm marz mzrym then men say, because they have forsaken the covenant of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah to-no-these of their fathers, which he made with them when he brought them forth out of the land of mizraim-narrows: ve’ameru ‘al ’asher ‘azebu berit yhvh ’elohei ’abotam, ’asher karat ‘imam behozi’o ’otam me’erez mizrayim.
wylkw wyebdw alhym axrym wyStxww lhm alhym aSr la ydewm wla xlq lhm for they went and worked for other to-no-these, and partook-shatakh them, to-no-these whom they hand-knew not, and whom he had not given unto them: vayelekhu vaya‘abdu ’elohim ’akherim vayishtakhavu lahem, ’elohim ’asher lo yeda‘um velo khalaq lahem.
wyxr ap yhwh barz hhwa lhbya elyh at kl hqllh hktwbh bspr hch and the nose-anger of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah was kindled against this land, to bring upon it all the curses that are written in this book: vayikhar ’af yhvh ba’arez hahiv, lehabi ‘aleha kal haqelalah haketubah basefer hazeh.
wytSm yhwh mel admtm bap wbxmh wbqzp gdwl wySlkm al arz axrt kywm hch and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah rooted them out of their land in nose-anger, and in wrath, and in great indignation, and cast them into another land, as it is this day. vayiteshem yhvh me‘al ’admatam be’af ubekhemah ubeqezef gadol, vayashlikhem ’el ’erez ’akheret kayom hazeh.
hnstrt lyhwh alhynw whnglt lnw wlbnynw ed ewlm leSwt at kl dbry htwrh hcat the secret things belong unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah our to-no-these: and those things which are revealed belong unto us and to our children-betweens for ever, that we may do all the bee-words of this teaching. hanistarot yhvh ’elohenu, vehaniglot lanu ulebanenu ‘ad ‘olam la‘asot kal dibrei hatorah hazot.
whyh ky ybaw elyk kl hdbrym halh hbrkh whqllh aSr ntty lpnyk whSbt al lbbk bkl hgwym aSr hdyxk yhwh alhyk Smh and it come to pass, when all these things are come upon thee, the knee-fluffy-blessing and the curse, which i have set before-turns thee, and thou call them to mind among all the nations, whither yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these hath driven thee, vehayah khi yabo’u ‘alekha kal hadebarim ha’eleh haberakhah vehaqelalah ’asher natati lefanekha, vahashebota ’el lebabekha bekhal hagoyim ’asher hidikhakha yhvh ’elohekha shamah.
wSbt ed yhwh alhyk wSmet bqlw kkl aSr anky mzwk hywm ath wbnyk bkl lbbk wbkl npSk and return unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, and obey his voice according to all that i direct thee this day, thou and thy children-betweens, with all thine heart, and with all thy being; veshabta ‘ad yhvh ’elohekha veshama‘ta beqolo kekhol ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, ’atah ubanekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha.
wSb yhwh alhyk at Sbwtk wrxmk wSb wqbzk mkl hemym aSr hpyzk yhwh alhyk Smh that then yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these will turn thy captivity, and have compassion upon thee, and will return and gather thee from all the nations, whither yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these hath scattered thee. veshab yhvh ’elohekha shebutekha verikhamekha, veshab veqibezkha mikal ha‘amim ’asher hefizekha yhvh ’elohekha shamah.
am yhyh ndxk bqzh hSmym mSm yqbzk yhwh alhyk wmSm yqxk if any of thine be driven out unto the outmost parts of namespaces, from thence will yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these gather thee, and from thence will he fetch thee: ’im yihyeh nidakhakha biqzeh hashamayim, misham yeqabezkha yhvh ’elohekha umisham yiqakhekha.
whbyak yhwh alhyk al harz aSr yrSw abtyk wyrSth whyTbk whrbk mabtyk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these will bring thee into the land which thy fathers possessed, and thou possess it; and he will do thee good, and multiply thee above thy fathers. vehebi’akha yhvh ’elohekha ’el ha’arez ’asher yareshu ’abotekha virishtah, vehetibkha vehirbekha me’abotekha.
wml yhwh alhyk at lbbk wat lbb crek lahbh at yhwh alhyk bkl lbbk wbkl npSk lmen xyyk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these will scribe-circumcise thine heart, and the heart of thy seed, to love yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these with all thine heart, and with all thy being, that thou mayest live. umal yhvh ’elohekha lebabekha ve’et lebab zar‘ekha, le’ahabah yhvh ’elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha lema‘an khayekha.
wntn yhwh alhyk at kl halwt halh el aybyk wel Snayk aSr rdpwk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these will put all these curses upon thine father-adversaries, and on them that hate thee, which persecuted thee. venatan yhvh ’elohekha kal ha’alot ha’eleh, ‘al ’oyebekha ve‘al sone’ekha ’asher redafukha.
wath tSwb wSmet bqwl yhwh weSyt at kl mzwtyw aSr anky mzwk hywm and thou return and obey the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and do all his directives which i direct thee this day. ve’atah tashub veshama‘ta beqol yhvh, ve‘asita kal mizvotav ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom.
whwtyrk yhwh alhyk bkl meSh ydk bpry bTnk wbpry bhmtk wbpry admtk lTwbh ky ySwb yhwh lSwS elyk lTwb kaSr SS el abtyk and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these will make thee plenteous in every work of thine hand, in the fruit of thy body, and in the fruit of thy in-them-animal, and in the fruit of thy land, for good: for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah will again rejoice over thee for good, as he rejoiced over thy fathers: vehotirekha yhvh ’elohekha bekhol ma‘aseh yadekha bifri bitnekha ubifri behemtekha ubifri ’admatekha letobah, ki yashub yhvh lasus ‘alekha letob ka’asher sas ‘al ’abotekha.
ky tSme bqwl yhwh alhyk lSmr mzwtyw wxqtyw hktwbh bspr htwrh hch ky tSwb al yhwh alhyk bkl lbbk wbkl npSk if thou hearken unto the voice of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, to keep his directives and his statutes which are written in this book of the teaching, and if thou turn unto yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these with all thine heart, and with all thy being. ki tishma‘ beqol yhvh ’elohekha lishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav haketubah besefer hatorah hazeh, ki tashub ’el yhvh ’elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha.
ky hmzwh hcat aSr anky mzwk hywm la nplat hwa mmk wla rxqh hwa for this directive which i direct thee this day, it is not hidden from thee, neither is it far off. ki hamizvah hazot ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom, lo niflet hi mimekha velo rekhoqah hi
la bSmym hwa lamr my yelh lnw hSmymh wyqxh lnw wySmenw ath wneSnh it is not in namespaces, that thou shouldest say, who go up for us to namespaces, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it? lo bashamayim hi lemor mi ya‘aleh lanu hashamaymah veyiqakheha lanu veyashmi‘enu ’otah vena‘asenah.
wla mebr lym hwa lamr my yebr lnw al ebr hym wyqxh lnw wySmenw ath wneSnh neither is it beyond the sea, that thou shouldest say, who go over the sea for us, and bring it unto us, that we may hear it, and do it? velo me‘eber layam hi lemor mi ya‘abar lanu ’el ‘eber hayam veyiqakheha lanu veyashmi‘enu ’otah vena‘asenah.
ky qrwb alyk hdbr mad bpyk wblbbk leStw and the bee-word is very nigh unto thee, in thy mouth, and in thy heart, that thou mayest do it. ki qarob ’elekha hadabar me’od, befikha ubilbabekha la‘asoto.
rah ntty lpnyk hywm at hxyym wat hTwb wat hmwt wat hre see, i have set before-turns thee this day life and good, and death and bad; re’eh natati lefanekha hayom hakhayim ve’et hatob, ve’et hamavet ve’et hara‘.
aSr anky mzwk hywm lahbh at yhwh alhyk llkt bdrkyw wlSmr mzwtyw wxqtyw wmSpTyw wxyyt wrbyt wbrkk yhwh alhyk barz aSr ath ba Smh lrSth in that i direct thee this day to love yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, to walk in his ways, and to keep his directives and his statutes and his decision-grammars, that thou mayest live and multiply: and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these knee-fluffy-bless thee in the land whither thou goest to possess it. ’asher ’anokhi mezavekha hayom le’ahabah yhvh ’elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav velishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav umishpatav, vekhayita verabita uberakhkha yhvh ’elohekha ba’arez ’asher ’atah ba shamah lerishtah.
wam ypnh lbbk wla tSme wndxt whStxwyt lalhym axrym webdtm and if thine heart turn away, so that thou wilt not hear, and be drawn away, and partake-shatakh other to-no-these, and work for them; ve’im yifneh lebabekha velo tishma‘, venidakhta vehishtakhavita lelohim ’akherim va‘abadtam.
hgdty lkm hywm ky abd tabdwn la tarykn ymym el hadmh aSr ath ebr at hyrdn lba Smh lrSth i denounce unto you this day, that ye surely perish, and that ye not prolong your days upon the land, whither thou passest over jordan-its-going-down to go to possess it. higadti lakhem hayom ki ’abod tobedun, lo ta’arikhun yamim ‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atah ‘ober hayarden labo shamah lerishtah.
heydty bkm hywm at hSmym wat harz hxyym whmwt ntty lpnyk hbrkh whqllh wbxrt bxyym lmen txyh ath wcrek i call namespaces and earth to record this day against you, that i have set before-turns you life and death, knee-fluffy-blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that both thou and thy seed may live: ha‘idoti bakhem hayom hashamayim ve’et ha’arez hakhayim vehamavet natati lefanekha haberakhah vehaqelalah, ubakharta bakhayim lema‘an tikhyeh ’atah vezar‘ekha.
lahbh at yhwh alhyk lSme bqlw wldbqh bw ky hwa xyyk wark ymyk lSbt el hadmh aSr nSbe yhwh labtyk labrhm lyzxq wlyeqb ltt lhm that thou mayest love yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, and that thou mayest obey his voice, and that thou mayest cleave unto him: for he is thy life, and the length of thy days: that thou mayest dwell in the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sware unto thy fathers, to abraham-their-dick, to isaac-laughter, and to jacob-backstreet, to give them. le’ahabah yhvh ’elohekha lishmoa‘ beqolo uledabeqah bo, ki hu khayekha ve’orekh yamekha lashebet ‘al ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotekha le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob latet lahem.
wylk mSh wydbr at hdbrym halh al kl ySral and mose-extracted went and spake these bee-words unto all israel-juicy-towards. vayelekh mosheh, vaydaber hadebarim ha’eleh ’el kal yisra’el.
wyamr alhm bn mah weSrym Snh anky hywm la awkl ewd lzat wlbwa wyhwh amr aly la tebr at hyrdn hch and he said unto them, i am an hundred and double-ten-twenty years old this day; i can no more go out and come in: also yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath said unto me, no go over this jordan-its-going-down. vayomer ’alehem ben me’ah ve‘esrim shanah ’anokhi hayom lo ’ukhal ‘od lazet velabo, yhvh ’amar ’elay lo ta‘abor hayarden hazeh.
yhwh alhyk hwa ebr lpnyk hwa ySmyd at hgwym halh mlpnyk wyrStm yhwSe hwa ebr lpnyk kaSr dbr yhwh yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, he will go over before-turns thee, and he will destroy these nations from before-turns thee, and thou possess them: and joshua-jesus-save, he go over before-turns thee, as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath said. yhvh ’elohekha hu ‘ober lefanekha hu yashmid hagoyim ha’eleh milefanekha virishtam, yehoshua‘ hu ‘ober lefanekha ka’asher diber yhvh.
weSh yhwh lhm kaSr eSh lsyxwn wlewg mlky hamry wlarzm aSr hSmyd atm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah do unto them as he did to sihon-curly and to og-mock, king-molochs of the amorite-talkers, and unto the land of them, whom he destroyed. ve‘asah yhvh lahem ka’asher ‘asah lesikhon ule‘og malkhei ha’emori ule’arzam, ’asher hishmid ’otam.
wntnm yhwh lpnykm weSytm lhm kkl hmzwh aSr zwyty atkm and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah give them up before-turns your face-turns, that ye may do unto them according unto all the directives which i have direct you. unetanam yhvh lifnekhem, va‘asitem lahem kekhal hamizvah ’asher ziviti ’etkhem.
xcqw wamzw al tyraw wal terzw mpnyhm ky yhwh alhyk hwa hhlk emk la yrpk wla yecbk be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee. khizqu ve’imzu ’al tire’u ve’al ta‘arzu mipenehem, ki yhvh ’elohekha hu haholekh ‘imakh lo yarpekha velo ya‘azbeka.
wyqra mSh lyhwSe wyamr alyw leyny kl ySral xcq wamz ky ath tbwa at hem hch al harz aSr nSbe yhwh labtm ltt lhm wath tnxylnh awtm and mose-extracted called unto joshua-jesus-save, and said unto him in the sight of all israel-juicy-towards, be strong and of a good courage: for thou must go with this with-mum-people unto the land which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hath sworn unto their fathers to give them; and thou cause them to inherit it. vayiqra mosheh lihoshua‘ vayomer ’elav le‘enei khal yisra’el khazaq ve’emaz ki ’atah tabo ’et ha‘am hazeh ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ yhvh la’abotam latet lahem, ve’atah tankhilenah ’otam.
wyhwh hwa hhlk lpnyk hwa yhyh emk la yrpk wla yecbk la tyra wla txt and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, he it is that doth go before-turns thee; he will be with thee, he will not fail thee, neither forsake thee: fear not, neither be dismayed. yhvh hu haholekh lefanekha hu yihyeh ‘imakh lo yarpekha velo ya‘azbeka, lo tira velo tekhat.
wyktb mSh at htwrh hcat wytnh al hkhnym bny lwy hnSaym at arwn bryt yhwh wal kl cqny ySral and mose-extracted wrote this teaching, and delivered it unto the dimmer-servers children-betweens of levi-join, which bare the cabinet of the covenant of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, and unto all the elders of israel-juicy-towards. vayikhtob mosheh hatorah hazot vayitenah ’el hakohanim benei levi hanose’im ’aron berit yhvh, ve’el kal ziqnei yisra’el.
wyzw mSh awtm lamr mqz Sbe Snym bmed Snt hSmTh bxg hskwt and mose-extracted direct them, saying, at the end of every seven years, in the solemnity of the year of release, in the until-conception of dwellings, vayzav mosheh ’otam lemor, miqez sheba‘ shanim bemo‘ed shenat hashemitah bekhag hasukot.
bbwa kl ySral lrawt at pny yhwh alhyk bmqwm aSr ybxr tqra at htwrh hcat ngd kl ySral bacnyhm when all israel-juicy-towards is come to appear before-turns yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah thy to-no-these in the stand-up-place which he choose, thou read this teaching before-turns all israel-juicy-towards in their hearing. bebo khal yisra’el lera’ot penei yhvh ’elohekha bamaqom ’asher yibkhar, tiqra hatorah hazot neged kal yisra’el be’azenehem.
hqhl at hem hanSym whnSym whTp wgrk aSr bSeryk lmen ySmew wlmen ylmdw wyraw at yhwh alhykm wSmrw leSwt at kl dbry htwrh hcat gather the with-mum-people together, men and women, and children-betweens, and thy stranger that is within thy hair-gates, that they may hear, and that they may learn, and fear yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, and guard-observe to do all the bee-words of this teaching: haqhel ha‘am ha’anashim vehanashim vehataf vegerekha ’asher bish‘arekha, lema‘an yishme‘u ulema‘an yilmedu veyare’u yhvh ’elohekhem veshameru la‘asot kal dibrei hatorah hazot.
wbnyhm aSr la ydew ySmew wlmdw lyrah at yhwh alhykm kl hymym aSr atm xyym el hadmh aSr atm ebrym at hyrdn Smh lrSth and that their children-betweens, which have not hand-known any thing, may hear, and learn to fear yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, as long as ye live in the land whither ye go over jordan-its-going-down to possess it. ubenehem ’asher lo yade‘u yishme‘u velamedu leyir’ah yhvh ’elohekhem, kal hayamim ’asher ’atem khayim ‘al ha’adamah ’asher ’atem ‘oberim hayarden shamah lerishtah.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hn qrbw ymyk lmwt qra at yhwSe whtyzbw bahl mwed wazwnw wylk mSh wyhwSe wytyzbw bahl mwed and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, behold, thy days approach that thou must die: call joshua-jesus-save, and present yourselves in the tent of until-conception, that i may give him a charge. and mose-extracted and joshua-jesus-save went, and presented themselves in the tent of until-conception. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hen qarebu yamekha lamut qera yehoshua‘ vehityazebu be’ohel mo‘ed va’azavenu, vayelekh mosheh vihoshua‘ vayityazebu be’ohel mo‘ed.
wyra yhwh bahl bemwd enn wyemd emwd henn el ptx hahl and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah appeared in the dwelling in a page-column-erection of a cloud: and the page-column-erection of the cloud stood over the opening of the dwelling. vayera yhvh ba’ohel be‘amud ‘anan, vaya‘amod ‘amud he‘anan ‘al petakh ha’ohel.
wyamr yhwh al mSh hnk Skb em abtyk wqm hem hch wcnh axry alhy nkr harz aSr hwa ba Smh bqrbw wecbny whpr at bryty aSr krty atw and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto mose-extracted, behold, thou sleep with thy fathers; and this with-mum-people will rise up, and go a whoring after the to-no-these of the strangers of the land, whither they go to be among them, and will forsake me, and break my covenant which i have made with them. vayomer yhvh ’el mosheh hinekha shokheb ‘im ’abotekha, veqam ha‘am hazeh vezanah ’akharei ’elohei nekhar ha’arez ’asher hu ba shamah beqirbo va‘azabani vehefer beriti ’asher karati ’ito.
wxrh apy bw bywm hhwa wecbtym whstrty pny mhm whyh lakl wmzahw rewt rbwt wzrwt wamr bywm hhwa hla el ky ayn alhy bqrby mzawny hrewt halh then my nose-anger be kindled against them in that day, and i will forsake them, and i will hide my face-turns from them, and they be devoured, and many bads and troubles befall them; so that they will say in that day, are not these bads come upon us, because our to-no-these is not among us? vekharah ’api bo bayom hahu va‘azabtim vehistarti fanay mehem vehayah le’ekhol umeza’uhu ra‘ot rabot vezarot, ve’amar bayom hahu halo ‘al ki ’en ’elohay beqirbi meza’uni hara‘ot ha’eleh.
wanky hstr astyr pny bywm hhwa el kl hreh aSr eSh ky pnh al alhym axrym and i will surely hide my face-turns in that day for all the bads which they have wrought, in that they are turned unto other to-no-these. ve’anokhi haster ’astir panay bayom hahu ‘al kal hara‘ah ’asher ‘asah, ki fanah ’el ’elohim ’akherim.
weth ktbw lkm at hSyrh hcat wlmdh at bny ySral Symh bpyhm lmen thyh ly hSyrh hcat led bbny ySral now therefore write ye this song for you, and teach it children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards: put it in their mouths, that this song may be a witness for me against children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. ve‘atah kitbu lakhem hashirah hazot velamedah bene yisra’el simah befihem, lema‘an tihyeh li hashirah hazot le‘ed bibnei yisra’el.
ky abyanw al hadmh aSr nSbety labtyw cbt xlb wdbS wakl wSbe wdSn wpnh al alhym axrym webdwm wnazwny whpr at bryty for when i have brought them into the land which i sware unto their fathers, that floweth with milk and honey; and they have eaten and filled themselves, and waxen fat; then will they turn unto other to-no-these, and work for them, and provoke me, and break my covenant. ki ’abi’enu ’el ha’adamah ’asher nishba‘ti la’abotav zabat khalab udebash ve’akhal vesaba‘ vedashen, ufanah ’el ’elohim ’akherim va‘abadum veni’azuni vehefer beriti.
whyh ky tmzan atw rewt rbwt wzrwt wenth hSyrh hcat lpnyw led ky la tSkx mpy crew ky ydety at yzrw aSr hwa eSh hywm bTrm abyanw al harz aSr nSbety and it come to pass, when many bads and troubles are befallen them, that this song testify against them as a witness; for it not be forgotten out of the mouths of their seed: for i hand-know their imagination which they go about, even now, before-turns i have brought them into the land which i sware. vehayah ki timzena ’oto ra‘ot rabot vezarot ve‘anetah hashirah hazot lefanav le‘ed ki lo tishakhakh mipi zar‘o, ki yada‘ti yizro ’asher hu ‘oseh hayom beterem ’abi’enu ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘eti.
wyktb mSh at hSyrh hcat bywm hhwa wylmdh at bny ySral mose-extracted therefore wrote this song the same day, and taught it children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. vayikhtob mosheh hashirah hazot bayom hahu, vaylamedah benei yisra’el.
wyzw at yhwSe bn nwn wyamr xcq wamz ky ath tbya at bny ySral al harz aSr nSbety lhm wanky ahyh emk and he gave joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish a charge, and said, be strong and of a good courage: for thou bring children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards into the land which i sware unto them: and i will be with thee. vayzav ’et yehoshua‘ bin nun vayomer khazaq ve’emaz ki ’atah tabi benei yisra’el ’el ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti lahem, ve’anokhi ’ehyeh ‘imakh.
wyhy kklwt mSh lktb at dbry htwrh hcat el spr ed tmm and it came to pass, when mose-extracted had made an end of writing the bee-words of this teaching in a book, until they were finished, vayhi kekhalot mosheh likhtob dibrei hatorah hazot ‘al sefer, ‘ad tumam.
wyzw mSh at hlwym nSay arwn bryt yhwh lamr that mose-extracted direct the levi-jointes, which conceived-of the cabinet of the covenant of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, saying, vayzav mosheh halviyim nose’ei ’aron berit yhvh lemor.
lqx at spr htwrh hch wSmtm atw mzd arwn bryt yhwh alhykm whyh Sm bk led take this book of the teaching, and put it in the side of the cabinet of the covenant of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah your to-no-these, that it may be there for a witness against thee. laqoakh sefer hatorah hazeh vesamtem ’oto mizad ’aron berit yhvh ’elohekhem, vehayah sham bekha le‘ed.
ky anky ydety at mryk wat erpk hqSh hn bewdny xy emkm hywm mmrym hytm em yhwh wap ky axry mwty for i hand-know thy rebellion, and thy stiff neck: behold, while i am yet alive with you this day, ye have been rebellious to yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah; and how much more after my death? ki ’anokhi yada‘ti meryekha ve’et ‘arepekha haqasheh, hen be‘odeni khay ‘imakhem hayom mamrim heyitem ‘im yhvh ve’af ki ’akharei moti.
hqhylw aly at kl cqny SbTykm wSTrykm wadbrh bacnyhm at hdbrym halh waeydh bm at hSmym wat harz gather unto me all the elders of your branchs, and your officers, that i may speak these bee-words in their ears, and call namespaces and earth to record against them. haqhilu ’elay kal ziqnei shibtekhem veshoterekhem, va’adaberah be’azenehem hadebarim ha’eleh ve’a‘idah bam hashamayim ve’et ha’arez.
ky ydety axry mwty ky hSxt tSxtwn wsrtm mn hdrk aSr zwyty atkm wqrat atkm hreh baxryt hymym ky teSw at hre beyny yhwh lhkeysw bmeSh ydykm for i hand-know that after my death ye will utterly corrupt yourselves, and turn aside from the way which i have direct you; and bad will befall you in the latter days; because ye will do bad in the sight of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, to provoke him to nose-anger through the work of your hands. ki yada‘ti ’akharei moti ki hashkhet tashkhitun vesartem min haderekh ’asher ziviti ’etkhem, veqarat ’etkhem hara‘ah be’akharit hayamim ki ta‘asu hara‘ be‘enei yhvh lehakh‘iso bema‘aseh yedekhem.
wydbr mSh bacny kl qhl ySral at dbry hSyrh hcat ed tmm and mose-extracted spake in the ears of all the until-witness of israel-juicy-towards the bee-words of this song, until they were ended. vaydaber mosheh be’azenei kal qehal yisra’el dibrei hashirah hazot, ‘ad tumam.
hacynw hSmym wadbrh wtSme harz amry py give ear, o ye namespacess, and i will speak; and hear, o earth, the bee-words of my mouth. ha’azinu hashamayim va’adaberah, vetishma‘ ha’arez ’imre fi.
yerp kmTr lqxy tcl kTl amrty kSeyrm ely dSa wkrbybym ely eSb my take-lessons drop as the rain, my speech distil as the dew, as the small rain upon the tender herb, and as the showers upon the grass: ya‘arof kamatar liqkhi tizal katal ’imrati, kis‘irim ‘ale deshe vekhirbibim ‘ale ‘eseb.
ky Sm yhwh aqra hbw gdl lalhynw because i will publish the name of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah: ascribe ye greatness unto our to-no-these. ki shem yhvh ’eqra, habu godel lelohenu.
hzwr tmym pelw ky kl drkyw mSpT al amwnh wayn ewl zdyq wySr hwa he is the rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are decision-grammar: a to-no-these of truth and without torment, just and right is he. hazur tamim pa‘olo ki khal derakhav mishpat, ’el ’emunah ve’en ‘avel zadiq veyashar hu.
Sxt lw la bnyw mwmm dwr eqS wptltl they have corrupted themselves, their spot is not the spot of his children-betweens: they are a perverse and crooked generation. shikhet lo lo banav mumam, dor ‘iqesh ufetaltol.
h lyhwh tgmlw cat em nbl wla xkm hlwa hwa abyk qnk hwa eSk wyknnk do ye thus requite yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, o foolish with-mum-people and unwise? is not he thy father that hath bought thee? hath he not made thee, and established thee? ha yhvh tigmelu zot ‘am nabal velo khakham, halo hu ’abikha qanekha hu ‘asekha vaykhonenekha.
ckr ymwt ewlm bynw Snwt dwr wdwr Sal abyk wygdk cqnyk wyamrw lk remember the days of old, consider the years of many generations: ask thy father, and he will show thee; thy elders, and they will tell thee. zekhor yemot ‘olam binu shenot dor vador, she’al ’abikha veyagedekha zeqenekha veyomeru lakh.
bhnxl elywn gwym bhprydw bny adm yzb gblt emym lmspr bny ySral when the most high divided to the nations their inheritance, when he separated children-betweens of adam-earth-blood-man, he set the bounds of the with-mum-people according to the number of children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards. behankhel ‘elyon goyim behafrido benei ’adam, yazeb gebulot ‘amim lemispar benei yisra’el.
ky xlq yhwh emw yeqb xbl nxltw for yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah's portion is his with-mum-people; jacob-backstreet is the lot-cover of his inheritance. ki kheleq yhvh ‘amo, ya‘aqob khebel nakhalato.
ymzahw barz mdbr wbthw yll ySmn ysbbnhw ybwnnhw yzrnhw kaySwn eynw he found him in a place-of-word-desert land, and in the waste howling place-of-word-desert; he led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye. yimza’ehu be’erez midbar ubetohu yelel yeshimon, yesobebenhu yebonehu yizerenhu ke’ishon ‘eno.
knSr yeyr qnw el gwclyw yrxp yprS knpyw yqxhw ySahw el abrtw as an drop-eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings: kenesher ya‘ir qino ‘al gozalav yerakhef, yifros kenafav yiqakhehu yisa’ehu ‘al ’ebrato.
yhwh bdd ynxnw wayn emw al nkr so yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah alone did lead him, and there was no strange to-no-these with him. yhvh badad yankhenu, ve’en ‘imo ’el nekhar.
yrkbhw el bmwty bmty arz wyakl tnwbt Sdy wynqhw dbS msle wSmn mxlmyS zwr he made him ride on the high places of the earth, that he might eat the increase of the fields; and he made him to suck honey out of the rock, and name-from-oil out of the flinty rock; yarkibehu ‘al bamotei ’arez vayokhal tenubot saday, vayeniqehu debash misela‘ veshemen mekhalmish zur.
xmat bqr wxlb zan em xlb krym waylym bny bSn wetwdym em xlb klywt xTh wdm enb tSth xmr butter of kine, and milk of sheep, with fat of lambs, and ram-voicelesss of the breed of bashan-at-tooth, and intense-goats, with the fat of eliminate-kidneys of wheat; and thou didst drink the pure-tahor blood of the grape. khem’at baqar vakhaleb zon ‘im kheleb karim ve’elim bene bashan ve‘atudim ‘im kheleb kilyot khitah, vedam ‘enab tishteh khamer.
wySmn ySrwn wybeT Smnt ebyt kSyt wyTS alwh eShw wynbl zwr ySetw and jeshurun-soaked waxed fat, and kicked: thou art waxen fat, thou art grown thick, thou art covered with fatness; then he forsook to-no-these which made him, and lightly esteemed the rock of his saving. vayishman yeshurun vayib‘at shamanta ‘abita kasita, vayitosh ’eloha ‘asahu vaynabel zur yeshu‘ato.

wyamr astyrh pny mhm arah mh axrytm ky dwr thpkt hmh bnym la amn bm and he said, i will hide my face-turns from them, i will see what their end be: for they are a very froward generation, children-betweens in whom is no faith-training. vayomer ’astirah fanay mehem ’er’eh mah ’akharitam, ki dor tahpukhot hemah banim lo ’emun bam.

mxwz tSkl xrb wmxdrym aymh gm bxwr gm btwlh ywnq em ayS Sybh the sword without, and terror within, destroy both the young man and the virgin, the suckling also with the man of gray gate-hairs. mikhuz teshakel khereb umekhadarim ’emah, gam bakhur gam betulah yoneq ‘im ’ish sebah.
