wlaSr amr brwk mbnym aSr yhy rzwy axyw wTbl bSmn rglw and of asher-bliss he said, let asher-bliss be knee-fluffy-blessed with children-betweens; let him be acceptable to his brethren, and let him dip his foot in name-from-oil. ule’asher ’amar barukh mibanim ’asher, yehi rezui ’ekhav vetobel bashemen raglo.
brcl wnxSt mnelyk wkymyk dbak thy shoes be iron and brass; and as thy days, so thy strength be. barzel unekhoshet min‘alekha, ukheyamekha dabe’ekha.
ayn kal ySrwn rkb Smym becrk wbgawtw Sxqym there is none like unto the to-no-these of jeshurun-soaked, who rideth upon the namespaces in thy help, and in his excellency on the sky. ’en ka’el yeshurun, rokheb shamayim be‘ezrekha ubega’avato shekhaqim.
menh alhy qdm wmtxt cret ewlm wygrS mpnyk awyb wyamr hSmd the eternal to-no-these is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he thrust out the enemy from before-turns thee; and say, destroy them. me‘onah ’elohei qedem umitakhat zero‘ot ‘olam, vaygaresh mipanekha ’oyeb vayomer hashmed.
wySkn ySral bTx bdd eyn yeqb al arz dgn wtyrwS ap Smyw yerpw Tl israel-juicy-towards then dwell in safety alone: the fountain of jacob-backstreet be upon a land of corn-swimming and wine-inherit; also his namespacess drop down dew. vayishkon yisra’el betakh badad ‘en ya‘aqob ’el ’erez dagan vetirosh, ’af shamav ya‘arfu tal.
aSryk ySral my kmwk em nwSe byhwh mgn ecrk waSr xrb gawtk wykxSw aybyk lk wath el bmwtymw tdrk happy art thou, o israel-juicy-towards: who is like unto thee, o with-mum-people saved by yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah, the shield of thy help, and who is the sword of thy excellency! and thine father-adversaries be found liars unto thee; and thou tread upon their high places. ’ashrekha yisra’el mi khamokha ‘am nosha‘ yhvh magen ‘ezrekha va’asher khereb ga’avatekha, veyikakhashu ’oyebekha lakh ve’atah ‘al bamotemo tidrokh.
wyel mSh merbt mwab al hr nbw raS hpsgh aSr el pny yrxw wyrahw yhwh at kl harz at hgled ed dn and mose-extracted went up from the plains of moab-from-father unto the mountain of nebo-at-him, to the top of pisgah-summit, that is over against jericho-moon-smell. and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah showed him all the land of gilead-roll-until-heap, unto dan-discuss, vaya‘al mosheh me‘arbot mo’ab ’el har nebo rosh hapisgah ’asher ‘al penei yerekho, vayar’ehu yhvh kal ha’arez hagil‘ad ‘ad dan.
wat kl nptly wat arz aprym wmnSh wat kl arz yhwdh ed hym haxrwn and all naphtali-twisted, and the land of ephraim-fruitful, and manasseh-place-of-sleep, and all the land of judah-know, unto the utmost sea, ve’et kal naftali ve’et ’erez ’efrayim umenasheh, ve’et kal ’erez yehudah ‘ad hayam ha’akharon.
wat hngb wat hkkr bqet yrxw eyr htmrym ed zer and the south-dry, and the plain of the valley of jericho-moon-smell, the light-city of palm trees, unto zoar-grief. ve’et hanegeb ve’et hakikar biq‘at yerekho ‘ir hatemarim ‘ad zo‘ar.
wyamr yhwh alyw cat harz aSr nSbety labrhm lyzxq wlyeqb lamr lcrek atnnh hraytyk beynyk wSmh la tebr and yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah said unto him, this is the land which i sware unto abraham-their-dick, unto isaac-laughter, and unto jacob-backstreet, saying, i will give it unto thy seed: i have caused thee to see it with thine eyes, and no go over thither. vayomer yhvh ’elav zot ha’arez ’asher nishba‘ti le’abraham leyizkhaq uleya‘aqob lemor lezar‘akha ’etenenah, her’itikha be‘enekha veshamah lo ta‘abor.
wymt Sm mSh ebd yhwh barz mwab el py yhwh so mose-extracted the worker of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah died there in the land of moab-from-father, according to the bee-word of yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah. vayamat sham mosheh ‘ebed yhvh be’erez mo’ab ‘al pi yhvh.
wyqbr atw bgy barz mwab mwl byt pewr wla yde ayS at qbrtw ed hywm hch and he buried him in a valley in the land of moab-from-father, over against betpeor-house-gaping: and no man knoweth of his sepulchre unto this day. vayiqbor ’oto bagay be’erez mo’ab mul bet pe‘or, velo yada‘ ’ish qeburato ‘ad hayom hazeh.
wmSh bn mah weSrym Snh bmtw la khth eynw wla ns lxh and mose-extracted was an hundred and double-ten-twenty years old when he died: his eye was not dim, nor his natural force abated. umosheh ben me’ah ve‘esrim shanah bemoto, lo khahatah ‘eno velo nas lekhoh.
wybkw bny ySral at mSh berbt mwab SlSym ywm wytmw ymy bky abl mSh and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards wept for mose-extracted in the plains of moab-from-father thirty days: so the days of weeping and mourning for mose-extracted were ended. vayibku benei yisra’el ’et mosheh be‘arbot mo’ab sheloshim yom, vayitemu yemei bekhi ’ebel mosheh.
wyhwSe bn nwn mla rwx xkmh ky smk mSh at ydyw elyw wySmew alyw bny ySral wyeSw kaSr zwh yhwh at mSh and joshua-jesus-save child-between of nun-fish was full of breath-spirit of wisdom; for mose-extracted had laid his hands upon him: and children-betweens of israel-juicy-towards hearkened unto him, and did as yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah direct mose-extracted. vihoshua‘ bin nun malei ruakh khakhmah ki samakh mosheh yadav ‘alav, vayishme‘u ’elav bene yisra’el vaya‘asu ka’asher zivah yhvh mosheh.
wla qm nbya ewd bySral kmSh aSr ydew yhwh pnym al pnym and there arose not a bringer since in israel-juicy-towards like unto mose-extracted, whom yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah hand-knew face-turns to face-turns, velo qam nabi ‘od beyisra’el kemosheh, ’asher yeda‘o yhvh panim ’el panim.
lkl hatwt whmwptym aSr Slxw yhwh leSwt barz mzrym lpreh wlkl ebdyw wlkl arzw in all the signs and the wonders, which yhwh-aeiou-ohyeah sent him to do in the land of mizraim-narrows to pharaoh-big-house, and to all his workers, and to all his land, lekhal ha’otot vehamoftim ’asher shelakho yhvh la‘asot be’erez mizrayim, lefar‘oh ulekhal ‘abadav ulekhal ’arzo.
wlkl hyd hxcqh wlkl hmwra hgdwl aSr eSh mSh leyny kl ySral and in all that mighty hand, and in all the great terror which mose-extracted showed in the sight of all israel-juicy-towards. ulekhol hayad hakhazaqah ulekhol hamora hagadol, ’asher ‘asah mosheh le‘enei kal yisra’el.
